 539  7AEE                  include "./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm
   1+ 7AEE              ScaleXX16Matrix197:
   2+ 7AEE                      IFDEF LOGMATHS
   3+ 7AEE ~                                    ld		b,9                 ; Interate though all 9 matrix elements
   4+ 7AEE ~                                    ld		hl,UBnkTransmatSidev ; within XX16 (transmat)
   5+ 7AEE ~                                    MMUSelectMathsTables
   6+ 7AEE ~            .ScaleXX16Loop:         ld		e,(hl)              ; set DE = matrix value              ;
   7+ 7AEE ~                                    inc		hl                  ;
   8+ 7AEE ~                                    ld		a,(hl)              ;
   9+ 7AEE ~                                    ld		d,a                 ;
  10+ 7AEE ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit        ; A holds high still to we can strip out sign bit
  11+ 7AEE ~                                    ld		ixl,a				; retain for sign bit
  12+ 7AEE ~                                    ShiftDELeft1				; carry now holds sign bit and DE = De * 2, this will in effect strip off the sign bit automatically
  13+ 7AEE ~                                    ld      a,d                 ; a = high byte after x 2
  14+ 7AEE ~                                    push	bc                  ; save BC  counter and constant 197
  15+ 7AEE ~                                    push	hl                  ; save HL
  16+ 7AEE ~                                    call    AEquAmul256Div197Log;
  17+ 7AEE ~                                    pop		hl
  18+ 7AEE ~                                    dec     hl                  ; move back to low byte
  19+ 7AEE ~                                    ld      (hl),a              ; save result in low byte as we want to preserve high byte sign
  20+ 7AEE ~                                    inc     hl                  ; move back to high byte
  21+ 7AEE ~                                    ld      a,ixl
  22+ 7AEE ~                                    ld      (hl),a              ; write back just sign bit
  23+ 7AEE ~                                    pop		bc                  ; retrieve both counter and constant 197
  24+ 7AEE ~                                    inc     hl                  ; no to next vertex value
  25+ 7AEE ~                                    djnz	.ScaleXX16Loop
  26+ 7AEE ~                                    MMUSelectROM0
  27+ 7AEE ~                                    ret
  28+ 7AEE                      ELSE
  29+ 7AEE 06 09                                ld		b,9                 ; Interate though all 9 matrix elements
  30+ 7AF0 0E C5                                ld		c,ConstNorm         ; c = 197
  31+ 7AF2 21 62 C0                             ld		hl,UBnkTransmatSidev ; within XX16 (transmat)
  32+ 7AF5 7E           .ScaleXX16Loop:         ld		a,(hl)              ; set DE = matrix value
  33+ 7AF6 5F                                   ld		e,a                 ;
  34+ 7AF7 23                                   inc		hl                  ;
  35+ 7AF8 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)              ;
  36+ 7AF9 57                                   ld		d,a                 ;
  37+ 7AFA E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; A holds high still to we can strip out sign bit
  38+ 7AFC DD 6F                                ld		ixl,a				; retain for sign bit
  39+ 7AFE                                      ShiftDELeft1				; carry now holds sign bit and DE = De * 2, this will in effect strip off the sign bit automatically
  39+ 7AFE CB 23       >			   sla e
  39+ 7B00 CB 12       >			   rl  d
  40+ 7B02 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; a = high byte after x 2
  41+ 7B03 C5                                   push	bc                  ; save BC  counter and constant 197
  42+ 7B04 E5                                   push	hl                  ; save HL
  43+ 7B05 CD 44 96                             call	DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC; AEquAmul256DivD; DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC	; result in BC = A*256 / 197 or D *512 / 197 = 2.6 * vector element, effectivley the result will always be in c
  44+ 7B08 E1                                   pop		hl
  45+ 7B09 2B                                   dec     hl                  ; move back to low byte
  46+ 7B0A 71                                   ld      (hl),c              ; save result in low byte as we want to preserve high byte sign
  47+ 7B0B 23                                   inc     hl                  ; move back to high byte
  48+ 7B0C                                  ;    ld      a,(hl)
  49+ 7B0C                                  ;    and     $80
  50+ 7B0C DD 7D                                ld      a,ixl
  51+ 7B0E 77                                   ld      (hl),a              ; write back just sign bit
  52+ 7B0F C1                                   pop		bc                  ; retrieve both counter and constant 197
  53+ 7B10 23                                   inc     hl                  ; no to next vertex value
  54+ 7B11 10 E2                                djnz	.ScaleXX16Loop
  55+ 7B13 C9                                   ret
  56+ 7B14                      ENDIF
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm
 540  7B14                  include "./Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm
   1+ 7B14              ;note: DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC as per
   2+ 7B14              ;                                   BC = A0
   3+ 7B14              ;                                   DE = 0C
   4+ 7B14              ;                                   so BC = a * 256 / C
   5+ 7B14
   6+ 7B14              ; We can cheat here, Speed is always 0 or positive
   7+ 7B14              ; z postion will always be positive if we can see it
   8+ 7B14
   9+ 7B14 EB           InitStarAtHL:           ex      de,hl               ; preserving hl
  10+ 7B15 CD 0C 85                             call    doRND               ; a = random OR bit 5
  11+ 7B18 EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; .
  12+ 7B19 F6 08                                or      8                   ; .
  13+ 7B1B 77                                   ld      (hl),a              ; save to x pos
  14+ 7B1C E6 7F                                and     $7F                 ; a = abs a
  15+ 7B1E 23                                   inc     hl                  ;
  16+ 7B1F 77                                   ld      (hl),a              ;
  17+ 7B20 EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; preserving hl
  18+ 7B21 CD 0C 85                             call    doRND               ; a = -ve (random / 2)
  19+ 7B24 EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; .
  20+ 7B25 0F                                   rrca                        ; .
  21+ 7B26 E6 80                                and     $80                 ; .
  22+ 7B28 B6                                   or      (hl)                ; or with
  23+ 7B29 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  24+ 7B2A 23                                   inc     hl
  25+ 7B2B EB                                   ex      de,hl
  26+ 7B2C CD 0C 85                             call    doRND
  27+ 7B2F EB                                   ex      de,hl
  28+ 7B30 F6 04                                or      4
  29+ 7B32 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  30+ 7B33 23                                   inc     hl
  31+ 7B34 E6 7F                                and     $7F
  32+ 7B36 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  33+ 7B37 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  34+ 7B38 CD 0C 85                             call    doRND
  35+ 7B3B EB                                   ex      de,hl
  36+ 7B3C 0F                                   rrca
  37+ 7B3D E6 80                                and     $80
  38+ 7B3F B6                                   or      (hl)
  39+ 7B40 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  40+ 7B41 23                                   inc     hl
  41+ 7B42 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  42+ 7B43 CD 0C 85                             call    doRND
  43+ 7B46 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  44+ 7B47 F6 90                                or      144
  45+ 7B49 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  46+ 7B4A 23                                   inc     hl
  47+ 7B4B F6 70                                or      %01110000
  48+ 7B4D E6 7F                                and     $7f     ; bodge
  49+ 7B4F 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  50+ 7B50 23                                   inc     hl
  51+ 7B51 C9                                   ret
  52+ 7B52
  53+ 7B52 EB           InitHyperStarAtHL:      ex      de,hl
  54+ 7B53 CD 0C 85                             call    doRND
  55+ 7B56 CB 27                                sla     a
  56+ 7B58 CB 27                                sla     a                ; so its * 4 as we have a blank spot
  57+ 7B5A EB                                   ex      de,hl
  58+ 7B5B E6 F8                                and     %11111000
  59+ 7B5D 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  60+ 7B5E E6 7F                                and     $7F
  61+ 7B60 23                                   inc     hl
  62+ 7B61 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  63+ 7B62 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  64+ 7B63 CD 0C 85                             call    doRND
  65+ 7B66 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  66+ 7B67 0F                                   rrca
  67+ 7B68 E6 80                                and     $80
  68+ 7B6A B6                                   or      (hl)
  69+ 7B6B 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  70+ 7B6C 23                                   inc     hl
  71+ 7B6D EB                                   ex      de,hl
  72+ 7B6E CD 0C 85                             call    doRND
  73+ 7B71 CB 27                                sla     a
  74+ 7B73 CB 27                                sla     a               ; so its * 4 as we have a blank spot
  75+ 7B75 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  76+ 7B76 E6 F8                                and     %11111000
  77+ 7B78 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  78+ 7B79 23                                   inc     hl
  79+ 7B7A E6 7F                                and     $7F
  80+ 7B7C 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  81+ 7B7D EB                                   ex      de,hl
  82+ 7B7E CD 0C 85                             call    doRND
  83+ 7B81 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  84+ 7B82 0F                                   rrca
  85+ 7B83 E6 80                                and     $80
  86+ 7B85 B6                                   or      (hl)
  87+ 7B86 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  88+ 7B87 23                                   inc     hl
  89+ 7B88 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  90+ 7B89 CD 0C 85                             call    doRND
  91+ 7B8C EB                                   ex      de,hl
  92+ 7B8D F6 5F                                or      95
  93+ 7B8F 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  94+ 7B90 23                                   inc     hl
  95+ 7B91 F6 70                                or      %01110000
  96+ 7B93 E6 7F                                and     $7f     ; bodge
  97+ 7B95 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  98+ 7B96 23                                   inc     hl
  99+ 7B97 C9                                   ret
 100+ 7B98
 101+ 7B98              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 102+ 7B98 06 0B        InitialiseStars:        ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars
 103+ 7B9A 21 85 80                             ld      hl,varDust
 104+ 7B9D CD 14 7B     .InitStarsLoop:         call    InitStarAtHL
 105+ 7BA0 10 FB                                djnz    .InitStarsLoop
 106+ 7BA2 C9                                   ret
 107+ 7BA3              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 108+ 7BA3 06 0B        InitialiseHyperStars:   ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars
 109+ 7BA5 21 85 80                             ld      hl,varDust
 110+ 7BA8 CD 52 7B     .InitStarsLoop:         call    InitHyperStarAtHL
 111+ 7BAB 10 FB                                djnz    .InitStarsLoop
 112+ 7BAD C9                                   ret
 113+ 7BAE              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 114+ 7BAE FD 21 85 80  SaveCurrentDust:        ld          iy,varDust
 115+ 7BB2 DD 21 6F 80                          ld          ix,varDustWarpRender
 116+ 7BB6 06 0B                                ld          b, MaxNumberOfStars
 117+ 7BB8 FD 7E 01     .SaveLoop               ld          a,(iy+1)
 118+ 7BBB 6F                                   ld          l,a
 119+ 7BBC E6 7F                                and         $7F
 120+ 7BBE                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,.StarNegXPt
 120+ 7BBE CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 120+ 7BC0 C2 C9 7B    >                        jp      nz,.StarNegXPt
 121+ 7BC3 C6 80                                add         a,$80
 122+ 7BC5 5F                                   ld          e,a
 123+ 7BC6 C3 CE 7B                             jp          .StarDoneX
 124+ 7BC9 57           .StarNegXPt:            ld          d,a
 125+ 7BCA 3E 80                                ld          a,$80
 126+ 7BCC 92                                   sub         d
 127+ 7BCD 5F                                   ld          e,a
 128+ 7BCE FD 7E 03     .StarDoneX:             ld          a,(iy+3)
 129+ 7BD1 6F                                   ld          l,a
 130+ 7BD2 E6 7F                                and         $7F
 131+ 7BD4                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,.StarNegYPt
 131+ 7BD4 CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 131+ 7BD6 C2 DF 7B    >                        jp      nz,.StarNegYPt
 132+ 7BD9 C6 60                                add         a,$60
 133+ 7BDB 57                                   ld          d,a
 134+ 7BDC C3 E4 7B                             jp          .StarDoneY
 135+ 7BDF 57           .StarNegYPt:            ld          d,a
 136+ 7BE0 3E 60                                ld          a,$60
 137+ 7BE2 92                                   sub         d
 138+ 7BE3 57                                   ld          d,a
 139+ 7BE4 DD 73 00     .StarDoneY:             ld          (ix+0),e
 140+ 7BE7 DD 72 01                             ld          (ix+1),d
 141+ 7BEA DD 23                                inc         ix
 142+ 7BEC DD 23                                inc         ix
 143+ 7BEE FD E5 E1                             ld          hl,iy
 144+ 7BF1 3E 06                                ld          a,6
 145+ 7BF3 ED 31                                add         hl,a
 146+ 7BF5 E5 FD E1                             ld          iy,hl
 147+ 7BF8 10 BE                                djnz        .SaveLoop
 148+ 7BFA C9                                   ret
 149+ 7BFB
 150+ 7BFB              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 151+ 7BFB 06 0B        DustForward:            ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars                  ; get the number of stars to process
 152+ 7BFD FD 21 85 80                          ld      iy,varDust                          ; hl is now a pointer to the dust array
 153+ 7C01 C5           StarProcessLoop:        push    bc                                  ; save counter +1
 154+ 7C02 FD 7E 05     .Qequ64XSpeedDivZHi:    ld      a,(iy+5)                            ; e  = z high
 155+ 7C05 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; d = 0
 156+ 7C06 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; de = zhi/256
 157+ 7C08 3A 59 7F                             ld      a,(DELTA)                           ; a = speed
 158+ 7C0B                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero .NormalSpeed               ; if we are stationary set speed
 158+ 7C0B A7          >                        and     a
 158+ 7C0C C2 10 7C    >                        jp	    nz,.NormalSpeed
 159+ 7C0F 3C                                   inc     a                                   ; so it is at least some dust movement
 160+ 7C10 47           .NormalSpeed:           ld      b,a                                 ;
 161+ 7C11 0E 00                                ld      c,0                                 ; bc = delta * 256
 162+ 7C13 CD D0 96                             call    BC_Div_DE                           ; BC = Speed/Z , HL = remainder
 163+ 7C16                                      ShiftHLRight1
 163+ 7C16 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 163+ 7C18 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 164+ 7C1A                                      ShiftHLRight1                               ; hl = remainder/2 so now 64 * speed / zhi
 164+ 7C1A CB 3C       >			   srl h
 164+ 7C1C CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 165+ 7C1E 7D                                   ld      a,l                                 ;
 166+ 7C1F F6 01                                or      1                                   ; so ensure A is at least 1 for ambient movement
 167+ 7C21 DD 6F                                ld      ixl,a                               ; preserve A which is also VarQ = 64 * speed / zhi
 168+ 7C23 FD 6E 04 FD  .ZequZMinusSpeedX64:    ld      hl,(iy+4)                           ; hl = z
 168+ 7C27 66 05
 169+ 7C29 ED 5B 5A 7F                          ld      de, (DELTA4)                         ; de = delta4 i.e. speed * 64 pre computed
 170+ 7C2D CD 75 01                             call    subHLDES15
 171+ 7C30                                      JumpOnBitSet h,7,ResetStar                  ; if z ended up negative then reset the star
 171+ 7C30 CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
 171+ 7C32 C2 87 7D    >                        jp      nz,ResetStar
 172+ 7C35 FD 75 04 FD                          ld      (iy+4),hl                           ; save new z pos
 172+ 7C39 74 05
 173+ 7C3B FD 6E 00 FD  .XEquXPlusXhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; hl  = x
 173+ 7C3F 66 01
 174+ 7C41 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 175+ 7C42 E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 176+ 7C44 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(x hi)
 177+ 7C45 DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 178+ 7C47 ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(x hi) * Q
 179+ 7C49 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 180+ 7C4A E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 181+ 7C4C B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 182+ 7C4D 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 183+ 7C4E CD 56 00                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4                  ; x = x + (x hi/256 * Q)
 184+ 7C51 7C                                   ld      a,h
 185+ 7C52 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 186+ 7C54                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $70, ResetStar
 186+ 7C54 FE 70       >                        cp     $70
 186+ 7C56 D2 87 7D    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 187+ 7C59 FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl                           ;
 187+ 7C5D 74 01
 188+ 7C5F FD 6E 02 FD  .YEquYPlusYhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; hl  = y
 188+ 7C63 66 03
 189+ 7C65 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 190+ 7C66 E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 191+ 7C68 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(y hi)
 192+ 7C69 DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 193+ 7C6B ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(y hi) * Q
 194+ 7C6D 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 195+ 7C6E E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 196+ 7C70 B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 197+ 7C71 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 198+ 7C72 CD 56 00                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4                  ; y = y + (x hi/256 * Q)
 199+ 7C75 7C                                   ld      a,h
 200+ 7C76 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 201+ 7C78                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60, ResetStar
 201+ 7C78 FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 201+ 7C7A D2 87 7D    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 202+ 7C7D 7C                                   ld      a,h
 203+ 7C7E E6 80                                and     $80
 204+ 7C80 20 06                                jr      nz,.NoSecondCheck
 205+ 7C82 7C                                   ld      a,h
 206+ 7C83                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $20, ResetStar
 206+ 7C83 FE 20       >                        cp     $20
 206+ 7C85 D2 87 7D    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 207+ 7C88 FD 75 02 FD  .NoSecondCheck:         ld      (iy+2),hl                           ;
 207+ 7C8C 74 03
 208+ 7C8E              ; Now roll
 209+ 7C8E              ;  6. x = x - alpha * y / 256
 210+ 7C8E 3A 79 7E     .XRoll:                 ld      a,(ALP1)                           ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 211+ 7C91 FE 00                                cp      0
 212+ 7C93 28 4D                                jr      z,.NoRoll                           ; don;t roll if magnitude is 0
 213+ 7C95                                   ;   break
 214+ 7C95 6F                                   ld      l,a                                 ; roll magnitude
 215+ 7C96 3A 7B 7E                             ld      a,(ALP2FLIP)                        ; inverted roll sign
 216+ 7C99 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                        ; sanitise sign bit
 217+ 7C9B 67                                   ld      h,a                                 ; h = roll sign
 218+ 7C9C E5                                   push    hl                                  ; save on the stack
 219+ 7C9D 4F           .rxSaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,a                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 220+ 7C9E 55           .rxDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 221+ 7C9F FD 7E 03                             ld      a,(iy+3)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 222+ 7CA2 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save signed byte
 223+ 7CA3 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                        ; a = sign only
 224+ 7CA5 47           .rxBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 225+ 7CA6 7B           .rxEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e                                 ; e = abs byte
 226+ 7CA7 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 227+ 7CA9 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 228+ 7CAA ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 229+ 7CAC 79                                   ld      a,c                                 ; get back sign from roll
 230+ 7CAD A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 231+ 7CAE B2                                   or      d
 232+ 7CAF 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 233+ 7CB0 FD 6E 00 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 233+ 7CB4 66 01
 234+ 7CB6 CD 75 01                             call    subHLDES15                       ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 235+ 7CB9 FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl
 235+ 7CBD 74 01
 236+ 7CBF              ;  5. y = y + alpha * x / 256
 237+ 7CBF              .YRoll:                 ;break
 238+ 7CBF E1                                   pop     hl                                  ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 239+ 7CC0 4C           .rySaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,h                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 240+ 7CC1 55           .ryDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 241+ 7CC2 FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 242+ 7CC5 5F                                   ld      e,a
 243+ 7CC6 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 244+ 7CC8 47           .ryBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 245+ 7CC9 7B           .ryEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e
 246+ 7CCA E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 247+ 7CCC 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 248+ 7CCD ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 249+ 7CCF 79                                   ld      a,c
 250+ 7CD0 A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 251+ 7CD1 B2                                   or      d
 252+ 7CD2 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 253+ 7CD3 FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 253+ 7CD7 66 03
 254+ 7CD9 CD 56 00                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4                  ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 255+ 7CDC FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 255+ 7CE0 74 03
 256+ 7CE2 3A 6D 7E     .NoRoll:                ld      a,(BET1)
 257+ 7CE5 FE 00                                cp      0
 258+ 7CE7 28 22                                jr      z,.NoPitch
 259+ 7CE9              ;  8. y = y - beta * 256
 260+ 7CE9 57           .YPitch:                ld      d,a                                 ; d = BET1
 261+ 7CEA FD 7E 02                             ld      a,(iy+2)
 262+ 7CED 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; e = Y HI
 263+ 7CEE ED 30                                mul                                         ; de = BET1 * YHi so now D = BETA & YHI / 256
 264+ 7CF0 5F                                   ld      e,a
 265+ 7CF1 ED 30                                mul                                         ; so now de = (BETA & Yhi) ^ 2
 266+ 7CF3                                      ShiftDELeft1                                ; de = 2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2)
 266+ 7CF3 CB 23       >			   sla e
 266+ 7CF5 CB 12       >			   rl  d
 267+ 7CF7 3A 6E 7E                             ld      a,(BET2)                            ; get inverted Sign
 268+ 7CFA B2                                   or      d
 269+ 7CFB 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = - (2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2))
 270+ 7CFC FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)
 270+ 7D00 66 03
 271+ 7D02 CD 56 00                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4
 272+ 7D05 FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 272+ 7D09 74 03
 273+ 7D0B              ; now work out screen pos
 274+ 7D0B              ; Note two optimistations, write to layer 2 - we get a free removal via double buffer cls
 275+ 7D0B              ; read z dept than determine hw many pixesl to plot, e.g. 1,2,3,4
 276+ 7D0B              ;        pop     de
 277+ 7D0B               ;       call    ProjectStarXToScreen
 278+ 7D0B                                      ;pop     de
 279+ 7D0B              .NoPitch:
 280+ 7D0B FD 7E 01     .ProjectStar:           ld      a,(iy+1)
 281+ 7D0E 6F                                   ld      l,a
 282+ 7D0F E6 7F                                and     $7F
 283+ 7D11                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegXPt
 283+ 7D11 CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 283+ 7D13 C2 1C 7D    >                        jp      nz,StarNegXPt
 284+ 7D16 C6 80                                add     a,$80
 285+ 7D18 4F                                   ld      c,a
 286+ 7D19 C3 21 7D                             jp      StarDoneX
 287+ 7D1C 47           StarNegXPt:             ld      b,a
 288+ 7D1D 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 289+ 7D1F 90                                   sub     b
 290+ 7D20 4F                                   ld      c,a
 291+ 7D21 FD 7E 03     StarDoneX:              ld      a,(iy+3)
 292+ 7D24 6F                                   ld      l,a
 293+ 7D25 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 294+ 7D27                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegYPt
 294+ 7D27 CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 294+ 7D29 C2 32 7D    >                        jp      nz,StarNegYPt
 295+ 7D2C C6 60                                add     a,$60
 296+ 7D2E 47                                   ld      b,a
 297+ 7D2F C3 37 7D                             jp      StarDoneY
 298+ 7D32 47           StarNegYPt:             ld      b,a
 299+ 7D33 3E 60                                ld      a,$60
 300+ 7D35 90                                   sub     b
 301+ 7D36 47                                   ld      b,a
 302+ 7D37 3E 92        StarDoneY:              ld      a,L2DustColour
 303+ 7D39 C5                                   push    bc
 304+ 7D3A              .DrawStar:              MMUSelectLayer2
 304+ 7D3A ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 305+ 7D3E CD B6 E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 306+ 7D41 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 307+ 7D44 C1                                   pop    bc
 308+ 7D45                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60,EndofStarsLoop
 308+ 7D45 FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 308+ 7D47 D2 77 7D    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 309+ 7D4A 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 310+ 7D4C 0C                                   inc     c
 311+ 7D4D C5                                   push    bc
 312+ 7D4E                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 312+ 7D4E ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 313+ 7D52 CD B6 E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 314+ 7D55 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 315+ 7D58 C1                                   pop    bc
 316+ 7D59                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $37,EndofStarsLoop
 316+ 7D59 FE 37       >                        cp     $37
 316+ 7D5B D2 77 7D    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 317+ 7D5E 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 318+ 7D60 04                                   inc     b
 319+ 7D61 C5                                   push    bc
 320+ 7D62                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 320+ 7D62 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 321+ 7D66 CD B6 E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 322+ 7D69 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 323+ 7D6C C1                                   pop    bc
 324+ 7D6D 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 325+ 7D6F 0D                                   dec     c
 326+ 7D70                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 326+ 7D70 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 327+ 7D74 CD B6 E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 328+ 7D77 C1           EndofStarsLoop:         pop     bc                                      ;  0
 329+ 7D78 FD E5        NextStarLoop3:          push    iy                                      ; +1
 330+ 7D7A E1                                   pop     hl                                      ;  0
 331+ 7D7B ED 34 06 00                          add     hl,6
 332+ 7D7F E5           NextStarLoop2:          push    hl                                      ; +1
 333+ 7D80 FD E1                                pop     iy                                      ;  0
 334+ 7D82 05                                   dec     b
 335+ 7D83 C2 01 7C                             jp      nz,StarProcessLoop
 336+ 7D86 C9                                   ret
 337+ 7D87 C1           ResetStar:              pop     bc                                      ; 0
 338+ 7D88 FD E5                                push    iy                                      ; +1 (current star)
 339+ 7D8A E1                                   pop     hl                                      ; 0
 340+ 7D8B CD 14 7B                             call    InitStarAtHL
 341+ 7D8E C3 78 7D                             jp      NextStarLoop3
 342+ 7D91              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 343+ 7D91 FD 4E 00     ProjectStarXToScreen:   ld      c,(iy+0)
 344+ 7D94 FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)
 345+ 7D97 6F                                   ld      l,a
 346+ 7D98 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 347+ 7D9A 47                                   ld      b,a
 348+ 7D9B CD 5B 96                             call    DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 349+ 7D9E 7D                                   ld      a,l
 350+ 7D9F                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarXNegativePoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
 350+ 7D9F CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 350+ 7DA1 C2 AC 7D    >                        jp      nz,StarXNegativePoint
 351+ 7DA4              ;StarXPositivePoint:									; x was positive result
 352+ 7DA4 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX						;
 353+ 7DA6 26 00                                ld          h,0
 354+ 7DA8 09                                   add         hl,bc								; hl = Screen Centre + X
 355+ 7DA9 C3 B3 7D                             jp          StarStoreXPoint
 356+ 7DAC              StarXNegativePoint:                                 ; x < 0 so need to subtract from the screen centre position
 357+ 7DAC 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX
 358+ 7DAE 26 00                                ld          h,0
 359+ 7DB0                                      ClearCarryFlag
 359+ 7DB0 B7          >                        or a
 360+ 7DB1 ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre - X
 361+ 7DB3              StarStoreXPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 362+ 7DB3 7D                                   ld          a,l
 363+ 7DB4 32 DD 80                             ld          (varStarX),a
 364+ 7DB7 C9                                   ret
 365+ 7DB8
 366+ 7DB8 FD 46 02     ProjectStarYToScreen:   ld          b,(iy+2)
 367+ 7DBB FD 7E 03                             ld          a,(iy+3)
 368+ 7DBE 6F                                   ld          l,a
 369+ 7DBF E6 7F                                and         $7F
 370+ 7DC1 47                                   ld          b,a
 371+ 7DC2 CD 5B 96                             call        DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 372+ 7DC5 7D                                   ld          a,l                                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
 373+ 7DC6                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarNegativeYPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap top of screen is Y = 0
 373+ 7DC6 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 373+ 7DC8 C2 D3 7D    >                        jp      nz,StarNegativeYPoint
 374+ 7DCB                                  ;StarPositiveYPoint:									; Y is positive so above the centre line
 375+ 7DCB 2E 60                               ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 376+ 7DCD                                      ClearCarryFlag
 376+ 7DCD B7          >                        or a
 377+ 7DCE ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc  							 	; hl = ScreenCentreY - Y coord (as screen is 0 at top)
 378+ 7DD0 C3 D8 7D                             jp          StarStoreYPoint
 379+ 7DD3              StarNegativeYPoint:									; this bit is only 8 bit aware TODO FIX
 380+ 7DD3 2E 60                                ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 381+ 7DD5 26 00                                ld          h,0
 382+ 7DD7 09                                   add         hl,bc								; hl = ScreenCenterY + Y as negative is below the center of screen
 383+ 7DD8              StarStoreYPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 384+ 7DD8 7D                                   ld          a,l
 385+ 7DD9 32 DE 80                             ld          (varStarY),a
 386+ 7DDC C9                                   ret
 387+ 7DDD
 388+ 7DDD
# file closed: ./Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm
 541  7DDD                  INCLUDE	"./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm"
# file opened: ./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm
   1+ 7DDD
   2+ 7DDD 00           memfillvalue		DB 0
   3+ 7DDE 83 C3 C7 CB  memfill        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   3+ 7DE2 7D
   4+ 7DE3 DD 7D        memfill_astrt  		DW memfillvalue
   5+ 7DE5 00 40        memfill_length 		DB $00,$40
   6+ 7DE7 24 10 AD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1FIXED_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   7+ 7DEA 00 00        memfill_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   8+ 7DEC 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   9+ 7DF0              memfill_cmd_len	  	EQU $ - memfill
  10+ 7DF0
  11+ 7DF0              memfill_dma:
  12+ 7DF0              ; "memfill_dma, hl = address to fill, a = value, de = length"
  13+ 7DF0              .set_fill_value:
  14+ 7DF0 32 DD 7D     	ld 		(memfillvalue),a
  15+ 7DF3              .set_target:
  16+ 7DF3 22 EA 7D     	ld		(memfill_bstrt),hl
  17+ 7DF6              .set_length:
  18+ 7DF6 ED 53 E5 7D  	ld		(memfill_length),de
  19+ 7DFA              .write_dma:
  20+ 7DFA 21 DE 7D     	ld 		hl, memfill
  21+ 7DFD 06 12        	ld 		b, memfill_cmd_len
  22+ 7DFF 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  23+ 7E01 ED B3        	otir
  24+ 7E03 C9           	ret
  25+ 7E04
# file closed: ./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm
 542  7E04                  INCLUDE	"./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm"
# file opened: ./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm
   1+ 7E04
   2+ 7E04 83 C3 C7 CB  memcopy        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   2+ 7E08 7D
   3+ 7E09 00 00        memcopy_astrt  		DB $00,$00
   4+ 7E0B 00 40        memcopy_length 		DB $00,$40
   5+ 7E0D 14 10 CD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_BURST_MODE;DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   6+ 7E10 00 00        memcopy_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   7+ 7E12 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   8+ 7E16              memcopy_cmd_len	  	equ $ - memcopy
   9+ 7E16
  10+ 7E16              memcopy_dma:
  11+ 7E16              ; "memcopy_dma, hl = target address de = source address to copy, bc = length"
  12+ 7E16              .set_target:
  13+ 7E16 22 10 7E     	ld		(memcopy_bstrt),hl
  14+ 7E19              .set_source:
  15+ 7E19 ED 53 09 7E  	ld		(memcopy_astrt),de
  16+ 7E1D              .set_length:
  17+ 7E1D ED 43 0B 7E  	ld		(memcopy_length),bc
  18+ 7E21              .write_dma:
  19+ 7E21 21 04 7E     	ld 		hl, memcopy
  20+ 7E24 06 12        	ld 		b, memcopy_cmd_len
  21+ 7E26 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  22+ 7E28 ED B3        	otir
  23+ 7E2A C9           	ret
  24+ 7E2B
# file closed: ./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm
 543  7E2B 00 00        XX12PVarQ			DW 0
 544  7E2D 00 00        XX12PVarR			DW 0
 545  7E2F 00 00        XX12PVarS			DW 0
 546  7E31 00 00        XX12PVarResult1		DW 0

 548  7E35 00 00        XX12PVarResult3		DW 0
 549  7E37 00           XX12PVarSign2		DB 0
 550  7E38 00           XX12PVarSign1		DB 0								; Note reversed so BC can do a little endian fetch
 551  7E39 00           XX12PVarSign3		DB 0
 552  7E3A                  INCLUDE "./Variables/constant_equates.asm"
# file opened: ./Variables/constant_equates.asm
   1+ 7E3A              ;Contants

   3+ 7E3A              SignMask8Bit		equ %01111111
   4+ 7E3A              SignMask16Bit		equ %0111111111111111
   5+ 7E3A              SignOnly8Bit		equ $80
   6+ 7E3A              SignOnly16Bit		equ $8000
   7+ 7E3A

  13+ 7E3A              Bit2Only            equ %00000100
  14+ 7E3A              Bit1Only            equ %00000010
  15+ 7E3A              Bit0Only            equ %00000001
  16+ 7E3A              Bit7Clear           equ %01111111

  18+ 7E3A              Bit5Clear           equ %11011111

  64+ 7E3A              ShipTypeNormal          equ 0

  81+ 7E3A              SpawnTypeDoNotSpawn     EQU SpawnTypeMissionEvent   + 1
  82+ 7E3A
  83+ 7E3A
  84+ 7E3A              ; Laser and Missile Settings
  85+ 7E3A              ; Laser and Missile
  86+ 7E3A              ShipLaserPower          equ %11110000
  87+ 7E3A              ShipMissileCount        equ %00001111
  88+ 7E3A              ShipMissiles1           equ %00000001
  89+ 7E3A              ShipMissiles2           equ %00000010
  90+ 7E3A              ShipMissiles3           equ %00000011
  91+ 7E3A              ShipMissiles4           equ %00000100

  93+ 7E3A              ShipMissiles6           equ %00000110

 103+ 7E3A              ; AI Flags  UniverseAIControl
 104+ 7E3A              ShipCanAnger            equ %10000000   ; Yes or no
 105+ 7E3A              ShipFighterBaySize      equ %01110000   ; fighter day size 0 = none 1,2 = 1 or 2 fighters, 3 = infinite
 106+ 7E3A              ShipFighterBaySize1     equ %00010000   ; fighter day size 0 = none 1,2 = 1 or 2 fighters, 3 = infinite
 107+ 7E3A              ShipFighterBaySize2     equ %00100000   ; fighter day size 0 = none 1,2 = 1 or 2 fighters, 3 = infinite
 108+ 7E3A              ShipFighterBaySize3     equ %00110000   ; fighter day size 0 = none 1,2 = 1 or 2 fighters, 3 = infinite
 109+ 7E3A              ShipFighterBaySize4     equ %01000000   ; fighter day size 0 = none 1,2 = 1 or 2 fighters, 3 = infinite
 110+ 7E3A              ShipFighterBaySize5     equ %01010000   ; fighter day size 0 = none 1,2 = 1 or 2 fighters, 3 = infinite
 111+ 7E3A              ShipFighterBaySizeInf   equ %01110000   ; Infinite fighters (well 255 as thats enough)
 112+ 7E3A              ShipFighterType         equ %00001100   ; 4 types 0 = Worm, 1 = Sidewinder, 2 = Viper, 3 = Thargon
 113+ 7E3A              ShipFighterWorm         equ %00000000
 114+ 7E3A              ShipFighterSidewinder   equ %00000100
 115+ 7E3A              ShipFighterViper        equ %00001000
 116+ 7E3A              ShipFighterThargon      equ %00001100
 117+ 7E3A              ShipUltraHostile        equ %00000010   ; If ultra hostile, will never back down so behaves like a missile
 118+ 7E3A              ShipFree                equ $00000011   ; Unused bits at present for later
 119+ 7E3A              ; NewBTactics
 120+ 7E3A              ShipIsTrader            equ Bit0Only   ; Trader flag  80% are peaceful 20% also have Bounty Hunter flag

 122+ 7E3A              ShipIsHostile           equ Bit2Only   ; Also used as Angry flag now

 375+ 815A              ; $094A =	EQUW page9+37* 2

 378+ 815A              ; $09B9 =	EQUW page9+37* 5
 379+ 815A              ; $09DE =	EQUW page9+37* 6
 380+ 815A              ; $0A03 =	EQUW page9+37* 7
 381+ 815A              ; $0A28 =	EQUW page9+37* 8
 382+ 815A              ; $0A4D =	EQUW page9+37* 9
 383+ 815A              ; $0A72 =	EQUW page9+37*10
 384+ 815A              ; $0A97 =	EQUW page9+37*11
 385+ 815A              ; $0ABC =	EQUW page9+37*12 \ allwk up to &0ABC while heap for edges working down from &CFF.

 557  850B                  INCLUDE "./Variables/random_number.asm"
# file opened: ./Variables/random_number.asm
   1+ 850B              doRandom2:									; .DORND2	\ -> &3F85 \ Restricted for explosion dust.
   2+ 850B              doRND2:
   3+ 850B A7           	and		a								; fast clear carry  leave bit0 of RAND+2 at 0.
   4+ 850C              doRandom:									;.DORND	\ -> &3F86 \ do random, new A, X.
   5+ 850C              ; "doRandom, Random Seed update, new value in A & C)"
   6+ 850C              ; uses a c h l registers
   7+ 850C              doRND:                  ;exx                                     ; protect bc,de,hl
   8+ 850C 3A 54 7E                             ld		a,(RandomSeed)					; Get Seed 0
   9+ 850F CB 17                                rl		a								; Rotate L including carry
  10+ 8511 4F                                   ld		c,a								; c =  double lo
  11+ 8512 21 56 7E     .AddSeed2:              ld		hl,RandomSeed2
  12+ 8515 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)							; RAND+2
  13+ 8516 32 54 7E     .SaveAtoSeed:           ld		(RandomSeed),a					; and save RAND
  14+ 8519 08           .SaveBtoSeed2:          ex		af,af'
  15+ 851A 79                                   ld		a,c
  16+ 851B 32 56 7E                             ld		(RandomSeed2),a
  17+ 851E 08                                   ex		af,af'
  18+ 851F 3A 55 7E                             ld		a,(RandomSeed1)
  19+ 8522 4F                                   ld		c,a								; C = Seed1
  20+ 8523 21 57 7E     .AddSeed3:              ld		hl,RandomSeed3
  21+ 8526 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)
  22+ 8527 32 55 7E                             ld		(RandomSeed1),a
  23+ 852A 08                                   ex		af,af'
  24+ 852B 79                                   ld		a,c
  25+ 852C 32 57 7E                             ld		(RandomSeed3),a
  26+ 852F 08                                   ex		af,af'
  27+ 8530                                      ;exx                                     ; get bc,de,hl back
  28+ 8530 C9                                   ret
  29+ 8531
  30+ 8531 21 54 7E     saveRandomSeeds:        ld      hl,RandomSeed
  31+ 8534 11 58 7E                             ld      de,RandomSeedSave
  32+ 8537 01 04 00                             ld      bc,4
  33+ 853A ED A0                                ldi
  34+ 853C ED A0                                ldi
  35+ 853E ED A0                                ldi
  36+ 8540 ED A0                                ldi
  37+ 8542 C9                                   ret
  38+ 8543
  39+ 8543 21 58 7E     restoreRandomSeeds:     ld      hl,RandomSeedSave
  40+ 8546 11 54 7E                             ld      de,RandomSeed
  41+ 8549 01 04 00                             ld      bc,4
  42+ 854C ED A0                                ldi
  43+ 854E ED A0                                ldi
  44+ 8550 ED A0                                ldi
  45+ 8552 ED A0                                ldi
  46+ 8554 C9                                   ret

  22+ 8588 18 DB                                jr		copy_seed
  23+ 858A
  24+ 858A 21 EF 7F     copy_working_to_system: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  25+ 858D 11 D7 7F                             ld		de,SystemSeed
  26+ 8590 18 D3                                jr		copy_seed
  27+ 8592
  28+ 8592 21 D7 7F     copy_system_to_working: ld		hl,SystemSeed
  29+ 8595 11 EF 7F                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  30+ 8598 18 CB                                jr		copy_seed
  31+ 859A
  32+ 859A              next_system_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  33+ 859A CD 9D 85     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  34+ 859D              .NextStep:
  35+ 859D CD A0 85     		call	process_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  36+ 85A0              process_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  37+ 85A0 3A D7 7F     		ld		a,(SystemSeed)				; QQ15
  38+ 85A3 B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  39+ 85A4 21 D9 7F     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  40+ 85A7 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 + QQ152
  41+ 85A8 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo
  42+ 85A9 3A D8 7F     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)
  43+ 85AC 21 DA 7F     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  44+ 85AF 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  45+ 85B0 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  46+ 85B1 3A D9 7F     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+2)
  47+ 85B4 32 D7 7F     		ld		(SystemSeed+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150
  48+ 85B7 3A DA 7F     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)
  49+ 85BA 32 D8 7F     		ld		(SystemSeed+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151
  50+ 85BD 3A DC 7F     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+5)
  51+ 85C0 32 DA 7F     		ld		(SystemSeed+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153
  52+ 85C3 3A DB 7F     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+4)
  53+ 85C6 32 D9 7F     		ld		(SystemSeed+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152
  54+ 85C9 B7           		or		a
  55+ 85CA 78           		ld		a,b
  56+ 85CB 21 D9 7F     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  57+ 85CE 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  58+ 85CF 32 DB 7F     		ld		(SystemSeed+4),a
  59+ 85D2 79           		ld		a,c
  60+ 85D3 21 DA 7F     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  61+ 85D6 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  62+ 85D7 32 DC 7F     		ld		(SystemSeed+5),a
  63+ 85DA C9           		ret
  64+ 85DB
  65+ 85DB              next_working_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  66+ 85DB CD DE 85     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  67+ 85DE              .NextStep:
  68+ 85DE CD E1 85     		call	working_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  69+ 85E1              working_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  70+ 85E1              ; x = a + c
  71+ 85E1 3A EF 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds)			; QQ15
  72+ 85E4 B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  73+ 85E5 21 F1 7F     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2			; hl -> qq+2 [c]
  74+ 85E8 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 [a]+ QQ15 [c]
  75+ 85E9 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo [x]
  76+ 85EA              ; y = b + d	+ carry
  77+ 85EA 3A F0 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+1)          ; [b]
  78+ 85ED 21 F2 7F     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 [d] we don't inc as it affects carry)
  79+ 85F0 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  80+ 85F1 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  81+ 85F2 3A F1 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+2)
  82+ 85F5 32 EF 7F     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150 [a] = [c]
  83+ 85F8 3A F2 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
  84+ 85FB 32 F0 7F     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151 [b] = [d]
  85+ 85FE 3A F4 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
  86+ 8601 32 F2 7F     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153 [d] = [f]
  87+ 8604 3A F3 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+4)
  88+ 8607 32 F1 7F     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152 [c] = [e]
  89+ 860A B7           		or		a
  90+ 860B 78           		ld		a,b
  91+ 860C 21 F1 7F     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2		    ; hl -> qq+2
  92+ 860F 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  93+ 8610 32 F3 7F     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+4),a			; e = x + [c]
  94+ 8613 79           		ld		a,c
  95+ 8614 21 F2 7F     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  96+ 8617 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  97+ 8618 32 F4 7F     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+5),a			; f = y + [d] + carry
  98+ 861B C9           		ret
  99+ 861C
 100+ 861C 32           working_distX	DB 50
 101+ 861D 32           working_distY	DB 50
 102+ 861E 00           current_distY	DB 0
 103+ 861F
 104+ 861F AF           find_present_system:    xor		a
 105+ 8620 32 64 7F                             ld		(XSAV),a
 106+ 8623 3A D8 7F     .CounterLoop:           ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)				; QQ15+1 \ seed Ycoord of star
 107+ 8626 4F                                   ld		c,a
 108+ 8627 3A 02 80     .calcLocaldy:           ld		a,(PresentSystemY)
 109+ 862A 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 110+ 862B 79                                   ld		a,c
 111+ 862C 90                                   sub		b
 112+ 862D CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 113+ 862F 28 02                                jr		z,.positivedy
 114+ 8631 ED 44        .negativedy:            neg
 115+ 8633 32 1E 86     .positivedy:            ld		(current_distY),a				; save cuirrent_dist Y as we need it maybe
 116+ 8636 ED 5B 1C 86                          ld		de,(working_distX)
 117+ 863A BA                                   cp		d
 118+ 863B 30 24                                jr		nc,.toofar
 119+ 863D 3A DA 7F     .calcLocaldx:           ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)				; QQ15+3 \ seed Xcoord of star
 120+ 8640 4F                                   ld		c,a
 121+ 8641 3A 01 80                             ld		a,(PresentSystemX)
 122+ 8644 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 123+ 8645 79                                   ld		a,c
 124+ 8646 90                                   sub		b
 125+ 8647 CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 126+ 8649 28 02                                jr		z,.positivedx
 127+ 864B ED 44        .negativedx:            neg
 128+ 864D 4F           .positivedx:            ld		c,a
 129+ 864E BB                                   cp		e
 130+ 864F 30 10                                jr		nc,.toofar
 131+ 8651 3A 1E 86     .Nearer:			    ld		a,(current_distY) 				; we have a closer system
 132+ 8654 47                                   ld		b,a								; we have c to recall Y into b
 133+ 8655 ED 43 1C 86                          ld		(working_distX),bc
 134+ 8659 C5                                   push	bc
 135+ 865A CD 92 85                             call 	copy_system_to_working
 136+ 865D C1                                   pop		bc
 137+ 865E 78                                   ld		a,b								;
 138+ 865F B1                                   or		c								;
 139+ 8660 C8                                   ret		z								; if we have distance 0 then bang on
 140+ 8661 CD 9A 85     .toofar:                call	next_system_seed
 141+ 8664 3A 64 7F                             ld		a,(XSAV)
 142+ 8667 3D                                   dec		a
 143+ 8668 FE 00                                cp		0
 144+ 866A C8                                   ret		z
 145+ 866B 32 64 7F                             ld		(XSAV),a
 146+ 866E 18 B3                                jr		.CounterLoop
 147+ 8670
 148+ 8670              get_planet_data_working_seed:
 149+ 8670 3A F0 7F     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+1)
 150+ 8673 E6 07        		and		7
 151+ 8675 32 1C 80     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 152+ 8678 3A F1 7F     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+2)
 153+ 867B CB 3F        		srl	a
 154+ 867D CB 3F        		srl	a
 155+ 867F CB 3F        		srl	a
 156+ 8681 CB 3F        		srl	a								; c/8
 157+ 8683 E6 07        		and		7
 158+ 8685 32 1D 80     		ld		(DisplayGovernment),a
 159+ 8688 CB 3F        		srl	a
 160+ 868A FE 00        		cp		0
 161+ 868C 20 08        		jr		nz,.CanBeRich
 162+ 868E              .Fedual:
 163+ 868E 3A 1C 80     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 164+ 8691 F6 02        		or		2							; Adjust Eco for Anarchy and Feudal, set bit 1.
 165+ 8693 32 1C 80     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 166+ 8696              .CanBeRich:
 167+ 8696 3A 1C 80     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 168+ 8699 EE 07        		xor		7							; flip economy so Rich is now 7
 169+ 869B 32 1E 80     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Flipped Eco, EcoEOR7, Rich Ind = 7
 170+ 869E 47           		ld		b,a
 171+ 869F 3A F2 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 172+ 86A2 E6 03        		and		3
 173+ 86A4 80           		add		a,b
 174+ 86A5 32 1E 80     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek Level += seed d & 3
 175+ 86A8 3A 1D 80     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 176+ 86AB CB 3F        		srl		a 							; gov/2
 177+ 86AD 47           		ld		b,a
 178+ 86AE 3A 1E 80     		ld		a,(DisplayTekLevel)
 179+ 86B1 80           		add		a,b
 180+ 86B2 32 1E 80     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek += gov /2
 181+ 86B5 CB 27        		sla		a
 182+ 86B7 CB 27        		sla		a							; Onto Population (TL-1)*= 4
 183+ 86B9 47           		ld		b,a
 184+ 86BA 3A 1C 80     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 185+ 86BD 80           		add		a,b                  		; TechLevel*4 + Eco   7-56
 186+ 86BE 47           		ld		b,a
 187+ 86BF 3A 1D 80     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)
 188+ 86C2 3C           		inc		a  							; +Government, 0 is Anarchy + 1
 189+ 86C3 32 1F 80     		ld		(DisplayPopulation),a
 190+ 86C6 3A 1C 80     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 191+ 86C9 EE 07        		xor		7							; Onto productivity
 192+ 86CB C6 03        		add		3							;  (Flipped eco +3)
 193+ 86CD 57           		ld		d,a
 194+ 86CE 3A 1D 80     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 195+ 86D1 C6 04        		add		4
 196+ 86D3 5F           		ld		e,a
 197+ 86D4 ED 30        		mul									; ; DE = d*e, Productivity part 1. has hsb in A, lsb in P.
 198+ 86D6 3A 1F 80     		ld		a,(DisplayPopulation)		; then we use d for radius
 199+ 86D9 57           		ld		d,a
 200+ 86DA ED 30        		mul
 201+ 86DC CB 23        		sla		e
 202+ 86DE CB 1A        		rr		d
 203+ 86E0 CB 23        		sla		e
 204+ 86E2 CB 1A        		rr		d
 205+ 86E4 CB 23        		sla		e
 206+ 86E6 CB 1A        		rr		d							; de * 8
 207+ 86E8 ED 53 21 80  		ld		(DisplayProductivity),de
 208+ 86EC              .DoRadius:
 209+ 86EC 3A F2 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 210+ 86EF 4F           		ld		c,a
 211+ 86F0 3A F4 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
 212+ 86F3 E6 0F        		and		$0F							;  lower 4 bits of w2_h determine planet radius
 213+ 86F5 C6 0B        		add		11							;  radius min = 256*11 = 2816 km
 214+ 86F7 47           		ld		b,a							;
 215+ 86F8 ED 43 25 80  		ld		(DisplayRadius),bc
 216+ 86FC C9           		ret
 217+ 86FD
# file closed: ./Variables/galaxy_seed.asm

  51+ 8859
  52+ 8859
  53+ 8859              getTableText:
  54+ 8859              ; ">getTableText, hl = indexlist, a = textnbr, returns with hl = porinter to head of text"
  55+ 8859              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  56+ 8859 D5           	push	de								; save DE as we will likley need it in caller
  57+ 885A ED 31        	add		hl,a							; 0 based ref, and its 2 bytes
  58+ 885C ED 31        	add		hl,a
  59+ 885E 5E           	ld		e,(hl)
  60+ 885F 23           	inc		hl
  61+ 8860 56           	ld		d,(hl)							; de = indexed address
  62+ 8861 EB           	ex		de,hl							; flip it to hl
  63+ 8862 D1           	pop		de								; retrieve de
  64+ 8863 C9           	ret										; return with hl as start entry
  65+ 8864
  66+ 8864
  67+ 8864              ;               CF      ZF      Result
  68+ 8864              ;               -----------------------------------
  69+ 8864              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  70+ 8864              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  71+ 8864              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  72+ 8864              ;               1       1       Impossible
  73+ 8864              getRankIndex:
  74+ 8864              ; ">getRank, de = kill count, returns a = index,hl destroyed"
  75+ 8864              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  76+ 8864 7A           	ld		a,d
  77+ 8865 B3           	or		e
  78+ 8866 FE 00        	cp		0
  79+ 8868 C8           	ret		z								; quicks skip for 0 kills
  80+ 8869 AF           	xor 	a
  81+ 886A 21 A2 87     	ld		hl,RankingTableLow
  82+ 886D              .testLoop:
  83+ 886D 4E           	ld		c,(hl)
  84+ 886E 23           	inc		hl
  85+ 886F 46           	ld		b,(hl)							; bc = ranking
  86+ 8870 E5           	push	hl
  87+ 8871 60           	ld		h,b
  88+ 8872 69           	ld		l,c
  89+ 8873 CD D8 99     	call	compare16HLDE
  90+ 8876 38 06        	jr		c,.HLLTDE
  91+ 8878              .HLGTEDE									; Found the correct rank
  92+ 8878 E1           	pop		hl
  93+ 8879 23           	inc		hl								; move to next value
  94+ 887A 23           	inc		hl
  95+ 887B 3C           	inc		a								; we canloop forever as if kills was $FFFF then hits nutter rank but also +1 = 0000 as its 16 bit
  96+ 887C 18 EF        	jr		.testLoop
  97+ 887E              .HLLTDE:									; HL < Kills so found correct rank
  98+ 887E E1           	pop		hl
  99+ 887F C9           	ret
 100+ 8880
# file closed: ./Tables/text_tables.asm

  13+ 88B8 53 63 6F 6F  WordScoops          		DB  "Scoops",0             ;11
  13+ 88BC 70 73 00

 236+ 8ED3              CapitaliseString:
 237+ 8ED3              ; ">CapitaliseString hl = address"
 238+ 8ED3              .CapLoop:
 239+ 8ED3 23           	inc		hl
 240+ 8ED4 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 241+ 8ED5 FE 00        	cp		0
 242+ 8ED7 C8           	ret		z
 243+ 8ED8 FE 5B        	cp		'Z'+1
 244+ 8EDA 30 F7        	jr		nc,.CapLoop
 245+ 8EDC FE 41        	cp		'A'
 246+ 8EDE 38 F3        	jr		c,.CapLoop
 247+ 8EE0              .LowerCase:
 248+ 8EE0 C6 20        	add		a,'a'-'A'
 249+ 8EE2 77           	ld		(hl),a
 250+ 8EE3 18 EE        	jr		.CapLoop

 252+ 8EE5 21 CC 8D     ShipIndexToAddress      ld      hl,WordIdxShipNames
 253+ 8EE8 C3 EE 8E                             jp      WordLookup
 254+ 8EEB
 255+ 8EEB 21 FE 8C     WordIndexToAddress:     ld		hl,WordIdx
 256+ 8EEE ED 31        WordLookup:             add		hl,a
 257+ 8EF0 ED 31                                add		hl,a
 258+ 8EF2 D5                                   push	de
 259+ 8EF3 5E                                   ld		e,(hl)
 260+ 8EF4 23                                   inc		hl
 261+ 8EF5 56                                   ld		d,(hl)
 262+ 8EF6 EB                                   ex		de,hl
 263+ 8EF7 D1                                   pop		de
 264+ 8EF8 C9                                   ret

 267+ 8EF9              expandTokenToString:
 268+ 8EF9              ; ">expandTokenToString a = texttoken"

 270+ 8EFC CD 59 88     	call	getTableText
 271+ 8EFF 11 B2 8E     	ld		de,TextBuffer
 272+ 8F02              .ReadLoop:
 273+ 8F02 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 274+ 8F03 FE 00        	cp		0
 275+ 8F05 28 1B        	jr		z,.ReadDone
 276+ 8F07 E5           	push	hl
 277+ 8F08 D5           	push	de
 278+ 8F09 21 FE 8C     	ld		hl,WordIdx
 279+ 8F0C CD 59 88     	call	getTableText
 280+ 8F0F D1           	pop		de
 281+ 8F10              .WordExpandLoop:
 282+ 8F10 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 283+ 8F11 FE 00        	cp		0
 284+ 8F13 28 05        	jr		z,.AddSpace
 285+ 8F15              ;.GetChar:
 286+ 8F15 12           	ld		(de),a
 287+ 8F16 13           	inc		de
 288+ 8F17 23           	inc		hl
 289+ 8F18 18 F6        	jr		.WordExpandLoop
 290+ 8F1A              .AddSpace:
 291+ 8F1A 3E 20        	ld		a,' '
 292+ 8F1C 12           	ld		(de),a
 293+ 8F1D 13           	inc		de
 294+ 8F1E E1           	pop		hl
 295+ 8F1F 23           	inc		hl
 296+ 8F20 18 E0        	jr		.ReadLoop
 297+ 8F22              .ReadDone:
 298+ 8F22 1B           	dec		de
 299+ 8F23 AF           	xor		a
 300+ 8F24 12           	ld		(de),a
 301+ 8F25 C9           	ret

 218+ 8FC0              ;	.TT42	\ Uppercase to lowercase
 219+ 8FC0              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 220+ 8FC0              ;90 06                   BCC TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 221+ 8FC0              ;C9 5B                   CMP #&5B	\ >= ascii 'Z'+1
 222+ 8FC0              ;B0 02                   BCS TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 223+ 8FC0              ;69 20                   ADC #&20	\ else Upper to lowercase
 224+ 8FC0              ;	.TT44	\ print character as is with TT26
 225+ 8FC0              ;4C FC 1E                JMP &1EFC \ TT26 \ print character
 226+ 8FC0              ;
 227+ 8FC0              ;	.TT41	\ QQ17 bit7 set
 228+ 8FC0              ;24 72                   BIT &72		\ QQ17
 229+ 8FC0              ;70 17                   BVS TT45	\ bit6 set too, Nothing or lower.
 230+ 8FC0              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 231+ 8FC0              ;90 22                   BCC TT74 	\ print as is using TT26
 232+ 8FC0              ;48                      PHA 		\ else store token Acc
 233+ 8FC0              ;8A                      TXA 		\ QQ17 copy
 234+ 8FC0              ;09 40                   ORA #&40	\ set bit6 in QQ17 so subsequent ones lower
 235+ 8FC0              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 236+ 8FC0              ;68                      PLA 		\ restore token
 237+ 8FC0              ;D0 EC                   BNE TT44	\ guaranteed up, print as Uppercase with TT26.
 238+ 8FC0              ;
 239+ 8FC0              ;	.qw	\ Acc = 14to31 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 240+ 8FC0              ;69 72                   ADC #&72	\ A+=114 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 241+ 8FC0              ;D0 32                   BNE ex		\ guaranteed down, extra.
 242+ 8FC0              ;

 244+ 8FC0              ;A9 15                   LDA #21		\ on right
 245+ 8FC0              ;85 2C                   STA &2C		\ XC
 246+ 8FC0              ;D0 97                   BNE TT73	\ guaranteed up, print colon.
 247+ 8FC0              ;
 248+ 8FC0              ;	.TT45	\ QQ17 bits 7,6 set. Nothing or lower.
 249+ 8FC0              ;E0 FF                   CPX #&FF	\ if QQ17 = #&FF
 250+ 8FC0              ;F0 63                   BEQ TT48	\ rts
 251+ 8FC0              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ >= ascii 'A' ?
 252+ 8FC0              ;B0 D0                   BCS TT42	\ Uppercase to lowercase, up.
 253+ 8FC0              ;	.TT46	\ clear bit6 QQ17 and print as is using TT26
 254+ 8FC0              ;48                      PHA 		\ push token
 255+ 8FC0              ;8A                      TXA 		\ QQ17 copy
 256+ 8FC0              ;29 BF                   AND #&BF	\ clear bit6
 257+ 8FC0              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 258+ 8FC0              ;68                      PLA 		\ pull token
 259+ 8FC0              ;	.TT74	\ TT26, print character.
 260+ 8FC0              ;4C FC 1E                JMP &1EFC	\ TT26
 261+ 8FC0              ;
 262+ 8FC0              ;	.TT43	\ Token > 127 page4 token or planet digram.
 263+ 8FC0              ;C9 A0                   CMP #&A0	      \ >= #160 ?
 264+ 8FC0              ;B0 14                   BCS TT47	      \ more page4, subtract #160
 265+ 8FC0              ;29 7F                   AND #&7F	      \ else token 128to159  -> 0 to 31
 266+ 8FC0              ;0A                      ASL A		      \ *= 2
 267+ 8FC0              ;A8                      TAY 		      \ digram index = 0to62
 268+ 8FC0              ;B9 80 08                LDA &0880,Y \ QQ16,Y  \ ALLEXEGEZACEBISOUSESARMAINDIREA?ER  etc.
 269+ 8FC0              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 270+ 8FC0              ;B9 81 08                LDA &0881,Y \ QQ16+1,Y \ 2nd character of diagram. Flight copied down from docked code.
 271+ 8FC0              ;C9 3F                   CMP #&3F	      \ is second letter '?'
 272+ 8FC0              ;F0 40                   BEQ TT48    	      \ rts, name has odd-number of letters.
 273+ 8FC0              ;4C 9A 33                JMP &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 274+ 8FC0              ;
 275+ 8FC0              ;	.TT47	\ more page4, subtract #160
 276+ 8FC0              ;E9 A0                   SBC #&A0	\ -= 160
 277+ 8FC0              ;	.ex	\ -> &342D \ extra, token >= 96 or Acc = 128to145 or -=160
 278+ 8FC0              ;AA                      TAX 		\ copy of word index
 279+ 8FC0              ;A9 00                   LDA #0		\ page 4 words lo  #QQ18 MOD 256
 280+ 8FC0              ;85 22                   STA &22		\ V
 281+ 8FC0              ;A9 04                   LDA #4		\ page 4 words hi  #QQ18 DIV 256
 282+ 8FC0              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 283+ 8FC0              ;A0 00                   LDY #0
 284+ 8FC0              ;8A                      TXA 		\ token = word index
 285+ 8FC0              ;F0 13                   BEQ TT50	\ if X=0 then Y offset to word correct
 286+ 8FC0              ;	.TT51	\ counters Y letter, X token
 287+ 8FC0              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 288+ 8FC0              ;F0 07                   BEQ TT49	\ exit as word ended
 289+ 8FC0              ;C8                      INY 		\ letter count
 290+ 8FC0              ;D0 F9                   BNE TT51	\ loop Y
 291+ 8FC0              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1 \ next page as Y reached 256
 292+ 8FC0              ;D0 F5                   BNE TT51    	\ guaranteed, loop Y letter
 293+ 8FC0              ;	.TT49	\ word ended
 294+ 8FC0              ;C8                      INY
 295+ 8FC0              ;D0 02                   BNE TT59    	\ next word
 296+ 8FC0              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1	\ next page as Y reached 256
 297+ 8FC0              ;	.TT59	\ next word
 298+ 8FC0              ;CA                      DEX 		\ token count
 299+ 8FC0              ;D0 ED                   BNE TT51	\ loop X token
 300+ 8FC0              ;	.TT50	\ token X = 0, counter Y offset to word correct
 301+ 8FC0              ;98                      TYA
 302+ 8FC0              ;48                      PHA 		\ store Yindex
 303+ 8FC0              ;A5 23                   LDA &23		\ V+1
 304+ 8FC0              ;48                      PHA 		\ correct pointer hi
 305+ 8FC0              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y 	\ (V),Y
 306+ 8FC0              ;49 23                   EOR #&23	\ decode '#'
 307+ 8FC0              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A \ TT27 \ process text token to next depth
 308+ 8FC0              ;68                      PLA 		\ restore this depth's Vhi
 309+ 8FC0              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 310+ 8FC0              ;68                      PLA
 311+ 8FC0              ;A8                      TAY 		\ restore this depth's Yindex
 312+ 8FC0              ;C8                      INY 		\ next letter
 313+ 8FC0              ;D0 02                   BNE P%+4	\ not zero so skip next page
 314+ 8FC0              ;E6 23                   INC &23		\ V+1
 315+ 8FC0              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y

   1+ 9002              ;INPUTS: ahl = dividend cde = divisor
   2+ 9002              ;OUTPUTS: cde = quotient ahl = remainder
   3+ 9002 47           Div24by24:              ld b,a
   4+ 9003 E5                                   push hl
   5+ 9004 DD E1                                pop ix
   6+ 9006 2E 18                                ld l,24
   7+ 9008 E5                                   push hl
   8+ 9009 AF                                   xor a
   9+ 900A 67                                   ld h,a
  10+ 900B 6F                                   ld l,a
  11+ 900C DD 29        .Div24by24loop:         add ix,ix
  12+ 900E CB 10                                rl b
  13+ 9010 ED 6A                                adc hl,hl
  14+ 9012 17                                   rla
  15+ 9013 B9                                   cp c
  16+ 9014 38 0C                                jr c,.Div24by24skip
  17+ 9016 20 05                                jr nz,.Div24by24setbit
  18+ 9018 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
  19+ 901A 19                                   add hl,de
  20+ 901B 38 05                                jr c,.Div24by24skip
  21+ 901D ED 52        .Div24by24setbit:       sbc hl,de
  22+ 901F 99                                   sbc a,c
  23+ 9020 DD 23                                inc ix
  24+ 9022 E3           .Div24by24skip:         ex (sp),hl
  25+ 9023 2D                                   dec l
  26+ 9024 E3                                   ex (sp),hl
  27+ 9025 20 E5                                jr nz,.Div24by24loop
  28+ 9027 D1                                   pop de
  29+ 9028 48                                   ld c,b
  30+ 9029 DD E5                                push ix
  31+ 902B D1                                   pop de
  32+ 902C C9                                   ret
  33+ 902D
  34+ 902D FD 67        Div24by24ASigned:       ld      iyh,a
  35+ 902F E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  36+ 9031 CD 02 90                             call    Div24by24
  37+ 9034 F5                                   push    af
  38+ 9035 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
  39+ 9037 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  40+ 9039 B1                                   or      c
  41+ 903A 4F                                   ld      c,a
  42+ 903B F1                                   pop     af
  43+ 903C C9                                   ret
  44+ 903D
  45+ 903D                                      ; CDE = AHL/CDE, AHL = remainder
  46+ 903D FD 67        Div24by24LeadSign:      ld      iyh,a           ; Preserve signed in IYL
  47+ 903F A9                                   xor     c               ; flip sign if negative
  48+ 9040 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit    ; .
  49+ 9042 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a           ; .
  50+ 9044 79                                   ld      a,c             ; make both values ABS
  51+ 9045 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; .
  52+ 9047 4F                                   ld      c,a             ; .
  53+ 9048 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; .
  54+ 904A E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; .
  55+ 904C CD 02 90                             call    Div24by24       ; do abs divide
  56+ 904F FD B5                                or      iyl             ; bring in sign bit
  57+ 9051 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save a
  58+ 9053 79                                   ld      a,c             ; sort sign for c
  59+ 9054 FD B5                                or      iyl             ;
  60+ 9056 4F                                   ld      c,a             ;
  61+ 9057 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; sort sign of a
  62+ 9059 C9                                   ret
  63+ 905A
  64+ 905A              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
  65+ 905A              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
  66+ 905A              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
  67+ 905A              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
  68+ 905A 47           PROJ256mulAdivQ:        ld      b,a
  69+ 905B 0E 00                                ld      c,0
  70+ 905D 16 00                                ld      d,0
  71+ 905F 3A 5F 7F                             ld      a,(varQ)
  72+ 9062 5F                                   ld      e,a
  73+ 9063 21 00 00     PROJDIV16UNDOC:         ld      hl,0
  74+ 9066 78                                   ld      a,b
  75+ 9067 06 10                                ld      b,16
  76+ 9069 CB 31        PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP:     sll     c       ; unroll 16 times
  77+ 906B 17                                   rla             ; ...
  78+ 906C ED 6A                                adc     hl,hl       ; ...
  79+ 906E ED 52                                sbc     hl,de       ; ...
  80+ 9070 30 02                                jr      nc,PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP       ; ...
  81+ 9072 19                                   add     hl,de       ; ...
  82+ 9073 0D                                   dec     c       ; ...
  83+ 9074 10 F3        PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP:     djnz    PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP
  84+ 9076 79                                   ld      a,c
  85+ 9077 32 60 7F                             ld      (varR),a
  86+ 907A C9                                   ret

   1+ 907B              HLequSRmulQdiv256:      ;X.Y=x1lo.S*M/256  	\ where M/256 is gradient

   4+ 9081 C5 D5        HLeqyHLmulAdiv256:      push    bc,,de
   5+ 9083 11 00 00                             ld  de,0        ; de = XY
   6+ 9086 47                                   ld  b,a         ; b = Q
   7+ 9087                                      ShiftHLRight1
   7+ 9087 CB 3C       >			   srl h
   7+ 9089 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
   8+ 908B CB 20                                sla b
   9+ 908D 30 03                                jr  nc,.LL126
  10+ 908F EB           .LL125:                 ex de,hl
  11+ 9090 19                                   add hl,de
  12+ 9091 EB                                   ex  de,hl       ; de = de + rs
  13+ 9092              .LL126:                 ShiftHLRight1
  13+ 9092 CB 3C       >			   srl h
  13+ 9094 CB 1D       >			   rr  l

  15+ 9098 38 F5                                jr      c,.LL125
  16+ 909A 20 F6                                jr      nz,.LL126
  17+ 909C EB                                   ex      de,hl   ; hl = result
  18+ 909D D1 C1                                pop     bc,,de
  19+ 909F C9                                   ret

  36+ 90AA AB                                   xor     e
  37+ 90AB E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  38+ 90AD 47                                   ld      b,a
  39+ 90AE 7A                                   ld      a,d
