  53+ 90BC              MacroDEEquQmulASigned:  MACRO
  54+ 90BC ~                                    ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  55+ 90BC ~                                    ld      a,(varQ)
  56+ 90BC ~                                    ld      e,a
  57+ 90BC ~                                    xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  58+ 90BC ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
  59+ 90BC ~                                    ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  60+ 90BC ~                                    ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  61+ 90BC ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  62+ 90BC ~                                    ld      d,a
  63+ 90BC ~                                    ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  64+ 90BC ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  65+ 90BC ~                                    ld      e,a
  66+ 90BC ~                                    mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  67+ 90BC ~                                    ld      a,d
  68+ 90BC ~                                    or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  69+ 90BC ~                                    ld      d,a
  70+ 90BC                                      ENDM

  91+ 90FD 7C           madXAAddHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
  92+ 90FE E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  93+ 9100 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
  94+ 9101 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
  95+ 9102                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
  95+ 9102 FA 1A 91    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
  96+ 9105 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:       ld      a,b
  97+ 9106 B2                                   or      d
  98+ 9107                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  98+ 9107 FA 0C 91    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
  99+ 910A 19                                   add     hl,de
 100+ 910B C9                                   ret
 101+ 910C 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 102+ 910D E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 103+ 910F 67                                   ld      h,a
 104+ 9110 7A                                   ld      a,d
 105+ 9111 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 106+ 9113 57                                   ld      d,a
 107+ 9114 19                                   add     hl,de
 108+ 9115 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
 109+ 9117 B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
 110+ 9118 67                                   ld      h,a
 111+ 9119 C9                                   ret
 112+ 911A 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:          ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit                     ; here HL and DE are opposite
 113+ 911B E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 114+ 911D 67                                   ld      h,a
 115+ 911E 7A                                   ld      a,d
 116+ 911F E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 117+ 9121 57                                   ld      d,a
 118+ 9122 B7                                   or      a
 119+ 9123 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 120+ 9125 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
 121+ 9127 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 122+ 9128 B4                                   or      h
 123+ 9129 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 124+ 912A C9                                   ret
 125+ 912B              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:       NegHL                                                   ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
 125+ 912B AF          >                    xor a
 125+ 912C 95          >                    sub l
 125+ 912D 6F          >                    ld l,a
 125+ 912E 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 125+ 912F 94          >                    sub h
 125+ 9130 67          >                    ld h,a
 126+ 9131 78                                   ld      a,b
 127+ 9132 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 128+ 9134 B4                                   or      h
 129+ 9135 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 130+ 9136 C9                                   ret
 131+ 9137
 132+ 9137
 133+ 9137                  ; multiplication of 16-bit number and 8-bit number into a 24-bit product
 134+ 9137                  ;
 135+ 9137                  ; enter : hl = 16-bit multiplier   = x
 136+ 9137                  ;          e =  8-bit multiplicand = y
 137+ 9137                  ;
 138+ 9137                  ; exit  : ahl = 24-bit product
 139+ 9137                  ;         carry reset
 140+ 9137                  ;
 141+ 9137                  ; uses  : af, de, hl
 142+ 9137 54           AHLequHLmulE:           ld d,h                      ; xh
 143+ 9138 63                                   ld h,e                      ; yl
 144+ 9139 ED 30                                mul de                      ; xh*yl
 145+ 913B EB                                   ex de,hl
 146+ 913C ED 30                                mul de                      ; yl*xl, hl = xh*yl
 147+ 913E
 148+ 913E 7A                                   ld  a,d                     ; sum products
 149+ 913F 85                                   add a,l
 150+ 9140 57                                   ld  d,a
 151+ 9141 EB                                   ex de,hl
 152+ 9142
 153+ 9142 7A                                   ld  a,d
 154+ 9143 CE 00                                adc a,0
 155+ 9145 C9                                   ret
 156+ 9146
 157+ 9146 54           HLE0quH0mulE:           ld      d,h                 ; .
 158+ 9147 63                                   ld      h,e                 ; .
 159+ 9148 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; de = xh * yl
 160+ 914A EB                                   ex      de,hl
 161+ 914B C9                                   ret
 162+ 914C
 163+ 914C                 ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 32-bit product
 164+ 914C                 ;
 165+ 914C                 ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand = y
 166+ 914C                 ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand = x
 167+ 914C                 ;
 168+ 914C                 ; exit  : dehl = 32-bit product
 169+ 914C                 ;         carry reset
 170+ 914C                 ;
 171+ 914C                 ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 172+ 914C
 173+ 914C
 174+ 914C
 175+ 914C 45           DEHLequDEmulHL:         ld b,l                      ; x0
 176+ 914D 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; y0
 177+ 914E 5D                                   ld e,l                      ; x0
 178+ 914F 6A                                   ld l,d
 179+ 9150 E5                                   push hl                     ; x1 y1
 180+ 9151 69                                   ld l,c                      ; y0
 181+ 9152              ; bc = x0 y0, de = y1 x0,  hl = x1 y0,  stack = x1 y1
 182+ 9152 ED 30                                mul de                      ; y1*x0
 183+ 9154 EB                                   ex de,hl
 184+ 9155 ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y0
 185+ 9157
 186+ 9157 AF                                   xor a                       ; zero A
 187+ 9158 19                                   add hl,de                   ; sum cross products p2 p1
 188+ 9159 8F                                   adc a,a                     ; capture carry p3
 189+ 915A
 190+ 915A 59                                   ld e,c                      ; x0
 191+ 915B 50                                   ld d,b                      ; y0
 192+ 915C ED 30                                mul de                      ; y0*x0
 193+ 915E
 194+ 915E 47                                   ld b,a                      ; carry from cross products
 195+ 915F 4C                                   ld c,h                      ; LSB of MSW from cross products
 196+ 9160
 197+ 9160 7A                                   ld a,d
 198+ 9161 85                                   add a,l
 199+ 9162 67                                   ld h,a
 200+ 9163 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; LSW in HL p1 p0
 201+ 9164
 202+ 9164 D1                                   pop de
 203+ 9165 ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y1
 204+ 9167
 205+ 9167 EB                                   ex de,hl
 206+ 9168 ED 4A                                adc hl,bc
 207+ 916A EB                                   ex de,hl                    ; de = final MSW
 208+ 916B
 209+ 916B C9                                   ret
 210+ 916C
 211+ 916C              ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 16-bit product
 212+ 916C              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 213+ 916C              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 214+ 916C              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 215+ 916C              ;         carry reset
 216+ 916C              ; maths is
 217+ 916C              ;        hl = y , de= x
 218+ 916C              ;        hl = xhi,ylo + (yhigh * xlow)
 219+ 916C              ;        hl = yhih & xlo + x
 220+ 916C              ;
 221+ 916C              ;
 222+ 916C              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 223+ 916C C5           mulDEbyHL:              push    bc
 224+ 916D 7A                                   ld a,d                      ; a = xh
 225+ 916E 54                                   ld d,h                      ; d = yh
 226+ 916F 67                                   ld h,a                      ; h = xh
 227+ 9170 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; c = xl
 228+ 9171 45                                   ld b,l                      ; b = yl
 229+ 9172 ED 30                                mul                         ; yh * yl
 230+ 9174 EB                                   ex de,hl
 231+ 9175 ED 30                                mul                         ; xh * yl
 232+ 9177 19                                   add hl,de                   ; add cross products
 233+ 9178 59                                   ld e,c
 234+ 9179 50                                   ld d,b
 235+ 917A ED 30                                mul                         ; yl * xl
 236+ 917C 7D                                   ld a,l                      ; cross products lsb
 237+ 917D 82                                   add a,d                     ; add to msb final
 238+ 917E 67                                   ld h,a
 239+ 917F 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; hl = final
 240+ 9180                                      ; 83 cycles, 19 bytes
 241+ 9180 AF                                   xor a                       ; reset carry
 242+ 9181 C1                                   pop     bc
 243+ 9182 C9                                   ret
 244+ 9183
 245+ 9183              ; multiplication of 16-bit numbers by 8-bit product
 246+ 9183              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 247+ 9183              ;          l = 8-bit multiplicand
 248+ 9183              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 249+ 9183              ;         carry reset
 250+ 9183              ; maths is
 251+ 9183              ;        hl = y , de= x
 252+ 9183              ;        hl = xhi,ylo + (yhigh * xlow)
 253+ 9183              ;        hl = yhih & xlo + x
 254+ 9183              ;
 255+ 9183              ;
 256+ 9183              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 257+ 9183 C5 E5 D5     mulDEbyLSigned:         push    bc,,hl,,de
 258+ 9186 7A                                   ld a,d                      ; a = xh
 259+ 9187 16 00                                ld d,0                      ; d = yh = 0
 260+ 9189 67                                   ld h,a                      ; h = xh
 261+ 918A 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; c = xl
 262+ 918B 45                                   ld b,l                      ; b = yl
 263+ 918C              ;                        mul                         ; yh * xl which will always be 0
 264+ 918C EB                                   ex de,hl                    ; de = xh yl
 265+ 918D ED 30                                mul                         ; xh * yl
 266+ 918F EB                                   ex de,hl                    ; hl = xh * yl
 267+ 9190              ;                        add hl,de                   ; add cross products
 268+ 9190 59                                   ld e,c                      ; de = yl xl
 269+ 9191 50                                   ld d,b                      ; .
 270+ 9192 ED 30                                mul                         ; yl * xl
 271+ 9194 7D                                   ld a,l                      ; cross products lsb
 272+ 9195 82                                   add a,d                     ; add to msb final
 273+ 9196 67                                   ld h,a
 274+ 9197 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; hl = final
 275+ 9198 AF                                   xor a                       ; reset carry
 276+ 9199 C1                                   pop     bc                  ; get de for sign
 277+ 919A 78                                   ld      a,b
 278+ 919B C1                                   pop     bc                  ; get hl for sign
 279+ 919C A8                                   xor     b
 280+ 919D E6 80                                and     $80                 ; so we now have the sign bit
 281+ 919F B4                                   or      h                   ; so set the sign
 282+ 91A0 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; .
 283+ 91A1 C1                                   pop     bc                  ; clear up stack
 284+ 91A2 C9                                   ret
 285+ 91A3
 286+ 91A3                  DISPLAY "TODO: TEST"
 287+ 91A3 7A           mulDEbyHLSigned:        ld  a,d                     ; de = abs de
 288+ 91A4 47                                   ld  b,a                     ;
 289+ 91A5 E6 7F                                and     $7F                 ; .
 290+ 91A7 57                                   ld  d,a                     ; .
 291+ 91A8 7C                                   ld  a,h                     ; hl = abs hl
 292+ 91A9 4F                                   ld  c,a                     ; .
 293+ 91AA E6 7F                                and     $7F                 ; .
 294+ 91AC 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; .
 295+ 91AD 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; ixl = target sign of de * hl
 296+ 91AE AA                                   xor     d                   ;
 297+ 91AF E6 80                                and     $80                 ;
 298+ 91B1 DD 6F                                ld      ixl,a               ;
 299+ 91B3 CD 6C 91                             call    mulDEbyHL           ; calculate ABS(DE) * ABS(HL)
 300+ 91B6 7C                                   ld      a,h                 ; recover sign bit
 301+ 91B7 DD B5                                or      ixl
 302+ 91B9 67                                   ld      h,a
 303+ 91BA C9                                   ret
 304+ 91BB
 305+ 91BB              ; CHL = multiplicand D = multiplier
 306+ 91BB              ; DCHL = CHL * D
 307+ 91BB 7A           mulCHLbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 308+ 91BC AC                                   xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 309+ 91BD E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 310+ 91BF FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 311+ 91C1 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; now CHL = ABS (CHL)
 312+ 91C2 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 313+ 91C4 4F                                   ld      c,a                 ; .
 314+ 91C5 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 315+ 91C6 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 316+ 91C8              ; At this point CHL = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 317+ 91C8 57           .mul1:                  ld      d,a                 ; first do D * L
 318+ 91C9 5D                                   ld      e,l                 ; .
 319+ 91CA ED 30                                mul     de                  ; DE = L * D
 320+ 91CC 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; save multiplier
 321+ 91CD 6B                                   ld      l,e                 ; L = p0
 322+ 91CE 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; carry byte
 323+ 91CF 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; retrieve muliplier and save carry byte along with flags
 324+ 91D0 5C           .mul2:                  ld      e,h                 ; byte 2 of multiplicand
 325+ 91D1 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; and multiplier
 326+ 91D2 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; now its D & L
 327+ 91D4 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; get back carry byte with flags
 328+ 91D5 83           .carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; add low byte carry to result and retain carry too through next instructions
 329+ 91D6 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; h = P1
 330+ 91D7 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; a = carry byte
 331+ 91D8 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; save carry byte and get back multiplier with flags
 332+ 91D9 59           .mul3:                  ld      e,c                 ; byte 3 of multiplicand
 333+ 91DA 57                                   ld      d,a                 ;
 334+ 91DB ED 30                                mul     de                  ;
 335+ 91DD 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; get back carry byte and carry prior to first add
 336+ 91DE 8B                                   adc     a,e                 ;
 337+ 91DF FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; recover saved resultant sign
 338+ 91E1 4F                                   ld      c,a                 ; c byte 3. Note the value range allowed can never cause a byte 3 carry
 339+ 91E2 C9                                   ret
 340+ 91E3
 341+ 91E3              ;  CHL = 53456 D = 1E
 342+ 91E3              ;  56 * 1E = A14 L = 14 carry = 0A
 343+ 91E3              ;  34 * 1E = 618 H = 18 +A = 22 carry = 6
 344+ 91E3              ;  5  * 1E = 096 C = 96 + 6 = 9C
 345+ 91E3              ;  CHL = 9C2214
 346+ 91E3              ;mult3
 347+ 91E3              ; DELC = HLE * D, uses HL, DE, C , A , IYH
 348+ 91E3              ; HLE = multiplicand D = multiplier
 349+ 91E3              ; tested by mathstestsun.asm all passed
 350+ 91E3              ; Algorithm
 351+ 91E3              ; AC =  E * D   (save carry)         H    L    E
 352+ 91E3              ; DE =  L * D                                  D
 353+ 91E3              ;  L =  A + E + carry                         E*D (lo)
 354+ 91E3              ; DE =  H * D                             L*D+ ^ (hi)
 355+ 91E3              ;  E =  A + E + carry                H*D (lo) + carry
 356+ 91E3              ;
 357+ 91E3              ;
 358+ 91E3 7A           mulHLbyDE2sc:           ld      a,d
 359+ 91E4 AC                                   xor     h
 360+ 91E5 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 361+ 91E7 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; save sign bit for result
 362+ 91E9 7C                                   ld      a,h
 363+ 91EA E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 364+ 91EC 28 06                                jr      z,.HLPositive
 365+ 91EE              .HLNegative:            NegHL
 365+ 91EE AF          >                    xor a
 365+ 91EF 95          >                    sub l
 365+ 91F0 6F          >                    ld l,a
 365+ 91F1 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 365+ 91F2 94          >                    sub h
 365+ 91F3 67          >                    ld h,a
 366+ 91F4 7A           .HLPositive:            ld      a,d
 367+ 91F5 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 368+ 91F7 28 06                                jr      z,.DEPositive
 369+ 91F9              .DENegative:            NegDE
 369+ 91F9 AF          >                    xor a
 369+ 91FA 93          >                    sub e
 369+ 91FB 5F          >                    ld e,a
 369+ 91FC 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 369+ 91FD 92          >                    sub d
 369+ 91FE 57          >                    ld d,a
 370+ 91FF CD 6C 91     .DEPositive:            call    mulDEbyHL           ; now do calc
 371+ 9202 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
 372+ 9204 A7                                   and     a                   ; if its 0 then we are good
 373+ 9205 C8                                   ret     z
 374+ 9206
 375+ 9206
 376+ 9206              ; Mulitply HLE by D leading Sign
 377+ 9206              ; used IY A BC
 378+ 9206              ; result it loaded to DELC
 379+ 9206 7A           mulHLEbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 380+ 9207 AC                                   xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 381+ 9208 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 382+ 920A FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 383+ 920C 7C                                   ld      a,h                 ; now HLE = ABS (HLE)
 384+ 920D E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 385+ 920F 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; .
 386+ 9210 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 387+ 9211 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 388+ 9213 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
 389+ 9214 B7           .testEitherSideZero:    or      a
 390+ 9215 28 24                                jr      z,.ResultZero
 391+ 9217 7C                                   ld      a,h
 392+ 9218 B5                                   or      l
 393+ 9219 B3                                   or      e
 394+ 921A 28 1F                                jr      z,.ResultZero
 395+ 921C              ; At this point HLE = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 396+ 921C 42                                   ld      b,d                 ; save Quotient
 397+ 921D ED 30        .mul1:                  mul     de                  ; C = E * D
 398+ 921F 4B                                   ld      c,e                 ; C = p0
 399+ 9220 FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d               ; save carry (p1)
 400+ 9222 5D           .mul2:                  ld      e,l                 ; L = L * D
 401+ 9223 50                                   ld      d,b                 ; .
 402+ 9224 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
 403+ 9226 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl               ; get back p1
 404+ 9228 83           .carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; L = L + E
 405+ 9229 6F                                   ld      l,a                 ; .
 406+ 922A FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d               ; save new carry byte
 407+ 922C 5C           .mul3:                  ld      e,h                 ; E = H * D
 408+ 922D 50                                   ld      d,b                 ; .
 409+ 922E ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
 410+ 9230 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl
 411+ 9232 8B                                   adc     a,e                 ; .
 412+ 9233 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
 413+ 9234 7A           .ItsNotZero:            ld      a,d                 ;
 414+ 9235 CE 00                                adc     a,0                 ; final carry bit
 415+ 9237 FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; bring back sign
 416+ 9239 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; s = sign
 417+ 923A C9                                   ret
 418+ 923B 11 00 00     .ResultZero:            ld      de,0
 419+ 923E                                      ZeroA
 419+ 923E AF          >                        xor a
 420+ 923F 4F                                   ld      c,a
 421+ 9240 6F                                   ld      l,a
 422+ 9241 C9                                   ret
 423+ 9242
 424+ 9242              ;;;
 425+ 9242              ;;;
 426+ 9242              ;;;mulHLEbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 427+ 9242              ;;;                        xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 428+ 9242              ;;;                        and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 429+ 9242              ;;;                        ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 430+ 9242              ;;;                        ld      a,h                 ; now HLE = ABS (HLE)
 431+ 9242              ;;;                        and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 432+ 9242              ;;;                        ld      h,a                 ; .
 433+ 9242              ;;;                        ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 434+ 9242              ;;;                        and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 435+ 9242              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 436+ 9242              ;;;.testEitherSideZero:    or      a
 437+ 9242              ;;;                        jr      z,.ResultZero
 438+ 9242              ;;;                        ld      a,h
 439+ 9242              ;;;                        or      l
 440+ 9242              ;;;                        or      e
 441+ 9242              ;;;                        jr      z,.ResultZero
 442+ 9242              ;;;; At this point HLE = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 443+ 9242              ;;;.mul1:                  mul     de                  ; C = E * D
 444+ 9242              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; save mulitplier
 445+ 9242              ;;;                        ld      c,e                 ; C = p0
 446+ 9242              ;;;                        ld      a,d                 ; save carry (p1)
 447+ 9242              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 448+ 9242              ;;;.mul2:                  ld      e,l                 ; L = L * D
 449+ 9242              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 450+ 9242              ;;;                        mul     de                  ; .
 451+ 9242              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 452+ 9242              ;;;.carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; L = L + E
 453+ 9242              ;;;                        ld      l,a                 ; .
 454+ 9242              ;;;                        ld      a,d
 455+ 9242              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; save new carry byte
 456+ 9242              ;;;.mul3:                  ld      e,h                 ; E = H * D
 457+ 9242              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 458+ 9242              ;;;                        mul     de                  ; .
 459+ 9242              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 460+ 9242              ;;;                        adc     a,e                 ; .
 461+ 9242              ;;;                        ld      e,a                 ; .
 462+ 9242              ;;;.ItsNotZero:            ld      a,d                 ;
 463+ 9242              ;;;                        adc     a,0                 ; final carry bit
 464+ 9242              ;;;                        or      iyh                 ; bring back sign
 465+ 9242              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; s = sign
 466+ 9242              ;;;                        ret
 467+ 9242              ;;;.ResultZero:            ld      de,0
 468+ 9242              ;;;                        ZeroA
 469+ 9242              ;;;                        ld      c,a
 470+ 9242              ;;;                        ld      l,a
 471+ 9242              ;;;                        ret
 472+ 9242
 473+ 9242              ; multiplication of two S156-bit numbers into a 16-bit 2'd compliment product
 474+ 9242              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 475+ 9242              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 476+ 9242              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 477+ 9242              ;         carry reset
 478+ 9242              ;
 479+ 9242              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 480+ 9242 00           mulDEbyHLSignByte       DB      0
 481+ 9243 AF           mulDEbyHLSgnTo2c:       xor     a
 482+ 9244 32 42 92                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 483+ 9247 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 484+ 9248 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 485+ 924B 28 08                                jr      z,.SignHL
 486+ 924D E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 487+ 924F 57                                   ld      d,a
 488+ 9250 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 489+ 9252 32 42 92                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 490+ 9255 7C           .SignHL:                ld      a,h
 491+ 9256 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 492+ 9259 28 0B                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 493+ 925B E6 7F        .NegativeHL:            and     $7F
 494+ 925D 67                                   ld      h,a
 495+ 925E 3A 42 92                             ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 496+ 9261 EE 80                                xor     $80
 497+ 9263 32 42 92                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 498+ 9266 CD 6C 91     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 499+ 9269 3A 42 92     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 500+ 926C ED 27 80                             test    $80
 501+ 926F C8                                   ret     z
 502+ 9270 AF           .Negateghl: 			xor 	a
 503+ 9271 95                                   sub 	l
 504+ 9272 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 505+ 9273 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 506+ 9274 94                                   sub 	h
 507+ 9275 67                                   ld 		h,a
 508+ 9276 C9                                   ret
 509+ 9277
 510+ 9277 AF           mulDESgnbyHLUnsgnTo2c:  xor     a
 511+ 9278 32 42 92                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 512+ 927B 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 513+ 927C ED 27 80                             test    $80
 514+ 927F 28 08                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 515+ 9281 E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 516+ 9283 57                                   ld      d,a
 517+ 9284 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 518+ 9286 32 42 92                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 519+ 9289 CD 6C 91     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 520+ 928C 3A 42 92     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 521+ 928F ED 27 80                             test    $80
 522+ 9292 C8                                   ret     z
 523+ 9293 AF           .Negateghl:             xor 	a
 524+ 9294 95                                   sub 	l
 525+ 9295 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 526+ 9296 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 527+ 9297 94                                   sub 	h
 528+ 9298 67                                   ld 		h,a
 529+ 9299 C9                                   ret
 530+ 929A
 531+ 929A
# file closed: ./Maths/multiply.asm
 567  929A                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_square.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
   1+ 929A              ; "ASM_SQUA : TESTGOOD"
   2+ 929A              ; "AP = A^2 A = low,P = hi"
   3+ 929A
   4+ 929A              inline_squde: MACRO
   5+ 929A ~            			ld	e,a
   6+ 929A ~            			ld  d,a
   7+ 929A ~            			mul
   8+ 929A              			ENDM
   9+ 929A
  10+ 929A              inline_squa: MACRO
  11+ 929A ~            			ld	e,a
  12+ 929A ~            			ld  d,a
  13+ 929A ~            			mul
  14+ 929A ~            			ld	a,e
  15+ 929A              			ENDM
  16+ 929A
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
 568  929A                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_sine.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_sine.asm
   1+ 929A              ;- MACROS
   2+ 929A              LookupSineAMacro:       MACRO
   3+ 929A ~                                    ld      hl,SNE                      ; Set Q = sin(X)  = sin(CNT2 mod 32) = |sin(CNT2)|
   4+ 929A ~                                    add     hl, a
   5+ 929A ~                                    ld      a,(hl)
   6+ 929A                                      ENDM
   7+ 929A
   8+ 929A              ; Gets the sine of A from the lookup table into A
   9+ 929A              LookupSineA:            LookupSineAMacro
   9+ 929A 21 43 93    >                        ld      hl,SNE                      ; Set Q = sin(X)  = sin(CNT2 mod 32) = |sin(CNT2)|
   9+ 929D ED 31       >                        add     hl, a
   9+ 929F 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
  10+ 92A0 C9                                   ret
  11+ 92A1

 569  92A1                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
   1+ 92A1              ; "ASM SQRT : TESTGOOD"
   2+ 92A1              ; "16-bit integer square root"
   3+ 92A1              ; "call with de = number to square root"
   4+ 92A1              ; "returns   hl = square root"
   5+ 92A1              ; "corrupts  bc, de"
   6+ 92A1              asm_sqrt:
   7+ 92A1 01 00 80     	ld bc,$8000
   8+ 92A4 61           	ld h,c
   9+ 92A5 69           	ld l,c
  10+ 92A6              .sqrloop:
  11+ 92A6 CB 38        	srl b
  12+ 92A8 CB 19        	rr c
  13+ 92AA 09           	add hl,bc
  14+ 92AB EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ 92AC ED 52        	sbc hl,de
  16+ 92AE 38 04        	jr c,.sqrbit
  17+ 92B0 EB           	ex de,hl
  18+ 92B1 09           	add hl,bc
  19+ 92B2 18 05        	jr .sqrfi
  20+ 92B4              .sqrbit:
  21+ 92B4 19           	add hl,de
  22+ 92B5 EB           	ex de,hl
  23+ 92B6 B7           	or a
  24+ 92B7 ED 42        	sbc hl,bc
  25+ 92B9              .sqrfi:
  26+ 92B9 CB 3C        	srl h
  27+ 92BB CB 1D        	rr l
  28+ 92BD CB 38        	srl b
  29+ 92BF CB 19        	rr c
  30+ 92C1 30 E3        	jr nc,.sqrloop
  31+ 92C3 C9           	ret
  32+ 92C4
  33+ 92C4
  34+ 92C4              sqrtQR:					; Q = SQR(Qlo.Rhi) Q <~127
  35+ 92C4 3A 5F 7F     	ld		a,(varQ)
  36+ 92C7 5F           	ld		e,a
  37+ 92C8 3A 60 7F     	ld		a,(varR)
  38+ 92CB 57           	ld		d,a
  39+ 92CC CD A1 92     	call	asm_sqrt
  40+ 92CF 7D               ld      a,l
  41+ 92D0 32 5F 7F     	ld		(varQ),a
  42+ 92D3 C9           	ret
  43+ 92D4
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
 570  92D4                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_arctan.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_arctan.asm
   1+ 92D4              ;Calculate A = arctan(P / Q)
   2+ 92D4              ; This finds the angle in the right-angled triangle where the opposite side to angle A is length P and the adjacent side to angle A has
   3+ 92D4              ; length Q, so:  tan(A) = P / Q
   4+ 92D4              ;
   5+ 92D4              ; The result in A is an integer representing the angle in radians. The routine returns values in the range 0 to 128,  (or 0 to PI radians).
   6+ 92D4 3A 5F 7E     ARCTAN:                 ld      a,(varP)                    ; LDA P                  \ Set T1 = P EOR Q, which will have the sign of P * Q
   7+ 92D7 21 5F 7F                             ld      hl,varQ                     ; EOR Q
   8+ 92DA AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
   9+ 92DB 32 5C 7E                             ld      (varT1),a                   ; STA T1
  10+ 92DE 3A 5F 7F                             ld      a,(varQ)                    ; LDA Q                  \ If Q = 0, jump to AR2 to return a right angle
  11+ 92E1 A7                                   and     a                           ; BEQ AR2
  12+ 92E2 CA 24 93                             jp      z, .AR2                     ; .
  13+ 92E5 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; ASL A                  \ Set Q = |Q| * 2 (this is a quick way of clearing the
  14+ 92E7 32 5F 7F                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; STA Q                  \ sign bit, and we don't need to shift right again as we only ever use this value in the division with |P| * 2, which we set next)
  15+ 92EA 3A 5F 7E                             ld      a,(varP)                    ; LDA P                  \ Set A = |P| * 2
  16+ 92ED CB 27                                sla     a                           ; ASL A
  17+ 92EF 32 5F 7E                             ld      (varP),a
  18+ 92F2 21 5F 7F                             ld      hl,varQ
  19+ 92F5 BE                                   cp      (hl)                        ; CMP Q                  \ If A >= Q, i.e. |P| > |Q|, jump to AR1 to swap P
  20+ 92F6 D2 08 93                             jp      nc, .AR1                    ; BCS AR1                \ and Q around, so we can still use the lookup table
  21+ 92F9 CD 30 93                             call    ARS1                        ; JSR ARS1               \ Call ARS1 to set the following from the lookup table:  A = arctan(A / Q)  = arctan(|P / Q|)
  22+ 92FC                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; SEC                    \ Set the C flag so the SBC instruction in AR3 will be correct, should we jump there
  22+ 92FC B7          >                        or a
  23+ 92FD 4F           .AR4:                   ld      c,a                         ; as we have to use a we use c as a temp, we can't push af as we would loose flags on pop
  24+ 92FE 3A 5C 7E                             ld      a,(varT1)                   ; LDX T1                 \ If T1 is negative, i.e. P and Q have different signs,
  25+ 9301 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; .
  26+ 9302 A7                                   and     a                           ; BMI AR3                \ jump down to AR3 to return arctan(-|P / Q|)
  27+ 9303 79                                   ld      a,c                         ; .                      \ we need to get a back before jump
  28+ 9304 FA 27 93                             jp      m, .AR3                     ; .
  29+ 9307 C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Otherwise P and Q have the same sign, so our result is correct and we can return from the subroutine
  30+ 9308              ; We want to calculate arctan(t) where |t| > 1, so we can use the calculation described in the documentation for the ACT table, i.e. 64 - arctan(1 / t)
  31+ 9308              ; In the 6502 verion it works with A already being P but we will fetch it
  32+ 9308 3A 5F 7F     .AR1:                   ld      a,(varQ)                    ; LDX Q                  \ Swap the values in Q and P, using the fact that we
  33+ 930B 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; .
  34+ 930C 3A 5F 7E                             ld      a,(varP)                    ; STA Q                  \ called AR1 with A = P
  35+ 930F 32 5F 7F                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; .
  36+ 9312 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; TXA                    \ This also sets A = P (which now contains the original argument |Q|)
  37+ 9313 32 5F 7E                             ld      (varP),a                    ; STX P                  \
  38+ 9316 CD 30 93                             call    ARS1                        ; JSR ARS1               \ Call ARS1 to set the following from the lookup table: A = arctan(A / Q) = arctan(|Q / P|) = arctan(1 / |P / Q|)
  39+ 9319 32 7B 7F                             ld      (varT),a                    ; STA T                  \ Set T = 64 - T, we use B as T (its not really that)
  40+ 931C 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; its actually t = a, a = 64-a
  41+ 931D 3E 40                                ld      a,64                        ; LDA #64 What is going on here is t = result
  42+ 931F                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; SBC T                            a = 64- result
  42+ 931F B7          >                        or a
  43+ 9320 98                                   sbc     a,b                         ; .
  44+ 9321 C3 FD 92                             jp      .AR4                        ; BCS AR4                \ Jump to AR4 to continue the calculation (this BCS is effectively a JMP as the subtraction will never underflow, as ARS1 returns values in the range 0-31)
  45+ 9324              ; If we get here then Q = 0, so tan(A) = infinity and A is a right angle, or 0.25 of a circle. We allocate 255 to a full circle, so we should return 63 for a right angle
  46+ 9324 3E 3F        .AR2:                   ld      a,63                        ; LDA #63                \ Set A to 63, to represent a right angle
  47+ 9326 C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
  48+ 9327              ; A contains arctan(|P / Q|) but P and Q have different signs, so we need to return arctan(-|P / Q|), using the calculation described in the documentation for the ACT table, i.e. 128 - A
  49+ 9327 32 7B 7F     .AR3:                   ld      (varT),a
  50+ 932A 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; STA T                  \ Set A = 128 - A, we use b as T
  51+ 932B 3E 80                                ld      a,128                       ; LDA #128               \
  52+ 932D                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; SBC T                  \ The subtraction will work because we did a SEC before calling AR3
  52+ 932D B7          >                        or a
  53+ 932E 98                                   sbc     a,b
  54+ 932F C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
  55+ 9330              ; This routine fetches arctan(A / Q) from the ACT table, so A will be set to an integer in the range 0 to 31 that represents an angle from 0 to 45 degrees (or 0 to \ PI / 4 radians)
  56+ 9330 CD ED 93     ARS1:                   call    Amul256DivQ                 ; JSR LL28               \ Call LL28 to calculate: R = 256 * A / Q
  57+ 9333 3A 60 7F                             ld      a,(varR)                    ; LDA R                  \ Set X = R / 8
  58+ 9336 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; LSR A                  \       = 32 * A / Q
  59+ 9338 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; LSR A                  \
  60+ 933A CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; LSR A                  \ so X has the value t * 32 where t = A / Q, which is
  61+ 933C 21 63 93                             ld      hl,ACT                      ; TAX                    \ what we need to look up values in the ACT table
  62+ 933F ED 31                                add     hl,a                        ; LDA ACT,X              \ Fetch ACT+X from the ACT table into A, so now:
  63+ 9341 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                        \   A = value in ACT + X = value in ACT + (32 * A / Q)= arctan(A / Q)
  64+ 9342 C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
  65+ 9343
  66+ 9343              ;;;arctan:										; .ARCTAN	\ -> &2A3C  \ A=TAN-1(P/Q) \ A=arctan (P/Q)  called from block E
  67+ 9343              ;;;		ld		a,(varP)					; a = var P
  68+ 9343              ;;;		ld		hl,varQ
  69+ 9343              ;;;		xor		(hl)						; a = var p XOR varQ
  70+ 9343              ;;;		ld		a,(varT1)					; \ T1	 \ quadrant info
  71+ 9343              ;;;		ld		c,a							; c = copy of T1
  72+ 9343              ;;;		ld		a,(hl)						; Q
  73+ 9343              ;;;		cp		0
  74+ 9343              ;;;		jr		z,.AR2						;  Q=0 so set angle to 63, pi/2
  75+ 9343              ;;;		ld		(varQ),a					; Q move to reg B?
  76+ 9343              ;;;		ld		d,a							; copy to reg d
  77+ 9343              ;;;		sla		a							; drop sign
  78+ 9343              ;;;		ld		a,(varP)					; P
  79+ 9343              ;;;		ld		e,a							; copy to reg e
  80+ 9343              ;;;		sla		a							; drop sign
  81+ 9343              ;;;		cp		d							; compare with b (unsigned varQ * 2)
  82+ 9343              ;;;		jr		nc, .ars1					; if q >  p then adjust  swop A and Q as A >= Q
  83+ 9343              ;;;		call	ars1						; \ ARS1 \ get Angle for A*32/Q from table.
  84+ 9343              ;;;		scf									; set carry flag
  85+ 9343              ;;;.ar4:										; sub o.k
  86+ 9343              ;;;		bit 	7,c							; is T1 (also in c) negative?
  87+ 9343              ;;;		jr		nz,.ar3						;  -ve quadrant
  88+ 9343              ;;;		ret
  89+ 9343              ;;;.ar1:										; swop A and Q entering here d = q and e = P
  90+ 9343              ;;;		ld		a,d							; a = varQ
  91+ 9343              ;;;		ld		d,e							; varQ = varP
  92+ 9343              ;;;		ld		e,a							; swap D and E around
  93+ 9343              ;;;		ld		(varP),a					; write to actual variables
  94+ 9343              ;;;		ld		a,d
  95+ 9343              ;;;		ld		(varQ),a					; write to actual variables
  96+ 9343              ;;;		call	.ars1
  97+ 9343              ;;;		ld		(varT),b
  98+ 9343              ;;;		ld		b,a							; B = T = angle
  99+ 9343              ;;;		ld		a,64						; next range of angle, pi/4 to pi/2
 100+ 9343              ;;;		sub		a,b							; a = 64 - T (or b)
 101+ 9343              ;;;		jr		nc,.ar4						;  sub o.k
 102+ 9343              ;;;.ar2:										; .AR2	\ set angle to 90 degrees
 103+ 9343              ;;;		ld 		a,&3F						;  #63
 104+ 9343              ;;;		ret
 105+ 9343              ;;;.ar3:										;.AR3	\ -ve quadrant
 106+ 9343              ;;;		ld		b,a							; b = T	= \ angle
 107+ 9343              ;;;		ld		a,ConstPi					; a = Pi
 108+ 9343              ;;;		sub		b,a							; A = 128-T, so now covering range pi/2 to pi correctly
 109+ 9343              ;;;		ret
 110+ 9343              ;;;.ars1:										; .ARS1	\ -> &2A75  \ get Angle for A*32/Q from table.
 111+ 9343              ;;;		call	RequAmul256divQ				;  LL28 \ BFRDIV R=A*256/Q
 112+ 9343              ;;;		ld		a,(regA)
 113+ 9343              ;;;		srl		a
 114+ 9343              ;;;		srl		a
 115+ 9343              ;;;		srl		a							;  31 max.
 116+ 9343              ;;;		ld		hl, ArcTanTable				; root of index into table at end of words data
 117+ 9343              ;;;		add		hl,a						; now at real data
 118+ 9343              ;;;		ld		a,(hl)						; a =  ACT[a]
 119+ 9343              ;;;.arsr:										; rts used by laser lines below (will not in later code)
 120+ 9343              ;;;		ret
 121+ 9343
 122+ 9343
 123+ 9343
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_arctan.asm
 571  9343                  INCLUDE "./Maths/SineTable.asm"

   1+ 9343              ;; PRINT "SIN TABLE"
   2+ 9343              ;; FOR I% =  0 TO  31
   3+ 9343              ;; N = ABS(SIN((I%/64)*2*PI))
   4+ 9343              ;; IF N >= 1 THEN B% = 255  ELSE B% = INT(256 * N + 0.5)
   5+ 9343              ;; PRINT B%
   6+ 9343              ;; NEXT I%
   7+ 9343

  11+ 9353 FF FF FB F5                  DB 255, 255, 251, 245, 237, 226, 213, 198

   5+ 9363

   6+ 9367 05 06 08 09
   7+ 936B 0A 0B 0C 0D                  DB 010, 011, 012, 013, 015, 016, 017, 018

   8+ 9373 13 14 15 16                  DB 019, 020, 021, 022, 023, 024, 025, 025
   8+ 9377 17 18 19 19
