 573  9383                  INCLUDE "./Maths/negate16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/negate16.asm
   1+ 9383              ;;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2+ 9383              ;; 16-bit negate
   3+ 9383                      ; Input:
   4+ 9383                      ;       HL = value
   5+ 9383                      ; Output:
   6+ 9383                      ;       HL = -value
   7+ 9383                      ; Destroys:
   8+ 9383                      ;       AF
   9+ 9383                      ;
  10+ 9383              negate16:
  11+ 9383 AF           negate16hl:         xor 	a
  12+ 9384 95                               sub 	l
  13+ 9385 6F                               ld 		l,a
  14+ 9386 9F                               sbc 	a,a
  15+ 9387 94                               sub 	h
  16+ 9388 67                               ld 		h,a
  17+ 9389 C9                               ret
  18+ 938A
  19+ 938A AF           negate16de:         xor 	a
  20+ 938B 93                               sub 	e
  21+ 938C 5F                               ld 		e,a
  22+ 938D 9F                               sbc 	a,a
  23+ 938E 92                               sub 	d
  24+ 938F 57                               ld 		d,a
  25+ 9390 C9                               ret
  26+ 9391
  27+ 9391 AF           negate16bc:         xor 	a
  28+ 9392 91                               sub 	c
  29+ 9393 4F                               ld 		c,a
  30+ 9394 9F                               sbc 	a,a
  31+ 9395 90                               sub 	b
  32+ 9396 47                               ld 		b,a
  33+ 9397 C9                               ret
  34+ 9398
# file closed: ./Maths/negate16.asm
 574  9398                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_divide.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
   1+ 9398              ;   K(3 2 1 0)           The result of the division
   2+ 9398              ;   X                    X is preserved
   3+ 9398
   4+ 9398              ; Calculate K(3 2 1 0) = (A P+1 P) / (z_sign z_hi z_lo) where zsign hi lo is in DE with zsign leading hi
   5+ 9398 00 00 00 00  varQRS                 DS      4
   6+ 939C 00 00 00     varAPP                  DS     3
   7+ 939F
   8+ 939F                                  DISPLAY "TODO:  neds rewrite of whoel DIDV3B2"
   9+ 939F              ;; NEEDS REWRITE TODO OF WHOLE DIVD3B2
  10+ 939F              ;; NEEDS REWRITE TODO
  11+ 939F
  12+ 939F              ; b = varR, c= varQ
  13+ 939F              Requ256mulAdivQ_6502:
  14+ 939F CB 27        .LL31_6502:             sla     a                       ; ASL A                   \ Shift A to the left
  15+ 93A1 DA B6 93                             jp      c,.LL29_6502            ; BCS LL29               \ If bit 7 of A was set, then jump straight to the subtraction
  16+ 93A4                                      FlipCarryFlag                   ;                          If A < N, then C flag is set.
  16+ 93A4 3F          >                        ccf
  17+ 93A5                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502 ; CMP Q              \ If A < Q, skip the following subtraction
  17+ 93A5 B9          >                        cp      c
  17+ 93A6 DA AB 93    >                        jp		c, .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502
  18+ 93A9                                                                      ; BCC P%+4
  19+ 93A9 91                                   sub     c                       ; SBC Q                  \ A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  20+ 93AA                                      ClearCarryFlag
  20+ 93AA B7          >                        or a
  21+ 93AB              .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502:     FlipCarryFlag
  21+ 93AB 3F          >                        ccf
  22+ 93AC CB 10                                rl      b                       ; ROL R                  \ Rotate the counter in R to the left, and catch the result bit into bit 0 (which will be a 0 if we didn't do the subtraction, or 1 if we did)
  23+ 93AE DA 9F 93                             jp      c, .LL31_6502            ; BCS LL31               \ If we still have set bits in R, loop back to LL31 to do the next iteration of 7
  24+ 93B1 78                                   ld      a,b
  25+ 93B2 32 AE EF                             ld      (Rvar),a
  26+ 93B5 C9                                   ret                             ; RTS                    \ R left with remainder of division
  27+ 93B6 91           .LL29_6502:             sub     c                       ; SBC Q                  \ A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  28+ 93B7                                      SetCarryFlag                    ; SEC                    \ Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  28+ 93B7 37          >                        scf
  29+ 93B8 CB 10                                rl      b                       ; ROL R                  \ Rotate the counter in R to the left, and catch the result bit into bit 0 (which will be a 0 if we didn't do the subtraction, or 1 if we did)
  30+ 93BA DA 9F 93                             jp      c, .LL31_6502            ; BCS LL31               \ If we still have set bits in R, loop back to LL31 to do the next iteration of 7
  31+ 93BD 78                                   ld      a,b                     ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine with R containing the
  32+ 93BE 32 AE EF                             ld      (Rvar),a                ; .
  33+ 93C1 C9                                   ret                             ; .                      \ remainder of the division
  34+ 93C2 3E FF        .LL2_6502:              ld      a,$FF                   ; LDA #255               \ The division is very close to 1, so return the closest
  35+ 93C4 32 60 7F                             ld      (varR),a                ; STA R                  \ possible answer to 256, i.e. R = 255
  36+ 93C7 47                                   ld      b,a                     ; as we are using b as varR
  37+ 93C8                                      SetCarryFlag                    ; we failed so need carry flag set
  37+ 93C8 37          >                        scf
  38+ 93C9 C9                                   ret                             ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
  39+ 93CA                             DISPLAY "TODO : Merge Requ256mulAdivQ_6502  RequAmul256divQ"
  40+ 93CA              ; Entry point if varQ is populated with demoninator
  41+ 93CA              RequAmul256divQ:
  42+ 93CA F5           BFRDIV:                 push	af
  43+ 93CB 3A 5F 7F                             ld		a,(varQ)
  44+ 93CE 4F                                   ld		c,a
  45+ 93CF F1                                   pop		af
  46+ 93D0 FE 00                                cp		0
  47+ 93D2 CA E9 93                             jp		z, HLDIVC_0_BY	; fast exit if numerator is 0
  48+ 93D5 2E 00        RequAmul256divC:        ld		l,0
  49+ 93D7 67                                   ld		h,a
  50+ 93D8 06 10        HL_Div_Cold:			ld b,16			; fast entry point if C and HL are already set
  51+ 93DA AF                                   xor a
  52+ 93DB 29           LOOPPOINT:	            add hl,hl
  53+ 93DC 17                                   rla
  54+ 93DD B9                                   cp c
  55+ 93DE 38 02                                jr c,SKIPINCSUB
  56+ 93E0 2C                                   inc l
  57+ 93E1 91                                   sub c
  58+ 93E2 10 F7        SKIPINCSUB:             djnz LOOPPOINT
  59+ 93E4 7D                                   ld		a,l
  60+ 93E5 32 60 7F                             ld 		(varR),a
  61+ 93E8 C9                                   ret
  62+ 93E9 32 60 7F     HLDIVC_0_BY:            ld		(varR),a
  63+ 93EC C9                                   ret
  64+ 93ED
  65+ 93ED
  66+ 93ED 21 5F 7F     Amul256DivQ:            ld      hl,varQ                 ; CMP Q                  \ If A >= Q, then the answer will not fit in one byte,
  67+ 93F0 4E                                   ld      c,(hl)                  ; using c as Q var
  68+ 93F1 B9                                   cp      c
  69+ 93F2                                      FlipCarryFlag
  69+ 93F2 3F          >                        ccf
  70+ 93F3 DA 1B 94                             jp      c, .LL2_6502            ; BCS LL2                \ so jump to LL2 to return 255
  71+ 93F6 06 FE                                ld      b,$FE                   ; LDX #%11111110         \ Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7 loop iterations, getting a 1 each time, and then we use b as Rvar
  72+ 93F8 CB 27        .LL31_6502:             sla     a                       ; ASL A                  \ Shift A to the left
  73+ 93FA DA 0F 94                             jp      c,.LL29_6502            ; BCS LL29               \ If bit 7 of A was set, then jump straight to the subtraction
  74+ 93FD                                      FlipCarryFlag                   ;                          If A < N, then C flag is set.
  74+ 93FD 3F          >                        ccf
  75+ 93FE                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502 ; CMP Q              \ If A < Q, skip the following subtraction
  75+ 93FE B9          >                        cp      c
  75+ 93FF DA 04 94    >                        jp		c, .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502
  76+ 9402                                                                      ; BCC P%+4
  77+ 9402 91                                   sub     c                       ; SBC Q                  \ A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  78+ 9403                                      ClearCarryFlag
  78+ 9403 B7          >                        or a
  79+ 9404              .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502:     FlipCarryFlag
  79+ 9404 3F          >                        ccf
  80+ 9405 CB 10                                rl      b                       ; ROL R                  \ Rotate the counter in R to the left, and catch the result bit into bit 0 (which will be a 0 if we didn't do the subtraction, or 1 if we did)
  81+ 9407 DA F8 93                             jp      c, .LL31_6502           ; BCS LL31               \ If we still have set bits in R, loop back to LL31 to do the next iteration of 7
  82+ 940A 78                                   ld      a,b
  83+ 940B 32 60 7F                             ld      (varR),a
  84+ 940E C9                                   ret                             ; RTS                    \ R left with remainder of division
  85+ 940F 91           .LL29_6502:             sub     c                       ; SBC Q                  \ A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  86+ 9410                                      SetCarryFlag                    ; SEC                    \ Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  86+ 9410 37          >                        scf
  87+ 9411 CB 10                                rl      b                       ; ROL R                  \ Rotate the counter in R to the left, and catch the result bit into bit 0 (which will be a 0 if we didn't do the subtraction, or 1 if we did)
  88+ 9413 DA F8 93                             jp      c, .LL31_6502           ; BCS LL31               \ If we still have set bits in R, loop back to LL31 to do the next iteration of 7
  89+ 9416 78                                   ld      a,b                     ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine with R containing the
  90+ 9417 32 60 7F                             ld      (varR),a                ; .
  91+ 941A C9                                   ret                             ; .                      \ remainder of the division
  92+ 941B 3E FF        .LL2_6502:              ld      a,$FF                   ; LDA #255               \ The division is very close to 1, so return the closest
  93+ 941D 32 60 7F                             ld      (varR),a                ; STA R                  \ possible answer to 256, i.e. R = 255
  94+ 9420                                      SetCarryFlag                    ; we failed so need carry flag set
  94+ 9420 37          >                        scf
  95+ 9421 C9                                   ret                             ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
  96+ 9422
  97+ 9422
  98+ 9422 00           DIVD3B_SHIFT_REG:       DB      0
  99+ 9423
 100+ 9423 7B           DIV3B2DE:               ld      a,e                         ; load QRS with Z sign hi lo
 101+ 9424 32 9A 93                             ld      (varQRS+2),a
 102+ 9427 7A                                   ld      a,d
 103+ 9428 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 104+ 942A 32 99 93                             ld      (varQRS+1),a
 105+ 942D 7A                                   ld      a,d
 106+ 942E E6 80                                and     $80
 107+ 9430 32 98 93                             ld      (varQRS),a
 108+ 9433 C3 39 94                             jp      DVID3B
 109+ 9436              ; Calculate K(3 2 1 0) = (A P+1 P) / (z_sign z_hi z_lo) = A P[1 0 ] / (SRQ)
 110+ 9436              ; We don't use zlo and assume its already loaded into SRQ
 111+ 9436 32 61 7E     DVID3B2:                ld      (varP+2),a                  ;STA P+2                \ Set P+2 = A
 112+ 9439                                                                          ; LDA INWK+6             \ Set Q = z_lo
 113+ 9439                                                                          ; STA Q
 114+ 9439                                                                          ; LDA INWK+7             \ Set R = z_hi
 115+ 9439                                                                          ; STA R
 116+ 9439                                                                          ; LDA INWK+8             \ Set S = z_sign
 117+ 9439                                                                          ; STA S
 118+ 9439              ;  Given the above assignments, we now want to calculate K(3 2 1 0) = P(2 1 0) / (S R Q)
 119+ 9439 3A 5F 7E     DVID3B:                 ld      a,(varP)                    ; LDA P                 \ Make sure P(2 1 0) is at least 1
 120+ 943C F6 01                                or      1                           ; ORA #1
 121+ 943E 32 5F 7E                             ld      (varP),a                    ; STA P
 122+ 9441              ;--- t = sign of P2 xor S (i.e. sign of result) ------------;
 123+ 9441 3A 61 7E                             ld      a,(varP+2)                  ; LDA P+2                \ Set T to the sign of P+2 * S (i.e. the sign of the
 124+ 9444 21 61 7F                             ld      hl, varS                    ; EOR S                  \ result) and store it in T
 125+ 9447 AE                                   xor     (hl)
 126+ 9448 E6 80                                and     $80                         ; AND #%10000000
 127+ 944A 32 7B 7F                             ld      (varT),a                    ; STA T
 128+ 944D              ;--- New bit added to aviod a divde by 0 -------------------;
 129+ 944D 3A 5F 7F     .CheckQRSAtLeast1:      ld      a,(varQ)                    ;
 130+ 9450 21 60 7F                             ld      hl,varR                     ;
 131+ 9453 B6                                   or      (hl)                        ;
 132+ 9454 C2 5C 94                             jp      nz,.DVL9Prep                ;
 133+ 9457 3E 01                                ld      a,1                         ;
 134+ 9459 32 5F 7F                             ld      (varQ),a                    ;
 135+ 945C              ; A P(1) P(0) = ABS P(2 1 0)
 136+ 945C 06 00        .DVL9Prep:              ld      b,0                         ; LDY #0                 \ Set Y = 0 to store the scale factor (use b as Y)
 137+ 945E 3A 61 7E                             ld      a,(varP+2)                  ; LDA P+2                \ Clear the sign bit of P+2, so the division can be done
 138+ 9461 E6 7F                                and     $7F                         ; AND #%01111111         \ with positive numbers and we'll set the correct sign below, once all the maths is done
 139+ 9463              ; We now shift (A P+1 P) left until A >= 64, counting the number of shifts in Y. This makes the top part of the division as large as possible, thus retaining as
 140+ 9463              ; much accuracy as we can.  When we come to return the final result, we shift the result by the number of places in Y, and in the correct direction
 141+ 9463                                      DISPLAY "TODO DVL9 and DVL6 move P and QRS into registers for faster shift"
 142+ 9463              ;-- while A < 64 shift A P(1) P(0) -------------------------;
 143+ 9463 FE 40        .DVL9:                  cp      64                          ; CMP #64                \ If A >= 64, jump down to DV14
 144+ 9465 D2 76 94                             jp      nc, .DV14                   ; BCS DV14
 145+ 9468 21 5F 7E                             ld      hl,varP                     ; ASL P                  \ Shift (A P+1 P) to the left
 146+ 946B CB 26                                sla     (hl)
 147+ 946D 23                                   inc     hl                          ; ROL P+1
 148+ 946E CB 16                                rl      (hl)
 149+ 9470 CB 17                                rl      a                           ; ROL A
 150+ 9472 04                                   inc     b                           ; INY                    \ Increment the scale factor in Y
 151+ 9473 C3 63 94                             jp      .DVL9                       ; BNE DVL9               \ Loop up to DVL9 (this BNE is effectively a JMP, as Y will never be zero)
 152+ 9476              ; If we get here, A >= 64 and contains the highest byte of the numerator, scaled up by the number of left shifts in Y (b in our code)
 153+ 9476 32 61 7E     .DV14:                  ld      (varP+2),a                  ; Store A in P+2, so we now have the scaled value of the numerator in P(2 1 0)
 154+ 9479 3A 61 7F                             ld      a,(varS)                    ; LDA S                  \ Set A = |S|
 155+ 947C E6 7F                                and     $7F                         ; AND #%01111111
 156+ 947E                                      ;nop                                ;  BMI DV9               \ If bit 7 of A is set, jump down to DV9 (which can never happen)
 157+ 947E              ; We now shift (S R Q) left until bit 7 of S is set, reducing Y by the number of shifts. This makes the bottom part of the division as large as possible, thus
 158+ 947E              ; retaining as much accuracy as we can. When we come to return the final result, we shift the result by the total number of places in Y, and in the correct
 159+ 947E              ; direction, to give us the correct result
 160+ 947E              ; We set A to |S| above, so the following actually shifts (A R Q)
 161+ 947E 05           .DVL6:                  dec     b                           ; DEY                    \ Decrement the scale factor in Y (b)
 162+ 947F 21 5F 7F                             ld      hl,varQ                     ; ASL Q                  \ Shift (A R Q) to the left
 163+ 9482 CB 26                                sla     (hl)                        ; .
 164+ 9484 21 60 7F                             ld      hl,varR                     ; ROL R
 165+ 9487 CB 16                                rl      (hl)                        ; .
 166+ 9489 CB 17                                rl      a                           ; ROL A
 167+ 948B F2 7E 94                             jp      p,.DVL6                     ; BPL DVL6               \ Loop up to DVL6 to do another shift, until bit 7 of A is set and we can't shift left any further
 168+ 948E              ; We have now shifted both the numerator and denominator left as far as they will go, keeping a tally of the overall scale factor of the various shifts in Y. We
 169+ 948E              ; can now divide just the two highest bytes to get our result
 170+ 948E 32 5F 7F     .DV9:                   ld      (varQ),a                    ; STA Q                  \ Set Q = A, the highest byte of the denominator
 171+ 9491 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; for Requ256mulAdivQ_6502 as it uses c as Q
 172+ 9492 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; preserve shift register in DEVD3B_SHIFT_REG
 173+ 9493 32 22 94                             ld      (DIVD3B_SHIFT_REG),a
 174+ 9496              ; Note in Requ256mulAdivQ_6502 we use B as R Var for shift register
 175+ 9496 06 FE                                ld      b,254                       ; LDA #254               \ Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can pass this to
 176+ 9498 32 60 7F                             ld      (varR),a                    ; STA R                  \ LL31 to act as the bit counter in the division
 177+ 949B 3A 61 7E                             ld      a,(varP+2)                  ; LDA P+2                \ Set A to the highest byte of the numerator
 178+ 949E CD 9F 93                             call    Requ256mulAdivQ_6502        ; JSR LL31               \ Call LL31 to calculate: R = 256 * A / Q which means result is in b
 179+ 94A1              ; The result of our division is now in R, so we just need to shift it back by the scale factor in Y
 180+ 94A1                                      ZeroA                               ; LDA #0                \ Set K(3 2 1) = 0 to hold the result (we populate K)
 180+ 94A1 AF          >                        xor a
 181+ 94A2 32 73 7F                             ld      (varK+1),a                  ; STA K+1               \ next)
 182+ 94A5 32 74 7F                             ld      (varK+2),a                  ; STA K+2
 183+ 94A8 32 75 7F                             ld      (varK+3),a                  ; STA K+3
 184+ 94AB 3A 22 94                             ld      a,(DIVD3B_SHIFT_REG)        ; TYA                   \ If Y (shift counter in b) is positive, jump to DV12
 185+ 94AE B7                                   or      a                           ; .                      we want to check the sign or if its zero
 186+ 94AF CA DA 94                             jp      z,.DV13                     ; Optimisation to save a second jump from DV12 to DV13
 187+ 94B2 F2 E5 94                             jp      p,.DV12                     ; BPL DV12
 188+ 94B5              ; If we get here then Y is negative, so we need to shift the result R to the left by Y places, and then set the correct sign for the result
 189+ 94B5                                      DISPLAY "TODO check oprimisation here for var r  in b"
 190+ 94B5 48                                   ld      c,b
 191+ 94B6 3A 22 94                             ld      a,(DIVD3B_SHIFT_REG)
 192+ 94B9 47                                   ld      b,a
 193+ 94BA 79                                   ld      a,c
 194+ 94BB                                      ; OPTIM ld      a,(varR)                    ; LDA R                  \ Set A = R
 195+ 94BB CB 27        .DVL8:                  sla     a                           ; ASL A                  \ Shift (K+3 K+2 K+1 A) left
 196+ 94BD 21 73 7F                             ld      hl,varK+1                   ; ROL K+1
 197+ 94C0 CB 16                                rl      (hl)                        ; .
 198+ 94C2 23                                   inc     hl                          ; ROL K+2
 199+ 94C3 CB 16                                rl      (hl)                        ; .
 200+ 94C5 23                                   inc     hl                          ; ROL K+3
 201+ 94C6 CB 16                                rl      (hl)                        ; .
 202+ 94C8 04                                   inc     b                           ; INY                    \ Increment the scale factor in Y
 203+ 94C9 C2 BB 94                             jp      nz,.DVL8                    ; BNE DVL8               \ Loop back to DVL8 until we have shifted left by Y places
 204+ 94CC 32 72 7F                             ld      (varK),a                    ; STA K                  \ Store A in K so the result is now in K(3 2 1 0)
 205+ 94CF 3A 75 7F                             ld      a,(varK+3)                  ; LDA K+3                \ Set K+3 to the sign in T, which we set above to the
 206+ 94D2 21 7B 7F                             ld      hl,varT                     ; ORA T                  \ correct sign for the result
 207+ 94D5 B6                                   or      (hl)                        ; .
 208+ 94D6 32 75 7F                             ld      (varK+3),a                  ; STA K+3
 209+ 94D9 C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
 210+ 94DA              ; If we get here then Y is zero, so we don't need to shift the result R, we just need to set the correct sign for the result
 211+ 94DA 78           .DV13:                  ld      a,b; varR)                  ; LDA R                  \ Store R in K so the result is now in K(3 2 1 0)
 212+ 94DB 32 72 7F                             ld      (varK),a                    ; STA K
 213+ 94DE 3A 7B 7F                             ld      a,(varT)                    ; LDA T                  \ Set K+3 to the sign in T, which we set above to the
 214+ 94E1 32 75 7F                             ld      (varK+3),a                  ; STA K+3                \ correct sign for the result
 215+ 94E4 C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
 216+ 94E5              ; if we get here U is positive but still could be zero, now this is handled in DV9
 217+ 94E5              .DV12:                  ; nop                               ; BEQ DV13               \ We jumped here having set A to the scale factor in Y, so this jumps up to DV13 if Y = 0
 218+ 94E5              ; If we get here then Y is positive and non-zero, so we need to shift the result R to the right by Y places and then set the correct sign for the result. We also
 219+ 94E5              ; know that K(3 2 1) will stay 0, as we are shifting the lowest byte to the right, so no set bits will make their way into the top three bytes
 220+ 94E5                                      ;ld      a,(varR)                    ; LDA R                  \ Set A = R
 221+ 94E5 48                                   ld      c,b
 222+ 94E6 3A 22 94                             ld      a,(DIVD3B_SHIFT_REG)
 223+ 94E9 47                                   ld      b,a
 224+ 94EA 79                                   ld      a,c
 225+ 94EB CB 3F        .DVL10:                 srl     a                           ; LSR A                  \ Shift A right
 226+ 94ED 05                                   dec     b                           ; DEY                    \ Decrement the scale factor in Y
 227+ 94EE C2 EB 94                             jp      nz,.DVL10                   ; BNE DVL10              \ Loop back to DVL10 until we have shifted right by Y places
 228+ 94F1 32 72 7F                             ld      (varK),a                    ; STA K                  \ Store the shifted A in K so the result is now in K(3 2 1 0)
 229+ 94F4 3A 7B 7F                             ld      a,(varT)                    ; LDA T                  \ Set K+3 to the sign in T, which we set above to the
 230+ 94F7 32 75 7F                             ld      (varK+3),a                  ; STA K+3                \ correct sign for the result
 231+ 94FA C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
 232+ 94FB              ;
 233+ 94FB              ;   Set flags E to 11111110
 234+ 94FB              ;   Loop:   A << 2
 235+ 94FB              ;           if carry was 0
 236+ 94FB              ;               if a >= D
 237+ 94FB              ;                   A = A - D
 238+ 94FB              ;                   clear carry (probably irrelevant really)
 239+ 94FB              ;           else
 240+ 94FB
 241+ 94FB              ;               sla flags << bringing in carry of 1
 242+ 94FB              ;               if bit 7 of flag was set then loop
 243+ 94FB              ;                                        elase a = e and exit
 244+ 94FB              ;
 245+ 94FB              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
 246+ 94FB              ;
 247+ 94FB              ;INPUTS: hl = dividend dbc = divisor
 248+ 94FB              ;OUTPUTS: hl/de -> AHL = quotient CDE = remainder, Carryflag set if divide by 0
 249+ 94FB
 250+ 94FB 57           DVIDT:                  ld      d,a                     ; D = var P+1
 251+ 94FC 3A 5F 7F                             ld      a,(varQ)
 252+ 94FF 4F                                   ld      c,a                     ; C = var Q
 253+ 9500 3A 5F 7E                             ld      a,(varP)
 254+ 9503 5F                                   ld      e,a                     ; E = var P
 255+ 9504                                      ; Need fast exists on ABS values
 256+ 9504 7A           BAequDEdivC:            ld      a,d                     ; Fast exit is value is 0
 257+ 9505 B3                                   or      e                       ; .
 258+ 9506 28 2A                                jr      z,.ResultIsZero         ; .
 259+ 9508 79                                   ld      a,c                     ; Fast exit is divide by 0
 260+ 9509 A7                                   and     a                       ;
 261+ 950A 28 29                                jr      z,.ResultIsFFFF         ;
 262+ 950C 7A           .SavSign:               ld      a,d                     ; preserve sign of result in var T
 263+ 950D A9                                   xor     c                       ;
 264+ 950E E6 80                                and     $80
 265+ 9510 6F                                   ld      l,a                     ; l = var T
 266+ 9511 3E 00                                ld      a,0
 267+ 9513 06 10                                ld      b,16
 268+ 9515                                      ShiftDELeft1
 268+ 9515 CB 23       >			   sla e
 268+ 9517 CB 12       >			   rl  d
 269+ 9519 CB 21                                sla     c                       ; c = abs c
 270+ 951B CB 39                                srl     c
 271+ 951D CB 17        .DivideLoop:            rl      a
 272+ 951F                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .SkipSubtract
 272+ 951F B9          >                        cp      c
 272+ 9520 DA 26 95    >                        jp		c, .SkipSubtract
 273+ 9523                                      ClearCarryFlag
 273+ 9523 B7          >                        or a
 274+ 9524 99                                   sbc     c
 275+ 9525                                      ClearCarryFlag
 275+ 9525 B7          >                        or a
 276+ 9526 3F           .SkipSubtract:          ccf
 277+ 9527 CB 13                                rl      e
 278+ 9529 CB 12                                rl      d
 279+ 952B 05                                   dec     b
 280+ 952C 20 EF                                jr      nz,.DivideLoop
 281+ 952E 7B                                   ld      a,e
 282+ 952F B5                                   or      l
 283+ 9530 42                                   ld      b,d
 284+ 9531 C9                                   ret
 285+ 9532              .ResultIsZero:          ZeroA
 285+ 9532 AF          >                        xor a
 286+ 9533 47                                   ld      b,a
 287+ 9534 C9                                   ret
 288+ 9535 3E FF        .ResultIsFFFF:          ld      a,$FF
 289+ 9537 47                                   ld      b,a
 290+ 9538 C9                                   ret
 291+ 9539
 292+ 9539 57           DIV96:                  ld      d,a                     ; D = var P+1
 293+ 953A 3A 5F 7F                             ld      a,(varQ)
 294+ 953D 0E 60                                ld      c,96                    ; C = var Q
 295+ 953F 3A 5F 7E                             ld      a,(varP)
 296+ 9542 5F                                   ld      e,a                     ; E = var P
 297+ 9543                                      ; Need fast exists on ABS values
 298+ 9543 7A           BAequDEdiv96            ld      a,d                     ; Fast exit is value is 0
 299+ 9544 B3                                   or      e                       ; .
 300+ 9545 28 26                                jr      z,.ResultIsZero         ; .
 301+ 9547 7A           .SavSign:               ld      a,d                     ; preserve sign of result in var T
 302+ 9548 A9                                   xor     c                       ;
 303+ 9549 E6 80                                and     $80
 304+ 954B 6F                                   ld      l,a                     ; l = var T
 305+ 954C 3E 00                                ld      a,0
 306+ 954E 06 10                                ld      b,16
 307+ 9550                                      ShiftDELeft1
 307+ 9550 CB 23       >			   sla e
 307+ 9552 CB 12       >			   rl  d
 308+ 9554 CB 21                                sla     c                       ; c = abs c
 309+ 9556 CB 39                                srl     c
 310+ 9558 CB 17        .DivideLoop:            rl      a
 311+ 955A                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .SkipSubtract
 311+ 955A B9          >                        cp      c
 311+ 955B DA 61 95    >                        jp		c, .SkipSubtract
 312+ 955E                                      ClearCarryFlag
 312+ 955E B7          >                        or a
 313+ 955F 99                                   sbc     c
 314+ 9560                                      ClearCarryFlag
 314+ 9560 B7          >                        or a
 315+ 9561 3F           .SkipSubtract:          ccf
 316+ 9562 CB 13                                rl      e
 317+ 9564 CB 12                                rl      d
 318+ 9566 05                                   dec     b
 319+ 9567 20 EF                                jr      nz,.DivideLoop
 320+ 9569 7B                                   ld      a,e
 321+ 956A B5                                   or      l
 322+ 956B 42                                   ld      b,d
 323+ 956C C9                                   ret
 324+ 956D              .ResultIsZero:          ZeroA
 324+ 956D AF          >                        xor a
 325+ 956E 47                                   ld      b,a
 326+ 956F C9                                   ret
 327+ 9570
 328+ 9570 14           Div16by24usgn:          inc     d                           ; can we fast retu
 329+ 9571 15                                   dec     d
 330+ 9572 20 13                                jr      nz,.ResultZero
 331+ 9574 50 59                                ld      de,bc                       ; so prep for bc/de
 332+ 9576 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl
 333+ 9578 7A           .div16by16usng:         ld      a,d
 334+ 9579 B3                                   or      e
 335+ 957A 28 10                                jr      z,.DivideByZero
 336+ 957C 14                                   inc     d
 337+ 957D 15                                   dec     d
 338+ 957E CD D0 96                             call    BC_Div_DE
 339+ 9581                                      ZeroA
 339+ 9581 AF          >                        xor a
 340+ 9582 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = remainder (need to fix c after hl = nothing of worth)
 341+ 9583 60 69                                ld      hl,bc                       ; hl = result (a is zero from above)
 342+ 9585 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; now fix c
 343+ 9586 C9                                   ret
 344+ 9587 AF           .ResultZero:            xor     a                           ; set AHL to 0 as d was 0 so h is zero
 345+ 9588 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; c = 0
 346+ 9589 67                                   ld      h,a
 347+ 958A 6F                                   ld      l,a
 348+ 958B C9                                   ret
 349+ 958C 3E FF        .DivideByZero:          ld      a,$FF
 350+ 958E 67                                   ld      h,a
 351+ 958F 6F                                   ld      l,a
 352+ 9590                                      SetCarryFlag
 352+ 9590 37          >                        scf
 353+ 9591 C9                                   ret
 354+ 9592
 355+ 9592              ;DIVD4 P-R=A/Qunsg  \P.R = A/Q unsigned called by Hall
 356+ 9592                          IFDEF HLEquAmul256DivD_Used
 357+ 9592 ~            HLEquAmul256DivD:       ld		b,8							; counter
 358+ 9592 ~                                    sla		a							;
 359+ 9592 ~                                    ld		h,a							; r a * 2 we will build result in hl
 360+ 9592 ~            .DivideLoop:            rl		a							; a = a * 2
 361+ 9592 ~                                    jr      c,.StraightToSubtraction    ; jump on carry to subtraction
 362+ 9592 ~                                    cp      d                           ; what was var Q
 363+ 9592 ~                                    jr		c,.SkipSubtraction	        ; if a < d skip subtraction, note this will come to skip subtraction with carry the wrong way round
 364+ 9592 ~            .StraightToSubtraction: ClearCarryFlag                      ; in 6502 the borrow flag is inverted carry, z80 just uses carry so we need to clear it
 365+ 9592 ~                                    sbc     a,d                         ; a = a - q
 366+ 9592 ~                                    ClearCarryFlag                      ; set carry so it gets shifted into bit 0 of b. we do this as we have to flip carry due to jr c from earlier cp d
 367+ 9592 ~            .SkipSubtraction:       ccf                                 ; we need to do this as 6502 does opposite on carry, i.e. if we jumped direct here then carry would be set in z80
 368+ 9592 ~                                    rl      h                           ; roll d left bringing in carry if there was an sbc performed
 369+ 9592 ~                                    djnz    .DivideLoop                 ; 8 cycles
 370+ 9592 ~            .CalculateRemainder:    cp      d                           ; calulate 256 * a / d if q >= q then answer will not fit in one byte d is still set, a holds remainder to be subtracted
 371+ 9592 ~                                    jr      nc, .RemainderTooBig
 372+ 9592 ~                                    ClearCarryFlag                      ; remove carry as the previous cp will have set it and mess up the sla in the remainder loop
 373+ 9592 ~            .InitRemainderLoop:     ld      b,%11111110                 ; loop for bits 1 to 7
 374+ 9592 ~                                    ld      l,b                         ; and set l to capture result bits (R)
 375+ 9592 ~            .RemainderLoop:         sla     a                           ; shift a left
 376+ 9592 ~                                    jr      c, .RemainderSubtraction    ; if there was a carry go to subtraction
 377+ 9592 ~                                    cp      d                           ; if a < d then skip subtraction
 378+ 9592 ~                                    jr      c,.RemainderSkipSubtract    ; .
 379+ 9592 ~                                    sbc     d                           ; a > q so a = a - q, carry will be clear here
 380+ 9592 ~            .RemainderSkipSubtract: ccf                                 ; as the jr used z80 we need to flip the carry to behave like 6502
 381+ 9592 ~                                    rl      l                           ; rotate counter to the left
 382+ 9592 ~                                    jr      c, .RemainderLoop           ; if there was a bit pushed to carry then loop
 383+ 9592 ~                                    ret
 384+ 9592 ~            .RemainderSubtraction:  sbc     d                           ; as the carry came from an sla we want to retain it
 385+ 9592 ~                                    SetCarryFlag                        ; roll in a carry bit to result
 386+ 9592 ~                                    rl      l                           ;
 387+ 9592 ~                                    jr      c, .RemainderLoop           ; and loop if there was a carry bit that came out
 388+ 9592 ~                                    ret
 389+ 9592 ~            .RemainderTooBig:       ld      l,$FF                       ; now hl = result
 390+ 9592 ~                                    ret
 391+ 9592                          ENDIF
 392+ 9592
 393+ 9592 BA           AEquAmul256DivD:        cp      d
 394+ 9593 28 1D                                jr      z,.BothSame
 395+ 9595 30 1E                                jr      nc,.DgtA
 396+ 9597 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
 397+ 9599 CB 27        .DivideLoop:            sla     a
 398+ 959B 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
 399+ 959D                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
 399+ 959D BA          >                        cp      d
 399+ 959E DA A3 95    >                        jp		c, .SkipSub
 400+ 95A1 92                                   sub     d
 401+ 95A2                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
 401+ 95A2 B7          >                        or a
 402+ 95A3              .SkipSub:               FlipCarryFlag                       ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
 402+ 95A3 3F          >                        ccf
 403+ 95A4 CB 13                                rl      e
 404+ 95A6 38 F1                                jr      c,.DivideLoop
 405+ 95A8 7B                                   ld      a,e
 406+ 95A9 C9                                   ret
 407+ 95AA 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
 408+ 95AB                                      SetCarryFlag                        ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
 408+ 95AB 37          >                        scf
 409+ 95AC CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
 410+ 95AE 38 E9                                jr      c,.DivideLoop               ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
 411+ 95B0 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
 412+ 95B1 C9                                   ret
 413+ 95B2 3E 01        .BothSame:              ld  a,1
 414+ 95B4 C9                                   ret
 415+ 95B5 3E FF        .DgtA:                  ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
 416+ 95B7 C9                                   ret
 417+ 95B8
 418+ 95B8              ; Divide 8-bit values
 419+ 95B8              ; In: Divide E by divider C
 420+ 95B8              ; Out: A = result, B = rest
 421+ 95B8              ;
 422+ 95B8              ;;;Div8:
 423+ 95B8              ;;;    xor a
 424+ 95B8              ;;;    ld b,8
 425+ 95B8              ;;;Div8_Loop:
 426+ 95B8              ;;;    rl e
 427+ 95B8              ;;;    rla
 428+ 95B8              ;;;    sub c
 429+ 95B8              ;;;    jr nc,Div8_NoAdd
 430+ 95B8              ;;;    add a,c
 431+ 95B8              ;;;Div8_NoAdd:
 432+ 95B8              ;;;    djnz Div8_Loop
 433+ 95B8              ;;;    ld b,a0
 434+ 95B8              ;;;    ld a,e
 435+ 95B8              ;;;    rla
 436+ 95B8              ;;;    cpl
 437+ 95B8              ;;;    ret
 438+ 95B8
 439+ 95B8              ;;Inputs: DE is the numerator, BC is the divisor
 440+ 95B8              ;;Outputs: DE is the result
 441+ 95B8              ;;         A is a copy of E
 442+ 95B8              ;;         HL is the remainder
 443+ 95B8              ;;         BC is not changed
 444+ 95B8              ;; so DE = DE /BC
 445+ 95B8              ;140 bytes
 446+ 95B8              ;145cc
 447+ 95B8
 448+ 95B8              MacroDEDivBC:       MACRO
 449+ 95B8 ~                                rla
 450+ 95B8 ~                                adc     hl,hl
 451+ 95B8 ~                                sbc     hl,bc
 452+ 95B8 ~                                jr      nc,$+3
 453+ 95B8 ~                                add     hl,bc
 454+ 95B8                                  ENDM
 455+ 95B8
 456+ 95B8 AF           DEequDEDivBC:       xor a
 457+ 95B9 ED 62                            sbc hl,hl
 458+ 95BB 7A                               ld a,d
 459+ 95BC                                  MacroDEDivBC
 459+ 95BC 17          >                    rla
 459+ 95BD ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
 459+ 95BF ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 459+ 95C1 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 459+ 95C3 09          >                    add     hl,bc
 460+ 95C4                                  MacroDEDivBC
 460+ 95C4 17          >                    rla
 460+ 95C5 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
 460+ 95C7 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 460+ 95C9 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 460+ 95CB 09          >                    add     hl,bc
 461+ 95CC                                  MacroDEDivBC

 480+ 9640 17                               rla
 481+ 9641 2F                               cpl
 482+ 9642 5F                               ld e,a
 483+ 9643 C9                               ret
 484+ 9644              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
 485+ 9644              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
 486+ 9644              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
 487+ 9644              ; Our use
 488+ 9644              ; BC = A0
 489+ 9644              ; DE = 0C
 490+ 9644              ; so BC = a * 256 / C
 491+ 9644              DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC:    JumpIfAGTENusng	  c,DEV16ATooLarge                                          ; first off if a > c ten return 255
 491+ 9644 B9          >                        cp     c
 491+ 9645 D2 70 96    >                        jp		nc,DEV16ATooLarge
 492+ 9648 47                                   ld      b,a
 493+ 9649 59                                   ld      e,c
 494+ 964A 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 495+ 964C 16 00                                ld      d,0
 496+ 964E C3 5B 96                             jp      DIV16UNDOC
 497+ 9651 47           DIV16Amul256dQUNDOC:    ld      b,a
 498+ 9652 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 499+ 9654 21 5F 7F                             ld      hl,varQ
 500+ 9657 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 501+ 9658 16 00                                ld      d,0
 502+ 965A 5F                                   ld      e,a
 503+ 965B              DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC:
 504+ 965B 21 00 00     DIV16UNDOC:             ld      hl,0
 505+ 965E 78                                   ld      a,b
 506+ 965F 06 10                                ld      b,16
 507+ 9661 CB 31        DIV16UNDOCLOOP:         sll	c		; unroll 16 times
 508+ 9663 17                                   rla			; ...
 509+ 9664 ED 6A                                adc	hl,hl		; ...
 510+ 9666 ED 52                                sbc	hl,de		; ...
 511+ 9668 30 02                                jr	nc,DIV16UNDOCSKIP		; ...
 512+ 966A 19                                   add	hl,de		; ...
 513+ 966B 0D                                   dec	c		; ...
 514+ 966C 10 F3        DIV16UNDOCSKIP:         djnz DIV16UNDOCLOOP
 515+ 966E 47                                   ld   b,a
 516+ 966F C9                                   ret
 517+ 9670 01 FF 00     DEV16ATooLarge:         ld     bc,$00FF
 518+ 9673 C9                                   ret
 519+ 9674              ; switch to logarithm version
 520+ 9674              ; "> asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
 521+ 9674 06 08        asm_div8:               ld b,8
 522+ 9676 AF                                   xor a
 523+ 9677 CB 21        .div8_loop:	            sla c
 524+ 9679 17                                   rla
 525+ 967A BA                                   cp d
 526+ 967B 38 02                                jr c,.div8_skip
 526+ 967D
 527+ 967D 0C                                   inc c
 528+ 967E 92                                   sub d
 529+ 967F 10 F6        .div8_skip:	            djnz .div8_loop
 530+ 9681 C9                                   ret
 531+ 9682              ; ">asm_div16: HL_Div_C: HL is the numerator,  C is the denominator, output A is the remainder, B is 0, C,DE is not changedHL is the quotient"
 532+ 9682 06 10        asm_div16:              ld b,16
 533+ 9684 AF                                   xor a
 534+ 9685 CB 25        div16_loop:	            sla l
 535+ 9687 CB 14                                rl	h
 536+ 9689              ;    add hl,hl
 537+ 9689 17                                   rla
 538+ 968A B9                                   cp c
 539+ 968B 38 02                                jr c,div16_skip
 540+ 968D 2C                                   inc l
 541+ 968E 91                                   sub c
 542+ 968F 10 F4        div16_skip:		        djnz div16_loop
 543+ 9691 C9                                   ret
 544+ 9692              ;
 545+ 9692              ; Divide 16-bit values (with 16-bit result)
 546+ 9692              ; In: Divide BC by divider DE
 547+ 9692              ; Out: BC = result, HL = rest
 548+ 9692              ;
 549+ 9692              HLDivC_Iteration: 	    MACRO
 550+ 9692 ~                                    add	hl,hl		; unroll 16 times
 551+ 9692 ~                                    rla				; ...
 552+ 9692 ~                                    cp	c			; ...
 553+ 9692 ~                                    jr	1F
 554+ 9692 ~                                    sub	c			; ...
 555+ 9692 ~            1:
 556+ 9692 ~                                    inc	l			; ...
 557+ 9692                                      ENDM
 558+ 9692
 559+ 9692              EDivC_Iteration:        MACRO
 560+ 9692 ~                                    rl  e
 561+ 9692 ~                                    rla
 562+ 9692 ~                                    sub c
 563+ 9692 ~                                    jr  nc,.Div8_NoAdd
 564+ 9692 ~                                    add a,c
 565+ 9692 ~            .Div8_NoAdd:
 566+ 9692                                      ENDM
 567+ 9692
 568+ 9692              ; Switch to a logarithm version
 569+ 9692              ; Divide E by divider C Out: A = result, B = rest
 570+ 9692              E_Div_C:                ZeroA
 570+ 9692 AF          >                        xor a
 571+ 9693                                      EDivC_Iteration
 571+ 9693 CB 13       >                        rl  e

 572+ 96A0 81          >                        add a,c

 586+ 96D0              BCDIVDE_Iteration:      MACRO
 587+ 96D0 ~                                    rla
 588+ 96D0 ~                                    adc	    hl,hl
 589+ 96D0 ~                                    add	    hl,de
 590+ 96D0 ~                                    jr	    c,1F

 594+ 96D0
 595+ 96D0
 596+ 96D0              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop"
 597+ 96D0              ;BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
 598+ 96D0              ;NOTE: BC/0 returns 0 as the quotient.
 599+ 96D0              ;min: 738cc
 600+ 96D0              ;max: 898cc
 601+ 96D0              ;avg: 818cc
 602+ 96D0              ;144 bytes
 603+ 96D0 AF           BC_Div_DE:              xor a
 604+ 96D1 67                                   ld h,a
 605+ 96D2 6F                                   ld l,a
 606+ 96D3 93                                   sub e
 607+ 96D4 5F                                   ld e,a
 608+ 96D5 9F                                   sbc a,a
 609+ 96D6 92                                   sub d
 610+ 96D7 57                                   ld d,a
 611+ 96D8 78                                   ld a,b
 612+ 96D9                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 612+ 96D9 17          >                        rla
 612+ 96DA ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 612+ 96DC 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 612+ 96DD 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 612+ 96DF ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 612+ 96E1             >1:
 613+ 96E1                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 613+ 96E1 17          >                        rla

 613+ 96E4 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 613+ 96E5 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 613+ 96E7 ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de

 629+ 974F 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 629+ 9750 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 629+ 9752 ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 629+ 9754             >1:
 630+ 9754                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 630+ 9754 17          >                        rla
 630+ 9755 ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 630+ 9757 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 630+ 9758 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 630+ 975A ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 630+ 975C             >1:
 631+ 975C 17                                   rla
 632+ 975D 4F                                   ld c,a
 633+ 975E C9                                   ret
 634+ 975F 78           Floor_DivQSigned:       ld      a,b             ; save resultant sign
 635+ 9760 AA                                   xor     d               ;
 636+ 9761 E6 80                                and     $80             ;
 637+ 9763 DD 67                                ld      ixh,a           ;
 638+ 9765 78                                   ld      a,b
 639+ 9766 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 640+ 9768 47                                   ld      b,a
 641+ 9769 7A                                   ld      a,d
 642+ 976A E6 7F                                and     $7F
 643+ 976C 57                                   ld      d,a
 644+ 976D CD 75 97                             call    Floor_DivQ
 645+ 9770 78                                   ld      a,b
 646+ 9771 DD B4                                or      ixh
 647+ 9773 47                                   ld      b,a
 648+ 9774 C9                                   ret
 649+ 9775
 650+ 9775
 651+ 9775
 652+ 9775              ; BC = BC / DE
 653+ 9775              ; HL = BC % DE
 654+ 9775              ; if HL > 0 BC -= 1
 655+ 9775 78           Floor_DivQ:             ld      a,b
 656+ 9776 B1                                   or      c
 657+ 9777 28 26                                jr      z, .divide0By   ; if bc is zero just return as result will be zero
 658+ 9779 7A                                   ld      a,d
 659+ 977A B3                                   or      e
 660+ 977B 28 26                                jr      z, .divideBy0
 661+ 977D D5                                   push    de
 662+ 977E CD D0 96     .DoDivide:              call    BC_Div_DE       ; bc(q0) = bc / de , hl(r0) = bc %de
 663+ 9781 D1                                   pop     de              ; get divisor back to test
 664+ 9782 CB 7A                                bit     7,d             ; if divisor <0 or = 0 goto else branch
 665+ 9784 C2 94 97                             jp      nz,.deLTE0
 666+ 9787 7A                                   ld      a,d
 667+ 9788 B3                                   or      e
 668+ 9789 CA 94 97                             jp      z,.deLTE0
 669+ 978C CB 7C        .deGT0:                 bit     7,h             ; if remainder >=0 return with no adjustment
 670+ 978E C8                                   ret     z               ; if remainder was not negative then all done
 671+ 978F 0B                                   dec     bc              ; else q --
 672+ 9790                                      ClearCarryFlag          ;      r += b
 672+ 9790 B7          >                        or a
 673+ 9791 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de           ;      .
 674+ 9793 C9                                   ret
 675+ 9794 CB 7C        .deLTE0:                bit     7,h             ; if remainder <= 0 retun with no adjustment
 676+ 9796 C8                                   ret     z               ; (return if negative)
 677+ 9797 7C                                   ld      a,h
 678+ 9798 B5                                   or      l               ; (return if zero)
 679+ 9799 C8                                   ret     z
 680+ 979A 0B                                   dec     bc              ; else q --
 681+ 979B                                      ClearCarryFlag          ;      r += b
 681+ 979B B7          >                        or a
 682+ 979C ED 5A                                adc     hl,de           ;      .
 683+ 979E C9                                   ret
 684+ 979F 21 00 00     .divide0By:             ld      hl,0            ; hl = 0, bc is already 0
 685+ 97A2 C9                                   ret
 686+ 97A3 21 00 00     .divideBy0:             ld      hl,0
 687+ 97A6 01 01 00                             ld      bc,1
 688+ 97A9 C9                                   ret
 689+ 97AA
 690+ 97AA
 691+ 97AA              L_DIV_0_ITERATION:      MACRO
 692+ 97AA ~                                    rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 693+ 97AA ~                                    ex      de,hl
 694+ 97AA ~                                    rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 695+ 97AA ~                                    ex      de,hl
 696+ 97AA ~                                    sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 697+ 97AA ~                                    jp      nc,.skip_revert0 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 698+ 97AA ~                                    add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 699+ 97AA ~            .skip_revert0:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 700+ 97AA ~                                    rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 701+ 97AA ~                                    ex      de,hl
 702+ 97AA ~                                    rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 703+ 97AA ~                                    ex      de,hl
 704+ 97AA ~                                    sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 705+ 97AA ~                                    jp      NC,.skip_revert1 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 706+ 97AA ~                                    add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 707+ 97AA ~            .skip_revert1:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 708+ 97AA                                      ENDM
 709+ 97AA
 710+ 97AA              ; HL = DE / BC, DE = DE % BC
 711+ 97AA 21 00 00     l_div_0:                ld      hl,0            ;clear remainder
 712+ 97AD                                      L_DIV_0_ITERATION
 712+ 97AD CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 712+ 97B1 EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 712+ 97B2 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 712+ 97B6 EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 712+ 97B7 B7 ED 42    >                        sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 712+ 97BA D2 BE 97    >                        jp      nc,.skip_revert0 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 712+ 97BD 09          >                        add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 712+ 97BE 3F          >.skip_revert0:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 712+ 97BF CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 712+ 97C3 EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 712+ 97C4 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 712+ 97C8 EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 712+ 97C9 B7 ED 42    >                        sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 712+ 97CC D2 D0 97    >                        jp      NC,.skip_revert1 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 712+ 97CF 09          >                        add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 712+ 97D0 3F          >.skip_revert1:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 713+ 97D1                                      L_DIV_0_ITERATION
 713+ 97D1 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 713+ 97D5 EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 713+ 97D6 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 713+ 97DA EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 713+ 97DB B7 ED 42    >                        sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 713+ 97DE D2 E2 97    >                        jp      nc,.skip_revert0 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 713+ 97E1 09          >                        add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 713+ 97E2 3F          >.skip_revert0:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 713+ 97E3 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry

 718+ 98A4 D2 A8 98    >                        jp      NC,.skip_revert1 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 718+ 98A7 09          >                        add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 718+ 98A8 3F          >.skip_revert1:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 719+ 98A9                                      L_DIV_0_ITERATION

 719+ 98BB CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry

 723+ 98D3
 724+ 98D3
 725+ 98D3
 726+ 98D3
 727+ 98D3 11 FE FF     LLHLdivC:               ld      de,$FFFE                    ; set XY to &FFFE at start, de holds XY
 728+ 98D6              .LL130:                 ShiftHLLeft1                        ; RS *= 2
 728+ 98D6 CB 25       >			   sla l
 728+ 98D8 CB 14       >			   rl  h
 729+ 98DA 7C                                   ld      a,h
 730+ 98DB 38 04                                jr      c,.LL131                    ; if S overflowed skip Q test and do subtractions
 731+ 98DD                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .LL132            ; if S <  Q = 256/gradient skip subtractions
 731+ 98DD B9          >                        cp      c
 731+ 98DE DA E9 98    >                        jp		c, .LL132
 732+ 98E1 3F           .LL131:                 ccf                                 ; compliment carry
 733+ 98E2 99                                   sbc     a,c                         ; q
 734+ 98E3 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; h (s)
 735+ 98E4 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; r
 736+ 98E5 DE 00                                sbc     a,0                         ; 0 - so in effect SR - Q*256
 737+ 98E7 37                                   scf                                 ; set carry for next rolls
 738+ 98E8 3F                                   ccf
 739+ 98E9              .LL132:                 RollDELeft1                         ; Rotate de bits left
 739+ 98E9 CB 13       >               rl  e
 739+ 98EB CB 12       >               rl  d
 740+ 98ED 38 E7                                jr      c,.LL130                    ;
 741+ 98EF EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = result
 742+ 98F0 C9                                   ret
 743+ 98F1
 744+ 98F1
 745+ 98F1 AF           div_hl_c:               xor	a
 746+ 98F2 06 10                                ld	b, 16
 747+ 98F4 29           .loop:                  add	hl, hl
 748+ 98F5 17                                   rla
 749+ 98F6 38 03                                jr	c, $+5
 750+ 98F8 B9                                   cp	c
 751+ 98F9 38 02                                jr	c, $+4
 752+ 98FB 91                                   sub	c
 753+ 98FC 2C                                   inc	l
 754+ 98FD 10 F5                                djnz	.loop
 755+ 98FF C9                                   ret
 756+ 9900              ;l_div, signed division
 757+ 9900              ; comes in with DE and HL
 758+ 9900              ; HL = DE / HL, DE = DE % HL
 759+ 9900 4A           l_div:                  ld      c,d             ;sign of dividend
 760+ 9901 44                                   ld      b,h             ;sign of divisor
 761+ 9902 C5                                   push    bc              ;save signs
 762+ 9903 4D                                   ld      c,l             ;divisor to bc
 763+ 9904 7A                                   ld      a,d
 764+ 9905 B7                                   or      a
 765+ 9906 F2 0F 99                             jp      p,.NotDENeg
 766+ 9909              .DeNegate:              macronegate16de
 766+ 9909 AF          >					xor 	a
 766+ 990A 93          >                    sub 	e
 766+ 990B 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
 766+ 990C 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 766+ 990D 92          >                    sub 	d
 766+ 990E 57          >                    ld 		d,a
 767+ 990F 78           .NotDENeg:              ld      a,b
 768+ 9910 B7                                   or      a
 769+ 9911 F2 1A 99                             jp      p,.NotBCNeg     ; if signs are opposite them flip
 770+ 9914                                      macronegate16bc
 770+ 9914 AF          >					xor 	a
 770+ 9915 91          >                    sub 	c
 770+ 9916 4F          >                    ld 		c,a
 770+ 9917 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 770+ 9918 90          >                    sub 	b
 770+ 9919 47          >                    ld 		b,a
 771+ 991A CD AA 97     .NotBCNeg:              call    l_div_0         ;unsigned HL = DE / BC, DE = DE % BC
 772+ 991D                                      ; C standard requires that the result of division satisfy a = (a/b)*b + a%b emainder takes sign of the dividend
 773+ 991D C1                                   pop     bc              ;restore sign info
 774+ 991E 78                                   ld      a,b
 775+ 991F A9                                   xor     c               ;quotient, sign of dividend^divisor
 776+ 9920 F2 29 99                             jp      p,.NotHLNeg
 777+ 9923                                      macronegate16hl
 777+ 9923 AF          >					xor 	a
 777+ 9924 95          >					sub 	l
 777+ 9925 6F          >					ld 		l,a
 777+ 9926 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
 777+ 9927 94          >					sub 	h
 777+ 9928 67          >					ld 		h,a
 778+ 9929 79           .NotHLNeg:              ld      a,c
 779+ 992A B7                                   or      a,a             ;remainder, sign of dividend
 780+ 992B F0                                   ret     p
 781+ 992C                                      macronegate16de
 781+ 992C AF          >					xor 	a
 781+ 992D 93          >                    sub 	e
 781+ 992E 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
 781+ 992F 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 781+ 9930 92          >                    sub 	d
 781+ 9931 57          >                    ld 		d,a
 782+ 9932 C9                                   ret
 783+ 9933
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
 575  9933                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
   1+ 9933              asm_tis2:
   2+ 9933              ; ">TIS2 A = (A / Q * 96) so A = -96 ---- 96  range "
   3+ 9933              ; ">DOES NOT DO SIGNED YET"
   4+ 9933 F5           	push af
   5+ 9934 E6 7F            and SignMask8Bit
   6+ 9936 57           	ld d,a				;; d = A
   7+ 9937 3A 5F 7F     	ld a,(varQ)
   8+ 993A 5F           	ld e,a
   9+ 993B 7A           	ld a,d
  10+ 993C BB           	cp e
  11+ 993D 30 11        	jr nc, .tis2_set96	;; jump if a >= Q
  12+ 993F 1E 60        	ld e, 96
  13+ 9941 ED 30        	mul				; de = d * 96 (also a * 96 )
  14+ 9943 EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ 9944 3A 5F 7F     	ld a,(varQ)
  16+ 9947 4F           	ld c,a
  17+ 9948 CD 82 96     	call asm_div16
  18+ 994B F1           	pop af
  19+ 994C E6 80        	and $80
  20+ 994E B5           	or l
  21+ 994F C9           	ret
  22+ 9950              .tis2_set96:
  23+ 9950 F1           	pop af
  24+ 9951 E6 80        	and $80
  25+ 9953 F6 96        	or $96
  26+ 9955 C9           	ret
  27+ 9956
  28+ 9956
  29+ 9956              asm_unit_vector:
  30+ 9956              squareregfx:
  31+ 9956 3A A7 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  32+ 9959 57           	ld d,a
  33+ 995A 5F           	ld e,a
  34+ 995B ED 30        	mul
  35+ 995D EB           	ex de,hl
  36+ 995E              squareregfy:
  37+ 995E 3A A9 C0     	ld a, (UBnkYScaled)
  38+ 9961 57           	ld d,a
  39+ 9962 5F           	ld e,a
  40+ 9963 ED 30        	mul
  41+ 9965 19           	add hl,de
  42+ 9966              squareregfz:
  43+ 9966 3A AB C0     	ld a, (UBnkZScaled)
  44+ 9969 57           	ld d,a
  45+ 996A 5F           	ld e,a
  46+ 996B ED 30        	mul
  47+ 996D 19           	add hl,de
  48+ 996E EB           	ex de,hl			; de de to number to root
  49+ 996F              hlequsquareroot:
  50+ 996F CD A1 92     	call asm_sqrt		; hl = sqrt (fx^2 + fy^2 + fx^2)
  51+ 9972 E5           	push hl				; save it for work 3 copies
  52+ 9973 E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  53+ 9974 E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  54+ 9975              normfx:
  55+ 9975 3A A7 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  56+ 9978 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #1
  57+ 9979 7D           	ld a,l				; we assume only l had worthwhile data but could spill into h
  58+ 997A 4F           	ld c,a
  59+ 997B CD 33 99     	call asm_tis2
  60+ 997E 32 A7 C0     	ld (UBnkXScaled),a
  61+ 9981              normfy:
  62+ 9981 3A A9 C0     	ld a,(UBnkYScaled)
  63+ 9984 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  64+ 9985 7D           	ld a,l
  65+ 9986 4F           	ld c,a
  66+ 9987 CD 33 99     	call asm_tis2
  67+ 998A 32 A9 C0     	ld (UBnkYScaled),a
  68+ 998D              normfz:
  69+ 998D 3A AB C0     	ld a,(UBnkZScaled)
  70+ 9990 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  71+ 9991 7D           	ld a,l
  72+ 9992 4F           	ld c,a
  73+ 9993 CD 33 99     	call asm_tis2
  74+ 9996 32 AB C0     	ld (UBnkZScaled),a
  75+ 9999              asm_unit_vector_end:
  76+ 9999 C9           	ret
