 576  999A                  INCLUDE "./Maths/compare16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/compare16.asm
   1+ 999A              ; Input:
   2+ 999A              ;       HL = 1st value
   3+ 999A              ;       DE = 2nd value
   4+ 999A              ; Output:
   5+ 999A              ;       CF, ZF = results of comparison:
   6+ 999A              ;
   7+ 999A              ;               CF      ZF      Result
   8+ 999A              ;               -----------------------------------
   9+ 999A              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  10+ 999A              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  11+ 999A              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  12+ 999A              ;               1       1       Impossible
  13+ 999A              ;
  14+ 999A
  15+ 999A
  16+ 999A E5           CompareBCDESigned:  push    hl
  17+ 999B A7                               and     a
  18+ 999C 60 69                            ld      hl,bc
  19+ 999E ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  20+ 99A0 E1                               pop     hl
  21+ 99A1 C9                               ret
  22+ 99A2
  23+ 99A2 E5           CompareDEBCSigned:  push    hl
  24+ 99A3 A7                               and     a
  25+ 99A4 62 6B                            ld      hl,de
  26+ 99A6 ED 42                            sbc     hl,bc
  27+ 99A8 E1                               pop     hl
  28+ 99A9 C9                               ret
  29+ 99AA
  30+ 99AA
  31+ 99AA              ;### CMPGTE -> test if A>=B
  32+ 99AA              ;### Input      HL=A, DE=B if hl=> de no carry else de > hl and set carry
  33+ 99AA 7C           CompareHLDESgn:     ld a,h
  34+ 99AB AA                               xor d
  35+ 99AC FA B6 99                         jp m, .cmpgte2
  36+ 99AF ED 52                            sbc hl,de
  37+ 99B1 30 09                            jr nc, .cmpgte3
  38+ 99B3 19           .cmpgte1            add hl,de
  39+ 99B4                                  SetCarryFlag
  39+ 99B4 37          >                        scf
  40+ 99B5 C9                               ret
  41+ 99B6 CB 7A        .cmpgte2            bit 7,d
  42+ 99B8 28 05                            jr z,.cmpgte4
  43+ 99BA              .cmpgte5:           ClearCarryFlag
  43+ 99BA B7          >                        or a
  44+ 99BB C9                               ret
  45+ 99BC 19           .cmpgte3            add hl,de
  46+ 99BD                                  ClearCarryFlag
  46+ 99BD B7          >                        or a
  47+ 99BE C9                               ret
  48+ 99BF              .cmpgte4:           SetCarryFlag
  48+ 99BF 37          >                        scf
  49+ 99C0 C9                               ret
  50+ 99C1
  51+ 99C1              ; Compares HL and DE sets z flag if same, else nz
  52+ 99C1 7C           CompareHLDESame:    ld  a,h
  53+ 99C2 BA                               cp  d
  54+ 99C3 C0                               ret nz
  55+ 99C4 7D                               ld  a,l
  56+ 99C5 BB                               cp  e
  57+ 99C6 C9                               ret
  58+ 99C7
  59+ 99C7
  60+ 99C7
  61+ 99C7 7C           CompareHLBCSgn:     ld a,h
  62+ 99C8 A8                               xor b
  63+ 99C9 FA D2 99                         jp m, .cmpgte2
  64+ 99CC ED 42                            sbc hl,bc
  65+ 99CE 30 06                            jr nc, .cmpgte3
  66+ 99D0              .cmpgte1            SetCarryFlag
  66+ 99D0 37          >                        scf
  67+ 99D1 C9                               ret
  68+ 99D2 CB 78        .cmpgte2            bit 7,b
  69+ 99D4 28 FA                            jr z,.cmpgte1
  70+ 99D6              .cmpgte3            ClearCarryFlag
  70+ 99D6 B7          >                        or a
  71+ 99D7 C9                               ret
  72+ 99D8
  73+ 99D8              CompareHLDESigned:
  74+ 99D8 E5           compare16HLDE:      push    hl
  75+ 99D9 A7                               and     a
  76+ 99DA ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  77+ 99DC E1                               pop     hl
  78+ 99DD C9                               ret
  79+ 99DE              CompareHLBCSigned:
  80+ 99DE E5           CompareHLBC:        push    hl
  81+ 99DF A7                               and     a
  82+ 99E0 ED 42                            sbc     hl,bc
  83+ 99E2 E1                               pop     hl
  84+ 99E3 C9                               ret
  85+ 99E4
  86+ 99E4              ; With compare signed we do ABS comparison
  87+ 99E4              ; this is used for view ports as we just want to know if its +/- out side of 90 degrees
  88+ 99E4
  89+ 99E4 E5 D5        compare16HLDEABS:   push    hl,,de
  90+ 99E6 7C                               ld      a,h                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  91+ 99E7 E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  92+ 99E9 67                               ld      h,a
  93+ 99EA 7A                               ld      a,d                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  94+ 99EB E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  95+ 99ED 57                               ld      d,a
  96+ 99EE A7                               and     a
  97+ 99EF ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  98+ 99F1 D1 E1                            pop     hl,,de
  99+ 99F3 C9                               ret
 100+ 99F4
 101+ 99F4
# file closed: ./Maths/compare16.asm
 577  99F4                  INCLUDE "./Maths/normalise96.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
   1+ 99F4              ; a equal a / d * 96
   2+ 99F4              ; Tested and works with signed numbers
   3+ 99F4 DD 7E 01     NormaliseIXVector:      ld		a,(ix+1)			; Vector X high
   4+ 99F7 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit        ; a = abs X high
   5+ 99F9 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; hl = abs X ^ 2
   6+ 99FA 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
   7+ 99FB ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
   8+ 99FD EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; .
   9+ 99FE DD 7E 03                             ld		a,(ix+3)			; vector = Y high
  10+ 9A01 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit        ; unsigned
  11+ 9A03 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; de = abs Y ^ 2
  12+ 9A04 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
  13+ 9A05 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
  14+ 9A07 19                                   add     hl,de               ; hl = x^2 + y ^2
  15+ 9A08 DD 7E 05                             ld		a,(ix+5)			; vector = Z high
  16+ 9A0B E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit        ; unsigned
  17+ 9A0D 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; de = abs Z ^ 2
  18+ 9A0E 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
  19+ 9A0F ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
  20+ 9A11 19                                   add     hl,de               ; de = x^2 + y ^2 + z ^ 2
  21+ 9A12 EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; .
  22+ 9A13 CD A1 92     .n96SQRT:               call	asm_sqrt			; hl = sqrt de
  23+ 9A16 DD 7E 01     .n96NORMX:              ld		a,(ix+1)
  24+ 9A19 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  25+ 9A1A CD 4C 9C                             call	AequAdivDmul96Q8    ; does not use HL so we can retain it
  26+ 9A1D 47                                   ld		b,a				    ; Sort out restoring sign bit
  27+ 9A1E 0E 00                                ld      c,0                 ; .
  28+ 9A20 DD 71 00 DD                          ld		(ix+0),bc           ; .
  28+ 9A24 70 01
  29+ 9A26 DD 7E 03     .n96NORMY:              ld		a,(ix+3)
  30+ 9A29 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  31+ 9A2A CD 4C 9C                             call	AequAdivDmul96Q8	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  32+ 9A2D 47                                   ld		b,a				    ; Sort out restoring sign bit
  33+ 9A2E 0E 00                                ld      c,0                 ; .
  34+ 9A30 DD 71 02 DD                          ld		(ix+2),bc           ; .
  34+ 9A34 70 03
  35+ 9A36 DD 7E 05     .n96NORMZ:              ld		a,(ix+5)
  36+ 9A39 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  37+ 9A3A CD 4C 9C                             call	AequAdivDmul96Q8 	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  38+ 9A3D 47                                   ld		b,a				    ; Sort out restoring sign bit
  39+ 9A3E 0E 00                                ld      c,0                 ; .
  40+ 9A40 DD 71 04 DD                          ld		(ix+4),bc           ; .
  40+ 9A44 70 05
  41+ 9A46 C9                                   ret
  42+ 9A47
  43+ 9A47              ; .NORM	\ -> &3BD6 \ Normalize 3-vector length of XX15
  44+ 9A47 3A A7 C0     normaliseXX1596S7:      ld		a,(XX15VecX)	    ; XX15+0
  45+ 9A4A DD 67                                ld		ixh,a               ; ixh = signed x component
  46+ 9A4C E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit        ; a = unsigned version
  47+ 9A4E              .n96SQX:	            inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  47+ 9A4E 5F          >			ld	e,a
  47+ 9A4F 57          >			ld  d,a
  47+ 9A50 ED 30       >			mul
  48+ 9A52 62                                   ld		h,d					; h == varR d = varO e= varA
  49+ 9A53 6B                                   ld		l,e					; l == varQ  															:: so HL = XX15[x]^2
  50+ 9A54 3A A8 C0     .n96SQY:                ld		a,(XX15VecY)
  51+ 9A57 DD 6F                                ld		ixl,a               ; ixl = signed y componet
  52+ 9A59 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit                 ; = abs
  53+ 9A5B                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[y]^2
  53+ 9A5B 5F          >			ld	e,a
  53+ 9A5C 57          >			ld  d,a
  53+ 9A5D ED 30       >			mul
  54+ 9A5F 19                                   add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2
  55+ 9A60 3A A9 C0     .n96SQZ:                ld		a,(XX15VecZ)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
  56+ 9A63 FD 67                                ld		iyh,a               ; iyh = signed
  57+ 9A65 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit                 ; unsigned
  58+ 9A67                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[z]^2
  58+ 9A67 5F          >			ld	e,a
  58+ 9A68 57          >			ld  d,a
  58+ 9A69 ED 30       >			mul
  59+ 9A6B 19           .n96SQADD:              add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2
  60+ 9A6C EB                                   ex		de,hl				; hl => de ready for square root
  61+ 9A6D CD A1 92     .n96SQRT:               call	asm_sqrt			; hl = de = sqrt(XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2), we just are interested in l which is the new Q
  62+ 9A70 3A A7 C0     .n96NORMX:              ld		a,(XX15VecX)
  63+ 9A73 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  64+ 9A75 4F                                   ld		c,a
  65+ 9A76 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  66+ 9A77 CD 02 9C                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  67+ 9A7A 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  68+ 9A7B DD 7C                                ld		a,ixh			    ;++SGN
  69+ 9A7D E6 80                                and		$80				    ;++SGN
  70+ 9A7F B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  71+ 9A80 32 A7 C0                             ld		(XX15VecX),a
  72+ 9A83 3A A8 C0     .n96NORMY:              ld		a,(XX15VecY)
  73+ 9A86 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  74+ 9A88 4F                                   ld		c,a
  75+ 9A89 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  76+ 9A8A CD 02 9C                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit     	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  77+ 9A8D 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  78+ 9A8E DD 7D                                ld		a,ixl			    ;++SGN
  79+ 9A90 E6 80                                and		$80				    ;++SGN
  80+ 9A92 B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  81+ 9A93 32 A8 C0                             ld		(XX15VecY),a
  82+ 9A96 3A A9 C0     .n96NORMZ:              ld		a,(XX15VecZ)
  83+ 9A99 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  84+ 9A9B 4F                                   ld		c,a
  85+ 9A9C 55                                   ld		d,l				; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  86+ 9A9D CD 02 9C                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  87+ 9AA0 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  88+ 9AA1 FD 7C                                ld		a,iyh			    ;++SGN
  89+ 9AA3 E6 80                                and		$80				    ;++SGN
  90+ 9AA5 B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  91+ 9AA6 32 A9 C0                             ld		(XX15VecZ),a
  92+ 9AA9 C9                                   ret
  93+ 9AAA
  94+ 9AAA              ; Normalise vector
  95+ 9AAA              ; scale Q = Sqrt (X^2 + Y^2 + Z^2)
  96+ 9AAA              ; X = X / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e X = X / Q * 3/8
  97+ 9AAA              ; Y = Y / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Y = Y / Q * 3/8
  98+ 9AAA              ; Z = Z / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Z = Z / Q * 3/8
  99+ 9AAA
# file closed: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
 578  9AAA                  INCLUDE "./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
   1+ 9AAA              ;Number in hl to decimal ASCII
   2+ 9AAA              ;Thanks to z80 Bits
   3+ 9AAA              ;inputs:	hl = number to ASCII
   4+ 9AAA              ;example: hl=300 outputs '00300'
   5+ 9AAA              ;destroys: af, bc, hl, de used
   6+ 9AAA              DispHLtoDE:
   7+ 9AAA              ; "DispHL, writes HL to DE address"
   8+ 9AAA 01 F0 D8     	ld	bc,-10000
   9+ 9AAD CD C3 9A     	call	Num1
  10+ 9AB0 01 18 FC     	ld	bc,-1000
  11+ 9AB3 CD C3 9A     	call	Num1
  12+ 9AB6 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  13+ 9AB9 CD C3 9A     	call	Num1
  14+ 9ABC 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  15+ 9ABE CD C3 9A     	call	Num1
  16+ 9AC1 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  17+ 9AC3              Num1:
  18+ 9AC3 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  19+ 9AC5              .Num2:
  20+ 9AC5 3C           	inc	a
  21+ 9AC6 09           	add	hl,bc
  22+ 9AC7 38 FC        	jr	c,.Num2
  23+ 9AC9 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  24+ 9ACB 12           	ld	(de),a
  25+ 9ACC 13           	inc	de
  26+ 9ACD C9           	ret
  27+ 9ACE
  28+ 9ACE              DispAtoDE:
  29+ 9ACE 26 00        	ld h,0
  30+ 9AD0 6F           	ld l,a
  31+ 9AD1 C3 AA 9A     	jp DispHLtoDE
  32+ 9AD4
  33+ 9AD4              DispPriceAtoDE:
  34+ 9AD4 26 00        	ld h,0
  35+ 9AD6 6F           	ld l,a
  36+ 9AD7 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  37+ 9ADA CD EA 9A     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  38+ 9ADD 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  39+ 9ADF CD C3 9A     	call	Num1
  40+ 9AE2 3E 2E        	ld		a,'.'					; we could assume preformat but
  41+ 9AE4                                  DISPLAY "TODO:  optimise "
  42+ 9AE4 12           	ld		(de),a					; we can optimse that later TODO
  43+ 9AE5 13           	inc		de						; with just an inc De
  44+ 9AE6 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  45+ 9AE8 18 D9        	jr		Num1
  46+ 9AEA              .NumLeadBlank1:
  47+ 9AEA 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  48+ 9AEC              .NumLeadBlank2:
  49+ 9AEC 3C           	inc	a
  50+ 9AED 09           	add	hl,bc
  51+ 9AEE 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  52+ 9AF0 FE 30        	cp	'0'
  53+ 9AF2 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  54+ 9AF4              .Blank:
  55+ 9AF4 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  56+ 9AF6              .DontBlank:
  57+ 9AF6 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  58+ 9AF8 12           	ld	(de),a
  59+ 9AF9 13           	inc	de
  60+ 9AFA C9           	ret
  61+ 9AFB
  62+ 9AFB              DispQtyAtoDE:
  63+ 9AFB FE 00        	cp	0
  64+ 9AFD 28 23        	jr	z,.NoStock
  65+ 9AFF 26 00        	ld h,0
  66+ 9B01 6F           	ld l,a
  67+ 9B02 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  68+ 9B05 CD 11 9B     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  69+ 9B08 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  70+ 9B0A CD 11 9B     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  71+ 9B0D 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  72+ 9B0F 18 B2        	jr		Num1
  73+ 9B11              .NumLeadBlank1:
  74+ 9B11 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  75+ 9B13              .NumLeadBlank2:
  76+ 9B13 3C           	inc	a
  77+ 9B14 09           	add	hl,bc
  78+ 9B15 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  79+ 9B17 FE 30        	cp	'0'
  80+ 9B19 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  81+ 9B1B              .Blank:
  82+ 9B1B 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  83+ 9B1D              .DontBlank:
  84+ 9B1D ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  85+ 9B1F 12           	ld	(de),a
  86+ 9B20 13           	inc	de
  87+ 9B21 C9           	ret
  88+ 9B22              .NoStock:
  89+ 9B22 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  90+ 9B24 12           	ld	(de),a
  91+ 9B25 13           	inc	de
  92+ 9B26 12           	ld	(de),a
  93+ 9B27 13           	inc	de
  94+ 9B28 3E 2D        	ld	a,'-'
  95+ 9B2A 12           	ld	(de),a
  96+ 9B2B 13           	inc de
  97+ 9B2C C9           	ret
  98+ 9B2D
  99+ 9B2D
 100+ 9B2D              ;### CLCN32 -> Converts 32Bit-Value in ASCII-String (terminated by 0)
 101+ 9B2D              ;### Input      DE,IX=32bit value, IY=destination address
 102+ 9B2D              ;### Output     IY=last char in destination string
 103+ 9B2D              ;### Destroyed AF,BC,DE,HL,IX
 104+ 9B2D 01 00 00 00  clcn32t dw 1,0,     10,0,     100,0,     1000,0,       10000,0
 104+ 9B31 0A 00 00 00
 104+ 9B35 64 00 00 00
 104+ 9B39 E8 03 00 00
 104+ 9B3D 10 27 00 00
 105+ 9B41 A0 86 01 00          dw $86a0,1, $4240,$0f, $9680,$98, $e100,$05f5, $ca00,$3b9a
 105+ 9B45 40 42 0F 00
 105+ 9B49 80 96 98 00
 105+ 9B4D 00 E1 F5 05
 105+ 9B51 00 CA 9A 3B
 106+ 9B55 00 00 00 00  clcn32z ds 4
 107+ 9B59
 108+ 9B59              ; As per display but shifts final digit by 1 and puts in "." for 1 decimal place
 109+ 9B59 CD 68 9B     DispDEIXtoIY1DP:        call    DispDEIXtoIY
 110+ 9B5C FD 7E 00                             ld      a,(IY+0)
 111+ 9B5F FD 77 01                             ld      (IY+1),a
 112+ 9B62 3E 2E                                ld      a,"."
 113+ 9B64 FD 77 00                             ld      (IY+0),a
 114+ 9B67 C9                                   ret
 115+ 9B68
 116+ 9B68 DD 22 55 9B  DispDEIXtoIY:           ld (clcn32z),ix
 117+ 9B6C ED 53 57 9B                          ld (clcn32z+2),de
 118+ 9B70 DD 21 51 9B                          ld ix,clcn32t+36
 119+ 9B74 06 09                                ld b,9
 120+ 9B76 0E 00                                ld c,0
 121+ 9B78 3E 30        .clcn321:               ld a,'0'
 122+ 9B7A B7                                   or a
 123+ 9B7B DD 5E 00     .clcn322:               ld e,(ix+0)
 124+ 9B7E DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 125+ 9B81 2A 55 9B                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 126+ 9B84 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 127+ 9B86 22 55 9B                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 128+ 9B89 DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 129+ 9B8C DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 130+ 9B8F 2A 57 9B                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 131+ 9B92 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 132+ 9B94 22 57 9B                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 133+ 9B97 38 04                                jr c,.clcn325
 134+ 9B99 0C                                   inc c
 135+ 9B9A 3C                                   inc a
 136+ 9B9B 18 DE                                jr .clcn322
 137+ 9B9D DD 5E 00     .clcn325:               ld e,(ix+0)
 138+ 9BA0 DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 139+ 9BA3 2A 55 9B                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 140+ 9BA6 19                                   add hl,de
 141+ 9BA7 22 55 9B                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 142+ 9BAA DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 143+ 9BAD DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 144+ 9BB0 2A 57 9B                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 145+ 9BB3 ED 5A                                adc hl,de
 146+ 9BB5 22 57 9B                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 147+ 9BB8 11 FC FF                             ld de,-4
 148+ 9BBB DD 19                                add ix,de
 149+ 9BBD 0C                                   inc c
 150+ 9BBE 0D                                   dec c
 151+ 9BBF 28 05                                jr z,.clcn323
 152+ 9BC1 FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 153+ 9BC4 FD 23                                inc iy
 154+ 9BC6 10 B0        .clcn323:               djnz .clcn321
 155+ 9BC8 3A 55 9B                             ld a,(clcn32z)
 156+ 9BCB C6 30                                add A,'0'
 157+ 9BCD FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 158+ 9BD0 FD 36 01 00                          ld (iy+1),0
 159+ 9BD4 C9                                   ret
 160+ 9BD5
# file closed: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
 579  9BD5                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_AequAdivQmul96.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_AequAdivQmul96.asm
   1+ 9BD5              AequAdivQmul96ABS:      JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
   1+ 9BD5 BA          >                        cp     d
   1+ 9BD6 D2 F1 9B    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
   2+ 9BD9 06 FE                                ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
   3+ 9BDB CB 27        .TIS2RollTLoop:			sla			a
   4+ 9BDD                                      JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub           ; a < d so don;t subtract
   4+ 9BDD BA          >                        cp      d
   4+ 9BDE DA F4 9B    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
   5+ 9BE1 9A                                   sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
   6+ 9BE2 37                                   scf
   7+ 9BE3 CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
   8+ 9BE5 38 F4                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
   9+ 9BE7 78           .TIS2SKIPCont:	        ld			a,b							; T
  10+ 9BE8 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 2
  11+ 9BEA CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 4
  12+ 9BEC 47                                   ld			b,a							; t = t /4
  13+ 9BED CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 8
  14+ 9BEF 80                                   add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  15+ 9BF0 C9                                   ret
  16+ 9BF1 3E 60        .TIS2AccGTEQ:           ld			a,$60							; unity
  17+ 9BF3 C9                                   ret
  18+ 9BF4 B7           .TIS2SkipSub:           or			a
  19+ 9BF5 CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  20+ 9BF7 38 E2                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  21+ 9BF9 C3 E7 9B                             jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  22+ 9BFC
  23+ 9BFC
  24+ 9BFC              ;; USES 			A DE BC
  25+ 9BFC              ;; DOES NOT USE 	HL
  26+ 9BFC              ;TIS2962C:		; two's compliment entry point, exits not 2's compliment
  27+ 9BFC              ;	bit			        7,a
  28+ 9BFC              ;	jr			        z,AequAdivQmul96
  29+ 9BFC              ;	neg			        							; revers 2s'c and just set neg bit
  30+ 9BFC              ;	set			        7,a
  31+ 9BFC              ;; Note negative numbers are bit 7 set not 2's compliment
  32+ 9BFC              AequAdivQmul96:								; TIS296:			; .tis2 A = A /Q *96 (or A = A * 3/8 * Q) Reduce Acc in NORM routine i.e. *96/Q clamps at +- 96
  33+ 9BFC              TIS2:
  34+ 9BFC 4F                                   ld			c,a							; copy of Acc
  35+ 9BFD 3A 5F 7F                             ld			a,(varQ)
  36+ 9C00 57                                   ld			d,a							; d = varQ
  37+ 9C01 79                                   ld			a,c							; recover a
  38+ 9C02 4F           AequAdivDmul967Bit:     ld          c,a
  39+ 9C03 7A                                   ld          a,d
  40+ 9C04 CB 27                                sla         a       ; wipe sign bit
  41+ 9C06 C8                                   ret         z       ; quick exit if dividing 0 as a will have the result of 0
  42+ 9C07 30 10                                jr          nc, .OKToDivide
  43+ 9C09 B7           .ScaleDown:             or          a       ; clear carry bit
  44+ 9C0A CB 3A                                srl         d       ; d >> 1 to get back to 7 bit value
  45+ 9C0C 79                                   ld          a,c
  46+ 9C0D E6 7F                                and         SignMask8Bit
  47+ 9C0F CB 3F                                srl         a
  48+ 9C11 47                                   ld          b,a
  49+ 9C12 79                                   ld          a,c
  50+ 9C13 E6 80                                and         $80
  51+ 9C15 B0                                   or          b
  52+ 9C16 C3 1A 9C                             jp          AequAdivDmul96
  53+ 9C19 79           .OKToDivide:            ld          a,c
  54+ 9C1A 4F           AequAdivDmul96:         ld			c,a							; copy of Acc as we need the sign, alternate entry point assuming D preloaded, wastes an "ld c,a" but simplifies code
  55+ 9C1B E6 7F                                and			SignMask8Bit				; ignore sign
  56+ 9C1D                                      JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
  56+ 9C1D BA          >                        cp     d
  56+ 9C1E D2 3E 9C    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
  57+ 9C21 06 FE                                ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
  58+ 9C23              .TIS2RollTLoop:									; .TIL2	; roll T
  59+ 9C23 CB 27                                sla			a
  60+ 9C25                                      JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub           ; a < d so don;t subtract
  60+ 9C25 BA          >                        cp      d
  60+ 9C26 DA 44 9C    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
  61+ 9C29 9A                                   sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
  62+ 9C2A 37                                   scf                                     ; set carrry to roll into b
  63+ 9C2B CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  64+ 9C2D 38 F4                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop			; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  65+ 9C2F 78           .TIS2SKIPCont:	        ld			a,b							; A = T = 4 / 4
  66+ 9C30 CB 3F                                srl			a							; .
  67+ 9C32 CB 3F                                srl			a							; .
  68+ 9C34 47                                   ld			b,a							; .
  69+ 9C35 CB 3F                                srl			a							; A = A / 2 (i.e. T /8)
  70+ 9C37 80                                   add			a,b							; A = T/8 + T/4 (3T/8)
  71+ 9C38 47                                   ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
  72+ 9C39 79                                   ld			a,c							; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
  73+ 9C3A E6 80                                and			$80							; recover sign only
  74+ 9C3C B0                                   or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
  75+ 9C3D C9                                   ret
  76+ 9C3E              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
  77+ 9C3E 79           .TIS2AccGTEQ:           ld			a,c
  78+ 9C3F E6 80                                and			$80							; copy of Acc
  79+ 9C41 F6 60                                or			$60							; unity
  80+ 9C43 C9                                   ret
  81+ 9C44              .TIS2SkipSub:           ClearCarryFlag                          ; Clear carry as it needs to be empty to roll in 0
  81+ 9C44 B7          >                        or a
  82+ 9C45 CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  83+ 9C47 38 DA                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop			; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  84+ 9C49 C3 2F 9C                             jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  85+ 9C4C
  86+ 9C4C
  87+ 9C4C
  88+ 9C4C              ; as per AequAdivDmul967Bit but Q is an 8 bit unsigned
  89+ 9C4C              ; a = a(S7)/Q(8u)*96
  90+ 9C4C 4F           AequAdivDmul96Q8:       ld          c,a                         ; c = a
  91+ 9C4D 7A           .CheckDivide0:          ld          a,d                         ; check if its a / 0
  92+ 9C4E A7                                   and         a                           ; .
  93+ 9C4F CA 76 9C                             jp          z,.TIS2AccGTEQ              ; .
  94+ 9C52 79           .NotDivide0:            ld          a,c                         ; get back value of A
  95+ 9C53 E6 7F                                and         SignMask8Bit                ; and make it abs, so a = abs(a) c = original a
  96+ 9C55                                      JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
  96+ 9C55 BA          >                        cp     d
  96+ 9C56 D2 76 9C    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
  97+ 9C59 06 FE                                ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
  98+ 9C5B              .TIS2RollTLoop:									; .TIL2	; roll T
  99+ 9C5B CB 27                                sla			a
 100+ 9C5D                                      JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub           ; a < d so don;t subtract
 100+ 9C5D BA          >                        cp      d
 100+ 9C5E DA 7C 9C    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
 101+ 9C61 9A                                   sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
 102+ 9C62 37                                   scf                                     ; set carrry to roll into b
 103+ 9C63 CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
 104+ 9C65 38 F4                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop			; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
 105+ 9C67 78           .TIS2SKIPCont:	        ld			a,b							; A = T = 4 / 4
 106+ 9C68 CB 3F                                srl			a							; .
 107+ 9C6A CB 3F                                srl			a							; .
 108+ 9C6C 47                                   ld			b,a							; .
 109+ 9C6D CB 3F                                srl			a							; A = A / 2 (i.e. T /8)
 110+ 9C6F 80                                   add			a,b							; A = T/8 + T/4 (3T/8)
 111+ 9C70 47                                   ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
 112+ 9C71 79                                   ld			a,c							; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
 113+ 9C72 E6 80                                and			SignOnly8Bit    			; recover sign only
 114+ 9C74 B0                                   or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
 115+ 9C75 C9                                   ret
 116+ 9C76              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
 117+ 9C76 79           .TIS2AccGTEQ:           ld			a,c
 118+ 9C77 E6 80                                and			$80							; copy of Acc
 119+ 9C79 F6 60                                or			$60							; unity
 120+ 9C7B C9                                   ret
 121+ 9C7C              .TIS2SkipSub:           ClearCarryFlag                          ; Clear carry as it needs to be empty to roll in 0
 121+ 9C7C B7          >                        or a
 122+ 9C7D CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
 123+ 9C7F 38 DA                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop			; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
 124+ 9C81 C3 67 9C                             jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
 125+ 9C84
 126+ 9C84
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_AequAdivQmul96.asm
 580  9C84                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
   1+ 9C84              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=A*Q/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   2+ 9C84              fmltu:
   3+ 9C84 57           AequAmulQdiv256:        ld	d,a
   4+ 9C85 3A 5F 7F                             ld	a,(varQ)
   5+ 9C88 5F                                   ld	e,a
   6+ 9C89 ED 30                                mul
   7+ 9C8B 7A                                   ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
   8+ 9C8C C9                                   ret
   9+ 9C8D
  10+ 9C8D 5F           AequAmulDdiv256:        ld  e,a
  11+ 9C8E ED 30                                mul
  12+ 9C90 7A                                   ld  a,d
  13+ 9C91 C9                                   ret
  14+ 9C92
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
 581  9C92                  ;INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm"
 582  9C92
 583  9C92                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
   1+ 9C92              APequQmulA:
   2+ 9C92              asm_mult1:
   3+ 9C92              ; "ASM_MULT1 (DE) A(hi).P(lo) = Q * A first part of MAD, multiply and add. Visited Quite often. A=hi P = lo also returns result in DE"
   4+ 9C92 FE 00        	cp	0
   5+ 9C94 28 1F        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its Q * 0
   6+ 9C96 5F           	ld	e,a
   7+ 9C97 3A 5F 7F     	ld	a,(varQ)
   8+ 9C9A 57           	ld	d,a
   9+ 9C9B FE 00        	cp	0				; compare a
  10+ 9C9D 28 16        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its 0 * a
  11+ 9C9F AB           	xor	e				; -- = + +- = - -+ = - ++ = +
  12+ 9CA0 E6 80        	and $80				; get the resultant sign and save into b
  13+ 9CA2 47           	ld	b,a
  14+ 9CA3 7A           	ld	a,d
  15+ 9CA4 E6 7F        	and	SignMask8Bit	; now strip off sign bits
  16+ 9CA6 57           	ld	d,a
  17+ 9CA7 7B           	ld	a,e
  18+ 9CA8 E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  19+ 9CAA 5F           	ld	e,a
  20+ 9CAB ED 30        	mul					; zxn de = d * e
  21+ 9CAD 7B           	ld	a,e
  22+ 9CAE 32 5F 7E     	ld	(varP),a		; p = lo
  23+ 9CB1 7A           	ld	a,d				; a = hi
  24+ 9CB2 B0           	or	b				; de goes to a and varP also re-do sign bit
  25+ 9CB3 57           	ld	d,a				; we will work with de having result as we may bin vars later
  26+ 9CB4 C9           	ret
  27+ 9CB5              .mul0:
  28+ 9CB5 AF           	xor	a
  29+ 9CB6 32 5F 7E     	ld	(varP),a
  30+ 9CB9 57           	ld	d,a
  31+ 9CBA 5F           	ld  e,a
  32+ 9CBB C9           	ret
  33+ 9CBC
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
 584  9CBC                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm
   1+ 9CBC              baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
   2+ 9CBC              SAEquSRPlusAQ:
   3+ 9CBC              ; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
   4+ 9CBC              ;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
   5+ 9CBC              ; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
   6+ 9CBC              ; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
   7+ 9CBC              ; so need to fix the issue with carry flag not returning a fault correctly
   8+ 9CBC              LL38:
   9+ 9CBC              ;	ld		d,a
  10+ 9CBC              ;	ld		a,(varQ)
  11+ 9CBC              ;	ld		e,a
  12+ 9CBC              ;	ld		a,(varS)
  13+ 9CBC              ;	ld		h,a
  14+ 9CBC              ;	ld		a,(varR)
  15+ 9CBC              ;	ld		l,a
  16+ 9CBC              ;	call	ADDHLDESignedv3
  17+ 9CBC              ;	ld		a,h
  18+ 9CBC              ;	ld		(varS),a
  19+ 9CBC              ;	ld		a,l
  20+ 9CBC              ;	ret
  21+ 9CBC              ; calculation table
  22+ 9CBC              ;   R     Q    Op            Sign calc
  23+ 9CBC              ;	10    5    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  24+ 9CBC              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  25+ 9CBC              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  26+ 9CBC              ;	-10  -5    ABS Add       -    sign same add R sign
  27+ 9CBC              ;   5    10    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  28+ 9CBC              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  29+ 9CBC              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  30+ 9CBC              ;   -5   -10   ABS  add      -    sign same add R sign
  31+ 9CBC
  32+ 9CBC              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  33+ 9CBC              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  34+ 9CBC              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  35+ 9CBC              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  36+ 9CBC
  37+ 9CBC
  38+ 9CBC              ; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  39+ 9CBC 21 61 7F     	ld		hl,varS							;
  40+ 9CBF AE           	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  41+ 9CC0 FA CB 9C     	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  42+ 9CC3 3A 5F 7F     	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  43+ 9CC6 21 60 7F     	ld		hl,varR
  44+ 9CC9 86           	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  45+ 9CCA C9           	ret										; Done carry set if overflow
  46+ 9CCB              .LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
  47+ 9CCB 3A 60 7F     	ld		a,(varR)						; a = R
  48+ 9CCE 21 5F 7F     	ld		hl,varQ                         ; Q
  49+ 9CD1              ;--	JumpIfALTMemHLusng LL39SwapSubtraction	; if a < (hl) then do LL39SwapSubtraction
  50+ 9CD1              	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
  50+ 9CD1 B7          >                        or a
  51+ 9CD2 9E           	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q which as R >= Q will always be a positive result
  52+ 9CD3 38 01            jr      c,.LL39SignCorrection
  53+ 9CD5              ;--    jr      a,.LL39ResultZero
  54+ 9CD5              ;--   JumpIfNegative LL39SignCorrection		; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
  55+ 9CD5              ;--	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
  56+ 9CD5 C9           	ret
  57+ 9CD6              .LL39SignCorrection:
  58+ 9CD6 FE 00            cp      0                               ; if its 0 then neg will affect flag so we just zero result to save compute
  59+ 9CD8 28 0E            jr      z,.LL39ResultZero
  60+ 9CDA ED 44            neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
  61+ 9CDC 08           	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
  62+ 9CDD 3A 61 7F     	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
  63+ 9CE0 EE 80        	xor		$80							    ;
  64+ 9CE2 32 61 7F     	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
  65+ 9CE5 08           	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
  66+ 9CE6                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry as NEG instrunction sets it for non zero
  66+ 9CE6 B7          >                        or a
  67+ 9CE7 C9           	ret
  68+ 9CE8              .LL39ResultZero:
  69+ 9CE8 32 61 7F         ld      (varS),a                        ; a is zero at this stage so set sign as well
  70+ 9CEB                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry
  70+ 9CEB B7          >                        or a
  71+ 9CEC C9               ret
  72+ 9CED              ;--LL39SwapSubtraction:
  73+ 9CED              ;--	push	bc
  74+ 9CED              ;--	ld		b,a
  75+ 9CED              ;--	ld		a,(hl)
  76+ 9CED              ;--	sub		b
  77+ 9CED              ;--	pop		bc
  78+ 9CED              ;--	ex		af,af'							; do we flip here or negate. i think its flip as its overflowed unsigned
  79+ 9CED              ;--	ld		a,(varS)
  80+ 9CED              ;--	xor		$80
  81+ 9CED              ;--	ld		(varS),a
  82+ 9CED              ;--	ex		af,af'
  83+ 9CED              ;--	ret
  84+ 9CED
  85+ 9CED              ;;;;	baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
  86+ 9CED              ;;;;; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
  87+ 9CED              ;;;;;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
  88+ 9CED              ;;;;; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
  89+ 9CED              ;;;;; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
  90+ 9CED              ;;;;LL38:
  91+ 9CED              ;;;;; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  92+ 9CED              ;;;;	ld		hl,varS							;
  93+ 9CED              ;;;;	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  94+ 9CED              ;;;;	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  95+ 9CED              ;;;;	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  96+ 9CED              ;;;;	ld		hl,varR
  97+ 9CED              ;;;;	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  98+ 9CED              ;;;;	ret										; Done
  99+ 9CED              ;;;;.LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
 100+ 9CED              ;;;;	ld		hl,varQ                         ;
 101+ 9CED              ;;;;	ld		a,(hl)
 102+ 9CED              ;;;;	JumpIfAGTENusng 128,LL39Sub16bit		; does this need to be 16 bit
 103+ 9CED              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)						;
 104+ 9CED              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
 105+ 9CED              ;;;;	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q
 106+ 9CED              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection				; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
 107+ 9CED              ;;;;	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
 108+ 9CED              ;;;;	ret
 109+ 9CED              ;;;;.SignCorrection:
 110+ 9CED              ;;;;    neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
 111+ 9CED              ;;;;	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
 112+ 9CED              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 113+ 9CED              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 114+ 9CED              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 115+ 9CED              ;;;;	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
 116+ 9CED              ;;;;	ret
 117+ 9CED              ;;;;LL39Sub16Bit:
 118+ 9CED              ;;;;	ld		e,a
 119+ 9CED              ;;;;	ld		d,0
 120+ 9CED              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)
 121+ 9CED              ;;;;	ld		l,a
 122+ 9CED              ;;;;	ld		h,0
 123+ 9CED              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag
 124+ 9CED              ;;;;	sbc		hl,de
 125+ 9CED              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection16bit
 126+ 9CED              ;;;;	bit		7,h
 127+ 9CED              ;;;;	jr		z,.GoodToReturn
 128+ 9CED              ;;;;.Needtonegate:
 129+ 9CED              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 130+ 9CED              ;;;;.GoodToReturn
 131+ 9CED              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 132+ 9CED              ;;;;	or		a
 133+ 9CED              ;;;;	ret
 134+ 9CED              ;;;;.SignCorrection16bit:
 135+ 9CED              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 136+ 9CED              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 137+ 9CED              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 138+ 9CED              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 139+ 9CED              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 140+ 9CED              ;;;;	ret
 141+ 9CED
 142+ 9CED
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm
 585  9CED
 586  9CED                  ;INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm"
 587  9CED                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm
   1+ 9CED              RequAdivQ:
   2+ 9CED              	; R = A/Q, U = remainder, code looked a little odd as if R is reminader and U = result
   3+ 9CED              LL61:										; Handling division R=A/Q for case further down
   4+ 9CED 4F           	ld		c,a								; c = A
   5+ 9CEE 3A 5F 7F     	ld		a,(varQ)						; test for divide by 0
   6+ 9CF1 FE 00        	cp		0
   7+ 9CF3 28 16        	jr		z,LL84							; divide by zero error
   8+ 9CF5 57           	ld		d,a								; now we can do C/D
   9+ 9CF6 06 08            ld b,8
  10+ 9CF8 AF               xor a
  11+ 9CF9              LL63:										; roll divide loop
  12+ 9CF9 CB 21            sla c
  13+ 9CFB 17               rla
  14+ 9CFC BA               cp d
  15+ 9CFD 38 02            jr c,LL64
  16+ 9CFF 0C               inc c
  17+ 9D00 92               sub d
  18+ 9D01              LL64:
  19+ 9D01 10 F6            djnz LL63
  20+ 9D03 32 5E 7F     	ld	(varU),a							; store remainder in U
  21+ 9D06 79           	ld	a,c
  22+ 9D07 32 60 7F     	ld	(varR),a							; store remainder in R
  23+ 9D0A C9               ret
  24+ 9D0B              LL84:										; div error  R=U=#5
  25+ 9D0B 3E 32        	ld		a,50
  26+ 9D0D 32 60 7F     	ld		(varR),a
  27+ 9D10 32 5E 7F     	ld		(varU),a
  28+ 9D13 C9           	ret
  29+ 9D14
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm

   1+ 9D4D              CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV:

  22+ 9D87 3A A7 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX15VecX)
  22+ 9D8A 32 2B C0    >                        ld       (UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a
  23+ 9D8D                      ldCopyByte  XX15VecY, UBnkrotmatSidevY+1
  23+ 9D8D 3A A8 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX15VecY)
  23+ 9D90 32 2D C0    >                        ld       (UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a
  24+ 9D93                      ldCopyByte  XX15VecZ, UBnkrotmatSidevZ+1
  24+ 9D93 3A A9 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX15VecZ)
  24+ 9D96 32 2F C0    >                        ld       (UBnkrotmatSidevZ+1),a
  25+ 9D99                      ZeroA
  25+ 9D99 AF          >                        xor a
  26+ 9D9A 32 2A C0             ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevX),a
  27+ 9D9D 32 2C C0             ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevY),a
  28+ 9DA0 32 2E C0             ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevZ),a
  29+ 9DA3 C9                   ret
  30+ 9DA4
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/CopyXX15toRotMat.asm
 592  9DA4                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_tidy.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_tidy.asm
   1+ 9DA4              ; d = vector 1 e = vector 2 h = vector3 l = vector 4 b = vector 5
   2+ 9DA4              ; performs (d*e + h*l) / b and puts the result in de where e is 0
   3+ 9DA4 C5           TidyCalc:       push    bc
   4+ 9DA5 CD A9 90                     call    mulDbyESigned           ; de = vector 1 * vector 2
   5+ 9DA8 EB                           ex      hl,de                   ; get hl into de and save result of de
   6+ 9DA9 CD A9 90                     call    mulDbyESigned           ; de = vector 2 * vector 3
   7+ 9DAC CD 04 00                     call    AddDEtoHLSigned         ; BC = HL = HL + DE
   8+ 9DAF D1                           pop     de                      ; DE = BC saved from earlier
   9+ 9DB0 7C                           ld      a,h                     ; check for result 0
  10+ 9DB1 B5                           or      l                       ; .
  11+ 9DB2 CA D3 9D                     jp      z,.ZeroResult           ; .
  12+ 9DB5 44 4D                        ld      bc,hl                   ; .
  13+ 9DB7 7A                           ld      a,d                     ; check for divide by zero
  14+ 9DB8 A7                           and     a                       ; .
  15+ 9DB9 CA CA 9D                     jp      z,.MaxedResult          ; .
  16+ 9DBC 5A                           ld      e,d                     ; now de = 0b (i.e. b register not hex value)
  17+ 9DBD 16 00                        ld      d,0                     ;
  18+ 9DBF CD 5F 97                     call    Floor_DivQSigned        ; TO BE TESTED should do BC = BC / DE
  19+ 9DC2 78                           ld      a,b                     ; sign bit from b
  20+ 9DC3 E6 80                        and     $80                     ; .
  21+ 9DC5 B1                           or      c                       ; bring in the value
  22+ 9DC6 57                           ld      d,a                     ; de = c0 (i.e. c register not hex value)
  23+ 9DC7 1E 00                        ld      e,0                     ; .
  24+ 9DC9 C9                           ret
  25+ 9DCA 78           .MaxedResult:   ld      a,b                     ; make result signed unity (i.e. 1 or 96 in our case)
  26+ 9DCB EE 80                        xor     $80
  27+ 9DCD F6 60                        or      $60
  28+ 9DCF 57                           ld      d,a
  29+ 9DD0 1E 00                        ld      e,0
  30+ 9DD2 C9                           ret
  31+ 9DD3 11 00 00     .ZeroResult:    ld      de,0
  32+ 9DD6 C9                           ret
  33+ 9DD7              ; as per tidy calc except
  34+ 9DD7              ; d = vector 1 e = vector 2 h = vector3 l = vector 4
  35+ 9DD7              ; performs (d*e - h*l) / 96 and puts the result in de where e is 0
  36+ 9DD7
  37+ 9DD7 CD A9 90     TidySide:       call    mulDbyESigned           ; de = vector 1 * vector 2
  38+ 9DDA EB                           ex      de,hl                   ; get hl = vector 1 * vector 2
  39+ 9DDB CD A9 90                     call    mulDbyESigned           ; de = vector 2 * vector 3
  40+ 9DDE CD 00 00                     call    SubDEfromHLSigned       ; BC = HL = HL - DE
  41+ 9DE1 44 4D                        ld      bc,hl                   ; .
  42+ 9DE3 11 60 00                     ld      de,$60                  ; now de = 96
  43+ 9DE6 CD 5F 97                     call    Floor_DivQSigned        ; TO BE TESTED should do BC = BC / DE
  44+ 9DE9 78                           ld      a,b                     ; sign bit from b
  45+ 9DEA E6 80                        and     $80                     ; .
  46+ 9DEC B1                           or      c                       ; bring in the value
  47+ 9DED 57                           ld      d,a                     ; de = c0 (i.e. c register not hex value)
  48+ 9DEE 1E 00                        ld      e,0                     ; .
  49+ 9DF0 C9                           ret
  50+ 9DF1
  51+ 9DF1              ;; orthonormalise vector for UBnK ship vector uses IX IT
  52+ 9DF1                  DISPLAY "TidyVectorsIX"
  53+ 9DF1 DD 21 36 C0  TidyVectorsIX:  ld      ix,UBnkrotmatNosevX
  54+ 9DF5 CD F4 99                     call    NormaliseIXVector       ; initially we normalise the nose vector
  55+ 9DF8 3A 37 C0     .CheckNoseXSize:ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)  ; a = nose x
  56+ 9DFB E6 30                        and     %00110000                ; if bits 7 and 6 are clear the work with nosey
  57+ 9DFD CA 31 9E                     jp      z, .NoseXSmall
  58+ 9E00              ;-- When nosex is large ------------------------  roofv_x =-(nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_x
  59+ 9E00 3A 39 C0     .NoseXLarge:    ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)  ; a = nose x
  60+ 9E03 57                           ld      d,a
  61+ 9E04 3A 33 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)  ; hl = nosev_y * roofv_y
  62+ 9E07 5F                           ld      e,a                     ; we already have d so only need roofY
  63+ 9E08 3A 3B C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)  ; de = nosev_z * roofv_z
  64+ 9E0B 67                           ld      h,a                     ; .
  65+ 9E0C 3A 35 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)  ; .
  66+ 9E0F 6F                           ld      l,a                     ; .
  67+ 9E10 3A 37 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
  68+ 9E13 47                           ld      b,a
  69+ 9E14 CD A4 9D                     call    TidyCalc
  70+ 9E17 7A                           ld      a,d
  71+ 9E18 B3                           or      e
  72+ 9E19 CA 20 9E                     jp      z,.NoRoofXFlip
  73+ 9E1C 3E 80                        ld      a,$80                   ; flip sign bit if not zero
  74+ 9E1E AA                           xor     d
  75+ 9E1F 57                           ld      d,a
  76+ 9E20 ED 53 30 C0  .NoRoofXFlip:   ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvX),de   ; write roofvx
  77+ 9E24 C3 8C 9E                     jp      .NormaliseRoofv
  78+ 9E27 11 00 E0     .MaxedRoofX:    ld      de,$E000                ; TEST if sign is correct for all of these if was divide by zero make it -1
  79+ 9E2A ED 53 30 C0                  ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvX),de   ; write roofvx
  80+ 9E2E C3 8C 9E                     jp      .NormaliseRoofv
  81+ 9E31              ;-- When noseX is small ------------------------ determine if we are doign roofz or roof y
  82+ 9E31 3A 38 C0     .NoseXSmall:    ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY)
  83+ 9E34 E6 60                        and     %01100000
  84+ 9E36 CA 64 9E                     jp      z,.NoseYSmall
  85+ 9E39              ;-- When noseY is large ------------------------ roofv_z = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_y * roofv_y) / nosev_z
  86+ 9E39 3A 37 C0     .NoseYLarge:    ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
  87+ 9E3C 57                           ld      d,a
  88+ 9E3D 3A 31 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
  89+ 9E40 5F                           ld      e,a
  90+ 9E41 3A 39 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
  91+ 9E44 67                           ld      h,a
  92+ 9E45 3A 33 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
  93+ 9E48 6F                           ld      l,a
  94+ 9E49 3A 3B C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
  95+ 9E4C 47                           ld      b,a
  96+ 9E4D CD A4 9D                     call    TidyCalc
  97+ 9E50 7A                           ld      a,d
  98+ 9E51 B3                           or      e
  99+ 9E52 CA 5D 9E                     jp      z,.NoRoofZFlip
 100+ 9E55 3E 80                        ld      a,$80                   ; flip sign bit if not zero
 101+ 9E57 AA                           xor     d
 102+ 9E58 57                           ld      d,a
 103+ 9E59 3E 80                        ld      a,$80                   ; flip sign bit
 104+ 9E5B AA                           xor     d
 105+ 9E5C 57                           ld      d,a
 106+ 9E5D ED 53 34 C0  .NoRoofZFlip:   ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvZ),de   ; write roofvz
 107+ 9E61 C3 8C 9E                     jp      .NormaliseRoofv
 108+ 9E64              ;-- When noseY is large ------------------------ roofv_y = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y
 109+ 9E64 3A 37 C0     .NoseYSmall:    ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 110+ 9E67 57                           ld      d,a
 111+ 9E68 3A 31 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 112+ 9E6B 5F                           ld      e,a
 113+ 9E6C 3A 3B C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 114+ 9E6F 67                           ld      h,a
 115+ 9E70 3A 35 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 116+ 9E73 6F                           ld      l,a
 117+ 9E74 3A 39 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 118+ 9E77 47                           ld      b,a
 119+ 9E78 CD A4 9D                     call    TidyCalc
 120+ 9E7B 7A                           ld      a,d
 121+ 9E7C B3                           or      e
 122+ 9E7D CA 88 9E                     jp      z,.NoRoofYFlip
 123+ 9E80 3E 80                        ld      a,$80                   ; flip sign bit if not zero
 124+ 9E82 AA                           xor     d
 125+ 9E83 57                           ld      d,a
 126+ 9E84 3E 80                        ld      a,$80                   ; flip sign bit
 127+ 9E86 AA                           xor     d
 128+ 9E87 57                           ld      d,a
 129+ 9E88 ED 53 32 C0  .NoRoofYFlip:   ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvY),de   ; write roofvy
 130+ 9E8C DD 21 30 C0  .NormaliseRoofv:ld      ix,UBnkrotmatRoofvX     ; now normalise roofv
 131+ 9E90 CD F4 99                     call    NormaliseIXVector
 132+ 9E93              ; -- sidev_x = (nosev_z * roofv_y - nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 133+ 9E93 3A 3B C0     .CalcSidevX:    ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 134+ 9E96 57                           ld      d,a
 135+ 9E97 3A 33 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 136+ 9E9A 5F                           ld      e,a
 137+ 9E9B 3A 39 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 138+ 9E9E 67                           ld      h,a
 139+ 9E9F 3A 35 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 140+ 9EA2 6F                           ld      l,a
 141+ 9EA3 CD D7 9D                     call    TidySide
 142+ 9EA6 ED 53 2A C0                  ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevX),de   ; write sidevX
 143+ 9EAA              ; -- sidev_y = (nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 144+ 9EAA 3A 37 C0     .CalcSidevY:    ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 145+ 9EAD 57                           ld      d,a
 146+ 9EAE 3A 35 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 147+ 9EB1 5F                           ld      e,a
 148+ 9EB2 3A 3B C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)

 153+ 9EBD ED 53 2C C0                  ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevY),de   ; write sidevX
 154+ 9EC1              ; -- sidev_z = (nosev_y * roofv_x - nosev_x * roofv_y) / 96
 155+ 9EC1 3A 39 C0     .CalcSidevZ:    ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 156+ 9EC4 57                           ld      d,a
 157+ 9EC5 3A 31 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 158+ 9EC8 5F                           ld      e,a
 159+ 9EC9 3A 37 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 160+ 9ECC 67                           ld      h,a

 155+ 9F98 3A 41 C0                             ld      a,(UbnKShipUnivBankNbr)                     ; save current bank
 156+ 9F9B FD 67                                ld      iyh,a
 157+ 9F9D                                      MMUSelectUniverseN 0                            ; space station is always 0
 157+ 9F9D ED 91 56 46 >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       BankUNIVDATA0+0
 158+ 9FA1 CD 1B C6                             call    SetShipHostile
 159+ 9FA4 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh                                   ; get prev bank back
 160+ 9FA6                                      MMUSelectUniverseA                              ;
 160+ 9FA6 C6 46       >                     add    a,BankUNIVDATA0
 160+ 9FA8 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 161+ 9FAB C9                                   ret
 162+ 9FAC

 164+ 9FAC              CheckMissileBlastInit:  ZeroA

 199+ 9FC6              ;...................................................................
 200+ 9FC6              ; We only do one test per loop for spreading the load of work
 201+ 9FC6 3A 31 81     CheckMissileBlastLoop:  ld      a,(CurrentMissileCheck)
 202+ 9FC9                                      ReturnIfAGTENusng   UniverseSlotListSize
 202+ 9FC9 FE 0C       >                        cp    UniverseSlotListSize
 202+ 9FCB D0          >                        ret	 nc
 203+ 9FCC FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a
 204+ 9FCE 3C                                   inc     a                                   ; update for next slot so re can fast return on distance checks
 205+ 9FCF 32 31 81                             ld      (CurrentMissileCheck),a
 206+ 9FD2                                      ReturnIfSlotAEmpty
 206+ 9FD2 21 33 81    >                        ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
 206+ 9FD5 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 206+ 9FD7 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 206+ 9FD8 3C          >                        inc     a
 206+ 9FD9 C8          >                        ret     z           ; if slot was ff inc would make it 0
 206+ 9FDA 3D          >                        dec     a           ; get original value back for later
 207+ 9FDB CD 8B 84                             call    IsSpaceStationPresent               ; If its a station its imune to missiles
 208+ 9FDE D8                                   ret     c                                   ; if we have a special mission to kill a staion then its type won't be space station for game logic
 209+ 9FDF 3A 52 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKexplDsp)                     ; Don't explode a ship twice
 210+ 9FE2 E6 20                                and     ShipExploding                       ;
 211+ 9FE4                                      ReturnIfNotZero                             ;
 211+ 9FE4 C0          >                        ret     nz

 219+ A000                                      ;CheckPointRange UBnKxlo, UBnKxsgn, MissileXPos, MissileXSgn  ; its a square but its good enough

 221+ A000                                      ;CheckPointRange UBnKzlo, UBnKzsgn, MissileZPos, MissileZSgn

 232+ A010              ;...................................................................

 234+ A013 ED 5B 23 C0                          ld      de, (UBnKylo)                       ; we can cheat as a missile will only ever be
 235+ A017 ED 4B 26 C0                          ld      bc, (UBnKzlo)                       ; 16 bit + sign bit in sign byte
 236+ A01B 7C                                   ld      a,h
 237+ A01C B2                                   or      d
 238+ A01D B0                                   or      b
 239+ A01E              .PrepForNoHit:          ClearCarryFlag

 240+ A01F                                      ReturnIfNotZero
 240+ A01F C0          >                        ret     nz
 241+ A020              .PrepForHit:            SetCarryFlag
 241+ A020 37          >                        scf
 242+ A021 C9                                   ret
 243+ A022

 244+ A022 AF          >                        xor a
 245+ A023 B4                                   or      h
 246+ A024                                      ClearCarryFlag
 246+ A024 B7          >                        or a
 247+ A025                                      ReturnIfNotZero                             ; will return with carry clear if way far away
 247+ A025 C0          >                        ret     nz
 248+ A026 7D                                   ld      a,l
 249+ A027                                      ReturnIfAGTENusng    c                      ; return no carry if x far
 249+ A027 B9          >                        cp    c
 249+ A028 D0          >                        ret	 nc
