 100++A1BA FD 7C       >                        ld      a,iyh
 100++A1BC             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
 100++A1BC ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 101++A1BF 2A 26 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                        ; get missile x
 102++A1C2 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                        ; get missile x sign
 103++A1C5                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 104++A1C5 22 5C A0                                 ld  (TacticsMissileZ),hl
 105++A1C8 32 5E A0                                 ld  (TacticsMissileZ+2),a
 106++A1CB                                      ENDIF
 107++A1CB
 108++A1CB 47                                   ld      b,a
 109++A1CC CD 33 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 110++A1CF 22 8C A0                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ),hl
 111++A1D2 32 8E A0                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 112++A1D5              ; by here missile in in memory and TacticsVector now holds distance
 113++A1D5              ; if or ABS all high bytes is <> 0
 114++A1D5              .CheckDistance:         IFDEF MISSILEDOHIT
 115++A1D5 2A 85 A0                                 ld      hl,(TacticsVectorX+1)              ; test if high bytes are set (value is assumed to be 24 bit, though calcs are only 16 so this is uneeded)
 116++A1D8 7C                                       ld      a,h                                ; .
 117++A1D9 ED 5B 89 A0                              ld      de,(TacticsVectorY+1)              ; .
 118++A1DD B2                                       or      d                                  ; .
 119++A1DE ED 4B 8D A0                              ld      bc,(TacticsVectorZ+1)              ; .
 120++A1E2 B0                                       or      b                                  ; .
 121++A1E3                                          ClearSignBitA                              ; .
 121++A1E3 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
 122++A1E5                                          JumpIfNotZero       .FarAway               ; .
 122++A1E5 C2 F4 A1    >                        jp	nz,.FarAway
 123++A1E8 B5                                       or      l                                    ; test for low byte bit 7, i.e high of 16 bit values
 124++A1E9 B3                                       or      e                                  ; .
 125++A1EA B1                                       or      c                                  ; .
 126++A1EB                                          JumpIfNotZero       .FarAway               ; .
 126++A1EB C2 F4 A1    >                        jp	nz,.FarAway
 127++A1EE                                      ELSE
 128++A1EE ~                                        jp                  .FarAway
 129++A1EE                                      ENDIF
 130++A1EE              ; If we get here its close enough to detonate
 131++A1EE 3A 46 C0     .CloseMissileExplode:   ld      a,(UBnKMissileTarget)
 132++A1F1 C3 87 9F                             jp      MissileHitShipA
 133++A1F4                          DISPLAY "TODO: far away ** TODO need to set memory read write on page 0"
 134++A1F4              .FarAway:               SelectTargetBank
 134++A1F4 FD 7D       >                        ld      a,iyl
 134++A1F6             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
 134++A1F6 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 135++A1F9                                      JumpIfMemFalse      UBnKECMFitted, .NoECM                   ; if target has ECM and enough energy to use it
 135++A1F9 3A 5B C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKECMFitted)
 135++A1FC A7          >                        and     a
 135++A1FD C2 1A A2    >                        jp      nz, .NoECM
 136++A200                                      JumpIfMemLTNusng    UBnKEnergy,    ECMCounterMax, .NoECM    ; .
 136++A200 3A 59 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKEnergy)
 136++A203 FE 80       >                        cp      ECMCounterMax
 136++A205 DA 1A A2    >                        jp	  c,.NoECM
 137++A208                                      JumpIfMemIsNotZero   ECMCountDown, .NoECM                ; . ECM is already active
 137++A208 3A 74 7E    >                        ld      a,(ECMCountDown)
 137++A20B A7          >                        and     a
 137++A20C C2 1A A2    >                        jp	    nz,.NoECM
 138++A20F 3A 56 7E     .TestIfUsingECM:        ld      a,(RandomSeed2)                                             ; if random < 16
 139++A212                                      JumpIfAGTENusng     16, .UpdateMissilePos                           ;   then fire ECM destroying missile
 139++A212 FE 10       >                        cp     16
 139++A214 D2 1A A2    >                        jp		nc,.UpdateMissilePos
 140++A217              ;. If we get here then target is still paged in to fire ECM
 141++A217 C3 43 C6     .ZeroPageFireECM:       jp      FireECM                                             ; with an implicit return
 142++A21A              ;                       implicit ret
 143++A21A              ;. If we get here then target is still paged in with no ECM
 144++A21A              .NoECM:
 145++A21A                                    ;;;         ** can do 16 bit maths as we can take teh view that once a object/space station is 24 bit value away then
 146++A21A                                    ;;;         ** targeting computer looses track and destructs missiles
 147++A21A              ;--- Now we can actually update the missile AI
 148++A21A              .UpdateMissilePos:      ;break
 149++A21A                                      SelectMissileBank
 149++A21A FD 7C       >                        ld      a,iyh
 149++A21C             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
 149++A21C ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 150++A21F                                      ;break
 151++A21F                                      ;call    ORTHOGALISE
 152++A21F              .NormaliseDirection:    IFDEF MISSILEBREAK
 153++A21F ~                                        ;break
 154++A21F                                      ENDIF
 155++A21F CD 79 A7                             call    NormalizeTactics                    ; Normalise vector down to 7 bit + sign byte (.TA19->TAS2)
 156++A222                                      IFDEF TACTICSDEBUG
 157++A222 CD 40 A6                                 call DebugTacticsCopy
 158++A225                                      ENDIF
 159++A225              .NegateDirection:       FlipSignMem TacticsVectorX+2                ; negate vector in XX15 so it points opposite direction
 159++A225 3A 86 A0    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorX+2)
 159++A228 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 159++A22A 32 86 A0    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 160++A22D                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorY+2                ; we have already negated the dot product above
 160++A22D 3A 8A A0    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorY+2)
 160++A230 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 160++A232 32 8A A0    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 161++A235                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorZ+2                ; .
 161++A235 3A 8E A0    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)
 161++A238 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 161++A23A 32 8E A0    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 162++A23D CD 54 A2                             call    SeekingLogic
 163++A240 C9                                   ret
 164++A241 3A 31 81     .ProcessMissileHit:     ld      a,(CurrentMissileCheck)
 165++A244                                      ReturnIfAGTENusng UniverseSlotListSize  ; need to wait another loop
 165++A244 FE 0C       >                        cp    UniverseSlotListSize
 165++A246 D0          >                        ret	 nc
 166++A247 C3 AC 9F     .ActivateNewExplosion:  jp  CheckMissileBlastInit               ; initialise
 167++A24A                                      ; DUMMY RET get a free return by using jp
 168++A24A CD A0 C7     .ECMIsActive:           call    UnivExplodeShip                 ; ECM detonates missile
 169++A24D                                      SetMemTrue  UBnKMissleHitToProcess      ; Enque an explosion
 169++A24D AF          >                        xor     a
 169++A24E 32 45 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKMissleHitToProcess),a
 170++A251 C3 41 A2                             jp      .ProcessMissileHit              ; lets see if we can enqueue now
 171++A254                                      ; DUMMY RET get a free return as activenewexplosion does jp to init with a free ret
 172++A254
 173++A254 CD 85 A6     SeekingLogic:           call    XX12EquTacticsDotNosev              ; SA = nose . XX15                           (     ->TAS3)
 174++A257 32 47 A0                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct1),a              ; CNT = A (high byte of dot product)
 175++A25A 3A 61 7F                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; get sign from dot product
 176++A25D 32 4B A0                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 177++A260 CD DB A6     .RoofDotProduct:        call    XX12EquTacticsDotRoofv              ; Now tran the roof for rotation
 178++A263 32 4A A0                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2),a              ; so if its +ve then the roof is similar so pull up to head towards it
 179++A266 3A 61 7F                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; .
 180++A269 32 4B A0                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 181++A26C CD 76 A2                             call    SimplifiedShipPitchv3
 182++A26F CD 9A A2                             call    SimplifiedShipRollv3
 183++A272 CD C8 A2                             call    SimplifiedShipSpeedv3
 184++A275 C9                                   ret
 185++A276
 186++A276              SimplifiedShipPitchv3:  ;break
 187++A276 2A 4A A0                             ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct2)            ; pitch counter sign = opposite sign to roofdir sign
 188++A279 7C                                   ld      a,h                                ; .
 189++A27A EE 80                                xor     $80                                ; .
 190++A27C E6 80                                and     $80                                ; .
 191++A27E 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h  = flipped sign
 192++A27F 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = value * 2
 193++A280 CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 194++A282                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16, .skipPitchZero         ; if its > 16 then update pitch
 194++A282 FE 10       >                        cp     16
 194++A284 D2 90 A2    >                        jp		nc,.skipPitchZero
 195++A287                                      ZeroA                                      ; else we zero pitch but
 195++A287 AF          >                        xor a
 196++A288 B4                                   or      h                                  ; we need to retain the sign
 197++A289 32 4A C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a                ; .
 198++A28C                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 199++A28C 32 D7 A0                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 200++A28F                                      ENDIF
 201++A28F C9                                   ret
 202++A290 3E 02        .skipPitchZero:         ld      a,2
 203++A292 B4                                   or      h
 204++A293 32 4A C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 205++A296                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 206++A296 32 D7 A0                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 207++A299                                      ENDIF
 208++A299 C9                                   ret
 209++A29A
 210++A29A              ;Direct on dot product nose is $24
 211++A29A              ; Position                  Pitch   Roll    Speed
 212++A29A              ; Top left forwards         up      -ve     +
 213++A29A              ; Top right forwards        up      +ve     +
 214++A29A              ; Bottom left forwards      down    -ve     +
 215++A29A              ; Bottom right forwards     down    +ve     +
 216++A29A              ; Top left rear             up      -ve     -
 217++A29A              ; Top right rear            up      +ve     -
 218++A29A              ; Bottom left rear          down    -ve     -
 219++A29A              ; Bottom right rear         down    +ve     -
 220++A29A
 221++A29A
 222++A29A
 223++A29A              SimplifiedShipRollv3:  ; ld      a,(UBnKRotXCounter)               ; get current roll
 224++A29A                                     ; sla     a                                 ; * 2 to also abs
 225++A29A                                     ; ReturnIfAGTENusng 32                      ; and so if >32 skip
 226++A29A CD E1 A6                             call    XX12EquTacticsDotSidev             ; calculate side dot protuct
 227++A29D 32 4D A0                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3),a             ; .
 228++A2A0 6F                                   ld      l,a                                ; .
 229++A2A1 3A 61 7F                             ld      a,(varS)                           ; .
 230++A2A4 32 4E A0                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3+1),a           ; .
 231++A2A7 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h = sign sidev
 232++A2A8 3A 4B A0                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2+1)           ; get flipped pitch counter sign
 233++A2AB                                      ;xor     $80                               ; .
 234++A2AB                                      ;xor     h                                 ; b = flip against pitch sign
 235++A2AB                                      ;and     $80                               ; .
 236++A2AB                                      ;xor $80
 237++A2AB 47                                   ld      b,a                                ; b = roof product
 238++A2AC 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = abs sidev  * 2
 239++A2AD CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 240++A2AF                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16,.skipRollZero           ;
 240++A2AF FE 10       >                        cp     16
 240++A2B1 D2 BD A2    >                        jp		nc,.skipRollZero
 241++A2B4                                      ZeroA                                      ; if its zoer then set rotx to zero
 241++A2B4 AF          >                        xor a
 242++A2B5 B0                                   or      b
 243++A2B6 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 244++A2B9                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 245++A2B9 32 D5 A0                                 ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 246++A2BC                                      ENDIF
 247++A2BC C9                                   ret
 248++A2BD 3E 02        .skipRollZero:          ld      a,2
 249++A2BF B4                                   or      h
 250++A2C0 A8                                   xor     b
 251++A2C1 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 252++A2C4                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 253++A2C4 32 D5 A0                                 ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 254++A2C7                                      ENDIF
 255++A2C7 C9                                   ret
 256++A2C8
 257++A2C8 2A 47 A0     SimplifiedShipSpeedv3:  ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)
 258++A2CB 7C                                   ld      a,h
 259++A2CC A7                                   and     a
 260++A2CD 20 13                                jr      nz,.SlowDown
 261++A2CF ED 5B 4A A0                          ld      de,(TacticsDotProduct2)             ; dot product is +ve so heading at each other
 262++A2D3 7D                                   ld      a,l
 263++A2D4                                      JumpIfALTNusng  22,.SlowDown                                  ; nose dot product <
 263++A2D4 FE 16       >                        cp      22
 263++A2D6 DA E2 A2    >                        jp		c, .SlowDown
 264++A2D9 3E 03        .Accelerate:            ld      a,3                                 ; else
 265++A2DB 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a                       ;  accelleration = 3
 266++A2DE                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 267++A2DE 32 D9 A0                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 268++A2E1                                      ENDIF
 269++A2E1 C9                                   ret                                         ;  .
 270++A2E2              .SlowDown:              JumpIfALTNusng 18, .NoSpeedChange
 270++A2E2 FE 12       >                        cp      18
 270++A2E4 DA F0 A2    >                        jp		c, .NoSpeedChange
 271++A2E7 3E FE        .Deccelerate:           ld      a,-2
 272++A2E9 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 273++A2EC                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 274++A2EC 32 D9 A0                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 275++A2EF                                      ENDIF
 276++A2EF C9                                   ret
 277++A2F0              .NoSpeedChange:         ZeroA                                       ; else no change
 277++A2F0 AF          >                        xor a
 278++A2F1 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 279++A2F4                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 280++A2F4 32 D9 A0                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 281++A2F7                                      ENDIF
 282++A2F7 C9                                   ret
 283++A2F8
 284++A2F8
 285++A2F8 CD 37 A3     SimplifiedShipSpeedv3b:  call    GetDistance                         ;
 286++A2FB 7C                                   ld      a,h
 287++A2FC A7                                   and     a
 288++A2FD 06 16                                ld      b,22
 289++A2FF 20 08                                jr      nz,.NotSlow
 290++A301 7D           .CloseSlowTest:         ld      a,l
 291++A302                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 30, .NotSlow
 291++A302 FE 1E       >                        cp     30
 291++A304 D2 09 A3    >                        jp		nc,.NotSlow
 292++A307 06 3C                                ld      b,60
 293++A309 2A 47 A0     .NotSlow:               ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)             ; if nosedir is negative (pointing the wrong way)
 294++A30C 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ; or nosedir < 22 (very far off)
 295++A30D E6 80                                and     $80                                 ; do decelleration test
 296++A30F C2 20 A3                             jp      nz,.DecelTest                       ; .
 297++A312 7D                                   ld      a,l                                 ; .
 298++A313                                      JumpIfALTNusng b, .DecelTest                ; .
 298++A313 B8          >                        cp      b
 298++A314 DA 20 A3    >                        jp		c, .DecelTest
 299++A317 3E 03        .Accelerate:            ld      a,3                                 ; else
 300++A319 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a                       ;  accelleration = 3
 301++A31C                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 302++A31C 32 D9 A0                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 303++A31F                                      ENDIF
 304++A31F C9                                   ret                                         ;  .
 305++A320 7D           .DecelTest:             ld      a,l                                 ; if abs acelleration > 18
 306++A321                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 18 ,.Deccelerate             ;    decelerate by 2
 306++A321 FE 12       >                        cp     18
 306++A323 D2 2E A3    >                        jp		nc,.Deccelerate
 307++A326              .NoSpeedChange:         ZeroA                                       ; else no change
 307++A326 AF          >                        xor a
 308++A327 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 309++A32A                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 310++A32A 32 D9 A0                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 311++A32D                                      ENDIF
 312++A32D C9                                   ret
 313++A32E 3E FE        .Deccelerate:           ld      a,-2
 314++A330 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 315++A333                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 316++A333 32 D9 A0                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 317++A336                                      ENDIF
 318++A336 C9                                   ret
 319++A337
 320++A337 2A 84 A0     GetDistance:            ld      hl,(TacticsVectorX)
 321++A33A ED 5B 88 A0                          ld      de,(TacticsVectorY)
 322++A33E ED 4B 8C A0                          ld      bc,(TacticsVectorZ)
 323++A342 7C                                   ld      a,h
 324++A343 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 325++A345 67                                   ld      h,a
 326++A346 78                                   ld      a,b
 327++A347 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 328++A349 47                                   ld      b,a
 329++A34A 7A                                   ld      a,d
 330++A34B E6 7F                                and     $7F
 331++A34D 57                                   ld      d,a
 332++A34E 09                                   add     hl,bc
 333++A34F 19                                   add     hl,de
 334++A350                                      ShiftHLRight1
 334++A350 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 334++A352 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 335++A354                                      ShiftHLRight1
 335++A354 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 335++A356 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 336++A358 C9                                   ret

  36++A3F3 3A 5F A3    >                        ld      a,(NewLaunchUBnKZ)

  46++A403 CD 56 C6     .GetEnergy:             call    RechargeEnergy                  ; TA13 if enegery <= maxumum value for blueprint then recharge energy by 1
  47++A406 3A 0F C4                             ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)
  48++A409 E6 01        .IsItATrader:           and     ShipIsTrader
  49++A40B 20 06                                jr      nz, .NotATrader
  50++A40D CD 0C 85     .ItsATrader:            call    doRandom
  51++A410                                      ReturnIfALTNusng 100                    ; 61% chance do nothing
  51++A410 FE 64       >                        cp    100
  51++A412 D8          >                        ret	 c
  52++A413                                      IFDEF DEBUGFORCEHOSTILE
  53++A413 ~                                            call SetShipHostile
  54++A413 ~                                            ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)
  55++A413 ~                                            or      ShipIsBountyHunter
  56++A413 ~                                            ld      (ShipNewBitsAddr),a
  57++A413                                      ENDIF
  58++A413              .NotATrader:
  59++A413 3A 0F C4     .IsItBountyHunter:      ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)
  60++A416 E6 02                                and     ShipIsBountyHunter
  61++A418 20 08                                jr      nz, .NotBountyHunter
  62++A41A              .CheckFIST:             CallIfMemGTENusng FugitiveInnocentStatus, 40, SetShipHostile ; if our FIST rating >= 40 set ship hostile (bit 2)
  62++A41A 3A 10 80    >                        ld      a,(FugitiveInnocentStatus)
  62++A41D FE 28       >                        cp      40
  62++A41F D4 1B C6    >                        call    nc,SetShipHostile

  65++A425 E6 04                                and     ShipIsHostile
  66++A427 20 09                                jr      nz,.ItsHostile
  67++A429 3A 0F C4     .ItsNotHostile:         ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)
  68++A42C E6 10                                and     ShipIsDocking                   ; if bit 4 is not clear
  69++A42E 20 01                                jr      nz,.NotDocking

  71++A430                                      ;       do docking algorithm
  72++A430                                      ;       return

  76++A431                                      ;       move towards planet
  77++A431                                      ;       return
  78++A431 C9                                   ret

  80++A435 E6 08        .IsItPirate:            and     ShipIsPirate
  81++A437 20 0E                                jr      nz,.NotAPirate

  88++A447              .NotAPirate:

  98++A459                                      ;inherits parent's ai angry

 101++A45E 3A 06 C4     .CheckEnergyLevels:     ld      a,(EnergyAddr)

 104++A465 CB 38                                srl     b                               ; max energy / 2
 105++A467                                      JumpIfAGTENusng b,.EnergyOverHalf       ; if ship max energy / 2 < current enerhy
 105++A467 B8          >                        cp     b

 107++A46D                                      JumpIfAGTENusng b,.EnergyOverQuater     ; if ship max enery / 4 < current energy
 107++A46D B8          >                        cp     b
 107++A46E D2 86 A4    >                        jp		nc,.EnergyOverQuater

 109++A474 E6 80                                and     ShipHasEscapePod

 112++A47B FE E6       >                        cp      230

 117++A486                                      ;            goto spawn escape pod
 118++A486              .EnergyOverHalf:
 119++A486              .EnergyOverQuater:

 122++A48A A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 122++A48B CA A1 A4    >                        jp	    z, .NoMissileLaunch

 125++A493                                      JumpIfALTNusng b, .NoMissileLaunch
 125++A493 B8          >                        cp      b
 125++A494 DA A1 A4    >                        jp		c, .NoMissileLaunch
 126++A497 3A 74 7E                             ld      a,(ECMCountDown)
 127++A49A                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero  .NoMissileLaunch
 127++A49A A7          >                        and     a
 127++A49B C2 A1 A4    >                        jp	    nz,.NoMissileLaunch
 128++A49E C3 C5 61                             jp    LaunchEnemyMissile                ; jump out and return if firing missile
 129++A4A1 3A 21 C0     .NoMissileLaunch:       ld      a,(UBnKxhi)
 130++A4A4 2A 24 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKyhi)
 131++A4A7 B6                                   or      (hl)
 132++A4A8 2A 27 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKzhi)
 133++A4AB B6                                   or      (hl)
 134++A4AC                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 160, .TooFarForLaser   ; if in laser range (all highs order together < 160)
 134++A4AC FE A0       >                        cp     160
 134++A4AE D2 D5 A4    >                        jp		nc,.TooFarForLaser
 135++A4B1 CD 85 A6                             call    XX12EquTacticsDotNosev
 136++A4B4 47                                   ld      b,a
 137++A4B5 3A 61 7F                             ld      a,(varS)
 138++A4B8                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero .TooFarForLaser        ;   if dot product of ship < 160 i.e. > -32
 138++A4B8 A7          >                        and     a
 138++A4B9 C2 D5 A4    >                        jp	    nz,.TooFarForLaser
 139++A4BC 78                                   ld      a,b                            ;    .
 140++A4BD                                      JumpIfALTNusng    32, .DoneLaserShot  ;    .
 140++A4BD FE 20       >                        cp      32
 140++A4BF DA D0 A4    >                        jp		c, .DoneLaserShot

 142++A4C2 78                                   ld      a,b ;; need to see if b gets corrupted by laser fire
 143++A4C3                                      JumpIfAEqNusng      35, .LaserHitPlayer
 143++A4C3 FE 23       >                        cp     35
 143++A4C5 CA D0 A4    >                        jp      z,.LaserHitPlayer
 144++A4C8                                      JumpIfAEqNusng      36, .LaserHitPlayer
 144++A4C8 FE 24       >                        cp     36
 144++A4CA CA D0 A4    >                        jp      z,.LaserHitPlayer
 145++A4CD C3 D0 A4     .LaserMissedPlayer:     jp      .DoneLaserShot
 146++A4D0              .LaserHitPlayer:        ;break ;         do direct hit logic
 147++A4D0 21 48 C0     .DoneLaserShot:         ld      hl,UBnKAccel                   ;      Half attacking ship's accelleration in byte 28 (dec so must be 0 1 or 2)
 148++A4D3 CB 26                                sla     (hl)
 149++A4D5              .TooFarForLaser:

 152++A4D8 3A 27 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzhi)

 153++A4DB FE 03       >                        cp     3
 153++A4DD D2 EB A4    >                        jp		nc,.ShipFarAway

 155++A4E3 2A 24 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKyhi)
 156++A4E6 B6                                   or      (hl)
 157++A4E7 E6 FE                                and     %11111110
 158++A4E9 28 26                                jr      z,.ShipTurnAway
 159++A4EB 3A 56 7E     .ShipFarAway:           ld      a,(RandomSeed2)                     ; if random with bit 7 set < ship AI byte 32 flag
 160++A4EE                                      ;or      %10000000               ; .
 161++A4EE                                      JumpIfAGTEMemusng UBnKShipAggression, .ShipTurnAway
 161++A4EE 21 54 C0    >                        ld      hl,UBnKShipAggression
 161++A4F1 BE          >                        cp      (hl)
 161++A4F2 D2 11 A5    >                        jp		nc,.ShipTurnAway
 162++A4F5                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorX+2                ; negate vector in XX15 so it points opposite direction
 162++A4F5 3A 86 A0    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorX+2)
 162++A4F8 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 162++A4FA 32 86 A0    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 163++A4FD                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorY+2                ; we have already negated the dot product above
 163++A4FD 3A 8A A0    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorY+2)
 163++A500 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 163++A502 32 8A A0    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 164++A505                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorZ+2                ; .
 164++A505 3A 8E A0    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)
 164++A508 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 164++A50A 32 8E A0    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorZ+2),a

 167++A511 CD 15 A5     .ShipTurnAway:          call    ShipSeekingLogic            ; move away (ie.. as per missile but dot products not reversed)
 168++A514                                      ;              consider a random roll
 169++A514 C9                                   ret
 170++A515
 171++A515 CD 85 A6     ShipSeekingLogic:       call    XX12EquTacticsDotNosev              ; SA = nose . XX15                           (     ->TAS3)
 172++A518 32 47 A0                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct1),a              ; CNT = A (high byte of dot product)
 173++A51B 3A 61 7F                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; get sign from dot product
 174++A51E 32 4B A0                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 175++A521 CD DB A6     .RoofDotProduct:        call    XX12EquTacticsDotRoofv              ; Now tran the roof for rotation
 176++A524 32 4A A0                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2),a              ; so if its +ve then the roof is similar so pull up to head towards it
 177++A527 3A 61 7F                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; .
 178++A52A 32 4B A0                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 179++A52D CD 37 A5                             call    ShipPitchv3
 180++A530 CD 5B A5                             call    ShipRollv3
 181++A533 CD 89 A5                             call    ShipSpeedv3
 182++A536 C9                                   ret
 183++A537
 184++A537 2A 4A A0     ShipPitchv3:            ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct2)            ; pitch counter sign = opposite sign to roofdir sign
 185++A53A 7C                                   ld      a,h                                ; .
 186++A53B EE 80                                xor     $80                                ; .
 187++A53D E6 80                                and     $80                                ; .
 188++A53F 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h  = flipped sign
 189++A540 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = value * 2
 190++A541 CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 191++A543                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16, .skipPitchZero         ; if its > 16 then update pitch
 191++A543 FE 10       >                        cp     16
 191++A545 D2 51 A5    >                        jp		nc,.skipPitchZero
 192++A548                                      ZeroA                                      ; else we zero pitch but
 192++A548 AF          >                        xor a
 193++A549 B4                                   or      h                                  ; we need to retain the sign
 194++A54A 32 4A C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a                ; .
 195++A54D                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 196++A54D 32 D7 A0                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 197++A550                                      ENDIF
 198++A550 C9                                   ret
 199++A551 3E 02        .skipPitchZero:         ld      a,2
 200++A553 B4                                   or      h
 201++A554 32 4A C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 202++A557                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 203++A557 32 D7 A0                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 204++A55A                                      ENDIF
 205++A55A C9                                   ret
 206++A55B
 207++A55B CD E1 A6     ShipRollv3:             call    XX12EquTacticsDotSidev             ; calculate side dot protuct
 208++A55E 32 4D A0                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3),a             ; .
 209++A561 6F                                   ld      l,a                                ; .
 210++A562 3A 61 7F                             ld      a,(varS)                           ; .
 211++A565 32 4E A0                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3+1),a           ; .
 212++A568 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h = sign sidev
 213++A569 3A 4B A0                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2+1)           ; get flipped pitch counter sign
 214++A56C 47                                   ld      b,a                                ; b = roof product
 215++A56D 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = abs sidev  * 2
 216++A56E CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 217++A570                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16,.skipRollZero           ;
 217++A570 FE 10       >                        cp     16
 217++A572 D2 7E A5    >                        jp		nc,.skipRollZero
 218++A575                                      ZeroA                                      ; if its zoer then set rotx to zero
 218++A575 AF          >                        xor a
 219++A576 B0                                   or      b
 220++A577 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 221++A57A                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 222++A57A 32 D5 A0                                 ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 223++A57D                                      ENDIF
 224++A57D C9                                   ret
 225++A57E 3E 02        .skipRollZero:          ld      a,2
 226++A580 B4                                   or      h
 227++A581 A8                                   xor     b
 228++A582 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 229++A585                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 230++A585 32 D5 A0                                 ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 231++A588                                      ENDIF
 232++A588 C9                                   ret
 233++A589
 234++A589 2A 47 A0     ShipSpeedv3:            ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)
 235++A58C 7C                                   ld      a,h
 236++A58D A7                                   and     a
 237++A58E 20 13                                jr      nz,.SlowDown
 238++A590 ED 5B 4A A0                          ld      de,(TacticsDotProduct2)             ; dot product is +ve so heading at each other
 239++A594 7D                                   ld      a,l
 240++A595                                      JumpIfALTNusng  22,.SlowDown                                  ; nose dot product <
 240++A595 FE 16       >                        cp      22
 240++A597 DA A3 A5    >                        jp		c, .SlowDown
 241++A59A 3E 03        .Accelerate:            ld      a,3                                 ; else
 242++A59C 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a                       ;  accelleration = 3
 243++A59F                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 244++A59F 32 D9 A0                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 245++A5A2                                      ENDIF
 246++A5A2 C9                                   ret                                         ;  .
 247++A5A3              .SlowDown:              JumpIfALTNusng 18, .NoSpeedChange
 247++A5A3 FE 12       >                        cp      18
 247++A5A5 DA B1 A5    >                        jp		c, .NoSpeedChange
 248++A5A8 3E FF        .Deccelerate:           ld      a,-1
 249++A5AA 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 250++A5AD                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 251++A5AD 32 D9 A0                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 252++A5B0                                      ENDIF
 253++A5B0 C9                                   ret
 254++A5B1              .NoSpeedChange:         ZeroA                                       ; else no change
 254++A5B1 AF          >                        xor a
 255++A5B2 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 256++A5B5                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 257++A5B5 32 D9 A0                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 258++A5B8                                      ENDIF
 259++A5B8 C9                                   ret

 354++A5B9              ;;;                        ld      h,a                                ; h  = flipped sign
 355++A5B9              ;;;                        ld      a,l                                ; a = value * 2
 356++A5B9              ;;;                        sla     a                                  ;
 357++A5B9              ;;;                        JumpIfAGTENusng RAT2, .skipPitchZero         ; if its > 16 then update pitch
 358++A5B9              ;;;                        ZeroA                                      ; else we zero pitch but
 359++A5B9              ;;;                        or      h                                  ; we need to retain the sign
 360++A5B9              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a                ; .
 361++A5B9              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 362++A5B9              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 363++A5B9              ;;;                        ENDIF
 364++A5B9              ;;;                        ret
 365++A5B9              ;;;.skipPitchZero:         ld      a,l
 366++A5B9              ;;;                        or      h
 367++A5B9              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 368++A5B9              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 369++A5B9              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 370++A5B9              ;;;                        ENDIF
 371++A5B9              ;;;                        ret
 372++A5B9              ;;;
 373++A5B9              ;;;
 374++A5B9              ;;;                        ;
 375++A5B9              ;;;ShipRoll:               call    XX12EquTacticsDotSidev             ; calculate side dot protuct
 376++A5B9              ;;;                        ld      (TacticsDotProduct3),a             ; .
 377++A5B9              ;;;                        ld      l,a                                ; .
 378++A5B9              ;;;                        ld      a,(varS)                           ; .
 379++A5B9              ;;;                        ld      (TacticsDotProduct3+1),a           ; .
 380++A5B9              ;;;                        ld      h,a                                ; h = sign sidev
 381++A5B9              ;;;                        ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2+1)           ; get flipped pitch counter sign
 382++A5B9              ;;;                        ld      b,a                                ; b = roof product
 383++A5B9              ;;;                        ld      a,l                                ; a = abs sidev  * 2
 384++A5B9              ;;;                        sla     a                                  ;
 385++A5B9              ;;;                        JumpIfAGTENusng RAT2,.skipRollZero           ;
 386++A5B9              ;;;                        ZeroA                                      ; if its zoer then set rotx to zero
 387++A5B9              ;;;                        or      b
 388++A5B9              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 389++A5B9              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 390++A5B9              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 391++A5B9              ;;;                        ENDIF
 392++A5B9              ;;;                        ret
 393++A5B9              ;;;.skipRollZero:          ld      a,1
 394++A5B9              ;;;                        or      h
 395++A5B9              ;;;                        xor     b
 396++A5B9              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 397++A5B9              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 398++A5B9              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 399++A5B9              ;;;                        ENDIF
 400++A5B9              ;;;                        ret
 401++A5B9              ;;;
 402++A5B9              ;;;ShipSpeed:              ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)
 403++A5B9              ;;;                        ld      a,h
 404++A5B9              ;;;                        and     a
 405++A5B9              ;;;                        jr      nz,.SlowDown
 406++A5B9              ;;;                        ld      de,(TacticsDotProduct2)             ; dot product is +ve so heading at each other
 407++A5B9              ;;;                        ld      a,l
 408++A5B9              ;;;                        JumpIfALTNusng  22,.SlowDown                                  ; nose dot product <
 409++A5B9              ;;;.Accelerate:            ld      a,3                                 ; else
 410++A5B9              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKAccel),a                       ;  accelleration = 3
 411++A5B9              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 412++A5B9              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 413++A5B9              ;;;                        ENDIF
 414++A5B9              ;;;                        ret                                         ;  .
 415++A5B9              ;;;.SlowDown:              JumpIfALTNusng 18, .NoSpeedChange
 416++A5B9              ;;;.Deccelerate:           ld      a,-1
 417++A5B9              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 418++A5B9              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 419++A5B9              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 420++A5B9              ;;;                        ENDIF
 421++A5B9              ;;;                        ret
 422++A5B9              ;;;.NoSpeedChange:         ZeroA                                       ; else no change
 423++A5B9              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 424++A5B9              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 425++A5B9              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 426++A5B9              ;;;                        ENDIF
 427++A5B9              ;;;                        ret
 428++A5B9
# file closed: ./GameEngine/../GameEngine/NormalAI.asm
 282+ A5B9
 283+ A5B9              ; On Entry A = TacticsDotProduct2 sign (i.e. roof direction)
 284+ A5B9              ; on exit a == new roll
 285+ A5B9 EE 80        calcNPitch:             xor     SignOnly8Bit                    ; c = sign flipped of dot product only
 286+ A5BB E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                    ; .
 287+ A5BD 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ; . (varT in effect)
 288+ A5BE F6 03                                or      MISSILEMAXPITCH                 ; a = flipped sign max pitch
 289+ A5C0 3A 4A C0                             ld      a,(UBnKRotZCounter)             ; b = abs (currentz pitch)
 290+ A5C3 C9                                   ret
 291+ A5C4
 292+ A5C4 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                    ; . which will initially be 0
 293+ A5C6 47                                   ld      b,a                             ; .
 294+ A5C7 3A 4A A0                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2)          ; a = abs roof dot product
 295+ A5CA                                      JumpIfALTNusng MISSILEMAXPITCH+1, .calcNPitch2    ; if a >= roll threshold
 295+ A5CA FE 04       >                        cp      MISSILEMAXPITCH+1
 295+ A5CC DA D9 A5    >                        jp		c, .calcNPitch2
 296+ A5CF 78                                   ld      a,b
 297+ A5D0 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 298+ A5D2                                      ;jr      z,.NPitchPositive
 299+ A5D2                                     ; ld      a,
 300+ A5D2 3E 03                                ld      a,MISSILEMAXPITCH                         ;    z rot = z rot * dot product flipped sign
 301+ A5D4 B1                                   or      c                               ;    i.e. zrot = current magnitude but dot product sign flipped
 302+ A5D5 32 4A C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a             ;    .
 303+ A5D8 C9                                   ret                                     ; else (a LT current abs z)
 304+ A5D9 B1           .calcNPitch2:           or      c                               ;     rot z = dot product with sign flipped
 305+ A5DA 32 4A C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a             ;
 306+ A5DD C9                                   ret                                     ;
 307+ A5DE
 308+ A5DE 3A 4A C0     calcNRoll:              ld      a,(UBnKRotZCounter)
 309+ A5E1 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 310+ A5E3 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                    ; flip sign of dot product
 311+ A5E5 F6 05                                or      5
 312+ A5E7 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 313+ A5EA C9                                   ret
 314+ A5EB
 315+ A5EB 4F                                   ld      c,a
 316+ A5EC F6 03                                or      MISSILEMAXPITCH
 317+ A5EE 3A 49 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKRotXCounter)
 318+ A5F1 C9                                   ret
 319+ A5F2
 320+ A5F2
 321+ A5F2
 322+ A5F2 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                    ; get ABS value
 323+ A5F4 47                                   ld      b,a
 324+ A5F5 3A 4A A0                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2)          ; now we have the dot product abs value
 325+ A5F8                                      JumpIfALTNusng MISSILEMAXROLL+1, .calcNRoll2
 325+ A5F8 FE 04       >                        cp      MISSILEMAXROLL+1
 325+ A5FA DA 04 A6    >                        jp		c, .calcNRoll2
 326+ A5FD 3E 03                                ld      a,MISSILEMAXROLL
 327+ A5FF B1                                   or      c
 328+ A600 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 329+ A603 C9                                   ret
 330+ A604 B1           .calcNRoll2:            or      c                               ;     rot z = dot product with sign flipped
 331+ A605 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 332+ A608 C9                                   ret

 335+ A609 21 2B C0     CopyRotSideToTacticsMat:ld      hl,UBnkrotmatSidevX+1
 336+ A60C C3 18 A6                             jp      CopyRotmatToTacticsMat
 337+ A60F
 338+ A60F 21 37 C0     CopyRotNoseToTacticsMat:ld      hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX+1
 339+ A612 C3 18 A6                             jp      CopyRotmatToTacticsMat
 340+ A615
 341+ A615 21 31 C0     CopyRotRoofToTacticsMat:ld      hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1
 342+ A618              ; Coy rotation matrix high byte to trans rot mat, strip off sign and separate to rotmat byte 2
 343+ A618 11 68 A0     CopyRotmatToTacticsMat: ld      de,TacticsRotMatX
 344+ A61B 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)              ; matrix high byte of x
 345+ A61C 47                                   ld      b,a
 346+ A61D E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 347+ A61F 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat value
 348+ A620 13                                   inc     de
 349+ A621 78                                   ld      a,b
 350+ A622 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 351+ A624 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat sign
 352+ A625 13                                   inc     de                  ; move to next rot mat element
 353+ A626 23                                   inc     hl
 354+ A627 23                                   inc     hl                  ; matrix high byte of y
 355+ A628 7E           .processYElement:       ld      a,(hl)              ; matrix high byte of y
 356+ A629 47                                   ld      b,a
 357+ A62A E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 358+ A62C 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat value
 359+ A62D 13                                   inc     de
 360+ A62E 78                                   ld      a,b
 361+ A62F E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 362+ A631 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat sign
 363+ A632 13                                   inc     de                  ; move to next rot mat element
 364+ A633 23                                   inc     hl
 365+ A634 23                                   inc     hl                  ; matrix high byte of z
 366+ A635 7E           .ProcessZElement:       ld      a,(hl)              ; matrix high byte of z
 367+ A636 47                                   ld      b,a
 368+ A637 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 369+ A639 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat value
 370+ A63A 13                                   inc     de
 371+ A63B 78                                   ld      a,b
 372+ A63C E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 373+ A63E 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat sign
 374+ A63F C9                                   ret

 377+ A640              DebugTacticsCopy:

 401+ A683
 402+ A683 00 00        TacticsVarResult        DW 0
 403+ A685 CD 0F A6     XX12EquTacticsDotNosev: call    CopyRotNoseToTacticsMat
 404+ A688 21 68 A0     XX12EquTacticsDotHL:    ld      hl,TacticsRotMatX; UBnkTransmatNosevX    ; ROTMATX HI
 405+ A68B 7E           .CalcXValue:            ld      a,(hl)                              ; DE = RotMatX & Vect X
 406+ A68C 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; .
 407+ A68D 3A 84 A0                             ld      a,(TacticsVectorX)                  ; .
 408+ A690 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; .
 409+ A691 ED 30                                mul                                         ; .
 410+ A693 7A                                   ld      a,d                                 ; S = A = Hi (RotMatX & Vect X)
 411+ A694 32 61 7F                             ld      (varS),a                            ; .
 412+ A697 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 413+ A698 3A 86 A0     .CalcXSign:             ld      a,(TacticsVectorX+2)                ; B  = A = Sign VecX xor sign RotMatX
 414+ A69B AE                                   xor     (hl)                                ; .
 415+ A69C 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; .
 416+ A69D 23           .MoveToY:               inc     hl                                  ; Move on to Y component
 417+ A69E 7E           .CalcYValue:            ld      a,(hl)                              ; D = 0, E = Hi (RotMatY & Vect Y)
 418+ A69F 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; .
 419+ A6A0 3A 88 A0                             ld      a,(TacticsVectorY)                  ; .
 420+ A6A3 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; .
 421+ A6A4 ED 30                                mul     de                                  ; .
 422+ A6A6 5A                                   ld      e,d                                 ; .
 423+ A6A7 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; .
 424+ A6A9 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 425+ A6AA 3A 8A A0     .CalcYSign:             ld      a,(TacticsVectorY+2)                ; c = sign of y_sign * sidev_y
 426+ A6AD AE                                   xor     (hl)                                ;
 427+ A6AE 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ;
 428+ A6AF 23           .MoveToZ:               inc     hl                                  ; Move on to Z component
 429+ A6B0 E5           .AddXandY:              push    hl                                  ; but save HL as we need that
 430+ A6B1 3A 61 7F                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; hl = Hi (RotMatX & Vect X) b= sign
 431+ A6B4 26 00                                ld      h,0                                 ; de = Hi (RotMatY & Vect Y) c= sign
 432+ A6B6 6F                                   ld      l,a                                 ;
 433+ A6B7 CD 33 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ; a(sign) hl = sum
 434+ A6BA 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; b = sign of result
 435+ A6BB 22 83 A6                             ld      (TacticsVarResult),hl               ; save sub in TacticsVarResult
 436+ A6BE E1           .CalcZValue:            pop     hl                                  ; get back to the rotation mat z
 437+ A6BF 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                              ; D = 0, E = Hi (RotMatZ & Vect Z)
 438+ A6C0 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; .
 439+ A6C1 3A 8C A0                             ld      a,(TacticsVectorZ)                  ; .
 440+ A6C4 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; .
 441+ A6C5 ED 30                                mul     de                                  ; .
 442+ A6C7 5A                                   ld      e,d                                 ; .
 443+ A6C8 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; .
 444+ A6CA 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 445+ A6CB 3A 8E A0     .CalcZSign:             ld      a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)
 446+ A6CE AE                                   xor     (hl)
 447+ A6CF 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; Set C to the sign of z_sign * sidev_z
 448+ A6D0 2A 83 A6                             ld      hl, (TacticsVarResult)              ; CHL = x + y, BDE = z products
 449+ A6D3 CD 33 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ; so AHL = X y z products
 450+ A6D6 32 61 7F                             ld      (varS),a                            ; for backwards compatibility
 451+ A6D9 7D                                   ld      a,l                                  ; .
 452+ A6DA C9                                   ret
 453+ A6DB
 454+ A6DB CD 15 A6     XX12EquTacticsDotRoofv: call    CopyRotRoofToTacticsMat
 455+ A6DE C3 88 A6                             jp      XX12EquTacticsDotHL
 456+ A6E1
 457+ A6E1 CD 09 A6     XX12EquTacticsDotSidev: call    CopyRotSideToTacticsMat
 458+ A6E4 C3 88 A6                             jp      XX12EquTacticsDotHL
 459+ A6E7
 460+ A6E7 21 20 C0     CopyToTargetVector:     ld      hl,UBnKxlo
 461+ A6EA 11 74 A0                             ld      de,TacticsTargetX
 462+ A6ED 01 09 00                             ld      bc,9
 463+ A6F0 ED B0                                ldir
 464+ A6F2 C9                                   ret
 465+ A6F3
 466+ A6F3              ; Copies 24 bit XYZ Vector to tactics vectors
 467+ A6F3 2A 20 C0     CopyPosToVector:        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
 468+ A6F6 3A 22 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)
 469+ A6F9                                      ;xor     $80
 470+ A6F9 22 84 A0                             ld      (TacticsVectorX),hl
 471+ A6FC 32 86 A0                             ld      (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 472+ A6FF
 473+ A6FF 2A 23 C0     .CopyY24Bit:            ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
 474+ A702 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
 475+ A705                                      ;xor     $80
 476+ A705 22 88 A0                             ld      (TacticsVectorY),hl
 477+ A708 32 8A A0                             ld      (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 478+ A70B
 479+ A70B 2A 26 C0     .CopyZ24Bit:            ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)
 480+ A70E 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)
 481+ A711                                      ;xor     $80
 482+ A711 22 8C A0                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ),hl
 483+ A714 32 8E A0                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 484+ A717 C9                                   ret
 485+ A718
 486+ A718              SetPlayerAsTarget:      ZeroA
 486+ A718 AF          >                        xor a
 487+ A719 21 74 A0                             ld      hl,TacticsTargetX
 488+ A71C 06 09                                ld      b, 3*3
 489+ A71E 77           .ZeroLoop:              ld      (hl),a                              ; player is always at 0,0,0
 490+ A71F 23                                   inc     hl
 491+ A720 10 FC                                djnz    .ZeroLoop
 492+ A722 C9                                   ret
 493+ A723
 494+ A723 CD 18 A7     CalcVectorToMyShip:     call    SetPlayerAsTarget
 495+ A726 CD F3 A6                             call    CopyPosToVector
 496+ A729                                      ;call    CopyToTargetVector
 497+ A729                                      ;FlipSignMem     TacticsTargetX+2
 498+ A729                                      ;FlipSignMem     TacticsTargetY+2
 499+ A729                                      ;FlipSignMem     TacticsTargetZ+2
 500+ A729 C9                                   ret
 501+ A72A
 502+ A72A ED 5B 74 A0  CalcTargetVector:       ld      de,(TacticsTargetX)                        ; get target ship X
 503+ A72E 3A 76 A0                             ld      a,(TacticsTargetX+2)                       ; and flip sign so we have missile - target
 504+ A731                                      FlipSignBitA
 504+ A731 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
 505+ A733 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
 506+ A734 2A 20 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)                        ; get missile x
 507+ A737 3A 22 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)                        ; get missile x sign
 508+ A73A 47                                   ld      b,a
 509+ A73B CD 33 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 510+ A73E 22 84 A0                             ld      (TacticsVectorX),hl
 511+ A741 32 86 A0                             ld      (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 512+ A744 ED 5B 77 A0  .UpdateTargetingShipY:  ld      de,(TacticsTargetY)
 513+ A748 3A 79 A0                             ld      a,(TacticsTargetY+2)
 514+ A74B                                      FlipSignBitA
 514+ A74B EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
 515+ A74D 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
 516+ A74E 2A 23 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKylo)                        ; get missile x
 517+ A751 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)                        ; get missile x sign
 518+ A754 47                                   ld      b,a
 519+ A755 CD 33 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 520+ A758 22 88 A0                             ld      (TacticsVectorY),hl
 521+ A75B 32 8A A0                             ld      (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 522+ A75E ED 5B 7A A0  .UpdateTargetingShipZ:  ld      de,(TacticsTargetZ)
 523+ A762 3A 7C A0                             ld      a,(TacticsTargetZ+2)
 524+ A765                                      FlipSignBitA
 524+ A765 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
 525+ A767 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
 526+ A768 2A 26 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                        ; get missile x
 527+ A76B 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                        ; get missile x sign
 528+ A76E 47                                   ld      b,a
 529+ A76F CD 33 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 530+ A772 22 8C A0                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ),hl
 531+ A775 32 8E A0                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 532+ A778 C9                                   ret
 533+ A779
 534+ A779              ;-- Now its scaled we can normalise
 535+ A779              ;-- Scale down so that h d &b are zero, then do once again so l e and c are 7 bit
 536+ A779              ;-- use 7 bit mul96 to ensure we don;t get odd maths
 537+ A779 2A 84 A0     NormalizeTactics:       ld      hl, (TacticsVectorX)        ; pull XX15 into registers
 538+ A77C ED 5B 88 A0                          ld      de, (TacticsVectorY)        ; .
 539+ A780 ED 4B 8C A0                          ld      bc, (TacticsVectorZ)        ; .
 540+ A784 7C           .ScaleLoop:             ld      a,h
 541+ A785 B2                                   or      d
 542+ A786 B0                                   or      b
 543+ A787 28 0F                                jr      z,.DoneScaling
 544+ A789                                      ShiftHLRight1
 544+ A789 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 544+ A78B CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 545+ A78D                                      ShiftDERight1
 545+ A78D CB 3A       >			   srl d
 545+ A78F CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 546+ A791                                      ShiftBCRight1
 546+ A791 CB 38       >			   srl b
 546+ A793 CB 19       >			   rr  c
 547+ A795 C3 84 A7                             jp      .ScaleLoop
 548+ A798              .DoneScaling:           ShiftHLRight1                       ; as the values now need to be sign magnitued
 548+ A798 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 548+ A79A CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 549+ A79C                                      ShiftDERight1                       ; e.g. S + 7 bit we need an extra shift
 549+ A79C CB 3A       >			   srl d
 549+ A79E CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 550+ A7A0                                      ShiftBCRight1                       ; now values are in L E C
 550+ A7A0 CB 38       >			   srl b
 550+ A7A2 CB 19       >			   rr  c
 551+ A7A4 E5 D5 C5                             push    hl,,de,,bc                  ; save vecrtor x y and z nwo they are scaled to 1 byte
 552+ A7A7 53                                   ld      d,e                         ; hl = y(e) ^ 2
 553+ A7A8 ED 30                                mul     de                          ; .
 554+ A7AA EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; .
 555+ A7AB 53                                   ld      d,e                         ; de = x(l) ^ 2
 556+ A7AC ED 30                                mul     de                          ; .
 557+ A7AE 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + de
 558+ A7AF 51                                   ld      d,c                         ; de = y(c)^ 2 + x ^ 2
 559+ A7B0 59                                   ld      e,c                         ; .
 560+ A7B1 ED 30                                mul     de                          ; .
 561+ A7B3 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; hl =  y^ 2 + x ^ 2 + z ^ 2
 562+ A7B4 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; fix as hl was holding square
 563+ A7B5 CD A1 92                             call    asm_sqrt                    ; IYH = A = hl = sqrt (de) = sqrt (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2 + z ^ 2)
 564+ A7B8                                      ; add in logic if h is low then use lower bytes for all
 565+ A7B8 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ;
 566+ A7B9 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                       ;
 567+ A7BB 57                                   ld      d,a                         ; D = sqrt
 568+ A7BC C1                                   pop     bc                          ; retrive tacticsvectorz scaled
 569+ A7BD 79                                   ld      a,c                         ; a = scaled byte
 570+ A7BE CD 02 9C                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96Unsg          ; This rountine I think is wrong and retuins bad values
 571+ A7C1 32 8C A0                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ),a          ; z = normalised z
 572+ A7C4 D1                                   pop     de
 573+ A7C5 7B                                   ld      a,e
 574+ A7C6 FD 54                                ld      d,iyh
 575+ A7C8 CD 02 9C                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96Unsg
 576+ A7CB 32 88 A0                             ld      (TacticsVectorY),a
 577+ A7CE E1                                   pop     hl
 578+ A7CF 7D                                   ld      a,l
 579+ A7D0 FD 54                                ld      d,iyh
 580+ A7D2 CD 02 9C                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96Unsg
 581+ A7D5 32 84 A0                             ld      (TacticsVectorX),a
 582+ A7D8                                      ; BODGE FOR NOW
 583+ A7D8                                     ; BODGE FOR NOW
 584+ A7D8                                      ZeroA                              ;; added to help debugging
 584+ A7D8 AF          >                        xor a
 585+ A7D9 32 85 A0                             ld      (TacticsVectorX+1),a       ;; added to help debugging
 586+ A7DC 32 89 A0                             ld      (TacticsVectorY+1),a       ;; added to help debugging
 587+ A7DF 32 8D A0                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ+1),a       ;; added to help debugging
 588+ A7E2                                      SignBitOnlyMem TacticsVectorX+2     ; now upper byte is sign only
 588+ A7E2 3A 86 A0    >                        ld      a, (TacticsVectorX+2)
 588+ A7E5 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 588+ A7E7 32 86 A0    >                        ld      (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 589+ A7EA                                      SignBitOnlyMem TacticsVectorY+2     ; (could move it to lower perhaps later if
 589+ A7EA 3A 8A A0    >                        ld      a, (TacticsVectorY+2)
 589+ A7ED E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 589+ A7EF 32 8A A0    >                        ld      (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 590+ A7F2                                      SignBitOnlyMem TacticsVectorZ+2     ;  its worth it)
 590+ A7F2 3A 8E A0    >                        ld      a, (TacticsVectorZ+2)
 590+ A7F5 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 590+ A7F7 32 8E A0    >                        ld      (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 591+ A7FA C9                                   ret

 797+ A7FB
 798+ A7FB 2A 84 A0     ReduceTacticVectors:ld      hl, (TacticsVectorX)        ; pull XX15 into registers
 799+ A7FE ED 5B 88 A0                      ld      de, (TacticsVectorY)        ; .
 800+ A802 ED 4B 8C A0                      ld      bc, (TacticsVectorZ)        ; .
 801+ A806 3A 86 A0                         ld      a,(TacticsVectorX+2)        ; .
 802+ A809 FD 67                            ld      iyh,a                       ; iyh = X sign
 803+ A80B 3A 8A A0                         ld      a,(TacticsVectorY+2)        ; .
 804+ A80E FD 6F                            ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = Y sign
 805+ A810 3A 8E A0                         ld      a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)        ; .
 806+ A813 DD 67                            ld      ixh,a                       ; ixh = z sign
 807+ A815 FD B4        .ScaleLoop:         or      iyh                         ; now check if upper has value
 808+ A817 FD B5                            or      iyl                         ; .
 809+ A819                                  ClearSignBitA                       ;  exluding sign bit
 809+ A819 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
 810+ A81B 28 21                            jr      z,.DoneScaling              ; and exit loop if upper byte is only sign component
 811+ A81D FD 7C        .ScaledDownBy2:     ld      a,iyh
 812+ A81F CB 2F                            sra     a
 813+ A821 FD 67                            ld      iyh,a                       ; actually we can keep sign bit so just sr then rr
 814+ A823 CB 1C                            rr      h                           ; Deal with X
 815+ A825 CB 1D                            rr      l                           ;
 816+ A827 FD 7D                            ld      a,iyl
 817+ A829 CB 2F                            sra     a                           ; actually we can keep sign bit so just sr then rr
 818+ A82B FD 6F                            ld      iyl,a
 819+ A82D CB 1A                            rr      d                           ; Deal with Y
 820+ A82F CB 1B                            rr      e                           ;
 821+ A831 DD 7D                            ld      a, ixl                      ; actually we can keep sign bit so just sr then rr
 822+ A833 CB 2F                            sra     a
 823+ A835 DD 6F                            ld      ixl,a
 824+ A837 CB 18                            rr      b                           ; Deal with Z
 825+ A839 CB 19                            rr      c                           ;
 826+ A83B C3 15 A8                         jp      .ScaleLoop
 827+ A83E 7C           .DoneScaling:       ld      a,h
 828+ A83F B2                               or      d
 829+ A840 B0                               or      b
 830+ A841                                  SignBitOnlyA                        ; check if new sign bit has a value rotated in,
 830+ A841 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 831+ A843 28 0C                            jr      z,.OKToNormalise
 832+ A845              .ShiftTo15Bit:      ShiftHLRight1                       ; one last shift to 15 bit we don't need
 832+ A845 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 832+ A847 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 833+ A849                                  ShiftDERight1                       ; to do sign bytes
 833+ A849 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 833+ A84B CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 834+ A84D                                  ShiftBCRight1                       ; as value must be 0
 834+ A84D CB 38       >			   srl b
 834+ A84F CB 19       >			   rr  c
 835+ A851 7C           .OKToNormalise:     ld      a,h                         ; iyh now can only hold sign
 836+ A852 FD B4                            or      iyh                         ; so by the end of here
 837+ A854 67                               ld      h,a                         ;   hl = x
 838+ A855 7A                               ld      a,d                         ;   de = y
 839+ A856 FD B5                            or      iyl                         ;   bc = z
 840+ A858 57                               ld      d,a                         ; all scaled to 15 bit + sign
 841+ A859 78                               ld      a,b                         ;
 842+ A85A DD B4                            or      ixh                         ;
 843+ A85C 47                               ld      b,a                         ;
 844+ A85D 22 94 A0                         ld      (TacticsNormX),hl
 845+ A860 22 98 A0                         ld      (TacticsNormY),hl
 846+ A863 22 9C A0                         ld      (TacticsNormZ),hl
 847+ A866 C9                               ret
 848+ A867                                 ; ***SIgn bits*** need to be in byte 3
 849+ A867

  21+ A867              ; Success 1 = default drive, carry reset
  22+ A867              ; Failure HL = -1 , carry set, errno set
  23+ A867 F5 C5 D5 E5  GetDefaultDrive:        push	af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix
  23+ A86B DD E5
  24+ A86D AF                                   xor	    a	; a = 0 means get default drive into A
  25+ A86E CF                                   rst	    $08
  26+ A86F 89                                   db	    M_GETSETDRV

  28+ A877 C1 F1
