  70+ A87A 3A 05 A9     fOpen:	                ld	    a,(DefaultDrive); default drive must be called before we start
  71+ A87D CF                                   rst	    $08
  72+ A87E 9A                                   db	    F_OPEN
  73+ A87F 32 06 A9                             ld      (FileHandle),a  ; make a local copy of last file opened
  74+ A882 38 01                                jr      c,.FileOpenError
  75+ A884 C9                                   ret
  76+ A885 C3 85 A8     .FileOpenError:         jp      .FileOpenError
  77+ A888
  78+ A888              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  79+ A888              ;	Function	refills the buffer map with card addresses for the file
  80+ A888              ;	In:		a  = file handle (if calling fRefill_mapA)
  81+ A888              ;           ix = address of filemap_buffer (if calling fRefill_mapA)
  82+ A888              ;           de = filemap size (which should equal 4 in our case)
  83+ A888              ;			bc  = amount to read
  84+ A888              ;	ret:		carry set = error
  85+ A888              ;               zero set  = no data loaded so still error
  86+ A888              ;   you can use fRefill_map to pull default valuess
  87+ A888              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  88+ A888              ;fRefill_map:            ld      a,(FileHandle)
  89+ A888              ;                        ld      ix,FilemapBuffer
  90+ A888              ;                        ld      de,FILEMAP_SIZE
  91+ A888              ;fRefill_mapA:           rst     $08
  92+ A888              ;                        db      DISK_FILEMAP
  93+ A888              ;.SetFlags:              ld      (CardFlags),a                   ; set up adressing mode flags  bit 0=card id (0 or 1) bit 1=0 for byte addressing, 1 for block addressing
  94+ A888              ;.CheckForEntries:       ld      (FilemapBufferLast),hl          ; save last entry address +2
  95+ A888              ;                        ld      de,FilemapBuffer
  96+ A888              ;                        sbc     hl,de                           ; hl = number of entries found
  97+ A888              ;                        ld      a,$ff
  98+ A888              ;                        ret
  99+ A888              ;
 100+ A888              ;read_stream_block:      ld      hl,(FilemapBufferPointer)
 101+ A888              ;                        ldBCDEatHL                              ; load the disk address
 102+ A888              ;                        push    bc                              ; into IXDE
 103+ A888              ;                        pop     ix                              ; now IXDE = card address
 104+ A888              ;                        ldBCatHL                                ; bc = number of blocks to be read
 105+ A888              ;                        ld      (FilemapBlockCount),bc
 106+ A888              ;                        ret
 107+ A888              ; Start up stream of data
 108+ A888              ; If successful, the call returns with:
 109+ A888              ; B=protocol: 0=SD/MMC, 1=IDE,  C=data port
 110+ A888              ; NOTE: On the Next, these values will always be: B=0 C=$EB
 111+ A888              ;fStream_start:          ld      hl,FilemapBuffer                ; set to head of filemap
 112+ A888              ;                        ld      (FilemapBufferPointer),hl       ; .
 113+ A888              ;                        ZeroA
 114+ A888              ;                        ld      (FilereadsPerformed),a
 115+ A888              ;                        call    read_stream_block
 116+ A888              ;                        ld      a,(CardFlags)                   ; get card flags back
 117+ A888              ;                        rst     $08
 118+ A888              ;                        DB      DISK_STRMSTART                  ; start up stream
 119+ A888              ;                        ld      (FileStreamPort),bc             ; save port information (even through it will not change on a next)
 120+ A888              ;                        ret
 121+ A888
 122+ A888              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 123+ A888              ;	Function	stream in a block of data to memory
 124+ A888              ;	In:		ix  = address to read into
 125+ A888              ;			bc  = amount to read
 126+ A888              ;	ret:		carry set = error
 127+ A888              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 128+ A888              ;fStream_block:          ld      ix,FileBuffer
 129+ A888              ;                        ld      a,(CardFlags)
 130+ A888              ;                        ld      bc,(FileStreamPort)
 131+ A888              ;                        ld      hl,FileBuffer
 132+ A888              ;                        ld      (FilemapBufferPointer),hl
 133+ A888              ;.StreamLoop:            ld      b,0
 134+ A888              ;                        ld      a,(TargetSize+1)
 135+ A888              ;                        cp      2
 136+ A888              ;                        jr      c,.stream_partial_block
 137+ A888              ;.StreamFullBlock:       inir                                ; read 256 bytes to hl
 138+ A888              ;                        inir                                ; read 256 bytes to hl+256
 139+ A888              ;                        dec     b                           ; update byte count
 140+ A888              ;                        dec     b                           ; .
 141+ A888              ;                        ld      hl,TargetSize               ; 512 bytes read
 142+ A888              ;                        ld      de,512
 143+ A888              ;                        ClearCarryFlag
 144+ A888              ;                        sbc     hl,de
 145+ A888              ;                        ld      (TargetSize),hl
 146+ A888              ;                        ld      a,(FileStreamPort+1)        ; get the protocol
 147+ A888              ;                        and     a
 148+ A888              ;                        jr      nz,.protocol_ide            ; we arn't using but for compatibility
 149+ A888              ;.protocol_sdmmc:        in      a,(c)                       ; for sd and mmc, read in the 2 byte CRC
 150+ A888              ;                        nop                                 ; as the max performance of the interface is
 151+ A888              ;                        nop                                 ; 16T per byte, no ops pad out operation
 152+ A888              ;                        in      a,(c)
 153+ A888              ;                        nop
 154+ A888              ;                        nop
 155+ A888              ;.wait_for_next_block:   in      a,(c)                       ; if wait token is not FF then we are read
 156+ A888              ;                        cp      $FF
 157+ A888              ;                        jr      z,.wait_for_next_block
 158+ A888              ;                        cp      $FE                         ; if not and its not FE its a fault
 159+ A888              ;                        jr      nz,.token_error
 160+ A888              ;.protocol_ide:          ld      de,(TargetSize)             ; Any more bytes required
 161+ A888              ;                        ld      a,d
 162+ A888              ;                        or      e
 163+ A888              ;                        jr      z,.streaming_complete
 164+ A888              ;                        ret
 165+ A888              ;.stream_partial_block:  and     a                           ; is block at least 256 bytes?
 166+ A888              ;                        jr      z,.under256_bytes
 167+ A888              ;                        inir                                ; get 256 bytes
 168+ A888              ;.under256_bytes:        ld      b,e
 169+ A888              ;                        inc     b
 170+ A888              ;                        dec     b
 171+ A888              ;                        jr      z,.streaming_complete
 172+ A888              ;                        inir
 173+ A888              ;.streaming_complete:    ld      a,(CardFlags)
 174+ A888              ;                        rst     $08
 175+ A888              ;                        DB      DISK_STRMEND
 176+ A888              ;                        ld      a,(FileHandle)
 177+ A888              ;                        call    fClose
 178+ A888              ;                        ret
 179+ A888              ;.token_error:           jp      .token_error
 180+ A888              ;
 181+ A888              ;
 182+ A888              ;fOpenReadFile:          ld      (TargetSize),bc
 183+ A888              ;                        call    disable_multiface
 184+ A888              ;                        call    fOpen_read_exists
 185+ A888              ;.SetupStream:           call    fStream_start
 186+ A888              ;                        jr      c,.FileStreamError
 187+ A888              ;                        ret
 188+ A888              ;
 189+ A888              ;.FileStreamError:       jp      .FileStreamError
 190+ A888              ;
 191+ A888              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 192+ A888              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
 193+ A888              ;	In:		ix  = address to read into
 194+ A888              ;			bc  = amount to read
 195+ A888              ;	ret:		carry set = error
 196+ A888              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 197+ A888 B7           fRead:                  or   	a             ; is it zero?
 198+ A889 C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
 199+ A88A E5                                   push    hl
 200+ A88B DD E5 E1                             ld      hl,ix    	 ; load ix into hl and save hl for later
 201+ A88E CF                                   rst	    $08
 202+ A88F 9D                                   db	    F_READ
 203+ A890 E1                                   pop	    hl
 204+ A891 C9                                   ret
 205+ A892
 206+ A892              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 207+ A892              ;	Function	Write bytes to the open file
 208+ A892              ;	In:		ix  = address to read from
 209+ A892              ;			bc  = amount to write
 210+ A892              ;	ret:		carry set = error
 211+ A892              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 212+ A892 B7           fWrite:                 or   	a             ; is it zero?
 213+ A893 C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
 214+ A894 E5                                   push	hl
 215+ A895 DD E5 E1                             ld      hl,ix
 216+ A898 CF                                   rst	    $08
 217+ A899 9E                                   db	    F_WRITE
 218+ A89A E1                                   pop	    hl
 219+ A89B C9                                   ret
 220+ A89C
 221+ A89C              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 222+ A89C              ;	Function:	Close open file
 223+ A89C              ;	In:		a  = handle
 224+ A89C              ;	ret		a  = handle, 0 on error
 225+ A89C              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 226+ A89C B7           fClose:		            or   	a             ; is it zero?
 227+ A89D C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
 228+ A89E CF                                   rst	    $08
 229+ A89F 9B                                   db	    F_CLOSE
 230+ A8A0 C9                                   ret
 231+ A8A1
 232+ A8A1              ;fSeekHome:              push    bc,,de,,hl,,ix
 233+ A8A1              ;                        ld      bc,0
 234+ A8A1              ;                        ld      de,0
 235+ A8A1              ;                        ld      l,0
 236+ A8A1              ;                        call    fSeek
 237+ A8A1              ;                        pop     bc,,de,,hl,,ix
 238+ A8A1              ;                        ret
 239+ A8A1              ;
 240+ A8A1              ;fSeekForward256:        push    bc,,de,,hl,,ix
 241+ A8A1              ;                        ld      bc,0
 242+ A8A1              ;                        ld      de,256
 243+ A8A1              ;                        ld      l,1
 244+ A8A1              ;                        call    fSeek
 245+ A8A1              ;                        pop     bc,,de,,hl,,ix
 246+ A8A1              ;                        ret
 247+ A8A1
 248+ A8A1              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 249+ A8A1              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
 250+ A8A1              ;	In:		a   = file handle
 251+ A8A1              ;			L   = Seek mode (0=start, 1=rel, 2=-rel)
 252+ A8A1              ;			BCDE = bytes to seek
 253+ A8A1              ;	ret:		BCDE = file pos from start
 254+ A8A1              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 255+ A8A1 DD E5 E5     fSeek:                  push	ix,,hl
 256+ A8A4 CF                                   rst	    $08
 257+ A8A5 9F                                   db	    F_SEEK
 258+ A8A6 E1 DD E1                             pop	    ix,,hl
 259+ A8A9 C9                                   ret
 260+ A8AA
 261+ A8AA              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 262+ A8AA              ; Init the file system
 263+ A8AA              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 264+ A8AA CD 67 A8     InitFileSystem:         call    GetDefaultDrive
 265+ A8AD C9                                   ret
 266+ A8AE
 267+ A8AE              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 268+ A8AE              ; Function:	Load a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
 269+ A8AE              ; In:		hl = file data pointer
 270+ A8AE              ;		    ix = address to load to
 271+ A8AE              ;           bc = filelength
 272+ A8AE              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 273+ A8AE CD 67 A8     FileLoad:	            call    GetDefaultDrive
 274+ A8B1 C5 D5 F5                             push	bc,,de,,af
 275+ A8B4                                      ; get file size
 276+ A8B4 C5 DD E5                             push	bc,,ix			; store size, load address,
 277+ A8B7 E5 DD E1                             ld      ix,hl
 278+ A8BA 06 01                                ld      b,FA_READ		; mode open for reading
 279+ A8BC CD 7A A8                             call    fOpen
 280+ A8BF 38 17                                jr	    c,.error_opening; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 281+ A8C1 FE 00                                cp	    0				; was file handle 0?
 282+ A8C3 28 13                                jr	    z,.error_opening; of so there was an error opening.
 283+ A8C5 DD E1 C1                             pop     bc,,ix          ; get load address back and size back
 284+ A8C8 F5                                   push	af				; remember handle
 285+ A8C9 CD 88 A8                             call	fRead			; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 286+ A8CC 38 0C                                jr	    c,.error_reading
 287+ A8CE F1                                   pop	    af			    ; get handle back
 288+ A8CF CD 9C A8                             call	fClose			; close file
 289+ A8D2 38 07                                jr	    c,.error_closing
 290+ A8D4 F1 D1 C1                             pop     bc,,de,,af      ; normal exit
 291+ A8D7 C9                                   ret
 292+ A8D8              ;
 293+ A8D8              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it
 294+ A8D8              ;
 295+ A8D8 DD E1        .error_opening:         pop	ix
 296+ A8DA C1           .error_reading:		    pop	bc	; don't pop a, need error code
 297+ A8DB
 298+ A8DB              .error_closing:
 299+ A8DB C1           .NormalError:  	        pop	bc	; don't pop into A, return with error code
 300+ A8DC D1                                   pop	de
 301+ A8DD C1                                   pop	bc
 302+ A8DE C9                                   ret
 303+ A8DF
 304+ A8DF              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 305+ A8DF              ; Function:	Save a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
 306+ A8DF              ; In:		hl = file name
 307+ A8DF              ;		    ix = address to save from
 308+ A8DF              ;		    bc = size
 309+ A8DF              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 310+ A8DF CD 67 A8     FileSave:	            call    GetDefaultDrive		; need to do this each time?!?!?
 311+ A8E2 C5 DD E5                             push	bc,,ix   			; store size& save address
 312+ A8E5 E5 DD E1                             ld      ix,hl               ; get name into ix
 313+ A8E8 06 0C                                ld      b,FA_OVERWRITE		; mode open for writing
 314+ A8EA CD 7A A8                             call    fOpen
 315+ A8ED 38 12                                jr	    c,.error_opening	; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 316+ A8EF FE 00                                cp	    0			        ; was file handle 0?
 317+ A8F1 28 0E                                jr	    z,.error_opening	; of so there was an error opening.
 318+ A8F3 DD E1 C1                             pop	    bc,,ix			    ; get lenght and save address back
 319+ A8F6 F5                                   push	af			        ; remember handle
 320+ A8F7 CD 92 A8                             call	fWrite			    ; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 321+ A8FA 38 04                                jr	c,.error
 322+ A8FC F1                                   pop	af			            ; get handle back
 323+ A8FD CD 9C A8                             call	fClose			    ; close file
 324+ A900 C9           .error:                 ret
 325+ A901              ;
 326+ A901              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it
 327+ A901              ;
 328+ A901 DD E1 C1     .error_opening:         pop	bc,,ix                  ; don't pop a, need error code
 329+ A904 C9                                   ret
 330+ A905
 331+ A905 00           DefaultDrive:	        DB	0
 332+ A906 00           FileHandle:             DB  0
 333+ A907 00           CardFlags               DB  0
 334+ A908 00 00        TargetSize              DW  0
 335+ A90A 00 00        FileStreamPort          DW  0
 336+ A90C 00 00 00...  FileBuffer              DS  512                     ; block of data
 337+ AB0C 00           FilereadsPerformed      DB  0
 338+ AB0D 00 00        FilemapBlockCount       DW  0
 339+ AB0F 00 00        FilemapBufferPointer    DW  0
 340+ AB11 00 00        FilemapBufferLast       DW  0
 341+ AB13 00 00 00...  FilemapBuffer           DS  FILEMAP_BLOCK_SIZE * FILEMAP_SIZE        ; expecting 60 to be overkill as most should be 1

 615  B104                              ;(The last DW could just be a DB as it needs to b 257 bytes but its cleaner for source code)
 616  B104
 617  B104 60 00        IR_COUNT        dw  $0060
 618  B106
 619  B106 00           LAST_DELTA      db  0
 620  B107 00           SavedMMU6       db  0
 621  B108 00           SavedMMU7       db  0
 622  B109              SoundInterrupt      EQU IM2Sound
 623  B109              DanubeInterrupt     EQU IM2PlayDanube
 624  B109              AttractInterrrupt   EQU IM2AttractMode
 625  B109
 626  B109
 627  B109              StartOfInterruptHandler:
 628  B109                  DISPLAY "Non Banked Code Ends At", StartOfInterruptHandler
 629  B109
 630  B109                              ; NOTE play then equeue simplifies ligic, more chance slot free
 631  B109                              org $B1B1
 632  B1B1                  DISPLAY "Interrupt Handler Starts at",$
 633  B1B1              ; keeping the handler to a minimal size in order to make best use of
 634  B1B1              ; non pageable memory
 635  B1B1              IM2Routine:             IFDEF INTERRUPT_BLOCKER
 636  B1B1 ~                                            DISPLAY "Interrupt Blocker Enabled"
 637  B1B1 ~                                            ei
 638  B1B1 ~                                            reti
 639  B1B1                                      ELSE
 640  B1B1                                              DISPLAY "Interrupt Blocker Disabled"
 641  B1B1                                      ENDIF
 642  B1B1 F5 C5 D5 E5                          push    af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix,,iy
 642  B1B5 DD E5 FD E5
 643  B1B9 08                                   ex      af,af'
 644  B1BA D9                                   exx
 645  B1BB F5 C5 D5 E5                          push    af,,bc,,de,,hl
 646  B1BF 21 5D 7F                             ld      hl,InterruptCounter
 647  B1C2 34                                   inc     (hl)                        ; cycles each interrupt
 648  B1C3                                      ;break
 649  B1C3 CD D7 B1     IM2SoundHandler:        call    IM2Sound                    ; This is a self modifying code address to change the actual sound vector if we are doing special music e.g. intro or docking
 650  B1C6 E1 D1 C1 F1                          pop    af,,bc,,de,,hl
 651  B1CA 08                                   ex      af,af'
 652  B1CB D9                                   exx
 653  B1CC FD E1 DD E1                          pop     af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix,,iy
 653  B1D0 E1 D1 C1 F1
 654  B1D4 FB           .IMFinishup:            ei
 655  B1D5 ED 4D                                reti
 656  B1D7                  DISPLAY "Interrupt Handler Ends at",$
 657  B1D7              EndOfNonBanked:
 658  B1D7                  DISPLAY "Non Banked Code + Interrupt Handler Ends At", EndOfNonBanked
 659  B1D7
 660  B1D7
 661  B1D7              SaveMMU6:               MACRO
 662  B1D7 ~                                    GetNextReg  MMU_SLOT_6_REGISTER
 663  B1D7 ~                                    ld      (SavedMMU6),a
 664  B1D7                                      ENDM
 665  B1D7
 666  B1D7              RestoreMMU6:            MACRO
 667  B1D7 ~                                    ld      a,(SavedMMU6)               ; now restore up post interrupt
 668  B1D7 ~                                    nextreg MMU_SLOT_6_REGISTER,a       ; Restore MMU7
 669  B1D7                                      ENDM
 670  B1D7
 671  B1D7              SaveMMU7:               MACRO
 672  B1D7 ~                                    GetNextReg  MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
 673  B1D7 ~                                    ld      (SavedMMU7),a
 674  B1D7                                      ENDM
 675  B1D7
 676  B1D7              RestoreMMU7:            MACRO
 677  B1D7 ~                                    ld      a,(SavedMMU7)               ; now restore up post interrupt
 678  B1D7 ~                                    nextreg MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER,a       ; Restore MMU7
 679  B1D7                                      ENDM
 680  B1D7
 681  B1D7              IM2Sound:               SaveMMU7
 681  B1D7             >                        GetNextReg  MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
 681  B1D7 01 3B 24    >            ld bc,$243B
 681  B1DA 3E 57       >            ld a,MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
 681  B1DC ED 79       >            out (c),a
 681  B1DE 04          >            inc b
 681  B1DF ED 78       >            in a,(c)
 681  B1E1 32 08 B1    >                        ld      (SavedMMU7),a
 682  B1E4                                      MMUSelectSound
 682  B1E4 ED 91 57 64 >                     nextreg SoundMMU,		    BankSound
 683  B1E8                                      ; This is a self modifying code address to change the
 684  B1E8                                      ; actual sound vector if we are doing special music
 685  B1E8                                      ; e.g. intro or docking
 686  B1E8 CD 00 E0     .IM2SoundHandler:       call    SoundInterruptHandler       ; this does the work
 687  B1EB              .DoneInterrupt:         RestoreMMU7
 687  B1EB 3A 08 B1    >                        ld      a,(SavedMMU7)               ; now restore up post interrupt
 687  B1EE ED 92 57    >                        nextreg MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER,a       ; Restore MMU7
 688  B1F1 C9                                   ret
 689  B1F2
 690  B1F2
 691  B1F2              IM2PlayDanube:          SaveMMU7
 691  B1F2             >                        GetNextReg  MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
 691  B1F2 01 3B 24    >            ld bc,$243B
 691  B1F5 3E 57       >            ld a,MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
 691  B1F7 ED 79       >            out (c),a
 691  B1F9 04          >            inc b
 691  B1FA ED 78       >            in a,(c)
 691  B1FC 32 08 B1    >                        ld      (SavedMMU7),a
 692  B1FF                                      MMUSelectSound
 692  B1FF ED 91 57 64 >                     nextreg SoundMMU,		    BankSound
 693  B203                                      ; This is a self modifying code address to change the
 694  B203                                      ; actual sound vector if we are doing special music
 695  B203                                      ; e.g. intro or docking
 696  B203 CD 1B E4     .IM2SoundHandler:       call    PlayDanube                  ; this does the work
 697  B206              .DoneInterrupt:         RestoreMMU7
 697  B206 3A 08 B1    >                        ld      a,(SavedMMU7)               ; now restore up post interrupt
 697  B209 ED 92 57    >                        nextreg MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER,a       ; Restore MMU7
 698  B20C C9                                   ret
 699  B20D
 700  B20D              IM2AttractMode:         ;break
 701  B20D                                  IFDEF SKIPATTRACTMUSIC
 702  B20D ~                                    DISPLAY "Attract mode Music disabled"
 703  B20D                                  ELSE
 704  B20D                                      DISPLAY "Attract mode Music enabled"
 705  B20D CD F2 B1                             call    IM2PlayDanube
 706  B210                                  ENDIF
 707  B210                                  IFDEF SKIPATTRACTGRAPHICS
 708  B210 ~                                    DISPLAY "Attract mode graphics disabled"
 709  B210                                  ELSE
 710  B210                                      DISPLAY "Attract mode graphics enabled"
 711  B210                                      SaveMMU6
 711  B210             >                        GetNextReg  MMU_SLOT_6_REGISTER
 711  B210 01 3B 24    >            ld bc,$243B
 711  B213 3E 56       >            ld a,MMU_SLOT_6_REGISTER
 711  B215 ED 79       >            out (c),a
 711  B217 04          >            inc b
 711  B218 ED 78       >            in a,(c)
 711  B21A 32 07 B1    >                        ld      (SavedMMU6),a
 712  B21D                                      SaveMMU7
 712  B21D             >                        GetNextReg  MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
 712  B21D 01 3B 24    >            ld bc,$243B
 712  B220 3E 57       >            ld a,MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
 712  B222 ED 79       >            out (c),a
 712  B224 04          >            inc b
 712  B225 ED 78       >            in a,(c)
 712  B227 32 08 B1    >                        ld      (SavedMMU7),a
 713  B22A                                      ;break
 714  B22A CD C8 78                             call    AttractModeUpdate
 715  B22D                                      RestoreMMU6
 715  B22D 3A 07 B1    >                        ld      a,(SavedMMU6)               ; now restore up post interrupt
 715  B230 ED 92 56    >                        nextreg MMU_SLOT_6_REGISTER,a       ; Restore MMU7
 716  B233                                      RestoreMMU7
 716  B233 3A 08 B1    >                        ld      a,(SavedMMU7)               ; now restore up post interrupt
 716  B236 ED 92 57    >                        nextreg MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER,a       ; Restore MMU7
 717  B239                                  ENDIF
 718  B239 C9                                   ret
 719  B23A
 720  B23A              ; ARCHIVED INCLUDE "Menus/draw_fuel_and_crosshair.asm"
 721  B23A              ;INCLUDE "./title_page.asm"

  33+ C0C2              SRM_print_boiler_text:  INCLUDE "Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C0C2
   2++C0C2              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C0C2 C5           .BoilerTextLoop:        push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   4++C0C3 4E                                   ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   5++C0C4 23                                   inc			hl
   6++C0C5 46                                   ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   7++C0C6 23                                   inc			hl
   8++C0C7 5E                                   ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
   9++C0C8 23                                   inc			hl
  10++C0C9 56                                   ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  11++C0CA 23                                   inc			hl
  12++C0CB E5                                   push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  13++C0CC EB                                   ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  14++C0CD 1E FF                                ld			e,txt_status_colour
  15++C0CF C5                                   push		bc
  16++C0D0 D1                                   pop			de
  17++C0D1                                      MMUSelectLayer1
  17++C0D1 ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  18++C0D5 CD D7 E0                             call		l1_print_at
  19++C0D8 E1                                   pop			hl
  20++C0D9 C1                                   pop			bc
  21++C0DA 10 E6                                djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  22++C0DC C9                                   ret
  23++C0DD
# file closed: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm

  59+ C110                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA

  60+ C113 ED 4B 03 80                          ld      bc,(TargetSystemX)

  71+ C130              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  72+ C130              SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair:
  73+ C130 ED 4B 03 80                          ld		bc,(TargetSystemX)              ; bc = selected jump
  74+ C134 ED 5B 01 80                          ld		de,(PresentSystemX)
  75+ C138 79                                   ld		a,c                             ; a = target x pos
  76+ C139 93                                   sub		e                               ; a = target x - present x
  77+ C13A F2 4B C1                             jp      p,.NoFlipX                      ; if > 0 skip next bit
  78+ C13D ED 44                                neg                                     ; c = a = abs a * 4
  79+ C13F CB 27                                sla		a                               ; .
  80+ C141 CB 27                                sla		a                               ; .
  81+ C143 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ;  .
  82+ C144 3E 80                                ld      a,src_x_centre                  ; c = a = centre screen - c
  83+ C146 91                                   sub     c                               ; .
  84+ C147 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ; .
  85+ C148 C3 52 C1                             jp      .fixY                           ;. now do Y
  86+ C14B CB 27        .NoFlipX:               sla		a
  87+ C14D CB 27                                sla		a
  88+ C14F C6 80                                add		a,src_x_centre
  89+ C151 4F                                   ld      c,a
  90+ C152 78           .fixY:                  ld		a,b                             ; for Y its * 2
  91+ C153 92                                   sub		d
  92+ C154 F2 63 C1                             jp      p,.NoFlipY
  93+ C157 ED 44                                neg
  94+ C159 CB 27                                sla     a
  95+ C15B 47                                   ld      b,a
  96+ C15C 3E 60                                ld      a,src_y_centre
  97+ C15E 90                                   sub     b
  98+ C15F 47                                   ld      b,a
  99+ C160 C3 68 C1                             jp      .RedrawSprite
 100+ C163 CB 27        .NoFlipY                sla		a
 101+ C165 C6 60                                add		a,src_y_centre
 102+ C167 47                                   ld		b,a

 151+ C1CD 3A EE 7F     src_calc_distance:      ld      a,(Galaxy)                                      ; Default in 0 distance
 152+ C1D0                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 152+ C1D0 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,     a
 153+ C1D3 11 24 C0                             ld      de,src_dist_amount
 154+ C1D6 21 36 C0                             ld      hl,src_default_dist
 155+ C1D9 ED A0                                ldi
 156+ C1DB ED A0                                ldi
 157+ C1DD ED A0                                ldi
 158+ C1DF ED A0                                ldi
 159+ C1E1 ED A0                                ldi
 160+ C1E3 ED 4B 01 80                          ld      bc,(PresentSystemX)
 161+ C1E7 ED 43 57 E8                          ld      (GalaxyPresentSystem),bc
 162+ C1EB ED 4B 03 80                          ld      bc,(TargetSystemX)
 163+ C1EF ED 43 59 E8                          ld      (GalaxyDestinationSystem),bc
 164+ C1F3 CD F7 FB                             call    galaxy_find_distance                            ; get distance into HL
 165+ C1F6 DD 2A 23 80                          ld      ix,(Distance)
 166+ C1FA 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
 167+ C1FD FD 21 3B C0                          ld      iy,src_distance_val
 168+ C201 CD 68 9B                             call    DispDEIXtoIY                                    ; use DEIX as distance and write to string at location IY
 169+ C204 FD E5                                push    iy
 170+ C206 E1                                   pop     hl                                              ; hl = iy
 171+ C207 11 3B C0                             ld      de,src_distance_val
 172+ C20A 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)				                            ;Push last digit to post decimal
 173+ C20B 32 28 C0                             ld		(src_fraction),a
 174+ C20E 2B                                   dec     hl
 175+ C20F CD D8 99                             call    compare16HLDE
 176+ C212 38 18                                jr      c,.done_number
 177+ C214 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 178+ C215 32 26 C0                             ld      (src_dist_amount+2),a
 179+ C218 2B                                   dec     hl
 180+ C219 CD D8 99                             call    compare16HLDE
 181+ C21C 38 0E                                jr      c,.done_number
 182+ C21E 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 183+ C21F 32 25 C0                             ld      (src_dist_amount+1),a
 184+ C222 2B                                   dec     hl
 185+ C223 CD D8 99                             call    compare16HLDE
 186+ C226 38 04                                jr      c,.done_number
 187+ C228 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 188+ C229 32 24 C0                             ld      (src_dist_amount),a
 189+ C22C C9           .done_number:           ret
 190+ C22D
 191+ C22D 00 00        PosScan1                DW      0
 192+ C22F 00 00        PosScan2                DW      0
 193+ C231              ; bc = row col, d = xlength e = y length
 194+ C231              ; Check logic simplies to , if 1 = bc and 2 = de:
 195+ C231              ; 12   X1            X2    OK         2 LT X1
 196+ C231              ; 1    X1  2         X2    FAIL       1 LT X1 && 2 GT X1 && 2 LT X2
 197+ C231              ;      X1  12        X2    FAIL       1 GT X1 && 1 LT X2 && 2 GT X1 && 2 LT X2
 198+ C231              ;      X1  1         X2 2  FAIL       1 GT X1 && 1 LT X2 && 2 GT X2
 199+ C231              ;      X1            X2 12 OK         1 GT X2
 200+ C231 16 07        FreeSlotCheck:          ld      d,7
 201+ C233 ED 30                                mul
 202+ C235 79                                   ld      a,c
 203+ C236 83                                   add     e
 204+ C237 30 02                                jr      nc,.NoOverflow
 205+ C239 3E FF        .Overflow:              ld      a,$FF
 206+ C23B 5F           .NoOverflow:            ld      e,a                     ; e now equals max length in pixels
 207+ C23C 78                                   ld      a,b
 208+ C23D C6 08                                add     8
 209+ C23F 57                                   ld      d,a                     ; e = max height
 210+ C240 ED 43 2D C2                          ld      (PosScan1),bc
 211+ C244 ED 53 2F C2                          ld      (PosScan2),de
 212+ C248 DD 21 41 C0  .CheckBoxes:            ld      ix,src_printed_text
 213+ C24C 3A C1 C0                             ld      a,(src_buffer_size)
 214+ C24F FE 00                                cp      0
 215+ C251 28 3C                                jr      z,.SafeToPrint
 216+ C253 60                                   ld      h,b                     ; h will substite for row b as b is used in dnjz
 217+ C254 47                                   ld      b,a
 218+ C255 DD 7E 02     .CheckBoxLoop:          ld      a,(ix+2)
 219+ C258 FE 00                                cp      0                       ; zerolength, not applicable
 220+ C25A 28 29                                jr      z,.NoBox
 221+ C25C 3A 2D C2     .CheckRow:              ld      a,(PosScan1)
 222+ C25F 3C                                   inc     a
 223+ C260                                      JumpIfAGTENusng (ix+2), .NoBox  ; X1 >= BottomLeftX
 223+ C260 DD BE 02    >                        cp     (ix+2)
 223+ C263 D2 85 C2    >                        jp		nc,.NoBox
 224+ C266 3A 2F C2                             ld      a,(PosScan2)
 225+ C269                                      JumpIfALTNusng (ix+0),  .NoBox   ; X2 <= TopRightX
 225+ C269 DD BE 00    >                        cp      (ix+0)
 225+ C26C DA 85 C2    >                        jp		c, .NoBox
 226+ C26F 3A 2E C2     .SafeToPrintX:          ld      a,(PosScan1+1)
 227+ C272 3C                                   inc     a
 228+ C273                                      JumpIfAGTENusng (ix+3), .NoBox  ; Y1 >= BottomLeftY
 228+ C273 DD BE 03    >                        cp     (ix+3)
 228+ C276 D2 85 C2    >                        jp		nc,.NoBox
 229+ C279 3A 30 C2                             ld      a,(PosScan2+1)
 230+ C27C                                      JumpIfALTNusng (ix+1),  .NoBox  ; Y2 <= TopRightY
 230+ C27C DD BE 01    >                        cp      (ix+1)
 230+ C27F DA 85 C2    >                        jp		c, .NoBox
 231+ C282 3E FF        .MatchedBox:            ld      a,$FF
 232+ C284 C9                                   ret
 233+ C285 DD 23        .NoBox:                 inc     ix
 234+ C287 DD 23                                inc     ix
 235+ C289 DD 23                                inc     ix
 236+ C28B DD 23                                inc     ix
 237+ C28D 10 C6                                djnz    .CheckBoxLoop
 238+ C28F 21 41 C0     .SafeToPrint:           ld      hl,src_printed_text
 239+ C292 3A C1 C0                             ld      a,(src_buffer_size)
 240+ C295 57                                   ld      d,a
 241+ C296 1E 04                                ld      e,4
 242+ C298 ED 30                                mul
 243+ C29A 19                                   add     hl,de
 244+ C29B ED 5B 2D C2                          ld      de,(PosScan1)
 245+ C29F 73 23 72 2B                          ld      (hl),de
 246+ C2A3 23                                   inc     hl
 247+ C2A4 23                                   inc     hl
 248+ C2A5 ED 5B 2F C2                          ld      de,(PosScan2)
 249+ C2A9 73 23 72 2B                          ld      (hl),de
 250+ C2AD 21 C1 C0                             ld      hl,src_buffer_size
 251+ C2B0 34                                   inc     (hl)
 252+ C2B1 AF                                   xor     a
 253+ C2B2 C9                                   ret
 254+ C2B3
 255+ C2B3 CD 92 85     src_label_ssytem:       call	copy_system_to_working
 256+ C2B6 3A EE 7F                             ld      a,(Galaxy)
 257+ C2B9                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 257+ C2B9 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,     a
 258+ C2BC CD 82 F6                             call	GetDigramWorkingSeed
 259+ C2BF 21 7E 8F                             ld		hl,name_expanded
 260+ C2C2 CD D3 8E                             call	CapitaliseString
 261+ C2C5 3A 18 C0                             ld		a,(local_name_row)
 262+ C2C8 D6 05                                sub		local_label_shift_y
 263+ C2CA 47                                   ld		b,a					    ; b = effective pixel row
 264+ C2CB 3A 19 C0                             ld		a,(local_name_col)
 265+ C2CE C6 03                                add		a,local_label_shift_x
 266+ C2D0 4F                                   ld		c,a                     ; c = effective pixel col
 267+ C2D1 1E 00        .GetStringName:         ld      e,0
 268+ C2D3 21 7E 8F                             ld      hl,name_expanded
 269+ C2D6 7E           .getStringLoop:         ld      a,(hl)
 270+ C2D7 23                                   inc     hl
 271+ C2D8 1C                                   inc     e
 272+ C2D9 FE 00                                cp      0                       ; String must have a terminator to work
 273+ C2DB 20 F9                                jr      nz,.getStringLoop
 274+ C2DD 16 08                                ld      d,8
 275+ C2DF C5                                   push    bc
 276+ C2E0 CD 31 C2                             call    FreeSlotCheck           ; first attemps
 277+ C2E3 C1                                   pop     bc
 278+ C2E4 FE 00                                cp      0
 279+ C2E6 28 19                                jr      z,.OKToPrint
 280+ C2E8 78                                   ld      a,b
 281+ C2E9 C6 08                                add     8
 282+ C2EB 47                                   ld      b,a
 283+ C2EC C5                                   push    bc
 284+ C2ED CD 31 C2                             call    FreeSlotCheck           ; attempt down 8 pixels attemps
 285+ C2F0 C1                                   pop     bc
 286+ C2F1 FE 00                                cp      0
 287+ C2F3 28 0C                                jr      z,.OKToPrint
 288+ C2F5 78                                   ld      a,b
 289+ C2F6 D6 10                                sub     16
 290+ C2F8 47                                   ld      b,a
 291+ C2F9 C5                                   push    bc
 292+ C2FA CD 31 C2                             call    FreeSlotCheck           ; attempt down 8 pixels attemps
 293+ C2FD C1                                   pop     bc
 294+ C2FE FE 00                                cp      0
 295+ C300 C0                                   ret     nz
 296+ C301 1E FF        .OKToPrint:             ld		e,$FF
 297+ C303 21 7E 8F                             ld		hl,name_expanded
 298+ C306                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 298+ C306 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 299+ C30A CD BE E3                             call	l2_print_7at
 300+ C30D C9                                   ret
 301+ C30E
 302+ C30E              name_if_possible:
 303+ C30E 3A 18 C0     SRCpixelRowToRefRow:    ld		a,(local_name_row)
 304+ C311 D6 05                                sub		local_label_shift_y
 305+ C313 47                                   ld		b,a					; b = effective pixel row
 306+ C314 CB 3F                                srl		a
 307+ C316 CB 3F                                srl		a
 308+ C318 CB 3F                                srl		a					; divide by 8 to get character row
 309+ C31A                                                  DISPLAY "TODO: dont overwrite header"
 310+ C31A                                  ;	sub		2					; don;t write over header TODO tweaks
 311+ C31A 21 28 7F                             ld		hl,IndexedWork
 312+ C31D ED 31                                add		hl,a
 313+ C31F 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)
 314+ C320 FE 00                                cp		0
 315+ C322                                                  DISPLAY "TODO: need to test +- 1 row"
 316+ C322 20 04                                jr		nz, SRCtryAbove		; if its not empty don't print *(need to test +-1 row TODO)
 317+ C324 36 01                                ld		(hl),1				; flag as in use
 318+ C326 18 12                                jr		SRCFoundRow
 319+ C328 2B           SRCtryAbove:            dec		hl
 320+ C329 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)
 321+ C32A FE 00                                cp		0
 322+ C32C                                                  DISPLAY "TODO: need to test +- 1 row"
 323+ C32C 20 04                                jr		nz, SRCtryBelow		; if its not empty don't print *(need to test +-1 row TODO)
 324+ C32E 36 01                                ld		(hl),1				; flag as in use
 325+ C330 18 08                                jr		SRCFoundRow
 326+ C332 23           SRCtryBelow:            inc		hl
 327+ C333 23                                   inc		hl
 328+ C334 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)
 329+ C335 FE 00                                cp		0
 330+ C337 C8                                   ret		z
 331+ C338 36 01                                ld		(hl),1				; flag as in use
 332+ C33A CD 92 85     SRCFoundRow:            call	copy_system_to_working

 335+ C343 CD 82 F6                             call	GetDigramWorkingSeed

 337+ C349 CD D3 8E                             call	CapitaliseString

 339+ C34F 3A 18 C0                             ld		a,(local_name_row)
 340+ C352 D6 05                                sub		local_label_shift_y
 341+ C354 47                                   ld		b,a					; b = effective pixel row

 351+ C366 32 64 7F                             ld		(XSAV),a

 353+ C36D 32 C1 C0                             ld      (src_buffer_size),a
 354+ C370 21 41 C0     SRCClearNameList:       ld		hl,src_printed_text
 355+ C373 11 80 00                             ld		de,src_fill_buffer_size
 356+ C376 CD F0 7D                             call	memfill_dma
 356+ C379
 357+ C379 AF           SRCCounterLoop:         xor		a
 358+ C37A 3A EE 7F                             ld      a,(Galaxy)
 359+ C37D                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA

 360+ C380 DD E5                                push    ix
 361+ C382 DD E5                                push    ix

 363+ C385 11 D7 7F                             ld      de,SystemSeed

 365+ C38B 3A D8 7F                             ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)				; QQ15+1 \ seed Ycoord of star
 366+ C38E 4F                                   ld		c,a
 367+ C38F 3A 02 80     SRCcalcLocaldy:         ld		a,(PresentSystemY)
 368+ C392 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 369+ C393 79                                   ld		a,c
 370+ C394 90                                   sub		b

 372+ C397 28 02                                jr		z,SRCpositivedy
 373+ C399 ED 44        SRCnegativedy:          neg
 374+ C39B FE 26        SRCpositivedy:          cp		local_max_range_y
 375+ C39D 30 48                                jr		nc,SRCtoofar
 376+ C39F 3A DA 7F     SRCcalcLocaldx:         ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)				; QQ15+3 \ seed Xcoord of star
 377+ C3A2 4F                                   ld		c,a
 378+ C3A3 3A 01 80                             ld		a,(PresentSystemX)
 379+ C3A6 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 380+ C3A7 79                                   ld		a,c
 381+ C3A8 90                                   sub		b
 382+ C3A9 CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 383+ C3AB 28 02                                jr		z,SRCpositivedx
 384+ C3AD ED 44        SRCnegativedx:          neg
 385+ C3AF FE 14        SRCpositivedx:          cp		local_max_range_x
 386+ C3B1 30 34                                jr		nc,SRCtoofar
 387+ C3B3 3A D8 7F     SRCOKToPlot             ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)
 388+ C3B6 21 02 80                             ld		hl,PresentSystemY
 389+ C3B9 96                                   sub		(hl)
 390+ C3BA CB 27                                sla		a								; * 2
 391+ C3BC C6 60                                add		src_y_centre

 446+ C45A 3A 4E 81     local_chart_cursors:    ld     a,(CursorKeysPressed)

 461+ C478              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 462+ C478 3A 04 80     src_UpPressed:          ld     a,(TargetSystemY)
 463+ C47B                                      JumpIfAIsZero   src_BoundsLimit
 463+ C47B A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 463+ C47C CA 0F C5    >                        jp	    z, src_BoundsLimit
 464+ C47F 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; save target as we will need it
 465+ C480 3A 02 80                             ld      a,(PresentSystemY)
 466+ C483 90                                   sub     b                           ; get the difference between present and target
 467+ C484 FA 8C C4                             jp      m,.SkipBoundsTest           ; if target is right of present, we can go left
 468+ C487                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 40,src_BoundsLimit  ; if no more than 20 then OK
 468+ C487 FE 28       >                        cp     40
 468+ C489 D2 0F C5    >                        jp		nc,src_BoundsLimit
 469+ C48C 78           .SkipBoundsTest:        ld      a,b
 470+ C48D 3D                                   dec     a
 471+ C48E 32 04 80                             ld      (TargetSystemY),a
 472+ C491 CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 473+ C494 C9                                   ret
 474+ C495              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 475+ C495 3A 02 80     src_DownPressed:        ld     a,(PresentSystemY)
 476+ C498 47                                   ld      b,a
 477+ C499 3A 04 80                             ld      a,(TargetSystemY)
 478+ C49C 4F                                   ld      c,a
 479+ C49D                                      JumpIfAEqNusng 128,src_BoundsLimit
 479+ C49D FE 80       >                        cp     128
 479+ C49F CA 0F C5    >                        jp      z,src_BoundsLimit
 480+ C4A2 90                                   sub     b
 481+ C4A3 FA AB C4                             jp      m,.SkipBoundsTest
 482+ C4A6                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 40,src_BoundsLimit
 482+ C4A6 FE 28       >                        cp     40
 482+ C4A8 D2 0F C5    >                        jp		nc,src_BoundsLimit
 483+ C4AB 79           .SkipBoundsTest:        ld      a,c
 484+ C4AC 3C                                   inc    a
 485+ C4AD 32 04 80                             ld      (TargetSystemY),a
 486+ C4B0 CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 487+ C4B3 C9                                   ret
 488+ C4B4              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 489+ C4B4 3A 03 80     src_LeftPressed:        ld      a,(TargetSystemX)           ; we can't move left if target is zero
 490+ C4B7                                      JumpIfAIsZero   src_BoundsLimit
 490+ C4B7 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 490+ C4B8 CA 0F C5    >                        jp	    z, src_BoundsLimit
 491+ C4BB 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; save target as we will need it
 492+ C4BC 3A 01 80                             ld      a,(PresentSystemX)
 493+ C4BF 90                                   sub     b                           ; get the difference between present and target
 494+ C4C0 FA C8 C4                             jp      m,.SkipBoundsTest           ; if target is right of present, we can go left
 495+ C4C3                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 20,src_BoundsLimit  ; if no more than 20 then OK
 495+ C4C3 FE 14       >                        cp     20
 495+ C4C5 D2 0F C5    >                        jp		nc,src_BoundsLimit
 496+ C4C8 78           .SkipBoundsTest:        ld      a,b
 497+ C4C9 3D                                   dec     a
 498+ C4CA 32 03 80                             ld      (TargetSystemX),a
 499+ C4CD CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 500+ C4D0 C9                                   ret
 501+ C4D1              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 502+ C4D1 3A 01 80     src_RightPressed:       ld      a,(PresentSystemX)
 503+ C4D4 47                                   ld      b,a
 504+ C4D5 3A 03 80                             ld      a,(TargetSystemX)
 505+ C4D8 4F                                   ld      c,a
 506+ C4D9                                      JumpIfAEqNusng 255,src_BoundsLimit
 506+ C4D9 FE FF       >                        cp     255
 506+ C4DB CA 0F C5    >                        jp      z,src_BoundsLimit
 507+ C4DE 90                                   sub     b
 508+ C4DF FA E7 C4                             jp      m,.SkipBoundsTest
 509+ C4E2                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 20,src_BoundsLimit
 509+ C4E2 FE 14       >                        cp     20
 509+ C4E4 D2 0F C5    >                        jp		nc,src_BoundsLimit
 510+ C4E7 79           .SkipBoundsTest:        ld      a,c
 511+ C4E8 3C                                   inc    a
 512+ C4E9 32 03 80                             ld      (TargetSystemX),a
 513+ C4EC CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 514+ C4EF C9                                   ret
 515+ C4F0              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 516+ C4F0 2A 01 80     src_HomePressed:        ld      hl,(PresentSystemX)
 517+ C4F3 22 03 80                             ld      (TargetSystemX),hl
 518+ C4F6 CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 519+ C4F9 C9                                   ret
 520+ C4FA              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 521+ C4FA 3A EE 7F     src_RecenterPressed:    ld      a,(Galaxy)      ; DEBUG as galaxy n is not working
 522+ C4FD                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 522+ C4FD ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,     a
 523+ C500 ED 4B 03 80                          ld      bc,(TargetSystemX)
 524+ C504 CD 70 FB                             call    find_nearest_to_bc
 525+ C507 ED 43 03 80                          ld      (TargetSystemX),bc

  27+ C08E              GCM_print_boiler_text:
  28+ C08E                  INCLUDE "Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C08E
   2++C08E              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C08E C5           .BoilerTextLoop:        push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   4++C08F 4E                                   ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   5++C090 23                                   inc			hl
   6++C091 46                                   ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   7++C092 23                                   inc			hl
   8++C093 5E                                   ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
   9++C094 23                                   inc			hl
  10++C095 56                                   ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  11++C096 23                                   inc			hl
  12++C097 E5                                   push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  13++C098 EB                                   ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  14++C099 1E FF                                ld			e,txt_status_colour
  15++C09B C5                                   push		bc
  16++C09C D1                                   pop			de
  17++C09D                                      MMUSelectLayer1
  17++C09D ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  18++C0A1 CD D7 E0                             call		l1_print_at
  19++C0A4 E1                                   pop			hl
  20++C0A5 C1                                   pop			bc
  21++C0A6 10 E6                                djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  22++C0A8 C9                                   ret
  23++C0A9
# file closed: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm

  65+ C0EC                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA

  69+ C0F5 CD 65 85                             call    copy_seed

  71+ C0FB 4F                                   ld		c,a								; c = X Coord

  83+ C114 FE 90                                cp		$90
  84+ C116 30 0A                                jr		nc,.NoSecondPixel

  86+ C119 3E 6C                                ld		a,galactic_star_colour2
  87+ C11B                                      MMUSelectLayer2

  90+ C124 E1                                   pop     hl

  92+ C129 E5                                   push    hl
  93+ C12A DD E1                                pop     ix

 217+ C2BC 3A D9 C1    >                        ld      a,(gcCursorBlink)
 217+ C2BF FE 10       >                        cp      gcBlinkVal

# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C070
   2++C070              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C070 C5           .BoilerTextLoop:        push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   4++C071 4E                                   ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   5++C072 23                                   inc			hl
   6++C073 46                                   ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   7++C074 23                                   inc			hl
   8++C075 5E                                   ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
   9++C076 23                                   inc			hl
  10++C077 56                                   ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  11++C078 23                                   inc			hl
  12++C079 E5                                   push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  13++C07A EB                                   ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  14++C07B 1E FF                                ld			e,txt_status_colour
  15++C07D C5                                   push		bc
  16++C07E D1                                   pop			de
  17++C07F                                      MMUSelectLayer1
  17++C07F ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1

  19++C086 E1                                   pop			hl
  20++C087 C1                                   pop			bc
  21++C088 10 E6                                djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  22++C08A C9                                   ret

# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C2C5
   2++C2C5              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C2C5 C5           .BoilerTextLoop:        push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   4++C2C6 4E                                   ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   5++C2C7 23                                   inc			hl
   6++C2C8 46                                   ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   7++C2C9 23                                   inc			hl
   8++C2CA 5E                                   ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
   9++C2CB 23                                   inc			hl
  10++C2CC 56                                   ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  11++C2CD 23                                   inc			hl
  12++C2CE E5                                   push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  13++C2CF EB                                   ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  14++C2D0 1E FF                                ld			e,txt_status_colour
  15++C2D2 C5                                   push		bc
  16++C2D3 D1                                   pop			de
  17++C2D4                                      MMUSelectLayer1
  17++C2D4 ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  18++C2D8 CD D7 E0                             call		l1_print_at
  19++C2DB E1                                   pop			hl
  20++C2DC C1                                   pop			bc
  21++C2DD 10 E6                                djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  22++C2DF C9                                   ret
  23++C2E0

 204+ C213              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 205+ C213              MPM_print_boiler_text:  INCLUDE "Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C213
   2++C213              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C213 C5           .BoilerTextLoop:        push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   4++C214 4E                                   ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   5++C215 23                                   inc			hl
   6++C216 46                                   ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   7++C217 23                                   inc			hl
   8++C218 5E                                   ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
   9++C219 23                                   inc			hl
  10++C21A 56                                   ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  11++C21B 23                                   inc			hl
  12++C21C E5                                   push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  13++C21D EB                                   ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  14++C21E 1E FF                                ld			e,txt_status_colour
  15++C220 C5                                   push		bc
  16++C221 D1                                   pop			de
  17++C222                                      MMUSelectLayer1
  17++C222 ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  18++C226 CD D7 E0                             call		l1_print_at
  19++C229 E1                                   pop			hl
  20++C22A C1                                   pop			bc
  21++C22B 10 E6                                djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  22++C22D C9                                   ret
  23++C22E
# file closed: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
