  37+ E421 04           .rightvertline:         inc		b							; save 2 pixles
  38+ E422 15                                   dec		d
  39+ E423 67                                   ld		h,a							;save color whilst c = col + width
  40+ E424 79                                   ld		a,c
  41+ E425 83                                   add		a,e
  42+ E426 4F                                   ld		c,a
  43+ E427 5C                                   ld		e,h							; e = color
  44+ E428 CD EF E4                             call	l2_draw_vert_line

 788  E44D                  INCLUDE "./Layer2Graphics/asm_l2_plot_horizontal.asm"
# file opened: ./Layer2Graphics/asm_l2_plot_horizontal.asm
   1+ E44D
   2+ E44D              ;; NOTE DMA is little endian
   3+ E44D 00           l2_horz_pixel           DB 0
   4+ E44E
   5+ E44E 83 C3 C7 CB  l2_horz_line            DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   5+ E452 7D
   6+ E453 4D E4        l2_horz_colr            DW l2_horz_pixel
   7+ E455 00           l2_horz_lenlo           DB 0
   8+ E456 00           l2_horz_lenhi           DB 0
   9+ E457 24 10 AD                             DB DMA_WR1_P1FIXED_MEMORY, DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY, DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
  10+ E45A 00 00        l2_horz_target          DB $00, $00
  11+ E45C CF 87                                DB DMA_LOAD, DMA_ENABLE
  12+ E45E              l2_horz_cmd_len	        EQU $ - l2_horz_line
  13+ E45E
  14+ E45E
  15+ E45E              ; "l2_draw_horz_dma"
  16+ E45E              ; "plot at bc for length d colour e using dma, assumes bank already selected"
  17+ E45E 7B           l2_draw_horz_dma:       ld		a,e                                               ; T=4      ;
  18+ E45F 32 4D E4                             ld		(l2_horz_pixel),a                                 ; T=13     ;
  19+ E462 5A                                   ld      e,d ; saved 3 t states ld		a,d                                               ; T=4      ; e=d   4
  20+ E463 16 00                                ld      d,0; saved 3 t states ld 		(l2_horz_lenlo),a                                 ; T=13     ; d = 0  7
  21+ E465 ED 53 55 E4                          ld      (l2_horz_lenlo),de; saved 3 t states xor 	a                                                 ; T=4      ; t 20  31
  22+ E469                                      ; saved 3 t states ld ld 		(l2_horz_lenhi),a                                 ; T=13     ;
  23+ E469                                    ; saved 4 t states  ld		h,b                           ;          ;
  24+ E469                                    ; saved 4 t states  ld		l,c                           ;          ;
  25+ E469 ED 43 5A E4                          ld      (l2_horz_target),bc ; saved 4 t states  was , hl  ; T=20     ;
  26+ E46D 21 4E E4     .write_dma:             ld 		hl, l2_horz_line                                  ;          ;
  27+ E470 06 10                                ld 		b, l2_horz_cmd_len                                ;
  28+ E472 0E 6B                                ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT                            ;
  29+ E474 ED B3                                otir                                                      ;
  30+ E476 C9                                   ret
  31+ E477
  32+ E477              ; "bc = left side row,col, d = length, e = color"
  33+ E477 D5           l2_draw_horz_dma_bank:  push 	de							; save length and colour
  34+ E478 C5                                   push 	bc							; save row col
  35+ E479 78                                   ld   	a,b
  36+ E47A CD 68 E0                             call 	asm_l2_row_bank_select		; now we have the correct bank, its a horizontal line so bank will not shift
  37+ E47D C1                                   pop  	bc
  38+ E47E 47                                   ld	 	b,a	       					; fixed row by the call we can go straight into HL with row col
  39+ E47F D1                                   pop  	de							; get length back
  40+ E480 CD 5E E4                             call    l2_draw_horz_dma
  41+ E483 C9                                   ret
  42+ E484
  43+ E484              ; "l2_draw_horz_line"
  44+ E484              ; "bc = left side row,col, d = length, e = color"
  45+ E484              ; "optimisation if above min pix is will use dma call SCREEN_HOZ_MIN_PIX not implemented yet"
  46+ E484 7A           l2_draw_horz_line:      ld		a,d
  47+ E485 FE 00                                cp 		0							; if its zero length then just return
  48+ E487 C8           .zerolengthexit:        ret		z
  49+ E488 FE 01        .isitlen1:              cp 		1
  50+ E48A CA AC E4                             jp 		z,.l2_draw_horz_line_1
  51+ E48D FE 0A        .longenoughtfordma:     cp  10
  52+ E48F C3 77 E4                             jp  l2_draw_horz_dma_bank
  53+ E492 D5 C5        .plottableline:         push 	de,,bc  					; save length and colour an d row col
  54+ E494 78                                   ld   	a,b
  55+ E495 CD 68 E0                             call 	asm_l2_row_bank_select		; now we have the correct bank, its a horizontal line so bank will not shift
  56+ E498 C1                                   pop  	bc
  57+ E499 67                                   ld	 	h,a	       					; fixed row by the call we can go straight into HL with row col
  58+ E49A 69                                   ld   	l,c
  59+ E49B D1                                   pop  	de							; get length back
  60+ E49C 79           .cliptest:              ld	 	a,c							; get column + length
  61+ E49D 42                                   ld  	b,d  						; speculate that we don't clip by pre-loading b with length
  62+ E49E 82                                   add  	a,d
  63+ E49F 30 06                                jr   	nc, .l2_draw_horz_plot_loop	; if carry is set c+d > 255
  64+ E4A1 3E FF        .clipat255:             ld   	a,$FF
  65+ E4A3 91                                   sub  	c							; a holds clipped length
  66+ E4A4 47                                   ld 		b, a 						; so now hl holds poke address  b = clipped length e = colour
  67+ E4A5 18 00                                jr		.l2_draw_horz_plot_loop
  68+ E4A7 73           .l2_draw_horz_plot_loop:ld (hl),e							; loop poking hl with e for b pixels
  69+ E4A8 23                                   inc hl
  70+ E4A9 10 FC                                djnz .l2_draw_horz_plot_loop
  71+ E4AB C9                                   ret
  72+ E4AC 7B           .l2_draw_horz_line_1:   ld		a,e
  73+ E4AD                                      l2_plot_macro; jp		l2_plot_pixel				; hijack return
  73+ E4AD 78          >                        ld      a,b
  73+ E4AE             >                        JumpIfAGTENusng 192 ,.NoPlot
  73+ E4AE FE C0       >                        cp     192
  73+ E4B0 D2 BC E4    >                        jp		nc,.NoPlot
  73+ E4B3 69          >                        ld      l,c
  73+ E4B4 CD 68 E0    >                        call    asm_l2_row_bank_select
  73+ E4B7 67          >                        ld      h,a
  73+ E4B8 3A B5 E2    >                        ld      a,(line_gfx_colour)
  73+ E4BB 77          >                        ld      (hl),a
  73+ E4BC             >.NoPlot:
  74+ E4BC C9                                   ret
  75+ E4BD
  76+ E4BD
  77+ E4BD              ; "l2_draw_horz_line_to"
  78+ E4BD              ; "bc = left side row,col, d right pixel, e = color"
  79+ E4BD 7A           l2_draw_horz_line_to:   ld 		a,d
  80+ E4BE B9                                   cp 		c
  81+ E4BF 30 04                                jr		nc, .noswap
  82+ E4C1 28 07                                jr      z, .singlepixel
  83+ E4C3 51           .swap:                  ld		d,c
  84+ E4C4 4F                                   ld		c,a
  85+ E4C5 7A           .noswap:                ld		a,d
  86+ E4C6 91                                   sub		c
  87+ E4C7              ;                        dec		a							; so now its length not offset
  88+ E4C7 57                                   ld		d,a
  89+ E4C8 18 BA                                jr 		l2_draw_horz_line			; hijack routine and return statements
  90+ E4CA 7B           .singlepixel:           ld		a,e
  91+ E4CB                                      l2_plot_macro; jp		l2_plot_pixel				; hijack return
  91+ E4CB 78          >                        ld      a,b
  91+ E4CC             >                        JumpIfAGTENusng 192 ,.NoPlot
  91+ E4CC FE C0       >                        cp     192
  91+ E4CE D2 DA E4    >                        jp		nc,.NoPlot
  91+ E4D1 69          >                        ld      l,c
  91+ E4D2 CD 68 E0    >                        call    asm_l2_row_bank_select
  91+ E4D5 67          >                        ld      h,a
  91+ E4D6 3A B5 E2    >                        ld      a,(line_gfx_colour)
  91+ E4D9 77          >                        ld      (hl),a
  91+ E4DA             >.NoPlot:
  92+ E4DA C9                                   ret

 789  E4DB                  INCLUDE "./Layer2Graphics/asm_l2_plot_vertical.asm"
# file opened: ./Layer2Graphics/asm_l2_plot_vertical.asm
   1+ E4DB              ; ">l2_draw_vert_segment"
   2+ E4DB              ; ">hl = bank adjusted pixel poke address d = length, e = color"
   3+ E4DB              ; ">will always clip once h = 64 even if length > 64 destroys a and hl, d = resudual length not plotted"
   4+ E4DB 7A           l2_draw_vert_segment:   ld		a,d
   5+ E4DC FE 00        .emptylinecheck:	    cp 		0
   6+ E4DE C8                                   ret		z
   7+ E4DF FE 01        .justonepixel	        cp		1
   8+ E4E1 20 02                                jr		nz, .multiplepixelsLoop
   9+ E4E3 73                                   ld		(hl),e
  10+ E4E4 C9                                   ret
  11+ E4E5              .multiplepixelsLoop:
  12+ E4E5 7C           .endofbankcheck:        ld   	a,h
  13+ E4E6 FE 40                                cp   	64
  14+ E4E8 D0                                   ret		nc							; check before we poke data if we have hit a boundary
  15+ E4E9 73           .canplotapixel:         ld   	(hl),e						; set colour
  16+ E4EA 24                                   inc 	h							; we don't check here else we would need a dec d on ret could do for optimisation of loop though
  17+ E4EB 15                                   dec		d
  18+ E4EC C8                                   ret		z
  19+ E4ED 18 F6                                jr		.multiplepixelsLoop
  20+ E4EF
  21+ E4EF              ; ">l2_draw_vert_line"
  22+ E4EF              ; ">bc = row col d = length, e = color"
  23+ E4EF 78           l2_draw_vert_line:      ld 		a,b
  24+ E4F0 FE C0        .offscreencheck:        cp 		SCREEN_HEIGHT
  25+ E4F2 D0                                   ret 	nc							; can't start off the screen
  26+ E4F3 7A           .emptylinecheck:        ld		a,d
  27+ E4F4 FE 00                                cp		0
  28+ E4F6 C8                                   ret		z
  29+ E4F7 FE 01                                cp		1
  30+ E4F9 20 10                                jr		nz,.multiplepixels
  31+ E4FB              .itsonepixel:           l2_plot_macro; call	l2_plot_pixel
  31+ E4FB 78          >                        ld      a,b
  31+ E4FC             >                        JumpIfAGTENusng 192 ,.NoPlot
  31+ E4FC FE C0       >                        cp     192
  31+ E4FE D2 0A E5    >                        jp		nc,.NoPlot
  31+ E501 69          >                        ld      l,c
  31+ E502 CD 68 E0    >                        call    asm_l2_row_bank_select
  31+ E505 67          >                        ld      h,a
  31+ E506 3A B5 E2    >                        ld      a,(line_gfx_colour)
  31+ E509 77          >                        ld      (hl),a
  31+ E50A             >.NoPlot:
  32+ E50A C9                                   ret
  33+ E50B              .multiplepixels:						; so now we have at least 2 pixels to plot
  34+ E50B 7A           .clipto192:             ld		a,d							; get length
  35+ E50C 80                                   add		a,b							; a= row + length
  36+ E50D 38 04                                jr		c,.needtoclip				; if it was > 255 then there is a definite need
  37+ E50F FE C0                                cp		SCREEN_HEIGHT
  38+ E511 38 08                                jr		c, .noclipneeded
  39+ E513 78           .needtoclip             ld		a,b
  40+ E514 82                                   add		a,d
  41+ E515 D6 C0                                sub		SCREEN_HEIGHT
  42+ E517 67                                   ld		h,a							; use h as a temp holding for (row + length) - 192
  43+ E518 7A                                   ld		a,d
  44+ E519 94                                   sub		h
  45+ E51A 57                                   ld		d,a							; d = length - ((row + length) - 192)
  46+ E51B              ; so now BC = row col, d = length clipped, e = color
  47+ E51B 78           .noclipneeded:          ld		a,b
  48+ E51C C5 D5                                push	bc,,de
  49+ E51E CD 68 E0                             call 	asm_l2_row_bank_select
  49+ E521               	 	; we now have poke address and a variable holding current bank number
  50+ E521 D1 C1                                pop		bc,,de
  51+ E523 67                                   ld		h,a							; b now tolds target pixel for first plot
  52+ E524 69                                   ld		l,c  						; and c holds pixel column for plotting
  53+ E525 CD DB E4                             call 	l2_draw_vert_segment		; draw seg, d = pixels remaining
  54+ E528 7A                                   ld		a,d							; a and d = nbr pixels remaining
  55+ E529 FE 00                                cp		0
  56+ E52B 28 27                                jr		z, .doneplotting
  57+ E52D 3A 00 E0     .anotherbank:           ld		a, (varL2_BANK_SELECTED)
  58+ E530 3C                                   inc		a
  59+ E531 06 00                                ld		b,0
  60+ E533 C5 D5                                push	bc,,de
  61+ E535 CD 51 E0                             call 	asm_l2_bank_n_select
  62+ E538 D1 C1                                pop     bc,,de
  63+ E53A 60                                   ld		h,b							; b now tolds target pixel for first plot
  64+ E53B 69                                   ld		l,c  						; and c holds pixel column for plotting
  65+ E53C CD DB E4                             call	l2_draw_vert_segment
  66+ E53F 7A                                   ld		a,d
  67+ E540 FE 00                                cp		0
  68+ E542 28 10                                jr		z,.doneplotting
  69+ E544 3A 00 E0     .yetanotherbank:        ld		a, (varL2_BANK_SELECTED)
  70+ E547 3C                                   inc		a
  71+ E548 06 00                                ld		b,0
  72+ E54A C5 D5                                push	bc,,de
  73+ E54C CD 51 E0                             call 	asm_l2_bank_n_select
  74+ E54F D1                                   pop		de
  75+ E550 E1                                   pop		hl							; hl = bc
  76+ E551 CD DB E4                             call	l2_draw_vert_segment		; we have now hit 192 pixels so done
  77+ E554 C9           .doneplotting:	        ret
  78+ E555
  79+ E555              ; ">l2_draw_vert_line_to"
  80+ E555              ; ">bc = row col d = to position, e = color"
  81+ E555 78           l2_draw_vert_line_to:   ld		a,b
  82+ E556 BA                                   cp		d
  83+ E557 38 02                                jr		c, .noyswap
  84+ E559 42           .yswap:                 ld		b,d			; Swap round row numbers so we are always incrementing
  85+ E55A 57                                   ld		d,a			; now we have a top to bottom to we we can calc length from bc
  86+ E55B 7A           .noyswap:               ld		a,d 		; we still may have d in a but only if it was bottom to top
  87+ E55C 90                                   sub		b
  88+ E55D 3C                                   inc		a			; so now its length not offset
  89+ E55E 57                                   ld		d,a
  90+ E55F 18 8E                                jr		l2_draw_vert_line	; we can hijack its clipping, 0 check and return logic
  91+ E561                                      ; no return needed

   6+ E562
   7+ E562              ;; Note l2stepx is done via self modifying code rather than an if for speed
   8+ E562              ;; l2stepx1 and l2stepx2 are the addresses to stick the inc or dec in
   9+ E562              l2incbcstep EQU $03
  10+ E562              l2incbstep	EQU	$04
  11+ E562              l2decbstep	EQU $05
  12+ E562              l2decbcstep EQU $0B
  13+ E562              l2deccstep	EQU $0D
  14+ E562              l2inccstep	EQU	$0C
  15+ E562              l2incdestep EQU $13
  16+ E562              l2decdestep EQU $1B
  17+ E562              l2inchlstep EQU $23
  18+ E562              l2dechlstep EQU $2B
  19+ E562              		; l2 deltas are signed
  20+ E562 00 00        l2deltaY	DW	0
  21+ E564 00 00        l2deltaX	DW	0
  22+ E566 00           l2deltaYsq	db	0
  23+ E567 00           l2deltaXsq	db	0
  24+ E568 00           l2deltaYn	db	0
  25+ E569 00           l2deltaXn	db	0
  26+ E56A 00           l2deltaYsqn	db	0
  27+ E56B 00           l2deltaXsqn	db	0
  28+ E56C 00           l2linecolor	db	0
  29+ E56D 00 00        l2fraction	dw	0
  30+ E56F 00 00        l2e2		dw	0
  31+ E571 00           l2way		db	0
  32+ E572 00 00        l2targetPtr	dw	0
  33+ E574              ;; These arrays should be 192 but if we use 256 then getting array2 value is just inc h rather than indexing again.
  34+ E574 00 00 00...  l2targetArray1 ds	256
  35+ E674 00 00 00...  l2targetArray2 ds	256
  36+ E774              ;; Using Bresenham Algorithm draw a diagonal line top to bottom. First we must sort of course
  37+ E774              ;;plotLine(int x0, int y0, int x1, int y1)
  38+ E774              ;;    dx =  abs(x1-x0);
  39+ E774              ;;    sx = x0<x1 ? 1 : -1;
  40+ E774              ;;    dy = -abs(y1-y0);
  41+ E774              ;;    sy = y0<y1 ? 1 : -1;
  42+ E774              ;;    err = dx+dy;  /* error value e_xy */
  43+ E774              ;;    while (true)   /* loop */
  44+ E774              ;;        plot(x0, y0);
  45+ E774              ;;        if (x0==x1 && y0==y1) break;
  46+ E774              ;;        e2 = 2*err;
  47+ E774              ;;        if (e2 >= dy) /* e_xy+e_x > 0 */
  48+ E774              ;;            err += dy;
  49+ E774              ;;            x0 += sx;
  50+ E774              ;;        end if
  51+ E774              ;;        if (e2 <= dx) /* e_xy+e_y < 0 */
  52+ E774              ;;            err += dx;
  53+ E774              ;;            y0 += sy;
  54+ E774              ;;        end if
  55+ E774              ;;    end while
  56+ E774              ; ">l2_draw_diagonal_save, bc = y0,x0 de=y1,x1,a=array nbr ESOURCE LL30 or LION"
  57+ E774              ; ">hl will be either l2targetArray1 or 2"
  58+ E774              ; For S15 version we can still use the current table as this will hold final fill data
  59+ E774              ; but we have to come in with X1Y1 X2Y2 being 16 bit
  60+ E774              ; if the Y1Y2 are both off same side of screen or X1X2 both off same side them line array is set as empty
  61+ E774              ; so
  62+ E774              ;       for each line from Y1 to Y2
  63+ E774              ;           if calculate as normal
  64+ E774              ;                if off screen we don't write
  65+ E774              ;                if on screen we clip to 0,255  which is easy as a horizontal line
  66+ E774              ;           we will need a special case were a line is not rendered    we have x1=255 and X1 = 0, i.e. they are flipped
  67+ E774              ;              we could also cheat and say view port as 1 pixel edge border so we can count x1 = 0 as no line
  68+ E774
  69+ E774              ; This must be called with  Y1 < Y2 as we won;t do a pre check
  70+ E774              ; Caulates the temp x. IY [01] = X1 [23]=Y1 [45]=X2 [67]=Y2 [89]=midY3
  71+ E774              ; Draw a line from BC to DE, with target Y position in a, all values must be 2's C at this points
  72+ E774              ; calculate deltaX, deltaY for line.
  73+ E774              ; calculate offsetY = TargetY - Y1
  74+ E774              ; calculate XTarget = X1 + (deltaX/deltaY) *  offsetY
  75+ E774              ;;;l2DiagDeltaX    DW 0
  76+ E774              ;;;l2_diagonal_getx:       ld		hl,0                            ;
  77+ E774              ;;;                        ld      ixh,0                           ; flag byte clear
  78+ E774              ;;;                        ld      (target_y),a                    ; save target
  79+ E774              ;;;.calculateDeltaX:       ld      hl,(IY+4)
  80+ E774              ;;;                        ld      de,(IY+0)
  81+ E774              ;;;                        ClearCarryFlag
  82+ E774              ;;;                        sbc     hl,de
  83+ E774              ;;;                        ld      (l2DiagDeltaX),hl
  84+ E774              ;;;.calculateDeltaY:       ld      hl,(IY+6)
  85+ E774              ;;;                        ld      de,(IY+2)
  86+ E774              ;;;                        ClearCarryFlag
  87+ E774              ;;;                        sbc     hl,de
  88+ E774              ;;;                        ld      (l2DiagDeltaY),hl
  89+ E774              ;;;.ABSDx:                 ld      hl,(l2DiagDeltaX)
  90+ E774              ;;;                        ld      a,h
  91+ E774              ;;;                        and     $80
  92+ E774              ;;;                        jr      nz,.DxPositive
  93+ E774              ;;;.DxNegative:            macronegate16hl
  94+ E774              ;;;.DxPositive:            ex      de,hl                               ; de = deltaX
  95+ E774              ;;;                        ld      hl,(l2DiagDeltaY)
  96+ E774              ;;;                        ld      a,h
  97+ E774              ;;;                        and     $80
  98+ E774              ;;;                        jr      nz,.DyPositive
  99+ E774              ;;;.DyNegative:            macronegate16hl
 100+ E774              ;;;.DyPositive:
 101+ E774              ;;;.ScaleLoop:             ld      a,h                                 ; At this point DX and DY are ABS values
 102+ E774              ;;;                        or      d                                   ; .
 103+ E774              ;;;                        jr      z,.ScaleDone                        ; .
 104+ E774              ;;;                        ShiftDERight1                               ; .
 105+ E774              ;;;                        ShiftHLRight1                               ; .
 106+ E774              ;;;                        jr      .ScaleLoop                          ; scaled down Dx and Dy to 8 bit, Dy may have been;;                                                                                               negative
 107+ E774              ;;;.ScaleDone:             ; hl = ABS DY, DE = ABS DX,  bc = Y1, ix = Y2,   note H and D will be zero
 108+ E774              ;;;.CalculateDelta:        ld      a,e                                 ; if DX < DY goto DX/DY
 109+ E774              ;;;                        JumpIfALTNusng l,.DXdivDY                   ; else do DY/DX
 110+ E774              ;;;.DYdivDX:               ld      a,l                                 ;    A = DY
 111+ E774              ;;;                        ld      d,e                                 ;    D = DX
 112+ E774              ;;;                        call    AEquAmul256DivD                     ;    A = R = 256 * DY / DX
 113+ E774              ;;;.SaveGradientDYDX:      ld      (Gradient),a
 114+ E774              ;;;                        ld      a,ixh
 115+ E774              ;;;                        or      16
 116+ E774              ;;;                        ld      ixh,a                               ;
 117+ E774              ;;;                        jp      .ClipP1                             ;
 118+ E774              ;;;.DXdivDY:               ld      a,e                                 ;    A = DX
 119+ E774              ;;;                        ld      d,l                                 ;    D = DY
 120+ E774              ;;;                        call    AEquAmul256DivD                     ;    A = R = 256 * DX / DY
 121+ E774              ;;;.SaveGradientDXDY:      ld      (Gradient),a
 122+ E774              ;;;
 123+ E774              ;;;have X1 -> X
 124+ E774              ;;;need deltaMidY = MidY - Y0
 125+ E774              ;;;                        X0 + (DeltaMY * Gradient) but if the graident is flipped then its X0+(deltaMY / Gradient)
 126+ E774              ;;;
 127+ E774              ;;;
 128+ E774              ;;;.calculateDeltaY:
 129+ E774              ;;;.calcualteDxDyOrDyDx
 130+ E774              ;;;.calculate
 131+ E774              ;;;
 132+ E774              ; Total unoptimised version
 133+ E774              ; use hl, de, bc, af,
 134+ E774              ; no used yet ix iy
 135+ E774              ; can we do an ex for hl' and de' holding x and hl, de holding y?
 136+ E774              ;;;l2_X0                   DW 0
 137+ E774              ;;;l2_Y0                   DW 0
 138+ E774              ;;;l2_X1                   DW 0
 139+ E774              ;;;l2_Y1                   DW 0
 140+ E774              ;;;l2_DX                   DW 0
 141+ E774              ;;;l2_DY                   DW 0
 142+ E774              ;;;l2_SX                   DW 0
 143+ E774              ;;;l2_SY                   DW 0
 144+ E774              ;;;l2_Error                DW 0
 145+ E774              ;;;l2_E2                   DW 0
 146+ E774              ;;;int_bren_save_Array1:   ld      hl,(l2_X1)          ; if X0 < X1
 147+ E774              ;;;                        ld      de,(l2_X0)          ; calculate SX DX
 148+ E774              ;;;                        ClearCarryFlag              ;
 149+ E774              ;;;                        sbc     hl,de               ;
 150+ E774              ;;;                        bit     7,h                 ;
 151+ E774              ;;;                        jr      z,.DXPositive       ;
 152+ E774              ;;;.DXNegative:            NegHL                       ;
 153+ E774              ;;;                        ld      bc,-1               ;
 154+ E774              ;;;                        jp      .DoneCalcDx         ;
 155+ E774              ;;;.DXPositive:            ld      bc,1                ;
 156+ E774              ;;;.DoneCalcDx:            ld      (l2_SX),bc          ;
 157+ E774              ;;;                        ld      (l2_DX),hl          ;
 158+ E774              ;;;.CalcDY:                ld      hl,(l2_Y1)          ; If Y1 < Y1
 159+ E774              ;;;                        ld      de,(l2_Y0)          ; calculate SY DY
 160+ E774              ;;;                        ClearCarryFlag              ;
 161+ E774              ;;;                        sbc     hl,de               ;
 162+ E774              ;;;                        bit     7,h                 ;
 163+ E774              ;;;                        jr      z,.DYPositive       ;
 164+ E774              ;;;.DYNegative:            ld      bc,-1               ;
 165+ E774              ;;;                        jp      .DoneCalcDx         ;
 166+ E774              ;;;.DYPositive:            NegHL                       ;
 167+ E774              ;;;                        ld      bc,1                ;
 168+ E774              ;;;.DoneCalcDy:            ld      (l2_SY),bc          ;
 169+ E774              ;;;                        ld      (l2_DY),hl
 170+ E774              ;;;.CalcError:             ld      hl,(l2_DX)
 171+ E774              ;;;                        ld      de,(l2_DY)
 172+ E774              ;;;                        add     hl,de
 173+ E774              ;;;                        ld      (l2_Error),hl
 174+ E774              ;;;.CalcLoop:              break
 175+ E774              ;;;                        ld      hl,(l2_X0)          ; get X0 and Y0
 176+ E774              ;;;.CheckYRange:           ld      de,(l2_Y0)
 177+ E774              ;;;                        ld      a,d                 ; if Y > 127
 178+ E774              ;;;                        and     a                   ; or Y is negative
 179+ E774              ;;;                        jr      nz,.YOutOfRange     ; then we can skip the plot
 180+ E774              ;;;                        ld      a,e                 ;
 181+ E774              ;;;                        and     $80                 ;
 182+ E774              ;;;                        jr      nz,.YOutOfRange     ;
 183+ E774              ;;;.CheckXRange:           ld      a,h                 ; if X0 is negative
 184+ E774              ;;;                        and     a
 185+ E774              ;;;                        jr      z,.XOKToPlot
 186+ E774              ;;;                        and     $80
 187+ E774              ;;;                        jr      z,.NotXNegative
 188+ E774              ;;;.XNegative:             ld      a,0
 189+ E774              ;;;                        jp      .ClipXDone
 190+ E774              ;;;.NotXNegative:          ld      a,255
 191+ E774              ;;;                        jp      .ClipXDone
 192+ E774              ;;;.XOKToPlot:             ld      a,l                 ; no clip therefore we can just use l
 193+ E774              ;;;.ClipXDone:             push    hl
 194+ E774              ;;;                        push    af                  ; using the Y coordinate
 195+ E774              ;;;                        ld      hl,l2targetArray1   ; plot the X value for this row
 196+ E774              ;;;                        ld      a,e
 197+ E774              ;;;                        add     hl,a
 198+ E774              ;;;                        pop     af
 199+ E774              ;;;                        ld      (hl),a
 200+ E774              ;;;                        pop     hl
 201+ E774              ;;;.YOutOfRange: ; At this point we have either plotted or its outside array range
 202+ E774              ;;;                        ld      bc,(l2_X1)
 203+ E774              ;;;.CheckEndXY:            cpHLEquBC .CheckEndXYOK     ; hl will equal X0 still by here
 204+ E774              ;;;                        jp      nz,.x0x1Differ
 205+ E774              ;;;.CheckEndXYOK:          ld      bc,(l2_Y1)
 206+ E774              ;;;                        cpDEEquBC  .x0x1Differ      ; de will equal Y0 still by here
 207+ E774              ;;;                        ret     z                   ; if they are both the same we are done
 208+ E774              ;;;.x0x1Differ:
 209+ E774              ;;;.SetError2:             ld      hl,(l2_Error)       ; e2 = 2 * error
 210+ E774              ;;;                        add     hl,hl               ; .
 211+ E774              ;;;                        ld      (l2_E2),hl          ; .
 212+ E774              ;;;.CheckE2gteDY:          ld      de,(l2_DY)          ; if e2 >= dy
 213+ E774              ;;;                        call    compare16HLDE       ; .
 214+ E774              ;;;                        jp      pe, .E2DyParitySet
 215+ E774              ;;;                        jp      m,  .E2ltDY         ; to get here overflow clear, so if m is set then HL<DE
 216+ E774              ;;;                        jp      .E2gteDY
 217+ E774              ;;;.E2DyParitySet:         jp      p,  .E2ltDY         ; if pe is set, then if sign is clear HL<DE
 218+ E774              ;;;.E2gteDY:               ld      hl,(l2_X0)          ;      if x0 == x1 break
 219+ E774              ;;;                        ld      de,(l2_X1)          ;      .
 220+ E774              ;;;                        cpHLEquDE .ErrorUpdateDY    ;      .
 221+ E774              ;;;                        ret     z                   ;      .
 222+ E774              ;;;.ErrorUpdateDY:         ld      hl,(l2_Error)       ;      error = error + dy
 223+ E774              ;;;                        ld      de,(l2_DY)          ;      .
 224+ E774              ;;;                        add     hl,de               ;      .
 225+ E774              ;;;                        ld      (l2_Error),hl       ;      .
 226+ E774              ;;;.UpdateX0:              ld      hl,(l2_X0)          ;      x0 = x0 + sx
 227+ E774              ;;;                        ld      bc,(l2_SX)          ;      .
 228+ E774              ;;;                        add     hl,bc               ;      .
 229+ E774              ;;;                        ld      (l2_X0),hl          ;      .
 230+ E774              ;;;.E2ltDY:
 231+ E774              ;;;.CheckE2lteDX:          ld      hl,(l2_E2)          ; if e2 <= dx
 232+ E774              ;;;                        ld      de,(l2_DX)          ; as we can't do skip on e2>dx
 233+ E774              ;;;                        call    compare16HLDE       ; we will jump based on e2 <= dx
 234+ E774              ;;;                        jp      z, .E2lteDX
 235+ E774              ;;;                        jp      pe, .E2DxParitySet
 236+ E774              ;;;                        jp      m,  .E2lteDX         ; to get here overflow clear, so if m is set then HL<DE
 237+ E774              ;;;                        jp      .E2gteDx
 238+ E774              ;;;.E2DxParitySet:         jp      p,  .E2lteDX
 239+ E774              ;;;                        jp      .E2gteDx
 240+ E774              ;;;.E2lteDX:               ld      hl,(l2_Y0)          ;      .
 241+ E774              ;;;                        ld      de,(l2_Y1)          ;      .
 242+ E774              ;;;                        cpHLEquDE .ErrorUdpateDX    ;      .
 243+ E774              ;;;                        ret     z                   ;      .
 244+ E774              ;;;.ErrorUdpateDX:         ld      hl,(l2_Error)       ;      error = error + dx
 245+ E774              ;;;                        ld      de,(l2_DX)          ;      .
 246+ E774              ;;;                        add     hl,de               ;      .
 247+ E774              ;;;                        ld      (l2_Error),hl       ;      .
 248+ E774              ;;;.UpdateY0:              ld      hl,(l2_Y0)          ;      x0 = x0 + sx
 249+ E774              ;;;                        ld      bc,(l2_SY)          ;      .
 250+ E774              ;;;                        add     hl,bc              ;      .
 251+ E774              ;;;                        ld      (l2_Y0),hl         ;      .
 252+ E774              ;;;.E2gteDx:               jp      .CalcLoop           ; repeat until we have a return
 253+ E774
 254+ E774
 255+ E774              ;;;;;;;; for this it myst always be sorted Y0 -> Y2
 256+ E774              ;;;;;;;;; note we ca't use this to do x? as it will clip inherently
 257+ E774              ;;;;;;;l2_save_diagnonal_signed_1:
 258+ E774              ;;;;;;;                        ld		hl,0                            ;
 259+ E774              ;;;;;;;                        ld		(l2deltaX),hl                   ;
 260+ E774              ;;;;;;;                        ld		(l2deltaY),hl
 261+ E774              ;;;;;;;.CheckYOnScreen:        ld      de,(l2_commonTopY)
 262+ E774              ;;;;;;;                        ld      hl,(l2_bottomY)
 263+ E774              ;;;;;;;                        ld      a,d
 264+ E774              ;;;;;;;                        and     h
 265+ E774              ;;;;;;;                        and     $80
 266+ E774              ;;;;;;;                        jr      nz,.OffScreen
 267+ E774              ;;;;;;;;...dy = y1 - y0
 268+ E774              ;;;;;;;.CalcDeltaY:            ClearCarryFlag
 269+ E774              ;;;;;;;                        sbc     hl,de                           ; now delta is signed, if its negative then something bad as gone wrong
 270+ E774              ;;;;;;;                        ld      a,h
 271+ E774              ;;;;;;;                        and     $80
 272+ E774              ;;;;;;;                        jr      nz,.OffScreen
 273+ E774              ;;;;;;;                        ld      (l2deltaY),hl                   ; Delta signed
 274+ E774              ;;;;;;;CheckXOnScreen:         ld      de,(l2_leftX)
 275+ E774              ;;;;;;;                        ld      hl,(l2_rightX)
 276+ E774              ;;;;;;;                        ld      a,d
 277+ E774              ;;;;;;;                        and     h
 278+ E774              ;;;;;;;                        and     $80
 279+ E774              ;;;;;;;                        jr      nz,.OffScreen
 280+ E774              ;;;;;;;                        ClearCarryFlag
 281+ E774              ;;;;;;;;...dx = x1 - x0
 282+ E774              ;;;;;;;.CalcDeltaX:            sbc     hl,de                           ; now delta is signed, could be negative
 283+ E774              ;;;;;;;                        ld      (l2deltaX),hl                   ; Delta signed
 284+ E774              ;;;;;;;                        ld      a,h
 285+ E774              ;;;;;;;                        and     $80
 286+ E774              ;;;;;;;                        jr      nz,.LeftToRight
 287+ E774              ;;;;;;;.RightToLeft:           set up instrnctin
 288+ E774              ;;;;;;;.LeftToRight:           set up instrnctin
 289+ E774              ;;;;;;;.setErr:									                    ;  LD H  := (D'-E')/2    round up if +ve or down if -ve
 290+ E774              ;;;;;;;,FracDYltDX:            ld		hl,(l2deltaY)					; Fraction = dY - dX
 291+ E774              ;;;;;;;                        ld		de,(l2deltaX)
 292+ E774              ;;;;;;;                        ClearCarryFlag
 293+ E774              ;;;;;;;                        sbc		hl,de							; sbc does not have an SBC IY so need to do this in HL
 294+ E774              ;;;;;;;                        ex		de,hl
 295+ E774              ;;;;;;;                        ld		iyh,d							; we will use IY reg for fractions
 296+ E774              ;;;;;;;                        ld		iyl,e
 297+ E774              ;;;;;;;                        jp		p,.fracIsPositive
 298+ E774              ;;;;;;;
 299+ E774              ;;;;;;;plotLine(x0, y0, x1, y1)
 300+ E774              ;;;;;;;    dx = x1 - x0
 301+ E774              ;;;;;;;    dy = y1 - y0
 302+ E774              ;;;;;;;    D = 2*dy - dx
 303+ E774              ;;;;;;;    y = y0
 304+ E774              ;;;;;;;
 305+ E774              ;;;;;;;    for x from x0 to x1
 306+ E774              ;;;;;;;        plot(x,y)
 307+ E774              ;;;;;;;        if D > 0
 308+ E774              ;;;;;;;            y = y + 1
 309+ E774              ;;;;;;;            D = D - 2*dx
 310+ E774              ;;;;;;;        end if
 311+ E774              ;;;;;;;        D = D + 2*dy
 312+ E774              ;;;;;;;
 313+ E774
 314+ E774
 315+ E774
 316+ E774              ;;;;;.fracIsNegative:        NegIY
 317+ E774              ;;;;;                        ShiftIYRight1
 318+ E774              ;;;;;                        NegIY
 319+ E774              ;;;;;                        jp		.SkipCalcInc					; so we have a negative frac
 320+ E774              ;;;;;.fracIsPositive:        ShiftIYRight1
 321+ E774              ;;;;;.SkipCalcInc:		                        			    	; As we loop, bc = to plot current XY
 322+ E774              ;;;;;.preTargetArray:	    ld		hl,l2targetArray1               ; Assuming row 0
 323+ E774              ;;;;;l2S_setTarget:	        ld		(l2targetPtr),hl
 324+ E774              ;;;;;                                                                ; set DE to current row
 325+ E774              ;;;;;.S_Loop:			    ld		hl,(l2targetPtr)				; Insert into respective array
 326+ E774              ;;;;;                                                                ; calculate current row
 327+ E774              ;;;;;                                                                ; if current row >= 0
 328+ E774              ;;;;;                                                                ; write current X value in DE to (hl)
 329+ E774              ;;;;;                        ld		a,b
 330+ E774              ;;;;;                        add		hl,a
 331+ E774              ;;;;;                        ld		(hl),c
 332+ E774              ;;;;;l2S_CheckIfEnd:	        ld		a,ixh
 333+ E774              ;;;;;                        JumpIfAGTENusng	  b,l2S_CheckXPos		; if Y1 < Y2 then continue regardless, when it hits Y2 then we must check X1 and X2
 334+ E774              ;;;;;                        jp		l2S_Continue
 335+ E774              ;;;;;l2S_CheckXPos:          ld      a,(l2S_adjustCol)
 336+ E774              ;;;;;                        cp      l2inccstep; if we self modified to inc the we can do a cp e else its cp c
 337+ E774              ;;;;;                        jr      z,.IncCP
 338+ E774              ;;;;;.DecCP:                 ld      a,c
 339+ E774              ;;;;;                        ReturnIfALTNusng ixl
 340+ E774              ;;;;;                        ReturnIfAEqNusng ixl
 341+ E774              ;;;;;                        jp      l2S_Continue
 342+ E774              ;;;;;.IncCP:                 ld		a,c
 343+ E774              ;;;;;                        ReturnIfAGTENusng ixl					; if X1 has reached or exceeded X2 then we are done
 344+ E774              ;;;;;l2S_Continue:
 345+ E774              ;;;;;l2S_HNegative:			ld		a,iyh
 346+ E774              ;;;;;                        bit		7,a								; if its negative then we need to deal with delta Y, there is no bit n,iyh instrunction
 347+ E774              ;;;;;                        jr		z,l2S_ErrNotNegative			;
 348+ E774              ;;;;;l2S_ErrNegative:		ld		a,(l2deltaY)					; if its a negative error update X
 349+ E774              ;;;;;                        ld		d,0
 350+ E774              ;;;;;                        ld		e,a
 351+ E774              ;;;;;                        add		iy,de							; add deltaY(unsinged) to l2fraction
 352+ E774              ;;;;;l2S_adjustCol:          nop										; this is our inc/dec of X
 353+ E774              ;;;;;                        jr		l2S_Loop							; repeat loop
 354+ E774              ;;;;;l2S_ErrNotNegative:     ld		a,iyh
 355+ E774              ;;;;;                        or		iyl
 356+ E774              ;;;;;                        JumpIfAIsZero l2S_ErrZero					; if there is no error then goto zeroerror
 357+ E774              ;;;;;l2S_ErrPositive:        ld      de,iy;  lddeiy								; if its a positive error then we update Y
 358+ E774              ;;;;;                        ex		de,hl
 359+ E774              ;;;;;                        ld		d,0
 360+ E774              ;;;;;                        ld		a,(l2deltaX)
 361+ E774              ;;;;;                        ld		e,a
 362+ E774              ;;;;;                        ClearCarryFlag
 363+ E774              ;;;;;                        sbc		hl,de
 364+ E774              ;;;;;                        ex		de,hl
 365+ E774              ;;;;;                        ld      iy,de;ldiyde
 366+ E774              ;;;;;l2S_adjustRow:          inc		b								; move Y down by one
 367+ E774              ;;;;;                        jr		l2S_Loop
 368+ E774              ;;;;;l2S_ErrZero:            ld		hl,(l2deltaX)
 369+ E774              ;;;;;                        ex		de,hl
 370+ E774              ;;;;;                        ld		hl,(l2deltaY)
 371+ E774              ;;;;;                        ClearCarryFlag
 372+ E774              ;;;;;                        sbc		hl,de
 373+ E774              ;;;;;                        ex		de,hl
 374+ E774              ;;;;;                        ld      iy,de; ldiyde
 375+ E774              ;;;;;l2S_adjustCol2:         nop										; update X and Y
 376+ E774              ;;;;;                        inc		b
 377+ E774              ;;;;;                        jr		l2S_Loop
 378+ E774              ;;;;;
 379+ E774              ;;;;;.OffScreen:             SetCarryFlag
 380+ E774              ;;;;;                        ret
 381+ E774              ;;;;;
 382+ E774              ;;;;;
 383+ E774
 384+ E774                      IFDEF L2_DIAGONAL_SAVE
 385+ E774 ~            l2_draw_diagonal_save:  cp		1
 386+ E774 ~                                    jr		z,l2S_ItsArray1
 387+ E774 ~                                    ld		hl,l2targetArray2
 388+ E774 ~                                    jp		l2S_setTarget
 389+ E774 ~            l2S_ItsArray1:	        ld		hl,l2targetArray1
 390+ E774 ~            l2S_setTarget:	        ld		(l2targetPtr),hl
 391+ E774 ~            ; ">l2_draw_diagonal, bc = y0,x0 de=y1,x1,a=color) Thsi version performs a pre sort based on y axis"
 392+ E774 ~                                    ld		(l2linecolor),a					;save colour for later
 393+ E774 ~                                    ld		hl,0                            ;
 394+ E774 ~                                    ld		(l2deltaX),hl                   ;
 395+ E774 ~                                    ld		(l2deltaY),hl                   ; initlaise deltas as we will only be loading 8 bit in there but workign in 16 bit later
 396+ E774 ~            l2S_preSort:            ld		a,b								;
 397+ E774 ~                                    JumpIfALTNusng	d,l2S_noYSort			; we must have Y1 < Y2 (if eqyal then verical line picked up earlier
 398+ E774 ~            l2S_SortBasedOnY:	    ldhlbc									;
 399+ E774 ~                                    ex		de,hl                           ;
 400+ E774 ~                                    ldbchl									; swap over bc and de using hl as an intermediate
 401+ E774 ~            l2S_noYSort:		    ld		ixh,d							; ixh now holds target Y coord post sorting
 402+ E774 ~                                    ld		ixl,e							; ixl now holds target X coord post sorting
 403+ E774 ~            l2S_setXLen:            ld		a,c                             ;
 404+ E774 ~                                    JumpIfALTNusng e,l2S_PosXLen			; if x1 < x2 then we have a positive increment
 405+ E774 ~            l2S_NegXLen:            ld		a,c                             ;
 406+ E774 ~                                    sub     e                               ;
 407+ E774 ~                                    ld		(l2deltaX),a					; As x1 > x2 we do deltaX = X1 - X2
 408+ E774 ~                                    ld		a,l2deccstep					; and set the value for inc dec self modifying to Dec
 409+ E774 ~                                    jr		l2S_XINCDEC
 410+ E774 ~            ; we set comparison
 411+ E774 ~            l2S_PosXLen:	        ld		a,e                             ;
 412+ E774 ~                                    sub		c                               ;
 413+ E774 ~                                    ld 		(l2deltaX),a                    ; As x1 < x2 we do deltaX = X2 - X1
 414+ E774 ~                                    ld		a,l2inccstep                    ; and set the value for inc dec self modifying to Inc
 415+ E774 ~            ; also need to fix the comparison, if its +x then compare with
 416+ E774 ~            l2S_XINCDEC:	        ld		(l2S_adjustCol),a				;
 417+ E774 ~                                    ld		(l2S_adjustCol2),a				; update self modifying code for X update with inc or dec from above
 418+ E774 ~            l2S_setYLen:            ld		a,d							 	; presorted on Y so it is now always positive
 419+ E774 ~                                    sub		b
 420+ E774 ~                                    ld 		(l2deltaY),a					; DeltaY = Y2 - Y1
 421+ E774 ~            l2S_setErr:									;  LD H  := (D'-E')/2    round up if +ve or down if -ve
 422+ E774 ~            ldS_FracDYltDX:         ld		hl,(l2deltaY)					; Fraction = dY - dX
 423+ E774 ~                                    ld		de,(l2deltaX)
 424+ E774 ~                                    ClearCarryFlag
 425+ E774 ~                                    sbc		hl,de							; sbc does not have an SBC IY so need to do this in HL
 426+ E774 ~                                    ex		de,hl
 427+ E774 ~                                    ld		iyh,d							; we will use IY reg for fractions
 428+ E774 ~                                    ld		iyl,e
 429+ E774 ~                                    jp		p,l2S_fracIsPositive
 430+ E774 ~            l2S_fracIsNegative:     NegIY
 431+ E774 ~                                    ShiftIYRight1
 432+ E774 ~                                    NegIY
 433+ E774 ~                                    jp		l2S_SkipCalcInc					; so we have a negative frac
 434+ E774 ~            l2S_fracIsPositive:     ShiftIYRight1
 435+ E774 ~            l2S_SkipCalcInc:		                        				; As we loop, bc = to plot current XY
 436+ E774 ~            l2S_Loop:			    ld		hl,(l2targetPtr)				; Insert into respective array
 437+ E774 ~                                    ld		a,b
 438+ E774 ~                                    add		hl,a
 439+ E774 ~                                    ld		(hl),c
 440+ E774 ~            l2S_CheckIfEnd:	        ld		a,ixh
 441+ E774 ~                                    JumpIfAGTENusng	  b,l2S_CheckXPos		; if Y1 < Y2 then continue regardless, when it hits Y2 then we must check X1 and X2
 442+ E774 ~                                    jp		l2S_Continue
 443+ E774 ~            l2S_CheckXPos:          ld      a,(l2S_adjustCol)
 444+ E774 ~                                    cp      l2inccstep; if we self modified to inc the we can do a cp e else its cp c
 445+ E774 ~                                    jr      z,.IncCP
 446+ E774 ~            .DecCP:                 ld      a,c
 447+ E774 ~                                    ReturnIfALTNusng ixl
 448+ E774 ~                                    ReturnIfAEqNusng ixl
 449+ E774 ~                                    jp      l2S_Continue
 450+ E774 ~            .IncCP:                 ld		a,c
 451+ E774 ~                                    ReturnIfAGTENusng ixl					; if X1 has reached or exceeded X2 then we are done
 452+ E774 ~            l2S_Continue:
 453+ E774 ~            l2S_HNegative:			ld		a,iyh
 454+ E774 ~                                    bit		7,a								; if its negative then we need to deal with delta Y, there is no bit n,iyh instrunction
 455+ E774 ~                                    jr		z,l2S_ErrNotNegative			;
 456+ E774 ~            l2S_ErrNegative:		ld		a,(l2deltaY)					; if its a negative error update X
 457+ E774 ~                                    ld		d,0
 458+ E774 ~                                    ld		e,a
 459+ E774 ~                                    add		iy,de							; add deltaY(unsinged) to l2fraction
 460+ E774 ~            l2S_adjustCol:          nop										; this is our inc/dec of X
 461+ E774 ~                                    jr		l2S_Loop							; repeat loop
 462+ E774 ~            l2S_ErrNotNegative:     ld		a,iyh
 463+ E774 ~                                    or		iyl
 464+ E774 ~                                    JumpIfAIsZero l2S_ErrZero					; if there is no error then goto zeroerror
 465+ E774 ~            l2S_ErrPositive:        ld      de,iy;  lddeiy								; if its a positive error then we update Y
 466+ E774 ~                                    ex		de,hl
 467+ E774 ~                                    ld		d,0
 468+ E774 ~                                    ld		a,(l2deltaX)
 469+ E774 ~                                    ld		e,a
 470+ E774 ~                                    ClearCarryFlag
 471+ E774 ~                                    sbc		hl,de
 472+ E774 ~                                    ex		de,hl
 473+ E774 ~                                    ld      iy,de;ldiyde
 474+ E774 ~            l2S_adjustRow:          inc		b								; move Y down by one
 475+ E774 ~                                    jr		l2S_Loop
 476+ E774 ~            l2S_ErrZero:            ld		hl,(l2deltaX)
 477+ E774 ~                                    ex		de,hl
 478+ E774 ~                                    ld		hl,(l2deltaY)
 479+ E774 ~                                    ClearCarryFlag
 480+ E774 ~                                    sbc		hl,de
 481+ E774 ~                                    ex		de,hl
 482+ E774 ~                                    ld      iy,de; ldiyde
 483+ E774 ~            l2S_adjustCol2:         nop										; update X and Y
 484+ E774 ~                                    inc		b
 485+ E774 ~                                    jr		l2S_Loop
 486+ E774                      ENDIF
 487+ E774                      DEFINE  L2_DRAW_DIAGONAL 1
 488+ E774                      IFDEF L2_DRAW_DIAGONAL
 489+ E774              ; ">l2_draw_diagonal, bc = y0,x0 de=y1,x1,a=color) Thsi version performs a pre sort based on y axis"
 490+ E774 32 6C E5     l2_draw_diagonal:       ld		(l2linecolor),a					;save colour for later
 491+ E777 21 00 00                             ld		hl,0                            ;
 492+ E77A 22 64 E5                             ld		(l2deltaX),hl                   ;
 493+ E77D 22 62 E5                             ld		(l2deltaY),hl                   ; initlaise deltas as we will only be loading 8 bit in there but workign in 16 bit later
 494+ E780 78           l2D_preSort:            ld		a,b								;
 495+ E781                                      JumpIfALTNusng	d,l2D_noYSort			; we must have Y1 < Y2 (if equal then verical line picked up earlier
 495+ E781 BA          >                        cp      d
 495+ E782 DA 8A E7    >                        jp		c, l2D_noYSort
 496+ E785              l2D_SortBasedOnY:	    ldhlbc									;
 496+ E785 60          >                        ld		h,b
 496+ E786 69          >                        ld		l,c
 497+ E787 EB                                   ex		de,hl                           ;
 498+ E788                                      ldbchl									; swap over bc and de using hl as an intermediate
 498+ E788 44          >                        ld		b,h
 498+ E789 4D          >                        ld		c,l
 499+ E78A DD 62        l2D_noYSort:		    ld		ixh,d							; ixh now holds target Y coord post sorting
 500+ E78C DD 6B                                ld		ixl,e							; ixl now holds target X coord post sorting
 501+ E78E 79           l2D_setXLen:            ld		a,c                             ;
 502+ E78F                                      JumpIfALTNusng e,l2D_PosXLen			; if x1 < x2 then we have a positive increment
 502+ E78F BB          >                        cp      e
 502+ E790 DA 9C E7    >                        jp		c, l2D_PosXLen
 503+ E793 79           l2D_NegXLen:            ld		a,c                             ;
 504+ E794 93                                   sub     e                               ;
 505+ E795 32 64 E5                             ld		(l2deltaX),a					; As x1 > x2 we do deltaX = X1 - X2
 506+ E798 3E 0D                                ld		a,l2deccstep					; and set the value for inc dec self modifying to Dec
 507+ E79A 18 07                                jr		l2D_XINCDEC
 508+ E79C 7B           l2D_PosXLen:	        ld		a,e                             ;
 509+ E79D 91                                   sub		c                               ;
 510+ E79E 32 64 E5                             ld 		(l2deltaX),a                    ; As x1 < x2 we do deltaX = X2 - X1
 511+ E7A1 3E 0C                                ld		a,l2inccstep                    ; and set the value for inc dec self modifying to Inc
 512+ E7A3 32 1E E8     l2D_XINCDEC:	        ld		(l2D_adjustCol),a				;
 513+ E7A6 32 4E E8                             ld		(l2D_adjustCol2),a				; update self modifying code for X update with inc or dec from above
 514+ E7A9 7A           l2D_setYLen				ld		a,d							 	; presorted on Y so it is now always positive
 515+ E7AA 90                                   sub		b
 516+ E7AB 32 62 E5                             ld 		(l2deltaY),a					; DeltaY = Y2 - Y1
 517+ E7AE              l2D_setErr:									;  LD H  := (D'-E')/2    round up if +ve or down if -ve
 518+ E7AE 2A 62 E5     ldD_FracDYltDX:			ld		hl,(l2deltaY)					; Fraction = dY - dX
 519+ E7B1 ED 5B 64 E5                          ld		de,(l2deltaX)
 520+ E7B5                                      ClearCarryFlag
 520+ E7B5 B7          >                        or a
 521+ E7B6 ED 52                                sbc		hl,de							; sbc does not have an SBC IY so need to do this in HL
 522+ E7B8 EB                                   ex		de,hl
 523+ E7B9 FD 62                                ld		iyh,d							; we will use IY reg for fractions
 524+ E7BB FD 6B                                ld		iyl,e
 525+ E7BD F2 E2 E7                             jp		p,l2D_fracIsPositive
 526+ E7C0              l2D_fracIsNegative:     NegIY
 526+ E7C0 AF          >                    xor a
 526+ E7C1 FD 95       >                    sub iyl
 526+ E7C3 FD 6F       >                    ld iyl,a
 526+ E7C5 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 526+ E7C6 FD 94       >                    sub iyh
 526+ E7C8 FD 67       >                    ld iyh,a
 527+ E7CA                                      ShiftIYRight1
 527+ E7CA FD 7C       >			   ld 	a,iyh
 527+ E7CC CB 3F       >			   srl 	a
 527+ E7CE FD 67       >			   ld	iyh,a
 527+ E7D0 FD 7D       >			   ld 	a,iyl
 527+ E7D2 1F          >			   rra
 527+ E7D3 FD 6F       >			   ld	iyl,a
 528+ E7D5                                      NegIY
 528+ E7D5 AF          >                    xor a
 528+ E7D6 FD 95       >                    sub iyl
 528+ E7D8 FD 6F       >                    ld iyl,a
 528+ E7DA 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 528+ E7DB FD 94       >                    sub iyh
 528+ E7DD FD 67       >                    ld iyh,a
 529+ E7DF C3 ED E7                             jp		l2D_SkipCalcInc					; so we have a negative frac
 530+ E7E2              l2D_fracIsPositive:     ShiftIYRight1
 530+ E7E2 FD 7C       >			   ld 	a,iyh
 530+ E7E4 CB 3F       >			   srl 	a
 530+ E7E6 FD 67       >			   ld	iyh,a
 530+ E7E8 FD 7D       >			   ld 	a,iyl
 530+ E7EA 1F          >			   rra
 530+ E7EB FD 6F       >			   ld	iyl,a
 531+ E7ED              l2D_SkipCalcInc:
 532+ E7ED C5 D5        l2D_Loop:				push	bc,,de                 			; l2DeltaY and l2DeltaX are set
 533+ E7EF 3A 6C E5                             ld		a,(l2linecolor)     			;
 534+ E7F2                                      l2_plot_macro;call	l2_plot_pixel       			; Plot Pixel
 534+ E7F2 78          >                        ld      a,b
 534+ E7F3             >                        JumpIfAGTENusng 192 ,.NoPlot
 534+ E7F3 FE C0       >                        cp     192
 534+ E7F5 D2 01 E8    >                        jp		nc,.NoPlot
 534+ E7F8 69          >                        ld      l,c
 534+ E7F9 CD 68 E0    >                        call    asm_l2_row_bank_select
 534+ E7FC 67          >                        ld      h,a
 534+ E7FD 3A B5 E2    >                        ld      a,(line_gfx_colour)
 534+ E800 77          >                        ld      (hl),a
 534+ E801             >.NoPlot:
 535+ E801 D1 C1                                pop     bc,,de
 536+ E803 DD 7C        l2D_CheckIfEnd:	        ld		a,ixh
 537+ E805                                      JumpIfAGTENusng	  b,l2D_CheckXPos		; if Y1 < Y2 then continue regardless, when it hits Y2 then we must check X1 and X2
 537+ E805 B8          >                        cp     b
 537+ E806 D2 0C E8    >                        jp		nc,l2D_CheckXPos
 538+ E809 C3 10 E8                             jp		l2D_Continue
 539+ E80C 79           l2D_CheckXPos:          ld		a,c
 540+ E80D                                      ReturnIfAEqNusng ixl					; if X1 has reached or exceeded X2 then we are done
 540+ E80D DD BD       >                        cp      ixl
 540+ E80F C8          >                        ret     z
 541+ E810              l2D_Continue:
 542+ E810 FD 7C        l2D_HNegative:			ld		a,iyh
 543+ E812 CB 7F                                bit		7,a								; if its negative then we need to deal with delta Y, there is no bit n,iyh instrunction
 544+ E814 28 0B                                jr		z,l2D_ErrNotNegative			;
 545+ E816 3A 62 E5     l2D_ErrNegative:		ld		a,(l2deltaY)
 546+ E819 16 00                                ld		d,0
 547+ E81B 5F                                   ld		e,a
 548+ E81C FD 19                                add		iy,de							; add deltaY(unsinged) to l2fraction
 549+ E81E 00           l2D_adjustCol:          nop										; this is our inc/dec of X
 550+ E81F 18 CC                                jr		l2D_Loop							; repeat loop
 551+ E821 FD 7C        l2D_ErrNotNegative:     ld		a,iyh
 552+ E823 FD B5                                or		iyl
 553+ E825                                      JumpIfAIsZero l2D_ErrZero					; if there is no error then goto zeroerror
 553+ E825 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 553+ E826 CA 3F E8    >                        jp	    z, l2D_ErrZero
 554+ E829 FD 54 FD 5D  l2D_ErrPositive:		ld      de,iy;lddeiy
 555+ E82D EB                                   ex		de,hl
 556+ E82E 16 00                                ld		d,0
 557+ E830 3A 64 E5                             ld		a,(l2deltaX)
 558+ E833 5F                                   ld		e,a
 559+ E834                                      ClearCarryFlag
 559+ E834 B7          >                        or a
 560+ E835 ED 52                                sbc		hl,de
 561+ E837 EB                                   ex		de,hl
 562+ E838 FD 62 FD 6B                          ld      iy,de;ldiyde
 563+ E83C 04           l2D_adjustRow:			inc		b
 564+ E83D 18 AE                                jr		l2D_Loop
 565+ E83F 2A 64 E5     l2D_ErrZero:            ld		hl,(l2deltaX)
 566+ E842 EB                                   ex		de,hl
 567+ E843 2A 62 E5                             ld		hl,(l2deltaY)
 568+ E846                                      ClearCarryFlag
 568+ E846 B7          >                        or a
 569+ E847 ED 52                                sbc		hl,de
 570+ E849 EB                                   ex		de,hl
 571+ E84A FD 62 FD 6B                          ld      iy,de;ldiyde
 572+ E84E 00           l2D_adjustCol2:         nop										; update X and Y
 573+ E84F 04                                   inc		b
 574+ E850 18 9B                                jr		l2D_Loop
 575+ E852              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 576+ E852                      ENDIF
 577+ E852
 578+ E852
 579+ E852
 580+ E852              ;Loin:				; BBC version of line draw
 581+ E852              ;; ">l2_draw_diagonal, bc = y0,x0 de=y1,x1,a=color)"
 582+ E852              ;	ld		(l2linecolor),a					; save colour as a reg gets used alot, coudl move this into interrupt flag and disable interrups
 583+ E852              ;	ld		ixh,0							; ixh = s
 584+ E852              ;	ld		iyh,0							; iyh = swap
 585+ E852              ;	ld		l,0								; l will hold delta sign flags
 586+ E852              ;LoinCalcDeltaX:
 587+ E852              ;	ld		a,e
 588+ E852              ;	sub		c								; a = deltaX
 589+ E852              ;	JumpIfPositive LoinPosDx
 590+ E852              ;LoinNegDx:
 591+ E852              ;	neg										; carry flag will indicate deltaX was negative
 592+ E852              ;	ld		l,$80							; set bit 7 of l for negative
 593+ E852              ;LoinPosDx:
 594+ E852              ;	ld		ixl,a							; ixl = varP = deltaX
 595+ E852              ;LoinCalcDeltaY:
 596+ E852              ;	ld		a,d
 597+ E852              ;	sub		b								; a= deltaY
 598+ E852              ;	JumpIfPositive LoinPosDy
 599+ E852              ;LoinNegDy:
 600+ E852              ;	neg
 601+ E852              ;	set		6,l								; set bit 6 of l for negative deltaY
 602+ E852              ;LoinPosDy:
 603+ E852              ;	ld		iyl,a							; iyl = varQ = deltaY
 604+ E852              ;	JumpIfAGTENusng ixl, LoinSTPy			; if deltaY >= DeltaX then step along Y
 605+ E852              ;LoinSTPx:									; step along X
 606+ E852              ;	JumpOnBitClear l,7						; if l flags were clear then X2 < X2
 607+ E852              ;LoinSTPxSwapCoords:
 608+ E852              ;	dec		iyh								; swap flag now becomes FF
 609+ E852              ;	ld		a,l								; save l flags
 610+ E852              ;	ex		de,hl							; save de to hl
 611+ E852              ;	lddebc									; Point2 = point1
 612+ E852              ;	ldbchl									; Point1 = point2 that was saved
 613+ E852              ;	ld		l,a								; get back l flags
 614+ E852              ;LoinSTPxCorrectOrder:
 615+ E852              ;	l2_point_pixel_y_safe					; call plot pixel preseving bc hl
 616+ E852              ;	ld		a,iyl							; get delta Y back
 617+ E852              ;	ld		iy1,$FE							; roll counter
 618+ E852              ;LionSTPxRollQ:
 619+ E852              ;	sla		a								; highest bit of delta-Y
 620+ E852              ;	jp		c,LoinSTPxSteep
 621+ E852              ;	cp		ixl								; compare with DeltaX
 622+ E852              ;	jp		cs,LoinSTPxShallow
 623+ E852              ;LoinSTPxSteep:								;; LI4
 624+ E852              ;	sbc		a,ixl							; deltaYwork -= (deltaX+1)
 625+ E852              ;	scf										; force carry flag set
 626+ E852              ;LoinSTPxShallow:							;; LI5
 627+ E852              ;	rl		iyl								; rotate iyl which started as FE
 628+ E852              ;	jp		c,LionSTPxRollQ					; so we are doing a 6 bit loop
 629+ E852              ;	inc		ihl								; DeltaX += 1
 630+ E852              ;LoinSTPxYDirection:							; change this to self modifying code
 631+ E852              ;	ld		a,d
 632+ E852              ;	JumpIfAGTEn	b,LionDOWN:
 633+ E852              ;	ld		a,iyh							; swap flag
 634+ E852              ;	JumpIfANotZero	X1Inc  					; if swap flag was not set then no need to update R
 635+ E852              ;LoinSTPxX1Dec:
 636+ E852              ;	dec		c								; move left 1 pixel as we sawped
 637+ E852              ;LoinSTPxXCounter:							;; LIL2
 638+ E852              ;	sub		b
 639+ E852              ;	if
 640+ E852              ;
 641+ E852              ;85 82                   STA &82	   \ R	\ mask byte
 642+ E852              ;A5 81                   LDA &81	   \ Q	\ delta-Y
 643+ E852              ;A2 FE                   LDX #&FE	\ roll counter
 644+ E852              ;86 81                   STX &81		\ Q
 645+ E852              ;.LIL1	\ roll Q
 646+ E852              ;0A                      ASL A		\ highest bit of delta-Y
 647+ E852              ;B0 04                   BCS LI4		\ steep
 648+ E852              ;C5 1B                   CMP &1B	   \ P	\ delta-X
 649+ E852              ;90 03                   BCC LI5		\ shallow
 650+ E852              ;.LI4	\ steep
 651+ E852              ;E5 1B                   SBC &1B		\ P
 652+ E852              ;38                      SEC
 653+ E852              ;.LI5	\ shallow
 654+ E852              ;26 81                   ROL &81	   \ Q	\ #&FE
 655+ E852              ;B0 F2                   BCS LIL1 	\ loop Q, end with some low bits in Q
 656+ E852              ;A6 1B                   LDX &1B		\ P
 657+ E852              ;E8                      INX 		\ Xreg is width
 658+ E852              ;A5 37                   LDA &37		\ Y2
 659+ E852              ;E5 35                   SBC &35		\ Y1
 660+ E852              ;B0 2C                   BCS DOWN	\ draw line to the right and down
 661+ E852              ;A5 90                   LDA &90		\ SWAP
 662+ E852              ;D0 07                   BNE LI6		\ else Xreg was correct after all, no need to update R
 663+ E852              ;CA                      DEX
 664+ E852              ;.LIL2	\ counter X width
 665+ E852              ;A5 82                   LDA &82	   \ R	\ mask byte
 666+ E852              ;51 07                   EOR (&07),Y	\ (SC),Y
 667+ E852              ;91 07                   STA (&07),Y	\ (SC),Y
 668+ E852              ;.LI6	\ Xreg correct
 669+ E852              ;46 82                   LSR &82	   \ R	\ mask byte
 670+ E852              ;90 08                   BCC LI7   	\ else moving to next column to right. Bring carry in back
 671+ E852              ;66 82                   ROR &82		\ R
 672+ E852              ;A5 07                   LDA &07		\ SC
 673+ E852              ;69 08                   ADC #8		\ next column
 674+ E852              ;85 07                   STA &07		\ SC
 675+ E852              ;.LI7	\ S += Q. this is like an overflow monitor to update Y
 676+ E852              ;A5 83                   LDA &83		\ S
 677+ E852              ;65 81                   ADC &81	   \ Q	\ some low bits
 678+ E852              ;85 83                   STA &83		\ S
 679+ E852              ;90 07                   BCC LIC2	\ skip Y adjustment
 680+ E852              ;88                      DEY
 681+ E852              ;10 04                   BPL LIC2	\ skip Y adjustment
 682+ E852              ;C6 08                   DEC &08		\ SC+1
 683+ E852              ;A0 07                   LDY #7
 684+ E852              ;.LIC2	\ skip Y adjustment
 685+ E852              ;CA                      DEX
 686+ E852              ;D0 DC                   BNE LIL2	\ loop X width
 687+ E852              ;A4 85                   LDY &85	 \ YSAV \ restore Yreg
 688+ E852              ;60                      RTS
 689+ E852              ;
 690+ E852              ;.DOWN	\ Line is going to the right and down
 691+ E852              ;A5 90                   LDA &90		\ SWAP
 692+ E852              ;F0 07                   BEQ LI9		\ no swap
 693+ E852              ;CA                      DEX
 694+ E852              ;.LIL3	\ counter X width
 695+ E852              ;A5 82                   LDA &82	    \ R \ mask byte
 696+ E852              ;51 07                   EOR (&07),Y	\ (SC),Y
 697+ E852              ;91 07                   STA (&07),Y	\ (SC),Y
 698+ E852              ;.LI9	\ no swap
 699+ E852              ;46 82                   LSR &82		\ R
 700+ E852              ;90 08                   BCC LI10	\ still in correct column, hop
 701+ E852              ;66 82                   ROR &82		\ R
 702+ E852              ;A5 07                   LDA &07		\ SC
 703+ E852              ;69 08                   ADC #8		\ next column
 704+ E852              ;85 07                   STA &07		\ SC
 705+ E852              ;.LI10	\ this is like an overflow monitor to update Y
 706+ E852              ;A5 83                   LDA &83		\ S
 707+ E852              ;65 81                   ADC &81		\ Q
 708+ E852              ;85 83                   STA &83		\ S
 709+ E852              ;90 09                   BCC LIC3	\ skip Y adjustment
 710+ E852              ;C8                      INY
 711+ E852              ;C0 08                   CPY #8
 712+ E852              ;D0 04                   BNE LIC3	\ have not reached bottom byte of char, hop
 713+ E852              ;E6 08                   INC &08		\ SC+1
 714+ E852              ;A0 00                   LDY #0
 715+ E852              ;.LIC3	\ skipped Y adjustment
 716+ E852              ;CA                      DEX
 717+ E852              ;D0 DA                   BNE LIL3	\ loop X width
 718+ E852              ;A4 85                   LDY &85	 \ YSAV \ restore Yreg
 719+ E852              ;60                      RTS
 720+ E852              ;
 721+ E852              ;.STPY	\ -> &1797 \ Step along y for line, goes down and to right
 722+ E852              ;A4 35                   LDY &35		\ Y1
 723+ E852              ;98                      TYA
 724+ E852              ;A6 34                   LDX &34		\ X1
 725+ E852              ;C4 37                   CPY &37		\ Y2
 726+ E852              ;B0 10                   BCS LI15	\ skip swap if Y1 >= Y2
 727+ E852              ;C6 90                   DEC &90		\ SWAP
 728+ E852              ;A5 36                   LDA &36		\ X2
 729+ E852              ;85 34                   STA &34		\ X1
 730+ E852              ;86 36                   STX &36		\ X2
 731+ E852              ;AA                      TAX
 732+ E852              ;A5 37                   LDA &37		\ Y2
 733+ E852              ;85 35                   STA &35		\ Y1
 734+ E852              ;84 37                   STY &37		\ Y2
 735+ E852              ;A8                      TAY
 736+ E852              ;.LI15	\ Y1 Y2 order is now correct
 737+ E852              ;4A                      LSR A
 738+ E852              ;4A                      LSR A
 739+ E852              ;4A                      LSR A
 740+ E852              ;09 60                   ORA #&60
 741+ E852              ;85 08                   STA &08	 \ SC+1	\ screen hi
 742+ E852              ;8A                      TXA 		\ X1
 743+ E852              ;29 F8                   AND #&F8
 744+ E852              ;85 07                   STA &07	  \ SC	\ screen lo
 745+ E852              ;8A                      TXA
 746+ E852              ;29 07                   AND #7		\ mask index
 747+ E852              ;AA                      TAX
 748+ E852              ;BD AF 16                LDA &16AF,X \ TWOS,X \ Mode4 single pixel
 749+ E852              ;85 82                   STA &82	    \ R	\ mask
 750+ E852              ;A5 35                   LDA &35		\ Y1
 751+ E852              ;29 07                   AND #7
 752+ E852              ;A8                      TAY
 753+ E852              ;A5 1B                   LDA &1B	    \ P	\ delta-X
 754+ E852              ;A2 01                   LDX #1		\ roll counter
 755+ E852              ;86 1B                   STX &1B	    	\ P
 756+ E852              ;.LIL4	\ roll P
 757+ E852              ;0A                      ASL A
 758+ E852              ;B0 04                   BCS LI13	\ do subtraction
 759+ E852              ;C5 81                   CMP &81	    \ Q	\ delta-Y
 760+ E852              ;90 03                   BCC LI14	\ less than Q
 761+ E852              ;.LI13	\ do subtraction
 762+ E852              ;E5 81                   SBC &81		\ Q
 763+ E852              ;38                      SEC
 764+ E852              ;.LI14	\ less than Q
 765+ E852              ;26 1B                   ROL &1B		\ P
 766+ E852              ;90 F2                   BCC LIL4	\ loop P, end with some low bits in P
 767+ E852              ;A6 81                   LDX &81		\ Q
 768+ E852              ;E8                      INX 		\ adjust height
 769+ E852              ;A5 36                   LDA &36		\ X2
 770+ E852              ;E5 34                   SBC &34		\ X1
 771+ E852              ;90 2D                   BCC LFT		\ if C cleared then line moving to the left - hop down
 772+ E852              ;18                      CLC
 773+ E852              ;A5 90                   LDA &90		\ SWAP
 774+ E852              ;F0 07                   BEQ LI17 	\ skip first point
 775+ E852              ;CA                      DEX
 776+ E852              ;.LIL5	\ skipped first point, counter X
 777+ E852              ;A5 82                   LDA &82	    \ R \ mask byte
 778+ E852              ;51 07                   EOR (&07),Y	\ (SC),Y
 779+ E852              ;91 07                   STA (&07),Y	\ (SC),Y
 780+ E852              ;.LI17	\ skipped first point
 781+ E852              ;88                      DEY
 782+ E852              ;10 04                   BPL LI16	\ skip hi adjust
 783+ E852              ;C6 08                   DEC &08		\ SC+1
 784+ E852              ;A0 07                   LDY #7		\ new char
 785+ E852              ;	.LI16	\ skipped hi adjust
 786+ E852              ;A5 83                   LDA &83		\ S
 787+ E852              ;65 1B                   ADC &1B		\ P
 788+ E852              ;85 83                   STA &83		\ S
 789+ E852              ;90 0C                   BCC LIC5	\ skip, still in same column
 790+ E852              ;46 82                   LSR &82	  \ R	\ mask
 791+ E852              ;90 08                   BCC LIC5  	\ no mask bit hop
 792+ E852              ;66 82                   ROR &82   \ R	\ else moved over to next column, reset mask
 793+ E852              ;A5 07                   LDA &07	  \ SC  \ screen lo
 794+ E852              ;69 08                   ADC #8		\ next char below
 795+ E852              ;85 07                   STA &07		\ SC
 796+ E852              ;.LIC5	\ same column
 797+ E852              ;CA                      DEX
 798+ E852              ;D0 DC                   BNE LIL5	\ loop X height
 799+ E852              ;A4 85                   LDY &85	 \ YSAV	\ restore Yreg
 800+ E852              ;60                      RTS
 801+ E852              ;
 802+ E852              ;.LFT	\ going left
 803+ E852              ;A5 90                   LDA &90		\ SWAP
 804+ E852              ;F0 07                   BEQ LI18	\ skip first point
 805+ E852              ;CA                      DEX 		\ reduce height
 806+ E852              ;.LIL6	\ counter X height
 807+ E852              ;A5 82                   LDA &82	   \ R	\ mask byte
 808+ E852              ;51 07                   EOR (&07),Y	\ (SC),Y
 809+ E852              ;91 07                   STA (&07),Y	\ (SC),Y
 810+ E852              ;.LI18
 811+ E852              ;88                      DEY
 812+ E852              ;10 04                   BPL LI19	\ skip hi adjust
 813+ E852              ;C6 08                   DEC &08		\ SC+1
 814+ E852              ;A0 07                   LDY #7		\ rest char row
 815+ E852              ;.LI19	\ skipped hi adjust
 816+ E852              ;A5 83                   LDA &83		\ S
 817+ E852              ;65 1B                   ADC &1B	    \ P \ some low bits
 818+ E852              ;85 83                   STA &83		\ S
 819+ E852              ;90 0D                   BCC LIC6	\ no overflow
 820+ E852              ;06 82                   ASL &82	    \ R \ else move byte mask to the left
 821+ E852              ;90 09                   BCC LIC6	\ no overflow
 822+ E852              ;26 82                   ROL &82		\ R
 823+ E852              ;A5 07                   LDA &07		\ SC
 824+ E852              ;E9 07                   SBC #7		\ down 1 char
 825+ E852              ;85 07                   STA &07		\ SC
 826+ E852              ;18                      CLC
 827+ E852              ;.LIC6	\ no overflow
 828+ E852              ;CA                      DEX 		\ height
 829+ E852              ;D0 DB                   BNE LIL6	\ loop X
 830+ E852              ;A4 85                   LDY &85	 \ YSAV	\ restore Yreg
 831+ E852              ;.HL6
 832+ E852              ;60                      RTS 		\ end Line drawing
