 922+ F8D7 2A F1 F5                             ld      hl,(y_pos)                      ;           if ((y_pos > 127) || (y_pos == 127 && rem >= delta_x))
 923+ F8DA 11 7F 00                             ld      de,127                          ;           .
 924+ F8DD CD C1 99                             call    CompareHLDESame                 ;           .    if y_pos != clipxmax skip the abort test
 925+ F8E0 20 0B                                jr      nz,.YPosNotClipymax             ;           .
 926+ F8E2 2A 13 F6                             ld      hl,(rem)                        ;           .    if rem < delta_y  skip the abort test
 927+ F8E5 ED 5B FE F5                          ld      de,(delta_x)                    ;           .
 928+ F8E9 CD AA 99                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;           .
 929+ F8EC D8                                   ret     c                               ;           .
 930+ F8ED EB           .YPosNotClipymax:       ex      de,hl                           ;           .    swap over xpos and max to compare xpos > xmax
 931+ F8EE CD AA 99                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;           .    if xpos > clipxmax then return (i.e clipxmax - xpos had a carry)
 932+ F8F1 D8                                   ret     c
 933+ F8F2 2A F9 F5     .yposLT127:             ld      hl,(clip_xmin)                  ;               x_pos = clip_xmin;
 934+ F8F5 22 EF F5                             ld      (x_pos),hl                      ;               .
 935+ F8F8 2A 10 F6                             ld      hl,(error)                      ;               error += rem
 936+ F8FB ED 5B 13 F6                          ld      de,(rem)                        ;               .
 937+ F8FF                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;               .
 937+ F8FF B7          >                        or a
 938+ F900 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                           ;               .
 939+ F902 22 10 F6                             ld      (error),hl                      ;               .
 940+ F905 2A 13 F6                             ld      hl,(rem)                        ;               if (rem >= delta_x)
 941+ F908 ED 5B FE F5                          ld      de,(delta_x)                    ;               .
 942+ F90C CD AA 99                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;               .
 943+ F90F DA 26 F9                             jp      c,.remLTDeltaX                  ;               .
 944+ F912 2A F1 F5     .remGTEDeltaX:          ld      hl,(y_pos)                      ;                   y_pos++
 945+ F915 23                                   inc     hl
 946+ F916 22 F1 F5                             ld      (y_pos),hl
 947+ F919 2A 10 F6                             ld      hl,(error)                      ;                    error -= delta_x_step;
 948+ F91C ED 5B 04 F6                          ld      de,(delta_x_step)               ;                    .
 949+ F920                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;                    .
 949+ F920 B7          >                        or a
 950+ F921 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;                    .
 951+ F923 22 10 F6                             ld      (error),hl                      ;                    .
 952+ F926              .remLTDeltaX:
 953+ F926 2A D8 F5     .exit_false:            ld      hl,(x2)                         ;           x_pos_end = x2;
 954+ F929 22 F3 F5                             ld      (x_pos_end),hl                  ;           .
 955+ F92C 2A DA F5                             ld      hl,(y2)                         ;           if (y2 > 127)
 956+ F92F 11 7F 00                             ld      de,127                          ;           .
 957+ F932 CD C1 99                             call    CompareHLDESame                 ;           .   if y2 is zero fails check
 958+ F935 CA 8C F9                             jp      z,.y2LTE127                     ;           .
 959+ F938 CD AA 99                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;           .   if y2 < 127 then there is carry so fails check
 960+ F93B DA 8C F9                             jp      c,.y2LTE127                      ;           .
 961+ F93E 21 7F 00     .y2GT127:               ld      hl,127                          ;               temp = delta_x_step * (127 - y1) + delta_x;
 962+ F941 ED 5B D6 F5                          ld      de,(y1)                         ;                   hl = 127-y1
 963+ F945                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;
 963+ F945 B7          >                        or a
 964+ F946 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 965+ F948 ED 5B 04 F6                          ld      de,(delta_x_step)               ;                   hl = delta_x_step * (127-y1)
 966+ F94C CD E3 91                             call    mulHLbyDE2sc                    ;                   .
 967+ F94F ED 5B FE F5                          ld      de,(delta_x)                    ;                   hl += delta_x
 968+ F953                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;                   .
 968+ F953 B7          >                        or a
 969+ F954 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                           ;                   .
 970+ F956 22 E4 F5                             ld      (temp),hl
 971+ F959 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl
 972+ F95B ED 5B 06 F6                          ld      de,(delta_y_step)               ;               msd = temp / delta y step
 973+ F95F CD 75 97                             call    Floor_DivQ                      ;               .
 974+ F962 ED 43 0E F6                          ld      (msd),bc                        ;               .
 975+ F966 2A D4 F5                             ld      hl,(x1)                         ;               x_pos_end = x1 + msd;
 976+ F969                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;               .
 976+ F969 B7          >                        or a
 977+ F96A ED 4A                                adc     hl,bc                           ;               .
 978+ F96C 22 F3 F5                             ld      (x_pos_end),hl                  ;               .
 979+ F96F 2A 0E F6                             ld      hl,(msd)                        ;               if ((temp - msd * delta_y_step) == 0) --x_pos_end
 980+ F972 ED 5B 06 F6                          ld      de,(delta_y_step)               ;               .
 981+ F976 CD E3 91                             call    mulHLbyDE2sc                    ;               .
 982+ F979 EB                                   ex      de,hl                           ;               .
 983+ F97A 2A E4 F5                             ld      hl,(temp)                       ;               .
 984+ F97D                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;               .
 984+ F97D B7          >                        or a
 985+ F97E ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;               .
 986+ F980 7C                                   ld      a,h                             ;               .
 987+ F981 B5                                   or      l                               ;               .
 988+ F982 C2 8C F9                             jp      nz,.NotTheSame                  ;               .
 989+ F985 2A F3 F5     .IsTheSame:             ld      hl,(x_pos_end)                  ;                   --x_pos_end
 990+ F988 2B                                   dec     hl                              ;                   .
 991+ F989 22 F3 F5                             ld      (x_pos_end),hl                  ;                   .
 992+ F98C              .NotTheSame:
 993+ F98C 2A F3 F5     .y2LTE127:              ld      hl,(x_pos_end)                  ;           x_pos_end = min (x_pos_end,clip_xmax) + 1
 994+ F98F ED 5B F7 F5                          ld      de,(clip_xmax)                  ;           .
 995+ F993 CD AA 99                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;           .
 996+ F996 D2 A3 F9                             jp      nc,.xposgtexmax                 ;           .
 997+ F999 2A F3 F5     .xposltxmax:            ld      hl,(x_pos_end)                  ;           .
 998+ F99C 23                                   inc     hl                              ;               x_pos_end+1
 999+ F99D 22 F3 F5                             ld      (x_pos_end),hl                  ;               .
1000+ F9A0 C3 A8 F9                             jp      .DoneXposAdjust                 ;               .
1001+ F9A3 13           .xposgtexmax:           inc     de                              ;               else
1002+ F9A4 ED 53 F3 F5                          ld      (x_pos_end),de                  ;               clip_xmax+1
1003+ F9A8 3A FB F5     .DoneXposAdjust:        ld      a,(sign_x)                      ;           if (sign_x == -1)
1004+ F9AB 3C                                   inc     a
1005+ F9AC C2 C7 F9                             jp      nz,.SignNotMinus1
1006+ F9AF 2A EF F5     .SignEquMinus1:         ld      hl,(x_pos)                      ;               x_pos = -x_pos;
1007+ F9B2                                      macronegate16hl
1007+ F9B2 AF          >					xor 	a
1007+ F9B3 95          >					sub 	l
1007+ F9B4 6F          >					ld 		l,a
1007+ F9B5 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
1007+ F9B6 94          >					sub 	h
1007+ F9B7 67          >					ld 		h,a
1008+ F9B8 22 EF F5                             ld      (x_pos),hl
1009+ F9BB 2A F3 F5                             ld      hl,(x_pos_end)                  ;               x_pos_end = -x_pos_end;
1010+ F9BE                                      macronegate16hl
1010+ F9BE AF          >					xor 	a
1010+ F9BF 95          >					sub 	l
1010+ F9C0 6F          >					ld 		l,a
1010+ F9C1 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
1010+ F9C2 94          >					sub 	h
1010+ F9C3 67          >					ld 		h,a
1011+ F9C4 22 F3 F5                             ld      (x_pos_end),hl
1012+ F9C7              .y2LTE27:
1013+ F9C7              .SignNotMinus1:
1014+ F9C7 ED 5B 06 F6                          ld      de,(delta_y_step)               ;        delta_x_step -= delta_y_step;
1015+ F9CB 2A 04 F6                             ld      hl,(delta_x_step)               ;        .
1016+ F9CE                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;        .
1016+ F9CE B7          >                        or a
1017+ F9CF ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;        .
1018+ F9D1 22 04 F6                             ld      (delta_x_step),hl               ;        .
1019+ F9D4 2A EF F5     .PlottingLoop:          ld      hl,(x_pos)                      ;        while (x_pos != x_pos_end)
1020+ F9D7 ED 5B F3 F5                          ld      de,(x_pos_end)                  ;        .
1021+ F9DB CD C1 99                             call    CompareHLDESame                 ;        .
1022+ F9DE C8                                   ret     z                               ;        .
1023+ F9DF 2A EF F5                             ld      hl,(x_pos)                      ;               drawpixel at xpos, ypos, Colour
1024+ F9E2 4D                                   ld      c,l                             ;               .
1025+ F9E3 2A F1 F5                             ld      hl,(y_pos)                      ;               .
1026+ F9E6 45                                   ld      b,l                             ;               .
1027+ F9E7 3E BF                                ld      a,$BF                           ;               .
1028+ F9E9 CD B6 E2     .PlotPixel:             call    l2_plot_pixel                   ;               .
1029+ F9EC 2A 10 F6                             ld      hl,(error)                      ;               if (error >= 0)
1030+ F9EF CB 7C                                bit     7,h                             ;               .
1031+ F9F1 C2 0B FA                             jp      nz,.errorLT0                    ;               .
1032+ F9F4 2A F1 F5     .errorGTE0:             ld	    hl,(y_pos)                      ;                   ++y_pos;
1033+ F9F7 23                                   inc	    hl                              ;                   .
1034+ F9F8 22 F1 F5                             ld	    (y_pos),hl                      ;                   .
1035+ F9FB 2A 10 F6                             ld	    hl,(error)                      ;                   error -= delta_x_step;
1036+ F9FE ED 5B 04 F6                          ld	    de,(delta_x_step)               ;                   .
1037+ FA02                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;                   .
1037+ FA02 B7          >                        or a
1038+ FA03 ED 52                                sbc	    hl,de                           ;                   .
1039+ FA05 22 10 F6                             ld	    (error),hl                      ;                   .
1040+ FA08 C3 18 FA                             jp      .DoneErrorAdjust                ;                   .
1041+ FA0B 2A 10 F6     .errorLT0:              ld	    hl,(error)                      ;                   error += delta_y_step;
1042+ FA0E ED 5B 06 F6                          ld	    de,(delta_y_step)
1043+ FA12                                      ClearCarryFlag
1043+ FA12 B7          >                        or a
1044+ FA13 ED 5A                                adc	    hl,de
1045+ FA15 22 10 F6                             ld	    (error),hl
1046+ FA18 ED 5B FB F5  .DoneErrorAdjust:       ld      de,(sign_x)
1047+ FA1C 2A EF F5                             ld      hl,(x_pos)
1048+ FA1F                                      ClearCarryFlag
1048+ FA1F B7          >                        or a
1049+ FA20 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de
1050+ FA22 22 EF F5                             ld      (x_pos),hl
1051+ FA25 C3 D4 F9                             jp      .PlottingLoop
1052+ FA28              ;.......................DxGltDy branch.............................................................................................
1053+ FA28              LineDrawDxLTDy:         ;ret
1054+ FA28 2A 04 F6                             ld      hl,(delta_x_step)               ;       error = delta_x_step - delta_y;
1055+ FA2B ED 5B 00 F6                          ld      de,(delta_y)
1056+ FA2F                                      ClearCarryFlag
1056+ FA2F B7          >                        or a
1057+ FA30 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
1058+ FA32 22 10 F6                             ld      (error),hl
1059+ FA35                                      ZeroA                                   ;        set exit false (0 == false)
1059+ FA35 AF          >                        xor a
1060+ FA36 32 12 F6                             ld      (set_exit),a
1061+ FA39 2A D4 F5                             ld      hl,(x1)                         ;        if (x1 < clip_xmin)
1062+ FA3C ED 5B F9 F5                          ld      de,(clip_xmin)                  ;        .
1063+ FA40 CD AA 99                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;        .
1064+ FA43 D2 D7 FA                             jp      nc,.x1GTEClipXmin               ;        .
1065+ FA46 ED 5B D4 F5  .x1LTClipXmin:          ld      de,(x1)                         ;           temp = (2 * (cllp_xmin - x1) - 1) * delta_y;
1066+ FA4A 2A F9 F5                             ld      hl,(clip_xmin)                  ;               hl = clip_xmin - x1
1067+ FA4D                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;               .
1067+ FA4D B7          >                        or a
1068+ FA4E ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;               .
1069+ FA50                                      ClearCarryFlag
1069+ FA50 B7          >                        or a
1070+ FA51 ED 6A                                adc     hl,hl                           ;               hl = (2* hl)
1071+ FA53 2B                                   dec     hl                              ;               hl = (2 *  hl - 1)
1072+ FA54 ED 5B 00 F6                          ld      de,(delta_y)                    ;               hl = hl  * delta_y
1073+ FA58 CD E3 91                             call    mulHLbyDE2sc                    ;               .
1074+ FA5B 22 E4 F5                             ld      (temp),hl                       ;               .
1075+ FA5E 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl                           ;            msd = temp / delta_x_step
1076+ FA60 ED 5B 04 F6                          ld      de,(delta_x_step)               ;               BC = BC / DE, HL = BC % DE
1077+ FA64 CD 75 97                             call    Floor_DivQ                      ;               .
1078+ FA67 ED 43 0E F6                          ld      (msd),bc                        ;               .
1079+ FA6B 2A F1 F5                             ld      hl,(y_pos)                      ;            y_pos += msd
1080+ FA6E                                      ClearCarryFlag
1080+ FA6E B7          >                        or a
1081+ FA6F ED 4A                                adc     hl,bc                           ;            .
1082+ FA71 22 F1 F5                             ld      (y_pos),hl                      ;            .
1083+ FA74 11 7F 00                             ld      de,127                          ;            if (y_pos >= 127)
1084+ FA77 CD C1 99                             call    CompareHLDESame                 ;            .
1085+ FA7A CA 81 FA                             jp      z,.yposGT127                    ;            .
1086+ FA7D CD AA 99                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;            .
1087+ FA80 D0                                   ret     nc                              ;               return
1088+ FA81 2A F1 F5     .yposGT127:             ld      hl,(y_pos)                      ;            if (y_pos >= 0)
1089+ FA84 CB 7C                                bit     7,h
1090+ FA86 C2 D7 FA                             jp      nz,.yposLT0
1091+ FA89 2A 0E F6     .yposGT0:               ld      hl,(msd)                        ;               rem = temp - (msd * delta_x_step)
1092+ FA8C ED 5B 04 F6                          ld      de,(delta_x_step)               ;                   de = msd * delta_x_step
1093+ FA90 CD E3 91                             call    mulHLbyDE2sc                    ;                   .
1094+ FA93 EB                                   ex      de,hl                           ;                   .
1095+ FA94 2A E4 F5                             ld      hl,(temp)                       ;                   hl = temp - de
1096+ FA97                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;                   .
1096+ FA97 B7          >                        or a
1097+ FA98 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;                   .
1098+ FA9A 22 13 F6                             ld      (rem),hl                        ;                   .
1099+ FA9D ED 5B F9 F5                          ld      de,(clip_xmin)                  ;               x_pos = clip_xmin
1100+ FAA1 ED 53 EF F5                          ld      (x_pos),de                      ;               .
1101+ FAA5 ED 5B 13 F6                          ld      de,(rem)                        ;               error -= rem + delta_y
1102+ FAA9                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;               .
1102+ FAA9 B7          >                        or a
1103+ FAAA ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                           ;                   de = rem+delta_x
1104+ FAAC EB                                   ex      de,hl                           ;                   .
1105+ FAAD 2A 10 F6                             ld      hl,(error)                      ;                   hl = error - de
1106+ FAB0                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;                   .
1106+ FAB0 B7          >                        or a
1107+ FAB1 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;                   .
1108+ FAB3 22 10 F6                             ld      (error),hl                      ;                   .
1109+ FAB6 2A 13 F6                             ld      hl,(rem)                        ;               if (rem > 0)
1110+ FAB9 7C                                   ld      a,h                             ;               .
1111+ FABA B5                                   or      l                               ;               .
1112+ FABB CA D2 FA                             jp      z,.remLte0                      ;               .
1113+ FABE 2A F1 F5     .remGT0:                ld      hl,(y_pos)                      ;                   y_pos += 1;
1114+ FAC1 23                                   inc     hl
1115+ FAC2 22 F1 F5                             ld      (y_pos),hl
1116+ FAC5 2A 10 F6                             ld      hl,(error)                      ;                   error += delta_x_step;
1117+ FAC8 ED 5B 04 F6                          ld      de,(delta_x_step)
1118+ FACC                                      ClearCarryFlag
1118+ FACC B7          >                        or a
1119+ FACD ED 5A                                adc     hl,de
1120+ FACF 22 10 F6                             ld      (error),hl
1121+ FAD2 3E 01        .remLte0:               ld      a,1                             ;               set exit = true
1122+ FAD4 32 12 F6                             ld      (set_exit),a                    ;               .
1123+ FAD7
1124+ FAD7              .yposLT0:
1125+ FAD7 3A 12 F6     .x1GTEClipXmin:         ld      a,(set_exit)                    ;        if (!set_exit && y1 < 0)
1126+ FADA A7                                   and     a                               ;        .
1127+ FADB C2 65 FB                             jp      nz,.exit_false                  ;        .  if exit is 1 then its true so exit branch
1128+ FADE 2A D6 F5                             ld      hl,(y1)                         ;        .  if y1 is positive (including 0) then exit branch
1129+ FAE1 CB 7C                                bit     7,h                             ;        .
1130+ FAE3 CA 65 FB                             jp      z,.exit_false                   ;        .
1131+ FAE6 2A D6 F5                             ld      hl,(y1)                         ;           temp = delta_x_step * (0 - y1)
1132+ FAE9                                      macronegate16hl                         ;           .
1132+ FAE9 AF          >					xor 	a
1132+ FAEA 95          >					sub 	l
1132+ FAEB 6F          >					ld 		l,a
1132+ FAEC 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
1132+ FAED 94          >					sub 	h
1132+ FAEE 67          >					ld 		h,a
1133+ FAEF ED 5B 04 F6                          ld      de,(delta_x_step)               ;           .       hl = delta_x_step * (- y1)
1134+ FAF3 CD E3 91                             call    mulHLbyDE2sc                    ;           .
1135+ FAF6 22 E4 F5                             ld      (temp),hl                       ;           .
1136+ FAF9 44 4D        .msdEQtempDIVdxstep:    ld      bc,hl                           ;           msd = temp / delta_y_step
1137+ FAFB ED 5B 06 F6                          ld      de,(delta_y_step)               ;               BC = BC / DE, HL = BC % DE
1138+ FAFF CD 75 97                             call    Floor_DivQ                      ;               .
1139+ FB02 ED 43 0E F6                          ld      (msd),bc                        ;               .
1140+ FB06 E5 FD E1                             ld      iy,hl                           ;               same remainders (which is also mod result)
1141+ FB09 22 13 F6                             ld      (rem),hl                        ;           rem = temp % delta_y_step (swapped from being after x_pos += msd)
1142+ FB0C 2A EF F5     .yposPlusmsd:           ld      hl,(x_pos)                      ;           x_pos += msd
1143+ FB0F                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;           .   bc already is msd
1143+ FB0F B7          >                        or a
1144+ FB10 ED 4A                                adc     hl,bc                           ;           .   hl += bc
1145+ FB12 22 EF F5                             ld      (x_pos),hl                      ;           .
1146+ FB15 2A EF F5                             ld      hl,(x_pos)                      ;           if ((x_pos > clip_xmax) || (x_pos == clip_xmax && rem >= delta_y))
1147+ FB18 ED 5B F7 F5                          ld      de,(clip_xmax)                  ;           .
1148+ FB1C CD C1 99                             call    CompareHLDESame                 ;           .    if xpos != clipxmax skip the abort test
1149+ FB1F 20 0B                                jr      nz,.XPosNotClipxmax             ;           .
1150+ FB21 2A 13 F6                             ld      hl,(rem)                        ;           .    if rem < delta_y  skip the abort test
1151+ FB24 ED 5B 00 F6                          ld      de,(delta_y)                    ;           .
1152+ FB28 CD AA 99                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;           .
1153+ FB2B D8                                   ret     c                               ;           .
1154+ FB2C EB           .XPosNotClipxmax:       ex      de,hl                           ;           .    swap over xpos and max to compare xpos > xmax
1155+ FB2D CD AA 99                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;           .    if xpos > clipxmax then return (i.e clipxmax - xpos had a carry)
1156+ FB30 D8                                   ret     c
1157+ FB31 21 00 00     .xposLT127:             ld      hl,0                            ;           y_pos = 0;
1158+ FB34 22 F1 F5                             ld      (y_pos),hl                      ;           .
1159+ FB37 2A 10 F6                             ld      hl,(error)                      ;           error += rem
1160+ FB3A ED 5B 13 F6                          ld      de,(rem)                        ;           .
1161+ FB3E                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;           .
1161+ FB3E B7          >                        or a
1162+ FB3F ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                           ;           .
1163+ FB41 22 10 F6                             ld      (error),hl                      ;           .
1164+ FB44 2A 13 F6                             ld      hl,(rem)                        ;           if (rem >= delta_y)
1165+ FB47 ED 5B 00 F6                          ld      de,(delta_y)                    ;           .
1166+ FB4B CD AA 99                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;           .
1167+ FB4E DA 65 FB                             jp      c,.remLTDeltaY                  ;           .
1168+ FB51 2A EF F5     .remGTEDeltaY:          ld      hl,(x_pos)                      ;                x_pos++
1169+ FB54 23                                   inc     hl
1170+ FB55 22 EF F5                             ld      (x_pos),hl
1171+ FB58 2A 10 F6                             ld      hl,(error)                      ;                error -= delta_y_step;
1172+ FB5B ED 5B 06 F6                          ld      de,(delta_y_step)               ;                .
1173+ FB5F                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;                .
1173+ FB5F B7          >                        or a
1174+ FB60 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;                .
1175+ FB62 22 10 F6                             ld      (error),hl                      ;                .
1176+ FB65              .remLTDeltaY:
1177+ FB65 2A DA F5     .exit_false:            ld      hl,(y2)                         ;           y_pos_end = y2;
1178+ FB68 22 F5 F5                             ld      (y_pos_end),hl                  ;           .
1179+ FB6B 2A D8 F5                             ld      hl,(x2)                         ;           if (x2 > clip_xmax)
1180+ FB6E ED 5B F7 F5                          ld      de,(clip_xmax)                  ;           .
1181+ FB72 CD C1 99                             call    CompareHLDESame                 ;           .
1182+ FB75 CA CC FB                             jp      z,.x2LTEclipxmax                ;           .
1183+ FB78 CD AA 99                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;           .
1184+ FB7B DA CC FB                             jp      c,.x2LTEclipxmax                ;           .
1185+ FB7E 2A F7 F5     .x2GTclipxmax:          ld      hl,(clip_xmax)                  ;               temp = delta_y_step * (clip_xmax - x1) + delta_y;
1186+ FB81 ED 5B D4 F5                          ld      de,(x1)                         ;                   hl = 127-y1
1187+ FB85                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;
1187+ FB85 B7          >                        or a
1188+ FB86 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
1189+ FB88 ED 5B 06 F6                          ld      de,(delta_y_step)               ;                   hl = delta_x_step * (clip_xmax - x1)
1190+ FB8C CD E3 91                             call    mulHLbyDE2sc                    ;                   .
1191+ FB8F ED 5B 00 F6                          ld      de,(delta_y)                    ;                   hl += delta_y
1192+ FB93                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;                   .
1192+ FB93 B7          >                        or a
1193+ FB94 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                           ;                   .
1194+ FB96 22 E4 F5                             ld      (temp),hl
1195+ FB99 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl
1196+ FB9B ED 5B 04 F6                          ld      de,(delta_x_step)               ;               msd = temp / delta x step
1197+ FB9F CD 75 97                             call    Floor_DivQ                      ;               .
1198+ FBA2 ED 43 0E F6                          ld      (msd),bc                        ;               .
1199+ FBA6 2A D6 F5                             ld      hl,(y1)                         ;               y_pos_end = y1 + msd;
1200+ FBA9                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;               .
1200+ FBA9 B7          >                        or a
1201+ FBAA ED 4A                                adc     hl,bc                           ;               .
1202+ FBAC 22 F5 F5                             ld      (y_pos_end),hl                  ;               .
1203+ FBAF 2A 0E F6                             ld      hl,(msd)                        ;               if ((temp - msd * delta_x_step) == 0) --y_pos_end
1204+ FBB2 ED 5B 04 F6                          ld      de,(delta_x_step)               ;               .
1205+ FBB6 CD E3 91                             call    mulHLbyDE2sc                    ;               .
1206+ FBB9 EB                                   ex      de,hl                           ;               .
1207+ FBBA 2A E4 F5                             ld      hl,(temp)                       ;               .
1208+ FBBD                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;               .
1208+ FBBD B7          >                        or a
1209+ FBBE ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;               .
1210+ FBC0 7C                                   ld      a,h                             ;               .
1211+ FBC1 B5                                   or      l                               ;               .
1212+ FBC2 C2 CC FB                             jp      nz,.NotTheSame                  ;               .
1213+ FBC5 2A F5 F5     .IsTheSame:             ld      hl,(y_pos_end)                  ;                   --x_pos_end
1214+ FBC8 2B                                   dec     hl                              ;                   .
1215+ FBC9 22 F5 F5                             ld      (y_pos_end),hl                  ;                   .
1216+ FBCC              .NotTheSame:
1217+ FBCC 2A F5 F5     .x2LTEclipxmax:         ld      hl,(y_pos_end)                  ;           y_pos_end = min(y_pos_end, clip_ymax) + 1
1218+ FBCF 11 7F 00                             ld      de,127                          ;           .
1219+ FBD2 CD AA 99                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;           .
1220+ FBD5 D2 E2 FB                             jp      nc,.yposgteymax                 ;           .
1221+ FBD8 2A F5 F5     .yposltymax:            ld      hl,(y_pos_end)                  ;           .
1222+ FBDB 23                                   inc     hl                              ;           .
1223+ FBDC 22 F5 F5                             ld      (y_pos_end),hl                  ;           .
1224+ FBDF C3 E7 FB                             jp      .DoneYposAdjust                 ;           .
1225+ FBE2 13           .yposgteymax:           inc     de                              ;           .
1226+ FBE3 ED 53 F5 F5                          ld      (y_pos_end),de                  ;           .
1227+ FBE7 3A FB F5     .DoneYposAdjust:        ld      a,(sign_x)                      ;           if (sign_x == -1)
1228+ FBEA 3C                                   inc     a
1229+ FBEB C2 06 FC                             jp      nz,.SignNotMinus1
1230+ FBEE 2A EF F5     .SignEquMinus1:         ld      hl,(x_pos)                      ;               x_pos = -x_pos;
1231+ FBF1                                      macronegate16hl
1231+ FBF1 AF          >					xor 	a
1231+ FBF2 95          >					sub 	l
1231+ FBF3 6F          >					ld 		l,a
1231+ FBF4 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
1231+ FBF5 94          >					sub 	h
1231+ FBF6 67          >					ld 		h,a
1232+ FBF7 22 EF F5                             ld      (x_pos),hl
1233+ FBFA 2A F3 F5                             ld      hl,(x_pos_end)                  ;               x_pos_end = -x_pos_end;
1234+ FBFD                                      macronegate16hl
1234+ FBFD AF          >					xor 	a
1234+ FBFE 95          >					sub 	l
1234+ FBFF 6F          >					ld 		l,a
1234+ FC00 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
1234+ FC01 94          >					sub 	h
1234+ FC02 67          >					ld 		h,a
1235+ FC03 22 F3 F5                             ld      (x_pos_end),hl
1236+ FC06 ED 5B 04 F6  .SignNotMinus1:         ld      de,(delta_x_step)               ;        delta_y_step -= delta_x_step;
1237+ FC0A 2A 06 F6                             ld      hl,(delta_y_step)               ;        .
1238+ FC0D                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;        .
1238+ FC0D B7          >                        or a
1239+ FC0E ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;        .
1240+ FC10 22 06 F6                             ld      (delta_y_step),hl               ;        .
1241+ FC13 2A F1 F5     .PlottingLoop:          ld      hl,(y_pos)                      ;        while (y_pos != y_pos_end)
1242+ FC16 ED 5B F5 F5                          ld      de,(y_pos_end)
1243+ FC1A CD C1 99                             call    CompareHLDESame
1244+ FC1D C8                                   ret     z
1245+ FC1E 2A EF F5     .PlotPixel:             ld      hl,(x_pos)
1246+ FC21 4D                                   ld      c,l
1247+ FC22 2A F1 F5                             ld      hl,(y_pos)
1248+ FC25 45                                   ld      b,l
1249+ FC26 3E BF                                ld      a,$BF
1250+ FC28 CD B6 E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel                   ;               drawpixel at xpos, ypos, Colour
1251+ FC2B 2A 10 F6                             ld      hl,(error)                      ;               if (error >= 0)
1252+ FC2E CB 7C                                bit     7,h
1253+ FC30 C2 50 FC                             jp      nz,.errorLT0
1254+ FC33 2A EF F5     .errorGTE0:             ld	    hl,(x_pos)                      ;                   ++x_pos
1255+ FC36 ED 5B FB F5                          ld      de,(sign_x)
1256+ FC3A                                      ClearCarryFlag
1256+ FC3A B7          >                        or a
1257+ FC3B ED 5A                                adc     hl,de
1258+ FC3D 22 EF F5                             ld	    (x_pos),hl
1259+ FC40 2A 10 F6                             ld	    hl,(error)                      ;                   error -= delta_y_step;
1260+ FC43 ED 5B 06 F6                          ld	    de,(delta_y_step)
1261+ FC47                                      ClearCarryFlag
1261+ FC47 B7          >                        or a
1262+ FC48 ED 52                                sbc	    hl,de
1263+ FC4A 22 10 F6                             ld	    (error),hl
1264+ FC4D C3 5D FC                             jp      .DoneErrorAdjust
1265+ FC50 2A 10 F6     .errorLT0:              ld	    hl,(error)                      ;                   error += delta_x_step;
1266+ FC53 ED 5B 04 F6                          ld	    de,(delta_x_step)
1267+ FC57                                      ClearCarryFlag
1267+ FC57 B7          >                        or a
1268+ FC58 ED 5A                                adc	    hl,de
1269+ FC5A 22 10 F6                             ld	    (error),hl
1270+ FC5D 2A F1 F5     .DoneErrorAdjust:       ld      hl,(y_pos)
1271+ FC60 23                                   inc     hl
1272+ FC61 22 F1 F5                             ld      (y_pos),hl
1273+ FC64 C3 13 FC                             jp      .PlottingLoop
1274+ FC67                      ENDIF
1275+ FC67
1276+ FC67
1277+ FC67 21 D4 F5     l2_draw_6502_line:      ld      hl,x1                           ; copy from currnet position to 6502 variables
1278+ FC6A 11 A0 EF                             ld      de,XX1510
1279+ FC6D 01 08 00                             ld      bc,4*2
1280+ FC70 ED B0                                ldir
1281+ FC72 CD 90 F1                             call    LL145_6502                      ; perform 6502 version
1282+ FC75 D8                                   ret     c                               ; returns if carry is set as its a no draw
1283+ FC76 21 00 00     .CopyBackResults:       ld      hl,0
1284+ FC79 22 D4 F5                             ld      (x1),hl
1285+ FC7C 22 D6 F5                             ld      (y1),hl
1286+ FC7F 22 D8 F5                             ld      (x2),hl
1287+ FC82 22 DA F5                             ld      (y2),hl
1288+ FC85 3A A0 EF                             ld      a,(XX1510)
1289+ FC88 32 D4 F5                             ld      (x1),a
1290+ FC8B 4F                                   ld      c,a
1291+ FC8C 3A A1 EF                             ld      a,(XX1510+1)
1292+ FC8F 32 D6 F5                             ld      (y1),a
1293+ FC92 47                                   ld      b,a
1294+ FC93 3A A2 EF                             ld      a,(XX1510+2)
1295+ FC96 32 D8 F5                             ld      (x2),a
1296+ FC99 5F                                   ld      e,a
1297+ FC9A 3A A3 EF                             ld      a,(XX1510+3)
1298+ FC9D 32 DA F5                             ld      (y2),a
1299+ FCA0 57                                   ld      d,a
1300+ FCA1 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
1301+ FCA3                                      ClearCarryFlag
1301+ FCA3 B7          >                        or a
1302+ FCA4 C9                                   ret
1303+ FCA5                                 ;     call    l2_draw_clipped_line
1304+ FCA5              ;                        call    l2_draw_diagonal                ; ">l2_draw_diagonal, bc = y0,x0 de=y1,x1,a=color) Thsi version performs a pre sort based on y axis"
1305+ FCA5              ;................................................................
1306+ FCA5 00 00        result                  dw      0
1307+ FCA7              ;    swap = 0;
1308+ FCA7              ;    if (y1 > y2)
1309+ FCA7 2A D6 F5     l2_draw_elite_line:     ld      hl,(y1)                         ; if (y1 > y2)
1310+ FCAA ED 5B DA F5                          ld      de,(y2)                         ; .
1311+ FCAE CD AA 99                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ; .
1312+ FCB1 DA B7 FC                             jp      c,.NoSwapCoords                 ;
1313+ FCB4              ;        swapp1p2();
1314+ FCB4 CD 15 F6     .SwapCoords:            call    SwapCoords                      ;       swap them so y1 <= y2
1315+ FCB7 2A D4 F5     .NoSwapCoords:          ld      hl,(x1)                         ; hl = x1
1316+ FCBA ED 5B D8 F5                          ld      de,(x2)                         ; de = x2
1317+ FCBE ED 4B D6 F5                          ld      bc,(y1)                         ; bc = y1
1318+ FCC2 DD 2A DA F5                          ld      ix,(y2)                         ; ix = y2
1319+ FCC6              .CheckForVertical:
1320+ FCC6              .CheckForHorizontal:
1321+ FCC6 FD 26 80                             ld      iyh,128                         ; iyh = xx13 = 128
1322+ FCC9              ;    xx13 = 128;
1323+ FCC9              ;    if (x2 >= 0 && x2 <= 255 && y2 >= 0 && y2 <= 127)
1324+ FCC9 7A                                   ld      a,d                             ; if (x2 >= 0 && x2 <= 255 && y2 >= 0 && y2 <= 127)
1325+ FCCA DD B4                                or      ixh                             ; .  [if x2 and y2 > 255 goto point2clip]
1326+ FCCC 20 09                                jr      nz,.Point2Clip                  ; .  .
1327+ FCCE DD 7D                                ld      a,ixl                           ; .  [if y2 low > 127 goto point2clip]
1328+ FCD0 CB 7F                                bit     7,a                             ; .  .
1329+ FCD2 20 03                                jr      nz,.Point2Clip                  ; .  .
1330+ FCD4              ;        xx13 = 0;
1331+ FCD4 FD 26 00     .Point2NoClip:          ld      iyh,0                           ;       iyh = xx13 = 0
1332+ FCD7              ;    if (x1 >= 0 && x1 <= 255 && y1 >= 0 && y1 <= 127)
1333+ FCD7 7C           .Point2Clip:            ld      a,h                             ; if (x1 >= 0 && x1 <= 255 && y1 >= 0 && y1 <= 127)
1334+ FCD8 B0                                   or      b                               ; . [ if x1 or y1 > 255 goto clip needed]
1335+ FCD9 C2 EA FC                             jp      nz,.ClipNeeded                  ; .
1336+ FCDC CB 79                                bit     7,c                             ; . [ if y1 low > 127 goto clip needed]
1337+ FCDE C2 EA FC                             jp      nz,.ClipNeeded                  ; .
1338+ FCE1              ;        if (xx13 != 0)
1339+ FCE1 FD 7C        .ClipPoint1:            ld      a,iyh                           ;       if (xx13 = 0)
1340+ FCE3 A7                                   and     a                               ;       .
1341+ FCE4 CA E1 FD                             jp      z,.ClipComplete                 ;               clipping not needed so treat as done an ddraw the line
1342+ FCE7 FD 26 40                             ld      iyh,64                          ;       else xx13 = 64 (xx13 /2 but if xx13 is 0 it never hits here so can just set to 64)
1343+ FCEA              ;.......................LL138
1344+ FCEA FD 7C        .ClipNeeded:            ld      a,iyh                           ; if (xx13 == 128)
1345+ FCEC CB 7F                                bit     7,a                             ; . [ jump if bit 7 is not set so <> 128]
1346+ FCEE CA 27 FD                             jp      z,.xx13Not128                   ; .
1347+ FCF1 7C           .xx13Is128:             ld      a,h                             ;       if (x1 < 0 && x2 < 0)
1348+ FCF2 A2                                   and     d                               ;       . [ x1 and x2 high bits 7 are both set then its off to the left]
1349+ FCF3 F8                                   ret     m                               ;               return
1350+ FCF4 78                                   ld      a,b                             ;       if (y1 < 0 && y2 < 0)
1351+ FCF5 DD A4                                and     ixh                             ;       . [ y1 and y2 high bits 7 are both set then its off the top]
1352+ FCF7 F8                                   ret     m                               ;               return
1353+ FCF8 7C                                   ld      a,h                             ;       if (x1 > 255  && x2 > 255)
1354+ FCF9 CB 7F                                bit     7,a                             ;       . [test if x1 is negative and if so skip]
1355+ FCFB C2 0A FD                             jp      nz,.x1x2LessThan256             ;       .
1356+ FCFE A7                                   and     a                               ;       . [ if x1 is not negative then if high has any value its > 256]
1357+ FCFF CA 0A FD                             jp      z,.x1x2LessThan256              ;       .
1358+ FD02 7A                                   ld      a,d                             ;       . [test if x2 is negative]
1359+ FD03 CB 7F                                bit     7,a                             ;       .
1360+ FD05 C2 0A FD                             jp      nz,.x1x2LessThan256             ;       . < can simplify with with an xor test to detect if opposite signs first >
1361+ FD08 A7                                   and     a                               ;       . [ if x2 is not negative then if high has any value its > 256]
1362+ FD09 C0                                   ret     nz                              ;               return
1363+ FD0A 78           .x1x2LessThan256:       ld      a,b                             ;       if (y1 > 127  && y2 > 127)
1364+ FD0B CB 7F                                bit     7,a                             ;       . [test if y1 is negative]
1365+ FD0D C2 27 FD                             jp      nz,.y1y2LessThan128             ;       .
1366+ FD10 A7                                   and     a                               ;       . [ if y1 is not negative then if high has any value its > 256]
1367+ FD11 CA 27 FD                             jp      z,.y1y2LessThan128              ;       .
1368+ FD14 CB 79                                bit     7,c                             ;       . [ if y1 low bit 7 is set then its > 127]
1369+ FD16 CA 27 FD                             jp      z,.y1y2LessThan128              ;       .
1370+ FD19 DD 7C                                ld      a,ixh                           ;       . [test if y2 is negative]
1371+ FD1B A7                                   and     a                               ;       .
1372+ FD1C FA 27 FD                             jp      m,.y1y2LessThan128              ;       .
1373+ FD1F A7                                   and     a                               ;       . [ if y2 is not negative then if high has any value its > 256]
1374+ FD20 CA 27 FD                             jp      z,.y1y2LessThan128              ;       .
1375+ FD23 DD 7D                                ld      a,ixl                           ;       .
1376+ FD25 A7                                   and     a                               ;       . [ if y2 low bit 7 is set then its > 127]
1377+ FD26 F8                                   ret     m                               ;               return
1378+ FD27              ;.......................LL115
1379+ FD27              .xx13Not128:                        // check right point
1380+ FD27 EB           .y1y2LessThan128:       ex      de,hl                           ; delta_x = x2 - x1;
1381+ FD28                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ; .
1381+ FD28 B7          >                        or a
1382+ FD29 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ; .
1383+ FD2B 22 FE F5                             ld      (delta_x),hl                    ; redundant as its in DE TODO OPTIMISE
1384+ FD2E EB                                   ex      de,hl                           ; de = delta_x for next bit
1385+ FD2F DD E5 E1     .DyEquY2MinusY1:        ld      hl,ix                           ; delta_y = y2 - y1;
1386+ FD32                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ; .
1386+ FD32 B7          >                        or a
1387+ FD33 ED 42                                sbc     hl,bc                           ; .
1388+ FD35 22 00 F6                             ld      (delta_y),hl                    ; . [ so now de = dx and hl = dy]
1389+ FD38 FD 2E 80                             ld      iyl,128                         ; assuming sign is iyl is positive dx dy
1390+ FD3B CB 7A        .SignDeltaXY:           bit     7,d                             ; if delta x is negative (delta y will always be positive)
1391+ FD3D CA 49 FD                             jp      z,.DeltaXPositive               ; .
1392+ FD40 FD 2E 00     .DeltaXNegative:        ld      iyl,0                           ;       so we set sign to 0
1393+ FD43                                      macronegate16de                         ;       and set delta x to |delta x|
1393+ FD43 AF          >					xor 	a
1393+ FD44 93          >                    sub 	e
1393+ FD45 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
1393+ FD46 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
1393+ FD47 92          >                    sub 	d
1393+ FD48 57          >                    ld 		d,a
1394+ FD49 ED 53 FE F5  .DeltaXPositive:        ld      (delta_x),de                    ;       .
1395+ FD4D              ;.......................Scale down DY and DY to 7 bit
1396+ FD4D 7C           .ScaleDXDY:             ld      a,h                             ; scale down so that dx and dx are < 256
1397+ FD4E B2                                   or      d                               ; .
1398+ FD4F CA 5D FD                             jp      z,.ScaleDXDYHighDone            ; .
1399+ FD52                                      ShiftDERight1                           ; .
1399+ FD52 CB 3A       >			   srl d
1399+ FD54 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
1400+ FD56                                      ShiftHLRight1                           ; .
1400+ FD56 CB 3C       >			   srl h
1400+ FD58 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
1401+ FD5A C3 4D FD                             jp      .ScaleDXDY                      ; .
1402+ FD5D 7B           .ScaleDXDYHighDone:     ld      a,e                             ; because of signed maths we will scale down to 7 bits to be safe
1403+ FD5E B5                                   or      l                               ; .
1404+ FD5F F2 6A FD                             jp      p,.LowScaleDone                 ; .
1405+ FD62                                      ShiftDERight1                           ; .
1405+ FD62 CB 3A       >			   srl d
1405+ FD64 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
1406+ FD66                                      ShiftHLRight1                           ; .
1406+ FD66 CB 3C       >			   srl h
1406+ FD68 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
1407+ FD6A              ;.......................Work out slope and gradient - later on we will work with deltax beign abs
1408+ FD6A ED 53 FE F5  .LowScaleDone:          ld      (delta_x),de                    ; save adjusted dx and dy back
1409+ FD6E 22 00 F6                             ld      (delta_y),hl                    ; .
1410+ FD71 55                                   ld      d,l                             ; now d = dy e = dx
1411+ FD72 ED 53 02 F6                          ld      (delta_y_x),de                  ; save for diagnostics
1412+ FD76              .SetUpTSlope:           ZeroA                                   ; Initialise tSlope to 0
1412+ FD76 AF          >                        xor a
1413+ FD77 32 0C F6                             ld      (tSlope),a                      ; .
1414+ FD7A 7B                                   ld      a,e                             ; a = dx
1415+ FD7B                                      JumpIfAGTENusng d, .deltaxGTEdeltaY     ; if dx < dy
1415+ FD7B BA          >                        cp     d
1415+ FD7C D2 8F FD    >                        jp		nc,.deltaxGTEdeltaY
1416+ FD7F 43           .deltaXLTdeltaY:        ld      b,e                             ;       bc = dx $00
1417+ FD80 0E 00                                ld      c,0                             ;       .
1418+ FD82 5A                                   ld      e,d                             ;       de = $00 dy
1419+ FD83 16 00                                ld      d,0                             ;       .
1420+ FD85 CD 75 97                             call    Floor_DivQ                      ;       bc = bc / de  (dx * 256 / dy)
1421+ FD88 ED 43 0A F6                          ld      (gradient),bc                   ;       in reality this is 8 bit little endian
1422+ FD8C C3 A0 FD                             jp      .donedxdycheck                  ;       .
1423+ FD8F                                                                              ; else
1424+ FD8F 42           .deltaxGTEdeltaY:       ld      b,d                             ;       bc = dy << 0
1425+ FD90 0E 00                                ld      c,0                             ;       .
1426+ FD92 16 00                                ld      d,0                             ;       de = 0dx
1427+ FD94 CD 75 97                             call    Floor_DivQ                      ;       bc = bc / de (dy * 256 / dx)
1428+ FD97 ED 43 0A F6                          ld      (gradient),bc                   ;       in reality this is 8 bit little endian
1429+ FD9B 3E FF                                ld      a,255                           ;       set tslope to -1
1430+ FD9D 32 0C F6                             ld      (tSlope),a                      ;       .
1431+ FDA0              .donedxdycheck:                 // CHECK CORRECT POINT
1432+ FDA0              ;.......................Clipping point 1
1433+ FDA0                                      ;break
1434+ FDA0 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh                           ; if xx13 = 0 or xx13 = 128 (values can be 0, 128, 64 later we can optimise to see if its <> 64)
1435+ FDA2 A7                                   and     a                               ; . [xx13 = 0  enter the block]
1436+ FDA3 CA A9 FD                             jp      z,.xx13is0or128                 ; .
1437+ FDA6 F2 CA FD                             jp      p,.xx13not0or128                ; . [xx13 <> 128 then skip block]
1438+ FDA9 CD E7 FD     .xx13is0or128:          call    ClipLL118Elite                  ;       clip point 1
1439+ FDAC FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh                           ;       if xx13 <> 0
1440+ FDAE A7                                   and     a                               ;       .
1441+ FDAF CA C6 FD                             jp      z,.ImmediateDraw                ;       .
1442+ FDB2 3A D5 F5                             ld      a,(x1+1)                        ;               if (if (x1 <0 || x1 > 255 || y1 <0 || y1 > 127)) return
1443+ FDB5 A7                                   and     a                               ;               .
1444+ FDB6 F8                                   ret     m                               ;               . [x1 high is negative then return]
1445+ FDB7 C0                                   ret     nz                              ;               . [if x1 high is not zero, x1 > 255 return (above will have sorted negative test on bit 7)]
1446+ FDB8 3A D7 F5                             ld      a,(y1+1)                        ;               . [a = x1 high]
1447+ FDBB A7                                   and     a                               ;               .
1448+ FDBC F8                                   ret     m                               ;               . [if y1 negative return]
1449+ FDBD C0                                   ret     nz                              ;               . [if y1 > 255 return (above will have sorted negative test on bit 7)]
1450+ FDBE 3A D6 F5                             ld      a,(y1)                          ;               . [a = y1 low]
1451+ FDC1 A7                                   and     a                               ;               .
1452+ FDC2 F8                                   ret     m                               ;               . [if y1 > 127 then low byte would appear as negative in bit 7]
1453+ FDC3 C3 CA FD                             jp      .SkipCheckP1OnScreen            ;               else goto SkipCheckP1OnScreen
1454+ FDC6              .ImmediateDraw:         IFDEF SPLITORLINEX
1455+ FDC6 CD E2 F6                             call    l2_draw_clipped_line            ;        else if we get here we only needed to clip one point so draw the line
1456+ FDC9                                      ENDIF
1457+ FDC9 C9                                   ret                                     ;             and we are done
1458+ FDCA              .xx13not0or128:
1459+ FDCA CD 15 F6     .SkipCheckP1OnScreen:   call    SwapCoords                      ; swap point 1 and point 2 so we can now process P2
1460+ FDCD CD E7 FD                             call    ClipLL118Elite                  ; clip P2
1461+ FDD0 3A D5 F5                             ld      a,(x1+1)                        ; if (x1 <0 || x1 > 255 || y1 <0 || y1 > 127) return
1462+ FDD3 A7                                   and     a                               ; .
1463+ FDD4 F8                                   ret     m                               ; . [if x1 negative return]
1464+ FDD5 C0                                   ret     nz                              ; . [if x1 > 255 return (above will have sorted negative test on bit 7)]
1465+ FDD6 3A D7 F5                             ld      a,(y1+1)                        ; . [a = y1 high]
1466+ FDD9 A7                                   and     a                               ;
1467+ FDDA F8                                   ret     m                               ; . [if y1 negative return]
1468+ FDDB C0                                   ret     nz                              ; . [if y1 > 255 return (above will have sorted negative test on bit 7)]
1469+ FDDC 3A D6 F5                             ld      a,(y1)                          ; . [a = y1 low]
1470+ FDDF A7                                   and     a                               ; .
1471+ FDE0 F8                                   ret     m                               ; . [if y1 low > 127 then low byte would appear as negative in bit 7]
1472+ FDE1              .ClipComplete:
1473+ FDE1              .xx13is0or128Draw:      IFDEF SPLITORLINEX
1474+ FDE1 CD E2 F6                             call    l2_draw_clipped_line            ; if we get here we only needed to clip one point/have done all slipping needed
1475+ FDE4                                      ENDIF
1476+ FDE4 C9                                   ret
1477+ FDE5              ;................................................................
1478+ FDE5 00 00        ClipSign                dw      0
1479+ FDE7              ClipLL118Elite:        ;break
1480+ FDE7 2A D4 F5     .checkX1IsNegative      ld      hl,(x1)                         ; if x1 is negative
1481+ FDEA CB 7C                                bit     7,h                             ; .
1482+ FDEC CA 0B FE                             jp      z,.x1GTE0                       ; .
1483+ FDEF 3E FF        .x1LT0:                 ld      a,255                           ;       clip sign = -1
1484+ FDF1 32 E5 FD                             ld      (ClipSign),a                    ;       .
1485+ FDF4 CD 73 FE                             call    CalcLL120                       ;       calc ll120
1486+ FDF7 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0                            ;       x1 = 0
1487+ FDFA 22 D4 F5                             ld      (x1),hl                         ;       .
1488+ FDFD 2A D6 F5                             ld      hl,(y1)                         ;       y1 = y1 + result
1489+ FE00 ED 5B A5 FC                          ld      de,(result)                     ;       . [and save in hl for optimisation processing y1]
1490+ FE04 19                                   add     hl,de                           ;       .
1491+ FE05 22 D6 F5                             ld      (y1),hl                         ;       .
1492+ FE08 C3 28 FE                             jp      .checkY1IsNegative              ;       .
1493+ FE0B 7C           .x1GTE0:                ld      a,h                             ; else
1494+ FE0C A7                                   and     a                               ;       if x1 > 255
1495+ FE0D CA 28 FE                             jp      z,.checkY1IsNegative            ;       .
1496+ FE10                                      ZeroA                                   ;               sign must be 0 for postive adjustment
1496+ FE10 AF          >                        xor a
1497+ FE11 32 E5 FD                             ld      (ClipSign),a                    ;               .
1498+ FE14 CD 73 FE                             call    CalcLL120                       ;               Calc LL120
1499+ FE17 21 FF 00                             ld      hl,255                          ;               x1 = 255
1500+ FE1A 22 D4 F5                             ld      (x1),hl                         ;               .
1501+ FE1D 2A D6 F5                             ld      hl,(y1)                         ;               y1 = y1 + result
1502+ FE20 ED 5B A5 FC                          ld      de,(result)                     ;               . [and save in hl for optimisation processing y1]
1503+ FE24 19                                   add     hl,de                           ;               .
1504+ FE25 22 D6 F5                             ld      (y1),hl                         ;               .
1505+ FE28                                                                              ; end if
1506+ FE28 2A D6 F5     .checkY1IsNegative:     ld      hl,(y1)                         ; if (y1 <0) [if we don;t need to clip x1 then we need to load hl with y1 as it never got loaded]
1507+ FE2B CB 7C                                bit     7,h                             ; .
1508+ FE2D CA 49 FE                             jp      z,.checkY1LT128                 ; .
1509+ FE30 3E FF                                ld      a,255                           ;       set sign to -1 for calc
1510+ FE32 32 E5 FD                             ld      (ClipSign),a                    ;       .
1511+ FE35 CD C0 FE                             call    CalcLL123                       ;       calc LL123
1512+ FE38 2A D4 F5                             ld      hl,(x1)                         ;       x1 = x1 + result
1513+ FE3B ED 5B A5 FC                          ld      de,(result)                     ;       .
1514+ FE3F 19                                   add     hl,de                           ;       .
1515+ FE40 22 D4 F5                             ld      (x1),hl                         ;       .
1516+ FE43 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0                            ;       y1 = 0
1517+ FE46 22 D6 F5                             ld      (y1),hl                         ;       .
1518+ FE49 7C           .checkY1LT128:          ld      a,h                             ; finished if y < 128
1519+ FE4A A7                                   and     a                               ; .
1520+ FE4B C2 51 FE                             jp      nz,.mopUpY1                     ; . [jump to mop up if y1 high <> 0, wehave already dealt with negatvies so don't need to consider that]
1521+ FE4E 7D                                   ld      a,l                             ; . [now check y1 low and return if y1 low > 127]
1522+ FE4F A7                                   and     a                               ; .
1523+ FE50 F0                                   ret     p                               ; . [ if y1 low was positive then we are done as it means y1 < 128]
1524+ FE51 11 80 00     .mopUpY1:               ld      de,128                          ; y1 = y1 - 128
1525+ FE54                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ; .
1525+ FE54 B7          >                        or a
1526+ FE55 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ; .
1527+ FE57 22 D6 F5                             ld      (y1),hl                         ; .
1528+ FE5A                                      ZeroA                                   ; set clip sign to 0
1528+ FE5A AF          >                        xor a
1529+ FE5B 32 E5 FD                             ld      (ClipSign),a                    ; to get to here if y1 < 0, y is set to 0, if its < 128 then it never reaches here, so y1 must be > 128 to get here
1530+ FE5E CD C0 FE                             call    CalcLL123                       ; calc LL123
1531+ FE61 2A D4 F5                             ld      hl,(x1)                         ; x1 = x1 + result
1532+ FE64 ED 5B A5 FC                          ld      de,(result)                     ; .
1533+ FE68 19                                   add     hl,de                           ; .
1534+ FE69 22 D4 F5                             ld      (x1),hl                         ; .
1535+ FE6C 21 7F 00                             ld      hl,127                          ; y1 = 127
1536+ FE6F 22 D6 F5                             ld      (y1),hl                         ; .
1537+ FE72 C9                                   ret
1538+ FE73
1539+ FE73 2A D4 F5     CalcLL120:              ld      hl,(x1)                         ; x1= |x1|
1540+ FE76                                      macroAbsHL                              ; .
1540+ FE76 CB 7C       >                    bit     7,h
1540+ FE78 CA 81 FE    >                    jp      z,.alreadyABS
1540+ FE7B AF          >					xor 	a
1540+ FE7C 95          >					sub 	l
1540+ FE7D 6F          >					ld 		l,a
1540+ FE7E 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
1540+ FE7F 94          >					sub 	h
1540+ FE80 67          >					ld 		h,a
1540+ FE81             >.alreadyABS:
1541+ FE81 3A 0C F6                             ld      a,(tSlope)                      ; if (tslope == 0)
1542+ FE84 A7                                   and     a                               ; .
1543+ FE85 C2 A4 FE                             jp      nz,.tSlopeNonZero               ; .
1544+ FE88 55           .tSlopeZero:            ld      d,l                             ;       d = x1 & 255
1545+ FE89 3A 0A F6                             ld      a,(gradient)                    ;       e = gradient
1546+ FE8C 5F                                   ld      e,a                             ;
1547+ FE8D ED 30                                mul     de                              ;       de = x1 & 255 * gradient
1548+ FE8F 5A                                   ld      e,d                             ;       de = x1 * gradient /256
1549+ FE90 16 00                                ld      d,0                             ;       .
1550+ FE92 3A E5 FD                             ld      a,(ClipSign)                    ;       if clipsign != 0
1551+ FE95 A7                                   and     a                               ;       .
1552+ FE96 CA 9F FE                             jp      z,.tSlopeZeroDone               ;       .
1553+ FE99              .tSlopeZeroNegate:      macronegate16de                         ;               result = - result
1553+ FE99 AF          >					xor 	a
1553+ FE9A 93          >                    sub 	e
1553+ FE9B 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
1553+ FE9C 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
1553+ FE9D 92          >                    sub 	d
1553+ FE9E 57          >                    ld 		d,a
1554+ FE9F ED 53 A5 FC  .tSlopeZeroDone:        ld      (result),de                     ;
1555+ FEA3 C9                                   ret                                     ;
1556+ FEA4              .tSlopeNonZero:         ;ld      a,(gradient)                    ; else  c = gradient
1557+ FEA4                                      ;ld      c,a                             ;       .
1558+ FEA4                                      ;ld      a,l                             ;       a = x1 & 255
1559+ FEA4                                      ;call    DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC             ;       bc = a * 256/c
1560+ FEA4
1561+ FEA4 ED 5B 0A F6                          ld      de,(gradient)                   ; BC = BC / DE
1562+ FEA8 45                                   ld      b,l
1563+ FEA9 0E 00                                ld      c,0
1564+ FEAB                                      ;; CORRECTED TO LADO INTO B ld      bc,hl                           ; HL = BC % DE
1565+ FEAB CD 75 97                             call    Floor_DivQ
1566+ FEAE
1567+ FEAE 3A E5 FD                             ld      a,(ClipSign)                    ;       if clipsign != 0
1568+ FEB1 A7                                   and     a                               ;       .
1569+ FEB2 CA BB FE                             jp      z,.tSlopeNonZeroDone            ;       .
1570+ FEB5              .tSlopeNonZeroNegate:   macronegate16bc                         ;               result = - result
1570+ FEB5 AF          >					xor 	a
1570+ FEB6 91          >                    sub 	c
1570+ FEB7 4F          >                    ld 		c,a
1570+ FEB8 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
1570+ FEB9 90          >                    sub 	b
1570+ FEBA 47          >                    ld 		b,a
1571+ FEBB ED 43 A5 FC  .tSlopeNonZeroDone:     ld      (result),bc
1572+ FEBF C9                                   ret
1573+ FEC0              ;.......................LL123
1574+ FEC0              CalcLL123:              ;break
1575+ FEC0 2A D6 F5                             ld      hl,(y1)                         ; hl = |y1|
1576+ FEC3                                      macroAbsHL                              ; .
1576+ FEC3 CB 7C       >                    bit     7,h
1576+ FEC5 CA CE FE    >                    jp      z,.alreadyABS
1576+ FEC8 AF          >					xor 	a
1576+ FEC9 95          >					sub 	l
1576+ FECA 6F          >					ld 		l,a
1576+ FECB 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
1576+ FECC 94          >					sub 	h
1576+ FECD 67          >					ld 		h,a
1576+ FECE             >.alreadyABS:
1577+ FECE 3A 0C F6                             ld      a,(tSlope)                      ; if tSlope = 0
1578+ FED1 A7                                   and     a                               ; .
1579+ FED2 C2 F0 FE                             jp      nz,.tSlopeNonZero               ; .
1580+ FED5              .tSlopeZero:           ; ld      a,(gradient)                    ;       c = gradient
1581+ FED5              ;                        ld      c,a                             ;       .
1582+ FED5              ;                        ld      a,l                             ;       hl = y1 (which is now abs and < 256)
1583+ FED5              ;                        call    DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC             ;       bc = A * 256 / c
1584+ FED5 ED 5B 0A F6                          ld      de,(gradient)                   ; BC = BC / DE
1585+ FED9 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl                           ; HL = BC % DE
1586+ FEDB CD 75 97                             call    Floor_DivQ
1587+ FEDE 3A E5 FD                             ld      a,(ClipSign)                    ;       if clipsign != 0
1588+ FEE1 A7                                   and     a                               ;       .
1589+ FEE2 CA EB FE                             jp      z, .tSlopeZeroDone              ;       .
1590+ FEE5              .tSlopeZeroNegate:      macronegate16bc                         ;               result = -result
1590+ FEE5 AF          >					xor 	a
1590+ FEE6 91          >                    sub 	c
1590+ FEE7 4F          >                    ld 		c,a
1590+ FEE8 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
1590+ FEE9 90          >                    sub 	b
1590+ FEEA 47          >                    ld 		b,a
1591+ FEEB ED 43 A5 FC  .tSlopeZeroDone:        ld      (result),bc                     ;       . save result in either case
1592+ FEEF C9                                   ret                                     ;       .
1593+ FEF0 55           .tSlopeNonZero:         ld      d,l                             ; else  d = |y1| low
1594+ FEF1 3A 0A F6                             ld      a,(gradient)                    ;       e = gradient
1595+ FEF4 5F                                   ld      e,a                             ;       .
1596+ FEF5 ED 30                                mul     de                              ;       de = l * gradient
1597+ FEF7 5A                                   ld      e,d                             ;       de = l * gradient /256
1598+ FEF8 16 00                                ld      d,0                             ;       .
1599+ FEFA 3A E5 FD                             ld      a,(ClipSign)                    ;       if clipsign != 0
1600+ FEFD A7                                   and     a                               ;
1601+ FEFE CA 07 FF                             jp      z,.tSlopeNonZeroDone            ;
1602+ FF01              .tSlopeNonZeroNegate:   macronegate16de                         ;               result = -result
1602+ FF01 AF          >					xor 	a
1602+ FF02 93          >                    sub 	e
1602+ FF03 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
1602+ FF04 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
1602+ FF05 92          >                    sub 	d
1602+ FF06 57          >                    ld 		d,a
1603+ FF07 ED 53 A5 FC  .tSlopeNonZeroDone:     ld      (result),de                     ;       . save result in either case
1604+ FF0B C9                                   ret                                     ;       .
1605+ FF0C
# file closed: ./Layer2Graphics/l2_draw_any_line.asm
 799  FF0C              ;    INCLUDE "./Layer2Graphics/clearLines-LL155.asm"
 800  FF0C                  INCLUDE "./Layer2Graphics/l2_draw_line_v2.asm"
# file opened: ./Layer2Graphics/l2_draw_line_v2.asm
   1+ FF0C              ; ******************************************************************************
   2+ FF0C              ;
   3+ FF0C              ;	Draw a pixel line from (x0,y0) defined in (COORDS) - the current plot
   4+ FF0C              ;	coordinate, to the relative distance points (x0+x,y0+y).
   5+ FF0C              ;
   6+ FF0C              ;	Design & programming by Gunther Strube,	Copyright (C) InterLogic 1995
   7+ FF0C              ;
   8+ FF0C              ;	The (COORDS+0)	pointer contains the current y coordinate, (COORDS+1) the
   9+ FF0C              ;	current x coordinate. The main program should reset the (COORDS) variables
  10+ FF0C              ;	before using line drawing.
  11+ FF0C              ;
  12+ FF0C              ;	The routine checks the range of specified coordinates which is the
  13+ FF0C              ;	boundaries of the graphics area (256x64	pixels).
  14+ FF0C              ;	If a boundary error occurs the routine exits automatically.	This may be
  15+ FF0C              ;	useful if you are trying to draw a line longer than allowed. Only the
  16+ FF0C              ;	visible part will be drawn.
  17+ FF0C              ;
  18+ FF0C              ;	The hardware graphics memory is organized as (0,0) in the top left corner.
  19+ FF0C              ;
  20+ FF0C              ;	The plot routine is	defined by an address pointer	in IX.
  21+ FF0C              ;
  22+ FF0C              ;	IN:	HL =	move	relative x horisontal points (maximum +/- 255).
  23+ FF0C              ;		DE =	move	relative y vertical	points (maximum +/-	255).
  24+ FF0C              ;		IX =	pointer to plot routine that uses HL = (x,y)	of plot coordinate.
  25+ FF0C              ;
  26+ FF0C              ;	OUT:	None.
  27+ FF0C              ;
  28+ FF0C              ;	Registers	used	by routine:
  29+ FF0C              ;		   N	:	B, loop counter
  30+ FF0C              ;		   i	:	line	balance variable
  31+ FF0C              ;		   x	:	H/L,	horisontal, vertical distance	variables
  32+ FF0C              ;		   y	:	H/L,	horisontal, vertical distance	variables
  33+ FF0C              ;	  (x0,y0)	:	(h,l)
  34+ FF0C              ;	  direc_x	:	d, horisontal step increment
  35+ FF0C              ;	  direc_y	:	e, vertical step increment
  36+ FF0C              ;		 ddx	:	b, horisontal step increment
  37+ FF0C              ;		 ddy	:	c, vertical step increment
  38+ FF0C              ;
  39+ FF0C              ;		DE, A work registers.
  40+ FF0C              ;
  41+ FF0C              ; The algorithm in pseudo-code:
  42+ FF0C              ;
  43+ FF0C              ;	direc_x =	SGN x: direc_y	= SGN y
  44+ FF0C              ;	x = ABS x: y =	ABS y
  45+ FF0C              ;
  46+ FF0C              ;	if x	>= y
  47+ FF0C              ;		if x+y=0 then return
  48+ FF0C              ;		H = x
  49+ FF0C              ;		L = y
  50+ FF0C              ;		ddx = direc_x
  51+ FF0C              ;		ddy = 0
  52+ FF0C              ;	else
  53+ FF0C              ;		H = y
  54+ FF0C              ;		L = x
  55+ FF0C              ;		ddx = 0
  56+ FF0C              ;		ddy = direc_y
  57+ FF0C              ;	endif
  58+ FF0C              ;
  59+ FF0C              ;	B = H
  60+ FF0C              ;	i = INT(B/2)
  61+ FF0C              ;	FOR N=B TO 1 STEP -1
  62+ FF0C              ;		i = i + L
  63+ FF0C              ;		if i	< H
  64+ FF0C              ;			ix =	ddx
  65+ FF0C              ;			iy =	ddy
  66+ FF0C              ;		else
  67+ FF0C              ;			i = i - H
  68+ FF0C              ;			ix =	direc_x
  69+ FF0C              ;			iy =	direc_y
  70+ FF0C              ;		endif
  71+ FF0C              ;		x0 =	x0 +	ix
  72+ FF0C              ;		y0 =	y0 +	iy
  73+ FF0C              ;		plot	(x0,y0)
  74+ FF0C              ;	NEXT	N
  75+ FF0C              ;
  76+ FF0C              ;
  77+ FF0C              ;	Registers	changed after return:
  78+ FF0C              ;		..BCDEHL/IXIY/af......	same
  79+ FF0C              ;		AF....../..../..bcdehl	different
  80+ FF0C              ;
  81+ FF0C 00 00        line_gfx_coords         dw  0
  82+ FF0E
  83+ FF0E              LineHLtoDE:
  84+ FF0E 7C           TestMaxY:               ld	a,h ; were h = y or l = y?
  85+ FF0F FE C0                                cp	192
  86+ FF11 30 26                                jr	nc, exit_line		; y0	coordinate out	of range
  87+ FF13 7A                                   ld	a,d
  88+ FF14 FE C0                                cp	192
