  93+ E000              mass_locked_pattern                 equ 33
  94+ E000              space_station_safe_zone_pattern     equ 34
  95+ E000
  96+ E000              spritecursoroffset					equ 17
  97+ E000              spriteborderoffset                  equ 32
  98+ E000
  99+ E000              HideSprite:                 MACRO   spritenbr
 100+ E000 ~                                        nextreg		SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,spritenbr
 101+ E000 ~                                        nextreg		SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,$00
 102+ E000                                          ENDM
 103+ E000
 104+ E000              ; " sprite_big BC = rowcol, D = sprite nbr , E= , pattern"
 105+ E000              sprite_big:
 106+ E000 7A           .SetAnchor:	                ld		a,d                                 ; a = sprite nbr, bug fix?
 107+ E001 F5                                       push	af									; save id for next few
 108+ E002 D5                                       push	de
 109+ E003 ED 92 34                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a		; set up sprite id
 110+ E006              ; write out X position bits 1 to 8
 111+ E006 79                                       ld		a,c
 112+ E007 21 11 00                                 ld      hl,spritecursoroffset
 113+ E00A ED 31                                    add		hl,a                                ; hl = full x position
 114+ E00C 7D                                       ld		a,l
 115+ E00D ED 92 35                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower x cc
 116+ E010              ; write out Y position bits 1 to 8
 117+ E010 EB                                       ex		de,hl								; de = full x position
 118+ E011 78                                       ld		a,b
 119+ E012 21 11 00                                 ld      hl,spritecursoroffset
 120+ E015 ED 31                                    add		hl,a
 121+ E017 7D                                       ld		a,l                                 ; hl = full y position
 122+ E018 ED 92 36                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a		; lower y coord on screen
 123+ E01B              ; write out MSB of X as its an anchor
 124+ E01B 7A                                       ld		a,d									; de = MSB of X (hl bit 0)
 125+ E01C ED 92 37                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a		; lower y
 126+ E01F              ; write out sprite pattern
 127+ E01F D1                                       pop		de                                  ; de = pattern and sprite nbr
 128+ E020 7B                                       ld		a,e
 129+ E021 F6 C0                                    or		%11000000							;
 130+ E023 ED 92 38                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a		; visible 5 bytes pattern e
 131+ E026              ; write out msb of y in h must be bit 0 only
 132+ E026 3E 00                                    ld		a,%00000000							; big unified composite
 133+ E028 B4                                       or		h									; MSB Y
 134+ E029 ED 92 39                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR4_REGISTER,a		; visible 5 bytes pattern e
 135+ E02C F1           .BigSprite1:                pop		af
 136+ E02D 3C                                       inc		a
 137+ E02E F5                                       push	af
 138+ E02F ED 92 34                                                       nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a
 139+ E032 3E 10                                    ld		a,16
 139+ E034 ED 92 35       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a	; lower x
 140+ E037 AF                                       xor 	a
 140+ E038 ED 92 36       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a	; lower y
 141+ E03B ED 92 37                                                       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a	; relative setup
 142+ E03E 3E C1                                    ld		a,%11000001
 142+ E040
 143+ E040 ED 92 38                                 nextreg		SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a					; relative and 4 bytes of data, pattern 1
 144+ E043 3E 41                                    ld		a,%01000001							; big unified composite
 145+ E045 ED 92 39                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR4_REGISTER,a		; visible 5 bytes pattern e
 146+ E048 F1           .BigSprite2:                pop		af
 147+ E049 3C                                       inc		a
 147+ E04A ED 92 34       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a
 148+ E04D AF                                       xor		a
 148+ E04E ED 92 35       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a	; lower x
 149+ E051 3E 10                                    ld		a,16
 149+ E053 ED 92 36       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a	; lower y
 150+ E056 AF                                       xor		a
 150+ E057 ED 92 37       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a	; relative setup
 151+ E05A 3E C2                                    ld		a,%11000010
 151+ E05C ED 92 38       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a	; relative and 4 bytes of data, pattern 2
 152+ E05F 3E 41                                    ld		a,%01000001
 152+ E061 ED 92 39       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_ATTR4_REGISTER,a	; visible 5 bytes pattern e 					; big unified composite
 153+ E064 C9                                       ret
 154+ E065
 155+ E065              ; Creates a 32x32 sprite based on first sprite number and pattern, then goes:
 156+ E065              ;    Spr,   pattern     spr+1, pattern+1
 157+ E065              ;    Spr+1, pattern+2   spr+3, pattern+3
 158+ E065              ; " sprite_big BC = row, hl= col D = sprite nbr , E= , pattern"
 159+ E065              ; note, BC and HL must be in correct range else they will mess up other byte's attributes, not masked for speed
 160+ E065              ; note this is based on full screen sprites including writing to border
 161+ E065              ; Currently can not get realtive sprites to work so will brute force it.
 162+ E065 7B           sprite_4x4:                 ld      a,e                                                         ; prep upper 2 bits as we will
 163+ E066 F6 C0                                    or      %11000000                                                   ; Enable visible and 5th byte
 164+ E068 5F                                       ld      e,a                                                         ; a now holds value to use for anchor
 165+ E069                                          ;break
 166+ E069 7A           .SetAnchor:	                ld		a,d
 166+ E06A ED 92 34       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a		; set up sprite id
 167+ E06D 7D                                       ld		a,l
 167+ E06E ED 92 35       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower x cc
 168+ E071 79                                       ld      a,c
 168+ E072 ED 92 36       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower y cc
 169+ E075 7C                                       ld      a,h
 169+ E076 ED 92 37       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a		; MSB of X position
 170+ E079 7B                                       ld      a,e
 170+ E07A ED 92 38       nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a		; visible 5 bytes pattern e
 171+ E07D 78                                       ld      a,b                                 ; get down MSB from b
 172+ E07E F6 20                                    or      %00100000
 172+ E080 ED 92 79       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_MIRROR_ATTRIBUTE_4_WITH_INC,a		; its going to be a unified "Big sprite" to uses rotations & scaling from anchor
 173+ E083              ;-- now process unified sprites
 174+ E083              .TopRightRelative:         ; inc     d
 175+ E083                                         ; ld      a,d         : nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a		; set up sprite id + 1
 176+ E083 7D                                       ld      a,l
 176+ E084 C6 10          add a,16
 176+ E086 ED 92 35       nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower x cc
 177+ E089 79                                       ld      a,c
 177+ E08A ED 92 36       nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower y cc
 178+ E08D 7C                                       ld      a,h
 178+ E08E ED 92 37       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a        ; clear MSB of X
 179+ E091 1C                                       inc     e
 180+ E092 7B                                       ld      a,e
 180+ E093 ED 92 38       nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a		; visible, 5 bytes pattern is achor + 1
 181+ E096 3E 20                                    ld      a,%0100000
 181+ E098 ED 92 79       nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_MIRROR_ATTRIBUTE_4_WITH_INC,a        ; pattern is relative and relative pattern
 182+ E09B              .BottomLeftRelative:       ; inc     d
 183+ E09B                                         ; ld      a,d         : nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a		; set up sprite id + 1
 184+ E09B 7D                                       ld      a,l
 184+ E09C
 184+ E09C ED 92 35       nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower x cc
 185+ E09F 79                                       ld      a,c
 185+ E0A0 C6 10          add a,16
 185+ E0A2 ED 92 36       nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower y cc
 186+ E0A5                                          ZeroA
 186+ E0A5 AF          >                        xor a
 186+ E0A6 ED 92 37       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a        ; clear MSB of X
 187+ E0A9 1C                                       inc     e
 188+ E0AA 7B                                       ld      a,e
 188+ E0AB ~             /*%1100010*/
 188+ E0AB ED 92 38       nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a		; visible, 5 bytes pattern is achor + 2
 189+ E0AE 3E 20                                    ld      a,%0100000
 189+ E0B0 ED 92 79       nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_MIRROR_ATTRIBUTE_4_WITH_INC,a        ; pattern is relative and relative pattern
 190+ E0B3              ;.BottomRightRelative:      ; inc     d
 191+ E0B3              ;                           ; inc     e
 192+ E0B3              ;                           ; ld      a,d         : nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a		; set up sprite id + 1
 193+ E0B3              ;                            ld      a,16        : nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower x cc
 194+ E0B3              ;                            ld      a,16        : nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower y cc
 195+ E0B3              ;                            ZeroA               : nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a        ; clear MSB of X
 196+ E0B3              ;                            ld      a,%1100011  : nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a		; visible, 5 bytes pattern is achor + 3
 197+ E0B3              ;                            ld      a,%0100001  : nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR4_REGISTER,a        ; pattern is relative and relative pattern
 198+ E0B3              ;                            ld      a,e                                                         ; prep upper 2 bits as we will
 199+ E0B3              ;                            or      %11000000                                                   ; Enable visible and 5th byte
 200+ E0B3              ;                            ld      e,a                                                         ; a now holds value to use for anchor
 201+ E0B3              ;                            break
 202+ E0B3 7A           .BRAbs:	                    ld		a,d
 202+ E0B4 C6 03         add a,3
 202+ E0B6 ED 92 34       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a		; set up sprite id
 203+ E0B9 7D                                       ld		a,l
 203+ E0BA C6 10         add a,16
 203+ E0BC
 203+ E0BC ED 92 35       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower x cc
 204+ E0BF 79                                       ld      a,c
 204+ E0C0 C6 10         add a,16
 204+ E0C2
 204+ E0C2 ED 92 36       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower y cc
 205+ E0C5 7C                                       ld      a,h
 205+ E0C6 ED 92 37       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a		; MSB of X position
 206+ E0C9 1C                                       inc     e
 207+ E0CA 7B                                       ld      a,e
 207+ E0CB ED 92 38       nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a		; visible 5 bytes pattern e
 208+ E0CE 78                                       ld      a,b                                 ; get down MSB from b
 209+ E0CF F6 20                                    or      %00100000
 209+ E0D1 ED 92 79       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_MIRROR_ATTRIBUTE_4_WITH_INC,a
 210+ E0D4 C9                                       ret
 211+ E0D5
 212+ E0D5
 213+ E0D5              ; for a sinle sprite within 256x192 area
 214+ E0D5 7A           sprite_single:              ld		a,d                                 ; a = sprite nbr, bug fix?
 215+ E0D6 D5                                       push    de
 216+ E0D7 ED 92 34                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a		; set up sprite id
 217+ E0DA              ; write out X position bits 1 to 8
 218+ E0DA 79                                       ld		a,c                                 ; a = column (c)
 219+ E0DB 21 20 00                                 ld      hl,spriteborderoffset
 220+ E0DE ED 31                                    add		hl,a                                ; hl = full x position
 221+ E0E0 EB                                       ex		de,hl								; de = full x position
 222+ E0E1 7B                                       ld		a,e
 223+ E0E2 ED 92 35                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower x cc
 224+ E0E5              ; write out Y position bits 1 to 8
 225+ E0E5 78                                       ld		a,b                                 ; a = row
 226+ E0E6 21 20 00                                 ld      hl,spriteborderoffset
 227+ E0E9 ED 31                                    add		hl,a
 228+ E0EB 7D                                       ld		a,l                                 ; hl = full y position
 229+ E0EC ED 92 36                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a		; lower y coord on screen
 230+ E0EF              ; write out MSB of X as its an anchor
 231+ E0EF 7A                                       ld		a,d									; de = MSB of X (hl bit 0)
 232+ E0F0 ED 92 37                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a		; lower y
 233+ E0F3              ; write out sprite pattern
 234+ E0F3 D1                                       pop     de
 235+ E0F4 7B                                       ld		a,e
 236+ E0F5 F6 80                                    or		%10000000							;
 237+ E0F7 ED 92 38                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a		; visible 5 bytes pattern e
 238+ E0FA              ; write out extended attribute
 239+ E0FA 3E 00                                    ld      a,%00000000                         ; its a single sprite
 240+ E0FC B4                                       or      h
 241+ E0FD ED 92 39                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR4_REGISTER,a
 242+ E100 C9                                       ret
 243+ E101              ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------
 244+ E101              ; ">sprite_galactic_cursor BC = rowcol"
 245+ E101 16 00        sprite_galactic_cursor:     ld		d,galactic_cursor_sprite
 246+ E103 1E 00                                    ld		e,0
 247+ E105 78                                       ld		a,b
 248+ E106 C6 18                                    add		a,galactic_chart_y_offset
 249+ E108 47                                       ld		b,a
 250+ E109 CD 00 E0                                 call	sprite_big
 251+ E10C C9                                       ret
 252+ E10D              ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------
 253+ E10D              ; "> sprite_galactic_hyper_cursorBC = rowcol"
 254+ E10D 78           sprite_galactic_hyper_cursor:ld		a,b
 255+ E10E C6 04                                    add		a,galactic_chart_hyper_offset
 256+ E110 47                                       ld		b,a
 257+ E111 16 04                                    ld		d,galactic_hyper_sprite
 258+ E113 1E 03                                    ld		e,3
 259+ E115 CD D5 E0                                 call	sprite_single ; sprite_big:
 260+ E118 C9                                       ret
 261+ E119              ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------
 262+ E119              ; moves hyperspace cursor to target system x position
 263+ E119 3E 04        sprite_ghc_move:            ld		a,galactic_hyper_sprite
 264+ E11B ED 92 34                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a		; set up sprite id
 265+ E11E              ; write out X position bits 1 to 8
 266+ E11E 79                                       ld		a,c
 267+ E11F 21 1C 00                                 ld      hl,galactic_chart_hyper_x_offset
 268+ E122 ED 31                                    add		hl,a                                ; hl = full x position
 269+ E124 7D                                       ld		a,l
 270+ E125 ED 92 35                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower x cc
 271+ E128              ; write out Y position bits 1 to 8
 272+ E128 EB                                       ex		de,hl								; de = full x position
 273+ E129 CB 38                                    srl		b			    					; row is row / 2
 274+ E12B 78                                       ld      a,b
 275+ E12C 21 34 00                                 ld      hl,galactic_chart_hyper_y_offset
 276+ E12F ED 31                                    add		hl,a
 277+ E131 7D                                       ld		a,l                                 ; hl = full y position
 278+ E132 ED 92 36                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a		; lower y coord on screen
 279+ E135              ; write out MSB of X as its an anchor
 280+ E135 7A                                       ld		a,d									; de = MSB of X (hl bit 0)
 281+ E136 ED 92 37                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a		; lower y
 282+ E139              ; write out msb of y in h must be bit 0 only
 283+ E139 3E 00                                    ld		a,%00000000							; big unified composite
 284+ E13B B2                                       or		d									; MSB Y
 285+ E13C ED 92 39                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR4_REGISTER,a		; visible 5 bytes pattern e
 286+ E13F C9                                       ret
 287+ E140              ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------
 288+ E140 3E 08        sprite_lhc_move:            ld		a,local_hyper_sprite
 289+ E142 ED 92 34                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a		; set up sprite id
 290+ E145              ; write out X position bits 1 to 8
 291+ E145 79                                       ld		a,c
 292+ E146 21 11 00                                 ld      hl,spritecursoroffset
 293+ E149 ED 31                                    add		hl,a                                ; hl = full x position
 294+ E14B 7D                                       ld		a,l
 295+ E14C ED 92 35                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower x cc
 296+ E14F              ; write out Y position bits 1 to 8
 297+ E14F EB                                       ex		de,hl								; de = full x position
 298+ E150 78                                       ld		a,b
 299+ E151 21 11 00                                 ld      hl,spritecursoroffset
 300+ E154 ED 31                                    add		hl,a
 301+ E156 7D                                       ld		a,l                                 ; hl = full y position
 302+ E157 ED 92 36                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a		; lower y coord on screen
 303+ E15A              ; write out MSB of X as its an anchor
 304+ E15A 7A                                       ld		a,d									; de = MSB of X (hl bit 0)
 305+ E15B ED 92 37                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a		; lower y
 306+ E15E              ; write out msb of y in h must be bit 0 only
 307+ E15E 3E 00                                    ld		a,%00000000							; big unified composite
 308+ E160 B2                                       or		d									; MSB Y
 309+ E161 ED 92 39                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR4_REGISTER,a		; visible 5 bytes pattern e
 310+ E164 C9                                       ret
 311+ E165              ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------
 312+ E165              ; "sprite_local_cursor BC = rowcol"
 313+ E165 16 05        sprite_local_cursor:        ld		d,local_cursor_sprite
 314+ E167 1E 04                                    ld		e,local_present_cursor
 315+ E169 CD 00 E0                                 call	sprite_big
 316+ E16C C9                                       ret
 317+ E16D              ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------
 318+ E16D              ; "sprite_local_hyper_cursor BC = rowcol"
 319+ E16D 16 08        sprite_local_hyper_cursor:  ld		d,local_hyper_sprite
 320+ E16F 1E 07                                    ld		e,local_hyper_pattern
 321+ E171 CD 00 E0                                 call	sprite_big
 322+ E174 C9                                       ret

 347+ E175 21 AC E1     sprite_sun_compass:         ld		hl,sunCompositeData

 349+ E17E 23             inc hl
 350+ E17F 7E           .Loop:                      ld      a,(hl)

 487+ E2BD 3E 27        sprite_missile_2:       ld      a,missile_sprite2
 488+ E2BF 0E 31                                ld      c,sprite_missile_x+15
 489+ E2C1 C3 A4 E2                             jp      sprite_missile_ready
 490+ E2C4
 491+ E2C4 3E 28        sprite_missile_3:       ld      a,missile_sprite3
 492+ E2C6 0E 3B                                ld      c,sprite_missile_x+25
 493+ E2C8 C3 A4 E2                             jp      sprite_missile_ready
 494+ E2CB
 495+ E2CB 3E 29        sprite_missile_4:       ld      a,missile_sprite4
 496+ E2CD 0E 45                                ld      c,sprite_missile_x +35
 497+ E2CF C3 A4 E2                             jp      sprite_missile_ready

 499+ E2D2
 500+ E2D2
 501+ E2D2 3E 0C        sprite_reticule:        ld      a,reticlule_sprite1                 ; LEFT ARM
 502+ E2D4 ED 92 34                             nextreg SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a        ; select left hand side
 503+ E2D7 3E 87                                ld      a,ReticuleCentreX -16 - ReticuleOffset
 504+ E2D9 ED 92 35                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower x pos as 136 (104 + 32 border)
 505+ E2DC 3E 7F                                ld		a,ReticuleCentreY
 506+ E2DE ED 92 36                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a		; lower y coord on screen
 507+ E2E1 AF                                   xor     a
 508+ E2E2 ED 92 37                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a		; attribute 2
 509+ E2E5 3E 8B                                ld      a,reticule_pattern_2 | %10000000
 510+ E2E7 ED 92 38                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a		; visible 5 bytes pattern left reticule
 511+ E2EA 3E 0D        .rightReticule          ld      a,reticlule_sprite2                 ; RIGHT ARM
 512+ E2EC ED 92 34                             nextreg SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a        ; select left hand side
 513+ E2EF 3E A7                                ld      a,ReticuleCentreX + ReticuleOffset
 514+ E2F1 ED 92 35                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower x pos as 136 (104 + 32 border)
 515+ E2F4 3E 7F                                ld		a,ReticuleCentreY
 516+ E2F6 ED 92 36                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a		; lower y coord on screen
 517+ E2F9 3E 08                                ld      a,%00001000
 518+ E2FB ED 92 37                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a		; attribute 2 including mirroring horizontal
 519+ E2FE 3E 8B                                ld      a,reticule_pattern_2 | %10000000
 520+ E300 ED 92 38                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a		; visible 5 bytes pattern left reticule
 521+ E303 3E 0E        .topReticule            ld      a,reticlule_sprite3
 522+ E305 ED 92 34                             nextreg SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a        ; select left hand side
 523+ E308 3E 9F                                ld      a,ReticuleCentreX
 524+ E30A ED 92 35                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower x pos as 136 (104 + 32 border)
 525+ E30D 3E 67                                ld		a,ReticuleCentreY-16 - ReticuleOffset
 526+ E30F ED 92 36                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a		; lower y coord on screen
 527+ E312 AF                                   xor     a
 528+ E313 ED 92 37                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a		; attribute 2
 529+ E316 3E 8A                                ld      a,reticule_pattern_1 | %10000000
 530+ E318 ED 92 38                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a		; visible 5 bytes pattern left reticule
 531+ E31B 3E 0F        .bottomReticule         ld      a,reticlule_sprite4
 532+ E31D ED 92 34                             nextreg SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a        ; select left hand side
 533+ E320 3E 9F                                ld      a,ReticuleCentreX
 534+ E322 ED 92 35                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower x pos as 136 (104 + 32 border)
 535+ E325 3E 87                                ld		a,ReticuleCentreY + ReticuleOffset
 536+ E327 ED 92 36                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a		; lower y coord on screen
 537+ E32A 3E 04                                ld      a,%00000100
 538+ E32C ED 92 37                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a		; attribute 2 including mirroring vertical
 539+ E32F 3E 8A                                ld      a,reticule_pattern_1 | %10000000
 540+ E331 ED 92 38                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a		; visible 5 bytes pattern left reticule
 541+ E334 C9                                   ret
 542+ E335
 543+ E335              laserbasex              equ 6
 544+ E335              laserbasey              equ 14
 545+ E335
 546+ E335              ShowSprite              MACRO   spritenbr, patternnbr
 547+ E335 ~                                    ld      a, spritenbr
 548+ E335 ~                                    nextreg SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a
 549+ E335 ~                                    ld      a,patternnbr | %10000000
 550+ E335 ~                                    nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a
 551+ E335                                      ENDM
 552+ E335
 553+ E335              LeftLaser:              MACRO   xoffset, yoffset, spriteL, patternL
 554+ E335 ~                                    ld      a, spriteL
 555+ E335 ~                                    nextreg SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a        ; select left hand side
 556+ E335 ~                                    ld      a,((laserbasex + xoffset) *8) + 32
 557+ E335 ~                                    nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower x pos as 136 (104 + 32 border)
 558+ E335 ~                                    ld		a,((laserbasey -yoffset) * 8) + 32 -1
 559+ E335 ~                                    nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a		; lower y coord on screen
 560+ E335 ~                                    xor     a
 561+ E335 ~                                    nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a		; attribute 2
 562+ E335 ~                                    ld      a, patternL | %00000000             ; hidden by default
 563+ E335 ~                                    nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a
 564+ E335                                      ENDM
 565+ E335
 566+ E335              RightLaser:             MACRO   xoffset, yoffset, spriteL, patternL
 567+ E335 ~                                    ld      a, spriteL
 568+ E335 ~                                    nextreg SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a        ; select left hand side
 569+ E335 ~                                    ld      a,(((30-laserbasex) - xoffset) *8) + 32 -2
 570+ E335 ~                                    nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower x pos as 136 (104 + 32 border)
 571+ E335 ~                                    ld		a,((laserbasey -yoffset) * 8) + 32 -1
 572+ E335 ~                                    nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a		; lower y coord on screen
 573+ E335 ~                                    ld      a,%00001000
 574+ E335 ~                                    nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a		; attribute 2
 575+ E335 ~                                    ld      a, patternL | %00000000             ; hidden by default
 576+ E335 ~                                    nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a
 577+ E335                                      ENDM
 578+ E335
 579+ E335              show_ecm_sprite:        ShowSprite  ECM_sprite, ecm_pattern
 579+ E335 3E 25       >                        ld      a, ECM_sprite
 579+ E337 ED 92 34    >                        nextreg SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a
 579+ E33A 3E 99       >                        ld      a,ecm_pattern | %10000000
 579+ E33C ED 92 38    >                        nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a
 580+ E33F C9                                   ret

 831+ E7B3 ~                                    nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a
 832+ E7B3                                      ENDM
 833+ E7B3
 834+ E7B3              set_sprite_pat_a_nx:    MACRO
 835+ E7B3 ~                                    and     %10111111
 836+ E7B3 ~                                    set_sprite_pat_a
 837+ E7B3                                      ENDM
 838+ E7B3

 840+ E7B3 ~                                    or      %10000000
 841+ E7B3 ~                                    set_sprite_pat_a
 842+ E7B3                                      ENDM

 857+ E7B3
 858+ E7B3 20           diag_x_pos:             DB 32
 859+ E7B4 40           diag_y_pos:             DB 64
 860+ E7B5 00           diag_sprite_nbr:        DB 0
 861+ E7B6
 862+ E7B6 06 40        sprite_diagnostic_clear:ld      b,64
 863+ E7B8 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 864+ E7BA 79           .HideLoop:              ld      a,c
 865+ E7BB                                      HideSprite a
 865+ E7BB ED 92 34    >                            nextreg		SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a
 865+ E7BE ED 91 38 00 >                            nextreg		SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,$00
 866+ E7C2 0C                                   inc     c
 867+ E7C3 10 F5                                djnz    .HideLoop
 868+ E7C5 C9                                   ret
 869+ E7C6
 870+ E7C6 3E 80        sprite_diagnostic:      ld      a,$80
 871+ E7C8 32 B5 E7                             ld      (diag_sprite_nbr),a
 872+ E7CB 3E 40                                ld      a,64
 873+ E7CD 32 B4 E7                             ld      (diag_y_pos),a
 874+ E7D0                                      ;break
 875+ E7D0 AF           .sprite_newline:        xor a
 876+ E7D1 32 B3 E7                             ld      (diag_x_pos),a
 877+ E7D4 3A B5 E7     .sprite_loop:           ld      a,(diag_sprite_nbr)
 877+ E7D7 E6 7F          and $7F
 877+ E7D9                 select_sprite_a
 877+ E7D9 ED 92 34    >                        nextreg SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a
 878+ E7DC 3A B3 E7                             ld      a,(diag_x_pos)
 878+ E7DF                set_sprite_x_low_a
 878+ E7DF ED 92 35    >                        nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a
 879+ E7E2 C6 10                                add     a,16
 880+ E7E4 32 B3 E7                             ld      (diag_x_pos),a
 881+ E7E7 3A B4 E7                             ld      a,(diag_y_pos)
 881+ E7EA                set_sprite_y_low_a
 881+ E7EA ED 92 36    >                        nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a
 882+ E7ED 3E 00                                ld      a,0
 882+ E7EF                set_sprite_x_msb_anc
 882+ E7EF ED 92 37    >                        nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a
 883+ E7F2 3A B5 E7                             ld      a,(diag_sprite_nbr)
 883+ E7F5                set_sprite_pat_a
 883+ E7F5 ED 92 38    >                        nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a
 884+ E7F8 3C                                   inc     a
 885+ E7F9 32 B5 E7                             ld      (diag_sprite_nbr),a
 886+ E7FC E6 7F                                and     $7F
 887+ E7FE                                      JumpIfALTNusng  35,.cont
 887+ E7FE FE 23       >                        cp      35
 887+ E800 DA 10 E8    >                        jp		c, .cont
 888+ E803 11 1D 36     .drawBig:               ld      de,diagnostic_sprite*256 + compass_sun_pattern
 889+ E806 01 96 00                             ld      bc,150
 890+ E809 21 96 00                             ld      hl,150
 891+ E80C CD 65 E0                             call    sprite_4x4
 892+ E80F
 893+ E80F C9                                   ret
 894+ E810 3A B3 E7     .cont:                  ld      a,(diag_x_pos)
 895+ E813                                      JumpIfALTNusng 200,.sprite_loop
 895+ E813 FE C8       >                        cp      200
 895+ E815 DA D4 E7    >                        jp		c, .sprite_loop
 896+ E818 3A B4 E7                             ld      a,(diag_y_pos)
 897+ E81B C6 14                                add     a,20
 898+ E81D 32 B4 E7                             ld      (diag_y_pos),a
 899+ E820 18 AE                                jr      .sprite_newline
 900+ E822 C9                                   ret

  26+ E854 AF          >                        xor a

  28+ E857 3E 01                                ld          a,$01
  29+ E859 32 2D E8                             ld          (FileNumber),a

  31+ E85E C5           .ReadLoop:              push        bc
  32+ E85F CD 3A E8                             call        FileNbrA
  33+ E862 CD 71 E8                             call        load_a_pattern

  36+ E869 27                                   daa
  37+ E86A 32 2D E8                             ld          (FileNumber),a

  43+ E871 21 2E E8     load_a_pattern:         ld          hl,Filename
  44+ E874 DD 21 8E E8                          ld          ix,SpriteDatabuffer

  48+ E880 01 5B 00     .streamPattern:         ld          bc, SPRITE_PATTERN_UPLOAD_PORT
  49+ E883 21 8E E8                             ld          hl, SpriteDatabuffer
  50+ E886 ED 90        .streamPatternLoop:     outinb                                      ; write byte of pattern
  51+ E888 1D                                   dec         e
  52+ E889 20 FB                                jr          nz, .streamPatternLoop          ; carry on writing for "e" iterations
  53+ E88B ED 90                                outinb
  54+ E88D C9                                   ret

   4+ C010 47           draw_front_calc_alpha:  ld      b,a
   5+ C011 E6 80                                and     $80
   6+ C013 32 7A 7E                             ld      (ALP2),a                            ; set sign
   7+ C016 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; save sign
   8+ C017 EE 80                                xor     $80
   9+ C019 32 7B 7E                             ld      (ALP2FLIP),a                        ; and oppsite sign
  10+ C01C 3A 76 7E                             ld      a,(JSTX)
  11+ C01F ED 27 80                             test    $80
  12+ C022 28 02                                jr      z,  .PositiveRoll
  13+ C024 ED 44        .NegativeRoll:          neg
  14+ C026 CB 3F        .PositiveRoll           srl     a                                   ; divide sign by 4
  15+ C028 CB 3F                                srl     a
  16+ C02A FE 08                                cp      8
  17+ C02C 38 02                                jr      c,.NotIncreasedDamp                 ; if a < 8 divide by 2 again
  18+ C02E CB 3F        .IncreasedDamp          srl     a
  19+ C030 32 79 7E     .NotIncreasedDamp:      ld      (ALP1),a
  20+ C033 B1                                   or      c
  21+ C034 32 78 7E                             ld      (ALPHA),a                           ; a = signed bit alph1
  22+ C037 21 FD C2     .RestartDampenRoll:     ld      hl,dampenRcounter
  23+ C03A 36 04                                ld      (hl),dampenRate
  24+ C03C C9                                   ret
  25+ C03D
  26+ C03D              ; Do the same for pitch
  27+ C03D 47           draw_front_calc_beta:   ld      b,a
  28+ C03E E6 80                                and     $80
  29+ C040 32 6E 7E                             ld      (BET2),a                            ; set sign
  30+ C043 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; save sign
  31+ C044 EE 80                                xor     $80
  32+ C046 32 6F 7E                             ld      (BET2FLIP),a                        ; and oppsite sign
  33+ C049 3A 6C 7E                             ld      a,(JSTY)
  34+ C04C ED 27 80                             test    $80
  35+ C04F 28 02                                jr      z,  .PositivePitch
  36+ C051 ED 44        .NegativePitch:         neg
  37+ C053 CB 3F        .PositivePitch:         srl     a                                   ; divide sign by 4
  38+ C055 CB 3F                                srl     a
  39+ C057 FE 08                                cp      8
  40+ C059 38 02                                jr      c,.NotIncreasedDamp                 ; if a < 8 divide by 2 again
  41+ C05B CB 3F        .IncreasedDamp          srl     a
  42+ C05D 32 6D 7E     .NotIncreasedDamp:      ld      (BET1),a
  43+ C060 B1                                   or      c
  44+ C061 32 6B 7E                             ld      (BETA),a                            ; a = signed bit bet1
  45+ C064 21 FE C2     .RestartDampenPitch:    ld      hl,dampenPcounter          ; TODO mach dampen rates ship properies by having teh $20 as a ship config

 274+ C358 2A 53 E0     .TestRightPressed:       ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_RollRight)
 275+ C35B 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 276+ C35C                                      JumpIfAIsZero   .DampenRoll
 276+ C35C A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 276+ C35D CA 73 C3    >                        jp	    z, .DampenRoll
 277+ C360 3A 76 7E                             ld      a,(JSTX)                            ; have we maxed out Joystick?
 278+ C363 21 7C 7E                             ld      hl,ALP1MAXR                         ; currnet ship max left roll
 279+ C366 BE                                   cp      (hl)
 280+ C367 28 24                                jr      z,.TestDivePressed                   ; if its held then we don't dampen
 281+ C369                                      ;break
 282+ C369 3C                                   inc     a                                   ; increase joystick roll
 283+ C36A 32 76 7E     .UpdateAlphRoll:        ld      (JSTX),a
 284+ C36D CD 10 C0                             call    draw_front_calc_alpha
 285+ C370 C3 8D C3                             jp      .TestDivePressed                    ; when pressing ignore damper
 286+ C373 21 FD C2     .DampenRoll:            ld      hl,dampenRcounter
 287+ C376 35                                   dec     (hl)
 288+ C377 20 14                                jr      nz,.TestDivePressed
 289+ C379 3E 04                                ld      a,dampenRate
 290+ C37B 77                                   ld      (hl),a
 291+ C37C 3A 76 7E                             ld      a,(JSTX)
 292+ C37F FE 00                                cp      0
 293+ C381 28 0A                                jr      z, .TestDivePressed
 294+ C383 CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 295+ C385 28 03                                jr      z,.PosRollDampen
 296+ C387 3C           .NegRollDampen:         inc     a
 297+ C388 18 01                                jr      .ApplyRollDampen
 298+ C38A 3D           .PosRollDampen:         dec     a
 299+ C38B 18 DD        .ApplyRollDampen:       jr      .UpdateAlphRoll
 300+ C38D              ; Dive and Climb input
 301+ C38D 2A 55 E0     .TestDivePressed:       ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Dive)
 302+ C390 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 303+ C391                                      JumpIfAIsZero   .TestClimbPressed
 303+ C391 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 303+ C392 CA A8 C3    >                        jp	    z, .TestClimbPressed
 304+ C395 3A 6C 7E                             ld      a,(JSTY)                            ; have we maxed out Joystick?
 305+ C398 21 71 7E                             ld      hl,BET1MAXD                         ; currnet ship max left roll
 306+ C39B BE                                   cp      (hl)
 307+ C39C 28 0A                                jr      z,.TestClimbPressed
 308+ C39E                                      ;break
 309+ C39E 3D                                   dec     a                                   ; increase joystick roll
 310+ C39F 32 6C 7E                             ld      (JSTY),a
 311+ C3A2 CD 3D C0                             call    draw_front_calc_beta
 312+ C3A5 C3 DD C3                             jp      .ForwardCursorKeysDone
 313+ C3A8 2A 57 E0     .TestClimbPressed:      ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Climb)
 314+ C3AB 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 315+ C3AC                                      JumpIfAIsZero   .DampenPitch
 315+ C3AC A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 315+ C3AD CA C3 C3    >                        jp	    z, .DampenPitch
 316+ C3B0 3A 6C 7E                             ld      a,(JSTY)                            ; have we maxed out Joystick?
 317+ C3B3 21 70 7E                             ld      hl,BET1MAXC                         ; currnet ship max left roll
 318+ C3B6 BE                                   cp      (hl)
 319+ C3B7 28 24                                jr      z,.ForwardCursorKeysDone
 320+ C3B9 3C                                   inc     a                                   ; increase joystick roll
 321+ C3BA 32 6C 7E     .UpdateBetaPitch:       ld      (JSTY),a
 322+ C3BD CD 3D C0                             call    draw_front_calc_beta
 323+ C3C0 C3 DD C3                             jp      .ForwardCursorKeysDone
 324+ C3C3 21 FE C2     .DampenPitch:           ld      hl,dampenPcounter          ; TODO mach dampen rates ship properies by having teh $20 as a ship config
 325+ C3C6 35                                   dec     (hl)
 326+ C3C7 20 14                                jr      nz,.ForwardCursorKeysDone
 327+ C3C9 3E 04                                ld      a,dampenRate
 328+ C3CB 77                                   ld      (hl),a
 329+ C3CC 3A 6C 7E                             ld      a,(JSTY)
 330+ C3CF FE 00                                cp      0
 331+ C3D1 28 0A                                jr      z,.ForwardCursorKeysDone
 332+ C3D3 CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 333+ C3D5 28 03                                jr      z,.PosPitchDampen
 334+ C3D7 3C           .NegPitchDampen:        inc     a
 335+ C3D8 18 01                                jr      .ApplyPitchDampen
 336+ C3DA 3D           .PosPitchDampen:        dec     a
 337+ C3DB 18 DD        .ApplyPitchDampen:      jr      .UpdateBetaPitch
 338+ C3DD              ; Now test hyperpsace. We can't be docked as this is a view routine piece of logic but for say local charts we may
 339+ C3DD              ; be in flight and they have to force a forward view when hyperspace is pressed
 340+ C3DD              ; We won't do galatic here, but for other views force to forward view
 341+ C3DD              .ForwardCursorKeysDone: MacroIsKeyPressed c_Pressed_Hyperspace              ; Check for hyperspace
 341+ C3DD 3E 24       >                        ld      a,c_Pressed_Hyperspace
 341+ C3DF             >                        MMUSelectKeyboard
 341+ C3DF ED 91 57 65 >                     nextreg KeyboardMMU,       BankKeyboard
 341+ C3E3 CD BB E1    >                        call    is_key_pressed
 342+ C3E6 20 48                                jr      nz,.NotHyperspace
 343+ C3E8              ; If we are in hyperspace countdown then test for hyperspace
 344+ C3E8 2A 27 81                             ld      hl,(InnerHyperCount)                ; if hyperspace was enaged then cancel
 345+ C3EB 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ; hyperspace
 346+ C3EC B5                                   or      l                                   ; .
 347+ C3ED 20 41                                jr      nz,.CancelHyperspace                ; .
 348+ C3EF              ; check selected target if we find one then after gettting galaxy at bc a=0 if not found
 349+ C3EF ED 5B 01 80                          ld      de,(PresentSystemX)
 350+ C3F3 2A 03 80                             ld      hl,(TargetSystemX)
 351+ C3F6 CD D8 99                             call    compare16HLDE
 352+ C3F9 28 35                                jr      z,.NoTargetSelected                 ; can't jump to current system
 353+ C3FB 3A EE 7F                             ld      a,(Galaxy)
 354+ C3FE                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 354+ C3FE ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,     a
 355+ C401 ED 4B 03 80                          ld      bc,(TargetSystemX)
 356+ C405 CD BB FA                             call    galaxy_name_at_bc
 357+ C408 FE 00                                cp      0
 358+ C40A 28 24                                jr      z,.NotHyperspace
 359+ C40C              ; check fuel is sufficient
 360+ C40C ED 4B 01 80                          ld      bc,(PresentSystemX)
 361+ C410 ED 43 57 E8                          ld      (GalaxyPresentSystem),bc
 362+ C414 ED 4B 03 80                          ld      bc,(TargetSystemX)
 363+ C418 ED 43 59 E8                          ld      (GalaxyDestinationSystem),bc
 364+ C41C CD F7 FB                             call    galaxy_find_distance            ; get distance into HL
 365+ C41F 7C                                   ld      a,h
 366+ C420 A7                                   and     a
 367+ C421 20 0D                                jr      nz,.InsufficientFuel            ; max jump capacity is 25 ly for any ship
 368+ C423 3A C3 84                             ld      a,(Fuel)
 369+ C426                                      JumpIfALTNusng    l, .InsufficientFuel
 369+ C426 BD          >                        cp      l
 369+ C427 DA 30 C4    >                        jp		c, .InsufficientFuel
 370+ C42A              ; set up timer countdown
 371+ C42A 21 0B 0B                             ld      hl,HyperSpaceTimers                 ; set both timers to 15
 372+ C42D 22 27 81                             ld      (InnerHyperCount),hl                ; .
 373+ C430              .CancelHyperspace
 374+ C430              .NoTargetSelected
 375+ C430              .InsufficientFuel
 376+ C430              .NotHyperspace:
 377+ C430              ;--- Check for in system Jump---------------------------------------
 378+ C430 2A 27 81     .CheckForWarpPressd:    ld      hl,(InnerHyperCount)                ; if hyperspace was enaged then cancel
 379+ C433 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ; hyperspace
 380+ C434 B5                                   or      l                                   ; .
 381+ C435 20 0F                                jr      nz,.WarpNotPressed
 382+ C437 3E 54                                ld      a,c_Pressed_Warp
 383+ C439                                      MMUSelectKeyboard
 383+ C439 ED 91 57 65 >                     nextreg KeyboardMMU,       BankKeyboard
 384+ C43D CD AE E1                             call    is_key_up_state
 385+ C440 28 04                                jr      z, .WarpNotPressed
 386+ C442                                      SetMemTrue  WarpPressed                     ; This signals the event , teh main loop will cancel this as an acknowlege
 386+ C442 AF          >                        xor     a
 386+ C443 32 50 81    >                        ld      (WarpPressed),a
 387+ C446              .WarpNotPressed:
 388+ C446                              IFDEF   LASER_V2
 389+ C446 CD 1E 83                             call    IsLaserUseable                      ; no laser or destroyed?
 390+ C449 28 3A                                jr      z,          .FireNotPressed
 391+ C44B 3E 14        .IsFirePressed:         ld      a,c_Pressed_FireLaser               ; else (beam type) if fire is pressed
 392+ C44D                                      MMUSelectKeyboard
 392+ C44D ED 91 57 65 >                     nextreg KeyboardMMU,       BankKeyboard
 393+ C451 CD AE E1                             call    is_key_up_state
 394+ C454 28 2F                                jr      z,.FireNotPressed
 395+ C456              .FirePressed:           ;break
 396+ C456                                      JumpIfMemNotZero    CurrentCooldown,     .LaserDone
 396+ C456 3A 00 82    >                        ld  a,(CurrentCooldown)
 396+ C459 A7          >                        and a
 396+ C45A C2 A7 C4    >                        jp  nz,.LaserDone
 397+ C45D                                      JumpIfMemNotZero    CurrentBurstPause,   .LaserDone
 397+ C45D 3A FF 81    >                        ld  a,(CurrentBurstPause)
 397+ C460 A7          >                        and a
 397+ C461 C2 A7 C4    >                        jp  nz,.LaserDone
 398+ C464                                      JumpIfMemNotZero    CurrLaserBurstCount, .LaserDone
 398+ C464 3A 02 82    >                        ld  a,(CurrLaserBurstCount)
 398+ C467 A7          >                        and a
 398+ C468 C2 A7 C4    >                        jp  nz,.LaserDone
 399+ C46B                                      JumpIfMemTrue       LaserBeamOn,         .LaserDone
 399+ C46B 3A FD 81    >                        ld      a,(LaserBeamOn)
 399+ C46E A7          >                        and     a
 399+ C46F CA A7 C4    >                        jp      z, .LaserDone
 400+ C472                                      ldCopyByte          CurrLaserPulseRate,   CurrLaserBurstCount
 400+ C472 3A F9 81    >                        ld       a,(CurrLaserPulseRate)
 400+ C475 32 02 82    >                        ld       (CurrLaserBurstCount),a
 401+ C478                                      ldCopyByte          CurrLaserPulseOnTime, CurrLaserDuration
 401+ C478 3A FA 81    >                        ld       a,(CurrLaserPulseOnTime)
 401+ C47B 32 FE 81    >                        ld       (CurrLaserDuration),a
 402+ C47E                                      SetMemTrue          LaserBeamOn
 402+ C47E AF          >                        xor     a
 402+ C47F 32 FD 81    >                        ld      (LaserBeamOn),a
 403+ C482                                      ;call               TriggerLaserSound
 404+ C482 C3 A7 C4                             jp                  .LaserDone
 405+ C485              .FireNotPressed:        ReturnIfMemNotZero  CurrLaserBurstCount
 405+ C485 3A 02 82    >                        ld     a,(CurrLaserBurstCount)
 405+ C488 A7          >                        and     a
 405+ C489 C0          >                        ret    nz
 406+ C48A                                      ReturnIfMemNotZero  CurrLaserDuration
 406+ C48A 3A FE 81    >                        ld     a,(CurrLaserDuration)
 406+ C48D A7          >                        and     a
 406+ C48E C0          >                        ret    nz
 407+ C48F                                      ReturnIfMemFalse    LaserBeamOn
 407+ C48F 3A FD 81    >                        ld      a,(LaserBeamOn)
 407+ C492 A7          >                        and     a
 407+ C493 C0          >                        ret     nz
 408+ C494                                      ldCopyByte          CurrLaserPulseRest, CurrentCooldown
 408+ C494 3A FC 81    >                        ld       a,(CurrLaserPulseRest)
 408+ C497 32 00 82    >                        ld       (CurrentCooldown),a
 409+ C49A                                      SetMemFalse         LaserBeamOn
 409+ C49A 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 409+ C49C 32 FD 81    >                        ld      (LaserBeamOn),a
 410+ C49F                                      SetMemZero          CurrLaserBurstCount
 410+ C49F AF          >                        xor     a
 410+ C4A0 32 02 82    >                        ld      (CurrLaserBurstCount),a
 411+ C4A3                                      SetMemZero          CurrentBurstPause
 411+ C4A3 AF          >                        xor     a
 411+ C4A4 32 FF 81    >                        ld      (CurrentBurstPause),a
 412+ C4A7              .LaserDone:
 413+ C4A7                              ELSE
 414+ C4A7 ~            .CheckForLaserPressed:  call    IsLaserUseable                      ; no laser or destroyed?
 415+ C4A7 ~                                    jr      z,.CheckTargetting
 416+ C4A7 ~            .CanLaserStillFire:     SetMemFalse FireLaserPressed                ; default to no laser
 417+ C4A7 ~                                    ld      a,(CurrLaserPulseRate)              ; if not beam type
 418+ C4A7 ~                                    JumpIfAIsZero .BeamType                     ; .
 419+ C4A7 ~                                    ld      b,a                                 ; and not run out of pulses
 420+ C4A7 ~                                    ld      a,(CurrLaserPulseRateCount)         ;
 421+ C4A7 ~                                    ld      a,(CurrLaserPulseOnCount)           ;    if not already on
 422+ C4A7 ~                                    JumpIfAEqNusng  b, .PulseLimitReached       ;
 423+ C4A7 ~                                    ld      hl,CurrLaserPulseOffCount           ;       and not in off phase
 424+ C4A7 ~                                    or      (hl)                                ;
 425+ C4A7 ~                                    inc     hl  ; CurrLaserPulseRestCount       ;       and not in rest phase.
 426+ C4A7 ~                                    or      (hl)                                ;    .
 427+ C4A7 ~                                    jr      nz, .CheckTargetting                ;    .
 428+ C4A7 ~            .IsFirePressed:         ld      a,c_Pressed_FireLaser               ;       if fire is pressed
 429+ C4A7 ~                                    MMUSelectKeyboard
 430+ C4A7 ~                                    call    is_key_up_state                     ;       .
 431+ C4A7 ~                                    jr      z,.CheckTargetting                  ;       .
 432+ C4A7 ~            .CanProcesFire:         ld      a,(CurrLaserPulseRateCount)         ;            pulse rate count ++
 433+ C4A7 ~                                    inc     a                                   ;            .
 434+ C4A7 ~            .StillHavePulsesLeft:   ld      (CurrLaserPulseRateCount),a         ;            .
 435+ C4A7 ~                                    ldCopyByte CurrLaserPulseOnTime, CurrLaserPulseOnCount  ; pulse on count = pulse on time
 436+ C4A7 ~                                 ;   ldCopyByte CurrLaserPulseOffTime, CurrLaserPulseOffCount; pulse off count = pulse off time
 437+ C4A7 ~                                 ;   ldCopyByte CurrLaserPulseRest, CurrLaserPulseRestCount  ; pulse rest count = pulse rest time
 438+ C4A7 ~                                    jp      .CheckTargetting
 439+ C4A7 ~            .BeamType:              ld      a,c_Pressed_FireLaser               ; else (beam type) if fire is pressed
 440+ C4A7 ~                                    MMUSelectKeyboard
 441+ C4A7 ~                                    call    is_key_up_state                     ;                   .
 442+ C4A7 ~                                    jr      z,.CheckTargetting                  ;                   .
 443+ C4A7 ~                                    SetMemTrue FireLaserPressed                 ;                   set pulse on to 1
 444+ C4A7 ~                                    ld      a,0
 445+ C4A7 ~                                    ld      (SoundFxToEnqueue),a
 446+ C4A7 ~                                    jp      .CheckTargetting
 447+ C4A7 ~            .PulseLimitReached:     ;ZeroA                                       ;
 448+ C4A7 ~                                    ;ld      (CurrLaserPulseRateCount),a         ;
 449+ C4A7 ~                                    ;ldCopyByte CurrLaserPulseRest, CurrLaserPulseRestCount   ; start the rest phase
 450+ C4A7                              ENDIF
 451+ C4A7              ; . Here we check to see if the target lock has been pressed
 452+ C4A7              .CheckTargetting:       MMUSelectKeyboard
 452+ C4A7 ED 91 57 65 >                     nextreg KeyboardMMU,       BankKeyboard
 453+ C4AB CD 45 E3                             call    TargetMissileTest
 454+ C4AE              .CheckForMissile:       MacroIsKeyPressed c_Pressed_FireMissile             ; launch pressed?
 454+ C4AE 3E 18       >                        ld      a,c_Pressed_FireMissile
 454+ C4B0             >                        MMUSelectKeyboard
 454+ C4B0 ED 91 57 65 >                     nextreg KeyboardMMU,       BankKeyboard
 454+ C4B4 CD BB E1    >                        call    is_key_pressed
 455+ C4B7 20 13                                jr      nz,.NotMissileLaunch
 456+ C4B9                                      AnyMissilesLeft
 456+ C4B9 3A 0E 80    >                        ld      a,(NbrMissiles)
 456+ C4BC A7          >                        and     a
 457+ C4BD 28 0D                                jr      z,.NotMissileLaunch                 ; no missiles in rack
 458+ C4BF CD C3 83                             call    IsMissileLockedOn
 459+ C4C2 28 08                                jr      z,.MissileNotLocked
 460+ C4C4              .MissileLaunch:         SetMissileLaunch
 460+ C4C4 3A E5 81    >                        ld      a,(MissileTargettingFlag)
 460+ C4C7 E6 0F       >                        and     $0F
 460+ C4C9 32 E5 81    >                        ld      (MissileTargettingFlag),a
 461+ C4CC              .MissileNotLocked:                       ; later on we need a "bing bong" nose for trying to launch an unlocked missile
 462+ C4CC              .NotMissileLaunch:
 463+ C4CC 3A E1 84     .CheckForECM:           ld      a,(ECMPresent)
 464+ C4CF                                      JumpIfAEqNusng EquipmentItemNotFitted,.NoECM
 464+ C4CF FE 00       >                        cp     EquipmentItemNotFitted
 464+ C4D1 CA F8 C4    >                        jp      z,.NoECM
 465+ C4D4 3A 0F 80     .CheckECMActive:        ld      a,(PlayerECMActiveCount)
 466+ C4D7                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero .NoECM
 466+ C4D7 A7          >                        and     a
 466+ C4D8 C2 F8 C4    >                        jp	    nz,.NoECM
 467+ C4DB              .CheckForKeyPress:      MacroIsKeyPressed c_Pressed_ECM
 467+ C4DB 3E 1C       >                        ld      a,c_Pressed_ECM
 467+ C4DD             >                        MMUSelectKeyboard
 467+ C4DD ED 91 57 65 >                     nextreg KeyboardMMU,       BankKeyboard
 467+ C4E1 CD BB E1    >                        call    is_key_pressed
 468+ C4E4 20 12                                jr      nz, .NoECM
 469+ C4E6              .FireECM:               SetMemToN      PlayerECMActiveCount, ECMCounterMax
 469+ C4E6 3E 80       >                        ld      a,ECMCounterMax
 469+ C4E8 32 0F 80    >                        ld      (PlayerECMActiveCount),a
 470+ C4EB 3A 74 7E                             ld      a,(ECMCountDown)
 471+ C4EE                                      JumpIfAGTENusng ECMCounterMax, .NoECM
 471+ C4EE FE 80       >                        cp     ECMCounterMax
 471+ C4F0 D2 F8 C4    >                        jp		nc,.NoECM
 472+ C4F3                                      SetMemToN      ECMCountDown, ECMCounterMax
 472+ C4F3 3E 80       >                        ld      a,ECMCounterMax
 472+ C4F5 32 74 7E    >                        ld      (ECMCountDown),a
 473+ C4F8 C9           .NoECM:                 ret

  56+ CD17 00 00 00...  stat_target_name        DS  30

  59+ CD36 21 7F E8     stat_copy_to_name:      ld      hl,GalaxyExpandedName

  64+ CD3F              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  65+ CD3F              STAT_print_boiler_text: INCLUDE "Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++CD3F
   2++CD3F              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++CD3F C5           .BoilerTextLoop:        push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   4++CD40 4E                                   ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   5++CD41 23                                   inc			hl
   6++CD42 46                                   ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   7++CD43 23                                   inc			hl
   8++CD44 5E                                   ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
   9++CD45 23                                   inc			hl
  10++CD46 56                                   ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  11++CD47 23                                   inc			hl
  12++CD48 E5                                   push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  13++CD49 EB                                   ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  14++CD4A 1E FF                                ld			e,txt_status_colour
  15++CD4C C5                                   push		bc
  16++CD4D D1                                   pop			de
  17++CD4E                                      MMUSelectLayer1
  17++CD4E ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  18++CD52 CD D7 E0                             call		l1_print_at
  19++CD55 E1                                   pop			hl
  20++CD56 C1                                   pop			bc
  21++CD57 10 E6                                djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  22++CD59 C9                                   ret
  23++CD5A
# file closed: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
  66+ CD5A              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  67+ CD5A DD 22 FE CD  STAT_DispDEIXtoIY:      ld (.STATclcn32z),ix
  68+ CD5E ED 53 00 CE                          ld (.STATclcn32zIX),de
  69+ CD62 DD 21 FA CD                          ld ix,.STATclcn32t+36
  70+ CD66 06 09                                ld b,9
  71+ CD68 0E 00                                ld c,0
  72+ CD6A 3E 30        .STATclcn321:           ld a,'0'
  73+ CD6C B7                                   or a
  74+ CD6D DD 5E 00     .STATclcn322:           ld e,(ix+0)
  75+ CD70 DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
  76+ CD73 2A FE CD                             ld hl,(.STATclcn32z)

  78+ CD78 22 FE CD                             ld (.STATclcn32z),hl

  80+ CD7E DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)

  86+ CD8C 3C                                   inc a

 122+ CE02 2A C1 84     STAT_GetCash:           ld		hl,(Cash+2)
 123+ CE05 EB                                   ex      de,hl
 124+ CE06 DD 2A BF 84                          ld      ix,(Cash)
 125+ CE0A FD 21 EA CC                          ld		iy,STAT_cash_amount
 126+ CE0E CD 5A CD                             call 	STAT_DispDEIXtoIY
 127+ CE11 FD E5                                push    iy
 128+ CE13 D1                                   pop     de

 130+ CE17 01 04 00                             ld      bc,4
 131+ CE1A ED B0                                ldir

 133+ CE1D              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 134+ CE1D 7E           STAT_expand_word:       ld      a,(hl)
 135+ CE1E FE 00                                cp      0
 136+ CE20 C8                                   ret     z
 137+ CE21 12                                   ld      (de),a
 138+ CE22 23                                   inc     hl
 139+ CE23 13                                   inc     de
 140+ CE24 18 F7                                jr      STAT_expand_word
 141+ CE26
 142+ CE26              ; hl = list of words
 143+ CE26              ; de = adress to expand to
 144+ CE26 7E           STAT_expand_name:       ld      a,(hl)
 145+ CE27 47                                   ld      b,a
 146+ CE28 23                                   inc     hl
 147+ CE29 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)              ; its a 16 bit
 148+ CE2A 2B                                   dec     hl                  ; move back one for now, need to optimise laters
 149+ CE2B B0                                   or      b
 150+ CE2C 20 01                                jr      nz,.MoreToDo
 151+ CE2E              ;                        ld      (de),a we dont want the null marker now
 152+ CE2E C9                                   ret
 153+ CE2F E5 D5        .MoreToDo:              push    hl,,de
 154+ CE31 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)              ; bodge for now no optimise
 155+ CE32 5F                                   ld      e,a
 156+ CE33 23                                   inc     hl
 157+ CE34 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 158+ CE35 57                                   ld      d,a
 159+ CE36 EB                                   ex      hl,de               ; hl is now Word... address
 160+ CE37 D1                                   pop     de                  ; de back to pointer to buffer
 161+ CE38 CD 1D CE     .ProcessWord:           call    STAT_expand_word
 162+ CE3B 3E 20                                ld      a," "               ; speculative space
 163+ CE3D 12                                   ld      (de),a
 164+ CE3E 13                                   inc     de
 165+ CE3F E1                                   pop     hl                  ; get string pointer back
 166+ CE40 23                                   inc     hl
 167+ CE41 23                                   inc     hl                  ; on to next word
 168+ CE42 18 E2                                jr      STAT_expand_name
 169+ CE44
 170+ CE44              STAT_First_Item         EQU     EQ_CARGO_BAY
 171+ CE44 3A EE 7F     STAT_buffer_list:       ld      a,(Galaxy)       ; DEBUG as galaxy n is not working
 172+ CE47                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 172+ CE47 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,     a
 173+ CE4A 21 EA C0                             ld      hl,STAT_display_buffer                      ; hl - target buffer
 174+ CE4D 3E 01                                ld      a,1                                         ; so it will still skip them on printing
 175+ CE4F 11 00 0C                             ld      de, STAT_display_buff_len
 176+ CE52 CD F0 7D                             call    memfill_dma                                 ; full buffer with ASCII 1 (unprintable character)
 177+ CE55 21 01 C1                             ld      hl,STAT_display_buffer+STAT_buffer_row_len-1
 178+ CE58 11 18 00                             ld      de,STAT_buffer_row_len
 179+ CE5B 06 80                                ld      b,STAT_buffer_rows
 180+ CE5D                                      ZeroA
 180+ CE5D AF          >                        xor a
 181+ CE5E 77           .EoLLoop:               ld      (hl),a                                      ; fix all buffer lines with a null
 182+ CE5F 19                                   add     hl,de
 183+ CE60 10 FC                                djnz    .EoLLoop
 184+ CE62 DD 21 E0 84                          ld      ix,EquipmentFitted + STAT_First_Item        ; ix = equipment master table, ignore missiles
 185+ CE66 FD 21 EA C0                          ld      iy,STAT_display_buffer                      ; iy = target buffer
 186+ CE6A 06 18                                ld      b,EQ_ITEM_COUNT - EQ_CARGO_BAY              ; we do not include Fuel and Missile counts
 187+ CE6C 0E 00                                ld      c,0                                         ; Current Row
 188+ CE6E 1E 02                                ld      e,STAT_First_Item
 189+ CE70 DD 7E 00     .ProcessRow:            ld      a,(ix+0)                                    ; Do we own one?
 190+ CE73                                      JumpIfAIsZero .NotFitted                            ; optimised check for EquipmentItemNotFitted
 190+ CE73 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 190+ CE74 CA 98 CE    >                        jp	    z, .NotFitted
 191+ CE77 D5 FD E5 DD  .OwnItem:               push    de,, iy,, ix,, bc
 191+ CE7B E5 C5
 192+ CE7D 21 06 F4                             ld      hl,ShipEquipNameTable                       ; look up equipment name
 193+ CE80 16 08                                ld      d,EquipNameTableRowLen                       ; ship equip name row length, e = current equip row
 194+ CE82 ED 30                                mul
 195+ CE84 19                                   add     hl,de                                       ; hl = dword list of work pointers
 196+ CE85 FD 54 FD 5D                          ld      de,iy                                       ; de = 0 column at current display buffer row
 197+ CE89 CD 26 CE                             call    STAT_expand_name                           ; expand name
 198+ CE8C C1 DD E1 FD                          pop     iy,,ix,,bc
 198+ CE90 E1
 199+ CE91 11 18 00                             ld      de,STAT_buffer_row_len
 200+ CE94 FD 19                                add     iy,de                                       ; now iy = start of next column
 201+ CE96 D1                                   pop     de
 202+ CE97 0C                                   inc     c
 203+ CE98              .NotFitted:
 204+ CE98 DD 23        .DoneFittedCheck:       inc     ix
 205+ CE9A 1C                                   inc     e
 206+ CE9B 10 D3                                djnz    .ProcessRow
 207+ CE9D 79           .DoneProcess:           ld      a,c
 208+ CE9E 32 E9 C0                             ld      (STAT_current_end),a
 209+ CEA1 C9                                   ret

 216+ CEAB              GetStatFuelLevel:       INCLUDE "Menus/get_fuel_level_inlineinclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/get_fuel_level_inlineinclude.asm
   1++CEAB
   2++CEAB
   3++CEAB 3A C3 84     	ld		a,(Fuel)
   4++CEAE 11 5E AC     	ld		de,txt_fuel_level
   5++CEB1 0E 9C        	ld	c, -100
   6++CEB3 CD BD CE     	call	.Num1
   7++CEB6 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
   8++CEB8 CD BD CE     	call	.Num1
   9++CEBB 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  10++CEBD              .Num1:
  11++CEBD 06 2F        	ld	b,'0'-1
  12++CEBF              .Num2:
  13++CEBF 04           	inc		b
  14++CEC0 81           	add		a,c
  15++CEC1 38 FC        	jr		c,.Num2
  16++CEC3 91           	sub 	c
  17++CEC4 C5           	push	bc
  18++CEC5 F5           	push	af
  19++CEC6 79           	ld		a,c
  20++CEC7 FE FF        	cp		-1
  21++CEC9 CC D2 CE     	call	z,.InsertDot
  22++CECC 78           	ld		a,b
  23++CECD 12           	ld		(de),a
  24++CECE 13           	inc		de
  25++CECF F1           	pop		af
  26++CED0 C1           	pop		bc
  27++CED1 C9           	ret
  28++CED2              .InsertDot:
  29++CED2 3E 2E        	ld		a,'.'
  30++CED4 12           	ld		(de),a
  31++CED5 13           	inc		de
  32++CED6 C9           	ret

 298+ CFA6              draw_STAT_items:        MMUSelectLayer1
 298+ CFA6 ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
 299+ CFAA CD 8F E0                             call    l1_cls
 300+ CFAD                                      ; add in all the status stuff later
 301+ CFAD 3A E8 C0                             ld      a,(STAT_current_topItem)                    ; Move to correct top of stat list item
 302+ CFB0 16 18                                ld      d,STAT_buffer_row_len                       ; so de = offset to first item in display
 303+ CFB2 5F                                   ld      e,a
 304+ CFB3 ED 30                                mul
 305+ CFB5 21 EA C0                             ld      hl,STAT_display_buffer                      ; hl = pointer to first item in display
 306+ CFB8 19                                   add     hl,de                                       ;
 307+ CFB9 3A E8 C0                             ld      a,(STAT_current_topItem)                    ; set a to number of lines to display
 308+ CFBC 47                                   ld      b,a                                         ;
 309+ CFBD 3A E9 C0                             ld      a,(STAT_current_end)                        ;
 310+ CFC0 90                                   sub     b                                           ;
 311+ CFC1                                      JumpIfALTNusng  STAT_eqip_window_len, .FillScreen   ; if there are enough then just do a screen fill
 311+ CFC1 FE 0A       >                        cp      STAT_eqip_window_len
 311+ CFC3 DA CA CF    >                        jp		c, .FillScreen
 312+ CFC6 06 0A        .JustWindowing:         ld      b,STAT_eqip_window_len                      ; if its more than a screen then window
 313+ CFC8 18 01                                jr      .ReadyToPrint
 314+ CFCA 47           .FillScreen:            ld      b,a                                         ; b = the mumber of rows to display
 315+ CFCB 11 40 58     .ReadyToPrint:          ld      de,STAT_position
 316+ CFCE D5 E5 C5     .DrawARow:              push    de,, hl,, bc                                ; "l1 PrintAt, pixel row, whole char col, DE = yx, HL = message Addr"
 317+ CFD1 CD D7 E0                             call    l1_print_at
 317+ CFD4
 318+ CFD4 C1 E1                                pop     hl,,bc                                      ; get mesage addr back and move down one line
 319+ CFD6 11 18 00                             ld      de,STAT_buffer_row_len
 320+ CFD9 19                                   add     hl,de
 321+ CFDA D1                                   pop     de                                           ; get output row back
 322+ CFDB 3E 08                                ld      a,8
 323+ CFDD 82                                   add     a,d
 324+ CFDE 57                                   ld      d,a
 325+ CFDF 10 ED                                djnz    .DrawARow
