  50+ C0BF
  51+ C0BF
  52+ C0BF              ; Post clipping the results are now 8 bit
  53+ C0BF 00           UBnkVisibility              DB  0               ; replaces general purpose xx4 in rendering
  54+ C0C0 00           UBnkProjectedY              DB  0
  55+ C0C1 00           UBnkProjectedX              DB  0
  56+ C0C2              UBnkProjected               equ UBnkProjectedY  ; resultant projected position
  57+ C0C2 00 00 00...  XX15Save                    DS  8
  58+ C0CA 00 00 00...  XX15Save2                   DS  8
  59+ C0D2 00           VarBackface                 DB 0
  60+ C0D3              ; Heap (or array) information for lines and normals
  61+ C0D3              ; Coords are stored XY,XY,XY,XY
  62+ C0D3              ; Normals
  63+ C0D3              ; This needs re-oprganising now.
  64+ C0D3              ; Runtime Calculation Store
  65+ C0D3
  66+ C0D3              FaceArraySize               equ 30
  67+ C0D3              EdgeHeapSize                equ 40
  68+ C0D3              NodeArraySize               equ 40
  69+ C0D3              LineArraySize               equ 50; incerased for max of 28 lines, of 4 points of 16 bits each
  70+ C0D3              ; ONLY IF TESTING SOLID FILL TraingleArraySize           equ 25
  71+ C0D3              ; Storage arrays for data
  72+ C0D3              ; Structure of arrays
  73+ C0D3              ; Visibility array  - 1 Byte per face/normal on ship model Bit 7 (or FF) visible, 0 Invisible
  74+ C0D3              ; Node array corresponds to a processed vertex from the ship model transformed into world coordinates and tracks the node list from model
  75+ C0D3              ; NodeArray         -  4 bytes per element      0           1            2          3
  76+ C0D3              ;                                               X Coord Lo  Y Coord Lo   Z CoordLo  Sign Bits 7 6 5 for X Y Z Signs (set = negative)
  77+ C0D3              ; Line Array        -  4 bytes per eleement     0           1            2          3
  78+ C0D3              ;                                               X1          Y1           X2         Y2
  79+ C0D3 00 00 00...  UbnkFaceVisArray            DS FaceArraySize            ; XX2 Up to 16 faces this may be normal list, each entry is controlled by bit 7, 1 visible, 0 hidden
  80+ C0F1              ; Node array holds the projected to screen position regardless of if its clipped or not
  81+ C0F1              ; When we use traingles we can cheat a bit on clipping as all lines will be horizontal so clipping is much simplified
  82+ C0F1 00 00 00...  UBnkNodeArray               DS NodeArraySize * 4        ; XX3 Holds the points as an array, its an array not a heap
  83+ C191 00 00 00...  UBnkNodeArray2              DS NodeArraySize * 4        ; XX3 Holds the points as an array, its an array not a heap
  84+ C231 00 00 00...  UbnkLineArray               DS LineArraySize * 8        ; XX19 Holds the clipped line details
  85+ C3C1              ; ONLY IF TESTING SOLID FILL UBnkTriangleOverspill       DS TraingleArraySize * 4    ; jsut a padding for testing
  86+ C3C1              UBnkLinesHeapMax            EQU $ - UbnkLineArray
  87+ C3C1              UBnkTraingleArray           EQU UbnkLineArray           ; We can use the line array as we draw lines or traingles
  88+ C3C1 00 00 00...  UbnkEdgeProcessedList DS EdgeHeapSize
  89+ C3E9              ; Array current Lengths
  90+ C3E9 00           UbnkFaceVisArrayLen         DS 1
  91+ C3EA 00           UBnkNodeArrayLen            DS 1
  92+ C3EB 00           UbnkLineArrayLen            DS 1                        ; total number of lines loaded to array
  93+ C3EC 00           UbnkLineArrayBytes          DS 1                        ; total number of bytes loaded to array  = array len * 4
  94+ C3ED              XX20                        equ UbnkLineArrayLen
  95+ C3ED              varXX20                     equ UbnkLineArrayLen
  96+ C3ED
  97+ C3ED 00           UbnkEdgeHeapSize            DS 1
  98+ C3EE 00           UbnkEdgeHeapBytes           DS 1
  99+ C3EF 00           UBnkLinesHeapLen            DS 1
 100+ C3F0 00           UbnKEdgeHeapCounter         DS 1
 101+ C3F1 00           UbnKEdgeRadius              DS 1
 102+ C3F2 00           UbnKEdgeShipType            DS 1
 103+ C3F3 00           UbnKEdgeExplosionType       DS 1
 104+ C3F4
 105+ C3F4              ; Node heap is used to write out transformed Vertexs
 106+ C3F4
 107+ C3F4              ; Lines
 108+ C3F4 00 00 00     UBnkXX19                    DS  3
 109+ C3F7
 110+ C3F7 00 00 00...  UBnkHullCopy                DS  ShipDataLength
 111+ C412              ScoopDebrisAddr             equ UBnkHullCopy + ScoopDebrisOffset
 112+ C412              MissileLockLoAddr           equ UBnkHullCopy + MissileLockLoOffset
 113+ C412              MissileLockHiAddr           equ UBnkHullCopy + MissileLockHiOffset
 114+ C412              EdgeAddyAddr                equ UBnkHullCopy + EdgeAddyOffset
 115+ C412              LineX4Addr                  equ UBnkHullCopy + LineX4Offset
 116+ C412              GunVertexAddr               equ UBnkHullCopy + GunVertexOffset
 117+ C412              ExplosionCtAddr             equ UBnkHullCopy + ExplosionCtOffset
 118+ C412              VertexCountAddr             equ UBnkHullCopy + VertexCountOffset
 119+ C412              VertexCtX6Addr              equ UBnkHullCopy + VertexCtX6Offset
 120+ C412              EdgeCountAddr               equ UBnkHullCopy + EdgeCountOffset
 121+ C412              BountyLoAddr                equ UBnkHullCopy + BountyLoOffset
 122+ C412              BountyHiAddr                equ UBnkHullCopy + BountyHiOffset
 123+ C412              FaceCtX4Addr                equ UBnkHullCopy + FaceCtX4Offset
 124+ C412              DotAddr                     equ UBnkHullCopy + DotOffset
 125+ C412              EnergyAddr                  equ UBnkHullCopy + EnergyOffset
 126+ C412              SpeedAddr                   equ UBnkHullCopy + SpeedOffset
 127+ C412              FaceAddyAddr                equ UBnkHullCopy + FaceAddyOffset
 128+ C412              QAddr                       equ UBnkHullCopy + QOffset
 129+ C412              LaserAddr                   equ UBnkHullCopy + LaserOffset
 130+ C412              VerticesAddyAddr            equ UBnkHullCopy + VerticiesAddyOffset
 131+ C412              ShipTypeAddr                equ UBnkHullCopy + ShipTypeOffset
 132+ C412              ShipNewBitsAddr             equ UBnkHullCopy + ShipNewBitsOffset
 133+ C412              ShipAIFlagsAddr             equ UBnkHullCopy + ShipAIFlagsOffset
 134+ C412              ShipECMFittedChanceAddr     equ UBnkHullCopy + ShipECMFittedChanceOffset
 135+ C412              ShipSolidFlagAddr           equ UBnkHullCopy + ShipSolidFlagOffset
 136+ C412              ShipSolidFillAddr           equ UBnkHullCopy + ShipSolidFillOffset
 137+ C412              ShipSolidLenAddr            equ UBnkHullCopy + ShipSolidLenOffset
 138+ C412              ; Static Ship Data. This is copied in when creating the universe object
 139+ C412              XX0                         equ UBnkHullCopy        ; general hull index pointer TODO find biggest ship design
 140+ C412
 141+ C412 00 00 00...  UBnkHullVerticies           DS  40 * 6              ; largetst is trasnport type 10 at 37 vericies so alows for 40 * 6 Bytes  =
 142+ C502 00 00 00...  UBnkHullEdges               DS  50 * 4              ; ype 10 is 46 edges so allow 50
 143+ C5CA 00 00 00...  UBnkHullNormals             DS  20 * 4              ; type 10 is 14 edges so 20 to be safe
 144+ C61A                  IFDEF SOLIDHULLTEST
 145+ C61A ~            UBnkHullSolid               DS  100 * 4             ; Up to 100 triangles (May optimise so only loads non hidden faces later
 146+ C61A                  ENDIF
 147+ C61A 0C           OrthagCountdown             DB  12
 148+ C61B
 149+ C61B              UBnkShipCopy                equ UBnkHullVerticies               ; Buffer for copy of ship data, for speed will copy to a local memory block, Cobra is around 400 bytes on creation of a new ship so should be plenty
 150+ C61B              UBnk_Data_len               EQU $ - StartOfUniv
 151+ C61B
 152+ C61B
 153+ C61B              ZeroUnivPitch:          MACRO
 154+ C61B ~                                    xor     a
 155+ C61B ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 156+ C61B                                      ENDM
 157+ C61B
 158+ C61B              ZeroUnivRoll:           MACRO
 159+ C61B ~                                    xor     a
 160+ C61B ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 161+ C61B                                      ENDM
 162+ C61B
 163+ C61B              ZeroUnivPitchAndRoll:   MACRO
 164+ C61B ~                                    xor     a
 165+ C61B ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 166+ C61B ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 167+ C61B                                      ENDM
 168+ C61B
 169+ C61B
 170+ C61B              MaxUnivPitchAndRoll:    MACRO
 171+ C61B ~                                    ld      a,127
 172+ C61B ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 173+ C61B ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 174+ C61B                                      ENDM
 175+ C61B
 176+ C61B              InfinitePitch:          MACRO
 177+ C61B ~                                    ld      a,$FF
 178+ C61B ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 179+ C61B                                      ENDM
 180+ C61B
 181+ C61B              InfiniteRoll:           MACRO
 182+ C61B ~                                    ld      a,$FF
 183+ C61B ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 184+ C61B                                      ENDM
 185+ C61B
 186+ C61B              InfinitePitchAndRoll:    MACRO
 187+ C61B ~                                    ld      a,$FF
 188+ C61B ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 189+ C61B ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 190+ C61B                                      ENDM
 191+ C61B
 192+ C61B              RandomUnivPitchAndRoll: MACRO
 193+ C61B ~                                    call    doRandom
 194+ C61B ~                                    or      %01101111
 195+ C61B ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 196+ C61B ~                                    call    doRandom
 197+ C61B ~                                    or      %01101111
 198+ C61B ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 199+ C61B                                      ENDM
 200+ C61B
 201+ C61B              RandomUnivSpeed:        MACRO
 202+ C61B ~                                    call    doRandom
 203+ C61B ~                                    and     31
 204+ C61B ~                                    ld      (UBnKSpeed),a
 205+ C61B                                      ENDM
 206+ C61B
 207+ C61B              MaxUnivSpeed:           MACRO
 208+ C61B ~                                    ld      a,31
 209+ C61B ~                                    ld      (UBnKSpeed),a
 210+ C61B                                      ENDM
 211+ C61B
 212+ C61B              ZeroUnivAccelleration:  MACRO
 213+ C61B ~                                    xor     a
 214+ C61B ~                                    ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 215+ C61B                                      ENDM
 216+ C61B
 217+ C61B 3A 0F C4     SetShipHostile:         ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)
 218+ C61E F6 04                                or      ShipIsHostile
 219+ C620 32 0F C4                             ld      (ShipNewBitsAddr),a
 220+ C623 C9                                   ret
 221+ C624
 222+ C624 3A 0F C4     ClearShipHostile:       ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)
 223+ C627 E6 FB                                and     ShipNotHostile
 224+ C629 32 0F C4                             ld      (ShipNewBitsAddr),a
 225+ C62C C9                                   ret
 226+ C62D
 227+ C62D
 228+ C62D              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 229+ C62D 21 00 C0     ResetUBnkData:          ld      hl,StartOfUniv
 230+ C630 11 1B 06                             ld      de,UBnk_Data_len
 231+ C633 AF                                   xor     a
 232+ C634 CD F0 7D                             call    memfill_dma
 233+ C637 C9                                   ret
 234+ C638              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 235+ C638 21 20 C0     ResetUbnkPosition:      ld      hl,UBnKxlo
 236+ C63B 06 09                                ld      b, 3*3
 237+ C63D AF                                   xor     a
 238+ C63E 77           .zeroLoop:              ld      (hl),a
 239+ C63F 23                                   inc     hl
 240+ C640 10 FC                                djnz    .zeroLoop
 241+ C642 C9                                   ret
 242+ C643
 243+ C643 DD 01        FireECM:                break
 244+ C645 3E 80                                ld      a,ECMCounterMax                 ; set ECM time
 245+ C647 32 5A C0                             ld      (UBnKECMCountDown),a            ;
 246+ C64A 3A 74 7E                             ld      a,(ECMCountDown)
 247+ C64D                                      ReturnIfALTNusng ECMCounterMax
 247+ C64D FE 80       >                        cp    ECMCounterMax
 247+ C64F D8          >                        ret	 c
 248+ C650 3E 80                                ld      a,ECMCounterMax
 249+ C652 32 74 7E                             ld      (ECMCountDown),a
 250+ C655 C9                                   ret
 251+ C656
 252+ C656 3A 59 C0     RechargeEnergy:         ld      a,(UBnKEnergy)
 253+ C659                                      ReturnIfAGTEMemusng EnergyAddr
 253+ C659 21 06 C4    >                        ld      hl,EnergyAddr
 253+ C65C BE          >                        cp      (hl)
 253+ C65D D0          >                        ret	    nc
 254+ C65E 3C                                   inc     a
 255+ C65F 32 59 C0                             ld      (UBnKEnergy),a
 256+ C662 C9                                   ret
 257+ C663              ; A ship normally needs enough energy to fire ECM but if its shot then
 258+ C663              ; it may be too low, in which case the ECM does a saftey shutdown and returns 1 energy
 259+ C663              ; plus a 50% chance it will blow the ECM up
 260+ C663 3A 5A C0     UpdateECM:              ld      a,(UBnKECMCountDown)
 261+ C666                                      ReturnIfAIsZero
 261+ C666 A7          >                        and     a
 261+ C667 C8          >                        ret     z
 262+ C668 3D                                   dec     a
 263+ C669 32 5A C0                             ld      (UBnKECMCountDown),a
 264+ C66C 21 59 C0                             ld      hl,UBnKEnergy
 265+ C66F 35                                   dec     (hl)
 266+ C670 F0                                   ret     p
 267+ C671 CD A0 C7     .ExhaustedEnergy:       call    UnivExplodeShip                 ; if it ran out of energy it was as it was also shot or collided as it checks in advance. Main ECM loop will continue as a compromise as multiple ships can fire ECM simultaneously
 268+ C674 C9                                   ret
 269+ C675
 270+ C675              ;-- This takes an Axis and subtracts 1, handles leading sign and boundary of 0 going negative
 271+ C675              JumpOffSet:             MACRO   Axis
 272+ C675 ~                                    ld      hl,(Axis)
 273+ C675 ~                                    ld      a,h
 274+ C675 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
 275+ C675 ~                                    jr      nz,.NegativeAxis
 276+ C675 ~            .PositiveAxis:          dec     l
 277+ C675 ~                                    jp      m,.MovingNegative
 278+ C675 ~                                    jp      .Done
 279+ C675 ~            .NegativeAxis:          inc     l                               ; negative means increment the z
 280+ C675 ~                                    jp      .Done
 281+ C675 ~            .MovingNegative:        ld      hl,$8001                        ; -1
 282+ C675 ~            .Done                   ld      (Axis),hl
 283+ C675                                      ENDM
 284+ C675
 285+ C675
 286+ C675              WarpOffset:             JumpOffSet  UBnKzhi                     ; we will simplify on just moving Z
 286+ C675 2A 27 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKzhi)
 286+ C678 7C          >                        ld      a,h
 286+ C679 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 286+ C67B 20 07       >                        jr      nz,.NegativeAxis
 286+ C67D 2D          >.PositiveAxis:          dec     l
 286+ C67E FA 88 C6    >                        jp      m,.MovingNegative
 286+ C681 C3 8B C6    >                        jp      .Done
 286+ C684 2C          >.NegativeAxis:          inc     l                               ; negative means increment the z
 286+ C685 C3 8B C6    >                        jp      .Done
 286+ C688 21 01 80    >.MovingNegative:        ld      hl,$8001                        ; -1
 286+ C68B 22 27 C0    >.Done                   ld      (UBnKzhi),hl
 287+ C68E C9                                   ret
 288+ C68F
 289+ C68F 44           WarpUnivByHL:           ld      b,h
 290+ C690 4D                                   ld      c,l
 291+ C691 26 00                                ld      h,0
 292+ C693 ED 5B 27 C0                          ld      de,(UBnKzhi)
 293+ C697 3A 26 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzlo)
 294+ C69A 6F                                   ld      l,a
 295+ C69B                                      MMUSelectMathsBankedFns
 295+ C69B ED 91 50 66 >                     nextreg MathsBankedFnsMMU, BankMathsBankedFns
 295+ C69F CD 10 01       call  SubBCHfromDELsigned
 296+ C6A2 ED 53 27 C0                          ld      (UBnKzhi),de
 297+ C6A6 7D                                   ld      a,l
 298+ C6A7 32 26 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),a
 299+ C6AA C9                                   ret
 300+ C6AB
 301+ C6AB              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 302+ C6AB              ; update ship speed and pitch based on adjustments from AI Tactics
 303+ C6AB 3A 48 C0     UpdateSpeedAndPitch:    ld      a,(UBnKAccel)                   ; only apply non zero accelleration
 304+ C6AE                                      JumpIfAIsZero .SkipAccelleration
 304+ C6AE A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 304+ C6AF CA CD C6    >                        jp	    z, .SkipAccelleration
 305+ C6B2 47                                   ld      b,a                             ; b = accelleration in 2's c
 306+ C6B3 3A 47 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKSpeed)                   ; a = speed + accelleration
 307+ C6B6                                      ClearCarryFlag
 307+ C6B6 B7          >                        or a
 308+ C6B7 88                                   adc     a,b
 309+ C6B8                                      JumpIfPositive  .DoneAccelleration      ; if speed < 0
 309+ C6B8 F2 BC C6    >                        jp		p, .DoneAccelleration
 310+ C6BB              .SpeedNegative:         ZeroA                                   ;    then speed = 0
 310+ C6BB AF          >                        xor a
 311+ C6BC 47           .DoneAccelleration:     ld      b,a                             ; if speed > speed limit
 312+ C6BD 3A 07 C4                             ld      a,(SpeedAddr)                   ;    speed = limit
 313+ C6C0                                      JumpIfAGTENusng b, .SpeedInLimits       ; .
 313+ C6C0 B8          >                        cp     b
 313+ C6C1 D2 C5 C6    >                        jp		nc,.SpeedInLimits
 314+ C6C4 47                                   ld      b,a                             ; .
 315+ C6C5 78           .SpeedInLimits:         ld      a,b                             ; .
 316+ C6C6 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKSpeed),a                   ; .
 317+ C6C9                                      ZeroA                                   ; acclleration = 0
 317+ C6C9 AF          >                        xor a
 318+ C6CA 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a                   ; for next AI update
 319+ C6CD              .SkipAccelleration:     ; handle roll and pitch rates
 320+ C6CD C9                                   ret
 321+ C6CE
 322+ C6CE 21 59 A3     UnivSetEnemyMissile:    ld      hl,NewLaunchUBnKX               ; Copy launch ship matrix
 323+ C6D1 11 20 C0                             ld      de,UBnKxlo                      ;
 324+ C6D4 01 1B 00                             ld      bc,NewLaunchDataBlockSize       ; positon + 3 rows of 3 bytes
 325+ C6D7 ED B0                                ldir                                    ;
 326+ C6D9 3E 03        .SetUpSpeed:            ld      a,3                             ; set accelleration
 327+ C6DB 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a                   ;
 328+ C6DE                                      ZeroA
 328+ C6DE AF          >                        xor a
 329+ C6DF 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 330+ C6E2 32 4A C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 331+ C6E5 3E 03                                ld      a,3                             ; these are max roll and pitch rates for later
 332+ C6E7 32 4B C0                             ld      (UBnKRAT),a
 333+ C6EA 3C                                   inc     a
 334+ C6EB 32 4C C0                             ld      (UBnKRAT2),a
 335+ C6EE 3E 16                                ld      a,22
 336+ C6F0 32 4E C0                             ld      (UBnKCNT2),a
 337+ C6F3                                      MaxUnivSpeed                            ; and immediatley full speed (for now at least) TODO
 337+ C6F3 3E 1F       >                        ld      a,31
 337+ C6F5 32 47 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKSpeed),a
 338+ C6F8                                      SetMemFalse UBnKMissleHitToProcess
 338+ C6F8 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 338+ C6FA 32 45 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKMissleHitToProcess),a
 339+ C6FD CD 62 C7                             call    UnivSetAIOnly
 340+ C700 CD 1B C6                             call    SetShipHostile
 341+ C703 3E 96        .SetupPayload:          ld      a,150
 342+ C705 32 3D C0                             ld      (UBnKMissileBlastDamage),a
 343+ C708 32 3F C0                             ld      (UBnKMissileDetonateDamage),a
 344+ C70B 3E 05                                ld      a,5
 345+ C70D 32 3C C0                             ld      (UBnKMissileBlastRange),a
 346+ C710 32 3E C0                             ld      (UBnKMissileDetonateRange),a
 347+ C713 C9                                   ret
 348+ C714              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 349+ C714              ; This sets the position of the current ship if its a player launched missile
 350+ C714 CD 54 CA     UnivSetPlayerMissile:   call    InitialisePlayerMissileOrientation  ; Copy in Player  facing
 351+ C717 CD 38 C6                             call    ResetUbnkPosition               ; home position
 352+ C71A 3E 05                                ld      a,MissileDropHeight             ; the missile launches from underneath
 353+ C71C 32 23 C0                             ld      (UBnKylo),a                     ; so its -ve drop height
 354+ C71F                                      IFDEF DEBUGMISSILELAUNCH
 355+ C71F ~                                        ld      a,$20       ; DEBUG
 356+ C71F ~                                        ld      (UBnKzlo),a
 357+ C71F                                      ENDIF
 358+ C71F 3E 80                                ld      a,$80                           ;
 359+ C721 32 25 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a                    ;
 360+ C724 3E 03                                ld      a,3                             ; set accelleration
 361+ C726 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a                   ;
 362+ C729                                      ZeroA
 362+ C729 AF          >                        xor a
 363+ C72A 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 364+ C72D 32 4A C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 365+ C730 3E 03                                ld      a,3                             ; these are max roll and pitch rates for later
 366+ C732 32 4B C0                             ld      (UBnKRAT),a
 367+ C735 3C                                   inc     a
 368+ C736 32 4C C0                             ld      (UBnKRAT2),a
 369+ C739 3E 16                                ld      a,22
 370+ C73B 32 4E C0                             ld      (UBnKCNT2),a
 371+ C73E                                      MaxUnivSpeed                            ; and immediatley full speed (for now at least) TODO
 371+ C73E 3E 1F       >                        ld      a,31
 371+ C740 32 47 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKSpeed),a
 372+ C743                                      SetMemFalse UBnKMissleHitToProcess
 372+ C743 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 372+ C745 32 45 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKMissleHitToProcess),a
 373+ C748 3E 80                                ld      a,ShipAIEnabled
 374+ C74A 32 55 C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a
 375+ C74D                                      ;break
 376+ C74D CD 24 C6                             call    ClearShipHostile                ; its a player missile
 377+ C750 C9                                   ret
 378+ C751              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 379+ C751              ; this applies blast damage to ship
 380+ C751 3A 5A 80     ShipMissileBlast:       ld      a,(CurrentMissileBlastDamage)
 381+ C754 47                                   ld      b,a
 382+ C755 3A 59 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKEnergy)                   ; Reduce Energy
 383+ C758 90                                   sub     b
 384+ C759 C3 A0 C7                             jp      UnivExplodeShip
 385+ C75C 18 42                                jr      UnivExplodeShip
 386+ C75E 32 59 C0                             ld      (UBnKEnergy),a
 387+ C761 C9                                   ret
 388+ C762              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 389+ C762              ; this applies AI flag and resets all other bits
 390+ C762 3E 80        UnivSetAIOnly:          ld      a,ShipAIEnabled
 391+ C764 32 55 C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a
 392+ C767 C9                                   ret
 393+ C768              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 394+ C768              ; Sets visibile and not a dot
 395+ C768 3A 55 C0     UnivVisible:            ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)                ;  disable ship AI hostily and ECM
 396+ C76B F6 40                                or      ShipIsVisible
 397+ C76D 32 55 C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a                ;  .
 398+ C770 C9                                   ret
 399+ C771              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 400+ C771              ; Sets invisibile
 401+ C771              UnivInvisible:          ClearMemBitN  UBnkaiatkecm  , ShipIsVisibleBitNbr ; Assume its hidden
 401+ C771 21 55 C0    >                        ld      hl,UBnkaiatkecm
 401+ C774 CB B6       >                        res     ShipIsVisibleBitNbr,(hl)
 402+ C776 C9                                   ret
 403+ C777              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 404+ C777              ; Clears ship killed bit to acknowled its happened
 405+ C777 21 55 C0     UnivAcknowledExploding: ld      hl, UBnkaiatkecm
 406+ C77A CB A6                                res     ShipKilledBitNbr,(hl)
 407+ C77C C9                                   ret
 408+ C77D              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 409+ C77D              ; Clears ship exploding bit
 410+ C77D 21 55 C0     UnivFinishedExplosion:  ld      hl, UBnkaiatkecm
 411+ C780 CB AE                                res     ShipExplodingBitNbr,(hl)
 412+ C782 C9                                   ret
 413+ C783              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 414+ C783              ; Sets visibile and not a dot
 415+ C783 3A 55 C0     UnivVisibleNonDot:      ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)                ;  disable ship AI hostily and ECM
 416+ C786 F6 40                                or      ShipIsVisible
 417+ C788 E6 F7                                and     ShipIsNotDot
 418+ C78A 32 55 C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a                ;  .
 419+ C78D C9                                   ret
 420+ C78E              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 421+ C78E              ; Sets visibile and  a dot
 422+ C78E 3A 55 C0     UnivVisibleDot:         ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)                ;  disable ship AI hostily and ECM
 423+ C791 F6 48                                or      ShipIsVisible | ShipIsDot
 424+ C793 32 55 C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a                ;  .
 425+ C796 C9                                   ret
 426+ C797              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 427+ C797              ; Removes AI Bit from ship
 428+ C797 3A 55 C0     UnivClearAI:            ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)                ;  disable ship AI hostily and ECM
 429+ C79A E6 7F                                and     ShipAIDisabled                  ;  .
 430+ C79C 32 55 C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a                ;  .
 431+ C79F C9                                   ret
 432+ C7A0
 433+ C7A0              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 434+ C7A0              ; This sets the ship as a shower of explosiondwd, flags as killed and removes AI
 435+ C7A0 DD 01        UnivExplodeShip:        break
 436+ C7A2 3A 55 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)
 437+ C7A5 F6 30                                or      ShipExploding | ShipKilled      ; Set Exlpoding flag and mark as just been killed
 438+ C7A7 E6 7F                                and     Bit7Clear                       ; Remove AI
 439+ C7A9 32 55 C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a
 440+ C7AC AF                                   xor     a
 441+ C7AD 32 59 C0                             ld      (UBnKEnergy),a
 442+ C7B0                                      ;TODO
 443+ C7B0 C9                                   ret
 444+ C7B1
 445+ C7B1 CD FA C8     UnivSetDemoPostion:     call    UnivSetSpawnPosition
 446+ C7B4 3E 81                                ld      a,%10000001                     ; AI Enabled has 1 missile
 447+ C7B6 32 55 C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a                ; set hostinle, no AI, has ECM
 448+ C7B9 32 0F C4                             ld      (ShipNewBitsAddr),a             ; initialise new bits logic
 449+ C7BC 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
 450+ C7BE 32 4A C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a             ; no pitch
 451+ C7C1 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a             ; set roll to maxi on station
 452+ C7C4                                      ZeroA
 452+ C7C4 AF          >                        xor a
 453+ C7C5 32 22 C0                             ld      (UBnKxsgn),a
 454+ C7C8 32 25 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a
 455+ C7CB 32 28 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a
 456+ C7CE 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0
 457+ C7D1 22 20 C0                             ld      (UBnKxlo),hl
 458+ C7D4 22 23 C0                             ld      (UBnKylo),hl
 459+ C7D7 3A 0E C4                             ld      a,(ShipTypeAddr)
 460+ C7DA 21 B0 05                             ld      hl,$05B0                            ; so its a negative distance behind
 461+ C7DD                                      JumpIfANENusng ShipTypeStation, .SkipFurther
 461+ C7DD FE 02       >                        cp     ShipTypeStation
 461+ C7DF C2 E6 C7    >                        jp      nz,.SkipFurther
 462+ C7E2 3E 05                                ld      a,5
 463+ C7E4 84                                   add     h
 464+ C7E5 67                                   ld      h,a
 465+ C7E6 22 26 C0     .SkipFurther            ld      (UBnKzlo),hl
 466+ C7E9 C9                                   ret
 467+ C7EA                  DISPLAY "Tracing 1", $
 468+ C7EA
 469+ C7EA              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 470+ C7EA              CopyPlanetGlobaltoSpaceStation:
 471+ C7EA 21 27 80                             ld      hl,ParentPlanetX
 472+ C7ED 11 20 C0                             ld      de,UBnKxlo
 473+ C7F0 01 09 00                             ld      bc,3*3
 474+ C7F3 ED B0                                ldir
 475+ C7F5 C9                                   ret
 476+ C7F6              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 477+ C7F6              CopySpaceStationtoPlanetGlobal:
 478+ C7F6 21 20 C0                             ld      hl,UBnKxlo
 479+ C7F9 11 27 80                             ld      de,ParentPlanetX
 480+ C7FC 01 09 00                             ld      bc,3*3
 481+ C7FF ED B0                                ldir
 482+ C801 C9                                   ret
 483+ C802              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 484+ C802              ; generate space station type based on seed values
 485+ C802              ; returns space station type in a
 486+ C802 3A 1C 80     UnivSelSpaceStationType:ld      a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 487+ C805 2A 1D 80                             ld      hl,(DisplayGovernment)          ; h = TekLevel, l = Government
 488+ C808 ED 5B 1F 80                          ld      de,(DisplayPopulation)          ; d = productivity e = Population
 489+ C80C                                      ; so its economdy + government - TekLevel + productivity - population %00000001
 490+ C80C 85                                   add     a,l
 491+ C80D 9C                                   sbc     a,h
 492+ C80E 82                                   add     a,d
 493+ C80F 9B                                   sbc     a,e
 494+ C810 E6 01                                and     $01
 495+ C812 21 DB 77                             ld      hl,MasterStations               ; in main memory
 496+ C815 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 497+ C817 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 498+ C818 C9                                   ret
 499+ C819              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 500+ C819              CalculateSpaceStationWarpPositon:
 501+ C819 3A F0 7F     .CalcZPosition:         ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+1)      ; seed d & 7
 502+ C81C E6 07                                and     %00000111               ; .
 503+ C81E C6 07                                add     a,7                     ; + 7
 504+ C820 CB 2F                                sra     a                       ; / 2
 505+ C822 32 28 C0     .SetZPosition:          ld      (UBnKzsgn),a            ; << 16 (i.e. load into z sign byte
 506+ C825 21 00 00                             ld      hl, $0000               ; now set z hi and lo
 507+ C828 22 26 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl            ;
 508+ C82B 3A F4 7F     .CalcXandYPosition:     ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+5)      ; seed f & 3
 509+ C82E E6 03                                and     %00000011               ; .
 510+ C830 C6 03                                add     a,3                     ; + 3
 511+ C832 47                                   ld      b,a
 512+ C833 3A F3 7F                             ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+4)      ; get low bit of seed e
 513+ C836 E6 01                                and     %00000001
 514+ C838 1F                                   rra                             ; roll bit 0 into bit 7
 515+ C839 B0                                   or      b                       ; now calc is f & 3 * -1 if seed e is odd
 516+ C83A 32 22 C0     .SetXandYPosition:      ld      (UBnKxsgn),a            ; set into x and y sign byte
 517+ C83D 32 25 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a            ; .
 518+ C840 78                                   ld      a,b                     ; we want just seed f & 3 here
 519+ C841 32 21 C0                             ld      (UBnKxhi),a             ; set into x and y high byte
 520+ C844 32 24 C0                             ld      (UBnKyhi),a             ; .
 521+ C847                                      ZeroA
 521+ C847 AF          >                        xor a
 522+ C848 32 20 C0                             ld      (UBnKxlo),a
 523+ C84B 32 23 C0                             ld      (UBnKylo),a
 524+ C84E              .CaclculateSpaceStationOffset:
 525+ C84E 3A F1 7F     .CalculateOffset:       ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+2)
 526+ C851 E6 03                                and     %00000011
 527+ C853 4F                                   ld      c,a
 528+ C854 3A EF 7F                             ld      a,(WorkingSeeds)
 529+ C857 E6 01                                and     %00000001
 530+ C859 17                                   rla
 531+ C85A 47                                   ld      b,a
 532+ C85B 61                                   ld      h,c
 533+ C85C 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 534+ C85E C5 E5        .TransposeX:            push    bc,,hl
 535+ C860 ED 5B 21 C0                          ld      de,(UBnKxhi)
 536+ C864 3A 22 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)
 537+ C867 6F                                   ld      l,a
 538+ C868                                      MMUSelectMathsBankedFns
 538+ C868 ED 91 50 66 >                     nextreg MathsBankedFnsMMU, BankMathsBankedFns
 538+ C86C CD 14 01       call        AddBCHtoDELsigned
 539+ C86F ED 53 21 C0                          ld      (UBnKxhi),de
 540+ C873 7D                                   ld      a,l
 541+ C874 32 22 C0                             ld      (UBnKxsgn),a
 542+ C877 E1 C1        .TransposeY:            pop     bc,,hl
 543+ C879 C5 E5                                push    bc,,hl
 544+ C87B ED 5B 24 C0                          ld      de,(UBnKyhi)
 545+ C87F 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
 546+ C882 6F                                   ld      l,a
 547+ C883                                      MMUSelectMathsBankedFns
 547+ C883 ED 91 50 66 >                     nextreg MathsBankedFnsMMU, BankMathsBankedFns
 547+ C887 CD 14 01       call        AddBCHtoDELsigned
 548+ C88A ED 53 24 C0                          ld      (UBnKyhi),de
 549+ C88E 7D                                   ld      a,l
 550+ C88F 32 25 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a
 551+ C892 E1 C1        .TransposeZ:            pop     bc,,hl
 552+ C894 ED 5B 27 C0                          ld      de,(UBnKzhi)
 553+ C898 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)
 554+ C89B 6F                                   ld      l,a
 555+ C89C                                      MMUSelectMathsBankedFns
 555+ C89C ED 91 50 66 >                     nextreg MathsBankedFnsMMU, BankMathsBankedFns
 555+ C8A0 CD 14 01       call        AddBCHtoDELsigned
 556+ C8A3 ED 53 27 C0                          ld      (UBnKzhi),de
 557+ C8A7 7D                                   ld      a,l
 558+ C8A8 32 28 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a
 559+ C8AB C9                                   ret
 560+ C8AC              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 561+ C8AC              UnivSpawnSpaceStationLaunched:
 562+ C8AC CD CF C8                             call    UnivSpawnSpaceStation
 563+ C8AF CD F6 C7                             call    CopySpaceStationtoPlanetGlobal
 564+ C8B2 CD 7C C9                             call    ResetStationLaunch
 565+ C8B5 C9                                   ret
 566+ C8B6                                      DISPLAY "TODO:fall into SpaceStation Launch Position once startup fixed"
 567+ C8B6                                      DISPLAY "TODO: Fault is probably as maths for xyz is 16 bit and shoudl be 24"
 568+ C8B6              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 569+ C8B6              SpaceStationLaunchPositon:
 570+ C8B6 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0
 571+ C8B9                                      ZeroA
 571+ C8B9 AF          >                        xor a
 572+ C8BA 22 20 C0                             ld      (UBnKxlo),hl
 573+ C8BD 32 22 C0                             ld      (UBnKxsgn),a
 574+ C8C0 22 23 C0                             ld      (UBnKylo),hl
 575+ C8C3 32 25 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a
 576+ C8C6 3E 81                                ld      a,$81
 577+ C8C8 22 26 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl
 578+ C8CB 32 28 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a
 579+ C8CE C9                                   ret
 580+ C8CF              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 581+ C8CF              UnivSpawnSpaceStation:  ;    UnivSelSpaceStationType ; set a to type
 582+ C8CF                                      ;ld      c,13                    ; c to slot 13 which is space station
 583+ C8CF                                      ;call    SpawnShipTypeASlotC     ; load inito universe slot
 584+ C8CF CD EA C7     .CalculatePosition:     call    CopyPlanetGlobaltoSpaceStation
 585+ C8D2 CD 19 C8     .CalcOrbitOffset:       call    CalculateSpaceStationWarpPositon
 586+ C8D5 CD 31 CA                             call    InitialiseOrientation
 587+ C8D8              .SetRollCounters:       ZeroUnivPitch
 587+ C8D8 AF          >                        xor     a
 587+ C8D9 32 4A C0    >                        ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 588+ C8DC                                      InfiniteRoll
 588+ C8DC 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 588+ C8DE 32 49 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 589+ C8E1              .SetOrientation:        FlipSignMem UBnkrotmatNosevX+1;  as its 0 flipping will make no difference
 589+ C8E1 3A 37 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 589+ C8E4 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 589+ C8E6 32 37 C0    >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevX+1),a
 590+ C8E9                                      FlipSignMem UBnkrotmatNosevY+1;  as its 0 flipping will make no difference
 590+ C8E9 3A 39 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 590+ C8EC EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 590+ C8EE 32 39 C0    >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevY+1),a
 591+ C8F1                                      FlipSignMem UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1
 591+ C8F1 3A 3B C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 591+ C8F4 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 591+ C8F6 32 3B C0    >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1),a
 592+ C8F9 C9                                   ret
 593+ C8FA              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 594+ C8FA              ; This sets the position of the current ship randomly, called after spawing
 595+ C8FA              ; Spawns in withink 16 bit range so 24 bit friendly
 596+ C8FA CD 31 CA     UnivSetSpawnPosition:   call    InitialiseOrientation
 597+ C8FD                                      RandomUnivPitchAndRoll
 597+ C8FD CD 0C 85    >                        call    doRandom
 597+ C900 F6 6F       >                        or      %01101111
 597+ C902 32 49 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 597+ C905 CD 0C 85    >                        call    doRandom
 597+ C908 F6 6F       >                        or      %01101111
 597+ C90A 32 4A C0    >                        ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 598+ C90D CD 0C 85                             call    doRandom                        ; set x lo and y lo to random
 599+ C910 32 20 C0     .setXlo:                ld      (UBnKxlo),a
 600+ C913 32 23 C0     .setYlo:                ld      (UBnKylo),a
 601+ C916 0F           .setXsign:              rrca                                    ; rotate by 1 bit right
 602+ C917 47                                   ld      b,a
 603+ C918 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 604+ C91A 32 22 C0                             ld      (UBnKxsgn),a
 605+ C91D 78           .setYSign:              ld      a,b                             ; get random back again
 606+ C91E 0F                                   rrca                                    ; rotate by 1 bit right
 607+ C91F 47                                   ld      b,a
 608+ C920 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                    ; and set y sign
 609+ C922 32 25 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a
 610+ C925 CB 08        .setYHigh:              rrc     b                               ; as value is in b rotate again
 611+ C927 78                                   ld      a,b                             ;
 612+ C928 E6 1F                                and     31                              ; set y hi to random 0 to 31
 613+ C92A 32 24 C0                             ld      (UBnKyhi),a                     ;
 614+ C92D CB 08        .setXHigh:              rrc     b                               ; as value is in b rotate again
 615+ C92F 78                                   ld      a,b
 616+ C930 E6 1F                                and     31                              ; set x hi to random 0 to 31
 617+ C932 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ; save shifted into c as well
 618+ C933 32 21 C0                             ld      (UBnKxhi),a
 619+ C936 3E 50        .setZHigh:              ld      a,80                            ; set z hi to 80 - xhi - yhi - carry
 620+ C938 98                                   sbc     b
 621+ C939 99                                   sbc     c
 622+ C93A 32 27 C0                             ld      (UBnKzhi),a
 623+ C93D 3A 0E C4     .CheckIfBodyOrJunk:     ld      a,(ShipTypeAddr)
 624+ C940                                      ReturnIfAEqNusng ShipTypeJunk
 624+ C940 FE 03       >                        cp      ShipTypeJunk
 624+ C942 C8          >                        ret     z
 625+ C943                                      ReturnIfAEqNusng ShipTypeScoopable
 625+ C943 FE 04       >                        cp      ShipTypeScoopable
 625+ C945 C8          >                        ret     z
 626+ C946 78                                   ld      a,b                             ; its not junk to set z sign
 627+ C947 0F                                   rrca                                    ; as it can jump in
 628+ C948 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 629+ C94A 32 28 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a
 630+ C94D C9                                   ret
 631+ C94E
 632+ C94E              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 633+ C94E              ; This sets the cargo type or carryflag set for not cargo
 634+ C94E              ; Later this will be done via a loadable lookup table
 635+ C94E 3A 0E C4     ShipCargoType:          ld      a,(ShipTypeAddr)
 636+ C951                                      JumpIfAEqNusng ShipID_CargoType5, .CargoCanister
 636+ C951 FE 04       >                        cp     ShipID_CargoType5
 636+ C953 CA 6A C9    >                        jp      z,.CargoCanister
 637+ C956              .IsItThargon:           JumpIfAEqNusng ShipID_Thargon,    .Thargon
 637+ C956 FE 27       >                        cp     ShipID_Thargon
 637+ C958 CA 70 C9    >                        jp      z,.Thargon
 638+ C95B              .IsItAlloy:             JumpIfAEqNusng ShipID_Plate,      .Plate
 638+ C95B FE 1D       >                        cp     ShipID_Plate
 638+ C95D CA 73 C9    >                        jp      z,.Plate
 639+ C960              .IsItSplinter:          JumpIfAEqNusng ShipID_Splinter,   .Splinter
 639+ C960 FE 24       >                        cp     ShipID_Splinter
 639+ C962 CA 76 C9    >                        jp      z,.Splinter
 640+ C965              .IsItEscapePod:         JumpIfAEqNusng ShipID_Escape_Pod, .EscapePod
 640+ C965 FE 11       >                        cp     ShipID_Escape_Pod
 640+ C967 CA 79 C9    >                        jp      z,.EscapePod
 641+ C96A CD 0C 85     .CargoCanister:         call    doRandom
 642+ C96D E6 0F                                and     15                      ; Limit stock from Food to Platinum
 643+ C96F C9                                   ret
 644+ C970 3E 11        .Thargon:               ld      a,AlienItemsIndex
 645+ C972 C9                                   ret
 646+ C973 3E 0A        .Plate:                 ld      a,AlloysIndex
 647+ C975 C9                                   ret
 648+ C976 3E 0D        .Splinter:              ld      a,MineralsIndex
 649+ C978 C9                                   ret
 650+ C979 3E 04        .EscapePod:             ld      a,SlavesIndex
 651+ C97B C9                                   ret
 652+ C97C                      IFDEF DEBUG_SHIP_MOVEMENT
 653+ C97C ~            FixStationPos:          ld      hl, DebugPos
 654+ C97C ~                                    ld      de, UBnKxlo
 655+ C97C ~                                    ld      bc,9
 656+ C97C ~                                    ldir
 657+ C97C ~                                    ld      hl,DebugRotMat
 658+ C97C ~                                    ld      de, UBnkrotmatSidevX
 659+ C97C ~                                    ld      bc,6*3
 660+ C97C ~                                    ldir
 661+ C97C ~                                    ret
 662+ C97C                      ENDIF
 663+ C97C                      IFDEF DEBUG_SHIP_MOVEMENT
 664+ C97C ~            DebugPos:               DB $00,$00,$00,$92,$01,$00,$7E,$04,$00
 665+ C97C ~            DebugRotMat:            DB $37,$88,$9A,$DC,$1B,$F7
 666+ C97C ~            DebugRotMat1:           DB $DF,$6D,$2A,$07,$C1,$83
 667+ C97C ~            DebugRotMat2:           DB $00,$80,$4A,$9B,$AA,$D8
 668+ C97C                      ENDIF
 669+ C97C
 670+ C97C              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 671+ C97C              ; This sets current univrse object to space station
 672+ C97C 3E 81        ResetStationLaunch:     ld  a,%10000001                         ; Has AI and 1 Missile
 673+ C97E 32 55 C0                             ld  (UBnkaiatkecm),a                    ; set hostinle, no AI, has ECM
 674+ C981 AF                                   xor a
 675+ C982 32 4A C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a             ; no pitch
 676+ C985 32 0F C4                             ld      (ShipNewBitsAddr),a             ; initialise new bits logic
 677+ C988 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
 678+ C98A 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a             ; set roll to maxi on station
 679+ C98D 21 00 00     .SetPosBehindUs:        ld      hl,$0000
 680+ C990 22 20 C0                             ld      (UBnKxlo),hl
 681+ C993 21 00 00                             ld      hl,$0000
 682+ C996 22 23 C0                             ld      (UBnKylo),hl
 683+ C999 21 B0 01                             ld      hl,$01B0                            ; so its a negative distance behind
 684+ C99C 22 26 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl
 685+ C99F AF                                   xor     a
 686+ C9A0 32 22 C0                             ld      (UBnKxsgn),a
 687+ C9A3 32 25 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a
 688+ C9A6 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 689+ C9A8 32 28 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a
 690+ C9AB CD 5E CA     .SetOrientation:        call    LaunchedOrientation             ; set initial facing
 691+ C9AE C9                                   ret
 692+ C9AF                  ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
 693+ C9AF              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
 694+ C9AF
 695+ C9AF
 696+ C9AF
 697+ C9AF 2A 23 29 27  FighterTypeMapping:     DB ShipID_Worm, ShipID_Sidewinder, ShipID_Viper, ShipID_Thargon
 698+ C9B3
 699+ C9B3              ; Initialiase data, iyh must equal slot number
 700+ C9B3              ;                   iyl must be ship type
 701+ C9B3              ;                   a  = current bank number
 702+ C9B3 01 22 00     UnivInitRuntime:        ld      bc,UBnKRuntimeSize
 703+ C9B6 21 40 C0                             ld      hl,UBnKStartOfRuntimeData
 704+ C9B9                                      ZeroA
 704+ C9B9 AF          >                        xor a
 705+ C9BA 32 5A C0                             ld      (UBnKECMCountDown),a
 706+ C9BD 77           .InitLoop:              ld      (hl),a
 707+ C9BE 23                                   inc     hl
 708+ C9BF 10 FC                                djnz    .InitLoop
 709+ C9C1              .SetEnergy:             ldCopyByte EnergyAddr, UBnKEnergy
 709+ C9C1 3A 06 C4    >                        ld       a,(EnergyAddr)
 709+ C9C4 32 59 C0    >                        ld       (UBnKEnergy),a
 710+ C9C7 FD 7C        .SetBankData:           ld      a,iyh
 711+ C9C9 32 40 C0                             ld      (UBnKSlotNumber),a
 712+ C9CC C6 46                                add     a,BankUNIVDATA0
 713+ C9CE 32 41 C0                             ld      (UbnKShipUnivBankNbr),a
 714+ C9D1 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl
 715+ C9D3 32 44 C0                             ld      (UBnKShipModelId),a
 716+ C9D6 CD 0F E0                             call    GetShipBankId                ; this will mostly be debugging info
 717+ C9D9 32 42 C0                             ld      (UBnkShipModelBank),a        ; this will mostly be debugging info
 718+ C9DC 78                                   ld      a,b                          ; this will mostly be debugging info
 719+ C9DD 32 43 C0                             ld      (UBnKShipModelNbr),a         ; this will mostly be debugging info
 720+ C9E0 3A 0B C4     .SetUpMissileCount:     ld      a,(LaserAddr)                ; get laser and missile details
 721+ C9E3 E6 0F                                and     ShipMissileCount
 722+ C9E5 4F                                   ld      c,a
 723+ C9E6 3A 55 7E                             ld      a,(RandomSeed1)              ; missile flag limit
 724+ C9E9 A1                                   and     c                            ; .
 725+ C9EA 32 5D C0                             ld      (UBnKMissilesLeft),a
 726+ C9ED 3A 0B C4     .SetupLaserType         ld      a,(LaserAddr)
 727+ C9F0 E6 F0                                and     ShipLaserPower
 728+ C9F2 ED 23                                swapnib
 729+ C9F4 32 5C C0                             ld      (UBnKLaserPower),a
 730+ C9F7 3A 10 C4     .SetUpFighterBays:      ld      a,(ShipAIFlagsAddr)
 731+ C9FA 4F                                   ld      c,a
 732+ C9FB E6 70                                and     ShipFighterBaySize
 733+ C9FD                                      JumpIfANENusng ShipFighterBaySizeInf, .LimitedBay
 733+ C9FD FE 70       >                        cp     ShipFighterBaySizeInf
 733+ C9FF C2 04 CA    >                        jp      nz,.LimitedBay
 734+ CA02 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF                       ; force unlimited ships
 735+ CA04 ED 23        .LimitedBay:            swapnib                             ; as its bits 6 to 4 and we have removed bit 7 we can cheat with a swapnib
 736+ CA06 32 5F C0                             ld      (UBnKFightersLeft),a
 737+ CA09 79           .SetUpFighterType:      ld      a,c                         ; get back AI flags
 738+ CA0A E6 0C                                and     ShipFighterType             ; fighter type is bits 2 and 3
 739+ CA0C CB 1F                                rr      a                           ; so get them down to 0 and 1
 740+ CA0E CB 1F                                rr      a                           ;
 741+ CA10 21 AF C9                             ld      hl,FighterTypeMapping       ; then use the lookup table
 742+ CA13 ED 31                                add     hl,a                        ; for the respective ship id
 743+ CA15 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; we work on this for optimisation
 744+ CA16 32 5E C0                             ld      (UBnKFighterShipId),a       ; ship data holds index to this table
 745+ CA19 3A 11 C4     .SetUpECM:              ld      a,(ShipECMFittedChanceAddr) ; Now handle ECM
 746+ CA1C 47                                   ld      b,a
 747+ CA1D 3A 57 7E     .FetchLatestRandom:     ld      a,(RandomSeed3)
 748+ CA20                                      JumpIfALTNusng b, .ECMFitted
 748+ CA20 B8          >                        cp      b
 748+ CA21 DA 2C CA    >                        jp		c, .ECMFitted
 749+ CA24              .ECMNotFitted:          SetMemFalse UBnKECMFitted
 749+ CA24 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 749+ CA26 32 5B C0    >                        ld      (UBnKECMFitted),a
 750+ CA29 C3 30 CA                             jp      .DoneECM
 751+ CA2C              .ECMFitted:             SetMemTrue  UBnKECMFitted
 751+ CA2C AF          >                        xor     a
 751+ CA2D 32 5B C0    >                        ld      (UBnKECMFitted),a
 752+ CA30              .DoneECM:               ; TODO set up laser power
 753+ CA30 C9                                   ret
 754+ CA31                  DISPLAY "Tracing 2", $
 755+ CA31
 756+ CA31                                      include "Universe/Ships/InitialiseOrientation.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/Ships/InitialiseOrientation.asm
   1++CA31              ;  sidev = (1,  0,  0)  sidev = (&6000, 0, 0)
   2++CA31              ;  roofv = (0,  1,  0)  roofv = (0, &6000, 0)
   3++CA31              ;  nosev = (0,  0, -1)  nosev = (0, 0, &E000)   E000 = SignBit[96]
   4++CA31              InitialiseOrientation:
   5++CA31 21 00 00     ZI1:                    ld      hl, 0
   6++CA34 22 2C C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevY),hl                ; set the zeroes
   7++CA37 22 2E C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevZ),hl                ; set the zeroes
   8++CA3A 22 30 C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvX),hl                ; set the zeroes
   9++CA3D 22 34 C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvZ),hl                ; set the zeroes
  10++CA40 22 36 C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatNosevX),hl                ; set the zeroes
  11++CA43 22 38 C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatNosevY),hl                ; set the zeroes
  12++CA46              ; Optimised as already have 0 in l
  13++CA46 26 60                                ld      h, $60	             				; 96 in hi byte
  14++CA48                                      ;ld      hl,1
  15++CA48 22 2A C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevX),hl
  16++CA4B 22 32 C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvY),hl
  17++CA4E              ; Optimised as already have 0 in l
  18++CA4E 26 E0                                ld      h, $E0					            ; -96 in hi byte which is +96 with hl bit 7 set
  19++CA50 22 3A C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatNosevZ),hl
  20++CA53 C9                                   ret
  21++CA54
  22++CA54              InitialisePlayerMissileOrientation:
  23++CA54 CD 31 CA                             call    InitialiseOrientation
  24++CA57 21 00 60                             ld      hl,$6000
  25++CA5A 22 3A C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatNosevZ),hl           ; mius
  26++CA5D C9                                   ret
  27++CA5E
  28++CA5E
  29++CA5E              ;  sidev = (1,  0,  0)  sidev = (&6000, 0, 0)
  30++CA5E              ;  roofv = (0,  1,  0)  roofv = (0, &6000, 0)
  31++CA5E              ;  nosev = (-0,  -0, 1) nosev = (0, 0, &6000)
  32++CA5E CD 31 CA     LaunchedOrientation:    call    InitialiseOrientation
  33++CA61                                      FlipSignMem UBnkrotmatNosevX+1;  as its 0 flipping will make no difference
  33++CA61 3A 37 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
  33++CA64 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
  33++CA66 32 37 C0    >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevX+1),a
  34++CA69                                      FlipSignMem UBnkrotmatNosevY+1;  as its 0 flipping will make no difference
  34++CA69 3A 39 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
  34++CA6C EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
  34++CA6E 32 39 C0    >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevY+1),a
  35++CA71                                      FlipSignMem UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1

  74++CAE5 A2                                   and     d

 100++CB0C              ; here as an optimisation we make sure X1 is always < X2  later on
 101++CB0C              .LL115:                 ClearCarryFlag

 117++CB2B AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; now a = sign dx xor sign dy

 121++CB35 ED 27 80                             test    $80

 128++CB4E ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ; is it a negative X

 131++CB56 9F          >					sbc 	a,a

 131++CB58 67          >					ld 		h,a
 132++CB59              .LL111:
 133++CB59 7C           .ScaleLoop:             ld      a,h                         ; At this point DX and DY are ABS values

 136++CB5D                                      ShiftDERight1
 136++CB5D CB 3A       >			   srl d
 136++CB5F CB 1B       >			   rr  e

 137++CB61 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 137++CB63 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 138++CB65 18 F2                                jr      .ScaleLoop                  ; scaled down Dx and Dy to 8 bit, Dy may have been negative
 139++CB67              .CalculateDelta:
 140++CB67              ; By now, the high bytes of both |delta_x| and |delta_y| are zero We know that h and d are both = 0 as that's what we tested with a BEQ
 141++CB67 AF           .LL113:                 xor     a
 142++CB68 32 7B 7F                             ld      (varT),a                    ; t = 0
 143++CB6B 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; If delta_x_lo < delta_y_lo, so our line is more vertical than horizontal, jump to LL114
 144++CB6C                                      JumpIfALTNusng  e, .LL114           ;
 144++CB6C BB          >                        cp      e
 144++CB6D DA 7D CB    >                        jp		c, .LL114
 145++CB70              ; Here Dx >= Dy sp calculate Delta Y / delta X
 146++CB70 32 5F 7F     .DxGTEDy:               ld      (varQ),a                    ; Set Q = delta_x_lo
 147++CB73 57                                   ld      d,a                         ; d = also Q for calc
 148++CB74 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; Set A = delta_y_lo
 149++CB75 CD 92 95                             call    AEquAmul256DivD; LL28Amul256DivD             ; Call LL28 to calculate:  R (actually a reg) = 256 * A / Q   = 256 * delta_y_lo / delta_x_lo
 150++CB78 32 60 7F                             ld      (varR),a                    ;
 151++CB7B 18 10                                jr      .LL116                      ; Jump to LL116, as we now have the line's gradient in R
 152++CB7D              ; Here Delta Y > Delta X so calulate delta X / delta Y
 153++CB7D 7B           .LL114:                 ld      a,e                         ; Set Q = delta_y_lo
 154++CB7E 57                                   ld      d,a
 155++CB7F 32 5F 7F                             ld      (varQ),a
 156++CB82 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; Set A = delta_x_lo
 157++CB83 CD 92 95                             call    AEquAmul256DivD; LL28Amul256DivD             ; Call LL28 to calculate: R = 256 * A / Q  = 256 * delta_x_lo / delta_y_lo
 158++CB86 32 60 7F                             ld      (varR),a                    ;
