 845+ CE7B                                      include "Universe/Ships/NormaliseTransMat.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/Ships/NormaliseTransMat.asm
   1++CE7B              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
   2++CE7B 47           Norm256mulAdivQ:        ld      b,a
   3++CE7C 0E 00                                ld      c,0
   4++CE7E 16 00                                ld      d,0
   5++CE80 3A 5F 7F                             ld      a,(varQ)
   6++CE83 5F                                   ld      e,a
   7++CE84              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
   8++CE84              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
   9++CE84 21 00 00     NormDIV16UNDOC:         ld      hl,0
  10++CE87 78                                   ld      a,b
  11++CE88 06 10                                ld      b,16
  12++CE8A CB 31        NormDIV16UNDOCLOOP:     sll	    c		; unroll 16 times
  13++CE8C 17                                   rla	    		; ...
  14++CE8D ED 6A                                adc	    hl,hl		; ...
  15++CE8F ED 52                                sbc	    hl,de		; ...
  16++CE91 30 02                                jr	    nc,NormDIV16UNDOCSKIP		; ...
  17++CE93 19                                   add	    hl,de		; ...
  18++CE94 0D                                   dec	    c		; ...
  19++CE95 10 F3        NormDIV16UNDOCSKIP:     djnz    NormDIV16UNDOCLOOP
  20++CE97 79                                   ld      a,c
  21++CE98 32 60 7F                             ld      (varR),a
  22++CE9B C9                                   ret
  23++CE9C
  24++CE9C FD 67        Norm256mulAdivQSignA:   ld      iyh,a
  25++CE9E                                      ClearSignBitA
  25++CE9E E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  26++CEA0 CD 7B CE                             call    Norm256mulAdivQ              ; do 15 bit unsigned
  27++CEA3 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh                       ; now correct R reg
  28++CEA5                                      SignBitOnlyA
  28++CEA5 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  29++CEA7 B1                                   or      c
  30++CEA8 32 60 7F                             ld      (varR),a
  31++CEAB C9                                   ret
  32++CEAC
  33++CEAC              ; Tested OK
  34++CEAC              ;LL21
  35++CEAC              NormaliseTransMat:
  36++CEAC                      IFDEF LOGMATHS
  37++CEAC ~                            ld      hl,UBnkTransmatNosevZ+1     ; initialise loop
  38++CEAC ~                            ld      b,9                         ; total of 9 elements to transform
  39++CEAC ~                            MMUSelectMathsTables
  40++CEAC ~            .LL21Loop:      ld      d,(hl)
  41++CEAC ~                            dec     hl
  42++CEAC ~                            ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = hilo now   hl now = pointer to low byte
  43++CEAC ~                            ShiftDELeft1                        ; De = DE * 2
  44++CEAC ~                            ld      a,d                         ; a = hi byte after shifting
  45++CEAC ~                            push	hl
  46++CEAC ~                            push	bc
  47++CEAC ~                            call    AEquAmul256Div197Log        ; R = (2(hi).0)/ConstNorm - LL28 Optimised BFRDIV R=A*256/Q = delta_y / delta_x Use Y/X grad. as not steep
  48++CEAC ~                            ;ld      a,c                         ; BFRDIV returns R also in l reg
  49++CEAC ~                            pop		bc
  50++CEAC ~                            pop		hl							; bc gets wrecked by BFRDIV
  51++CEAC ~                            ld      (hl),a                      ; write low result to low byte so zlo = (zhl *2)/197, we keep hi byte in tact as we need the sign bit
  52++CEAC ~                            dec     hl                          ; now hl = hi byte of pre val e.g z->y->x
  53++CEAC ~                            djnz    .LL21Loop                   ; loop from 2zLo through to 0xLo
  54++CEAC ~                            MMUSelectROM0
  55++CEAC ~                            ret
  56++CEAC                      ELSE
  57++CEAC 21 73 C0                     ld      hl,UBnkTransmatNosevZ+1         ; initialise loop
  58++CEAF 0E C5                        ld      c,ConstNorm                 ; c = Q = norm = 197
  59++CEB1 79                           ld      a,c
  60++CEB2 32 5F 7F                     ld      (varQ),a                    ; set up varQ
  61++CEB5 06 09                        ld      b,9                         ; total of 9 elements to transform
  62++CEB7 56           LL21Loop:       ld      d,(hl)
  63++CEB8 2B                           dec     hl
  64++CEB9 5E                           ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = hilo now   hl now = pointer to low byte
  65++CEBA                              ShiftDELeft1                        ; De = DE * 2
  65++CEBA CB 23       >			   sla e
  65++CEBC CB 12       >			   rl  d
  66++CEBE 7A                           ld      a,d                         ; a = hi byte after shifting
  67++CEBF E5                           push	hl
  68++CEC0 C5                           push	bc
  69++CEC1 CD 7B CE                     call    Norm256mulAdivQ
  70++CEC4                              ;===call    RequAmul256divC				; R = (2(hi).0)/ConstNorm - LL28 Optimised BFRDIV R=A*256/Q = delta_y / delta_x Use Y/X grad. as not steep
  71++CEC4 79                           ld      a,c                         ; BFRDIV returns R also in l reg
  72++CEC5 C1                           pop		bc
  73++CEC6 E1                           pop		hl							; bc gets wrecked by BFRDIV
  74++CEC7 77                           ld      (hl),a                      ; write low result to low byte so zlo = (zhl *2)/197, we keep hi byte in tact as we need the sign bit
  75++CEC8 2B                           dec     hl                          ; now hl = hi byte of pre val e.g z->y->x
  76++CEC9 10 EC                        djnz    LL21Loop                    ; loop from 2zLo through to 0xLo
  77++CECB C9                           ret
  78++CECC                      ENDIF
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/NormaliseTransMat.asm

 849+ CECC              ; Now we have
 850+ CECC              ;   * XX18(2 1 0) = (x_sign x_hi x_lo)
 851+ CECC              ;   * XX18(5 4 3) = (y_sign y_hi y_lo)
 852+ CECC              ;   * XX18(8 7 6) = (z_sign z_hi z_lo)

# file opened: ./Universe/Ships/InverseXX16.asm
   1++CECC              ; TESTEDOK
   2++CECC
   3++CECC              ;ScaleOrientationXX16:                       ; DEBUG TODO will combine with inverse later
   4++CECC              ;        ld      a,(XX17)
   5++CECC              ;        ld      ixl,a
   6++CECC              ;        ld      ixh,9
   7++CECC              ;        ld      hl,UBnkTransInv0x
   8++CECC              ;        ld      a,(hl)
   9++CECC              ;ScaleNode:
  10++CECC              ;        ld      b,ixl
  11++CECC              ;ScaleNodeLoop:
  12++CECC              ;        sla      a
  13++CECC              ;        djnz    ScaleNodeLoop
  14++CECC              ;        ld      (hl),a
  15++CECC              ;        inc     hl
  16++CECC              ;        inc     hl
  17++CECC              ;        dec     ixh
  18++CECC              ;        jr      nz,ScaleNode
  19++CECC              ;        ret
  20++CECC
  21++CECC
  22++CECC              InverseXX16:								; lead routine into .LL42	\ ->  &4B04 \ DO nodeX-Ycoords their comment  \  TrnspMat
  23++CECC              ; we coudl combine this with move to transmat later as an optimisation
  24++CECC              ; INPUT - All Scaled
  25++CECC              ;  They transmat has already been put into side, roof nose order
  26++CECC              ;  XX16   = |sidev_x| |sidev_y| |sidev_z|  1  0  3  2  5  4 note each bytepair is Scaled value in low and high byte just for sign
  27++CECC              ;  XX16   = |roofv_x| |roofv_y| |roofv_z|  7  6  8  9 11 10
  28++CECC              ;  XX16   = |nosev_x| |nosev_y| |nosev_z| 13 12 15 14 17 16
  29++CECC              ; OUTPUT
  30++CECC              ;  XX16(1 0)   ( 3 2) ( 5 4 ) =  sidev_x roofv_x nosev_x
  31++CECC              ;  XX16(7 6)   ( 8 9) (11 10) =  sidev_y roofv_y nosev_y
  32++CECC              ;  XX16(13 12) (15 14)(17 16) =  sidev_z roofv_z nosev_z
  33++CECC              ; First all side values become compoment 0 of each vector
  34++CECC 2A 62 C0             ld      hl,(UBnkTransmatSidevX)     ;
  35++CECF ED 5B 68 C0          ld      de,(UBnkTransmatRoofvX)     ;
  36++CED3 ED 4B 6E C0          ld      bc,(UBnkTransmatNosevX)     ;
  37++CED7 22 7A C0             ld      (UbnkTransInvRow0x0),hl     ;
  38++CEDA ED 53 7C C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow0x1),de     ;
  39++CEDE ED 43 7E C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow0x2),bc     ;
  40++CEE2 2A 64 C0             ld      hl,(UBnkTransmatSidevY)     ;
  41++CEE5 ED 5B 6A C0          ld      de,(UBnkTransmatRoofvY)     ;
  42++CEE9 ED 4B 70 C0          ld      bc,(UBnkTransmatNosevY)     ;
  43++CEED 22 82 C0             ld      (UbnkTransInvRow1y0),hl     ;
  44++CEF0 ED 53 84 C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow1y1),de     ;
  45++CEF4 ED 43 86 C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow1y2),bc     ;
  46++CEF8 2A 66 C0             ld      hl,(UBnkTransmatSidevZ)     ;
  47++CEFB ED 5B 6C C0          ld      de,(UBnkTransmatRoofvZ)     ;
  48++CEFF ED 4B 72 C0          ld      bc,(UBnkTransmatNosevZ)     ;
  49++CF03 22 8A C0             ld      (UbnkTransInvRow2z0),hl     ;
  50++CF06 ED 53 8C C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow2z1),de     ;
  51++CF0A ED 43 8E C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow2z2),bc     ;
  52++CF0E C9                   ret
  53++CF0F
  54++CF0F
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/InverseXX16.asm
 856+ CF0F              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 857+ CF0F              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 858+ CF0F              ;   XX12(1 0) = [x y z] . sidev  = (dot_sidev_sign dot_sidev_lo)  = dot_sidev
 859+ CF0F              ;   XX12(3 2) = [x y z] . roofv  = (dot_roofv_sign dot_roofv_lo)  = dot_roofv
 860+ CF0F              ;   XX12(5 4) = [x y z] . nosev  = (dot_nosev_sign dot_nosev_lo)  = dot_nosev
 861+ CF0F              ; Returns
 862+ CF0F              ;
 863+ CF0F              ;   XX12(1 0)            The dot product of [x y z] vector with the sidev (or _x)
 864+ CF0F              ;                        vector, with the sign in XX12+1 and magnitude in XX12
 865+ CF0F              ;
 866+ CF0F              ;   XX12(3 2)            The dot product of [x y z] vector with the roofv (or _y)
 867+ CF0F              ;                        vector, with the sign in XX12+3 and magnitude in XX12+2
 868+ CF0F              ;
 869+ CF0F              ;   XX12(5 4)            The dot product of [x y z] vector with the nosev (or _z)
 870+ CF0F              ;                        vector, with the sign in XX12+5 and magnitude in XX12+4
 871+ CF0F              ; TESTEDOK
 872+ CF0F              XX12DotOneRow:
 873+ CF0F              XX12CalcX:              N0equN1byN2div256 varT, (hl), (UBnkXScaled)       ; T = (hl) * regXX15fx /256
 873+ CF0F 3A A7 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)                        ;
 873+ CF12 5F          >                        ld      e,a                         ; use e as var Q = value of XX15 [n] lo
 873+ CF13 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)                        ; A = XX16 element
 873+ CF14 57          >                        ld      d,a
 873+ CF15 ED 30       >                        mul
 873+ CF17 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
 873+ CF18 32 7B 7F    >                        ld      (varT),a                      ; Q         ; result variable = XX16[n] * XX15[n]/256
 874+ CF1B 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 875+ CF1C              XX12CalcXSign:          AequN1xorN2 UBnkXScaledSign,(hl)             ;
 875+ CF1C 3A A8 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkXScaledSign)
 875+ CF1F AE          >                        xor     (hl)
 876+ CF20 32 61 7F                             ld      (varS),a                            ; Set S to the sign of x_sign * sidev_x
 877+ CF23 23                                   inc     hl
 878+ CF24              XX12CalcY:              N0equN1byN2div256 varQ, (hl),(UBnkYScaled)       ; Q = XX16 * XX15 /256 using varQ to hold regXX15fx
 878+ CF24 3A A9 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)                        ;
 878+ CF27 5F          >                        ld      e,a                         ; use e as var Q = value of XX15 [n] lo
 878+ CF28 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)                        ; A = XX16 element
 878+ CF29 57          >                        ld      d,a
 878+ CF2A ED 30       >                        mul
 878+ CF2C 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
 878+ CF2D 32 5F 7F    >                        ld      (varQ),a                      ; Q         ; result variable = XX16[n] * XX15[n]/256
 879+ CF30                                      ldCopyByte varT,varR                        ; R = T =  |sidev_x| * x_lo / 256
 879+ CF30 3A 7B 7F    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 879+ CF33 32 60 7F    >                        ld       (varR),a
 880+ CF36 23                                   inc     hl
 881+ CF37                                      AequN1xorN2 UBnkYScaledSign,(hl)             ; Set A to the sign of y_sign * sidev_y
 881+ CF37 3A AA C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkYScaledSign)
 881+ CF3A AE          >                        xor     (hl)
 882+ CF3B              ; (S)A = |sidev_x| * x_lo / 256  = |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo
 883+ CF3B E5           STequSRplusAQ           push    hl
 884+ CF3C CD BC 9C                             call    baddll38                            ; JSR &4812 \ LL38   \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ 1byte add (subtract)
 885+ CF3F E1                                   pop     hl
 886+ CF40 32 7B 7F                             ld      (varT),a                            ; T = |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo
 887+ CF43 23                                   inc     hl
 888+ CF44              XX12CalcZ:              N0equN1byN2div256 varQ,(hl),(UBnkZScaled)       ; Q = |sidev_z| * z_lo / 256
 888+ CF44 3A AB C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)                        ;
 888+ CF47 5F          >                        ld      e,a                         ; use e as var Q = value of XX15 [n] lo
 888+ CF48 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)                        ; A = XX16 element
 888+ CF49 57          >                        ld      d,a
 888+ CF4A ED 30       >                        mul
 888+ CF4C 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
 888+ CF4D 32 5F 7F    >                        ld      (varQ),a                      ; Q         ; result variable = XX16[n] * XX15[n]/256
 889+ CF50                                      ldCopyByte varT,varR                        ; R = |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo
 889+ CF50 3A 7B 7F    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 889+ CF53 32 60 7F    >                        ld       (varR),a
 890+ CF56 23                                   inc     hl
 891+ CF57                                      AequN1xorN2 UBnkZScaledSign,(hl)             ; A = sign of z_sign * sidev_z
 891+ CF57 3A AC C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
 891+ CF5A AE          >                        xor     (hl)
 892+ CF5B              ; (S)A= |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo + |sidev_z| * z_lo
 893+ CF5B CD BC 9C                             call    baddll38                            ; JSR &4812 \ LL38   \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 894+ CF5E              ; Now we exit with A = result S = Sign
 895+ CF5E C9                                   ret
 896+ CF5F
 897+ CF5F
 898+ CF5F                  DISPLAY "Tracing 4", $
 899+ CF5F
 900+ CF5F              ;-- LL51---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 901+ CF5F              ;TESTED OK
 902+ CF5F              ;XX12EquScaleDotOrientation:                         ; .LL51 \ -> &4832 \ XX12=XX15.XX16  each vector is 16-bit x,y,z
 903+ CF5F              XX12EquXX15DotProductXX16:
 904+ CF5F 01 00 00                             ld      bc,0                                ; LDX, LDY 0
 905+ CF62 21 62 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatSidevX
 906+ CF65 CD 0F CF                             call    XX12DotOneRow
 907+ CF68 32 AD C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a
 908+ CF6B 3A 61 7F                             ld      a,(varS)
 909+ CF6E 32 AE C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xSign),a
 910+ CF71 21 68 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatRoofvX
 911+ CF74 CD 0F CF                             call    XX12DotOneRow
 912+ CF77 32 AF C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a
 913+ CF7A 3A 61 7F                             ld      a,(varS)
 914+ CF7D 32 B0 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12ySign),a
 915+ CF80 21 6E C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatNosevX
 916+ CF83 CD 0F CF                             call    XX12DotOneRow
 917+ CF86 32 B1 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a
 918+ CF89 3A 61 7F                             ld      a,(varS)
 919+ CF8C 32 B2 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zSign),a
 920+ CF8F C9                                   ret
 921+ CF90              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 922+ CF90                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ScaledToXX18.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ScaledToXX18.asm
   1++CF90              CopyXX12ScaledToXX18:
   2++CF90              CopyResultToDrawCam:

  38++D045              ;;;        ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0xLo,  UBnkXScaled       ; XX18+0 => XX15+0
  39++D045              ;;;        ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0xSgn, UBnkXScaledSign   ; XX18+2 => XX15+1
  40++D045              ;;;        ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0yLo,  UBnkYScaled       ; XX18+3 => XX15+2
  41++D045              ;;;        ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0ySgn, UBnkYScaledSign   ; XX18+5 => XX15+3
  42++D045              ;;;        ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0zLo,  UBnkZScaled       ; XX18+6 => XX15+4

  48++D045              ;;;        ldCopyByte UBnkXScaled,       UBnkDrawCam0xLo   ; XX15+0 => XX18+0
  49++D045              ;;;        ldCopyByte UBnkXScaledSign,   UBnkDrawCam0xSgn  ; XX15+1 => XX18+2
  50++D045              ;;;        ldCopyByte UBnkYScaled,       UBnkDrawCam0yLo   ; XX15+2 => XX18+3
  51++D045              ;;;        ldCopyByte UBnkYScaledSign,   UBnkDrawCam0ySgn  ; XX15+3 => XX18+5
  52++D045              ;;;        ldCopyByte UBnkZScaled,       UBnkDrawCam0zLo   ; XX15+4 => XX18+6

  54++D045

  56++D045              XX15EquXX15AddXX18:
  57++D045              LL94Z:
  58++D045 26 00                ld      h,0                                                     ;           AddZ = FaceData (XX12)z +  ShipPos (XX18)z
  59++D047 16 00                ld      d,0                                                     ;
  60++D049 3A AB C0             ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)                                         ;
  61++D04C 6F                   ld      l,a                                                     ;
  62++D04D 3A AC C0             ld      a,(UBnkZScaledSign)                                     ;
  63++D050 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  64++D051 3A A1 C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)                                     ;
  65++D054 5F                   ld      e,a                                                     ;
  66++D055 3A A3 C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zSgn)                                    ;
  67++D058 4F                   ld      c,a                                                     ;
  68++D059 CD 33 00             call    ADDHLDESignBC                                           ;
  69++D05C 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  70++D05D 7C                   ld      a,h                                                     ;
  71++D05E 78                   ld      a,b                                                     ;           else  Scaled (XX15) Z = AddZ
  72++D05F 32 AC C0             ld      (UBnkZScaledSign),a                                     ;
  73++D062 7D                   ld      a,l                                                     ;
  74++D063 32 AB C0             ld      (UBnkZScaled),a                                         ;           endif
  75++D066              LL94X:
  76++D066 26 00                ld      h,0                                                     ;           AddZ = FaceData (XX12)z +  ShipPos (XX18)z
  77++D068 16 00                ld      d,0                                                     ;
  78++D06A 3A A7 C0             ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)                                         ;
  79++D06D 6F                   ld      l,a                                                     ;
  80++D06E 3A A8 C0             ld      a,(UBnkXScaledSign)                                     ;
  81++D071 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  82++D072 3A 9B C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)                                     ;
  83++D075 5F                   ld      e,a                                                     ;
  84++D076 3A 9D C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xSgn)                                    ;
  85++D079 4F                   ld      c,a                                                     ;
  86++D07A CD 33 00             call    ADDHLDESignBC                                           ;
  87++D07D 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  88++D07E 7C                   ld      a,h                                                     ;
  89++D07F 78                   ld      a,b                                                     ;           else  Scaled (XX15) Z = AddZ
  90++D080 32 A8 C0             ld      (UBnkXScaledSign),a                                     ;
  91++D083 7D                   ld      a,l                                                     ;
  92++D084 32 A7 C0             ld      (UBnkXScaled),a                                         ;           endif
  93++D087              LL94Y:
  94++D087 26 00                ld      h,0                                                     ;           AddZ = FaceData (XX12)z +  ShipPos (XX18)z
  95++D089 16 00                ld      d,0                                                     ;
  96++D08B 3A A9 C0             ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)                                         ;
  97++D08E 6F                   ld      l,a                                                     ;
  98++D08F 3A AA C0             ld      a,(UBnkYScaledSign)                                     ;
  99++D092 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
 100++D093 3A 9E C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)                                     ;
 101++D096 5F                   ld      e,a                                                     ;
 102++D097 3A A0 C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0ySgn)                                    ;
 103++D09A 4F                   ld      c,a                                                     ;
 104++D09B CD 33 00             call    ADDHLDESignBC                                           ;
 105++D09E 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
 106++D09F 7C                   ld      a,h                                                     ;
 107++D0A0 78                   ld      a,b                                                     ;           else  Scaled (XX15) Z = AddZ
 108++D0A1 32 AA C0             ld      (UBnkYScaledSign),a                                     ;
 109++D0A4 7D                   ld      a,l                                                     ;
 110++D0A5 32 A9 C0             ld      (UBnkYScaled),a                                         ;
 111++D0A8 C9                   ret
