# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyXX18ScaledToXX15.asm
 926+ D0A9                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ToScaled.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ToScaled.asm
   1++D0A9              CopyXX12ToScaled:
   2++D0A9              CopyResultToScaled:
   3++D0A9                      ldCopyByte  XX12+0,UBnkXScaled      ; xnormal lo
   3++D0A9 3A AD C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+0)
   3++D0AC 32 A7 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaled),a
   4++D0AF                      ldCopyByte  XX12+2,UBnkYScaled      ; ynormal lo
   4++D0AF 3A AF C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+2)
   4++D0B2 32 A9 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaled),a
   5++D0B5                      ldCopyByte  XX12+4,UBnkZScaled      ; znormal lo and leaves a holding zscaled normal
   5++D0B5 3A B1 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+4)
   5++D0B8 32 AB C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaled),a
   6++D0BB C9                   ret
   7++D0BC
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ToScaled.asm
 927+ D0BC              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 928+ D0BC                                      include "./Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm"
# file opened: ././Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm
   1++D0BC              ;;; Q = XX12 xLo ,A = XX15 xLo
   2++D0BC              ;;; T = A * Q/256 Usgined  (FMLTU)
   3++D0BC              ;;; S = XX12 XSign Xor XX15 XSign
   4++D0BC              ;;; Q = XX12 Ynormal Lo, A = XX15+2 (y lo)
   5++D0BC              ;;; Q = A * Q/256 Usigned (FMLTI)
   6++D0BC              ;;; R = T
   7++D0BC              ;;; A = XX12+3 (ySign) Xor XX15+3 (ySign)
   8++D0BC              ;;; T = BADD s(A) = R + Q(SA) (xdot + ydot)
   9++D0BC              ;;; Q = XX12+4 (znormal lo) A = XX15+4 z lo
  10++D0BC              ;;; Q = A * Q /256 usigned (zdot)
  11++D0BC              ;;; R = T
  12++D0BC              ;;; A - XX15+ 5 Zsign Xor XX12+5 Z Sign
  13++D0BC
  14++D0BC
  15++D0BC
  16++D0BC
  17++D0BC
  18++D0BC              MacroAequDxEdiv256usgn:	MACRO
  19++D0BC ~            						mul
  20++D0BC ~            						ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
  21++D0BC              						ENDM
  22++D0BC              DotProductXX12XX15:
  23++D0BC 3A AD C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12xLo)         ; Use e as var Q for xnormal lo
  24++D0BF                      JumpIfAIsZero dotxskipzero
  24++D0BF A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  24++D0C0 CA DD D0    >                        jp	    z, dotxskipzero
  25++D0C3 5F                   ld          e,a
  26++D0C4 3A A7 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)         ; use d as XX12 world xform x, e = norm x
  27++D0C7 57                   ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
  28++D0C8                      JumpIfAIsZero dotxskipzero
  28++D0C8 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  28++D0C9 CA DD D0    >                        jp	    z, dotxskipzero
  29++D0CC ED 30        		mul
  30++D0CE 42                   ld          b,d                     ; b = result
  31++D0CF 3A AE C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
  32++D0D2 21 A8 C0             ld          hl,UBnkXScaledSign
  33++D0D5 AE                   xor         (hl)
  34++D0D6 E6 80                and         $80                     ; so sign bit only
  35++D0D8 FD 67                ld          iyh ,a                   ; we actually need to preserve sign in iyh here
  36++D0DA C3 E1 D0             jp          dotmuly
  37++D0DD              dotxskipzero:
  38++D0DD AF                   xor         a
  39++D0DE 47                   ld          b,a
  40++D0DF FD 67                ld          iyh,a
  41++D0E1              dotmuly:
  42++D0E1              ; now we have b = XX12 x &d  norm x signed
  43++D0E1 3A AF C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
  44++D0E4                      JumpIfAIsZero dotyskipzero
  44++D0E4 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  44++D0E5 CA 04 D1    >                        jp	    z, dotyskipzero
  45++D0E8 5F                   ld          e,a
  46++D0E9 3A A9 C0             ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)         ; XX15+2
  47++D0EC                      JumpIfAIsZero dotyskipzero
  47++D0EC A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  47++D0ED CA 04 D1    >                        jp	    z, dotyskipzero
  48++D0F0 57                   ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
  49++D0F1 ED 30                mul
  50++D0F3 4A                   ld          c,d                     ; c = result
  51++D0F4 DD 69                ld          ixl,c
  52++D0F6 3A B0 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12ySign)       ; A = ysg
  53++D0F9 21 AA C0             ld          hl, UBnkYScaledSign     ; a= y sign XOR Y scaled sign
  54++D0FC AE                   xor         (hl)                    ; XX15+3
  55++D0FD E6 80                and         $80                     ; do b = x mul c = y mul, iyh = sign for b and a = sign for c
  56++D0FF DD 67                ld          ixh,a
  57++D101 C3 08 D1             jp          dotaddxy
  58++D104              dotyskipzero:
  59++D104 AF                   xor         a
  60++D105 4F                   ld          c,a
  61++D106 DD 67                ld          ixh,a
  62++D108              dotaddxy:
  63++D108              ; Optimise later as this is 16 bit
  64++D108 26 00                ld          h,0                     ;
  65++D10A 68                   ld          l,b                     ; hl = xlo + x scaled
  66++D10B 16 00                ld          d,0                     ;
  67++D10D 59                   ld          e,c                     ; de = ylo + yscaled
  68++D10E FD 44                ld          b,iyh                   ; b = sign of xlo + xscaled
  69++D110 4F                   ld          c,a                     ; c = sign of ylo + yscaled
  70++D111 CD 33 00             call ADDHLDESignBC                  ; so now hl = result so will push sign to h
  71++D114 47                   ld          b,a                     ; b = resultant sign , hl = add so far
  72++D115 3A B1 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12zLo)         ;
  73++D118                      JumpIfAIsZero dotzskipzero
  73++D118 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  73++D119 CA 3E D1    >                        jp	    z, dotzskipzero
  74++D11C 5F                   ld          e,a                     ;
  75++D11D 3A AB C0             ld          a,(UBnkZScaled)         ;
  76++D120                      JumpIfAIsZero dotzskipzero
  76++D120 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  76++D121 CA 3E D1    >                        jp	    z, dotzskipzero
  77++D124 57                   ld          d,a
  78++D125 ED 30                mul
  79++D127 E5                   push        hl                      ; save prev result
  80++D128 3A AC C0             ld          a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
  81++D12B 21 B2 C0             ld          hl, UBnkXX12zSign       ; XX15+5
  82++D12E AE                   xor         (hl)                    ; hi sign
  83++D12F E6 80                and         $80                     ; a = sign of multiply
  84++D131 4F                   ld          c,a                     ; c = sign of z lo & z scaled
  85++D132 E1                   pop         hl
  86++D133 5A                   ld          e,d
  87++D134 16 00                ld          d,0
  88++D136 CD 33 00             call ADDHLDESignBC
  89++D139 32 61 7F             ld          (varS),a
  90++D13C 7D                   ld          a,l
  91++D13D C9                   ret                                 ; returns with A = value, varS = sign
  92++D13E              dotzskipzero:                               ; if we got here then z was zero so no component so just tidy up from last add
  93++D13E 78                   ld          a,b
  94++D13F 32 61 7F             ld          (varS),a
  95++D142 7D                   ld          a,l
  96++D143 C9                   ret
  97++D144              ;;;;       DotProductXX12XX15:
  98++D144              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12xLo)         ; Use e as var Q for xnormal lo
  99++D144              ;;;;       ld          e,a
 100++D144              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)         ; use d as XX12 world xform x, e = norm x
 101++D144              ;;;;       ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
 102++D144              ;;;;		; FMLTU	\ A=A*Q/256unsg using D as A and E as Q
 103++D144              ;;;;		mul
 104++D144              ;;;;       ld          b,d                     ; b as var T
 105++D144              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
 106++D144              ;;;;       ld          hl,UBnkXScaledSign
 107++D144              ;;;;       xor         (hl)
 108++D144              ;;;;       and         $80                     ; so sign bit only
 109++D144              ;;;;       ld          (varS),a                ; we did use c as S \ S	\ x-sign, but we actually need it in varS for BADD
 110++D144              ;;;; now we have b = XX12 x & norm x signed
 111++D144              ;;;; by here B = xlo & xscaled C = result sign
 112++D144              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
 113++D144              ;;;;       ld          e,a
 114++D144              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)         ; XX15+2
 115++D144              ;;;;		ld          d,a						; MISSED THIS EARLIER BUG FIX
 116++D144              ;;;;       mul
 117++D144              ;;;;       ld          a,d
 118++D144              ;;;;       ld          (varQ),a                ; Q = Y y-dot
 119++D144              ;;;;       ld          a,b                     ; get back T from above held in b
 120++D144              ;;;;       ld          (varR),a                ; R= b \ T	\ x-dot
 121++D144              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12ySign)       ; A = ysg
 122++D144              ;;;;       ld          hl, UBnkYScaledSign     ; a= y sign XOR Y scaled sign
 123++D144              ;;;;       xor         (hl)                    ; XX15+3
 124++D144              ;;;;       and         $80
 125++D144              ;;;;       call        baddll38                ; LL38	\ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 126++D144              ;;;;       ld          (varT),a                ; var T	\ xdot+ydot
 127++D144              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12zLo)         ; use d as  varQ        ; XX12+4	\ znormal lo to varQ
 128++D144              ;;;;       ld          e,a                     ; use e as var Q
 129++D144              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkZScaled)         ;
 130++D144              ;;;;       ld          d,a
 131++D144              ;;;;       mul
 132++D144              ;;;;       ld          a,d
 133++D144              ;;;;       ld          (varQ),a                ; Q	\ zdot
 134++D144              ;;;;       ldCopyByte  varT,varR               ; copy T to R so R = resutl of previous calc
 135++D144              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
 136++D144              ;;;;       ld          hl, UBnkXX12zSign       ; XX15+5
 137++D144              ;;;;       xor         (hl)                    ; hi sign
 138++D144              ;;;;       and         $80
 139++D144              ;;;;       call        baddll38                ; LL38	\ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 140++D144              ;;;;       ret                                 ; returns with A = value, varS = sign
 141++D144
# file closed: ././Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm
 929+ D144              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 930+ D144              ; scale Normal. IXL is xReg and A is loaded with XX17 holds the scale factor to apply
 931+ D144              ; Not Used in code      include "Universe/Ships/ScaleNormal.asm"
 932+ D144              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 933+ D144                                      include "./Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm
   1++D144              ScaleObjectDistance:
   2++D144              ; ">ScaleObjectDistance, scales camera location and returns c = scaling factor (equiv of X reg)"
   3++D144 3A 0A C4             ld      a,(QAddr)                   ; Hull byte #18 normals scaled by 2^Q% DtProd^XX2  their comment   Dot product gives  normals' visibility in XX2
   4++D147 4F                   ld      c,a                         ; c = Q factor for scaling of normals
   5++D148              LL90:                                       ; scaling object distance
   6++D148 3A A2 C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zHi)         ; z_hi
   7++D14B 47                   ld      b,a                         ; z_hi (yReg)
   8++D14C                      ReturnIfAIsZero                     ; if zHi 0 test ifis object close/small, i.e. zhi already zero then we are done
   8++D14C A7          >                        and     a
   8++D14D C8          >                        ret     z
   9++D14E              LL90Loop:
  10++D14E              ; Loop dividing camera by 2 until zhi is 0 and updating scale factor
  11++D14E 0C                   inc     c                           ; LL90+3 \ repeat INWK z brought closer, take Qscale X up
  12++D14F                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0yLo    ; cam Y /= 2
  12++D14F 2A 9E C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)
  12++D152 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  12++D154 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  12++D156 22 9E C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),hl
  13++D159                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0xLo    ; cam X /= 2
  13++D159 2A 9B C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)
  13++D15C CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  13++D15E CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  13++D160 22 9B C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),hl
  14++D163                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0zLo    ; cam Z /= 2
  14++D163 2A A1 C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)
  14++D166 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  14++D168 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  14++D16A 22 A1 C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),hl
  15++D16D 7C                   ld      a,h                         ; last shift will result in zhi adjusted into h reg.
  16++D16E                      JumpIfAIsNotZero LL90Loop           ; loop until z hi = 0 this gives scalinging in c
  16++D16E A7          >                        and     a
  16++D16F C2 4E D1    >                        jp	    nz,LL90Loop
  17++D172 C9                   ret
  18++D173
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm
 934+ D173              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 935+ D173
 936+ D173              ; Backface cull
 937+ D173              ; is the angle between the ship -> camera vector and the normal of the face as long as both are unit vectors soo we can check that normal z > 0
 938+ D173              ; normal vector = cross product of ship ccordinates
 939+ D173              ;
 940+ D173                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX15.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX15.asm
   1++D173 7E           CopyFaceToXX15:         ld      a,(hl)                      ; get Normal byte 0                                                                    ;;;     if visibility (bits 4 to 0 of byte 0) > XX4
   2++D174 47                                   ld      b,a                                                    ;;;
   3++D175 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   4++D177 32 A8 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaledSign),a           ; write Sign bits to x sign                                                            ;;;
   5++D17A 78                                   ld      a,b
   6++D17B CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
   7++D17D 47                                   ld      b,a
   8++D17E E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   9++D180 32 AA C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaledSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  10++D183 78                                   ld      a,b
  11++D184 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
  12++D186 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  13++D188 32 AC C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaledSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  14++D18B 23                                   inc     hl                          ; move to X ccord
  15++D18C 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;   XX12 x,y,z lo = Normal[loop].x,y,z
  16++D18D 32 A7 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaled),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  17++D190 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  18++D191 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  19++D192 32 A9 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaled),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  20++D195 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  21++D196 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  22++D197 32 AB C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
  23++D19A C9                                   ret
  24++D19B
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX15.asm
 941+ D19B                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm
   1++D19B 7E           CopyFaceToXX12:         ld      a,(hl)                      ; get Normal byte 0                                                                    ;;;     if visibility (bits 4 to 0 of byte 0) > XX4
   2++D19C 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; save sign bits to b
   3++D19D E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   4++D19F 32 AE C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xSign),a           ; write Sign bits to x sign                                                            ;;;
   5++D1A2 78                                   ld      a,b
   6++D1A3 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
   7++D1A5 47                                   ld      b,a
   8++D1A6 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   9++D1A8 32 B0 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12ySign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  10++D1AB 78                                   ld      a,b
  11++D1AC CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
  12++D1AE E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  13++D1B0 32 B2 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  14++D1B3 23                                   inc     hl                          ; move to X ccord
  15++D1B4 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;   XX12 x,y,z lo = Normal[loop].x,y,z
  16++D1B5 32 AD C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  17++D1B8 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  18++D1B9 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  19++D1BA 32 AF C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  20++D1BD 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  21++D1BE 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  22++D1BF 32 B1 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a
  23++D1C2 C9                                   ret
  24++D1C3
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm
 942+ D1C3              ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 943+ D1C3              ; Original loginc in EE29 (LL9 4 of 12)
 944+ D1C3              ; Enters with XX4 = z distnace scaled to 1 .. 31
 945+ D1C3              ; get number of faces * 4      FaceCntX4
 946+ D1C3              ; return if no faces
 947+ D1C3              ; get Face Normal scale factor FaceScale (XX17)
 948+ D1C3              ; get ship pos z hi     (XX18)
 949+ D1C3              ; While Z hi <> 0
 950+ D1C3              ;    FaceScale = FaceScale + 1           (XX17)
 951+ D1C3              ;    Ship pos y = ship pos y / 2         (XX18)
 952+ D1C3              ;    ship pos x = ship pos x / 2         (XX18)
 953+ D1C3              ;    ship pos z = ship pos z / 2         (XX18)
 954+ D1C3              ; Loop
 955+ D1C3              ; Copy Ship Pos (XX18) to Scaled         (XX15)
 956+ D1C3              ; Get Dot Product of Scaled (XX15) and XX16 (pre inverted) into XX12
 957+ D1C3              ; Copy XX12 into XX18
 958+ D1C3              ; For each face
 959+ D1C3              ;     Get Face sign and visibility distance byte
 960+ D1C3              ;     if normal visibility range  < XX4
 961+ D1C3              ;        Get Face data into XX12
 962+ D1C3              ;        if FaceScale (XX17) >= 4
 963+ D1C3              ;            Copy Ship Pos (XX18) to scaled (XX15)                                                                  ::LL143
 964+ D1C3              ;        else
 965+ D1C3              ;           Copy FaceScale scaled to X  (XX17)
 966+ D1C3              ;LabelOverflowLoop:
 967+ D1C3              ;           Copy FaceData (XX12) to Scaled (XX15)                                                                   ::LL92
 968+ D1C3              ;           While X >= 0
 969+ D1C3              ;              X--                                                                                                  ::LL93
 970+ D1C3              ;              if  x >= 0
 971+ D1C3              ;                  XX15x = XX15x / 2
 972+ D1C3              ;                  XX15y = XX15y / 2
 973+ D1C3              ;                  XX15y = XX15y / 2
 974+ D1C3              ;           loop
 975+ D1C3              ;           AddZ = FaceData (XX12)z +  ShipPos (XX18)z                                                              ::LL94
 976+ D1C3              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
 977+ D1C3              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
 978+ D1C3              ;               X = 1
 979+ D1C3              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
 980+ D1C3              ;           else
 981+ D1C3              ;              Scaled (XX15) Z = AddZ
 982+ D1C3              ;           endif
 983+ D1C3              ;           AddX = FaceData (XX12)x +  ShipPos (XX18)x
 984+ D1C3              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
 985+ D1C3              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
 986+ D1C3              ;               X = 1
 987+ D1C3              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
 988+ D1C3              ;           else
 989+ D1C3              ;              Scaled (XX15) X = AddX
 990+ D1C3              ;           endif
 991+ D1C3              ;           AddY = FaceData (XX12)y +  ShipPos (XX18)y
 992+ D1C3              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
 993+ D1C3              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
 994+ D1C3              ;               X = 1
 995+ D1C3              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
 996+ D1C3              ;           else
 997+ D1C3              ;              Scaled (XX15) Y = AddY
 998+ D1C3              ;           endif
 999+ D1C3              ;        endif
1000+ D1C3              ;        calculate dot product XX12.XX15  (XX15x * XX12x /256 + XX15y * XX12y /256 + XX15z * XX12z /256)        ::LL89
1001+ D1C3              ;        if dot product < 0
1002+ D1C3              ;           set face visible
1003+ D1C3              ;        else
1004+ D1C3              ;           set face invisible
1005+ D1C3              ;        end if
1006+ D1C3              ;     else
1007+ D1C3              ;       Set FaceVisibility to true
1008+ D1C3              ;     end if
1009+ D1C3              ; Next Face
1010+ D1C3
1011+ D1C3              ;line of sight vector = [x y z] + face normal vector
1012+ D1C3
1013+ D1C3              ;               [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]   [ normal_x ]
1014+ D1C3              ;  visibility = [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ] . [ normal_y ]
1015+ D1C3              ;               [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]   [ normal_z ]
1016+ D1C3              ;
1017+ D1C3              ;--------------------------------------------------------------
1018+ D1C3              ; line of sight (eye outwards dot face normal vector < 0
1019+ D1C3              ; So lin eof sight = vector from 0,0,0 to ship pos, now we need to consider teh ship's facing
1020+ D1C3              ; now if we add teh veector for teh normal(times magnitude)) to teh ship position we have the true center of the face
1021+ D1C3              ; now we can calcualt teh dot product of this caulated vector and teh normal which if < 0 is goot. this means we use rot mat not inverted rotmat.
1022+ D1C3                  include "./ModelRender/BackfaceCull.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/BackfaceCull.asm
   1++D1C3              ;    DEFINE DEBUGDRAWDISTANCE 1
   2++D1C3                  DEFINE CHECKDOTSHIPDATA  1
   3++D1C3               ;   DEFINE DEBUGFORCEFACEDRAW 1
   4++D1C3 00           CurrentNormIdx  DB 0
   5++D1C4              ; SomeFacesVisible:
   6++D1C4              ; EE29:
   7++D1C4
   8++D1C4              ;   Backface cull logic  line of sight vector . face normal vector
   9++D1C4              ;       line of sight vector . face normal vector
  10++D1C4              ;       => line of sight vector = [x y z] + face normal vector
  11++D1C4              ;       Where [x y z] =
  12++D1C4              ;                                               [ [x y z] . sidev ]
  13++D1C4              ;                    projected [x y z] vector = [ [x y z] . roofv ]
  14++D1C4              ;                                               [ [x y z] . nosev ]
  15++D1C4              ;
  16++D1C4              ;   so project the [x y z] vector into the face's normal space
  17++D1C4              ;  line of sight vector = projected [x y z] vector + face normal vector
  18++D1C4              ;                         [ [x y z] . sidev ]   [ normal_x ]
  19++D1C4              ;                       = [ [x y z] . roofv ] + [ normal_y ]
  20++D1C4              ;                         [ [x y z] . nosev ]   [ normal_z ]
  21++D1C4              ;
  22++D1C4              ;                         [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]
  23++D1C4              ;                       = [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ]
  24++D1C4              ;                         [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]
  25++D1C4              ;
  26++D1C4              ; so
  27++D1C4              ;              visibility = [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]   [ normal_x ]
  28++D1C4              ;                            [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ] . [ normal_y ]
  29++D1C4              ;                           [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]   [ normal_z ]
  30++D1C4              ;
  31++D1C4              ; where face is visible if visibility < 0
  32++D1C4              ;
  33++D1C4              ;   so we set XX15 to [x y z] . sidev
  34++D1C4              ;                     [x y z] . roofv
  35++D1C4              ;                     [x y z] . nosev
  36++D1C4              ;
  37++D1C4
  38++D1C4
  39++D1C4
  40++D1C4 3A A2 C0     ScaleDrawcam:           ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zHi)         ; if z hi is 0 then we have scaled XX18
  41++D1C7                                      JumpIfAIsZero .ScaleDone            ;
  41++D1C7 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  41++D1C8 CA F4 D1    >                        jp	    z, .ScaleDone
  42++D1CB 2A 9B C0                             ld      hl,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)        ; pull postition into registers
  43++D1CE ED 5B 9E C0                          ld      de,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)        ; we only pull in if needed to save fetches
  44++D1D2 ED 4B A1 C0                          ld      bc,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)        ;
  45++D1D6 FD 2C        .ScaleNormalLoop:       inc     iyl                         ; Q goes up by one
  46++D1D8                                      ShiftHLRight1                       ; divide cam position by 2
  46++D1D8 CB 3C       >			   srl h
  46++D1DA CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  47++D1DC                                      ShiftDERight1                       ;
  47++D1DC CB 3A       >			   srl d
  47++D1DE CB 1B       >			   rr  e
  48++D1E0                                      ShiftBCRight1                       ;
  48++D1E0 CB 38       >			   srl b
  48++D1E2 CB 19       >			   rr  c
  49++D1E4 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; loop if not scaled down
  50++D1E5                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero .ScaleNormalLoop     ;
  50++D1E5 A7          >                        and     a
  50++D1E6 C2 D6 D1    >                        jp	    nz,.ScaleNormalLoop
  51++D1E9 22 9B C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),hl        ; save position back to XX18
  52++D1EC ED 53 9E C0                          ld      (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),de        ;
  53++D1F0 ED 43 A1 C0                          ld      (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),bc        ;
  54++D1F4 FD 7D        .ScaleDone:             ld      a,iyl
  55++D1F6 32 66 7F                             ld      (varXX17),a                  ; XX17 = normal scale factor for current ship adjusted for camera
  56++D1F9 C9                                   ret
  57++D1FA
  58++D1FA 3A 28 C0     CheckVisible:           ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                 ; Is the ship behind us
  59++D1FD E6 80        .CheckBehind:           and     SignOnly8Bit                 ; which means z sign is negative
  60++D1FF 20 2A                                jr      nz,.ShipNoDraw               ; .
  61++D201 2A 26 C0     .CheckViewPort:         ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                 ; now check to see if its within 90 degree arc
  62++D204 7C                                   ld      a,h
  63++D205                                      JumpIfAGTENusng ShipMaxDistance, .ShipNoDraw
  63++D205 FE C0       >                        cp     ShipMaxDistance
  63++D207 D2 2B D2    >                        jp		nc,.ShipNoDraw
  64++D20A ED 5B 20 C0  .CheckXAxis:            ld      de,(UBnKxlo)                 ; if abs x > abx z then its out side of view port
  65++D20E CD D8 99                             call    compare16HLDE
  66++D211 38 18                                jr      c,.ShipNoDraw               ; ship is too far out on the X Axis
  67++D213 ED 5B 23 C0  .CheckYAxis:            ld      de,(UBnKylo)                ; if abs y > abx z then its out side of view port
  68++D217 CD D8 99                             call    compare16HLDE
  69++D21A 38 0F                                jr      c,.ShipNoDraw               ; ship is too far out on the X Axis
  70++D21C                                      IFDEF   CHECKDOTSHIPDATA
  71++D21C 3A 05 C4     .CheckDotV2:                ld      a,(DotAddr)
  72++D21F                                          JumpIfAGTENusng h, .DrawFull
  72++D21F BC          >                        cp     h
  72++D220 D2 26 D2    >                        jp		nc,.DrawFull
  73++D223 C3 2F D2                                 jp      .ShipIsADot
  74++D226 CD 83 C7     .DrawFull:                  call    UnivVisibleNonDot           ;
  75++D229                                          ClearCarryFlag
  75++D229 B7          >                        or a
  76++D22A C9                                       ret
  77++D22B                                      ELSE
  78++D22B ~            .CalculateXX4:              ShiftHLRight1                       ; hl = z pos / 8
  79++D22B ~                                        ShiftHLRight1                       ; .
  80++D22B ~                                        ShiftHLRight1                       ; .
  81++D22B ~                                        ld      a,h
  82++D22B ~                                        srl     a                           ; if a / 16 <> 0 then ship is a dot
  83++D22B ~            .DrawAsDotCheck:            JumpIfNotZero   .ShipIsADot
  84++D22B ~                                        ; Check visbility distance
  85++D22B ~            .SetXX4Dist:                ;break
  86++D22B ~                                        ld      a,l
  87++D22B ~                                        rra                                 ; l may have had bit 0 of h carried in
  88++D22B ~                                        srl     a                           ; so move it to bit 4 giving A as distance $000xxxxx
  89++D22B ~                                        srl     a
  90++D22B ~                                        srl     a
  91++D22B ~                                        ld      (UBnkDrawAllFaces),a        ; XX4 = "all faces" distance
  92++D22B ~                                        call    UnivVisibleNonDot               ;
  93++D22B ~                                        ClearCarryFlag
  94++D22B ~                                        ret
  95++D22B                                      ENDIF
  96++D22B CD 71 C7     .ShipNoDraw:            call    UnivInvisible
  97++D22E C9                                   ret
  98++D22F              .ShipIsADot:            IFDEF DEBUGDRAWDISTANCE
  99++D22F ~                                        call    UnivVisible  ;
 100++D22F                                      ELSE
 101++D22F CD 8E C7                                 call    UnivVisibleDot
 102++D232                                      ENDIF
 103++D232 C9                                   ret
 104++D233
 105++D233                                                  DISPLAY "TODO:remove all teh processing of rotmat to load craft to camera as its already been done"
 106++D233              CullV2:                 ReturnIfMemisZero FaceCtX4Addr      ;
 106++D233 3A 04 C4    >                        ld   a,(FaceCtX4Addr)
 106++D236 A7          >                        and a
 106++D237 C8          >                        ret    z
 107++D238                                      ;break
 108++D238 CD 33 CD                             call    CopyRotmatToTransMat        ; XX16 = UBNKRotMat
 109++D23B CD EE 7A                             call    ScaleXX16Matrix197          ; scale rotation matrix in XX16
 110++D23E CD FF CF                             call    LoadCraftToCamera           ; XX18 = camera
 111++D241                                      ;call    CopyCameraToXX15Signed      ; Copy the camera to XX15 as signed 15 bit
 112++D241 3A 0A C4     .BackfaceLoop:          ld      a,(QAddr)                   ;
 113++D244 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = scale factor
 114++D246              ; By this point XX18 = scaled draw cam and iyl = scale factor
 115++D246 CD C4 D1                             call    ScaleDrawcam                ; XX18 = scaled camera XX17 = scale
 116++D249 CD 23 D0                             call    CopyCameraToXX15Signed      ; Xx18 -> xx15 sign + 15 bit
 117++D24C CD 81 7A     .LL91:                  call    XX12EquNodeDotXX16          ; xx12 = Scaled Camera . Rotation matrix (Note Xx16 no Xx16 inv)
 118++D24F CD 90 CF                             call    CopyXX12ScaledToXX18        ; now xx18 = XX12 = xx15.xx16
 119++D252 21 CA C5     .PrepNormals:           ld      hl,UBnkHullNormals                                                                                                 ;;; V = address of Normal start
 120++D255 22 65 7E                             ld      (varV),hl
 121++D258 3A 04 C4                             ld      a,(FaceCtX4Addr)                                        ; For each face
 122++D25B CB 3F                                srl     a                                              ;
 123++D25D CB 3F                                srl     a                                              ;
 124++D25F 47                                   ld      b,a                                            ;
 125++D260 AF                                   xor     a
 126++D261 32 C3 D1                             ld      (CurrentNormIdx),a                                          ; used to increment up face incdex as b decrements
 127++D264 E5           .ProcessNormalsLoop:    push    hl
 128++D265 C5                                   push    bc
 129++D266 7E           .LL86:                  ld      a,(hl)                                         ; Get Face sign and visibility distance byte
 130++D267 E6 1F                                and     $1F                                            ; if normal visibility range  < XX4
 131++D269 E5                                   push    hl
 132++D26A 21 53 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkDrawAllFaces
 133++D26D BE                                   cp      (hl)
 134++D26E E1                                   pop     hl
 135++D26F                                      IFDEF DEBUGFORCEFACEDRAW
 136++D26F ~                                        jp      .FaceVisible
 137++D26F                                      ELSE
 138++D26F DA B4 D3                                 jp      c,.FaceVisible              ; then we always draw
 139++D272                                      ENDIF
 140++D272              ; This bit needs to be added to force face visible
 141++D272 CD 9B D1     .LL87:                  call    CopyFaceToXX12              ; XX12 = normal (repolaced scale version) as a working copy
 142++D275 3A 66 7F                             ld      a,(XX17)                    ; a = q scale XX17 cauclated by the call to ScaleDrawcam
 143++D278 47                                   ld      b,a
 144++D279                                      JumpIfALTNusng 4,.ScaleNormByXX17   ; if q >= 4 then is so big we don;t factor in + normal for dot product
 144++D279 FE 04       >                        cp      4
 144++D27B DA B6 D2    >                        jp		c, .ScaleNormByXX17
 145++D27E CD DA CF     .LL143:                 call    CopyXX18toXX15              ; and we just set XX15 = scaled Camera dot rotation matrix
 146++D281 C3 45 D3                             jp      .DoneScalingIntoXX15        ; Now Process XX12 normal
 147++D284 3A 9B C0     .Ovflw:                 ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)         ; divide camera by 2 if overflow
 148++D287 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; which is held in XX18
 149++D289 32 9B C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),a         ; .
 150++D28C 3A A1 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)         ; .
 151++D28F CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; .
 152++D291 32 A1 C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),a         ; .
 153++D294 3A 9E C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)         ; .
 154++D297 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; .
 155++D299 32 9E C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),a        ; .
 156++D29C 06 01        .ScaleXScaledAgain:     ld      b,1                         ; set scale to 1 so we divide original normal by 2 into face and try again and hope we didn't scaled down XX12 earlier so if we did then we must be in the do doo as the object was obscenely large and very close
 157++D29E                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkXScaled         ; Divide XX15 by 2^B
 157++D29E 3A A7 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)
 157++D2A1 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 157++D2A3 32 A7 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkXScaled),a
 158++D2A6                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkYScaled         ;
 158++D2A6 3A A9 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)
 158++D2A9 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 158++D2AB 32 A9 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkYScaled),a
 159++D2AE                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkZScaled         ;
 159++D2AE 3A AB C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)
 159++D2B1 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 159++D2B3 32 AB C0    >                    ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
 160++D2B6              ; if we jumped to here scale factor < 4 so we copy in normal to XX15 (scaled) LL92
 161++D2B6              .ScaleNormByXX17:       ;ld      b,a
 162++D2B6 CD B5 CF                             call    CopyXX12toXX15
 163++D2B9 05           .LL93                   dec     b
 164++D2BA FA D9 D2                             jp      m, .ScaledNorm
 165++D2BD              .LL93Loop:              ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkXScaled        ; Divide XX15 by 2^B, I think this should be really XX12 and is a bug in the original code
 165++D2BD 3A A7 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)
 165++D2C0 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 165++D2C2 32 A7 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkXScaled),a
 166++D2C5                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkYScaled        ;
 166++D2C5 3A A9 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)
 166++D2C8 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 166++D2CA 32 A9 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkYScaled),a
 167++D2CD                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkZScaled        ;
 167++D2CD 3A AB C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)
 167++D2D0 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 167++D2D2 32 AB C0    >                    ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
 168++D2D5 05                                   dec     b                          ;
 169++D2D6 F2 BD D2                             jp      p,.LL93Loop                ; Now we have XX15 as scaled Normal, XX15 as camera, don;t really knwo why as cals work on XX12 and XX18
 170++D2D9              .ScaledNorm:            ;ORIG CODE DOES NOT HAVE THIS call    CopyXX15ToXX12 ; DEBUG as XX15 shoudl be a sacled nromal
 171++D2D9              ; Add normal to XX15
 172++D2D9              ; if we jumped here direct from LL143 then XX15 = drawcam scaled by Q, XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX18 = drawcam scaled also
 173++D2D9              ; if we jumped here via scaling       then XX15 = normal scaled by Q,  XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX16 = drawcam scaled
 174++D2D9              ; if we hit an overflow               then XX15 = drawcam scaled by Q  XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX18 = (drawcam scaled / 2 ) / 2^ nbr overflows (if we cam in vai scaling then its a mess?
 175++D2D9              ; So LL94 is wrong as it shoud be operating on XX12 not XX15
 176++D2D9              .LL94:                  ldCopyByte UBnkZScaled, varR        ; ldCopyByte  UBnkZScaled,     varR  ; if we jumped direct XX15 = drawcam scaled, Xx12 = normal xx18 = drawcam
 176++D2D9 3A AB C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkZScaled)
 176++D2DC 32 60 7F    >                        ld       (varR),a
 177++D2DF                                      ldCopyByte UBnkXX12zSign, varS      ; ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled,     varS  ; if we did scaling then xx15 = norm scaled XX18 = drawcam
 177++D2DF 3A B2 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12zSign)
 177++D2E2 32 61 7F    >                        ld       (varS),a
 178++D2E5                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0zLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam Z signed
 178++D2E5 3A A1 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)
 178++D2E8 32 5F 7F    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 179++D2EB 3A A3 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zSgn)        ; .
 180++D2EE CD BC 9C                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = drawcam Z dot + z
 181++D2F1 DA 84 D2                             jp      c,.Ovflw
 182++D2F4 32 AB C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaled),a             ; XX15Z = SA
 183++D2F7                                      ldCopyByte  varS, UBnkZScaledSign   ;
 183++D2F7 3A 61 7F    >                        ld       a,(varS)
 183++D2FA 32 AC C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaledSign),a
 184++D2FD                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXScaled,     varR   ; SR = normal X
 184++D2FD 3A A7 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXScaled)
 184++D300 32 60 7F    >                        ld       (varR),a
 185++D303                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12xSign,   varS   ; .
 185++D303 3A AE C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
 185++D306 32 61 7F    >                        ld       (varS),a
 186++D309                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0xLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam x dot
 186++D309 3A 9B C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)
 186++D30C 32 5F 7F    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 187++D30F 3A 9D C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xSgn)        ; .
 188++D312 CD BC 9C                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = normal x + drawcam x dot
 189++D315 DA 84 D2                             jp      c,.Ovflw
 190++D318 32 A7 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaled),a             ; XX15Z = SA
 191++D31B                                      ldCopyByte  varS, UBnkXScaledSign   ; .
 191++D31B 3A 61 7F    >                        ld       a,(varS)
 191++D31E 32 A8 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaledSign),a
 192++D321                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled, varR       ; SR = normal Y
 192++D321 3A A9 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkYScaled)
 192++D324 32 60 7F    >                        ld       (varR),a
 193++D327                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12ySign, varS     ; .
 193++D327 3A B0 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12ySign)
 193++D32A 32 61 7F    >                        ld       (varS),a
 194++D32D                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0yLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam y dot
 194++D32D 3A 9E C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)
 194++D330 32 5F 7F    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 195++D333 3A A0 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0ySgn)        ; .
 196++D336 CD BC 9C                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = normal y + drawcam y dot
 197++D339 DA 84 D2                             jp      c,.Ovflw                    ; .
 198++D33C 32 A9 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaled),a             ; XX15 Y = SA
 199++D33F                                      ldCopyByte   varS, UBnkYScaledSign  ; .
 199++D33F 3A 61 7F    >                        ld       a,(varS)
 199++D342 32 AA C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaledSign),a
 200++D345              ; calculate dot product LL89
 201++D345              .DoneScalingIntoXX15:   ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12xLo, varQ       ; Q = norm X XX12
 201++D345 3A AD C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12xLo)
 201++D348 32 5F 7F    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 202++D34B 3A A7 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)             ; A = XX15 X
 203++D34E CD 84 9C                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 204++D351 32 7B 7F                             ld      (varT),a                    ; T = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 205++D354 3A AE C0                             ld      a,(UBnkXX12xSign)           ; S = sign of XX15 X * XX12 X
 206++D357 21 A8 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkXScaledSign          ; .
 207++D35A AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 208++D35B 32 61 7F                             ld      (varS),a                    ; .
 209++D35E                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12yLo, varQ       ; Q = norm Y XX12
 209++D35E 3A AF C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
 209++D361 32 5F 7F    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 210++D364 3A A9 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)             ; A = XX15 Y
 211++D367 CD 84 9C                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 212++D36A 32 5F 7F                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q = XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 213++D36D                                      ldCopyByte  varT,varR               ; R = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 213++D36D 3A 7B 7F    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 213++D370 32 60 7F    >                        ld       (varR),a
 214++D373 3A B0 C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkXX12ySign)         ; A = sign of XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 215++D376 21 AA C0                             ld      hl, UBnkYScaledSign         ; .
 216++D379 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 217++D37A CD BC 9C                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = SR+AQ = (X calc) + (Y calc)
 218++D37D 32 7B 7F                             ld      (varT),a                    ; T = usigned (X calc) + (Y calc)
 219++D380                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12zLo, varQ       ; Q = XX12 Z
 219++D380 3A B1 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12zLo)
 219++D383 32 5F 7F    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 220++D386 3A AB C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkZScaled)           ; A = XX15 Z
 221++D389 CD 84 9C                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 222++D38C 32 5F 7F                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q = XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 223++D38F                                      ldCopyByte  varT, varR              ; R = usigned (X calc) + (Y calc)
 223++D38F 3A 7B 7F    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 223++D392 32 60 7F    >                        ld       (varR),a
 224++D395 3A AC C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkZScaledSign)       ; A = sign of XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 225++D398 21 B2 C0                             ld      hl, UBnkXX12zSign           ; .
 226++D39B AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 227++D39C CD BC 9C                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = ((X+Y signed)) (Z signed)
 228++D39F FE 00                                cp      0                           ; was the result 0, if so then there are scenarios where SAEquSRPlusAQ can return -ve 0
 229++D3A1 28 08                                jr      z,.FaceNotVisible           ; in which case face is not visible
 230++D3A3 3A 61 7F                             ld      a,(varS)                    ; if the cacl was a negative number then its visible
 231++D3A6 ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ; this should test S not A
 232++D3A9 20 09                                jr      nz,.FaceVisible                                      ;        if dot product < 0 set face visible
 233++D3AB 3A C3 D1     .FaceNotVisible:         ld          a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 234++D3AE CD 3B CE                             call        SetFaceAHidden                                      ;           set face invisible
 235++D3B1 C3 BA D3                             jp          .ProcessNormalLoopEnd                                ;        end if
 236++D3B4 3A C3 D1     .FaceVisible:            ld          a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 237++D3B7 CD 32 CE                             call        SetFaceAVisible
 238++D3BA 21 C3 D1     .ProcessNormalLoopEnd:  ld          hl, CurrentNormIdx
 239++D3BD 34                                   inc         (hl)                    ; move index pointer up by one
 240++D3BE C1                                   pop         bc
 241++D3BF E1                                   pop         hl                      ; get normal data pointer back
 242++D3C0 3E 04                                ld          a,4
 243++D3C2 ED 31                                add         hl,a                    ; move to next normal entry
 244++D3C4 22 65 7E                             ld          (varV),hl               ; save as we need it again
 245++D3C7 05                                   dec         b
 246++D3C8 C2 64 D2                             jp          nz,.ProcessNormalsLoop
 247++D3CB C9                                   ret
 248++D3CC
# file closed: ././ModelRender/BackfaceCull.asm

1025+ D3CC              TransposeXX12NodeToXX15:
1026+ D3CC                      ldCopyByte  UBnKxsgn,UbnkXPointSign           ; UBnkXSgn => XX15+2 x sign
1026+ D3CC 3A 22 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnKxsgn)
1026+ D3CF 32 A9 C0    >                        ld       (UbnkXPointSign),a
1027+ D3D2 ED 4B AD C0          ld          bc,(UBnkXX12xLo)                   ; c = lo, b = sign   XX12XLoSign
1028+ D3D6 A8                   xor         b                                   ; a = UBnkKxsgn (or XX15+2) here and b = XX12xsign,  XX12+1 \ rotated xnode h                                                                             ;;;           a = a XOR XX12+1                              XCALC
1029+ D3D7 FA ED D3             jp          m,NodeNegativeX                                                                                                                                                            ;;;           if sign is +ve                        ::LL52   XCALC
1030+ D3DA              ; XX15 [0,1] = INWK[0]+ XX12[0] + 256*INWK[1]                                                                                       ;;;          while any of x,y & z hi <> 0
1031+ D3DA              NodeXPositiveX:
1032+ D3DA 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; We picked up XX12+0 above in bc Xlo
1033+ D3DB 06 00                ld          b,0                                 ; but only want to work on xlo                                                           ;;;              XX15xHiLo = XX12HiLo + xpos lo             XCALC
1034+ D3DD 2A 20 C0             ld          hl,(UBnKxlo)                       ; hl = XX1 UBNKxLo
1035+ D3E0 26 00                ld          h,0                                 ; but we don;t want the sign
1036+ D3E2 09                   add         hl,bc                               ; its a 16 bit add
1037+ D3E3 22 A7 C0             ld          (UbnkXPoint),hl                    ; And written to XX15 0,1
1038+ D3E6 AF                   xor         a                                   ; we want to write 0 as sign bit (not in original code)
1039+ D3E7 32 A9 C0             ld          (UbnkXPointSign),a
1040+ D3EA C3 09 D4             jp          FinishedThisNodeX
1041+ D3ED              ; If we get here then _sign and vertv_ have different signs so do subtract
1042+ D3ED              NodeNegativeX:
1043+ D3ED              LL52X:                                                 ;
1044+ D3ED 2A 20 C0             ld          hl,(UBnKxlo)                       ; Coord
1045+ D3F0 ED 4B AD C0          ld          bc,(UBnkXX12xLo)                   ; XX12
1046+ D3F4 06 00                ld          b,0                                 ; XX12 lo byte only
1047+ D3F6 ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = UBnKx - UBnkXX12xLo
1048+ D3F8 F2 06 D4             jp          p,SetAndMopX                       ; if result is positive skip to write back
1049+ D3FB              NodeXNegSignChangeX:
1050+ D3FB              ; If we get here the result is 2'c compliment so we reverse it and flip sign
1051+ D3FB CD 83 93             call        negate16hl                          ; Convert back to positive and flip sign
1052+ D3FE 3A A9 C0             ld          a,(UbnkXPointSign)                 ; XX15+2
1053+ D401 EE 80                xor         $80                                 ; Flip bit 7
1054+ D403 32 A9 C0             ld          (UbnkXPointSign),a                 ; XX15+2
1055+ D406              SetAndMopX:
1056+ D406 22 20 C0             ld          (UBnKxlo),hl                       ; XX15+0
1057+ D409              FinishedThisNodeX:
1058+ D409
1059+ D409              LL53:
1060+ D409

1081+ D431 06 00                ld          b,0                                 ; XX12 lo byte only

1084+ D438              NodeXNegSignChangeY:

1086+ D438 CD 83 93             call        negate16hl                          ; Convert back to positive and flip sign
1087+ D43B 3A AC C0             ld          a,(UbnkYPointSign)                 ; XX15+2

1099+ D449                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,NegativeNodeZ                    ; LL56 -ve Z node                                                           ;;;

1100+ D44E 3A B1 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12zLo)                     ; XX12+4 \ rotated znode lo                                                 ;;;
1101+ D451 2A 26 C0             ld          hl,(UBnKzlo)                        ; INWK+6    \ zorg lo                                                       ;;;

1103+ D456 7D                   ld          a,l

1108+ D45F              ; Doing additions and scalings for each visible node around here                                                                    ;;;
1109+ D45F              NegativeNodeZ:
1110+ D45F              LL56:                                                   ; Enter XX12+5 -ve Z node case  from above                                  ;;;
1111+ D45F 2A 26 C0             ld          hl,(UBnKzlo)                        ; INWK+6 \ z org lo                                                         ;;;
1112+ D462 ED 4B B1 C0          ld          bc,(UBnkXX12zLo)                    ; XX12+4    \ rotated z node lo                                                 ......................................................
