1114+ D468                      ClearCarryFlag
1114+ D468 B7          >                        or a
1115+ D469 ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; 6502 used carry flag compliment
1116+ D46B 7D                   ld          a,l
1117+ D46C 32 7B 7F             ld          (varT),a                            ; t = result low
1118+ D46F 7C                   ld          a,h
1119+ D470 32 5E 7F             ld          (varU),a                            ; u = result high
1120+ D473 E2 80 D4             jp          po,MakeNodeClose                    ; no overflow to parity would be clear
1121+ D476              LL56Overflow:
1122+ D476 FE 00                cp          0                                   ; is varU 0?
1123+ D478 20 16                jr          nz,NodeAdditionsDone                ; Enter Node additions done, UT=z
1124+ D47A 3A 7B 7F             ld          a,(varT)                            ; T \ restore z lo
1125+ D47D                      ReturnIfAGTENusng 4                              ; >= 4 ? zlo big enough, Enter Node additions done.
1125+ D47D FE 04       >                        cp    4
1125+ D47F D0          >                        ret	 nc
1126+ D480              MakeNodeClose:
1127+ D480              LL140:                                                  ; else make node close
1128+ D480 AF                   xor         a                                   ; hi This needs tuning to use a 16 bit variable
1129+ D481 32 5E 7F             ld          (varU),a                            ; U
1130+ D484 3E 04                ld          a,4                                 ; lo
1131+ D486 32 7B 7F             ld          (varT),a                            ; T
1132+ D489 C9                   ret
1133+ D48A              ;--LL49-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1134+ D48A              ProcessVisibleNode:
1135+ D48A              RotateNode:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1136+ D48A CD 5F CF             call        XX12EquXX15DotProductXX16                                                                                       ;;;           call      XX12=XX15.XX16
1137+ D48D              LL52LL53LL54LL55
1138+ D48D              TransposeNode:
1139+ D48D CD CC D3             call        TransposeXX12NodeToXX15
1140+ D490
1141+ D490              ; ......................................................                                                         ;;;
1142+ D490              NodeAdditionsDone:
1143+ D490              Scale16BitTo8Bit:
1144+ D490              LL57:                                                   ; Enter Node additions done, z=T.U set up from LL55
1145+ D490 3A 5E 7F             ld          a,(varU)                            ; U \ z hi
1146+ D493 21 A8 C0             ld          hl,UbnkXPointHi
1147+ D496 B6                   or          (hl)                                ; XX15+1    \ x hi
1148+ D497 21 AB C0             ld          hl,UbnkYPointHi
1149+ D49A B6                   or          (hl)                                ; XX15+4    \ y hi
1150+ D49B              AreXYZHiAllZero:
1151+ D49B 28 2B                jr          z,NodeScalingDone                   ; if X, Y, Z = 0  exit loop down once hi U rolled to 0
1152+ D49D              DivideXYZBy2:
1153+ D49D                      ShiftMem16Right1    UbnkXPoint                  ; XX15[0,1]
1153+ D49D 2A A7 C0    >                    ld    hl,(UbnkXPoint)
1153+ D4A0 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
1153+ D4A2 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
1153+ D4A4 22 A7 C0    >                    ld    (UbnkXPoint),hl
1154+ D4A7                      ShiftMem16Right1    UbnkYPoint                  ; XX15[3,4]
1154+ D4A7 2A AA C0    >                    ld    hl,(UbnkYPoint)
1154+ D4AA CB 3C       >                    srl   h
1154+ D4AC CB 1D       >                    rr    l
1154+ D4AE 22 AA C0    >                    ld    (UbnkYPoint),hl
1155+ D4B1 3A 5E 7F             ld          a,(varU)                            ; U \ z hi
1156+ D4B4 67                   ld          h,a
1157+ D4B5 3A 7B 7F             ld          a,(varT)                            ; T \ z lo
1158+ D4B8 6F                   ld          l,a
1159+ D4B9                      ShiftHLRight1
1159+ D4B9 CB 3C       >			   srl h
1159+ D4BB CB 1D       >			   rr  l
1160+ D4BD 7C                   ld          a,h
1161+ D4BE 32 5E 7F             ld          (varU),a
1162+ D4C1 7D                   ld          a,l
1163+ D4C2 32 7B 7F             ld          (varT),a                            ; T \ z lo
1164+ D4C5 C3 90 D4             jp          Scale16BitTo8Bit                    ; loop U
1165+ D4C8              NodeScalingDone:
1166+ D4C8              LL60:                                                   ; hi U rolled to 0, exited loop above.
1167+ D4C8              ProjectNodeToScreen:
1168+ D4C8                      ldCopyByte  varT,varQ                           ; T =>  Q   \ zdist lo
1168+ D4C8 3A 7B 7F    >                        ld       a,(varT)
1168+ D4CB 32 5F 7F    >                        ld       (varQ),a
1169+ D4CE 3A A7 C0             ld          a,(UbnkXPointLo)                    ; XX15  \ rolled x lo
1170+ D4D1 21 5F 7F             ld          hl,varQ
1171+ D4D4 BE                   cp          (hl)                                ; Q
1172+ D4D5                      JumpIfALTusng DoSmallAngle                      ; LL69 if xdist < zdist hop over jmp to small x angle
1172+ D4D5 DA DE D4    >                        jp		c,DoSmallAngle
1173+ D4D8 CD ED 9C             call        RequAdivQ                           ; LL61  \ visit up  R = A/Q = x/z
1174+ D4DB C3 E6 D4             jp          SkipSmallAngle                      ; LL65  \ hop over small xangle
1175+ D4DE              DoSmallAngle:                                           ; small x angle
1176+ D4DE              LL69:
1177+ D4DE              ; TODO check if we need to retain BC as this trashes it
1178+ D4DE              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
1179+ D4DE              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
1180+ D4DE 47                   ld      b,a
1181+ D4DF CD 5B 96             call    DIV16UNDOC
1182+ D4E2 79                   ld      a,c
1183+ D4E3 32 60 7F             ld      (varR),a
1184+ D4E6               ;;;       call        RequAmul256divQ                     ; LL28  \ BFRDIV R=A*256/Q byte for remainder of division
1185+ D4E6              SkipSmallAngle:
1186+ D4E6              ScaleX:
1187+ D4E6              LL65:                                                   ; both continue for scaling based on z
1188+ D4E6 3A A9 C0             ld          a,(UbnkXPointSign)                  ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
1189+ D4E9                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,NegativeXPoint                 ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
1189+ D4E9 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1189+ D4EB C2 FE D4    >                        jp      nz,NegativeXPoint
1190+ D4EE              ; ......................................................
1191+ D4EE              PositiveXPoint:
1192+ D4EE 3A 60 7F             ld          a,(varR)
1193+ D4F1 6F                   ld          l,a
1194+ D4F2 3A 5E 7F             ld          a,(varU)
1195+ D4F5 67                   ld          h,a
1196+ D4F6 3E 80                ld          a,ScreenCenterX
1197+ D4F8 ED 31                add         hl,a
1198+ D4FA EB                   ex          de,hl
1199+ D4FB C3 0E D5             jp          StoreXPoint
1200+ D4FE              NegativeXPoint:
1201+ D4FE              LL62:                                                   ; Arrive from LL65 just below, screen for -ve RU onto XX3 heap, index X=CNT ;;;
1202+ D4FE 3A 60 7F             ld          a,(varR)
1203+ D501 6F                   ld          l,a
1204+ D502 3A 5E 7F             ld          a,(varU)
1205+ D505 67                   ld          h,a
1206+ D506 0E 80                ld          c,ScreenCenterX
1207+ D508 06 00                ld          b,0
1208+ D50A                      ClearCarryFlag
1208+ D50A B7          >                        or a
1209+ D50B ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = RU-ScreenCenterX
1210+ D50D EB                   ex          de,hl
1211+ D50E              StoreXPoint:                                            ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1212+ D50E FD 73 00             ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point
1213+ D511 FD 72 01             ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
1214+ D514 FD 23                inc         iy
1215+ D516 FD 23                inc         iy
1216+ D518              ; ......................................................
1217+ D518              LL66:
1218+ D518              ProcessYPoint:
1219+ D518 AF                   xor         a                                   ; y hi = 0
1220+ D519 32 5E 7F             ld          (varU),a                            ; U
1221+ D51C                      ldCopyByte  varT,varQ                           ; Q \ zdist lo
1221+ D51C 3A 7B 7F    >                        ld       a,(varT)
1221+ D51F 32 5F 7F    >                        ld       (varQ),a
1222+ D522 3A AA C0             ld          a,(UbnkYPointLo)                    ; XX15+3 \ rolled y low
1223+ D525 21 5F 7F             ld          hl,varQ
1224+ D528 BE                   cp          (hl)                                ; Q
1225+ D529                      JumpIfALTusng SmallYHop                         ; if ydist < zdist hop to small yangle
1225+ D529 DA 32 D5    >                        jp		c,SmallYHop
1226+ D52C              SmallYPoint:
1227+ D52C CD ED 9C             call        RequAdivQ                           ; LL61  \ else visit up R = A/Q = y/z
1228+ D52F C3 35 D5             jp          SkipYScale                          ; LL68 hop over small y yangle
1229+ D532              SmallYHop:
1230+ D532              LL67:                                                   ; Arrive from LL66 above if XX15+3 < Q \ small yangle
1231+ D532 CD CA 93             call        RequAmul256divQ                     ; LL28  \ BFRDIV R=A*256/Q byte for remainder of division
1232+ D535              SkipYScale:
1233+ D535              LL68:                                                   ; both carry on, also arrive from LL66, yscaled based on z
1234+ D535 3A AC C0             ld          a,(UbnkYPointSign)                  ; XX15+5 \ sign of X dist
1235+ D538 CB 7F                bit         7,a
1236+ D53A C2 4D D5             jp          nz,NegativeYPoint                   ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
1237+ D53D              PositiveYPoint:
1238+ D53D 3A 60 7F             ld          a,(varR)
1239+ D540 6F                   ld          l,a
1240+ D541 3A 5E 7F             ld          a,(varU)
1241+ D544 67                   ld          h,a
1242+ D545 3E 60                ld          a,ScreenHeightHalf
1243+ D547 ED 31                add         hl,a
1244+ D549 EB                   ex          de,hl
1245+ D54A C3 5D D5             jp          LL50
1246+ D54D              NegativeYPoint:
1247+ D54D              LL70:                                                   ; Arrive from LL65 just below, screen for -ve RU onto XX3 heap, index X=CNT ;;;
1248+ D54D 3A 60 7F             ld          a,(varR)
1249+ D550 6F                   ld          l,a
1250+ D551 3A 5E 7F             ld          a,(varU)
1251+ D554 67                   ld          h,a
1252+ D555 0E 60                ld          c,ScreenHeightHalf
1253+ D557 06 00                ld          b,0
1254+ D559                      ClearCarryFlag
1254+ D559 B7          >                        or a
1255+ D55A ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = RU-ScreenCenterX
1256+ D55C EB                   ex          de,hl
1257+ D55D              LL50:                                                   ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1258+ D55D FD 73 00             ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point
1259+ D560 FD 72 01             ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
1260+ D563 FD 23                inc         iy
1261+ D565 FD 23                inc         iy
1262+ D567 C9                   ret
1263+ D568              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1264+ D568              ;;;     Byte 0 = X magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1265+ D568              ;;;     Byte 1 = Y magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1266+ D568              ;;;     Byte 2 = Z magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1267+ D568              ;;;     Byte 3 = Sign Bits of Vertex 7=X 6=Y 5 = Z 4 - 0 = visibility beyond which vertix is not shown
1268+ D568              CopyNodeToXX15:
1269+ D568                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkXScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1269+ D568 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1269+ D569 32 A7 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaled),a
1270+ D56C 23                   inc         hl
1271+ D56D                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkYScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1271+ D56D 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1271+ D56E 32 A9 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaled),a
1272+ D571 23                   inc         hl
1273+ D572                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkZScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1273+ D572 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1273+ D573 32 AB C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaled),a
1274+ D576 23                   inc         hl
1275+ D577              PopulateXX15SignBits:
1276+ D577              ; Simplfied for debugging, needs optimising back to original DEBUG TODO
1277+ D577 7E                   ld          a,(hl)
1278+ D578 4F                   ld          c,a                                 ; copy sign and visibility to c
1279+ D579 47                   ld          b,a
1280+ D57A E6 80                and         $80                                 ; keep high 3 bits
1281+ D57C 32 A8 C0             ld          (UBnkXScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1282+ D57F 78                   ld          a,b
1283+ D580 E6 40                and         $40
1284+ D582 CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1285+ D584 32 AA C0             ld          (UBnkYScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1286+ D587 78                   ld          a,b
1287+ D588 E6 20                and         $20
1288+ D58A CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1289+ D58C CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1290+ D58E 32 AC C0             ld          (UBnkZScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1291+ D591 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; returns a with visibility sign byte
1292+ D592 E6 1F                and         $1F                                 ; visibility is held in bits 0 to 4                                                              ;;;     A = XX15 Signs AND &1F (to get lower 5 visibility)
1293+ D594 32 7B 7F             ld          (varT),a                            ; and store in varT as its needed later
1294+ D597 C9                   ret
1295+ D598
1296+ D598              ;;;     Byte 4 = High 4 bits Face 2 Index Low 4 bits = Face 1 Index
1297+ D598              ;;;     Byte 5 = High 4 bits Face 4 Index Low 4 bits = Face 3 Index
1298+ D598              ;..............................................................................................................................
1299+ D598              ProcessANode:                                           ; Start loop on Nodes for visibility, each node has 4 faces associated with ;;; For each node (point) in model                  ::LL48
1300+ D598              LL48GetScale:
1301+ D598 3A 50 7E             ld          a,(LastNormalVisible)               ; get Normal visible range into e before we copy node
1302+ D59B 5F                   ld          e,a
1303+ D59C CD 68 D5             call        CopyNodeToXX15
1304+ D59F              LL48GetVertices:
1305+ D59F              LL48GetVertSignAndVisDist:
1306+ D59F                      JumpIfALTNusng e,NodeIsNotVisible               ; if XX4 > Visibility distance then vertext too far away , next vertex.                                             ;;;        goto LL50 (end of loop)
1306+ D59F BB          >                        cp      e
1306+ D5A0 DA DD D5    >                        jp		c, NodeIsNotVisible
1307+ D5A3              CheckFace1:                                                                                                                         ;;;     if all FaceVisile[point face any of idx1,2,3 or 4] = 0
1308+ D5A3                      CopyByteAtNextHL varP                           ; vertex byte#4, first 2 faces two 4-bit indices 0:15 into XX2 for 2 of the ;;;     get point face idx from byte 4 & 5 of normal
1308+ D5A3 23          >                    inc         hl                                  ; vertex byte#1
1308+ D5A4 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ;
1308+ D5A5 32 5F 7E    >                    ld          (varP),a                     ; SunXX15+2 = (V),Y
1309+ D5A8 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; use d to hold a as a temp                                                 ;;;
1310+ D5A9 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; face 1                                                                    ;;;
1311+ D5AB E5                   push        hl                                  ; we need to save HL                                                        ;;;
1312+ D5AC                      ldHLIdxAToA UbnkFaceVisArray                    ; visibility at face 1                                                Byte 4;;;
1312+ D5AC 21 D3 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
1312+ D5AF ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
1312+ D5B1 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)
1313+ D5B2 E1                   pop         hl                                  ;                                                                           ;;;
1314+ D5B3                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1314+ D5B3 A7          >                        and     a
1314+ D5B4 C2 E3 D5    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1315+ D5B7              CheckFace2:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1316+ D5B7 7A                   ld          a,d                                                                                                             ;;;
1317+ D5B8 ED 23                swapnib                                                                                                                     ;;;
1318+ D5BA E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; this is face 2                                                            ;;;
1319+ D5BC                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1319+ D5BC A7          >                        and     a
1319+ D5BD C2 E3 D5    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1320+ D5C0              CheckFace3:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1321+ D5C0                      CopyByteAtNextHL varP                           ; vertex byte#4, first 2 faces two 4-bit indices 0:15 into XX2 for 2 of the ;;;
1321+ D5C0 23          >                    inc         hl                                  ; vertex byte#1
1321+ D5C1 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ;
1321+ D5C2 32 5F 7E    >                    ld          (varP),a                     ; SunXX15+2 = (V),Y
1322+ D5C5 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; use d to hold a as a temp                                                 ;;;
1323+ D5C6 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; face 1                                                                    ;;;
1324+ D5C8 E5                   push        hl                                  ; we need to save HL                                                        ;;;
1325+ D5C9                      ldHLIdxAToA UbnkFaceVisArray                  ; visibility at face 1                                                Byte 5;;;
1325+ D5C9 21 D3 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
1325+ D5CC ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
1325+ D5CE 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)
1326+ D5CF E1                   pop         hl                                  ;                                                                           ;;;
1327+ D5D0                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1327+ D5D0 A7          >                        and     a
1327+ D5D1 C2 E3 D5    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1328+ D5D4              CheckFace4:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1329+ D5D4 7A                   ld          a,d                                                                                                             ;;;
1330+ D5D5 ED 23                swapnib                                                                                                                     ;;;
1331+ D5D7 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; this is face 2                                                            ;;;
1332+ D5D9                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1332+ D5D9 A7          >                        and     a
1332+ D5DA C2 E3 D5    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1333+ D5DD              NodeIsNotVisible:                                                                                                                   ;;;
1334+ D5DD 01 04 00             ld          bc,4
1335+ D5E0 FD 09                add         iy,bc                               ; if not visible then move to next element in array anyway                  ;;;
1336+ D5E2                      ;;; Should we be loading FFFFFFFF into 4 bytes or just ignore?
1337+ D5E2 C9                   ret                                                                                                      ;;;        goto LL50 (end of loop)
1338+ D5E3              NodeIsVisible:
1339+ D5E3              LL49:
1340+ D5E3 CD 8A D4             call        ProcessVisibleNode                  ; Process node to determine if it goes on heap
1341+ D5E6 C9                   ret
1342+ D5E7
1343+ D5E7                  DISPLAY "Tracing 6", $
1344+ D5E7
1345+ D5E7              ProjectNodeToEye:
1346+ D5E7 ED 4B AB C0      ld          bc,(UBnkZScaled)                    ; BC = Z Cordinate. By here it MUST be positive as its clamped to 4 min
1347+ D5EB 79               ld          a,c                                 ;  so no need for a negative check
1348+ D5EC 32 5F 7F         ld          (varQ),a                            ; VarQ = z
1349+ D5EF 3A A7 C0         ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)                     ; XX15  \ rolled x lo which is signed
1350+ D5F2 CD 44 96         call        DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC                 ; result in BC which is 16 bit TODO Move to 16 bit below not just C reg
1351+ D5F5 3A A8 C0         ld          a,(UBnkXScaledSign)                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
1352+ D5F8                  JumpOnBitSet a,7,EyeNegativeXPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
1352+ D5F8 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1352+ D5FA C2 05 D6    >                        jp      nz,EyeNegativeXPoint
1353+ D5FD              EyePositiveXPoint:                                  ; x was positive result
1354+ D5FD 2E 80            ld          l,ScreenCenterX                     ;
1355+ D5FF 26 00            ld          h,0
1356+ D601 09               add         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre + X
1357+ D602 C3 0C D6         jp          EyeStoreXPoint
1358+ D605              EyeNegativeXPoint:                                 ; x < 0 so need to subtract from the screen centre position
1359+ D605 2E 80            ld          l,ScreenCenterX
1360+ D607 26 00            ld          h,0
1361+ D609                  ClearCarryFlag
1361+ D609 B7          >                        or a
1362+ D60A ED 42            sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre - X
1363+ D60C              EyeStoreXPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1364+ D60C EB               ex          de,hl
1365+ D60D FD 73 00         ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point TODO this bit is 16 bit aware just need to fix above bit
1366+ D610 FD 72 01         ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
1367+ D613              EyeProcessYPoint:
1368+ D613 ED 4B AB C0      ld          bc,(UBnkZScaled)                    ; Now process Y co-ordinate
1369+ D617 79               ld          a,c
1370+ D618 32 5F 7F         ld          (varQ),a
1371+ D61B 3A A9 C0         ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)                     ; XX15  \ rolled x lo
1372+ D61E CD 44 96         call        DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC                 ; a = Y scaled * 256 / zscaled
1373+ D621 3A AA C0         ld          a,(UBnkYScaledSign)                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
1374+ D624                  JumpOnBitSet a,7,EyeNegativeYPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap top of screen is Y = 0
1374+ D624 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1374+ D626 C2 31 D6    >                        jp      nz,EyeNegativeYPoint
1375+ D629              EyePositiveYPoint:                                  ; Y is positive so above the centre line
1376+ D629 2E 60            ld          l,ScreenCenterY
1377+ D62B                  ClearCarryFlag
1377+ D62B B7          >                        or a
1378+ D62C ED 42            sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = ScreenCentreY - Y coord (as screen is 0 at top)
1379+ D62E C3 36 D6         jp          EyeStoreYPoint
1380+ D631              EyeNegativeYPoint:                                  ; this bit is only 8 bit aware TODO FIX
1381+ D631 2E 60            ld          l,ScreenCenterY
1382+ D633 26 00            ld          h,0
1383+ D635 09               add         hl,bc                               ; hl = ScreenCenterY + Y as negative is below the center of screen
1384+ D636              EyeStoreYPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1385+ D636 EB               ex          de,hl
1386+ D637 FD 73 02         ld          (iy+2),e                            ; Update Y Point
1387+ D63A FD 72 03         ld          (iy+3),d                            ; Update Y Point
1388+ D63D C9               ret
1389+ D63E
1390+ D63E
1391+ D63E
1392+ D63E              ; Pitch and roll are 2 phases
1393+ D63E              ; 1 - we apply our pitch and roll to the ship position
1394+ D63E              ;       x -> x + alpha * (y - alpha * x)
1395+ D63E              ;       y -> y - alpha * x - beta * z
1396+ D63E              ;       z -> z + beta * (y - alpha * x - beta * z)
1397+ D63E              ; which can be simplified as:
1398+ D63E              ;       1. K2 = y - alpha * x
1399+ D63E              ;       2. z = z + beta * K2
1400+ D63E              ;       3. y = K2 - beta * z
1401+ D63E              ;       4. x = x + alpha * y
1402+ D63E              ; 2 - we apply our patch and roll to the ship orientation
1403+ D63E              ;      Roll calculations:
1404+ D63E              ;
1405+ D63E              ;        nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
1406+ D63E              ;        nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
1407+ D63E              ;      Pitch calculations:
1408+ D63E              ;
1409+ D63E              ;        nosev_y = nosev_y - beta * nosev_z_hi
1410+ D63E              ;        nosev_z = nosev_z + beta * nosev_y_hi
1411+ D63E
1412+ D63E
1413+ D63E              ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1414+ D63E                          INCLUDE "./Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm
   1++D63E
   2++D63E              ; Full version
   3++D63E              ; 1. K2 = y - alpha * x
   4++D63E              ; 2. z = z + beta * K2
   5++D63E              ; 3. y = K2 - beta * z
   6++D63E              ; 4. x = x + alpha * y
   7++D63E
   8++D63E                  IFDEF USE_24BIT_ROLL_AND_PITCH
   9++D63E 00 00 00 00  UBnK24BitAlphaMulX      DB $00,$00, $00, $00
  10++D642 00 00 00 00  UBnK24BitAlphaMulY      DB $00,$00, $00, $00
  11++D646 00 00 00 00  UBnK24BitAlphaMulZ      DB $00,$00, $00, $00
  12++D64A 00 00 00 00  UBnK24BitBetaMulZ       DB $00,$00, $00, $00
  13++D64E 00 00 00 00  UBnK24BitBetaMulY       DB $00,$00, $00, $00
  14++D652 00 00 00     UBnK24BitK2             DS 3
  15++D655
  16++D655 01           PitchBlock              DB  1
  17++D656
  18++D656 3A 78 7E     ApplyMyRollAndPitch:    ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; no roll or pitch, no calc needed
  19++D659 A7           .CheckForRoll:          and		a
  20++D65A C4 CA D6     						call	nz,UBnKRoll_24Bit
  21++D65D 3A 6B 7E     .CheckForPitch:			ld		a,(BETA)
  22++D660 A7           						and		a
  23++D661 C4 30 D7     						call	nz,UBnKPitch_24Bit
  24++D664 3A 59 7F     .ApplySpeed:            ld      a,(DELTA)                   ; BCH = - Delta
  25++D667 A7                                   and     a
  26++D668 CA 83 D6                             jp      z,.ApplyOrientation
  27++D66B              						;ReturnIfAIsZero
  28++D66B 0E 00        						ld      c,0                         ;
  29++D66D 67           						ld      h,a                         ;
  30++D66E 06 80        						ld      b,$80                       ;
  31++D670 ED 5B 27 C0  						ld      de,(UBnKzhi)                ; DEL = z position
  32++D674 3A 26 C0     						ld      a,(UBnKzlo)                 ; .
  33++D677 6F           						ld      l,a                         ; .
  34++D678 CD 14 01     						call    AddBCHtoDELsigned           ; update speed
  35++D67B ED 53 27 C0  						ld      (UBnKzhi),DE                ; write back to zpos
  36++D67F 7D           						ld      a,l
  37++D680 32 26 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),a                ;
  38++D683 3A 78 7E     .ApplyOrientation:      ld      a,(ALPHA)
  39++D686 21 6B 7E                             ld      hl,BETA
  40++D689 B6                                   or      (hl)
  41++D68A C8                                   ret     z
  42++D68B 3A 55 D6                             ld      a,(PitchBlock)
  43++D68E A7                                   and     a
  44++D68F C8                                   ret     z
  45++D690                                      ;break
  46++D690 DD 21 2A C0  PitchBreak:             ld      ix,UBnkrotmatSidevX
  47++D694 DD 7E 01     DebugAlert1:            ld      a,(ix+1)
  48++D697 DD 56 03                             ld      d,(ix+3)
  49++D69A DD 5E 05                             ld      e,(ix+5)
  50++D69D B2                                   or     d
  51++D69E B3                                   or     e
  52++D69F E6 7F                                and     $7F
  53++D6A1 C2 A6 D6                             jp      nz,.NoBreak
  54++D6A4 DD 01                                break
  55++D6A6              .NoBreak
  56++D6A6
  57++D6A6 CD BA 02                             call    ApplyRollAndPitchToIX
  58++D6A9 DD 7E 01     DebugAlert2:             ld      a,(ix+1)
  59++D6AC DD 56 03                             ld      d,(ix+3)
  60++D6AF DD 5E 05                             ld      e,(ix+5)
  61++D6B2 B2                                   or     d
  62++D6B3 B3                                   or     e
  63++D6B4 E6 7F                                and     $7F
  64++D6B6 C2 BB D6                             jp      nz,.NoBreak
  65++D6B9 DD 01                                break
  66++D6BB              .NoBreak
  67++D6BB DD 21 30 C0                          ld      ix,UBnkrotmatRoofvX
  68++D6BF CD BA 02                             call    ApplyRollAndPitchToIX
  69++D6C2 DD 21 36 C0                          ld      ix,UBnkrotmatNosevX
  70++D6C6 CD BA 02                             call    ApplyRollAndPitchToIX
  71++D6C9 C9                                   ret
  72++D6CA
  73++D6CA 3A 78 7E     UBnKRoll_24Bit:			ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; get roll value
  74++D6CD E6 7F        						and 	$7F
  75++D6CF 57           						ld      d,a                         ; .
  76++D6D0 3A 23 C0     						ld      a,(UBnKylo)                ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
  77++D6D3 5F           						ld      e,a                         ; .
  78++D6D4 2A 24 C0     						ld      hl,(UBnKyhi)               ; .
  79++D6D7 CD 06 92     						call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * alpha, so DEL = X * -alpha / 256
  80++D6DA 7D           						ld		a,l
  81++D6DB 32 42 D6     						ld		(UBnK24BitAlphaMulY),a			; save result
  82++D6DE ED 53 43 D6  						ld		(UBnK24BitAlphaMulY+1),de		; save result
  83++D6E2 3A 78 7E     						ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; get roll value
  84++D6E5 E6 7F        						and 	$7F
  85++D6E7 57           						ld      d,a                         ; .
  86++D6E8 3A 20 C0     						ld      a,(UBnKxlo)                ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
  87++D6EB 5F           						ld      e,a                         ; .
  88++D6EC 2A 21 C0     						ld      hl,(UBnKxhi)               ; .
  89++D6EF CD 06 92     						call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * alpha, so DEL = X * -alpha / 256
  90++D6F2 7D           						ld		a,l
  91++D6F3 32 3E D6     						ld		(UBnK24BitAlphaMulX),a			; save result
  92++D6F6 ED 53 3F D6  						ld		(UBnK24BitAlphaMulX+1),de		; save result
  93++D6FA 3A 78 7E     						ld		a,(ALPHA)
  94++D6FD E6 80        						and		$80
  95++D6FF CA 19 D7     						jp		z,.RollingRight
  96++D702 DD 21 20 C0  .RollingLeft:			ld		ix,UBnKxlo
  97++D706 FD 21 42 D6  						ld		iy,UBnK24BitAlphaMulY
  98++D70A CD 90 00     						call	AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
  99++D70D DD 21 23 C0  						ld		ix,UBnKylo
 100++D711 FD 21 3E D6  						ld		iy,UBnK24BitAlphaMulX
 101++D715 CD CD 00     						call	SubAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 102++D718 C9           						ret
 103++D719 DD 21 20 C0  .RollingRight:			ld		ix,UBnKxlo
 104++D71D FD 21 42 D6  						ld		iy,UBnK24BitAlphaMulY
 105++D721 CD CD 00     						call	SubAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 106++D724 DD 21 23 C0  						ld		ix,UBnKylo
 107++D728 FD 21 3E D6  						ld		iy,UBnK24BitAlphaMulX
 108++D72C CD 90 00     						call	AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 109++D72F C9           						ret
 110++D730
 111++D730 3A 6B 7E     UBnKPitch_24Bit:		ld      a,(BETA)                   ; get roll value
 112++D733 E6 7F        						and 	$7F
 113++D735 57           						ld      d,a                         ; .
 114++D736 3A 23 C0     						ld      a,(UBnKylo)                ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
 115++D739 5F           						ld      e,a                         ; .
 116++D73A 2A 24 C0     						ld      hl,(UBnKyhi)               ; .
 117++D73D CD 06 92     						call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * alpha, so DEL = X * -alpha / 256
 118++D740 7D           						ld		a,l
 119++D741 32 4E D6     						ld		(UBnK24BitBetaMulY),a			; save result
 120++D744 ED 53 4F D6  						ld		(UBnK24BitBetaMulY+1),de		; save result
 121++D748 3A 6B 7E     						ld      a,(BETA)                   ; get roll value
 122++D74B E6 7F        						and 	$7F
 123++D74D 57           						ld      d,a                         ; .
 124++D74E 3A 26 C0     						ld      a,(UBnKzlo)                ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
 125++D751 5F           						ld      e,a                         ; .
 126++D752 2A 27 C0     						ld      hl,(UBnKzhi)               ; .
 127++D755 CD 06 92     						call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * alpha, so DEL = X * -alpha / 256
 128++D758 7D           						ld		a,l
 129++D759 32 4A D6     						ld		(UBnK24BitBetaMulZ),a			; save result
 130++D75C ED 53 4B D6  						ld		(UBnK24BitBetaMulZ+1),de		; save result
 131++D760 3A 6B 7E     						ld		a,(BETA)
 132++D763 E6 80        						and		$80
 133++D765 CA 7F D7     						jp		z,.Climbing
 134++D768 DD 21 23 C0  .Diving:				ld		ix,UBnKylo
 135++D76C FD 21 4A D6  						ld		iy,UBnK24BitBetaMulZ
 136++D770 CD 90 00     						call	AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 137++D773 DD 21 26 C0  						ld		ix,UBnKzlo
 138++D777 FD 21 4E D6  						ld		iy,UBnK24BitBetaMulY
 139++D77B CD CD 00     						call	SubAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 140++D77E C9           						ret
 141++D77F DD 21 23 C0  .Climbing:		     	ld		ix,UBnKylo
 142++D783 FD 21 4A D6  						ld		iy,UBnK24BitBetaMulZ
 143++D787 CD CD 00     						call	SubAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 144++D78A DD 21 26 C0  						ld		ix,UBnKzlo
 145++D78E FD 21 4E D6  						ld		iy,UBnK24BitBetaMulY
 146++D792 CD 90 00     						call	AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 147++D795 C9           						ret
 148++D796
 149++D796                  ELSE
 150++D796 ~            APPequPosPlusAPP:       MACRO    Position, PositionSign
 151++D796 ~                                    push    bc
 152++D796 ~                                    ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
 153++D796 ~                                    ld      a,(PositionSign)
 154++D796 ~                                    ld      b,a
 155++D796 ~                                    ld      a,c
 156++D796 ~                                    xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
 157++D796 ~                                    jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
 158++D796 ~            ; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
 159++D796 ~                                    ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
 160++D796 ~                                    ld      hl,(Position)
 161++D796 ~                                    add     hl,de
 162++D796 ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
 163++D796 ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
 164++D796 ~                                    pop     bc
 165++D796 ~                                    ret
 166++D796 ~            ; Signs are opposite so we subtract
 167++D796 ~            .MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
 168++D796 ~                                    ld      hl,(Position)
 169++D796 ~                                    or      a
 170++D796 ~                                    sbc     hl,de
 171++D796 ~                                    jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
 172++D796 ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
 173++D796 ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
 174++D796 ~                                    xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
 175++D796 ~                                    pop     bc
 176++D796 ~                                    ret
 177++D796 ~            .MV51:                  NegHL
 178++D796 ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl
 179++D796 ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
 180++D796 ~                                    pop     bc
 181++D796 ~                                    ret
 182++D796 ~                                    ENDM
 183++D796 ~
 184++D796 ~
 185++D796 ~            APPequXPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKxlo, UBnKxsgn
 186++D796 ~
 187++D796 ~            APPequYPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKylo, UBnKysgn
 188++D796 ~
 189++D796 ~            APPequZPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKzlo, UBnKzsgn
 190++D796 ~
 191++D796 ~            ; rollWork holds Alpha intermidate results
 192++D796 ~            rollWork      DS 3
 193++D796 ~            rollWorkp1    equ rollWork
 194++D796 ~            rollWorkp2    equ rollWork+1
 195++D796 ~            rollWorkp3    equ rollWork+2
 196++D796 ~
 197++D796 ~            ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 198++D796 ~            ; based on MVEIT part 4 of 9
 199++D796 ~            ApplyMyRollAndPitch:    ld      a,(ALP1)                    ; get roll magnitude
 200++D796 ~                                    ld      hl,BET1                     ; and pitch
 201++D796 ~                                    or      (hl)
 202++D796 ~                                    jp      z,.NoRotation               ; if both zero then don't compute
 203++D796 ~            ; If the xsgn,ysng or zsng are not 0 or $80 then we use 24 bit routines
 204++D796 ~            ; else we can just continue to use 16 bit
 205++D796 ~                                   ;jp      ApplyMyRollAndPitch24Bit
 206++D796 ~
 207++D796 ~            .CheckFor24Bit:         ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)
 208++D796 ~                                    ld      hl,UBnKysgn
 209++D796 ~                                    or      (hl)
 210++D796 ~                                    ld      hl,UBnKzsgn
 211++D796 ~                                    or      (hl)
 212++D796 ~                                    and     $7F
 213++D796 ~                                    jp      nz,ApplyMyRollAndPitch24Bit
 214++D796 ~                                    ;break
 215++D796 ~            ; P[210] = x * alph (we use P[2]P[1] later as result/256
 216++D796 ~            .Not24BitCalcs:         ld      e,a                         ; e = roll magnitude
 217++D796 ~                                    ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)                ; hl = ship x pos
 218++D796 ~                                    call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MULTU2-2 AHL = UbnkXlo * Alp1 both unsigned
 219++D796 ~                                    ld      (varPhi2),a                 ; set P[2] to high byte to help with ./256
 220++D796 ~                                    ld      (varP),hl                   ; P (2 1 0) = UbnkXlo * Alph1
 221++D796 ~            ; A = Flip sign
 222++D796 ~                                    ld      a,(ALP2)                ; flip the current roll angle alpha and xor with x sign
 223++D796 ~                                    ld      hl,UBnKxsgn                 ; and xor with x pos sign
 224++D796 ~                                    xor     (hl)                        ; so now  (A P+2 P+1) = - (x_sign x_hi x_lo) * alpha / 256
 225++D796 ~            ; AP[2]P[1] =Y + AP[2]P[1] (i.e. Previous APP/256)
 226++D796 ~                                    call    APPequYPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6 calculate APP = y - (x * alpha / 256)
 227++D796 ~            ; K2 = AP[2][1] K2(3 2 1) = (A P+2 P+1) = y - x * alpha / 256
 228++D796 ~                                    ld      (rollWorkp3),a               ; k2+3 = sign of result
 229++D796 ~                                    ld      (rollWorkp1),hl             ; k2+1,2 = result
 230++D796 ~            ; P[210] = K2[2 1] * Beta  = (A ~P) * X
 231++D796 ~                                    ld      a,(BET1)                    ; a = magnitude of pitch
 232++D796 ~                                    ld      e,a
 233++D796 ~                                    call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MLTU2-2 AHL = (P+2 P+1) * BET1 or by now ((UbnkXlo * Alph1)/256 * Bet1)
 234++D796 ~                                    ld      (varPp2),a                   ; save highest byte in P2
 235++D796 ~                                    ld      (varP),hl
 236++D796 ~            ; Fetch sign of previosu cal and xor with BETA inverted
 237++D796 ~                                    ld      a,(rollWorkp3)
 238++D796 ~                                    ld      e,a
 239++D796 ~                                    ld      a,(BET2)
 240++D796 ~                                    xor     e                           ; so we get the sign of K3 and xor with pitch sign
 241++D796 ~            ; Z = P[210] =Z + APP
 242++D796 ~                                    call    APPequZPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6
 243++D796 ~                                    ld      (UBnKzsgn),a                ; save result back into z
 244++D796 ~                                    ld      (UBnKzlo),hl
 245++D796 ~            ; A[P1]P[0] = z * Beta
 246++D796 ~                                    ld      a,(BET1)                    ; get pitch back again for mulitply in original it was kept in Q so no fetch needed
 247++D796 ~                                    ld      e,a
 248++D796 ~                                    call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MULTU2 P2 P1 was already in hl (A P+1 P) = (z_hi z_lo) * beta
 249++D796 ~                                    ld      (varPp2),a                  ; P2 = high byte of result
 250++D796 ~                                    ld      (varP),hl                   ; P (2 1 0) = UbnkXlo & Alph1
 251++D796 ~            ; A xor BET2,Zsign
 252++D796 ~                                    ld      a,(rollWorkp3)               ; get K3 (sign of y) and store it in y pos
 253++D796 ~                                    ld      (UBnKysgn),a                ; save result back into y
 254++D796 ~                                    ld      e,a                         ; a = y sign Xor pitch rate sign
 255++D796 ~                                    ld      a,(BET2)                    ;
 256++D796 ~                                    xor     e                           ;
 257++D796 ~                                    ld      e,a                         ; now xor it with z sign too
 258++D796 ~                                    ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                ;
 259++D796 ~                                    xor     e                           ; so now a = sign of y * beta * sign y * sign z
 260++D796 ~                                    jp      p,.MV43                     ; if result is pve beta * z and y have differetn signs
 261++D796 ~                                    ld      hl,(varPp1)
 262++D796 ~                                    ld      de,(rollWorkp1)
 263++D796 ~                                    or      a
 264++D796 ~                                    add     hl,de
 265++D796 ~                                    jp      .MV44
 266++D796 ~            .MV43:                  ld      hl,(rollWorkp1)
 267++D796 ~                                    ld      de,(varPp1)
 268++D796 ~                                    or      a
 269++D796 ~                                    sbc     hl,de                       ; (y_hi y_lo) = K2(2 1) - P(2 1)
 270++D796 ~                                    jr      nc,.MV44                    ; if there was no over flow carry on
 271++D796 ~                                    NegHL
 272++D796 ~                                    ld      a,(UBnKysgn)                ; flip sign bit TODO, we may have to remove xor as planets and Univs are sign + 23 bit xpos
 273++D796 ~                                    xor     SignOnly8Bit
 274++D796 ~                                    ld      (UBnKysgn),a
 275++D796 ~            ; by here we have (y_sign y_hi y_lo) = K2(2 1) - P(2 1) = K2 - beta * z
 276++D796 ~            .MV44:                  ld      (UBnKylo),hl                ; we do save here to avoid two writes if MV43 ended up with a 2s'c conversion
 277++D796 ~                                    ld      a,(ALP1)                    ; get roll magnitude
 278++D796 ~                                    ld      e,a
 279++D796 ~                                    ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
 280++D796 ~                                    call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MLTU2-2 AHL = (y_hi y_lo) * alpha
 281++D796 ~                                    ld      (varPp2),a                  ; store high byte P(2 1 0) = (y_hi y_lo) * alpha
 282++D796 ~                                    ld      (varP),hl
 283++D796 ~                                    ld      a,(ALP2FLIP)
 284++D796 ~                                    ld      e,a
 285++D796 ~                                    ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
 286++D796 ~                                    xor     e                           ; a = sign of roll xor y so now we have (A P+2 P+1) = (y_sign y_hi y_lo) * alpha / 256
 287++D796 ~                                    call    APPequXPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6 Set (A P+2 P+1) = (x_sign x_hi x_lo) + (A P+2 P+1) = x + y * alpha / 256
 288++D796 ~                                    ld      (UBnKxsgn),a                ; save resutl stright into X pos
 289++D796 ~                                    ld      (UBnKxlo),hl
 290++D796 ~                                    ;break
 291++D796 ~                                    call    ApplyMyRollToOrientation
 292++D796 ~                                    call    ApplyMyPitchToOrientation
 293++D796 ~                                    ; if its not a Univ then apply to local orientation
 294++D796 ~            .NoRotation:            ld      a,(DELTA)                   ; get speed
 295++D796 ~                                    ld      d,0
 296++D796 ~                                    ld      e,a                         ; de = speed in low byte
 297++D796 ~                                    ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                ; hl = z position
 298++D796 ~                                    ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                ; b = z sign
 299++D796 ~                                    ld      b,a                         ;
 300++D796 ~                                    ld      c,$80                       ; c = -ve as we are always moving forwards
 301++D796 ~                                    call    ADDHLDESignBC               ; update speed
 302++D796 ~                                    ld      (UBnKzlo),hl                ; write back to zpos
 303++D796 ~                                    ld      (UBnKzsgn),a                ;
 304++D796 ~                                    ret
 305++D796 ~
 306++D796 ~                           DISPLAY "TODO: Looks like pitch is always being applied as positive"
 307++D796 ~            ApplyMyRollToOrientation:MMUSelectMathsBankedFns
 308++D796 ~                                    ld      a,(ALPHA)
 308++D796 ~              ld ix,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 308++D796 ~              ld iy,UBnkrotmatNosevY
 308++D796 ~              call ApplyMyAngleAToIXIY ; ApplyMyRollToNosev:
 309++D796 ~                                    ld      a,(ALPHA)
 309++D796 ~              ld ix,UBnkrotmatSidevX
 309++D796 ~              ld iy,UBnkrotmatSidevY
 309++D796 ~              call ApplyMyAngleAToIXIY ; ApplyMyRollToSidev:
 310++D796 ~                                    ld      a,(ALPHA)
 310++D796 ~              ld ix,UBnkrotmatRoofvX
 310++D796 ~              ld iy,UBnkrotmatRoofvY
 310++D796 ~              call ApplyMyAngleAToIXIY ; ApplyMyRollToRoofv:
 311++D796 ~                                    ret
 312++D796 ~
 313++D796 ~            ApplyMyPitchToOrientation:
 314++D796 ~                                    ld      a,(BETA)
 314++D796 ~              ld ix,UBnkrotmatNosevZ
 314++D796 ~              ld iy,UBnkrotmatNosevY
 314++D796 ~              call ApplyMyAngleAToIXIY ; ApplyMyPitchToNosev:
 315++D796 ~                                    ld      a,(BETA)
 315++D796 ~              ld ix,UBnkrotmatSidevZ
 315++D796 ~              ld iy,UBnkrotmatSidevY
 315++D796 ~              call ApplyMyAngleAToIXIY ; ApplyMyPitchToSidev:
 316++D796 ~                                    ld      a,(BETA)
 316++D796 ~              ld ix,UBnkrotmatRoofvZ
 316++D796 ~              ld iy,UBnkrotmatRoofvY
 316++D796 ~              call ApplyMyAngleAToIXIY ; ApplyMyPitchToRoofv:
 317++D796 ~                                    ret
 318++D796 ~            ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 319++D796 ~            ; 24 bit version of pitch and roll is a 24 bit calculation 1 bit sign + 23 bit value
 320++D796 ~            ; Need to write a test routine for roll and pitchs
 321++D796 ~            ; Minsky Roll       Minsky Pitch
 322++D796 ~            ;  y -= alpha * x    y -= beta * z
 323++D796 ~            ;  x += alpha * y    z += beta * y
 324++D796 ~            ; or once combined
 325++D796 ~            ;   1. K2 = y - alpha * x
 326++D796 ~            ;   2. z = z + beta * K2
 327++D796 ~            ;   3. y = K2 - beta * z
 328++D796 ~            ;   4. x = x + alpha * y
 329++D796 ~            ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 330++D796 ~            ; Based on non optimised version of Planet pitch and roll is a 24 bit calculation 1 bit sign + 23 bit value
 331++D796 ~            ; Now at least rolls the correct direction
 332++D796 ~            UnivAlphaMulX               DB $00,$00, $00, $00
 333++D796 ~            UnivAlphaMulY               DB $00,$00, $00, $00
 334++D796 ~            UnivAlphaMulZ               DB $00,$00, $00, $00
 335++D796 ~            UnivBetaMulZ                DB $00,$00, $00, $00
 336++D796 ~            UnivBetaMulY                DB $00,$00, $00, $00
 337++D796 ~            UnivK2                      DS 3
 338++D796 ~
 339++D796 ~            ApplyMyRollAndPitch24Bit: 	 ld     a,(ALPHA)                   ; no roll or pitch, no calc needed
 340++D796 ~                                         ld     hl,BETA
 341++D796 ~                                         or     (hl)
 342++D796 ~                                         call   nz, Univ_Roll_And_Pitch
 343++D796 ~            ;.CheckForRoll:              and		a
 344++D796 ~            ;							call	nz,Univ_Roll
 345++D796 ~            ;.CheckForPitch:				ld		a,(BETA)
 346++D796 ~            ;							and		a
 347++D796 ~            ;							call	nz,Univ_Pitch
 348++D796 ~            .ApplySpeed:            	ld      a,(DELTA)                   ; BCH = - Delta
 349++D796 ~            							ReturnIfAIsZero
 350++D796 ~            							ld      c,0                         ;
 351++D796 ~            							ld      h,a                         ;
 352++D796 ~            							ld      b,$80                       ;
 353++D796 ~            							ld      de,(UBnKzhi)                ; DEL = z position
 354++D796 ~            							ld      a,(UBnKzlo)                 ; .
 355++D796 ~            							ld      l,a                         ; .
 356++D796 ~            							call    AddBCHtoDELsigned           ; update speed
 357++D796 ~            							ld      (UBnKzhi),DE                ; write back to zpos
 358++D796 ~            							ld      a,l
 359++D796 ~            							ld      (UBnKzlo),a                ;
 360++D796 ~            							ret
 361++D796 ~
 362++D796 ~            ; Performs minsky rotation
 363++D796 ~            ; Joystick left          Joystick right
 364++D796 ~            ; ---------------------  ---------------------
 365++D796 ~            ; x :=  x      + y / 64  x :=  x -  y / 64  so rather than /64  is z * alpha / 256
 366++D796 ~            ; y :=  y      - x /64   y :=  y +  x / 64
 367++D796 ~            ;
 368++D796 ~            ; Joystick down          Joystick up
 369++D796 ~            ; ---------------------  ---------------------
 370++D796 ~            ; y :=  y      + z / 64  y :=  y - z / 64
 371++D796 ~            ; z :=  z      - y / 64  z :=  z + y / 64
 372++D796 ~            ;
 373++D796 ~            ; get z, multiply by alpha, pick top 3 bytes with sign
 374++D796 ~            ; get x, multiply by alpha, pick top 3 bytes with sign
 375++D796 ~            ; if alpha +ve subtract x = x - z adj, z =z + x adj , else x += z adj z -= z adj
 376++D796 ~            ; so we can assume 24 bit maths and just do 16 bit multiply of say HL = nosev x [sgn][hi] and de = [0][alpha] by calling AHLequHLmulE
 377++D796 ~            ; for roll
 378++D796 ~            ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
 379++D796 ~            ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
 380++D796 ~            ; and for pitch
 381++D796 ~            ; nosev_y = nosev_y - beta * nosev_z_hi
 382++D796 ~            ; nosev_z = nosev_z + beta * nosev_y_hi
 383++D796 ~            ;  1. K2 = y - alpha * x
 384++D796 ~            ;   2. z = z + beta * K2
 385++D796 ~            ;   3. y = K2 - beta * z
 386++D796 ~            ;   4. x = x + alpha * y
 387++D796 ~            ;
 388++D796 ~            ;   1a. K [3 2 1 0] = -alpha * (x sign hi lo)
 389++D796 ~            ;   1b. K [3 2 1]   = y sign hi lo + K [321] (in effect y minus (alpha * x / 256)
 390++D796 ~            ;   1c. K2 [3 2 1]  = k [3 2 1 ]
 391++D796 ~            ;   2a. K[3 2 1 0]  = k2 [3 2 1] * beta
 392++D796 ~            ;   2b. z sign hi lo += K[3 2 1] ( in effect z += (beta * K2)/256
 393++D796 ~            ;   3a. K [3 2 1 0] = z sign hi lo * -beta
 394++D796 ~            ;   3b. y sign hi lo = K2 [3 2 1] - K [3 2 1] ( in effect K2 - (beta * z) /256
 395++D796 ~            ;
 396++D796 ~            ;   4. x = x + alpha * y
 397++D796 ~
 398++D796 ~
 399++D796 ~
 400++D796 ~            ;-- Q = - ALPHA
 401++D796 ~            ;-- A P[1 0] = xsign xhi xlo
 402++D796 ~            ;-- call K[3 2 1 0] = A P[1 0] * Q which means  K(3 2 1) = (A P+1 P) * Q / 256 = x * -alpha / 256 = - alpha * x / 256
 403++D796 ~            ;-- call K[3 2 1] = ysign hi lo + K[3 2 1] (= y - alpha * x / 256)
 404++D796 ~            ;-- K2 [3 2 1 ] = K [ 3 2 1 ]
 405++D796 ~            ;-- A P [1 0]   = K [3 2 1]
 406++D796 ~            ;-- Q = BETA
 407++D796 ~            ;-- K[3 2 1 0] = A P[1 0] * Q
 408++D796 ~            ;-- K3[3 2 1] = z sign hi lo + K[3 2 1]
 409++D796 ~            ;-- A P [1 0] = -K [3 2 1]
 410++D796 ~            ;-- z sign hi lo = K[3 2 1]
 411++D796 ~            ;-- K[3 2 1 0] = A P[1 0] * Q
 412++D796 ~            ;-- T = K[3] sign bit
 413++D796 ~            ;-- A = K[3] sign bit xor K2[3]
 414++D796 ~            ;-- if positive A yhi lo - = K [3 2 1 0] + K2[3 2 1 0] so A yhi ylo = K + K2 /256 as we abandon low byte
 415++D796 ~            ;-- if negative A yhi lo = (K - k2 )/256
 416++D796 ~            ;-- A = A xor T
 417++D796 ~            ;-- y sign = A
 418++D796 ~            ;-- Q = alpha
 419++D796 ~            ;-- A P(1 0) = y sign hi lo
 420++D796 ~            ;-- K[3 2 1 0 ] A P[1 0] * Q
 421++D796 ~            ;-- x sign hi lo = K[3 2 1] = xsign hi lo * K[3 2 1]
 422++D796 ~
 423++D796 ~            K2      DS  3
 424++D796 ~
 425++D796 ~            Univ_Roll_And_Pitch:	    ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; get roll value
 426++D796 ~            ;** 1. K2 = y - alpha * x **************************************
 427++D796 ~            ;-- DEL = alpha * (x sign hi lo) /256
 428++D796 ~            							ld      d,a                         ; d = alpha
 429++D796 ~            							ld      a,(UBnKxlo)                 ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
 430++D796 ~            							ld      e,a                         ; .
 431++D796 ~            							ld      hl,(UBnKxhi)                ; hl = UBnKchi sgn
 432++D796 ~            							call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * alpha, so DEL = X * alpha / 256
 433++D796 ~            ;-- DEL = K2 = y - alpha * x
 434++D796 ~                                        ld      bc,de                       ; transfer to BCH for now
 435++D796 ~                                        ld      h,l
 436++D796 ~                                        ld      de,(UBnKyhi)
 437++D796 ~                                        ld      a,(UBnKylo)
 438++D796 ~                                        ld      l,a
 439++D796 ~                                        call    SubBCHfromDELsigned
 440++D796 ~                                        ld      (K2+1),de
 441++D796 ~                                        ld      a,l
 442++D796 ~                                        ld      (K2),a
 443++D796 ~            ;** 2. z = z + beta * K2 ***************************************
 444++D796 ~            ;-- HLE = DEL ..................................................
 445++D796 ~                                        ex      de,hl                       ; will set hl to de and e to l in one go
 446++D796 ~            ;-- DELC = beta * HLE, i.e. beta * K2
 447++D796 ~                                        ld      a,(BETA)
 448++D796 ~                                        ld      d,a
 449++D796 ~                                        call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = beta * K2
 450++D796 ~            ;-- DEL = z + DEL, i.e. z + Beta * K2 /256
 451++D796 ~                                        ld      bc,(UBnKzhi)                ; BCH = z
 452++D796 ~                                        ld      a,(UBnKzlo)                 ; .
 453++D796 ~                                        ld      h,a                         ; .
 454++D796 ~                                        call    AddBCHtoDELsigned           ; DEL =z + (beta * K2)/256
 455++D796 ~                                        ld      (UBnKzhi),de                ; and save to Z
 456++D796 ~                                        ld      a,l                         ; .
 457++D796 ~                                        ld      (UBnKzlo),a                 ; .
 458++D796 ~            ;** 3. y = K2 - beta * z ***************************************
 459++D796 ~            ;-- DEL = beta * z / 256
 460++D796 ~                                        ld      a,(BETA)                    ; get pitch value
 461++D796 ~            							ld      d,a                         ; d = pitch
 462++D796 ~            							ld      a,(UBnKzlo)                 ; HLE = z sgn, hi, lo
 463++D796 ~            							ld      e,a                         ; .
 464++D796 ~            							ld      hl,(UBnKzhi)                ; hl = UBnKchi sgn
 465++D796 ~            							call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = z * beta, so DEL = z * beta / 256
 466++D796 ~            ;-- BCH = DEL ..................................................
 467++D796 ~                                        ld      bc,de                       ; transfer to BCH for now
 468++D796 ~                                        ld      h,l
 469++D796 ~            ;-- y = DEL = K2 - beta * z = DEL - BCH
 470++D796 ~                                        ld      de,(K2+1)                   ; del = K2
 471++D796 ~                                        ld      a,(K2)                      ; .
 472++D796 ~                                        ld      l,a                         ; .
 473++D796 ~                                        call    SubBCHfromDELsigned         ; .
 474++D796 ~                                        ld      (UBnKyhi),de                ; and save to y
 475++D796 ~                                        ld      a,l                         ; .
 476++D796 ~                                        ld      (UBnKylo),a                 ; .
 477++D796 ~            ;** 4. x = x + alpha * y ***************************************
 478++D796 ~            ;-- DEL = alpha * y
 479++D796 ~                                        ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; get roll value
 480++D796 ~            ;-- DEL = alpha * (y sign hi lo) /256
 481++D796 ~            							ld      d,a                         ; d = alpha
 482++D796 ~            							ld      a,(UBnKylo)                 ; HLE = y sgn, hi, lo
 483++D796 ~            							ld      e,a                         ; .
 484++D796 ~            							ld      hl,(UBnKyhi)                ; hl = UBnKyhi sgn
 485++D796 ~            							call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = y * alpha, so DEL = Y * alpha / 256
 486++D796 ~            ;-- DEL = x + alpha * y
 487++D796 ~                                        ld      bc,de                       ; transfer to BCH for now
 488++D796 ~                                        ld      h,l                         ; .
 489++D796 ~                                        ld      de,(UBnKxhi)                ; del = x
 490++D796 ~                                        ld      a,(UBnKxlo)                 ; .
 491++D796 ~                                        ld      l,a                         ; .
 492++D796 ~                                        call    AddBCHtoDELsigned           ; del = del + bch = x + alpha * y
 493++D796 ~                                        ld      (UBnKxhi),de                ; and save to x
 494++D796 ~                                        ld      a,l                         ; .
 495++D796 ~                                        ld      (UBnKxlo),a                 ; .
 496++D796 ~            .ApplyRollToRight:          ;call    ApplyMyRollToOrientation
 497++D796 ~            .ApplyPitchToClimb:         call    ApplyMyPitchToOrientation
 498++D796 ~                                      ;  call    TidyVectorsIX ; doesn't work
 499++D796 ~            							ret
 500++D796                  ENDIF
 501++D796
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm
1415+ D796                          INCLUDE "./Universe/Ships/ApplyShipRollAndPitch.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyShipRollAndPitch.asm
   1++D796
   2++D796              ; A = value for rotation
   3++D796              ; HL = address of value for rotation
   4++D796              ; TODO logic for permanent spin, I thik this it -127??
   5++D796              SplitAndDampenZ:        MACRO
   6++D796 ~                                    ld      b,a
   7++D796 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit            ; if abs (Rotz) is 0 then skip
   8++D796 ~                                    jp      z,.ProcessRoll
   9++D796 ~                                    ld      a,b                     ; b = rotate counter S7
  10++D796 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit            ; a = sign rat2 = c = sign
  11++D796 ~                                    ld      c,a                     ; .
  12++D796 ~                                    ld      (univRAT2),a            ; .
  13++D796 ~                                    ld      a,b                     ; a = abs b
  14++D796 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit            ; .
  15++D796 ~                                    dec     a                       ; dampen
  16++D796 ~                                    ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  17++D796 ~                                    or      c                       ; make S7 again after dampening
  18++D796 ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
  19++D796                                      ENDM
  20++D796
  21++D796              SplitAndDampenX:        MACRO
  22++D796 ~                                    ld      b,a
  23++D796 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit            ; exit early is ABS = 0
  24++D796 ~                                    and     a                       ; .
  25++D796 ~                                    ret     z                       ; .
  26++D796 ~                                    ld      a,b                     ; a = rotate counter S7
  27++D796 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit            ; rat2 = c = sign
  28++D796 ~                                    ld      c,a                     ; .
  29++D796 ~                                    ld      (univRAT2),a            ; .
  30++D796 ~                                    ld      a,b                     ; a = abs b
  31++D796 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit            ; .
  32++D796 ~                                    dec     a                       ; dampen
  33++D796 ~                                    ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  34++D796 ~                                    or      c                       ; make S7 again after dampening
  35++D796 ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
  36++D796                                      ENDM

  38++D796
  39++D796              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  40++D796              ; based on MVEIT part 4 of 9
  41++D796              ; x and z counters are proper 2's c values
  42++D796 3A 4A C0     ApplyShipRollAndPitch:  ld      a,(UBnKRotZCounter)
  43++D799 FE FF                                cp      $FF
  44++D79B 28 18                                jr      z,.PitchSAxes
  45++D79D                                      SplitAndDampenZ
  45++D79D 47          >                        ld      b,a
  45++D79E E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit            ; if abs (Rotz) is 0 then skip
  45++D7A0 CA E2 D7    >                        jp      z,.ProcessRoll
  45++D7A3 78          >                        ld      a,b                     ; b = rotate counter S7
  45++D7A4 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit            ; a = sign rat2 = c = sign
  45++D7A6 4F          >                        ld      c,a                     ; .
  45++D7A7 32 50 C0    >                        ld      (univRAT2),a            ; .
  45++D7AA 78          >                        ld      a,b                     ; a = abs b
  45++D7AB E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit            ; .
  45++D7AD 3D          >                        dec     a                       ; dampen
  45++D7AE 32 51 C0    >                        ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  45++D7B1 B1          >                        or      c                       ; make S7 again after dampening
