  46++D7B5                                      ;ld      a,(UBnKRotZCounter)
  47++D7B5 21 30 C0     .PitchSAxes:            ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX; UBnkrotmatSidevY
  48++D7B8 22 44 7E                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  49++D7BB 21 36 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX; UBnkrotmatSidevZ
  50++D7BE 22 46 7E                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  51++D7C1 CD 2E D8                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  52++D7C4 21 32 C0     .PitchRAxes:            ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvY
  53++D7C7 22 44 7E                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  54++D7CA 21 38 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatNosevY;UBnkrotmatRoofvZ
  55++D7CD 22 46 7E                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  56++D7D0 CD 2E D8                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  57++D7D3 21 34 C0     .PitchNAxes:            ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvZ; UBnkrotmatNosevY
  58++D7D6 22 44 7E                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  59++D7D9 21 3A C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatNosevZ
  60++D7DC 22 46 7E                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  61++D7DF CD 2E D8                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  62++D7E2 3A 49 C0     .ProcessRoll:           ld      a,(UBnKRotXCounter)
  63++D7E5 FE FF                                cp      $FF
  64++D7E7 28 17                                jr      z,.RollSAxis
  65++D7E9                                      SplitAndDampenX
  65++D7E9 47          >                        ld      b,a
  65++D7EA E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit            ; exit early is ABS = 0
  65++D7EC A7          >                        and     a                       ; .
  65++D7ED C8          >                        ret     z                       ; .
  65++D7EE 78          >                        ld      a,b                     ; a = rotate counter S7
  65++D7EF E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit            ; rat2 = c = sign
  65++D7F1 4F          >                        ld      c,a                     ; .
  65++D7F2 32 50 C0    >                        ld      (univRAT2),a            ; .
  65++D7F5 78          >                        ld      a,b                     ; a = abs b
  65++D7F6 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit            ; .
  65++D7F8 3D          >                        dec     a                       ; dampen
  65++D7F9 32 51 C0    >                        ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  65++D7FC B1          >                        or      c                       ; make S7 again after dampening
  65++D7FD 32 49 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
  66++D800 21 30 C0     .RollSAxis:           	ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX; UBnkrotmatSidevX
  67++D803 22 44 7E                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  68++D806 21 2A C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatSidevX; UBnkrotmatSidevY
  69++D809 22 46 7E                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  70++D80C CD 2E D8                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  71++D80F 21 32 C0     .RollRAxis:             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvY; UBnkrotmatRoofvX
  72++D812 22 44 7E                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  73++D815 21 2C C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatSidevY; UBnkrotmatRoofvY
  74++D818 22 46 7E                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  75++D81B CD 2E D8                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  76++D81E 21 34 C0     .RollNAxis:             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvZ; UBnkrotmatNosevX
  77++D821 22 44 7E                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  78++D824 21 2E C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatSidevZ; UBnkrotmatNosevY
  79++D827 22 46 7E                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  80++D82A CD 2E D8                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  81++D82D C9                                   ret
  82++D82E
  83++D82E
  84++D82E
  85++D82E              ; Roate around axis
  86++D82E              ; varAxis1 and varAxis2 point to the address of the axis to rotate
  87++D82E              ; so the axis x1 points to roofv  x , y or z
  88++D82E              ;             x2           nosev or sidev  x, y or z
  89++D82E              ;   Axis1 = Axis1 * (1 - 1/512)  + Axis2 / 16
  90++D82E              ;   Axis2 = Axis2 * (1 - 1/512)  - Axis1 / 16
  91++D82E              ; var RAT2 gives direction
  92++D82E              ; for pitch x we come in with Axis1 = roofv_x and Axis2 = nosev_x
  93++D82E              ;-Set up S R -----------------------------------------
  94++D82E              ; optimised we don't deal with sign here just the value of roof axis / 512
  95++D82E 2A 44 7E     MVS5RotateAxis:         ld      hl,(varAxis1)   ; work on roofv axis to get (1- 1/152) * roofv axis
  96++D831 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
  97++D832 23                                   inc     hl
  98++D833 56                                   ld      d,(hl)          ; de = Axis1 (roofv x for pitch x)
  99++D834 EB                                   ex      de,hl           ; hl = Axis1 (roofv x for pitch x)
 100++D835 7C                                   ld      a,h
 101++D836 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 102++D838 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; iyh = sign Axis1
 103++D83A 7C                                   ld      a,h
 104++D83B E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = Axis1 (roof hi axis  unsigned)
 105++D83D CB 3F                                srl     a               ; a = Axis1/2
 106++D83F 5F                                   ld      e,a             ;
 107++D840 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; A = Axis 1 sign
 108++D842 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = signed Axis1 / 512
 109++D843 B7                                   or      a               ; clear carry
 110++D844 CD 75 01                             call    subHLDES15      ; hl = roof axis - (roof axis /512) which in effect is roof * (1-1/512)
 111++D847              ;-Push to stack roof axis - (roofaxis/152)  ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 112++D847 E5                                   push    hl              ; save hl on stack PUSH ID 1 (roof axis - roofv aixs /512)
 113++D848 7D                                   ld      a,l
 114++D849 32 60 7F                             ld      (varR),a
 115++D84C 7C                                   ld      a,h
 116++D84D 32 61 7F                             ld      (varS),a        ;  RS now equals (1- 1/152) * roofv axis or (roof axis - roofv aixs /512)
 117++D850              ;-calculate roofv latter half of calc
 118++D850 2A 46 7E                             ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; now work on nosev axis to get nosev axis / 16
 119++D853 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 120++D854 23                                   inc     hl
 121++D855 56                                   ld      d,(hl)          ; de = value of roof axis
 122++D856 7A                                   ld      a,d
 123++D857 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 124++D859 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save sign
 125++D85B 7A                                   ld      a,d
 126++D85C E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = nosev hi axis  unsigned
 127++D85E 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = abs (nosev)
 128++D85F                                      ShiftDERight1
 128++D85F CB 3A       >			   srl d
 128++D861 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 129++D863                                      ShiftDERight1
 129++D863 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 129++D865 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 130++D867                                      ShiftDERight1
 130++D867 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 130++D869 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 131++D86B                                      ShiftDERight1           ; de = nosev /16 unsigned
 131++D86B CB 3A       >			   srl d
 131++D86D CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 132++D86F 3A 50 C0                             ld      a,(univRAT2)     ; need to consider direction, so by defautl we use rat2, but flip via sign bit
 133++D872 FD AC                                xor     iyh             ; get the sign back we saveded from DE in so de = nosev axis / 16 signed
 134++D874 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 135++D876 B2                                   or      d
 136++D877 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = nosev /16 signed and ready as if we were doing a + or - based on RAT2
 137++D878              ;;; ld      a,e
 138++D878              ;;;     or      iyh
 139++D878              ;;; ld      (varP),a        ; PA now equals nosev axis / 16 signed
 140++D878              ;-now AP = nosev /16  --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 141++D878 E1                                   pop     hl              ; get back RS POP ID 1
 142++D879                  ;ex     de,hl           ; swapping around so hl = AP and de = SR , shoud not matter though as its an add
 143++D879              ;-now DE = (roofaxis/512) hl - abs(nosevaxis) --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 144++D879 CD 56 00                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4 ; do add using hl and de
 145++D87C E5                                   push    hl              ; we use stack to represent var K here now varK = Nosev axis /16 + (1 - 1/512) * roofv axis PUSH ID 2
 146++D87D              ;-push to stack nosev axis + roofvaxis /512  which is what roofv axis will be ------------------------------------------------
 147++D87D              ;-- Set up SR = 1 - 1/512 * nosev-----------------------
 148++D87D 2A 46 7E                             ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; work on nosev again to get nosev - novesv / 512
 149++D880 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 150++D881 23                                   inc     hl
 151++D882 56                                   ld      d,(hl)
 152++D883 EB                                   ex      de,hl
 153++D884 7C                                   ld      a,h
 154++D885 E6 80                                and     $80
 155++D887 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a
 156++D889 7C                                   ld      a,h
 157++D88A E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = roof hi axis  unsigned
 158++D88C CB 3F                                srl     a               ; now A = unsigned 15 bit nosev axis hi / 2 (or in effect nosev / 512
 159++D88E 5F                                   ld      e,a
 160++D88F FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
 161++D891 57                                   ld      d,a
 162++D892 B7                                   or      a               ; clear carry
 163++D893 CD 75 01                             call    subHLDES15
 164++D896              ;   sbc     hl,de           ; hl = nosev - novesv / 512
 165++D896 E5                                   push    hl              ; save hl on stack  PUSH ID 3
 166++D897 7D                                   ld      a,l
 167++D898 32 5F 7E                             ld      (varP),a        ; p = low of resuilt
 168++D89B 7C                                   ld      a,h
 169++D89C E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = roof hi axis  unsigned
 170++D89E 32 7B 7F                             ld      (varT),a        ; t = high of result
 171++D8A1              ;-- Set up TQ
 172++D8A1 2A 44 7E                             ld      hl,(varAxis1)   ; now work on roofv axis / 16
 173++D8A4              ;   ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; work on nosev again
 174++D8A4 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 175++D8A5 23                                   inc     hl
 176++D8A6 56                                   ld      d,(hl)
 177++D8A7 7A                                   ld      a,d
 178++D8A8 E6 80                                and     $80
 179++D8AA FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save sign
 180++D8AC 7A                                   ld      a,d
 181++D8AD E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = nosev hi axis  unsigned
 182++D8AF 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = abs (nosev)
 183++D8B0                                      ShiftDERight1
 183++D8B0 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 183++D8B2 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 184++D8B4                                      ShiftDERight1
 184++D8B4 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 184++D8B6 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 185++D8B8                                      ShiftDERight1
 185++D8B8 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 185++D8BA CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 186++D8BC                                      ShiftDERight1           ; de = nosev /16 unsigned
 186++D8BC CB 3A       >			   srl d
 186++D8BE CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 187++D8C0 3A 50 C0                             ld      a,(univRAT2)
 188++D8C3 FD AC                                xor     iyh             ; get the sign back in so de = nosev axis / 16 signed
 189++D8C5 E6 80                                and     $80
 190++D8C7 B2                                   or      d
 191++D8C8 57                                   ld      d,a
 192++D8C9              ;;; ld      a,e
 193++D8C9              ;;;     or      iyh
 194++D8C9              ;;; ld      (varP),a        ; PA now equals nosev axis / 16 signed
 195++D8C9 E1                                   pop     hl              ; get back RS   POP ID 3
 196++D8CA              ;   ex      de,hl           ; swapping around so hl = AP and de = SR , shoud not matter though as its an add
 197++D8CA CD 75 01                             call    subHLDES15 ; do add using hl and de
 198++D8CD              ;-- Update nosev ---------------------------------------
 199++D8CD EB                                   ex      de,hl           ; save hl to de
 200++D8CE 2A 46 7E                             ld      hl,(varAxis2)
 201++D8D1 73                                   ld      (hl),e
 202++D8D2 23                                   inc     hl
 203++D8D3 72                                   ld      (hl),d          ; copy result into nosev
 204++D8D4              ;-- Update roofv ---------------------------------------
 205++D8D4 D1                                   pop     de              ; get calc saved on stack POP ID 2
 206++D8D5 2A 44 7E                             ld      hl,(varAxis1)
 207++D8D8 73                                   ld      (hl),e
 208++D8D9 23                                   inc     hl
 209++D8DA 72                                   ld      (hl),d          ; copy result into nosev
 210++D8DB C9                                   ret

1507+ DA97 3A A8 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkXScaledSign)

1509+ DA9D CD 5E CD                             call    TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15

1516+ DAAA E1                                   pop     hl
1517+ DAAB 3E 04                                ld      a,4
1518+ DAAD ED 31                                add     hl,a
1519+ DAAF E5                                   push    hl                                  ; write it back at iy + 4
1520+ DAB0 FD E1                                pop     iy                                  ; and put it in iy again
1521+ DAB2 E1                                   pop     hl                                  ; get hl back as vertex list
1522+ DAB3 3E 06                                ld      a,6

1524+ DAB7 C1                                   pop     bc                                  ; get counter back

1529+ DABC              ; ...........................................................
1530+ DABC CD FA D1     ProcessShip:            call    CheckVisible                ; checks for z -ve and outside view frustrum, sets up flags for next bit
1531+ DABF 3A 55 C0     .IsItADot:              ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)
1532+ DAC2 E6 68                                and     ShipIsVisible | ShipIsDot | ShipExploding  ; first off set if we can draw or need to update explosion
1533+ DAC4 C8                                   ret     z                           ; if none of these flags are set we can fast exit
1534+ DAC5                                      JumpOnABitSet ShipExplodingBitNbr, .ExplodingCloud; we always do the cloud processing even if invisible
1534+ DAC5 CB 6F       >                        bit 	ShipExplodingBitNbr, a
1534+ DAC7 C2 06 DB    >                        jp      nz,.ExplodingCloud
1535+ DACA              ;............................................................
1536+ DACA              .DetermineDrawType:     ReturnOnBitClear    a, ShipIsVisibleBitNbr          ; if its not visible exit early
1536+ DACA CB 77       >                        bit 	ShipIsVisibleBitNbr,a
1536+ DACC C8          >                        ret		z
1537+ DACD                                      JumpOnABitClear ShipIsDotBitNbr, .CarryOnWithDraw   ; if not dot do normal draw
1537+ DACD CB 5F       >                        bit 	ShipIsDotBitNbr, a
1537+ DACF CA F4 DA    >                        jp      z,.CarryOnWithDraw

1542+ DADC ED 5B F3 C0                          ld      de,(UBnkNodeArray+2)        ; and Y
1543+ DAE0 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; if high byte components are not 0 then off screen
1544+ DAE1 B2                                   or      d                           ;
1545+ DAE2 C0                                   ret     nz                          ;
1546+ DAE3 7B                                   ld      a,e
1547+ DAE4 E6 80                                and     %10000000                   ; check to see if Y > 128
1548+ DAE6 C0                                   ret     nz
1549+ DAE7 43                                   ld      b,e                         ; now b = y and c = x
1550+ DAE8 3E FF                                ld      a,L2ColourWHITE_1           ; just draw a pixel
1551+ DAEA 3E E0                                ld      a,224
1552+ DAEC                                      MMUSelectLayer2                     ; then go to update radar
1552+ DAEC ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
1553+ DAF0 CD F8 E2                             call    ShipPixel                   ;
1554+ DAF3 C9                                   ret
1555+ DAF4              ;............................................................
1556+ DAF4 CD 6D DA     .CarryOnWithDraw:       call    ProcessNodes                ; process notes is the poor performer or check distnace is not culling
1557+ DAF7                                     ; break
1558+ DAF7                                  IFDEF PLOTPOINTSONLY
1559+ DAF7 ~                                    ld      a,$F6
1560+ DAF7 ~                                    ld      (line_gfx_colour),a
1561+ DAF7 ~                                    call    PlotAllNodes
1562+ DAF7                                  ELSE
1563+ DAF7 3E E3                                ld      a,$E3
1564+ DAF9 32 B5 E2                             ld      (line_gfx_colour),a
1565+ DAFC CD 33 D2                             call    CullV2
1566+ DAFF CD A5 DC                             call    PrepLines                       ; With late clipping this just moves the data to the line array which is now x2 size
1567+ DB02 CD 84 D9                             call    DrawLinesLateClipping
1568+ DB05                                  ENDIF
1569+ DB05                                  IFDEF OVERLAYNODES
1570+ DB05 ~                                    ld      a,$CF
1571+ DB05 ~                                    ld      (line_gfx_colour),a
1572+ DB05 ~                                    call    PlotAllNodes
1573+ DB05                                  ENDIF
1574+ DB05                                  IFDEF FLIPBUFFERSTEST
1575+ DB05 ~                                    DISPLAY "Univ_ship_data flip buffer test Enabled"
1576+ DB05 ~                                    call   l2_flip_buffers
1577+ DB05 ~                                    call   l2_flip_buffers
1578+ DB05                                  ELSE
1579+ DB05                                      DISPLAY "Univ_ship_data flip buffer test Disabled"
1580+ DB05                                  ENDIF
1581+ DB05 C9                                   ret
1582+ DB06              ;............................................................
1583+ DB06 DD 01        .ExplodingCloud:        break
1584+ DB08 CD 6D DA                             call    ProcessNodes
1585+ DB0B CD 77 C7                             call    UnivAcknowledExploding      ; acknowledge ship exploding
1586+ DB0E 3A 60 C0     .UpdateCloudCounter:    ld      a,(UBnKCloudCounter)        ; counter += 4 until > 255
1587+ DB11 C6 04                                add     4                           ; we do this early as we now have logic for
1588+ DB13 DA D5 DB                             jp      c,.FinishedExplosion        ; display or not later
1589+ DB16 32 60 C0                             ld      (UBnKCloudCounter),a        ; .
1590+ DB19              .SkipHiddenShip:        ReturnOnMemBitClear  UBnkaiatkecm , ShipIsVisibleBitNbr
1590+ DB19 3A 55 C0    >                        ld     a,(UBnkaiatkecm)
1590+ DB1C CB 77       >                        bit 	ShipIsVisibleBitNbr,a
1590+ DB1E C8          >                        ret		z
1591+ DB1F              .IsShipADot:            JumpOnABitSet ShipIsDotBitNbr, .itsJustADot ; if its dot distance then explosion is a dot, TODO later we will do as a coloured dot
1591+ DB1F CB 5F       >                        bit 	ShipIsDotBitNbr, a
1591+ DB21 C2 D2 DA    >                        jp      nz,.itsJustADot
1592+ DB24 2A 26 C0     .CalculateZ:            ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                ; al = hl = z
1593+ DB27 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; .
1594+ DB28                                      JumpIfALTNusng 32,.CalcFromZ        ; if its >= 32 then set a to FE and we are done
1594+ DB28 FE 20       >                        cp      32
1594+ DB2A DA 32 DB    >                        jp		c, .CalcFromZ
1595+ DB2D 26 FE                                ld      h,$FE                       ; .
1596+ DB2F C3 3D DB                             jp      .DoneZDist                  ; .
1597+ DB32              .CalcFromZ:             ShiftHLLeft1                        ; else
1597+ DB32 CB 25       >			   sla l
1597+ DB34 CB 14       >			   rl  h
1598+ DB36                                      ShiftHLLeft1                        ; hl = hl * 2
1598+ DB36 CB 25       >			   sla l
1598+ DB38 CB 14       >			   rl  h
1599+ DB3A                                      SetCarryFlag                        ; h = h * 3 rolling in lower bit
1599+ DB3A 37          >                        scf
1600+ DB3B CB 14                                rl  h                               ;
1601+ DB3D 06 00        .DoneZDist:             ld      b,0                         ; bc = cloud z distance calculateed
1602+ DB3F 4C                                   ld      c,h                         ; .
1603+ DB40 3A 60 C0     .CalcCloudRadius:       ld      a,(UBnKCloudCounter)        ; de = cloud counter * 256
1604+ DB43                      IFDEF LOGMATHS
1605+ DB43 ~                                    MMUSelectMathsTables
1606+ DB43 ~                                    ld      b,h
1607+ DB43 ~                                    call    AEquAmul256DivBLog
1608+ DB43 ~                                    ld      d,a
1609+ DB43 ~                                    MMUSelectROM0
1610+ DB43                      ELSE
1611+ DB43 57                                   ld      d,a                         ;
1612+ DB44 1E 00                                ld      e,0                         ;
1613+ DB46 CD B8 95                             call    DEequDEDivBC                ; de = cloud counter * 256 / z distance
1614+ DB49 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ; if radius >= 28
1615+ DB4A                      ENDIF
1616+ DB4A                                      JumpIfALTNusng  28,.SetCloudRadius  ; then set raidus in d to $FE
1616+ DB4A FE 1C       >                        cp      28
1616+ DB4C DA 54 DB    >                        jp		c, .SetCloudRadius
1617+ DB4F 16 FE        .MaxCloudRadius:        ld      d,$FE                       ;
1618+ DB51 C3 60 DB                             jp      .SizedUpCloud               ;
1619+ DB54              .SetCloudRadius:        ShiftDELeft1                        ; de = 8 * de
1619+ DB54 CB 23       >			   sla e
1619+ DB56 CB 12       >			   rl  d
1620+ DB58                                      ShiftDELeft1                        ; .
1620+ DB58 CB 23       >			   sla e
1620+ DB5A CB 12       >			   rl  d
1621+ DB5C                                      ShiftDELeft1                        ; .
1621+ DB5C CB 23       >			   sla e
1621+ DB5E CB 12       >			   rl  d
1622+ DB60 7A           .SizedUpCloud:          ld      a,d                         ; cloudradius = a = d or (cloudcounter * 8 / 256)
1623+ DB61 32 61 C0                             ld      (UBnKCloudRadius),a         ; .
1624+ DB64 DD 67                                ld      ixh,a                       ; ixh = a = calculated cloud radius
1625+ DB66 3A 60 C0     .CalcSubParticleColour: ld      a,(UBnKCloudCounter)        ; colur fades away
1626+ DB69 ED 23                                swapnib                             ; divive by 16
1627+ DB6B E6 0F                                and     $0F                         ; mask off upper bytes
1628+ DB6D CB 2F                                sra     a                           ; divide by 32
1629+ DB6F 21 DF DB                             ld      hl,DebrisColourTable
1630+ DB72 ED 31                                add     hl,a
1631+ DB74 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
1632+ DB75 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = pixel colours
1633+ DB77 3A 60 C0     .CalcSubParticleCount:  ld      a,(UBnKCloudCounter)        ; cloud counter = abs (cloud counter) in effect if > 127 then shrinks it
1634+ DB7A                                      ABSa2c                              ; a = abs a
1634+ DB7A CB 7F       >                        bit     7,a
1634+ DB7C CA 81 DB    >                        jp      z,.DoneABSa
1634+ DB7F ED 44       >                        neg
1634+ DB81             >.DoneABSa:
1635+ DB81 CB 2F        .ParticlePositive:      sra a                               ; iyh = (a /8)
1636+ DB83 CB 2F                                sra a                               ; .
1637+ DB85 CB 2F                                sra a                               ; .
1638+ DB87 F6 01                                or  1                               ; bit 0 set so minimum 1
1639+ DB89 DD 6F        .DoneSubParticleCount:  ld      ixl,a                       ; ixl = nbr particles per vertex
1640+ DB8B 3A FF C3     .ForEachVertex:         ld      a,(VertexCountAddr)         ; load vertex count into b
1641+ DB8E 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; .
1642+ DB8F 21 F1 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkNodeArray            ; hl = list of vertices
1643+ DB92 C5 E5        .ExplosionVertLoop:     push    bc,,hl                      ; save vertex counter in b and pointer to verticles in hl
1644+ DB94 DD 68                                    ld      ixl,b                   ; save counter
1645+ DB96 4E                                       ld      c,(hl)                  ; get vertex into bc and de
1646+ DB97 23                                       inc     hl                      ; .
1647+ DB98 46                                       ld      b,(hl)                  ; .
1648+ DB99 23                                       inc     hl                      ; .
1649+ DB9A 5E                                       ld      e,(hl)                  ; .
1650+ DB9B 23                                       inc     hl                      ; .
1651+ DB9C 56                                       ld      d,(hl)                  ; now hl is done with and we can use it
1652+ DB9D DD 7D        .LoopSubParticles:          ld      a,ixl                   ; iyh = loop iterator for nbr of particles per vertex
1653+ DB9F FD 67                                    ld      iyh,a                   ;
1654+ DBA1                                          ;break
1655+ DBA1 D5 C5        .ProcessAParticle:          push    de,,bc                  ; save y then x coordinates
1656+ DBA3 EB                                           ex      de,hl               ; hl = de (Y)
1657+ DBA4 DD 54                                        ld      d,ixh               ; d = cloud radius
1658+ DBA6 CD E7 DB                                     call    HLEquARandCloud     ; vertex = vertex +/- (random * projected cloud side /256)
1659+ DBA9 7C                                           ld      a,h                 ; if off screen skip
1660+ DBAA                                              JumpIfAIsNotZero  .NextIteration
1660+ DBAA A7          >                        and     a
1660+ DBAB C2 C6 DB    >                        jp	    nz,.NextIteration
1661+ DBAE EB                                           ex      de,hl               ; de = result for y which was put into hl
1662+ DBAF E1                                           pop     hl                  ; get x back from bc on stack
1663+ DBB0 E5                                           push    hl                  ; put bc (which is now in hl) back on the stack
1664+ DBB1 D5                                           push    de                  ; save de
1665+ DBB2 DD 54                                        ld      d,ixh               ; d = cloud radius
1666+ DBB4 CD E7 DB                                     call    HLEquARandCloud     ; vertex = vertex +/- (random * projected cloud side /256)
1667+ DBB7 D1                                           pop     de                  ; get de back doing pop here clears stack up
1668+ DBB8 7C                                           ld      a,h                 ; if high byte has a value then off screen
1669+ DBB9                                              JumpIfAIsNotZero .NextIteration ;
1669+ DBB9 A7          >                        and     a
1669+ DBBA C2 C6 DB    >                        jp	    nz,.NextIteration
1670+ DBBD 43                                           ld      b,e                 ; bc = y x of pixel from e and c regs
1671+ DBBE 4D                                           ld      c,l                 ; iyl already has colour
1672+ DBBF                                              MMUSelectLayer2             ; plot it with debris code as this can chop y > 128
1672+ DBBF ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
1673+ DBC3 CD 00 E3                                     call    DebrisPixel         ; .
1674+ DBC6 C1 D1        .NextIteration:             pop    de,,bc                   ; ready for next iteration, get back y and x coordinates
1675+ DBC8 FD 25                                    dec    iyh                      ; one partcile done
1676+ DBCA 20 D5                                    jr      nz,.ProcessAParticle    ; until all done
1677+ DBCC E1 C1        .NextVert:              pop     bc,,hl                      ; recover loop counter and source pointer
1678+ DBCE 3E 04                                ld      a,4                         ; move to next vertex group
1679+ DBD0 ED 31                                add     hl,a                        ;
1680+ DBD2 10 BE                                djnz    .ExplosionVertLoop          ;
1681+ DBD4 C9                                   ret
1682+ DBD5              .FinishedExplosion:     ;break
1683+ DBD5 3A 40 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKSlotNumber)          ; get slot number
1684+ DBD8 CD 29 84                             call    ClearSlotA                  ; gauranted to be in main memory as non bankables
1685+ DBDB CD 7D C7                             call    UnivFinishedExplosion       ;
1686+ DBDE C9                                   ret
1687+ DBDF
1688+ DBDF
1689+ DBDF FC D8 B4 90  DebrisColourTable:      DB L2ColourYELLOW_1, L2ColourYELLOW_2, L2ColourYELLOW_3, L2ColourYELLOW_4, L2ColourYELLOW_5, L2ColourYELLOW_6, L2ColourYELLOW_7,L2ColourGREY_4
1689+ DBE3 6C 48 24 25
1690+ DBE7                                      ; set flags and signal to remove from slot list
1691+ DBE7
1692+ DBE7              ; Hl = HlL +/- (Random * projected cloud size)
1693+ DBE7              ; In - d = z distance, hl = vert hi lo
1694+ DBE7              ; Out hl = adjusted distance
1695+ DBE7              ; uses registers hl, de
1696+ DBE7 E5           HLEquARandCloud:        push    hl                          ; random number geneator upsets hl register
1697+ DBE8 CD 0C 85                             call    doRandom                    ; a= random * 2
1698+ DBEB E1                                   pop     hl
1699+ DBEC 17                                   rla                                 ;
1700+ DBED 38 0A                                jr      c,.Negative                 ; if buit 7 went into carry
1701+ DBEF 5F           .Positive:              ld  e,a
1702+ DBF0 ED 30                                mul
1703+ DBF2 5A                                   ld  e,d
1704+ DBF3 16 00                                ld  d,0
1705+ DBF5                                      ClearCarryFlag
1705+ DBF5 B7          >                        or a
1706+ DBF6 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + a
1707+ DBF8 C9                                   ret
1708+ DBF9 5F           .Negative:              ld  e,a
1709+ DBFA ED 30                                mul
1710+ DBFC 5A                                   ld  e,d
1711+ DBFD 16 00                                ld  d,0
1712+ DBFF                                      ClearCarryFlag
1712+ DBFF B7          >                        or a
1713+ DC00 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + a
1714+ DC02 C9                                   ret
1715+ DC03
1716+ DC03              GetExperiencePoints:    ; TODO calculate experience points
1717+ DC03                                      ; TODO mission updates check
1718+ DC03 C9                                   ret
1719+ DC04
1720+ DC04              ; ......................................................
1721+ DC04 3A 0E C4     KillShip:               ld      a,(ShipTypeAddr)            ; we can't destroy stations in a collision
1722+ DC07 FE 02                                cp      ShipTypeStation             ; for destructable one we will have a special type of ship
1723+ DC09 C8                                   ret     z
1724+ DC0A CD A0 C7                             call    UnivExplodeShip             ; remove AI, mark killed, mark exploding
1725+ DC0D                                      SetMemToN   UBnKexplDsp, ShipExplosionDuration ; set debris cloud timer, also usered in main to remove from slots
1725+ DC0D 3E 4B       >                        ld      a,ShipExplosionDuration
1725+ DC0F 32 52 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKexplDsp),a
1726+ DC12                                      ldWriteZero UBnKEnergy              ; Zero ship energy
1726+ DC12 AF          >                        xor      a
1726+ DC13 32 59 C0    >                        ld       (UBnKEnergy),a
1727+ DC16 32 61 C0                             ld      (UBnKCloudRadius),a
1728+ DC19 3E 12                                ld      a,18
1729+ DC1B 32 60 C0                             ld      (UBnKCloudCounter),a        ; Zero cloud
1730+ DC1E                                      ; TODO logic to spawn cargo/plates goes here
1731+ DC1E C9                                   ret
1732+ DC1F
1733+ DC1F              ; in a = damage
1734+ DC1F 47           DamageShip:             ld      b,a                         ; b = a = damage comming in
1735+ DC20 3A 0E C4                             ld      a,(ShipTypeAddr)            ; we can't destroy stations in a collision
1736+ DC23 FE 02                                cp      ShipTypeStation             ; for destructable one we will have a special type of ship
1737+ DC25 C8                                   ret     z
1738+ DC26 3A 59 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKEnergy)              ; get current energy level
1739+ DC29                                      ClearCarryFlag
1739+ DC29 B7          >                        or a
1740+ DC2A 98                                   sbc     a,b                         ; subtract damage
1741+ DC2B D2 32 DC     .Overkilled:            jp      nc,.DoneDamage              ; if no carry then its not gone negative
1742+ DC2E CD 04 DC                             call    KillShip                    ; else kill it
1743+ DC31 C9                                   ret
1744+ DC32 32 59 C0     .DoneDamage:            ld      (UBnKEnergy),a
1745+ DC35 C9                                   ret
1746+ DC36              ; need recovery for energy too
1747+ DC36              ; Shall we have a "jolt ship off course routine for when it gets hit by a blast or collision)
1748+ DC36
1749+ DC36              ;-LL49-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1750+ DC36              ;  Entering Here we have the following:
1751+ DC36              ;  XX15(1 0) = vertex x-coordinate but sign not populated
1752+ DC36              ;  XX15(3 2) = vertex y-coordinate but sign not populated
1753+ DC36              ;  XX15(5 4) = vertex z-coordinate but sign not populated
1754+ DC36              ;
1755+ DC36              ;  XX16(  1 0)sidev_x   (3 2)roofv_x   (5 4)nosev_x
1756+ DC36              ;  XX16(  7 6)sidev_y   (9 8)roofv_y (11 10)nosev_y
1757+ DC36              ;  XX16(13 12)sidev_z (15 14)roofv_z (17 16)nosev_z
1758+ DC36              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1759+ DC36              AddLaserBeamLine:
1760+ DC36              ; this code is a bag of shit and needs re-writing
1761+ DC36              GetGunVertexNode:
1762+ DC36 3A FD C3             ld          a,(GunVertexAddr)                   ; Hull byte#6, gun vertex*4 (XX0),Y
1763+ DC39 21 F1 C0             ld          hl,UBnkNodeArray                    ; list of lines to read
1764+ DC3C ED 31                add         hl,a                                ; HL = address of GunVertexOnNodeArray
1765+ DC3E FD 2E 00             ld          iyl,0
1766+ DC41              MoveX1PointToXX15:
1767+ DC41 4E                   ld          c,(hl)                              ;
1768+ DC42 23                   inc         hl
1769+ DC43 46                   ld          b,(hl)                              ; bc = x1 of gun vertex
1770+ DC44 23                   inc         hl
1771+ DC45 ED 43 A7 C0          ld          (UBnkX1),bc
1772+ DC49 0C                   inc         c
1773+ DC4A C8                   ret         z                                   ; was c 255?
1774+ DC4B 04                   inc         b
1775+ DC4C C8                   ret         z                                   ; was c 255?
1776+ DC4D              MoveY1PointToXX15:
1777+ DC4D 4E                   ld          c,(hl)                              ;
1778+ DC4E 23                   inc         hl
1779+ DC4F 46                   ld          b,(hl)                              ; bc = y1 of gun vertex
1780+ DC50 23                   inc         hl
1781+ DC51 ED 43 A9 C0          ld          (UBnkY1),bc
1782+ DC55              SetX2PointToXX15:
1783+ DC55 01 00 00             ld          bc,0                                ; set X2 to 0
1784+ DC58 ED 43 AB C0          ld          (UBnkX2),bc
1785+ DC5C 3A 26 C0             ld          a,(UBnKzlo)
1786+ DC5F 4F                   ld          c,a
1787+ DC60              SetY2PointToXX15:
1788+ DC60 ED 43 AD C0          ld          (UBnkY2),bc                         ; set Y2to 0
1789+ DC64 3A 22 C0             ld          a,(UBnKxsgn)
1790+ DC67                      JumpOnBitClear a,7,LL74SkipDec
1790+ DC67 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1790+ DC69 CA 71 DC    >                        jp      z,LL74SkipDec
1791+ DC6C              LL74DecX2:
1792+ DC6C 3E FF                ld          a,$FF
1793+ DC6E 32 AB C0             ld          (UBnkX2Lo),a                        ; rather than dec (hl) just load with 255 as it will always be that at this code point
1794+ DC71              LL74SkipDec:
1795+ DC71 CD 32 CD             call        ClipLineV3                            ; LL145 \ clip test on XX15 XX12 vector, returns carry
1796+ DC74 38 5A                jr          c,CalculateNewLines
1797+ DC76              ;        jr          c,CalculateNewLines                 ; LL170 clip returned carry set so not visibile if carry set skip the rest (laser not firing)
1798+ DC76              ; Here we are usign hl to replace VarU as index
1799+ DC76 2A 62 7F             ld          hl,(varU16)
1800+ DC79 3A A7 C0             ld          a,(UBnKx1Lo)
1801+ DC7C 77                   ld          (hl),a
1802+ DC7D 23                   inc         hl
1803+ DC7E 3A A9 C0             ld          a,(UbnKy1Lo)
1804+ DC81 77                   ld          (hl),a
1805+ DC82 23                   inc         hl
1806+ DC83 3A AB C0             ld          a,(UBnkX2Lo)
1807+ DC86 77                   ld          (hl),a
1808+ DC87 23                   inc         hl
1809+ DC88 3A AD C0             ld          a,(UbnKy2Lo)
1810+ DC8B 77                   ld          (hl),a
1811+ DC8C FD 2C                inc         iyl                                 ; iyl holds as a counter to iterations
1812+ DC8E 23                   inc         hl
1813+ DC8F FD 2C                inc         iyl                                 ; ready for next byte
1814+ DC91 22 62 7F             ld          (varU16),hl
1815+ DC94 C9                   ret
1816+ DC95
1817+ DC95                  DISPLAY "Tracing 7", $
1818+ DC95
1819+ DC95                  INCLUDE "Universe/Ships/PrepLines.asm"

   3++DC95                      DISPLAY "Tracing 8", $

   5++DC95                  INCLUDE "./ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1.asm
   1++DC95              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++DC95              ; a = byteoffset to node array as its pre computed to x4 bytes
   3++DC95 21 F1 C0     getVertexNodeAtAToDE:   ld          hl,UBnkNodeArray                    ; hl = edgelist  current pointer
   4++DC98 ED 31                                add         hl,a                                ; hl = address of Node
   5++DC9A 7E                                   ld          a,(hl)                              ; get edge list nbr 1 edge
   6++DC9B ED A0                                ldi                                             ; x1 lo
   7++DC9D ED A0                                ldi                                             ; x1 hi
   8++DC9F ED A0                                ldi                                             ; y1 lo
   9++DCA1 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; y1 hi
  10++DCA3 C9                                   ret
  11++DCA4

  10++DCA4                      DISPLAY "Tracing 10", $

  12++DCA4                  INCLUDE "./ModelRender/GetFaceAtA.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/GetFaceAtA.asm
   1++DCA4              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++DCA4              GetFaceAtA:         MACRO
   3++DCA4 ~                                ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
   4++DCA4 ~                                add         hl,a
   5++DCA4 ~                                ld          a,(hl)                              ; get face visibility
   6++DCA4                                  ENDM
   7++DCA4
# file closed: ././ModelRender/GetFaceAtA.asm
  13++DCA4                      DISPLAY "Tracing 11", $
  14++DCA4
  15++DCA4              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  16++DCA4              ; LL72 Goes through each edge in to determine if they are on a visible face, if so load start and end to line array as clipped lines
  17++DCA4               ;   DEFINE NOBACKFACECULL 1
  18++DCA4 00           PLEDGECTR           DB          0
  19++DCA5
  20++DCA5              PrepLines:
  21++DCA5              ; FOR NOW BRUTE FORCE IF OFF SCREEN
  22++DCA5
  23++DCA5              ; TODO add in onced DOEXP is finished
  24++DCA5              ;        ld          a,(UBnkexplDsp)                     ; INWK+31  \ display/exploding state|missiles
  25++DCA5              ;        JumpOnBitClear  a,5,EE31                        ; bit5 of mask, if zero no explosion
  26++DCA5              ;        or          8
  27++DCA5              ;        ld          (UBnkexplDsp),a                     ; else else set bit3 to erase old line
  28++DCA5              ;        jp          DOEXP                               ; erase using Do Explosion and use implicit return
  29++DCA5              ;EE31:                                                   ; no explosion
  30++DCA5              ;        JumpOnBitClear  a,3,LL74                        ; clear is hop to do New lines
  31++DCA5              ;        call        ClearLine                           ; LL155    \ else erase lines in XX19 heap at LINEstr down
  32++DCA5              ;        ld          a, $08                              ; set bit 3 of a and fall into LL74
  33++DCA5              ;
  34++DCA5              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  35++DCA5
  36++DCA5              InitialiseLineRead:
  37++DCA5                      ;break
  38++DCA5                      ldWriteZero UbnkLineArrayLen                    ; current line array index = 0
  38++DCA5 AF          >                        xor      a
  38++DCA6 32 EB C3    >                        ld       (UbnkLineArrayLen),a
  39++DCA9 32 EC C3             ld          (UbnkLineArrayBytes),a              ; UbnkLineArrayBytes= nbr of bytes of lines laoded = array len * 4
  40++DCAC 32 A4 DC             ld          (PLEDGECTR),a
  41++DCAF 3A 01 C4             ld          a,(EdgeCountAddr)
  42++DCB2 DD 67                ld          ixh,a                               ; ixh = XX17 = Total number of edges to traverse
  43++DCB4 FD 2E 00             ld          iyl,0                               ; ixl = current edge index
  44++DCB7 21 31 C2             ld          hl,UbnkLineArray                    ; head of array
  45++DCBA 22 62 7F             ld          (varU16),hl                         ; store current line array pointer un varU16
  46++DCBD                      ldCopyByte  EdgeCountAddr, XX17                 ; XX17  = total number of edges to traverse edge counter
  46++DCBD 3A 01 C4    >                        ld       a,(EdgeCountAddr)
  46++DCC0 32 66 7F    >                        ld       (XX17),a
  47++DCC3 3A 52 C0             ld          a,(UBnKexplDsp)                     ; get explosion status
  48++DCC6                      JumpOnBitClear a,6,CalculateNewLines            ; LL170 bit6 of display state clear (laser not firing) \ Calculate new lines
  48++DCC6 CB 77       >                        bit 	6,a
  48++DCC8 CA D0 DC    >                        jp      z,CalculateNewLines
  49++DCCB E6 BF                and         $BF                                 ; else laser is firing, clear bit6.
  50++DCCD 32 52 C0             ld          (UBnKexplDsp),a                     ; INWK+31
  51++DCD0              ;   TODO commentedout as teh subroutine is a mess   call        AddLaserBeamLine                    ; add laser beam line to draw list
  52++DCD0              ; NOw we can calculate hull after including laser line
  53++DCD0              CalculateNewLines:
  54++DCD0              LL170:                                                  ;(laser not firing) \ Calculate new lines   \ their comment
  55++DCD0              CheckEdgesForVisibility:
  56++DCD0 21 02 C5             ld          hl,UBnkHullEdges
  57++DCD3                      ; TODO change heap to 3 separate arrays and break them down during copy of ship hull data
  58++DCD3 22 65 7E             ld          (varV),hl                           ; V \ is pointer to where edges data start
  59++DCD6 3A FC C3             ld          a,(LineX4Addr)
  60++DCD9 47                   ld          b,a                                 ; nbr of bytes of edge data
  61++DCDA              LL75Loop:                                               ; count Visible edges
  62++DCDA              IsEdgeInVisibilityRange:
  63++DCDA 2A 65 7E             ld          hl,(varV)
  64++DCDD E5                   push        hl
  65++DCDE FD E1                pop         iy
  66++DCE0                     ; DEFINE NOBACKFACECULL 1
  67++DCE0                      IFDEF NOBACKFACECULL
  68++DCE0 ~                        jp          VisibileEdge; DEBUGTODO
  69++DCE0                      ENDIF
  70++DCE0 3A 50 7E             ld          a,(LastNormalVisible)               ; XX4 is visibility range
  71++DCE3 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; d holds copy of XX4
  72++DCE4              ; Get Edge Byte 0
  73++DCE4 FD 7E 00             ld          a,(IY+0)                            ; edge data byte#0 is visibility distance
  74++DCE7                      JumpIfALTNusng d,LL78EdgeNotVisible             ; XX4   \ visibility LLx78 edge not visible
  74++DCE7 BA          >                        cp      d
  74++DCE8 DA 43 DD    >                        jp		c, LL78EdgeNotVisible
  75++DCEB              EdgeMayBeVisibile:
  76++DCEB              ; Get Edge Byte 1
  77++DCEB              IsFace1Visibile:                                        ; edges have 2 faces to test
  78++DCEB FD 7E 01             ld          a,(IY+1)                            ; (V),Y \ edge data byte#1 bits 0 to 3 face 1 4 to 7 face 2
  79++DCEE 4F                   ld          c,a                                 ;  c = a copy of byte 1
  80++DCEF E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ;
  81++DCF1                      GetFaceAtA
  81++DCF1 21 D3 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
  81++DCF4 ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
  81++DCF6 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ; get face visibility
  82++DCF7              ;       jp  VisibileEdge; DEBUG BODGE TEST TODO
  83++DCF7                      JumpIfAIsNotZero VisibileEdge                     ; LL70 visible edge
  83++DCF7 A7          >                        and     a
  83++DCF8 C2 0C DD    >                        jp	    nz,VisibileEdge
  84++DCFB              IsFace2Visibile:
  85++DCFB 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; restore byte 1 from c register
  86++DCFC ED 23                swapnib                                         ;
  87++DCFE E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; swap high byte into low byte
  88++DD00 E5                   push        hl
  89++DD01                      GetFaceAtA
  89++DD01 21 D3 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
  89++DD04 ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
  89++DD06 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ; get face visibility
  90++DD07 E1                   pop         hl
  91++DD08                      JumpIfAIsZero LL78EdgeNotVisible                ; edge not visible
  91++DD08 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  91++DD09 CA 43 DD    >                        jp	    z, LL78EdgeNotVisible
  92++DD0C              VisibileEdge:                                           ; Now we need to node id from bytes 2 - start and 3 - end
  93++DD0C              ;LL79--Visible edge--------------------------------------
  94++DD0C              ; Get Edge Byte 2
  95++DD0C FD 7E 02             ld          a,(IY+2)                            ; get Node id
  96++DD0F 11 A7 C0             ld          de,UBnkX1
  97++DD12 CD 95 DC             call        getVertexNodeAtAToDE; getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1              ; get the points X1Y1 from node
  98++DD15 FD 7E 03             ld          a,(IY+3)
  99++DD18 11 AB C0             ld          de,UBnkX2
 100++DD1B CD 95 DC             call        getVertexNodeAtAToDE; getVertexNodeAtAToX2Y2              ; get the points X2Y2 from node
 101++DD1E
 102++DD1E                      IFDEF       CLIPVersion3
 103++DD1E ~                        call        ClipLineV3
 104++DD1E ~                        jr          nc,.SkipBreak1
 105++DD1E ~                        nop
 106++DD1E ~                        nop
 107++DD1E ~                        ;break
 108++DD1E ~            .SkipBreak1:
 109++DD1E ~                        jr          c,LL78EdgeNotVisible
 110++DD1E ~            //COMMENEDOUT FOR LATECLIPPING        ELSE
 111++DD1E ~            //COMMENEDOUT FOR LATECLIPPING            call        ClipLine
 112++DD1E ~            //COMMENEDOUT FOR LATECLIPPING            jr          c,LL78EdgeNotVisible                ; LL78 edge not visible
 113++DD1E                      ENDIF
 114++DD1E              LL80:                                                   ; ll80 \ Shove visible edge onto XX19 ship lines heap counter U
 115++DD1E                      IFDEF       LATECLIPPING
 116++DD1E ED 5B 62 7F                  ld          de,(varU16)                         ; clipped edges heap address
 117++DD22 21 A7 C0                     ld          hl,UbnkPreClipX1
 118++DD25                              FourLDIInstrunctions
 118++DD25 ED A0       >                        ldi
 118++DD27 ED A0       >                        ldi
 118++DD29 ED A0       >                        ldi
 118++DD2B ED A0       >                        ldi
 119++DD2D                              FourLDIInstrunctions
 119++DD2D ED A0       >                        ldi
 119++DD2F ED A0       >                        ldi
 119++DD31 ED A0       >                        ldi
 119++DD33 ED A0       >                        ldi
 120++DD35 ED 53 62 7F                  ld          (varU16),de                         ; update U16 with current address
 121++DD39                      ELSE
 122++DD39 ~                            ld          de,(varU16)                         ; clipped edges heap address
 123++DD39 ~                            ld          hl,UBnkNewX1
 124++DD39 ~                            FourLDIInstrunctions
 125++DD39 ~                            ld          (varU16),de                         ; update U16 with current address
 126++DD39                      ENDIF
 127++DD39 21 EB C3             ld          hl,UbnkLineArrayLen                 ; we have loaded one line
 128++DD3C 34                   inc         (hl)
 129++DD3D 7E                   ld          a,(hl)
 130++DD3E                      JumpIfAGTENusng LineArraySize,CompletedLineGeneration   ; have we hit max lines for a model hop over jmp to Exit edge data loop
 130++DD3E FE 32       >                        cp     LineArraySize
 130++DD40 D2 59 DD    >                        jp		nc,CompletedLineGeneration
 131++DD43              ; If we hit here we skip the write of line arryay u16
 132++DD43              LL78EdgeNotVisible:                                     ; also arrive here if Edge not visible, loop next data edge.
 133++DD43              LL78:
 134++DD43 2A 65 7E             ld          hl,(varV)                           ; varV is current edge address
 135++DD46 3E 04                ld          a,4
 136++DD48 ED 31                add         hl,a
 137++DD4A 22 65 7E             ld          (varV),hl
 138++DD4D 21 A4 DC             ld          hl,PLEDGECTR                        ;
 139++DD50 34                   inc         (hl)                                ;
 140++DD51 7E                   ld          a,(hl)                              ; current edge index ++
 141++DD52                      JumpIfANEMemusng XX17,LL75Loop                  ; compare with total number of edges
 141++DD52 21 66 7F    >                        ld    hl,XX17
 141++DD55 BE          >                        cp    (hl)
 141++DD56 C2 DA DC    >                        jp      nz,LL75Loop
 142++DD59              CompletedLineGeneration:
 143++DD59              LL81:
 144++DD59              LL81SHPPT:                                              ; SHPPT ship is a point arrives here with Acc=2, bottom entry in heap
 145++DD59 3A EB C3             ld          a,(UbnkLineArrayLen)                ; UbnkLineArrayLen = nbr of lines loaded
 146++DD5C CB 27                sla         a
 147++DD5E CB 27                sla         a                                   ; multiple by 4 to equal number of bytes
 148++DD60                      IFDEF       LATECLIPPING
 149++DD60 CB 27                        sla         a                           ; multiple by 8 to equal number of bytes
 150++DD62                      ENDIF
 151++DD62 32 EC C3             ld          (UbnkLineArrayBytes),a              ; UbnkLineArrayBytes= nbr of bytes of lines laoded = array len * 4
 152++DD65              ExitEdgeDataLoop:
 153++DD65 C9                   ret
 154++DD66
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/PrepLines.asm
1820+ DD66
1821+ DD66                  DISPLAY "Tracing XX", $
1822+ DD66
1823+ DD66              UnivBankSize  EQU $ - StartOfUniv
1824+ DD66
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/univ_ship_data.asm

# file opened: ./Universe/Sun/sun_data.asm
   1+ C000              ; In  flight ship data tables
   2+ C000              ; In  flight ship data tables
   3+ C000              ; In  flight ship data tables
   4+ C000              ; There can be upto &12 objects in flight.
   5+ C000              ; To avoid hassle of memory heap managment, the free list
   6+ C000              ; will correspond to a memory bank offset so data will be held in
   7+ C000              ; 1 bank per universe object. Its a waste of a lot of memory but really
   8+ C000              ; 1 bank per universe object. Its a waste of a lot of memory but really
   9+ C000              ; simple that way. Each bank will be 8K and swapped on 8K slot 7 $E000 to $FFFF
  10+ C000              ; This means each gets its own line list, inwork etc
  11+ C000
  12+ C000              ; "Runtime Ship Data paged into in Bank 7"
  13+ C000              ;                      0123456789ABCDEF
  14+ C000 53 75 6E 20  StartOfSun:        DB "Sun Data ......."
  14+ C004 44 61 74 61
  14+ C008 20 2E 2E 2E
  14+ C00C 2E 2E 2E 2E
  15+ C010              ; NOTE we can cheat and pre allocate segs just using a DS for now
  16+ C010              CheckRowHLOnScreen:     MACRO   failtarget
  17+ C010 ~                                    ld      a,h                             ; is h byte set, i.e > 256 or < 0
  18+ C010 ~                                    and     a                               ; .
  19+ C010 ~                                    jr      nz,failtarget                   ; h <> 0 so fails (covers <0 and > 255
  20+ C010 ~                                    ld      a,l                             ; l bit 7 0?
  21+ C010 ~                                    and     Bit7Only                        ; covers l > 127 (screen draw area is 0 to 192 / 3 * 2 (128)
  22+ C010 ~                                    jr      nz,failtarget                   ;
  23+ C010                                      ENDM
  24+ C010
  25+ C010              ; IY = SBnKLineArray + rowValue*2
  26+ C010              IYEquRowN:              MACRO   rowValue                        ; set up iy as target address
  27+ C010 ~                                    ld      a,rowValue
  28+ C010 ~                                    ld      hl,SBnKLineArray
  29+ C010 ~                                    add     hl,a
  30+ C010 ~                                    add     hl,a
  31+ C010 ~                                    push    hl
  32+ C010 ~                                    pop     iy
  33+ C010                                      ENDM
  34+ C010              ;   \ -> & 565D \ See ship data files chosen and loaded after flight code starts running.
  35+ C010              ; Universe map substibute for INWK

  37+ C010              SBnKDataBlock:

   1++C021              ;-- XX16 --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++C021 00 00        SBnkTransmatSidevX          DW  0               ; XX16+0

  11++C058 00           SBnKProjzHi                 DB  0

  80+ C193 21 10 C0     ResetSBnKData:          ld      hl,SBnKDataBlock

  86+ C19E 21 10 C0     ResetSBnKPosition:      ld      hl,SBnKxlo

  88+ C1A3 AF                                   xor     a

  94+ C1A9 44           WarpSunByHL:            ld      b,h
  95+ C1AA 4D                                   ld      c,l
  96+ C1AB 26 00                                ld      h,0
  97+ C1AD ED 5B 17 C0                          ld      de,(SBnKzhi)
  98+ C1B1 3A 16 C0                             ld      a,(SBnKzlo)
  99+ C1B4 6F                                   ld      l,a
 100+ C1B5                                      MMUSelectMathsBankedFns
 100+ C1B5 ED 91 50 66 >                     nextreg MathsBankedFnsMMU, BankMathsBankedFns
