 704+ C6A3 3A FA C5                             ld      a,(SunVarP+2)
 705+ C6A6 C5                                   push    bc                          ; save shift counter in b
 706+ C6A7 CD 44 96                             call    DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC
 707+ C6AA                                      ;call    RequAmul256divQ
 708+ C6AA 79                                   ld      a, c
 709+ C6AB 32 60 7F                             ld      (varR),a
 710+ C6AE C1                                   pop     bc                          ; retrieve shift counter
 711+ C6AF 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0                        ; set K to 0
 712+ C6B2 22 F4 C5                             ld      (SunVarK),hl                ; .
 713+ C6B5 22 F6 C5                             ld      (SunVarK+2),hl              ; .
 714+ C6B8 CB 78                                bit     7,b                         ; is counter positive
 715+ C6BA 28 32                                jr      z,.SunDV12                  ; .
 716+ C6BC 3A 60 7F                             ld      a,(varR)                    ;
 717+ C6BF CB 27        .SunDVL8:               sla     a                           ; Shift K by 1 left
 718+ C6C1 21 F5 C5                             ld      hl,SunVarK+1                ; .
 719+ C6C4 CB 16                                rl      (hl)                        ; .
 720+ C6C6 23                                   inc     hl                          ; .
 721+ C6C7 CB 16                                rl      (hl)                        ; .
 722+ C6C9 23                                   inc     hl                          ; .
 723+ C6CA CB 16                                rl      (hl)                        ; .
 724+ C6CC 04                                   inc     b
 725+ C6CD 20 F0                                jr      nz,.SunDVL8                 ; loop until K is shifted
 726+ C6CF 32 F4 C5                             ld      (SunVarK),a
 727+ C6D2 3A F7 C5                             ld      a,(SunVarK+3)
 728+ C6D5 21 FE C5                             ld      hl,SunVarT
 729+ C6D8 B6                                   or      (hl)
 730+ C6D9 32 F7 C5                             ld      (SunVarK+3),a
 731+ C6DC C9                                   ret
 732+ C6DD 3A 60 7F     .SunDV13:               ld      a,(varR)                    ; when we get here, shift is zero
 733+ C6E0 32 F4 C5                             ld      (SunVarK),a
 734+ C6E3 3A F7 C5                             ld      a,(SunVarK+3)
 735+ C6E6 21 FE C5                             ld      hl,SunVarT
 736+ C6E9 B6                                   or      (hl)
 737+ C6EA 32 F7 C5                             ld      (SunVarK+3),a
 738+ C6ED C9                                   ret
 739+ C6EE 78           .SunDV12:               ld      a,b
 740+ C6EF A7                                   and     a
 741+ C6F0 28 EB                                jr      z,.SunDV13
 742+ C6F2 3A 60 7F                             ld      a,(varR)                    ; it probably is already R so need to test
 743+ C6F5 CB 2F        .SunDVL10:              sra     a                           ; Shift K by 1 left
 744+ C6F7 05                                   dec     b
 745+ C6F8 20 FB                                jr      nz,.SunDVL10
 746+ C6FA 32 F4 C5                             ld      (SunVarK),a                 ; as original divide was onyl 8 bits K 1,2,3 don;t matter
 747+ C6FD 3A FE C5                             ld      a,(SunVarT)
 748+ C700 32 F7 C5                             ld      (SunVarK+3),a
 749+ C703 C9                                   ret
 750+ C704
 751+ C704
 752+ C704
 753+ C704 47           SunProcessVertex:       ld      b,a                         ; save sign byte
 754+ C705 ED 5B 16 C0  .SunProjectToEye:       ld      de,(SBnKzlo)                ; X Pos = X / Z
 755+ C709 3A 18 C0                             ld      a,(SBnKzsgn)                ; CDE = z
 756+ C70C FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                       ; save sign
 757+ C70E                                      ClearSignBitA
 757+ C70E E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
 758+ C710                                      ; Addeed as it neds to be AHL/0CD to force * 256 and get correct screen position on scaling
 759+ C710              ;                        ld      c,a                         ;
 760+ C710 5A                                   ld      e,d
 761+ C711 57                                   ld      d,a
 762+ C712 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 763+ C714                                      ; added above to correct positioning as in reality its X/(Z/256)
 764+ C714 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; restore sign byte
 765+ C715 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                       ; save sign
 766+ C717                                      ClearSignBitA
 766+ C717 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
 767+ C719 CD FF C5                             call SunAHLequAHLDivCDE             ; AHL = AHL/CDE unsigned
 768+ C71C              .CheckPosOnScreenX:     JumpIfAIsNotZero .IsOffScreen         ; if A has a value then its way too large regardless of sign
 768+ C71C A7          >                        and     a
 768+ C71D C2 3A C7    >                        jp	    nz,.IsOffScreen
 769+ C720                                      JumpOnLeadSignSet h, .IsOffScreen      ; or bit 7 set of h
 769+ C720 7C          >                        ld      a,h
 769+ C721 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 769+ C723 C2 3A C7    >                        jp      nz,.IsOffScreen
 770+ C726 7C                                   ld      a,h
 771+ C727                                      ReturnIfAGTEusng 4                  ; if a > 1024 then its way too large regardless of sign
 771+ C727 FE 04       >                        cp    4
 771+ C729 D0          >                        ret	 nc
 772+ C72A FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh                       ; now deal with the sign
 773+ C72C FD AD                                xor     iyl
 774+ C72E                                      SignBitOnlyA                        ; a= resultant sign
 774+ C72E E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 775+ C730 28 06                                jr      z,.calculatedVert           ; result is positive so we don't 2's compliment it
 776+ C732              .XIsNegative:           NegHL                               ; make 2's c as negative
 776+ C732 AF          >                    xor a
 776+ C733 95          >                    sub l
 776+ C734 6F          >                    ld l,a
 776+ C735 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 776+ C736 94          >                    sub h
 776+ C737 67          >                    ld h,a
 777+ C738              .calculatedVert:        ClearCarryFlag
 777+ C738 B7          >                        or a
 778+ C739 C9                                   ret
 779+ C73A 21 FF 7F     .IsOffScreen:           ld      hl,$7FFF
 780+ C73D FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
 781+ C73F FD AD                                xor     iyl
 782+ C741                                      SignBitOnlyA
 782+ C741 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 783+ C743 28 02                                jr      z,.calculatedOffScreen
 784+ C745 23                                   inc     hl                          ; set hl to $8001 i.e. -32768
 785+ C746 23                                   inc     hl                          ; .
 786+ C747              .calculatedOffScreen:   SetCarryFlag
 786+ C747 37          >                        scf
 787+ C748 C9                                   ret
 788+ C749
 789+ C749
 790+ C749              ; .........................................................................................................................
 791+ C749              ; we only hit this if z is positive so we can ignore signs
 792+ C749 ED 4B 16 C0  SunCalculateRadius:     ld      bc,(SBnKzlo)                ; DBC = z position
 793+ C74D 3A 18 C0                             ld      a,(SBnKzsgn)                ;
 794+ C750 57                                   ld      d,a                         ;
 795+ C751 21 00 60                             ld      hl,$6000  ; was hl          ; planet radius at Z = 1 006000
 796+ C754 CD 70 95                             call    Div16by24usgn               ; radius = HL/DBC = 24576 / distance z
 797+ C757 B4                                   or      h                           ; if A or H are not 0 then max Radius
 798+ C758                                      JumpIfAIsZero  .SaveRadius
 798+ C758 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 798+ C759 CA 5E C7    >                        jp	    z, .SaveRadius
 799+ C75C 1E F8        .MaxRadius:             ld      e,248                       ;set radius to 248 as maxed out
 800+ C75E 7D           .SaveRadius:            ld      a,l                         ; l = resultant radius
 801+ C75F F6 01                                or      1                           ; at least radius 1 (never even so need to test)
 802+ C761 32 F3 C5                             ld      (SunRadius),a               ; save a copy of radius now for later
 803+ C764 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; as later code expects it to be in e
 804+ C765 C9                                   ret
 805+ C766
 806+ C766              ; Shorter version when sun does not need to be processed to screen
 807+ C766 3A 12 C0     SunUpdateCompass:       ld      a,(SBnKxsgn)
 808+ C769 2A 10 C0                             ld      hl,(SBnKxlo)
 809+ C76C CD 04 C7                             call    SunProcessVertex
 810+ C76F 22 19 C0                             ld      (SunCompassX),hl
 811+ C772 3A 15 C0                             ld      a,(SBnKysgn)
 812+ C775 2A 13 C0                             ld      hl,(SBnKylo)
 813+ C778 CD 04 C7                             call    SunProcessVertex
 814+ C77B 22 1B C0                             ld      (SunCompassY),hl
 815+ C77E C9                                   ret
 816+ C77F
 817+ C77F                                 ; could probabyl set a variable say "varGood", default as 1 then set to 0 if we end up with a good calulation?? may not need it as we draw here
 818+ C77F CD F0 C4     SunUpdateAndRender:     call    SunApplyMyRollAndPitch
 819+ C782 3A 18 C0     .CheckDrawable:         ld      a,(SBnKzsgn)
 820+ C785                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 48,  SunUpdateCompass ; at a distance over 48 its too far away
 820+ C785 FE 30       >                        cp     48
 820+ C787 D2 66 C7    >                        jp		nc,SunUpdateCompass
 821+ C78A 21 17 C0                             ld      hl,SBnKzhi                  ; if the two high bytes are zero then its too close
 822+ C78D B6                                   or      (hl)
 823+ C78E                                      JumpIfAIsZero       SunUpdateCompass
 823+ C78E A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 823+ C78F CA 66 C7    >                        jp	    z, SunUpdateCompass
 824+ C792 3A 12 C0     .calculateX:            ld      a,(SBnKxsgn)
 825+ C795 2A 10 C0                             ld      hl,(SBnKxlo)
 826+ C798 CD 04 C7                             call    SunProcessVertex            ; now returns carry set for failure
 827+ C79B 22 19 C0                             ld      (SunCompassX),hl
 828+ C79E D8                                   ret     c
 829+ C79F 1E 80        .calculatedX:           ld      e,ScreenCenterX
 830+ C7A1 16 00                                ld      d,0
 831+ C7A3                                      ClearCarryFlag
 831+ C7A3 B7          >                        or a
 832+ C7A4 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de
 833+ C7A6                                      ;call    HL2cEquHLSgnPlusAusgn       ; correct to center of screen
 834+ C7A6 22 EF C5                             ld      (SunScrnX),hl               ; save projected X Position, 2's compliment
 835+ C7A9 3A 15 C0     .calculateY:            ld      a,(SBnKysgn)
 836+ C7AC 2A 13 C0                             ld      hl,(SBnKylo)
 837+ C7AF CD 04 C7                             call    SunProcessVertex            ; now returns carry set for failure
 838+ C7B2 22 1B C0                             ld      (SunCompassY),hl
 839+ C7B5 D8                                   ret     c
 840+ C7B6 1E 60        .calculatedY:           ld      e,ScreenCenterY
 841+ C7B8 16 00                                ld      d,0
 842+ C7BA EB                                   ex      de,hl
 843+ C7BB                                      ClearCarryFlag
 843+ C7BB B7          >                        or a
 844+ C7BC ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 845+ C7BE                                      ;call    HL2cEquHLSgnPlusAusgn       ; correct to center of screen
 846+ C7BE 22 F1 C5                             ld      (SunScrnY),hl               ; save projected Y Position, 2's compliment
 847+ C7C1              ; .........................................................................................................................
 848+ C7C1 CD 49 C7                             call    SunCalculateRadius
 849+ C7C4              ; .........................................................................................................................
 850+ C7C4 2A EF C5     .CheckIfSunOnScreen:    ld      hl,(SunScrnX)               ; get x pixel position
 851+ C7C7 FD 26 00                             ld      iyh,0                       ; iyh holds draw status, 0= OK
 852+ C7CA 16 00                                ld      d,0                         ; e still holds radius
 853+ C7CC 7C                                   ld      a,h
 854+ C7CD                                      JumpOnLeadSignSet   h,.CheckXNegative
 854+ C7CD 7C          >                        ld      a,h
 854+ C7CE E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 854+ C7D0 C2 E6 C7    >                        jp      nz,.CheckXNegative
 855+ C7D3 7C           .CheckXPositive:        ld      a,h
 856+ C7D4                                      JumpIfAIsZero   .XOnScreen          ; if high byte of h is not zero its definitly on screen
 856+ C7D4 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 856+ C7D5 CA EF C7    >                        jp	    z, .XOnScreen
 857+ C7D8 16 00                                ld      d,0                         ; de = radius
 858+ C7DA                                      ClearCarryFlag
 858+ C7DA B7          >                        or a
 859+ C7DB ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 860+ C7DD FA EF C7                             jp      m   ,.XOnScreen             ; if result was negative then it spans screen
 861+ C7E0 7C                                   ld      a,h
 862+ C7E1                                      JumpIfAIsZero   .XOnScreen          ; if high byte of h is not zero then its partially on screen at least
 862+ C7E1 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 862+ C7E2 CA EF C7    >                        jp	    z, .XOnScreen
 863+ C7E5 C9                                   ret                                 ; None of the X coordinates are on screen
 864+ C7E6 16 00        .CheckXNegative:        ld      d,0                         ; de = radius
 865+ C7E8                                      ClearCarryFlag
 865+ C7E8 B7          >                        or a
 866+ C7E9 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                       ; so we have hl - de
 867+ C7EB F2 EF C7                             jp      p,.XOnScreen                ; if result was positive then it spans screen so we are good
 868+ C7EE C9                                   ret                                 ; else x is totally off the left side of the screen
 869+ C7EF              ; .........................................................................................................................
 870+ C7EF 2A F1 C5     .XOnScreen:             ld      hl,(SunScrnY)               ; now Check Y coordinate
 871+ C7F2                                      JumpOnLeadSignSet   h,.CheckYNegative
 871+ C7F2 7C          >                        ld      a,h
 871+ C7F3 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 871+ C7F5 C2 16 C8    >                        jp      nz,.CheckYNegative
 872+ C7F8 7C           .CheckYPositive:        ld      a,h
 873+ C7F9                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero   .PosYCheck2
 873+ C7F9 A7          >                        and     a
 873+ C7FA C2 03 C8    >                        jp	    nz,.PosYCheck2
 874+ C7FD 7D                                   ld      a,l
 875+ C7FE E6 80                                and     %10000000
 876+ C800 CA 1F C8                             jp      z,YOnScreen                ; at least 1 row is on screen as > 128
 877+ C803 16 00        .PosYCheck2:            ld      d,0                         ; de = radius
 878+ C805                                      ClearCarryFlag
 878+ C805 B7          >                        or a
 879+ C806 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 880+ C808 FA 1F C8                             jp      m,YOnScreen                ; so if its -ve then it spans screen
 881+ C80B 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; if h > 0 then off screen so did not span
 882+ C80C                                      ReturnIfANotZero                    ; .
 882+ C80C A7          >                        and     a
 882+ C80D C0          >                        ret     nz
 883+ C80E 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; if l > 128 then off screen so did not span
 884+ C80F E6 80                                and     %10000000                   ; .
 885+ C811                                      ReturnIfANotZero                    ; .
 885+ C811 A7          >                        and     a
 885+ C812 C0          >                        ret     nz
 886+ C813 C3 1F C8                             jp      YOnScreen                  ; so Y at least spans
 887+ C816 16 00        .CheckYNegative:        ld      d,0                         ; de = radius
 888+ C818                                      ClearCarryFlag
 888+ C818 B7          >                        or a
 889+ C819 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                       ; so we have hl - de
 890+ C81B F2 1F C8                             jp      p,YOnScreen                ; if result was positive then it spans screen so we are good
 891+ C81E C9                                   ret                                 ; else never gets above 0 so return
 892+ C81F              ; .........................................................................................................................
 893+ C81F 21 91 C0     YOnScreen:             ld      hl,SBnKLineArray            ; we load start and end as 0
 894+ C822 11 00 01                             ld		de, SunLineArraySize        ; just if we get a 0,0 genuine we will not plot it
 895+ C825 3E 00                                ld		a,0
 896+ C827 CD F0 7D                             call	memfill_dma
 897+ C82A              ; .........................................................................................................................
 898+ C82A 11 00 00     .SetRaggedEdgeMax:      ld      de,0
 899+ C82D 3A F3 C5                             ld      a,(SunRadius)               ; get readius
 900+ C830 FE 60                                cp      96                          ; if > 96 then roll carry flag into e
 901+ C832                                      FlipCarryFlag
 901+ C832 3F          >                        ccf
 902+ C833 CB 13                                rl      e                           ; if > 40 then roll carry flag into e
 903+ C835 FE 28                                cp      40
 904+ C837                                      FlipCarryFlag
 904+ C837 3F          >                        ccf
 905+ C838 CB 13                                rl      e
 906+ C83A FE 10                                cp      16                          ; if > 16 then roll carry flag into e
 907+ C83C                                      FlipCarryFlag
 907+ C83C 3F          >                        ccf
 908+ C83D CB 13                                rl     e
 909+ C83F 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; a = ragged size from %00000111 to %00000000
 910+ C840 32 EC C5                             ld      (RaggedSize),a
 911+ C843              ; .........................................................................................................................
 912+ C843 21 91 C0     .SkipSetK:              ld      hl,SBnKLineArray            ; prep line array details ready for filling
 913+ C846 22 91 C1                             ld      (LineArrayPtr),hl
 914+ C849 AF                                   xor     a
 915+ C84A 32 EB C5                             ld      (LineCount),a
 916+ C84D              ; .........................................................................................................................
 917+ C84D 2A F1 C5     .GetMinY:               ld      hl,(SunScrnY)               ; now calculate start Y position
 918+ C850 3A F3 C5                             ld      a,(SunRadius)
 919+ C853 5F                                   ld      e,a
 920+ C854 16 00                                ld      d,0
 921+ C856                                      ClearCarryFlag
 921+ C856 B7          >                        or a
 922+ C857 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 923+ C859 F2 5F C8                             jp      p,.DoneMinY
 924+ C85C 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0                        ; if its negative then we start with 0 as it can only go up screen after radius
 925+ C85F              .DoneMinY:              ReturnIfRegNotZero h                ; if h > 0 then off the screen
 925+ C85F 7C          >                        ld      a, h
 925+ C860 A7          >                        and     a
 925+ C861 C0          >                        ret     nz
 926+ C862 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; check if l > 127
 927+ C863 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                ; .
 928+ C865 C0                                   ret     nz                          ; if bit is set then > 128
 929+ C866 7D           .SetMinY:               ld      a,l
 930+ C867 32 ED C5                             ld      (MinYOffset),a              ; so now we have Y top of screen
 931+ C86A 2A F1 C5     .GetMaxY:               ld      hl,(SunScrnY)               ; get hl = Y + radius, note if we got here then this can never be a negative result but can go from -ve hl to +ve result
 932+ C86D 3A F3 C5                             ld      a,(SunRadius)               ; hl = hl + radius
 933+ C870 16 00                                ld      d,0                         ; .
 934+ C872 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; .
 935+ C873                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; .
 935+ C873 B7          >                        or a
 936+ C874 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                       ; .
 937+ C876 7C                                   ld      a,h
 938+ C877 A7                                   and     a
 939+ C878 28 06                                jr      z,.YHiOK
 940+ C87A 21 7F 00     .YHiGTE127:             ld      hl,127
 941+ C87D C3 89 C8                             jp      .SetMaxY
 942+ C880 7D           .YHiOK:                 ld      a,l                         ; clamp at 127
 943+ C881 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                ; .
 944+ C883 CA 89 C8                             jp      z,.SetMaxY
 945+ C886 21 7F 00                             ld      hl,127
 946+ C889 7D           .SetMaxY                ld      a,l
 947+ C88A 32 EE C5                             ld      (MaxYOffSet),a              ; so now we have min and max Y coordinates and SunScrnX & Y holds center
 948+ C88D CD 94 C8                             call    SunDrawCircle
 949+ C890 CD D9 C1                             call    SunDraw
 950+ C893 C9                                   ret
 951+ C894                                      ; b8 04 00 02 00 00 60 01 00 gives a 0.5 so we have the cal wrong as its +-1 so should be * result of divide by 128
 952+ C894              ;.. Now we caluclate the circle of the star
 953+ C894              ;.. its from MinY down the screen to MaxY center ProjX,ProjY.
 954+ C894              ;.. We can use the circle draw logic gtom Bressenham's algorithm
 955+ C894              ; so now there are the following conditions to consider
 956+ C894              ; y min = 0   y center is negative radius <= ABS (Y center)             => Don't draw
 957+ C894              ; y min = 0   y center is negative radius > ABS (Y center)+1            => Draw bottom half only
 958+ C894              ; y max = 127 y center is > 127    radius <= y center - 127             => Don't draw
 959+ C894              ; y max = 127 y center is > 127    radius > y center - 127              => Draw top half only
 960+ C894              ; y min >= 0  y center > y min     we don't need to worry about radius  => Draw both halves
 961+ C894              ; x center + radius < 0                                                 => Don't draw
 962+ C894              ; x center - radius > 255                                               => Don't draw
 963+ C894              ; we won't consider x more here as the driver is the y coordinate but we will check if x is vaiable
 964+ C894              ; x point = max (x point, 0)   on left
 965+ C894              ; x point = min (x point, 255) on right
 966+ C894
 967+ C894              SetIYPlusOffset:        MACRO   reg
 968+ C894 ~                                    push    hl,,iy                          ; save hl, then hl = iy
 969+ C894 ~                                    pop     hl                              ;
 970+ C894 ~                                    ld      a,reg
 971+ C894 ~                                    add     hl,a
 972+ C894 ~                                    add     hl,a
 973+ C894 ~                                    push    hl
 974+ C894 ~                                    pop     iy
 975+ C894 ~                                    pop     hl
 976+ C894                                      ENDM
 977+ C894
 978+ C894              SetIYMinusOffset:       MACRO   reg
 979+ C894 ~                                    push    de,,hl,,iy                      ; save hl, then hl = iy
 980+ C894 ~                                    pop     hl                              ;
 981+ C894 ~                                    ld      a,reg
 982+ C894 ~                                    add     a,a
 983+ C894 ~                                    ld      e,a
 984+ C894 ~                                    ld      d,0
 985+ C894 ~                                    ClearCarryFlag
 986+ C894 ~                                    sbc     hl,de
 987+ C894 ~                                    push    hl
 988+ C894 ~                                    pop     iy
 989+ C894 ~                                    pop     de,,hl
 990+ C894                                      ENDM
 991+ C894
 992+ C894
 993+ C894              ;;;-SunDrawCircle:          ld      a,(SunRadius)

1027+ C894              SunDrawCircle
1028+ C894                                      ; ** BNOTE Ptuichj abnd roll has a bug as piitch increases z axis value
1029+ C894              .PrepCircleData:       ; ld      ixl,0
1030+ C894                                     ; ld		(.Plot1+1),bc			        ; save origin into DE reg in code
1031+ C894 3A F3 C5                             ld      a,(SunRadius)
1032+ C897 DD 67                                ld		ixh,a							; ixh = radius
1033+ C899 DD 2E 00                             ld		ixl,0						    ; ixl = delta (y)
1034+ C89C 26 00        .calcd:	                ld		h,0                             ; de = radius * 2
1035+ C89E 6F                                   ld		l,a                             ; .
1036+ C89F 29                                   add		hl,hl							; .
1037+ C8A0 EB                                   ex		de,hl							; .
1038+ C8A1 21 03 00                             ld		hl,3                            ; hl = 3 - (r * 2)
1039+ C8A4 A7                                   and		a                               ; .
1040+ C8A5 ED 52                                sbc		hl,de							; .
1041+ C8A7 44                                   ld		b,h                             ; bc = 3 - (r * 2) : d = 3 - 2r
1042+ C8A8 4D                                   ld		c,l								; .
1043+ C8A9 21 01 00     .calcdelta:             ld		hl,1                            ; set hl to 1
1044+ C8AC 16 00                                ld		d,0                             ; de = ixl
1045+ C8AE DD 5D                                ld		e,ixl                           ;
1046+ C8B0                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;
1046+ C8B0 B7          >                        or a
1047+ C8B1 ED 52                                sbc		hl,de                           ; hl = 1 - ixl
1048+ C8B3 11 01 00     .Setde1:                ld		de,1                            ; del = 1
1049+ C8B6 DD 7C        .CircleLoop:            ld		a,ixh                           ; if x = y then exit
1050+ C8B8 DD BD                                cp		ixl                             ;
1051+ C8BA D8                                   ret		c                               ;
1052+ C8BB D9           .ProcessLoop:	        exx                                     ; save out registers
1053+ C8BC              ; Process CY+Y CX+X & CY+Y CX-X..................................
1054+ C8BC 2A F1 C5     .Plot1:                 ld      hl, (SunScrnY)
1055+ C8BF DD 7C        .Get1YRow:              ld      a,ixh
1056+ C8C1 ED 31                                add     hl,a                            ; Check to see if CY+Y (note is add hl ,a usginedf only??)
1057+ C8C3              .Check1YRowOnScreen:    CheckRowHLOnScreen .NoTopPixelPair
1057+ C8C3 7C          >                        ld      a,h                             ; is h byte set, i.e > 256 or < 0
1057+ C8C4 A7          >                        and     a                               ; .
1057+ C8C5 20 26       >                        jr      nz,.NoTopPixelPair                   ; h <> 0 so fails (covers <0 and > 255
1057+ C8C7 7D          >                        ld      a,l                             ; l bit 7 0?
1057+ C8C8 E6 80       >                        and     Bit7Only                        ; covers l > 127 (screen draw area is 0 to 192 / 3 * 2 (128)
1057+ C8CA 20 21       >                        jr      nz,.NoTopPixelPair                   ;
1058+ C8CC              .Write1YCoord:          SetIYPlusOffset ixh                     ; IY = IY + ixh
1058+ C8CC E5 FD E5    >                        push    hl,,iy                          ; save hl, then hl = iy
1058+ C8CF E1          >                        pop     hl                              ;
1058+ C8D0 DD 7C       >                        ld      a,ixh
1058+ C8D2 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1058+ C8D4 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1058+ C8D6 E5          >                        push    hl
1058+ C8D7 FD E1       >                        pop     iy
1058+ C8D9 E1          >                        pop     hl
1059+ C8DA                                      IYEquRowN l                             ; IY = SBnkLineArray + (2 * l) - set up iy as target address
1059+ C8DA 7D          >                        ld      a,l
1059+ C8DB 21 91 C0    >                        ld      hl,SBnKLineArray
1059+ C8DE ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1059+ C8E0 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1059+ C8E2 E5          >                        push    hl
1059+ C8E3 FD E1       >                        pop     iy
1060+ C8E5 DD 7D                                ld      a,ixl
1061+ C8E7 CD BA C9                             call    ProcessXRowA
1062+ C8EA C3 ED C8                             jp      .Plot2
1063+ C8ED              .NoTopPixelPair:        ;break
1064+ C8ED              ; Process CY-Y CX+X & CY-Y CX-X..................................
1065+ C8ED 2A F1 C5     .Plot2:                 ld      hl, (SunScrnY)
1066+ C8F0 16 00        .Get2YRow:              ld      d,0
1067+ C8F2 DD 5C                                ld      e,ixh
1068+ C8F4                                      ClearCarryFlag
1068+ C8F4 B7          >                        or a
1069+ C8F5 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
1070+ C8F7              .Check2YRowOnScreen:    CheckRowHLOnScreen .NoBottomPixelPair
1070+ C8F7 7C          >                        ld      a,h                             ; is h byte set, i.e > 256 or < 0
1070+ C8F8 A7          >                        and     a                               ; .
1070+ C8F9 20 2B       >                        jr      nz,.NoBottomPixelPair                   ; h <> 0 so fails (covers <0 and > 255
1070+ C8FB 7D          >                        ld      a,l                             ; l bit 7 0?
1070+ C8FC E6 80       >                        and     Bit7Only                        ; covers l > 127 (screen draw area is 0 to 192 / 3 * 2 (128)
1070+ C8FE 20 26       >                        jr      nz,.NoBottomPixelPair                   ;
1071+ C900                                      SetIYMinusOffset ixh
1071+ C900 D5 E5 FD E5 >                        push    de,,hl,,iy                      ; save hl, then hl = iy
1071+ C904 E1          >                        pop     hl                              ;
1071+ C905 DD 7C       >                        ld      a,ixh
1071+ C907 87          >                        add     a,a
1071+ C908 5F          >                        ld      e,a
1071+ C909 16 00       >                        ld      d,0
1071+ C90B             >                        ClearCarryFlag
1071+ C90B B7          >                        or a
1071+ C90C ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
1071+ C90E E5          >                        push    hl
1071+ C90F FD E1       >                        pop     iy
1071+ C911 E1 D1       >                        pop     de,,hl
1072+ C913              .Write2YCoord:          IYEquRowN l                             ; set up iy as target address
1072+ C913 7D          >                        ld      a,l
1072+ C914 21 91 C0    >                        ld      hl,SBnKLineArray
1072+ C917 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1072+ C919 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1072+ C91B E5          >                        push    hl
1072+ C91C FD E1       >                        pop     iy
1073+ C91E DD 7D                                ld      a,ixl
1074+ C920 CD BA C9                             call    ProcessXRowA
1075+ C923 C3 26 C9                             jp      .Plot3
1076+ C926              .NoBottomPixelPair:     ;break
1077+ C926              ; Process CY+X CX+Y & CY+X CX-Y..................................
1078+ C926 2A F1 C5     .Plot3:                 ld      hl, (SunScrnY)
1079+ C929 DD 7D        .Get3YRow:              ld      a,ixl
1080+ C92B ED 31                                add     hl,a                            ; Check to see if CY+Y
1081+ C92D              .Check3YRowOnScreen:    CheckRowHLOnScreen .NoTop3PixelPair
1081+ C92D 7C          >                        ld      a,h                             ; is h byte set, i.e > 256 or < 0
1081+ C92E A7          >                        and     a                               ; .
1081+ C92F 20 26       >                        jr      nz,.NoTop3PixelPair                   ; h <> 0 so fails (covers <0 and > 255

1081+ C932 E6 80       >                        and     Bit7Only                        ; covers l > 127 (screen draw area is 0 to 192 / 3 * 2 (128)
1081+ C934 20 21       >                        jr      nz,.NoTop3PixelPair                   ;
1082+ C936                                      SetIYPlusOffset ixl
1082+ C936 E5 FD E5    >                        push    hl,,iy                          ; save hl, then hl = iy
1082+ C939 E1          >                        pop     hl                              ;
1082+ C93A DD 7D       >                        ld      a,ixl

1082+ C93E ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1082+ C940 E5          >                        push    hl
1082+ C941 FD E1       >                        pop     iy
1082+ C943 E1          >                        pop     hl

1083+ C944 7D          >                        ld      a,l
1083+ C945 21 91 C0    >                        ld      hl,SBnKLineArray

1088+ C957              ; Process CY-X CX+Y & CY-X CX-Y..................................
1089+ C957 2A F1 C5     .Plot4:                 ld      hl, (SunScrnY)
1090+ C95A 16 00        .Get4YRow:              ld      d,0
1091+ C95C DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl
1092+ C95E                                      ClearCarryFlag
1092+ C95E B7          >                        or a
1093+ C95F ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
1094+ C961              .Check4YRowOnScreen:    CheckRowHLOnScreen .NoBottom4PixelPair
1094+ C961 7C          >                        ld      a,h                             ; is h byte set, i.e > 256 or < 0
1094+ C962 A7          >                        and     a                               ; .

1094+ C968 20 23       >                        jr      nz,.NoBottom4PixelPair                   ;
1095+ C96A                                      SetIYMinusOffset ixl

1095+ C96E E1          >                        pop     hl                              ;

1095+ C971 87          >                        add     a,a
1095+ C972 5F          >                        ld      e,a
1095+ C973 16 00       >                        ld      d,0

1095+ C976 ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
1095+ C978 E5          >                        push    hl
1095+ C979 FD E1       >                        pop     iy

1096+ C97D 7D          >                        ld      a,l
1096+ C97E 21 91 C0    >                        ld      hl,SBnKLineArray

1096+ C983 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1096+ C985 E5          >                        push    hl
1096+ C986 FD E1       >                        pop     iy
1097+ C988 DD 7C                                ld      a,ixh
1098+ C98A CD BA C9                             call    ProcessXRowA
1099+ C98D              .NoBottom4PixelPair:
1100+ C98D              ; Completed one iteration........................................
1101+ C98D D9                                   exx
1102+ C98E CB 7C        .IncrementCircle:	    bit     7,h				; Check for Hl<=0
1103+ C990 28 03                                jr z,   .draw_circle_1
1104+ C992 19                                   add hl,de			; Delta=Delta+D1
1105+ C993 18 05                                jr      .draw_circle_2		;
1106+ C995 09           .draw_circle_1:		    add     hl,bc			; Delta=Delta+D2
1107+ C996 03                                   inc     bc
1108+ C997 03                                   inc     bc				; D2=D2+2
1109+ C998 DD 25                                dec     ixh				; Y=Y-1
1110+ C99A 03           .draw_circle_2:		    inc bc				    ; D2=D2+2
1111+ C99B 03                                   inc bc
1112+ C99C 13                                   inc de				    ; D1=D1+2
1113+ C99D 13                                   inc de
1114+ C99E DD 2C                                inc ixl				    ; X=X+1
1115+ C9A0 C3 B6 C8                             jp      .CircleLoop
1116+ C9A3 2A EF C5     SunCircleSinglePixel:     ld      hl,(SunScrnX)
1117+ C9A6 7C                                   ld      a,h
1118+ C9A7 A7                                   and     a
1119+ C9A8 C0                                   ret     nz                  ; if the high byte is set then no pixel
1120+ C9A9 4D                                   ld      c,l
1121+ C9AA 2A F1 C5                             ld      hl,(SunScrnY)
1122+ C9AD 7C                                   ld      a,h
1123+ C9AE A7                                   and     a
1124+ C9AF C0                                   ret     nz                  ; if the high byte is set then no pixel
1125+ C9B0 7D                                   ld      a,l
1126+ C9B1 CB 7F                                bit     7,a
1127+ C9B3 C0                                   ret     nz                  ; if l > 127 then no pixel
1128+ C9B4 47                                   ld      b,a
1129+ C9B5 7B                                   ld		a,e
1130+ C9B6 CD 08 E3                             call	l2_plot_pixel_y_test
1131+ C9B9 C9                                   ret
1132+ C9BA
1133+ C9BA              ProcessXRowA:           ;break
1134+ C9BA 2A EF C5                             ld      hl,(SunScrnX)                    ; get X Center
1135+ C9BD F5                                   push    af                              ; save A (curent offset +/- value
1136+ C9BE ED 31                                add     hl,a                            ; Hl = HL + offset
1137+ C9C0 7C                                   ld      a,h                             ; is HL negative?, if so then set C to 0
1138+ C9C1 CB 7F                                bit     7,a                             ;
1139+ C9C3 20 14                                jr      nz,.XCoordNegative              ; We can have this for non X + Radius i.e. the equater
1140+ C9C5 A7                                   and     a                               ; if H <> 0? (why by here must be +ve), set c to $FF
1141+ C9C6 20 16                                jr      nz,.XCoordMaxed                 ; .
1142+ C9C8 4D                                   ld      c,l                             ; else set c to l and do the -ve offset
1143+ C9C9 C5           .AddFuzz:               push    bc
1144+ C9CA CD 0C 85                             call    doRandom                        ; c = c - random AND ragged Size
1145+ C9CD C1                                   pop     bc
1146+ C9CE 21 EC C5                             ld      hl,RaggedSize                   ;
1147+ C9D1 A6                                   and     (hl)                            ;
1148+ C9D2 81                                   add     c                               ;
1149+ C9D3 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ;
1150+ C9D4 38 08                                jr      c,.XCoordMaxed                  ; has fuzz caused a carry, if so > 255 to make 255
1151+ C9D6 C3 E0 C9                             jp      .ProcessSubtract                ;
1152+ C9D9 0E 00        .XCoordNegative:        ld      c,0                             ; if it was negative then 0
1153+ C9DB C3 E0 C9                             jp      .ProcessSubtract
1154+ C9DE 0E FF        .XCoordMaxed:           ld      c,255                           ; if it was +ve then 255
1155+ C9E0 F1           .ProcessSubtract:       pop     af                              ; get offset back
1156+ C9E1 5F                                   ld      e,a                             ; but goes into DE as its a subtract
1157+ C9E2 16 00                                ld      d,0
1158+ C9E4 2A EF C5                             ld      hl,(SunScrnX)                    ; so do subtract
1159+ C9E7                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ; .
1159+ C9E7 B7          >                        or a
1160+ C9E8 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ; .
1161+ C9EA FA 07 CA                             jp      m,.XCoordLeftNegative           ; again test for min max
1162+ C9ED E5 C5        .AddFuzzSubtract:       push    hl,,bc
1163+ C9EF CD 0C 85                             call    doRandom                        ; c = c - random AND ragged Size
1164+ C9F2 C1                                   pop     bc
1165+ C9F3 21 EC C5                             ld      hl,RaggedSize                   ;
1166+ C9F6 A6                                   and     (hl)                            ;
1167+ C9F7 5F                                   ld      e,a
1168+ C9F8 E1                                   pop     hl
1169+ C9F9 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
1170+ C9FB FA 07 CA                             jp      m,.XCoordLeftNegative           ; again test for min max
1171+ C9FE 7C                                   ld      a,h
1172+ C9FF A7                                   and     a
1173+ CA00 C2 0C CA                             jp      nz,.XCordLeftMaxed
1174+ CA03 45                                   ld      b,l
1175+ CA04 C3 0E CA                             jp      .CompletedXCoords
1176+ CA07 06 00        .XCoordLeftNegative:    ld      b,0
1177+ CA09 C3 0E CA                             jp      .CompletedXCoords
1178+ CA0C 06 FF        .XCordLeftMaxed:        ld      b,255
1179+ CA0E 78           .CompletedXCoords:      ld      a,b
1180+ CA0F FD 77 00     .RowSaveIY1             ld      (iy+0),a                        ; iy holds current line array index
1181+ CA12 79                                   ld      a,c
1182+ CA13 FD 77 01     .RowSaveIY3             ld      (iy+1),a
1183+ CA16 C9                                   ret

   1+ C000
   2+ C000              ;- DEBUG CODE
   3+ C000                                      IFDEF BLINEDEBUG
   4+ C000 ~            TestBLINE:              ld  a,$FF
   5+ C000 ~                                    ld  (P_BnKFlag),a
   6+ C000 ~                                    ld  a,5
   7+ C000 ~                                    ld  (P_BnKSTP),a
   8+ C000 ~                                    ZeroA
   9+ C000 ~                                    ld  (P_BnKCNT),a
  10+ C000 ~            .DebugLoop:             ld  ix,(DataPointer)
  11+ C000 ~                                    ld  a,(ix+0)
  12+ C000 ~                                    ld  l,a
  13+ C000 ~                                    ld  a,(ix+1)
  14+ C000 ~                                    ld  h,a
  15+ C000 ~                                    ld  (P_NewXPos),hl
  16+ C000 ~                                    ld  a,(ix+2)
  17+ C000 ~                                    ld  l,a
  18+ C000 ~                                    ld  a,(ix+3)
  19+ C000 ~                                    ld  h,a
  20+ C000 ~                                    ld  (P_NewYPos),hl
  21+ C000 ~                                    call    BLINE
  22+ C000 ~                                    ld      a,(DataPointCounter)
  23+ C000 ~                                    inc     a
  24+ C000 ~                                    ld      hl,DataPointSize
  25+ C000 ~                                    cp      (hl)
  26+ C000 ~                                    ret     z
  27+ C000 ~                                    ld      (DataPointCounter),a
  28+ C000 ~                                    ld      hl,(DataPointer)
  29+ C000 ~                                    ld      a,4
  30+ C000 ~                                    add     hl,a
  31+ C000 ~                                    ld      (DataPointer),hl
  32+ C000 ~                                    jp      .DebugLoop
  33+ C000 ~
  34+ C000 ~            DataPoints:             DW  10,10, 20,60, 30,20, 40,50, 100,90, 150, 30
  35+ C000 ~            DataPointSize           DB  6
  36+ C000 ~            DataPointCounter        DB  0
  37+ C000 ~            DataPointer:            DW  DataPoints
  38+ C000                                      ENDIF

  56+ C000              ; In  flight ship data tables
  57+ C000              ; In  flight ship data tables
  58+ C000              ; In  flight ship data tables
  59+ C000              ; There can be upto &12 objects in flight.
  60+ C000              ; To avoid hassle of memory heap managment, the free list
  61+ C000              ; will correspond to a memory bank offset so data will be held in
  62+ C000              ; 1 bank per universe object. Its a waste of a lot of memory but really
  63+ C000              ; 1 bank per universe object. Its a waste of a lot of memory but really
  64+ C000              ; simple that way. Each bank will be 8K and swapped on 8K slot 7 $E000 to $FFFF
  65+ C000              ; This means each gets its own line list, inwork etc
  66+ C000
  67+ C000              ; "Runtime Ship Data paged into in Bank 7"
  68+ C000              ;                      0123456789ABCDEF
  69+ C000 50 6C 61 6E  StartOfPlanet:     DB "Planet Data....."

  69+ C008 61 74 61 2E
  69+ C00C 2E 2E 2E 2E

  88+ C0C4             >    IFDEF MERIDANLINEDEBUG

  88+ C0C6             >
  88+ C0C6             >; Post clipping the results are now 8 bit
  88+ C0C6 00          >P_BnKVisibility              DB  0               ; replaces general purpose xx4 in renderingW
  88+ C0C7 00          >P_BnKProjectedY              DB  0

  88+ C0C9 00 00 00... >P_XX15Save                   DS  8
  88+ C0D1 00 00 00... >P_XX15Save2                  DS  8
  88+ C0D9 00          >P_Radius                     DB  0

  88+ C0DA             >; held as 16 bit values pre clipping

  88+ C0DC 00 00       >P_PrevYPos                   DW 0

  88+ C0E0 00 00       >P_NewYPos                    DW 0
