 105+ C395 B6          >                            or      (hl)                             ; .
 105+ C396 F2 60 C3    >                            jp      p, P_LL109_6502           ; BPL LL109              \ jump to LL109 to return from the subroutine with the C flag set, as the line doesn't fit on-screen
 105+ C399             >; for this bit, while z80 uses carry the opposite way to 6502, 6502 uses borrow, in effect inverting the flip
 105+ C399             >;NOTEFOUND A PATH WHERE IT DOES NOT DO THIS CHECK e.g. 90 B2 8D A2
 105+ C399 3A E7 C0    >P_LL83_DEBUG:          ld      a,(P_XX1532)              ; LDA XX15+2             \ If y1_lo < y-coordinate of screen bottom, clear the C
 105+ C39C FE 80       >                            cp      128                     ; CMP #Y*2               \ flag, otherwise set it (NOTE FLIPPED IN z80)
 105+ C39E 3A E8 C0    >                            ld      a,(P_XX1532+1)            ; LDA XX15+3             \ Set XX12+2 = y1_hi - (1 - C), so:
 105+ C3A1 DE 00       >                            sbc     0                       ; SBC #0                 \ .
 105+ C3A3 32 10 C1    >                            ld      (P_XX12p2),a              ; STA XX12+2             \  * Set XX12+2 = y1_hi - 1 if y1_lo is on-screen * Set XX12+2 = y1_hi  otherwise We do this subtraction because we are only interested
 105+ C3A6 3A EB C0    >                            ld      a,(P_XX1576)              ; LDA XX12               \ If y2_lo < y-coordinate of screen bottom, clear the C
 105+ C3A9 FE 80       >                            cp      128                     ; CMP #Y*2               \ flag, otherwise set it
 105+ C3AB 3A EC C0    >                            ld      a,(P_XX1576+1)            ; LDA XX12+1             \ Set XX12+2 = y2_hi - (1 - C), so:
 105+ C3AE DE 00       >                            sbc     0                       ; SBC #0                   * Set XX12+1 = y2_hi - 1 if y2_lo is on-screen  * Set XX12+1 = y2_hi     otherwise
 105+ C3B0 21 10 C1    >                            ld      hl,P_XX12p2               ; ORA XX12+2             \ If neither XX12+1 or XX12+2 have bit 7 set, jump to
 105+ C3B3 B6          >                            or      (hl)                    ; .
 105+ C3B4 F2 60 C3    >                            jp      p,P_LL109_6502            ; BPL LL109              \ LL109 to return from the subroutine with the C flag set, as the line doesn't fit on-screen
 105+ C3B7             >;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 105+ C3B7             >;-- LL145 (Part 3 of 4) Summary: Clip line: Calculate the line's gradient
 105+ C3B7 3A B1 EF    >P_LL115_6502:        ld      a,(Yreg)                ; TYA                    \ Store Y on the stack so we can preserve it through the call to this routine
 105+ C3BA F5          >                            push    af                      ; PHA            SP+1    \ call to this subroutine
 105+ C3BB 2A E9 C0    >                            ld      hl,(P_XX15X2lo)             ; LDA XX15+4             \ Set XX12+2 = x2_lo - x1_lo
 105+ C3BE ED 5B E5 C0 >                            ld      de,(P_XX15X1lo)             ; LDA XX15+5             \ Set XX12+3 = x2_hi - x1_hi
 105+ C3C2             >                            ClearCarryFlag                  ; SBC XX15+1
 105+ C3C2 B7          >                        or a
 105+ C3C3 ED 52       >                            sbc     hl,de                   ; .
 105+ C3C5 22 FE F5    >                            ld      (delta_x),hl            ; .
 105+ C3C8 2A EB C0    >                            ld      hl,(P_XX15Y2lo)             ; LDA XX12               \ Set XX12+4 = y2_lo - y1_lo
 105+ C3CB ED 5B E7 C0 >                            ld      de,(P_XX15Y1lo)             ;
 105+ C3CF             >                            ClearCarryFlag                  ; SBC XX15+2
 105+ C3CF B7          >                        or a
 105+ C3D0 ED 52       >                            sbc     hl,de                   ; .
 105+ C3D2 22 00 F6    >                            ld      (delta_y),hl            ; .
 105+ C3D5             >; So we now have:  delta_x in XX12(3 2)  delta_y in XX12(5 4) where the delta is (x1, y1) - (x2, y2))
 105+ C3D5 3A 01 F6    >                            ld      a,(delta_y+1)           ; EOR XX12+3             \ Set S = the sign of delta_x * the sign of delta_y, so
 105+ C3D8 21 FF F5    >                            ld      hl,delta_x+1
 105+ C3DB AE          >                            xor     (hl)
 105+ C3DC 32 AF EF    >                            ld      (Svar),a                ; STA S                  \ if bit 7 of S is set, the deltas have different signs (perhaps we should do bit 7 mask ?????????
 105+ C3DF 2A 00 F6    >                            ld      hl,(delta_y)            ; LDA XX12+5             \ If delta_y_hi is positive, jump down to LL110 to skip
 105+ C3E2 7C          >                            ld      a,h
 105+ C3E3 A7          >                            and     a
 105+ C3E4 F2 F0 C3    >                            jp      p, P_LL110_6502  ; BPL LL110              \ the following
 105+ C3E7             >                            NegHL                           ; LDA #0                 \ Otherwise flip the sign of delta_y to make it
 105+ C3E7 AF          >                    xor a
 105+ C3E8 95          >                    sub l
 105+ C3E9 6F          >                    ld l,a
 105+ C3EA 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 105+ C3EB 94          >                    sub h
 105+ C3EC 67          >                    ld h,a
 105+ C3ED 22 00 F6    >                            ld      (delta_y),hl            ; positive, starting with the low bytes
 105+ C3F0 2A FE F5    >P_LL110_6502:        ld      hl,(delta_x)            ; LDA XX12+3             \ If delta_x_hi is positive, jump down to LL111 to skip
 105+ C3F3 7C          >                            ld      a,h                     ; BPL LL111              \ the following
 105+ C3F4 A7          >                            and     a                       ; .
 105+ C3F5 F2 01 C4    >                            jp      p,P_LL111_6502            ; .
 105+ C3F8             >                            NegHL                           ; SEC                    \ Otherwise flip the sign of delta_x to make it
 105+ C3F8 AF          >                    xor a
 105+ C3F9 95          >                    sub l
 105+ C3FA 6F          >                    ld l,a
 105+ C3FB 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 105+ C3FC 94          >                    sub h
 105+ C3FD 67          >                    ld h,a
 105+ C3FE 22 FE F5    >                            ld      (delta_x),hl            ; LDA #0                 \ positive, starting with the low bytes
 105+ C401             >;--  We now keep halving |delta_x| and |delta_y| until both of them have zero in their high bytes
 105+ C401 2A FE F5    >P_LL111_6502:        ld      hl,(delta_x)
 105+ C404 ED 5B 00 F6 >                            ld      de,(delta_y)
 105+ C408 7C          >                            ld      a,h                     ; TAX                    \ If |delta_x_hi| is non-zero, skip the following
 105+ C409 B2          >                            or      d                       ; BNE LL112
 105+ C40A CA 1F C4    >                            jp      z,P_LL113_6502            ; LDX XX12+5             \ If |delta_y_hi| = 0, jump down to LL113 (as both |delta_x_hi| and |delta_y_hi| are 0)
 105+ C40D             >P_LL112_6502:        ShiftHLRight1                   ; LSR A                  \ Halve the value of delta_x in (A XX12+2)
 105+ C40D CB 3C       >			   srl h
 105+ C40F CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 105+ C411             >                            ShiftDERight1                   ; LSR XX12+5             \ Halve the value of delta_y XX12(5 4)
 105+ C411 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 105+ C413 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 105+ C415 22 FE F5    >                            ld      (delta_x),hl
 105+ C418 ED 53 00 F6 >                            ld      (delta_y),de            ; write them back so we don't end up in an infinite loop
 105+ C41C C3 01 C4    >                            jp       P_LL111_6502                  ; JMP LL111              \ Loop back to LL111
 105+ C41F             >;-- By now, the high bytes of both |delta_x| and |delta_y| are zero
 105+ C41F             >P_LL113_6502:        ZeroA                           ; STX T                  \ We know that X = 0 as that's what we tested with a BEQ  above, so this sets T = 0
 105+ C41F AF          >                        xor a
 105+ C420 32 AC EF    >                            ld      (Tvar),a
 105+ C423 3A FE F5    >                            ld      a,(delta_x)             ; LDA XX12+2             \ If delta_x_lo < delta_y_lo, so our line is more
 105+ C426 21 00 F6    >                            ld      hl,delta_y              ; CMP XX12+4             \ vertical than horizontal, jump to LL114
 105+ C429 BE          >                            cp      (hl)
 105+ C42A DA 3C C4    >                            jp      c, P_LL114_6502  ; BCC LL114              ; if delta y > delta x then its a steep slope so we do 256*dy/dx
 105+ C42D             >;-- If we get here then our line is more horizontal than vertical, so it is a shallow slope
 105+ C42D 3A FE F5    >                            ld      a,(delta_x)             ; STA Q                  \ Set Q = delta_x_lo
 105+ C430 32 AD EF    >                            ld      (Qvar),a                ; .
 105+ C433 3A 00 F6    >                            ld      a,(delta_y)             ; LDA XX12+4             \ Set A = delta_y_lo
 105+ C436 CD 1A C1    >                            call    P_LL28_6502      ; JSR LL28               \ Call LL28 to calculate: R = 256 * A / Q = 256 * delta_y_lo / delta_x_lo
 105+ C439 C3 4D C4    >                            jp      P_LL116_6502     ; JMP LL116              \ Jump to LL116, as we now have the line's gradient in R
 105+ C43C             >;-- If we get here then our line is more vertical than horizontal, so it is a steep slope
 105+ C43C 3A 00 F6    >P_LL114_6502:        ld      a,(delta_y)             ; LDA XX12+4             \ Set Q = delta_y_lo
 105+ C43F 32 AD EF    >                            ld      (Qvar),a                ; STA Q
 105+ C442 3A FE F5    >                            ld      a,(delta_x)             ; LDA XX12+2             \ Set A = delta_x_lo
 105+ C445 CD 1A C1    >                            call    P_LL28_6502               ; JSR LL28               \ Call LL28 to calculate: R = 256 * A / Q = 256 * delta_x_lo / delta_y_lo
 105+ C448 3E FF       >                            ld      a,$FF                   ; DEC T                  \ T was set to 0 above, so this sets T = &FF when our
 105+ C44A 32 AC EF    >                            ld      (Tvar),a                ;                        \ line is steep
 105+ C44D             >;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 105+ C44D             >;--- LL116 This part sets things up to call the routine in LL188, which does the actual clipping.
 105+ C44D             >;--  If we get here, then R has been set to the gradient of the line (x1, y1) to(x2, y2), with T indicating the gradient of slope: * 0   = shallow slope (more horizontal than vertical)
 105+ C44D             >;--                                                                                                                                * &FF = steep slope (more vertical than horizontal)
 105+ C44D             >;-- XX13 has been set as follows: * 0   = (x1, y1) off-screen, (x2, y2) on-screen * 95(64)  = (x1, y1) on-screen,  (x2, y2) off-screen * 191(128) = (x1, y1) off-screen, (x2, y2) off-screen
 105+ C44D 3A AE EF    >P_LL116_6502:        ld      a,(Rvar)                ; LDA R                  \ Store the gradient in XX12+2
 105+ C450 32 10 C1    >                            ld      (P_XX12p2),a     ; STA XX12+2
 105+ C453 3A AF EF    >                            ld      a,(Svar)                ; LDA S                  \ Store the type of slope in XX12+3, bit 7 clear means
 105+ C456 32 11 C1    >                            ld      (P_XX12p3),a              ; STA XX12+3             \ top left to bottom right, bit 7 set means top right to bottom left
 105+ C459 3A F9 C0    >                            ld      a,( P_XX13)                ; LDA XX13               \ If XX13 = 0, skip the following instruction
 105+ C45C FE 00       >                            cp      0                       ; BEQ LL138
 105+ C45E CA 64 C4    >                            jp      z,P_LL138_6502            ; .
 105+ C461 F2 80 C4    >                            jp      p, P_LLX117_6502          ; If XX13 is positive, it must be 95 (64) as 128 would be negative). This means (x1, y1) is on-screen but (x2, y2) isn't, so we jump
 105+ C464             >;-- If we get here, XX13 = 0 or 191, so (x1, y1) is off-screen and needs clipping
 105+ C464 CD 90 C2    >P_LL138_6502:          call    P_LL118_6502              ; JSR LL118              \ Call LL118 to move (x1, y1) along the line onto the screen, i.e. clip the line at the (x1, y1) end
 105+ C467 3A F9 C0    >                            ld      a,( P_XX13)                ; LDA XX13               \ If XX13 = 0, i.e. (x2, y2) is on-screen, jump down to
 105+ C46A A7          >                            and     a
 105+ C46B F2 A3 C4    >                            jp      p,P_LL124_6502            ; BPL LL124              \ LL124 to return with a successfully clipped line
 105+ C46E             >;-- If we get here, XX13 = 191 (128) (both coordinates areoff-screen)
 105+ C46E 3A E6 C0    >P_LL117_6502:          ld      a,(P_XX1510+1)            ; LDA XX15+1             \ If either of x1_hi or y1_hi are non-zero, jump to
 105+ C471 21 E8 C0    >                            ld      hl,P_XX1532+1             ; ORA XX15+3             \ LL137 to return from the subroutine with the C flag
 105+ C474 B6          >                            or      (hl)
 105+ C475 C2 AB C4    >                            jp      nz, P_LL137_6502          ; BNE LL137              \ set, as the line doesn't fit on-screen
 105+ C478 3A E7 C0    >                            ld      a,(P_XX1532)              ; LDA XX15+2             \ If y1_lo > y-coordinate of the bottom of the screen
 105+ C47B FE 80       >                            cp      128                     ; CMP #Y*2               \ jump to LL137 to return from the subroutine with the
 105+ C47D D2 AB C4    >                            jp      nc, P_LL137_6502          ; BCS LL137              \ C flag set, as the line doesn't fit on-screen
 105+ C480             >;-- If we get here, XX13 = 95 or 191, and in both cases (x2, y2) is off-screen, so we now need to swap the (x1, y1) and (x2, y2) coordinates around before doing the actual clipping, because we need to clip (x2, y2) but the clipping routine at LL118 only clips (x1, y1)
 105+ C480 2A E5 C0    >P_LLX117_6502:         ld      hl,( P_XX1510)             ; LDX XX15               \ Swap x1_lo = x2_lo
 105+ C483 ED 5B E9 C0 >                            ld      de,( P_XX1554)
 105+ C487 ED 53 E5 C0 >                            ld      ( P_XX1510),de
 105+ C48B 22 E9 C0    >                            ld      ( P_XX1554),hl
 105+ C48E 2A E7 C0    >                            ld      hl,( P_XX1532)             ; LDX XX15+2             \ Swap y1_lo = y2_lo
 105+ C491 ED 5B EB C0 >                            ld      de,( P_XX1576)
 105+ C495 ED 53 E7 C0 >                            ld      ( P_XX1532),de
 105+ C499 22 EB C0    >                            ld      ( P_XX1576),hl
 105+ C49C CD 90 C2    >                            call    P_LL118_6502              ; JSR LL118              \ Call LL118 to move (x1, y1) along the line onto the screen, i.e. clip the line at the (x1, y1) end
 105+ C49F 21 83 CA    >                            ld      hl,SWAP
 105+ C4A2 35          >                            dec     (hl)                    ; DEC SWAP               \ Set SWAP = &FF to indicate that we just clipped the line at the (x2, y2) end by swapping the coordinates (the DEC does this as we set SWAP to 0 at the start of this subroutine)
 105+ C4A3 F1          >P_LL124_6502:          pop     af                      ; PLA            SP+0    \ Restore Y from the stack so it gets preserved through
 105+ C4A4 32 B1 EF    >                            ld      (Yreg),a                ; TAY                    \ the call to this subroutine
 105+ C4A7 CD 3A C3    >                            call    P_LL146_6502              ; JMP LL146              \ Jump up to LL146 to move the low bytes of (x1, y1) and (x2, y2) into (X1, Y1) and (X2, Y2), and return from the subroutine with a successfully clipped line
 105+ C4AA C9          >                            ret                             ; then exit so we don't pop it twice
 105+ C4AB F1          >P_LL137_6502:          pop     af                      ; PLA            SP+0    \ Restore Y from the stack so it gets preserved through
 105+ C4AC 32 B1 EF    >                            ld      (Yreg),a                ; TAY                    \ the call to this subroutine
 105+ C4AF             >                            SetCarryFlag                    ; SEC                    \ Set the C flag to indicate the clipped line does not fit on-screen
 105+ C4AF 37          >                        scf
 105+ C4B0 C9          >                            ret                             ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
 105+ C4B1             >
 105+ C4B1             >
 105+ C4B1 21 D4 F5    >P_l2_draw_6502_line:   ld      hl,x1                           ; copy from currnet position to 6502 variables
 105+ C4B4 11 E5 C0    >                            ld      de, P_XX1510
 105+ C4B7 01 08 00    >                            ld      bc,4*2
 105+ C4BA ED B0       >                            ldir
 105+ C4BC CD F8 C2    >                            call    P_LL145_6502                      ; perform 6502 version
 105+ C4BF D8          >                            ret     c                               ; returns if carry is set as its a no draw
 105+ C4C0 21 00 00    >.CopyBackResults:           ld      hl,0
 105+ C4C3 22 D4 F5    >                            ld      (x1),hl
 105+ C4C6 22 D6 F5    >                            ld      (y1),hl
 105+ C4C9 22 D8 F5    >                            ld      (x2),hl
 105+ C4CC 22 DA F5    >                            ld      (y2),hl
 105+ C4CF 3A E5 C0    >                            ld      a,( P_XX1510)
 105+ C4D2 32 D4 F5    >                            ld      (x1),a
 105+ C4D5 4F          >                            ld      c,a
 105+ C4D6 3A E6 C0    >                            ld      a,( P_XX1510+1)
 105+ C4D9 32 D6 F5    >                            ld      (y1),a
 105+ C4DC 47          >                            ld      b,a
 105+ C4DD 3A E7 C0    >                            ld      a,( P_XX1510+2)
 105+ C4E0 32 D8 F5    >                            ld      (x2),a
 105+ C4E3 5F          >                            ld      e,a
 105+ C4E4 3A E8 C0    >                            ld      a,( P_XX1510+3)
 105+ C4E7 32 DA F5    >                            ld      (y2),a
 105+ C4EA 57          >                            ld      d,a
 105+ C4EB 3E FF       >                            ld      a,$FF
 105+ C4ED             >                            ClearCarryFlag
 105+ C4ED B7          >                        or a
 105+ C4EE C9          >                            ret
 106+ C4EF                                          ; Not needed as we don't do rotation matrices for planets
 107+ C4EF                                          ;InitialiseUniverseObjMacro P
 108+ C4EF
 109+ C4EF              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 110+ C4EF              ; clear out the planet data block
 111+ C4EF 21 10 C0     ResetP_BnKData:         ld      hl,P_BnKDataBlock
 112+ C4F2 11 0A 01                             ld      de,P_BnK_Data_len
 113+ C4F5 AF                                   xor     a
 114+ C4F6 CD F0 7D                             call    memfill_dma
 115+ C4F9 C9                                   ret
 116+ C4FA              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 117+ C4FA 21 10 C0     ResetP_BnKPosition:     ld      hl,P_BnKxlo
 118+ C4FD 06 09                                ld      b, 3*3
 119+ C4FF AF                                   xor     a
 120+ C500 77           .zeroLoop:              ld      (hl),a
 121+ C501 23                                   inc     hl
 122+ C502 10 FC                                djnz    .zeroLoop
 123+ C504 C9                                   ret
 124+ C505              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 125+ C505              ; Normalise planet vectors
 126+ C505              ; Not needed as we don't rotate planets and suns
 127+ C505              ;P_NormaliseRotMat:      ld      hl,P_BnkTransmatNosevZ+1   ; initialise loop
 128+ C505              ;                        ld      c,ConstNorm                 ; c = Q = norm = 197
 129+ C505              ;                        ld      a,c
 130+ C505              ;                        ld      (varQ),a                    ; set up varQ
 131+ C505              ;                        ld      b,9                         ; total of 9 elements to transform
 132+ C505              ;.LL21Loop:              ld      d,(hl)
 133+ C505              ;                        dec     hl
 134+ C505              ;                        ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = hilo now   hl now = pointer to low byte
 135+ C505              ;                        ShiftDELeft1                        ; De = DE * 2
 136+ C505              ;                        ld      a,d                         ; a = hi byte after shifting
 137+ C505              ;                        push	hl
 138+ C505              ;                        push	bc
 139+ C505              ;                        call    Norm256mulAdivQ
 140+ C505              ;                        ;===call    RequAmul256divC				; R = (2(hi).0)/ConstNorm - LL28 Optimised BFRDIV R=A*256/Q = delta_y / delta_x Use Y/X grad. as not steep
 141+ C505              ;                        ld      a,c                         ; BFRDIV returns R also in l reg
 142+ C505              ;                        pop		bc
 143+ C505              ;                        pop		hl							; bc gets wrecked by BFRDIV
 144+ C505              ;                        ld      (hl),a                      ; write low result to low byte so zlo = (zhl *2)/197, we keep hi byte in tact as we need the sign bit
 145+ C505              ;                        dec     hl                          ; now hl = hi byte of pre val e.g z->y->x
 146+ C505              ;                        djnz    .LL21Loop                    ; loop from 2zLo through to 0xLo
 147+ C505              ;                        ret
 148+ C505
 149+ C505
 150+ C505              ; This uses UBNKNodeArray as the list
 151+ C505              ; the array is 256 * 2 bytes
 152+ C505              ; counter is current row y pos
 153+ C505              ; byte 1 is start x pos
 154+ C505              ; byte 2 is end x pos
 155+ C505              ; if they are both 0 then skip
 156+ C505              ; its always horizontal, yellow
 157+ C505              ; 16 different Planet Colours
 158+ C505              ; codes D<> Dark, M<> Mid, L<> Light B<> Brightest
 159+ C505              PlanetColour10DG        equ      40     ; Green
 160+ C505              PlanetColour20DG        equ      44
 161+ C505              PlanetColour11MG        equ      44
 162+ C505              PlanetColour21MG        equ      80
 163+ C505              PlanetColour12LG        equ      80
 164+ C505              PlanetColour22LG        equ      84
 165+ C505              PlanetColour13BG        equ      84
 166+ C505              PlanetColour23BG        equ      120
 167+ C505              PlanetColour14DB        equ      1      ; Blue
 168+ C505              PlanetColour24DB        equ      2
 169+ C505              PlanetColour15MB        equ      2
 170+ C505              PlanetColour25MB        equ      3
 171+ C505              PlanetColour16LB        equ      3
 172+ C505              PlanetColour26LB        equ      67
 173+ C505              PlanetColour17DO        equ      68     ; Orange
 174+ C505              PlanetColour27DO        equ      100
 175+ C505              PlanetColour18MO        equ      100
 176+ C505              PlanetColour28MO        equ      136
 177+ C505              PlanetColour19LO        equ      136
 178+ C505              PlanetColour29LO        equ      168
 179+ C505              PlanetColour1ABO        equ      168
 180+ C505              PlanetColour2ABO        equ      204
 181+ C505              PlanetColour1BDR        equ      64     ; Red
 182+ C505              PlanetColour2BDR        equ      96
 183+ C505              PlanetColour1CMR        equ      96
 184+ C505              PlanetColour2CMR        equ      128
 185+ C505              PlanetColour1DLR        equ      128
 186+ C505              PlanetColour2DLR        equ      160
 187+ C505              PlanetColour1EMC        equ      18     ; Cyan
 188+ C505              PlanetColour2EMC        equ      22
 189+ C505              PlanetColour1FMP        equ      163    ; Purple
 190+ C505              PlanetColour2FMP        equ      226    ; note avoiding transparent
 191+ C505
 192+ C505 28 2C 50 54  PlanetColour1Table:     DB       PlanetColour10DG, PlanetColour11MG, PlanetColour12LG, PlanetColour13BG
 193+ C509 01 02 03 44                          DB       PlanetColour14DB, PlanetColour15MB, PlanetColour16LB, PlanetColour17DO
 194+ C50D 64 88 A8 40                          DB       PlanetColour18MO, PlanetColour19LO, PlanetColour1ABO, PlanetColour1BDR
 195+ C511 60 80 12 A3                          DB       PlanetColour1CMR, PlanetColour1DLR, PlanetColour1EMC, PlanetColour1FMP
 196+ C515 2C 50 54 78  PlanetColour2Table:     DB       PlanetColour20DG, PlanetColour21MG, PlanetColour22LG, PlanetColour23BG
 197+ C519 02 03 43 64                          DB       PlanetColour24DB, PlanetColour25MB, PlanetColour26LB, PlanetColour27DO
 198+ C51D 88 A8 CC 60                          DB       PlanetColour28MO, PlanetColour29LO, PlanetColour2ABO, PlanetColour2BDR
 199+ C521 80 A0 16 E2                          DB       PlanetColour2CMR, PlanetColour2DLR, PlanetColour2EMC, PlanetColour2FMP
 200+ C525
 201+ C525 44           WarpPlanetByHL:         ld      b,h
 202+ C526 4D                                   ld      c,l
 203+ C527 26 00                                ld      h,0
 204+ C529 ED 5B 17 C0                          ld      de,(P_BnKzhi)
 205+ C52D 3A 16 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKzlo)
 206+ C530 6F                                   ld      l,a
 207+ C531                                      MMUSelectMathsBankedFns
 207+ C531 ED 91 50 66 >                     nextreg MathsBankedFnsMMU, BankMathsBankedFns
 207+ C535 CD 10 01       call  SubBCHfromDELsigned
 208+ C538 ED 53 17 C0                          ld      (P_BnKzhi),de
 209+ C53C 7D                                   ld      a,l
 210+ C53D 32 16 C0                             ld      (P_BnKzlo),a
 211+ C540 C9                                   ret
 212+ C541
 213+ C541              ; PLANET
 214+ C541 21 18 C0     WarpPlanetCloser:       ld      hl,P_BnKzsgn
 215+ C544 7E           .PositiveAxis:          ld      a,(hl)
 216+ C545                                      ReturnIfALTNusng 2                      ; hard liit along z axis
 216+ C545 FE 02       >                        cp    2
 216+ C547 D8          >                        ret	 c
 217+ C548 35                                   dec     (hl)
 218+ C549 C9                                   ret
 219+ C54A
 220+ C54A              ; It should normally be behind but someone could fly past a planet, turn aroudn and jump
 221+ C54A 21 18 C0     WarpPlanetFurther:      ld      hl,P_BnKzsgn
 222+ C54D 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 223+ C54E                                      ReturnIfAGTENusng $7F                   ; this is the hard limit else it woudl turn negative and flip to -0
 223+ C54E FE 7F       >                        cp    $7F
 223+ C550 D0          >                        ret	 nc
 224+ C551 34                                   inc     (hl)                           ; if its negative it will still increase as we will block insane values
 225+ C552 C9                                   ret
 226+ C553
 227+ C553              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 228+ C553              ; This sets current universe object to a planet,they use sign + 23 bit positions
 229+ C553              ; we need to have variable size and color
 230+ C553              CalculatePlanetWarpPositon:
 231+ C553 3A F0 7F     .CalcZPosition:         ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+1)      ; seed d & 7
 232+ C556 E6 07                                and     %00000111               ; .
 233+ C558 C6 07                                add     a,7                     ; + 7
 234+ C55A CB 2F                                sra     a                       ; / 2
 235+ C55C 32 18 C0     .SetZPosition:          ld      (P_BnKzsgn),a            ; << 16 (i.e. load into z sign byte
 236+ C55F 21 00 00                             ld      hl, $0000               ; now set z hi and lo
 237+ C562 22 16 C0                             ld      (P_BnKzlo),hl            ;
 238+ C565 3A F4 7F     .CalcXandYPosition:     ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+5)      ; seed f & 3
 239+ C568 E6 03                                and     %00000011               ; .
 240+ C56A C6 03                                add     a,3                     ; + 3
 241+ C56C 47                                   ld      b,a
 242+ C56D 3A F3 7F                             ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+4)      ; get low bit of seed e
 243+ C570 E6 01                                and     %00000001
 244+ C572 1F                                   rra                             ; roll bit 0 into bit 7
 245+ C573 B0                                   or      b                       ; now calc is f & 3 * -1 if seed e is odd
 246+ C574 32 12 C0     .SetXandYPosition:      ld      (P_BnKxsgn),a            ; set into x and y sign byte
 247+ C577 32 15 C0                             ld      (P_BnKysgn),a            ; .
 248+ C57A 78                                   ld      a,b                     ; we want just seed f & 3 here
 249+ C57B 32 11 C0                             ld      (P_BnKxhi),a             ; set into x and y high byte
 250+ C57E 32 14 C0                             ld      (P_BnKyhi),a             ; .
 251+ C581                                      ZeroA
 251+ C581 AF          >                        xor a
 252+ C582 32 10 C0                             ld      (P_BnKxlo),a
 253+ C585 32 13 C0                             ld      (P_BnKylo),a
 254+ C588 C9                                   ret
 255+ C589
 256+ C589              CalculatePlanetLaunchedPosition:
 257+ C589              .CalcXPosition:         MMUSelectMathsBankedFns
 257+ C589 ED 91 50 66 >                     nextreg MathsBankedFnsMMU, BankMathsBankedFns
 258+ C58D DD 21 10 C0                          ld      ix,P_BnKxlo             ; P_BnKxlo += ParentPlanetX
 259+ C591 FD 21 27 80                          ld      iy,ParentPlanetX        ; .
 260+ C595 CD 90 00                             call    AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed   ; .
 261+ C598 DD 21 13 C0  .CalcYPosition:         ld      ix,P_BnKylo             ; P_BnKylo += ParentPlanetZ
 262+ C59C FD 21 2A 80                          ld      iy,ParentPlanetY        ; .
 263+ C5A0 CD 90 00                             call    AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed   ; .
 264+ C5A3 DD 21 16 C0  .CalcZPosition:         ld      ix,P_BnKzlo             ; P_BnKzlo += ParentPlanetZ
 265+ C5A7 FD 21 2D 80                          ld      iy,ParentPlanetZ        ; .
 266+ C5AB CD 90 00                             call    AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed   ; .
 267+ C5AE C9                                   ret
 268+ C5AF              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 269+ C5AF 21 10 C0     CopyPlanettoGlobal:     ld      hl,P_BnKxlo
 270+ C5B2 11 27 80                             ld      de,ParentPlanetX
 271+ C5B5 01 09 00                             ld      bc,3*3
 272+ C5B8 ED B0                                ldir
 273+ C5BA C9                                   ret
 274+ C5BB              ; This sets current universe object to a planet,they use sign + 23 bit positions
 275+ C5BB              ; we need to have variable size and color
 276+ C5BB CD EF C4     CreatePlanet:           call    ResetP_BnKData          ; Clear out planet block
 277+ C5BE 3A 1E 80                             ld      a,(DisplayTekLevel)
 278+ C5C1 E6 02                                and     %00000010               ; Set A = 128 or 130 depending on bit 1 of the system's tech level
 279+ C5C3 F6 80                                or      %10000000
 280+ C5C5 32 6B C0                             ld      (P_BnKShipType),a       ; and load to ship type (synomous with planet type)
 281+ C5C8                                      ; PLanets don't have pitch and roll MaxUnivPitchAndRoll
 282+ C5C8 3A F0 7F                             ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+1)      ; a= bits 1 and 0 of working seed1 + 3 + carry
 283+ C5CB E6 03                                and     %00000011               ; .
 284+ C5CD CE 03                                adc     3                       ; we also lauch planet side so its infront of us
 285+ C5CF 32 18 C0                             ld      (P_BnKzsgn),a           ; set z sign to 3 + C + 0..3 bits
 286+ C5D2 CB 1F                                rr      a
 287+ C5D4 32 12 C0                             ld      (P_BnKxsgn),a
 288+ C5D7 32 15 C0                             ld      (P_BnKysgn),a
 289+ C5DA 3A 1E 80     .SetColour:             ld      a,(DisplayTekLevel)
 290+ C5DD 21 1F 80                             ld      hl,DisplayPopulation    ; add displaypopulation
 291+ C5E0 86                                   add     a, (hl)
 292+ C5E1 47                                   ld      b,a                     ; save for atmosphere level
 293+ C5E2 23                                   inc     hl                      ; move to DisplayProductivity
 294+ C5E3 86                                   add     a, (hl)
 295+ C5E4 E6 0F                                and     $0F                     ; limit to 0 to 16
 296+ C5E6 21 05 C5                             ld      hl,PlanetColour1Table
 297+ C5E9 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 298+ C5EB 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 299+ C5EC 32 E2 C0                             ld      (P_Colour1),a
 300+ C5EF 3E 10                                ld      a,$10
 301+ C5F1 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 302+ C5F3 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 303+ C5F4 32 E3 C0                             ld      (P_Colour2),a
 304+ C5F7 78                                   ld      a,b
 305+ C5F8 E6 07                                and     %00000111               ; atmosphere can be 0 to  3 pixels thick
 306+ C5FA CB 3F                                srl     a                       ;
 307+ C5FC 32 E4 C0                             ld      (P_Colour2Thickness),a
 308+ C5FF              .SetOrientation:        ; Not needed as we don't do planet rotation call    P_InitRotMat
 309+ C5FF CD AF C5                             call    CopyPlanettoGlobal      ; Set up global position interface
 310+ C602 C9                                   ret
 311+ C603
 312+ C603 CD EF C4     CreatePlanetLaunched:   call    ResetP_BnKData
 313+ C606 CD BB C5                             call    CreatePlanet
 314+ C609 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0
 315+ C60C 22 10 C0                             ld      (P_BnKxlo),hl
 316+ C60F 22 13 C0                             ld      (P_BnKylo),hl
 317+ C612 21 03 FF                             ld      hl,$FF03
 318+ C615 22 16 C0                             ld      (P_BnKzlo),hl
 319+ C618                                      ZeroA
 319+ C618 AF          >                        xor a
 320+ C619 32 12 C0                             ld      (P_BnKxsgn),a
 321+ C61C 32 15 C0                             ld      (P_BnKysgn),a
 322+ C61F 32 18 C0                             ld      (P_BnKzsgn),a
 323+ C622                                      ; PLanets don't have pitch and roll MaxUnivPitchAndRoll
 324+ C622 CD AF C5                             call    CopyPlanettoGlobal      ; Set up global position interface
 325+ C625 C9                                   ret
 326+ C626              ; NEED FINSIHGING
 327+ C626
 328+ C626
 329+ C626 ED 4B E9 C0  ScalePlanetTo8Bit:		ld			bc,(P_BnKZScaled)
 330+ C62A 2A E5 C0                             ld			hl,(P_BnKXScaled)
 331+ C62D ED 5B E7 C0                          ld			de,(P_BnKYScaled)
 332+ C631 78           .SetABSbc:              ld			a,b
 333+ C632 DD 67                                ld			ixh,a
 334+ C634 E6 7F                                and			SignMask8Bit
 335+ C636 47                                   ld			b,a									; bc = ABS bc
 336+ C637 7C           .SetABShl:              ld			a,h
 337+ C638 DD 6F                                ld			ixl,a
 338+ C63A E6 7F                                and			SignMask8Bit
 339+ C63C 67                                   ld			h,a									; hl = ABS hl
 340+ C63D 7A           .SetABSde:              ld			a,d
 341+ C63E FD 67                                ld			iyh,a
 342+ C640 E6 7F                                and			SignMask8Bit
 343+ C642 57                                   ld			d,a									; de = ABS de
 344+ C643 78           .ScaleNodeTo8BitLoop:   ld          a,b		                            ; U	\ z hi
 345+ C644 B4                                   or			h                                   ; XX15+1	\ x hi
 346+ C645 B2                                   or			d                                   ; XX15+4	\ y hi
 347+ C646 28 0F                                jr          z,.ScaleNodeDone                   ; if X, Y, Z = 0  exit loop down once hi U rolled to 0
 348+ C648                                      ShiftHLRight1
 348+ C648 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 348+ C64A CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 349+ C64C                                      ShiftDERight1
 349+ C64C CB 3A       >			   srl d
 349+ C64E CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 350+ C650                                      ShiftBCRight1
 350+ C650 CB 38       >			   srl b
 350+ C652 CB 19       >			   rr  c
 351+ C654 C3 43 C6                             jp          .ScaleNodeTo8BitLoop
 352+ C657              ; now we have scaled values we have to deal with sign
 353+ C657 DD 7C        .ScaleNodeDone:          ld			a,ixh								; get sign bit and or with b
 354+ C659 E6 80                                and			SignOnly8Bit
 355+ C65B B0                                   or			b
 356+ C65C 47                                   ld			b,a
 357+ C65D DD 7D        .SignforHL:              ld			a,ixl								; get sign bit and or with b
 358+ C65F E6 80                                and			SignOnly8Bit
 359+ C661 B4                                   or			h
 360+ C662 67                                   ld			h,a
 361+ C663 FD 7C        .SignforDE:              ld			a,iyh								; get sign bit and or with b
 362+ C665 E6 80                                and			SignOnly8Bit
 363+ C667 B2                                   or			d
 364+ C668 57                                   ld			d,a
 365+ C669 ED 43 E9 C0  .SignsDoneSaveResult:	ld			(P_BnKZScaled),bc
 366+ C66D 22 E5 C0                             ld			(P_BnKXScaled),hl
 367+ C670 ED 53 E7 C0                          ld			(P_BnKYScaled),de
 368+ C674 78                                   ld			a,b
 369+ C675 32 5E 7F                             ld			(varU),a
 370+ C678 79                                   ld			a,c
 371+ C679 32 7B 7F                             ld			(varT),a
 372+ C67C C9                                   ret
 373+ C67D
 374+ C67D              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 375+ C67D                                      include "./Universe/Planet/CopyPlanetXX12ScaledToPlanetXX18.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Planet/CopyPlanetXX12ScaledToPlanetXX18.asm
   1++C67D              CopyPSXX12ScaledToPXX18:
   2++C67D              CopyResultToPDrawCam:
   3++C67D                      ldCopyByte P_XX12         ,P_XX18             ; XX12+0 => XX18+0  Set XX18(2 0) = dot_sidev
   3++C67D 3A EB C0    >                        ld       a,(P_XX12)
   3++C680 32 5E C0    >                        ld       (P_XX18),a
   4++C683                      ldCopyByte P_XX12+1       ,P_XX18+2           ; XX12+1 => XX18+2
   4++C683 3A EC C0    >                        ld       a,(P_XX12+1)
   4++C686 32 60 C0    >                        ld       (P_XX18+2),a
   5++C689                      ldCopyByte P_XX12+2       ,P_XX18+3           ; XX12+2 => XX18+3  Set XX12+1 => XX18+2
   5++C689 3A ED C0    >                        ld       a,(P_XX12+2)
   5++C68C 32 61 C0    >                        ld       (P_XX18+3),a
   6++C68F                      ldCopyByte P_XX12+3       ,P_XX18+5           ; XX12+3 => XX18+5
   6++C68F 3A EE C0    >                        ld       a,(P_XX12+3)
   6++C692 32 63 C0    >                        ld       (P_XX18+5),a
   7++C695                      ldCopyByte P_XX12+4       ,P_XX18+6           ; XX12+4 => XX18+6  Set XX18(8 6) = dot_nosev
   7++C695 3A EF C0    >                        ld       a,(P_XX12+4)
   7++C698 32 64 C0    >                        ld       (P_XX18+6),a
   8++C69B                      ldCopyByte P_XX12+5       ,P_XX18+8           ; XX12+5 => XX18+8
   8++C69B 3A F0 C0    >                        ld       a,(P_XX12+5)
   8++C69E 32 66 C0    >                        ld       (P_XX18+8),a
   9++C6A1 C9                   ret
  10++C6A2

 376+ C6A2                                      include "./Universe/Planet/CopyPlanetPosToPlanetXX15.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Planet/CopyPlanetPosToPlanetXX15.asm
   1++C6A2              PlanetCopyPosToXX15:    ldCopyByte  P_BnKxhi         ,P_BnKXScaled        ; xlo
   1++C6A2 3A 11 C0    >                        ld       a,(P_BnKxhi)
   1++C6A5 32 E5 C0    >                        ld       (P_BnKXScaled),a
   2++C6A8                                      ldCopyByte  P_BnKxsgn        ,P_BnKXScaledSign    ; xsg
   2++C6A8 3A 12 C0    >                        ld       a,(P_BnKxsgn)
   2++C6AB 32 E6 C0    >                        ld       (P_BnKXScaledSign),a
   3++C6AE                                      ldCopyByte  P_BnKyhi         ,P_BnKYScaled        ; xlo
   3++C6AE 3A 14 C0    >                        ld       a,(P_BnKyhi)
   3++C6B1 32 E7 C0    >                        ld       (P_BnKYScaled),a
   4++C6B4                                      ldCopyByte  P_BnKysgn        ,P_BnKYScaledSign    ; xsg
   4++C6B4 3A 15 C0    >                        ld       a,(P_BnKysgn)
   4++C6B7 32 E8 C0    >                        ld       (P_BnKYScaledSign),a
   5++C6BA                                      ldCopyByte  P_BnKzhi         ,P_BnKZScaled        ; xlo
   5++C6BA 3A 17 C0    >                        ld       a,(P_BnKzhi)
   5++C6BD 32 E9 C0    >                        ld       (P_BnKZScaled),a
   6++C6C0                                      ldCopyByte  P_BnKzsgn        ,P_BnKZScaledSign    ; xsg
   6++C6C0 3A 18 C0    >                        ld       a,(P_BnKzsgn)
   6++C6C3 32 EA C0    >                        ld       (P_BnKZScaledSign),a
   7++C6C6 C9                                   ret

 377+ C6C7
 378+ C6C7              ; ......................................................                                                         ;;;
 379+ C6C7                          INCLUDE "./Universe/Planet/PlanetApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Planet/PlanetApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm
   1++C6C7
   2++C6C7              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   3++C6C7              ; Planet version of pitch and roll is a 24 bit calculation 1 bit sign + 23 bit value
   4++C6C7              ; Need to write a test routine for roll and pitchs
   5++C6C7 00 00 00 00  PlanetAlphaMulX            DB $00,$00, $00, $00
   6++C6CB 00 00 00 00  PlanetAlphaMulY            DB $00,$00, $00, $00
   7++C6CF 00 00 00 00  PlanetAlphaMulZ            DB $00,$00, $00, $00
   8++C6D3 00 00 00 00  PlanetBetaMulZ             DB $00,$00, $00, $00
   9++C6D7 00 00 00 00  PlanetBetaMulY             DB $00,$00, $00, $00
  10++C6DB 00 00 00     PlanetK2                   DS 3
  11++C6DE
  12++C6DE              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  13++C6DE              ; Sun version of pitch and roll is a 24 bit calculation 1 bit sign + 23 bit value
  14++C6DE              ; Need to write a test routine for roll and pitchs
  15++C6DE
  16++C6DE              ; Gets values backwards, is it 24 bit safe?
  17++C6DE
  18++C6DE 3A 78 7E     PlanetApplyMyRollAndPitch: 	ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; no roll or pitch, no calc needed
  19++C6E1 A7           .CheckForRoll:              and		a
  20++C6E2 C4 0A C7     							call	nz,Planet_Roll
  21++C6E5 3A 6B 7E     .CheckForPitch:				ld		a,(BETA)
  22++C6E8 A7           							and		a
  23++C6E9 C4 70 C7     							call	nz,Planet_Pitch
  24++C6EC 3A 59 7F     .ApplySpeed:            	ld      a,(DELTA)                   ; BCH = - Delta
  25++C6EF              							ReturnIfAIsZero
  25++C6EF A7          >                        and     a
  25++C6F0 C8          >                        ret     z
  26++C6F1 0E 00        							ld      c,0                         ;
  27++C6F3 67           							ld      h,a                         ;
  28++C6F4 06 80        							ld      b,$80                       ;
  29++C6F6 ED 5B 17 C0  							ld      de,(P_BnKzhi)                ; DEL = z position
  30++C6FA 3A 16 C0     							ld      a,(P_BnKzlo)                 ; .
  31++C6FD 6F           							ld      l,a                         ; .
  32++C6FE CD 14 01     							call    AddBCHtoDELsigned           ; update speed
  33++C701 ED 53 17 C0  							ld      (P_BnKzhi),DE                ; write back to zpos
  34++C705 7D           							ld      a,l
  35++C706 32 16 C0     							ld      (P_BnKzlo),a                ;
  36++C709 C9           							ret
  37++C70A
  38++C70A              ; Performs minsky rotation
  39++C70A              ; Joystick left          Joystick right
  40++C70A              ; ---------------------  ---------------------
  41++C70A              ; x :=  x      + y / 64  x :=  x -  y / 64  so rather than /64  is z * alpha / 256
  42++C70A              ; y :=  y      - x /64   y :=  y +  x / 64
  43++C70A              ;
  44++C70A              ; Joystick down          Joystick up
  45++C70A              ; ---------------------  ---------------------
  46++C70A              ; y :=  y      + z / 64  y :=  y - z / 64
  47++C70A              ; z :=  z      - y / 64  z :=  z + y / 64
  48++C70A              ;
  49++C70A              ; get z, multiply by alpha, pick top 3 bytes with sign
  50++C70A              ; get x, multiply by alpha, pick top 3 bytes with sign
  51++C70A              ; if alpha +ve subtract x = x - z adj, z =z + x adj , else x += z adj z -= z adj
  52++C70A 3A 78 7E     Planet_Roll:				ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; get roll value
  53++C70D E6 7F        							and 	$7F
  54++C70F 57           							ld      d,a                         ; .
  55++C710 3A 13 C0     							ld      a,(P_BnKylo)                ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
  56++C713 5F           							ld      e,a                         ; .
  57++C714 2A 14 C0     							ld      hl,(P_BnKyhi)               ; .
  58++C717 CD 06 92     							call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * alpha, so DEL = X * -alpha / 256
  59++C71A 7D           							ld		a,l
  60++C71B 32 CB C6     							ld		(PlanetAlphaMulY),a			; save result
  61++C71E ED 53 CC C6  							ld		(PlanetAlphaMulY+1),de		; save result
  62++C722 3A 78 7E     							ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; get roll value
  63++C725 E6 7F        							and 	$7F
  64++C727 57           							ld      d,a                         ; .
  65++C728 3A 10 C0     							ld      a,(P_BnKxlo)                ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
  66++C72B 5F           							ld      e,a                         ; .
  67++C72C 2A 11 C0     							ld      hl,(P_BnKxhi)               ; .
  68++C72F CD 06 92     							call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * alpha, so DEL = X * -alpha / 256
  69++C732 7D           							ld		a,l
  70++C733 32 C7 C6     							ld		(PlanetAlphaMulX),a			; save result
  71++C736 ED 53 C8 C6  							ld		(PlanetAlphaMulX+1),de		; save result
  72++C73A 3A 78 7E     							ld		a,(ALPHA)
  73++C73D E6 80        							and		$80
  74++C73F CA 59 C7     							jp		z,.RollingRight
  75++C742 DD 21 10 C0  .RollingLeft:				ld		ix,P_BnKxlo
  76++C746 FD 21 CB C6  							ld		iy,PlanetAlphaMulY
  77++C74A CD 90 00     							call	AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
  78++C74D DD 21 13 C0  							ld		ix,P_BnKylo
  79++C751 FD 21 C7 C6  							ld		iy,PlanetAlphaMulX
  80++C755 CD CD 00     							call	SubAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
  81++C758 C9           							ret
  82++C759 DD 21 10 C0  .RollingRight:				ld		ix,P_BnKxlo
  83++C75D FD 21 CB C6  							ld		iy,PlanetAlphaMulY
  84++C761 CD CD 00     							call	SubAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
  85++C764 DD 21 13 C0  							ld		ix,P_BnKylo
  86++C768 FD 21 C7 C6  							ld		iy,PlanetAlphaMulX
  87++C76C CD 90 00     							call	AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
  88++C76F C9           							ret
  89++C770
  90++C770 3A 6B 7E     Planet_Pitch:				ld      a,(BETA)                   ; get roll value
  91++C773 E6 7F        							and 	$7F
  92++C775 57           							ld      d,a                         ; .
  93++C776 3A 13 C0     							ld      a,(P_BnKylo)                ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
  94++C779 5F           							ld      e,a                         ; .
  95++C77A 2A 14 C0     							ld      hl,(P_BnKyhi)               ; .
  96++C77D CD 06 92     							call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * alpha, so DEL = X * -alpha / 256
  97++C780 7D           							ld		a,l
  98++C781 32 D7 C6     							ld		(PlanetBetaMulY),a			; save result
  99++C784 ED 53 D8 C6  							ld		(PlanetBetaMulY+1),de		; save result
 100++C788 3A 6B 7E     							ld      a,(BETA)                   ; get roll value
 101++C78B E6 7F        							and 	$7F
 102++C78D 57           							ld      d,a                         ; .
 103++C78E 3A 16 C0     							ld      a,(P_BnKzlo)                ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
 104++C791 5F           							ld      e,a                         ; .
 105++C792 2A 17 C0     							ld      hl,(P_BnKzhi)               ; .
 106++C795 CD 06 92     							call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * alpha, so DEL = X * -alpha / 256
 107++C798 7D           							ld		a,l
 108++C799 32 D3 C6     							ld		(PlanetBetaMulZ),a			; save result
 109++C79C ED 53 D4 C6  							ld		(PlanetBetaMulZ+1),de		; save result
 110++C7A0 3A 6B 7E     							ld		a,(BETA)
 111++C7A3 E6 80        							and		$80
 112++C7A5 CA BF C7     							jp		z,.Climbing
 113++C7A8 DD 21 13 C0  .Diving:					ld		ix,P_BnKylo
 114++C7AC FD 21 D3 C6  							ld		iy,PlanetBetaMulZ
 115++C7B0 CD 90 00     							call	AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 116++C7B3 DD 21 16 C0  							ld		ix,P_BnKzlo
 117++C7B7 FD 21 D7 C6  							ld		iy,PlanetBetaMulY
 118++C7BB CD CD 00     							call	SubAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 119++C7BE C9           							ret
 120++C7BF DD 21 13 C0  .Climbing:		     		ld		ix,P_BnKylo
 121++C7C3 FD 21 D3 C6  							ld		iy,PlanetBetaMulZ
 122++C7C7 CD CD 00     							call	SubAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 123++C7CA DD 21 16 C0  							ld		ix,P_BnKzlo
 124++C7CE FD 21 D7 C6  							ld		iy,PlanetBetaMulY
 125++C7D2 CD 90 00     							call	AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 126++C7D5 C9           							ret
# file closed: ././Universe/Planet/PlanetApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm
